 Efacepray ONCEyay UPONyay Ayay IMETay, ONGLay, ONGLay AGOyay, INyay  Arealmyay alledcay ethay  Idwesternmay  Unitedyay  Ates—specificallystay ethay atesstay ofyay  Inne­sotamay andyay  Wisconsin—ayay oupgray ofyay iendsfray atheredgay ogethertay otay oreverfay alteryay ethay istoryhay ofyay aminggay. Ityay wasn’tyay eirthay intentyay otay oday osay. 
 Eythay wereyay iredtay ofyay erelymay eadingray alestay aboutyay worldsyay ofyay agicmay, onstersmay, andyay adventureyay. 
 Eythay wantedyay otay ayplay inyay osethay worldsyay, atherray anthay observeyay emthay. 
 Atthay eythay wentyay onyay otay inventyay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray, andyay erebythay igniteyay ayay evolutionray inyay aminggay atthay ontinuescay otay isthay ayday, eaksspay otay wotay ingsthay. Irstfay, ityay eaksspay otay eirthay ingenuityyay andyay eniusgay inyay ig­uringfay outyay atthay amesgay wereyay ethay erfectpay wayyay otay exploreyay worldsyay atthay ouldcay otnay otherwiseyay existyay. 
 Almostyay everyyay odernmay amegay, whetheryay ayedplay onyay ayay igitalday eviceday oryay ayay abletoptay, owesyay omesay ebtday otay DDDay. Econdsay, ityay isyay ayay estamenttay otay ethay inherentyay appealyay ofyay ethay amegay eythay eatedcray. 
 Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray arkedspay ayay ivingthray obalglay enomenonphay. 
 Ityay isyay ethay irstfay oleplayingray amegay, andyay ityay emainsray oneyay ofyay ethay estbay ofyay itsyay eedbray. Otay ayplay DDDay, andyay otay ayplay ityay wellyay, youyay on’tday eednay otay eadray allyay ethay ulesray, emorizemay everyyay etailday ofyay ethay amegay, oryay astermay ethay inefay artyay ofyay ollingray unnyfay ookinglay iceday. Onenay ofyay osethay ingsthay avehay anyyay earingbay onyay what’syay estbay aboutyay ethay amegay. Whatyay youyay eednay areyay wotay ingsthay, ethay irstfay eingbay iendsfray withyay whomyay youyay ancay areshay ethay amegay. 
 Ayingplay amesgay withyay youryay iendsfray isyay ayay otlay ofyay unfay, utbay DDDay oesday omethingsay oremay anthay entertainyay. Ayingplay DDDay isyay anyay exerciseyay inyay ollaborativecay eationcray. 
 Youyay andyay youryay iendsfray eatecray epicyay oriesstay illedfay withyay en­siontay andyay emorablemay amadray. 
 Youyay eatecray illysay in-jokesyay atthay akemay youyay aughlay yearsyay aterlay. 
 Ethay iceday willyay ebay uelcray otay youyay, utbay youyay willyay oldiersay onyay. 
 Youryay ollectivecay eativ­itycray willyay uildbay oriesstay atthay youyay willyay elltay againyay andyay againyay, angingray omfray ethay utterlyyay absurdyay otay ethay uffstay ofyay egendlay. Ifyay youyay on’tday avehay iendsfray interestedyay inyay ayingplay, on’tday worryyay. 
 Ere’sthay ayay ecialspay alchemyyay atthay akestay aceplay aroundyay ayay DDDay abletay atthay othingnay elseyay ancay atchmay. 
 Ayplay ethay amegay withyay omeonesay enoughyay, andyay ethay wotay ofyay youareyay ikelylay otay endyay upyay iendsfray. 
 It’syay ayay oolcay idesay effectyay ofyay ethay amegay. 
 Youryay extnay aminggay oupgray isyay asyay oseclay asyay ethay earestnay amegay orestay, onlineyay orumfay, oryay aminggay onventioncay. Ethay econdsay ingthay youyay eednay isyay ayay ivelylay imaginationyay oryay, oremay importantlyyay, ethay willingnessyay otay useyay whateveryay imaginationyay youyay avehay. 
 Youyay on’tday eednay otay ebay ayay astermay orytellerstay oryay ayay illiantbray artistyay. 
 Youyay ustjay eednay otay aspireyay otay eatecray, otay avehay ethay ouragecay ofyay omeonesay whoyay isyay willingyay otay uildbay omethingsay andyay areshay ityay withyay othersyay. Uckilylay, ustjay asyay DDDay ancay engthenstray youryay iendshipsfray, ityay ancay elphay uildbay inyay youyay ethay onfidencecay otay eatecray andyay areshay. 
DDDay isyay ayay amegay atthay eachestay youyay otay ooklay orfay ethay everclay olutionsay, areshay ethay uddensay ideayay atthay ancay overcomeyay ayay oblempray, andyay ushpay yourselfyay otay imagineyay whatyay ouldcay ebay, atherray anthay implysay acceptyay whatyay isyay. Ethay irstfay aracterschay andyay adventuresyay youyay eatecray willyay obablypray ebay ayay ollectioncay ofyay ichesclay. 
 At’sthay uetray ofyay every­oneyay, omfray ethay eatestgray  Ungeonday  Astersmay inyay istoryhay onyay ownday. 
 Acceptyay isthay ealityray andyay ovemay onyay otay eatecray ethay econdsay aracterchay oryay adventureyay, whichyay willyay ebay etterbay, andyay enthay ethay irdthay, whichyay willyay ebay etterbay illstay. 
 Epeatray atthay overyay ethay oursecay ofyay imetay, andyay oonsay you’llyay ebay ableyay otay eatecray anythingyay, omfray ayay aracter’schay ackgroundbay orystay otay anyay epicyay worldyay ofyay antasyfay adventureyay. Onceyay youyay avehay atthay illskay, it’syay yoursyay oreverfay. 
 Ountlesscay writersyay, artistsyay, andyay otheryay eatorscray ancay acetray eirthay egin­ningsbay otay ayay ewfay agespay ofyay DDDay otesnay, ayay andfulhay ofyay iceday, andyay ayay itchenkay abletay. Aboveyay allyay elseyay, DDDay isyay yoursyay. 
 Ethay iendshipsfray youyay akemay aroundyay ethay abletay willyay ebay uniqueyay otay youyay. 
 Ethay adven­turesyay youyay embarkyay onyay, ethay aracterschay youyay eatecray, ethay emoriesmay youyay ake—thesemay willyay ebay yoursyay. 
DDDay isyay youryay ersonalpay ornercay ofyay ethay universeyay, ayay aceplay whereyay youyay avehay eefray eignray otay oday asyay youyay wishyay. Ogay orthfay ownay. 
 Eadray ethay ulesray ofyay ethay amegay andyay ethay orystay ofyay itsyay worldsyay, utbay alwaysyay ememberray atthay youyay areyay ethay oneyay whoyay ingsbray emthay otay ifelay. 
 Introductionyay Ethay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray oleplayingray amegay isyay aboutyay orytellingstay inyay worldsyay ofyay wordssay andyay orcerysay. 
 Ityay aresshay elementsyay withyay ildhoodchay amesgay ofyay ake-believemay. 
 Ikelay osethay amesgay, DDDay isyay ivendray ybay imagina­tionyay. 
 It’syay aboutyay icturingpay ethay oweringtay astlecay eneathbay ethay ormystay ightnay yskay andyay imaginingyay owhay ayay antasyfay adventureryay ightmay eactray otay ethay allengeschay atthay enescay esentspray. Ungeonday  Astermay (DMay):  Afteryay assingpay oughthray ethay aggycray eakspay, ethay oadray akestay ayay uddensay urntay otay ethay eastyay andyay  Astlecay  Avenloftray owerstay eforebay youyay. 
 Umblingcray owerstay ofyay onestay eepkay ayay ilentsay watchyay overyay ethay approachyay. 
 Eythay ooklay ikelay abandonedyay uardhousesgay. 
 Eyondbay esethay, ayay wideyay asmchay apesgay, isappearingday intoyay ethay eepday ogfay elowbay. 
Ayay oweredlay awbridgedray ansspay ethay asmchay, eadinglay otay anyay archedyay entranceyay otay ethay astlecay ourtyardcay. Ethay ainschay ofyay ethay awbridgedray eakcray inyay ethay windyay, eirthay ust-eatenray ironyay ainingstray withyay ethay weightyay. 
 Omfray atopyay ethay ighhay ongstray wallsyay, onestay argoylesgay arestay atyay youyay omfray ollowhay ocketssay andyay ingray ideouslyhay. 
Ayay ottingray woodenyay ortcullispay, eengray withyay owthgray, angshay inyay ethay entryyay unneltay. 
 Eyondbay isthay, ethay ainmay oorsday ofyay  Astlecay  Avenloftray andstay openyay, ayay ichray warmyay ightlay illingspay intoyay ethay ourtyardcay. Illipphay (ayingplay  Arethgay): Iyay wantyay otay ooklay atyay ethay argoylesgay. 
Iyay avehay ayay eelingfay ey’rethay otnay ustjay atuesstay. Amyyay (ayingplay  Ivaray):  Ethay awbridgedray ookslay ecarious?Ipray wantyay otay eesay owhay urdystay ityay isyay. 
 Oday Iyay inkthay weyay ancay osscray ityay, oryay isyay ityay oinggay otay ollapsecay underyay ouryay weightyay? Unlikeyay ayay amegay ofyay ake-believemay, DDDay ivesgay ucturestray otay ethay oriesstay, ayay wayyay ofyay eterminingday ethay onsequencescay ofyay ethay adventurersyay’ actionyay. 
 Ayersplay ollray iceday otay esolveray whetheryay eirthay attacksyay ithay oryay issmay oryay whetheryay eirthay adven­turersyay ancay alescay ayay iffclay, ollray awayyay omfray ethay ikestray ofyay ayay agicalmay ightninglay oltbay, oryay ullpay offyay omesay otheryay angerousday asktay. 
 Anythingyay isyay ossiblepay, utbay ethay iceday akemay omesay out­comesyay oremay obablepray anthay othersyay. Ungeonday  Astermay (DMay): OKyay, oneyay atyay ayay imetay. 
 Illipphay, you’reyay ookinglay atyay ethay argoylesgay? Illipphay:  Yeahyay. 
 Isyay erethay anyyay inthay eythay ightmay ebay eaturescray andyay otnay ecorations?DMday:  Akemay anyay  Intelligenceyay eckchay. Illipphay:  Oesday ymay  Investigationyay illskay apply?DMyay:  Uresay! Illipphay (ollingray ayay day20):  Ughyay. 
 even.DMSay:  Eythay ooklay ikelay ecorationsday otay youyay. 
 Andyay  Amyyay, Ivaray isyay eckingchay outyay ethay awbridgedray? Inyay ethay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray amegay, eachyay ayerplay eatescray anyay adventureryay (alsoyay alledcay ayay aracterchay) andyay eamstay upyay withyay otheryay adventurersyay (ayedplay ybay iendsfray). 
 Workingyay ogethertay, ethay oupgray ightmay exploreyay ayay arkday un­geonday, ayay uinedray itycay, ayay auntedhay astlecay, ayay ostlay empletay eepday inyay ayay unglejay, oryay ayay ava-filledlay averncay eneathbay ayay ysteriousmay ountainmay. 
 Ethay adventurersyay ancay olvesay uzzlespay, alktay withyay otheryay aracterschay, attlebay antasticfay onstersmay, andyay iscoverday abulousfay agicmay itemsyay andyay otheryay easuretray. Oneyay ayerplay, oweverhay, akestay onyay ethay oleray ofyay ethay  Ungeonday  Astermay (DMay), ethay ame’sgay eadlay orytellerstay andyay efereeray. 
 Ethay DMay eatescray adventuresyay orfay ethay aracterschay, whoyay av­igatenay itsyay azardshay andyay ecideday whichyay athspay otay exploreyay. 
 Ethay DMay ightmay escribeday ethay entranceyay otay  Astlecay  Avenloftray, andyay ethay ayersplay ecideday whatyay eythay wantyay eirthay adventurersyay otay oday. 
 Willyay eythay walkyay acrossyay ethay angerouslyday weatheredyay awbridgedray?  Ietay emselvesthay ogethertay withyay operay otay ini­mizemay ethay ancechay atthay omeonesay willyay allfay ifyay ethay awbridgedray ivesgay wayyay?  Oryay astcay ayay ellspay otay arrycay emthay overyay ethay asmchay? Enthay ethay DMay eterminesday ethay esultsray ofyay ethay adventur­ersyay’ actionsyay andyay arratesnay whatyay eythay experienceyay. 
 Ecausebay ethay DMay ancay improviseyay otay eactray otay anythingyay ethay ayersplay attemptyay, DDDay isyay infinitelyyay exibleflay, andyay eachyay adventureyay ancay ebay excitingyay andyay unexpectedyay. Ethay amegay ashay onay ealray endyay; whenyay oneyay orystay oryay questyay wrapsyay upyay, anotheryay oneyay ancay eginbay, eatingcray anyay ongoingyay orystay alledcay ayay ampaigncay. 
 Anymay eoplepay whoyay ayplay ethay amegay eepkay eirthay ampaignscay oinggay orfay onthsmay oryay yearsyay, eetingmay withyay eirthay iendsfray everyyay weekyay oryay osay otay ickpay upyay ethay orystay whereyay eythay eftlay offyay. 
 Ethay adventurersyay owgray inyay ightmay asyay ethay ampaigncay ontinuescay. 
 Eachyay onstermay efeatedday, eachyay adventureyay ompletedcay, andyay eachyay easuretray ecoveredray otnay onlyyay addsyay otay ethay ontinuingcay orystay, utbay alsoyay earnsyay ethay adventurersyay ewnay apabilitiescay. 
 Isthay increaseyay inyay owerpay isyay eflectedray ybay anyay adventurer’syay evellay. Ere’sthay onay winningyay andyay osinglay inyay ethay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray ame—atgay eastlay, otnay ethay wayyay osethay ermstay areyay usuallyyay understoodyay. 
 Ogethertay, ethay DMay andyay ethay ayersplay eatecray anyay excitingyay orystay ofyay oldbay adventurersyay whoyay onfrontcay eadlyday erilspay. 
 Ometimessay anyay adventureryay ightmay omecay otay ayay islygray endyay, orntay apartyay ybay erociousfay onstersmay oryay oneday inyay ybay ayay efariousnay illainvay. 
 Evenyay osay, ethay otheryay adventurersyay ancay earchsay orfay owerfulpay agicmay otay eviveray eirthay allenfay omradecay, oryay ethay ayerplay ightmay oosechay otay eatecray ayay ewnay aracterchay otay arrycay onyay. 
 Ethay oupgray ightmay ailfay otay ompletecay anyay adventureyay uccessfullysay, utbay ifyay everyoneyay adhay ayay oodgay imetay andyay eatedcray ayay emorablemay orystay, eythay allyay winyay. Worldsyay ofyay  Adventureyay Ethay anymay worldsyay ofyay ethay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray amegay areyay acesplay ofyay agicmay andyay onstersmay, ofyay avebray warriorsyay andyay ectacularspay adventuresyay. 
 Eythay eginbay withyay ayay oundationfay ofyay edievalmay antasyfay andyay enthay addyay ethay eaturescray, acesplay, andyay agicmay atthay akemay esethay worldsyay uniqueyay. Ethay worldsyay ofyay ethay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray amegay existyay withinyay ayay astvay osmoscay alledcay ethay ultiversemay, onnectedcay inyay angestray andyay ysteriousmay waysyay otay oneyay anotheryay andyay otay otheryay anesplay ofyay existenceyay, uchsay asyay ethay  Elementalyay  Aneplay ofyay  Irefay andyay ethay  Infiniteyay  Epthsday ofyay ethay  Abyssyay. 
isthay ultiversemay areyay anyay endlessyay arietyvay ofyay worldsyay. 
 Anymay ofyay emthay avehay eenbay ublishedpay asyay officialyay ettingssay orfay ethay DDDay amegay. 
 Ethay egendslay ofyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray,  Agdray- onlanceyay,  Eyhawkgray,  Arkday  Unsay,  Ystaramay, andyay  Eberronyay ettingssay areyay wovenyay ogethertay inyay ethay abricfay ofyay ethay ultimay- ersevay. 
 Alongsideyay esethay worldsyay areyay undredshay ofyay ousandsthay oremay, eatedcray ybay enerationsgay ofyay DDDay ayersplay orfay eirthay ownyay amesgay. 
 Andyay amidyay allyay ethay ichnessray ofyay ethay ultiversemay, youyay ightmay eatecray ayay worldyay ofyay youryay ownyay. Allyay esethay worldsyay areshay aracteristicschay, utbay eachyay worldyay isyay etsay apartyay ybay itsyay ownyay istoryhay andyay ulturescay, istinctiveday onstersmay andyay acesray, antasticfay eographygay, ancientyay un­geonsday, andyay emingschay illainsvay. 
 Omesay acesray avehay unusualyay aitstray inyay ifferentday worldsyay. 
 Ethay alflingshay ofyay ethay  Arkday  Unsay ettingsay, orfay exampleyay, areyay ungle-dwellingjay annibalscay, andyay ethay elvesyay areyay esertday omadsnay. 
 Omesay worldsyay eaturefay acesray unknownyay inyay otheryay ettingssay, uchsay asyay  Eberron’syay waryay- orgedfay, oldierssay eatedcray andyay imbuedyay withyay ifelay otay ightfay inyay ethay  Astlay  Waryay. 
 Omesay worldsyay areyay ominatedday ybay oneyay eatgray orystay, ikelay ethay  Waryay ofyay ethay  Ancelay atthay aysplay ayay entralcay oleray inyay ethay  Agonlancedray ettingsay. 
 Utbay ey’rethay allyay DDDay worldsyay, andyay youyay ancay useyay ethay ulesray inyay isthay ookbay otay eatecray ayay ar­acterchay andyay ayplay inyay anyyay oneyay ofyay emthay. Youryay DMay ightmay etsay ethay ampaigncay onyay oneyay ofyay esethay worldsyay oryay onyay oneyay atthay ehay oryay eshay eatedcray. 
 Ecausebay erethay isyay osay uchmay iversityday amongyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay, youyay ouldshay eckchay withyay youryay DMay aboutyay anyyay ousehay ulesray atthay willyay affectyay youryay ayplay ofyay ethay amegay. 
 Ultimatelyyay, ethay  Un­geonday  Astermay isyay ethay authorityyay onyay ethay ampaigncay andyay itsyay ettingsay, evenyay ifyay ethay ettingsay isyay ayay ublishedpay worldyay. Usingyay  Isthay  Ookbay Ethay  Ayer’splay  Andbookhay isyay ividedday intoyay eethray artspay. Artpay 1 isyay aboutyay eatingcray ayay aracterchay, ovidingpray ethay ulesray andyay uidancegay youyay eednay otay akemay ethay aracterchay you’llyay ayplay inyay ethay amegay. 
 Ityay includesyay informationyay onyay ethay ariousvay acesray, assesclay, ackgroundsbay, equipmentyay, andyay otheryay ustomizationcay optionsyay atthay youyay ancay oosechay omfray. 
 Anymay ofyay ethay ulesray inyay artpay 1 elyray onyay aterialmay inyay artspay 2 andyay 3. 
 Ifyay youyay omecay acrossyay ayay amegay onceptcay inyay artpay 1 atthay youyay on’tday understandyay, onsultcay ethay ook’sbay indexyay. Artpay 2 etailsday ethay ulesray ofyay owhay otay ayplay ethay amegay, eyondbay ethay asicsbay escribedday inyay isthay introductionyay. 
 Atthay artpay overscay ethay indskay ofyay ieday ollsray youyay akemay otay etermineday uccesssay oryay ailurefay atyay ethay askstay youryay aracterchay attemptsyay, andyay escribesday ethay eethray oadbray ategoriescay ofyay activityyay inyay ethay amegay: explorationyay, interactionyay, andyay ombatcay. Artpay 3 isyay allyay aboutyay agicmay. 
 Ityay overscay ethay aturenay ofyay agicmay inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay, ethay ulesray orfay ellcastingspay, andyay ethay ugehay arietyvay ofyay ellsspay availableyay otay agic-usingmay arac­terschay (andyay onstersmay) inyay ethay amegay. Owhay otay  Ayplay Ethay ayplay ofyay ethay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray amegay unfoldsyay accordingyay otay isthay asicbay atternpay.1. 
 Ethay DMay escribesday ethay environmentyay. 
 Ethay Day Ellsmtay ethay ayersplay whereyay eirthay adventurersyay areyay andyay what’syay aroundyay emthay, esentingpray ethay asicbay opescay ofyay optionsyay atthay esentpray emselvesthay (owhay anymay oorsday eadlay outyay ofyay ayay oomray, what’syay onyay ayay abletay, who’syay inyay ethay averntay, andyay osay onyay).2. 
 Ethay ayersplay escribeday whatyay eythay wantyay otay oday. 
 Ome­timessay oneyay ayerplay eaksspay orfay ethay wholeyay artypay, ayingsay, “ We’llyay aketay ethay eastyay oorday,” orfay exampleyay. 
 Otheryay imestay, ifferentday adventurersyay oday ifferentday ingsthay: oneyay adventureryay ightmay earchsay ayay easuretray estchay whileyay ayay econdsay examinesyay anyay esotericyay ymbolsay engravedyay onyay ayay wallyay andyay ayay irdthay eepskay watchyay orfay onstersmay. 
 Ethay ayersplay on’tday eednay otay aketay urnstay, utbay ethay DMay istenslay otay everyyay ayerplay andyay ecidesday owhay otay esolveray osethay actionsyay. Ometimessay, esolvingray ayay asktay isyay easyyay. 
 Ifyay anyay adventureryay wantsyay otay walkyay acrossyay ayay oomray andyay openyay ayay oorday, ethay DMay ightmay ustjay aysay atthay ethay oorday opensyay andyay escribeday whatyay ieslay eyondbay. 
 Utbay ethay oorday ightmay ebay ockedlay, ethay oorflay ightmay idehay ayay eadlyday aptray, oryay omesay otheryay ircumstancecay ightmay akemay ityay allengingchay orfay anyay adventureryay otay ompletecay ayay asktay. 
 Inyay osethay asescay, ethay DMay ecidesday whatyay appenshay, oftenyay elyingray onyay ethay ollray ofyay ayay ieday otay etermineday ethay esultsray ofyay anyay actionyay.3. 
 Ethay DMay arratesnay ethay esultsray ofyay ethay adventurersyay’ actionsyay. 
 Escribingday ethay esultsray oftenyay eadslay otay anotheryay ecisionday ointpay, whichyay ingsbray ethay owflay ofyay ethay amegay ightray ackbay otay epstay 1. Isthay atternpay oldshay whetheryay ethay adventurersyay areyay au­tiouslycay exploringyay ayay uinray, alkingtay otay ayay eviousday incepray, oryay ockedlay inyay ortalmay ombatcay againstyay ayay ightymay agondray. 
 Inyay ertaincay ituationssay, articularlypay ombatcay, ethay actionyay isyay oremay ucturedstray andyay ethay ayersplay (andyay DMay) oday aketay urnstay oosingchay andyay esolvingray actionsyay. 
 Utbay ostmay ofyay ethay imetay, ayplay isyay uidflay andyay exibleflay, adaptingyay otay ethay ircumstancescay ofyay ethay adventureyay. Oftenyay ethay actionyay ofyay anyay adventureyay akestay aceplay inyay ethay imaginationyay ofyay ethay ayersplay andyay DMay, elyingray onyay ethay sdMsay erbalvay escriptionsday otay etsay ethay enescay. 
 Omesay Day msay ikelay otay useyay usicmay, artyay, oryay ecordedray oundsay effectsyay otay elphay etsay ethay oodmay, andyay anymay ayersplay andyay Day msay alikeyay adoptyay ifferentday oicesvay orfay ethay ariousvay adventurersyay, onstersmay, andyay otheryay aracterschay eythay ayplay inyay ethay amegay. 
 Ometimessay, ayay DMay ightmay aylay outyay ayay apmay andyay useyay okenstay oryay iniaturemay iguresfay otay epresentray eachyay eaturecray involvedyay inyay ayay enescay otay elphay ethay ayersplay eepkay acktray ofyay whereyay everyoneyay isyay. Amegay  Iceday  Ethay amegay usesyay olyhedralpay iceday withyay ifferentday umbersnay ofyay idessay. 
 Youyay ancay indfay iceday ikelay esethay inyay amegay oresstay andyay inyay anymay ookstoresbay. Inyay esethay ulesray, ethay ifferentday iceday areyay eferredray otay ybay ethay etterlay day ollowedfay ybay ethay umbernay ofyay idessay: day4, day6, day8, day10, day12, andyay day20. 
 Orfay instanceyay, ayay day6 isyay ayay ix-sidedsay ieday (ethay ypicaltay ubecay atthay anymay amesgay useyay). Ercentilepay iceday, oryay day100, workyay ayay ittlelay ifferentlyday. 
 Youyay enerategay ayay umbernay etweenbay 1 andyay 100 ybay ollingray wotay ifferentday en-sidedtay iceday umberednay omfray 0 otay 9. 
 Oneyay ieday (esignatedday eforebay youyay ollray) ivesgay ethay enstay igitday, andyay ethay otheryay ivesgay ethay onesyay igitday. 
 Ifyay youyay ollray ayay 7 andyay ayay 1, orfay exampleyay, ethay umbernay olledray isyay 71. 
 Wotay  Osyay epresentray 100. 
 Omesay en-sidedtay iceday areyay umberednay inyay enstay (00, 10, 20, andyay osay onyay), akingmay ityay easieryay otay istinguishday ethay enstay igitday omfray ethay onesyay igitday. 
 Inyay isthay asecay, ayay ollray ofyay 70 andyay 1 isyay 71, andyay 00 andyay 0 isyay 100. Whenyay youyay eednay otay ollray iceday, ethay ulesray elltay youyay owhay anymay iceday otay ollray ofyay ayay ertaincay ypetay, asyay wellyay asyay whatyay od­ifiersmay otay addyay. 
eethray eight-sidedyay iceday, addyay emthay ogethertay, andyay addyay 5 otay ethay otaltay. Ethay amesay day otationnay appearsyay inyay ethay expressionsyay “1day3” andyay “1day2.”  Otay imulatesay ethay ollray ofyay 1day3, ollray ayay day6 andyay ivideday ethay umbernay olledray ybay 2 (oundray upyay). 
 Otay imulatesay ethay ollray ofyay 1day2, ollray anyyay ieday andyay assignyay ayay 1 oryay 2 otay ethay ollray ependingday onyay whetheryay ityay wasyay oddyay oryay evenyay. 
( Alternativelyyay, ifyay ethay umbernay olledray isyay oremay anthay alfhay ethay umbernay ofyay idessay onyay ethay ieday, it’syay ayay 2.) Ethay Day20  Oesday anyay adventurer’syay wordsay wingsay urthay ayay agondray oryay ustjay ouncebay offyay itsyay iron-hardyay alesscay?  Willyay ethay ogreyay elievebay anyay outrageousyay uffblay?  Ancay ayay aracterchay wimsay acrossyay ayay agingray iverray?  Ancay ayay aracterchay avoidyay ethay ainmay astblay ofyay ayay ireballfay, oryay oesday ehay oryay eshay aketay ullfay amageday omfray ethay azeblay?  Inyay asescay whereyay ethay outcomeyay ofyay anyay actionyay isyay uncertainyay, ethay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray amegay eliesray onyay ollsray ofyay ayay 20-idedsay ieday, ayay day20, otay etermineday uccesssay oryay ailurefay. Everyyay aracterchay andyay onstermay inyay ethay amegay ashay apa­bilitiescay efinedday ybay ixsay abilityyay oresscay. 
 Ethay abilitiesyay areyay  Engthstray,  Exterityday,  Onstitutioncay,  Intelligenceyay,  Wisdomyay, andyay  Arismachay, andyay eythay ypicallytay angeray omfray 3 otay 18 orfay ostmay adventurersyay. 
( Onstersmay ightmay avehay oresscay asyay owlay asyay 1 oryay asyay ighhay asyay 30.)  Esethay abilityyay oresscay, andyay ethay abilityyay odifiersmay erivedday omfray emthay, areyay ethay asisbay orfay almostyay everyyay day20 ollray atthay ayay ayerplay akesmay onyay ayay arac­ter’schay oryay onster’smay ehalfbay. Abilityyay eckschay, attackyay ollsray, andyay avingsay owsthray areyay ethay eethray ainmay indskay ofyay day20 ollsray, ormingfay ethay orecay ofyay ethay ulesray ofyay ethay amegay. 
 Allyay eethray ollowfay esethay implesay epsstay.1. 
 Ollray ethay ieday andyay addyay ayay odifiermay. 
 Ollray ayay day20 andyay addyay ethay elevantray odifiermay. 
 Isthay isyay ypicallytay ethay od­ifiermay erivedday omfray oneyay ofyay ethay ixsay abilityyay oresscay, andyay ityay ometimessay includesyay ayay oficiencypray onusbay otay eflectray ayay ar­acter’schay articularpay illskay. 
( Eesay apterchay 1 orfay etailsday onyay eachyay abilityyay andyay owhay otay etermineday anyay ability’syay odifiermay.)2. 
 Applyyay ircumstantialcay onusesbay andyay enaltiespay. 
Ayay assclay eaturefay, ayay ellspay, ayay articularpay ircumstancecay, oryay omesay otheryay effectyay ightmay ivegay ayay onusbay oryay enaltypay otay ethay eckchay.3. 
 Omparecay ethay otaltay otay ayay argettay umbernay. 
 Ifyay ethay otaltay equalsyay oryay exceedsyay ethay argettay umbernay, ethay abilityyay eckchay, attackyay ollray, oryay avingsay owthray isyay ayay uccesssay. 
 Otherwiseyay, it’syay ayay ailurefay. 
 Ethay DMay isyay usuallyyay ethay oneyay whoyay eterminesday argettay umbersnay andyay ellstay ayersplay whetheryay eirthay abilityyay eckschay, attackyay ollsray, andyay avingsay owsthray ucceedsay oryay ailfay. Ethay argettay umbernay orfay anyay abilityyay eckchay oryay ayay avingsay owthray isyay alledcay ayay  Ifficultyday  Assclay (DCay). 
 Ethay argettay umbernay orfay anyay attackyay ollray isyay alledcay anyay  Armoryay  Assclay (ACyay). Isthay implesay uleray overnsgay ethay esolutionray ofyay ostmay askstay inyay DDDay ayplay. 
 Apterchay 7 ovidespray oremay etailedday ulesray orfay usingyay ethay day20 inyay ethay amegay. Advantageyay andyay  Isadvantageday Ometimessay anyay abilityyay eckchay, attackyay ollray, oryay avingsay owthray isyay odifiedmay ybay ecialspay ituationssay alledcay advantageyay andyay isadvantageday. 
 Advantageyay eflectsray ethay ositivepay ircum­stancescay urroundingsay ayay day20 ollray, whileyay isadvantageday eflectsray ethay oppositeyay. 
 Whenyay youyay avehay eitheryay advantageyay oryay isadvantageday, youyay ollray ayay econdsay day20 whenyay youyay akemay ethay ollray. 
 Useyay ethay igherhay ofyay ethay wotay ollsray ifyay youyay avehay advan­tageyay, andyay useyay ethay owerlay ollray ifyay youyay avehay isadvantageday. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay avehay isadvantageday andyay ollray ayay 17 andyay ayay 5, youyay useyay ethay 5. 
 Ifyay youyay insteadyay avehay advantageyay andyay ollray osethay umbersnay, youyay useyay ethay 17. Oremay etailedday ulesray orfay advantageyay andyay isadvantageday areyay esentedpray inyay apterchay 7. Ecificspay  Eatsbay  Eneralgay Isthay ookbay ontainscay ulesray, especiallyyay inyay artspay 2 andyay 3, atthay overngay owhay ethay amegay aysplay. 
 Atthay aidsay, anymay acialray aitstray, assclay eaturesfay, ellsspay, agicmay itemsyay, onstermay abili­tiesyay, andyay otheryay amegay elementsyay eakbray ethay eneralgay ulesray inyay omesay wayyay, eatingcray anyay exceptionyay otay owhay ethay estray ofyay ethay amegay worksyay. 
 Ememberray isthay:  Ifyay ayay ecificspay uleray ontra­dictscay ayay eneralgay uleray, ethay ecificspay uleray winsyay. Exceptionsyay otay ethay ulesray areyay oftenyay inormay. 
 Orfay instanceyay, anymay adventurersyay on’tday avehay oficiencypray withyay ongbowslay, utbay everyyay woodyay elfyay oesday ecausebay ofyay ayay acialray aittray. 
 Atthay aittray eatescray ayay inormay exceptionyay inyay ethay amegay. 
 Otheryay examplesyay ofyay ule-breakingray areyay oremay onspicuouscay. 
 Orfay instanceyay, anyay adventureryay an’tcay ormallynay asspay oughthray wallsyay, utbay omesay ellsspay akemay atthay ossiblepay. 
 Agicmay accountsyay orfay ostmay ofyay ethay ajormay exceptionsyay otay ethay ulesray. Oundray  Ownday Ere’sthay oneyay oremay eneralgay uleray youyay eednay otay owknay atyay ethay outsetyay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay ivideday ayay umbernay inyay ethay amegay, oundray ownday ifyay youyay endyay upyay withyay ayay actionfray, evenyay ifyay ethay actionfray isyay one-halfyay oryay eatergray. Adventuresyay Ethay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray amegay onsistscay ofyay ayay oupgray ofyay aracterschay embarkingyay onyay anyay adventureyay atthay ethay  Un­geonday  Astermay esentspray otay emthay. 
 Eachyay aracterchay ingsbray articularpay apabilitiescay otay ethay adventureyay inyay ethay ormfay ofyay abilityyay oresscay andyay illsskay, assclay eaturesfay, acialray aitstray, equipmentyay, andyay agicmay itemsyay. 
eirthay ompanionscay. 
 Ethay adventurersyay ustmay ooperatecay otay uccessfullysay ompletecay ethay adventureyay. Ethay adventureyay isyay ethay earthay ofyay ethay amegay, ayay orystay withyay ayay eginningbay, ayay iddlemay, andyay anyay endyay. 
 Anyay adventureyay ightmay ebay eatedcray ybay ethay  Ungeonday  Astermay oryay urchasedpay offyay ethay elfshay, weakedtay andyay odifiedmay otay uitsay ethay sdMsay eedsnay andyay esiresday. 
 Inyay eitheryay asecay, anyay adventureyay eaturesfay ayay antasticfay ettingsay, whetheryay it’syay anyay undergroundyay ungeonday, ayay um­blingcray astlecay, ayay etchstray ofyay wildernessyay, oryay ayay ustlingbay itycay. Ityay eaturesfay ayay ichray astcay ofyay aracterschay: ethay adventurersyay eatedcray andyay ayedplay ybay ethay otheryay ayersplay atyay ethay abletay, asyay wellyay asyay onplayernay aracterschay (NPay csay). 
 Osethay ar­acterschay ightmay ebay atronspay, alliesyay, enemiesyay, irelingshay, oryay ustjay ackgroundbay extrasyay inyay anyay adventureyay. 
 Oftenyay, oneyay ofyay ethay NPay csay isyay ayay illainvay whoseyay agendayay ivesdray uchmay ofyay anyay adventure’syay actionyay. Overyay ethay oursecay ofyay eirthay adventuresyay, ethay aracterschay areyay onfrontedcay ybay ayay arietyvay ofyay eaturescray, objectsyay, andyay ituationssay atthay eythay ustmay ealday withyay inyay omesay wayyay. 
 Ome­timessay ethay adventurersyay andyay otheryay eaturescray oday eirthay estbay otay illkay oryay apturecay eachyay otheryay inyay ombatcay. 
 Atyay otheryay imestay, ethay adventurersyay alktay otay anotheryay eaturecray (oryay evenyay ayay agicalmay objectyay) withyay ayay oalgay inyay indmay. 
 Andyay oftenyay, ethay adventurersyay endspay imetay yingtray otay olvesay ayay uzzlepay, ypassbay anyay obstacleyay, indfay omethingsay iddenhay, oryay unravelyay ethay ur­rentcay ituationsay. 
 Eanwhilemay, ethay adventurersyay exploreyay ethay worldyay, akingmay ecisionsday aboutyay whichyay wayyay otay aveltray andyay whatyay ey’llthay ytray otay oday extnay. Adventuresyay aryvay inyay engthlay andyay omplexitycay. 
Ayay ortshay adventureyay ightmay esentpray onlyyay ayay ewfay allengeschay, andyay ityay ightmay aketay onay oremay anthay ayay inglesay amegay essionsay otay ompletecay. 
Ayay onglay adventureyay ancay involveyay undredshay ofyay ombatscay, interactionsyay, andyay otheryay allengeschay, andyay aketay ozensday ofyay essionssay otay ayplay oughthray, etchingstray overyay weeksyay oryay onthsmay ofyay ealray imetay. 
 Usuallyyay, ethay endyay ofyay anyay adventureyay isyay arkedmay ybay ethay adventurersyay eadinghay ackbay otay ivilizationcay otay estray andyay enjoyyay ethay oilsspay ofyay eirthay aborslay. Utbay at’sthay otnay ethay endyay ofyay ethay orystay. 
 Youyay ancay inkthay ofyay anyay adventureyay asyay ayay inglesay episodeyay ofyay ayay TVay eriessay, ademay upyay ofyay ultiplemay excitingyay enesscay. 
Ayay ampaigncay isyay ethay wholeyay eries—asay ingstray ofyay adventuresyay oinedjay ogethertay, withyay ayay onsistentcay oupgray ofyay adventurersyay ollowingfay ethay arrativenay omfray artstay otay inishfay. Ethay  Eethray  Illarspay ofyay  Adventureyay Adventurersyay ancay ytray otay oday anythingyay eirthay ayersplay ancay imagineyay, utbay ityay ancay ebay elpfulhay otay alktay aboutyay eirthay activ­itiesyay inyay eethray oadbray ategoriescay: explorationyay, ocialsay interactionyay, andyay ombatcay. Explorationyay includesyay othbay ethay adventurersyay’ ovementmay oughthray ethay worldyay andyay eirthay interactionyay withyay objectsyay andyay ituationssay atthay equireray eirthay attentionyay. 
 Explorationyay isyay ethay ive-and-takegay ofyay ethay ayersplay escribingday whatyay eythay wantyay eirthay aracterschay otay oday, andyay ethay  Ungeonday  Astermay ellingtay ethay ayersplay whatyay appenshay asyay ayay esultray. 
 Onyay ayay argelay alescay, atthay ightmay involveyay ethay aracterschay endingspay ayay ayday oss­ingcray ayay ollingray ainplay oryay anyay ourhay akingmay eirthay wayyay oughthray avernscay undergroundyay. 
 Onyay ethay allestsmay alescay, ityay ouldcay eanmay oneyay aracterchay ullingpay ayay everlay inyay ayay ungeonday oomray otay eesay whatyay appenshay. Ocialsay interactionyay eaturesfay ethay adventurersyay alkingtay otay omeonesay (oryay omethingsay) elseyay. 
 Ityay ightmay eanmay emandingthatday ayay apturedcay outscay evealray ethay ecretsay entranceyay otay ethay oblingay airlay, ettinggay informationyay omfray ayay escuedray isonerpray, eadingplay orfay ercymay omfray anyay orcyay ieftainchay, oryay ersuadingpay ayay alkativetay agicmay irrormay otay owshay ayay istantday ocationlay otay ethay adventurersyay. Ethay ulesray inyay apterschay 7 andyay 8 upportsay explorationyay andyay ocialsay interactionyay, asyay oday anymay assclay eaturesfay inyay apterchay 3 andyay ersonalitypay aitstray inyay apterchay 4. Ombatcay, ethay ocusfay ofyay apterchay 9, involvesyay aracterschay andyay otheryay eaturescray wingingsay weaponsyay, astingcay ellsspay, aneuveringmay orfay ositionpay, andyay osay on—allyay inyay anyay effortyay otay efeatday eirthay opponentsyay, whetheryay atthay eansmay illingkay everyyay enemyyay, akingtay aptivescay, oryay orcingfay ayay outray. 
 Ombatcay isyay ethay ostmay ucturedstray elementyay ofyay ayay DDDay essionsay, withyay eaturescray akingtay urnstay otay akemay uresay atthay everyoneyay etsgay ayay ancechay otay actyay. 
 Evenyay inyay ethay ontextcay ofyay ayay itchedpay attlebay, ere’sthay illstay entyplay ofyay opportunityyay orfay adventurersyay otay attemptyay wackyyay untsstay ikelay urfingsay ownday ayay ightflay ofyay airsstay onyay ayay ieldshay, otay examineyay ethay environmentyay (erhapspay ybay ullingpay ayay ysteriousmay everlay), andyay otay interactyay withyay otheryay eaturescray, includingyay alliesyay, enemiesyay, andyay eutralnay artiespay. Ethay  Wondersyay ofyay  Agicmay Ewfay DDDay adventuresyay endyay withoutyay omethingsay agicalmay appeninghay. 
 Whetheryay elpfulhay oryay armfulhay, agicmay appearsyay equentlyfray inyay ethay ifelay ofyay anyay adventureryay, andyay ityay isyay ethay ocusfay ofyay apterschay 10 andyay 11. Inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray, actitionerspray ofyay agicmay areyay areray, etsay apartyay omfray ethay assesmay ofyay eoplepay ybay eirthay extraordinaryyay alenttay. 
 Ommoncay olkfay ightmay eesay evidenceyay ofyay agicmay onyay ayay egularray asisbay, utbay it’syay usuallyyay inor—amay antasticfay onstermay, ayay isiblyvay answeredyay ayerpray, ayay wizardyay walkingyay oughthray ethay eetsstray withyay anyay animatedyay ieldshay uardiangay asyay ayay odyguardbay. Orfay adventurersyay, oughthay, agicmay isyay eykay otay eirthay ur­vivalsay. 
 Withoutyay ethay ealinghay agicmay ofyay ericsclay andyay aladinspay, adventurersyay wouldyay quicklyyay uccumbsay otay eirthay woundsyay. 
 Withoutyay ethay upliftingyay agicalmay upportsay ofyay ardsbay andyay ericsclay, warriorsyay ightmay ebay overwhelmedyay ybay owerfulpay oesfay. 
 Withoutyay ethay eershay agicalmay owerpay andyay ersatilityvay ofyay wizardsyay andyay uidsdray, everyyay eatthray wouldyay ebay ag­nifiedmay enfoldtay. Agicmay isyay alsoyay ayay avoredfay ooltay ofyay illainsvay. 
 Anymay adven­turesyay areyay ivendray ybay ethay achinationsmay ofyay ellcastersspay whoyay areyay ellbenthay onyay usingyay agicmay orfay omesay illyay endyay. 
Ayay ultcay eaderlay eekssay otay awakenyay ayay odgay whoyay umbersslay eneathbay ethay easay, ayay aghay idnapskay youthsyay otay agicallymay aindray emthay ofyay eirthay igorvay, ayay admay wizardyay aborslay otay investyay anyay armyyay ofyay automatonsyay withyay ayay acsimilefay ofyay ifelay, ayay agondray eginsbay ayay ysticalmay itualray otay iseray upyay asyay ayay odgay ofyay estruction—theseday areyay ustjay ayay ewfay ofyay ethay agicalmay eatsthray atthay adventurersyay ightmay acefay. 
 Apterchay 1:  Ep-bystay- Epstay  Aracterschay OURyay IRSTFay EPSTay INyay AYINGPLay ANyay ADVENTURERyay INyay ETHay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray amegay isyay otay imagineyay andyay eatecray ayay aracterchay ofyay youryay ownyay. 
 Youryay aracterchay isyay ayay ombinationcay ofyay amegay atisticsstay, oleplayingray ookshay, andyay youryay imaginationyay. 
 Youyay oosechay ayay aceray (uchsay asyay umanhay oryay alflinghay) andayay assclay (uchsay asyay ighterfay oryay wizardyay). 
 Youyay alsoinventyay ethay ersonalitypay, appearanceyay, andyay ackstorybay ofyay youryay aracterchay. 
 Onceyay ompletedcay, youryay aracterchay ervessay asyay youryay epresentativeray inyay ethay amegay, youryay avataryay inyay ethay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray worldyay. Eforebay youyay iveday intoyay epstay 1 elowbay, inkthay aboutyay ethay indkay ofyay adventureryay youyay wantyay otay ayplay. 
 Youyay ightmay ebay ayay ourageouscay ighterfay, ayay ulkingskay ogueray, ayay erventfay ericclay, oryay ayay amboyantflay wizardyay. 
 Oryay youyay ightmay ebay oremay interestedyay inyay anyay unconventionalyay aracterchay, uchsay asyay ayay awnybray ogueray whoyay ikeslay and-to-handhay ombatcay, oryay ayay arpshootershay whoyay ickspay offyay enemiesyay omfray afaryay. 
 Oday youyay ikelay antasyfay ictionfay eaturingfay warvesday oryay elvesyay?  Ytray uildingbay ayay aracterchay ofyay oneyay ofyay osethay acesray. 
 Oday youyay wantyay youryay aracterchay otay ebay ethay oughesttay adventureryay atyay ethay abletay?  Onsidercay ayay assclay ikelay arbarianbay oryay aladinpay. 
 Ifyay youyay on’tday owknay whereyay elseyay otay eginbay, aketay ayay ooklay atyay ethay illustrationsyay inyay isthay ookbay otay eesay whatyay atchescay youryay interestyay. Onceyay youyay avehay ayay aracterchay inyay indmay, ollowfay esethay epsstay inyay orderyay, akingmay ecisionsday atthay eflectray ethay aracterchay youyay wantyay. 
 Youryay onceptioncay ofyay youryay aracterchay ightmay evolveyay withyay eachyay oicechay youyay akemay. 
 What’syay importantyay isyay atthay youyay omecay otay ethay abletay withyay ayay aracterchay you’reyay excitedyay otay ayplay. Oughoutthray isthay apterchay, weyay useyay ethay ermtay aracterchay eetshay otay eanmay whateveryay youyay useyay otay acktray youryay aracterchay, whetheryay it’syay ayay ormalfay aracterchay eetshay (ikelay ethay oneyay atyay ethay endyay ofyay isthay ookbay), omesay ormfay ofyay igitalday ecordray, oryay ayay iecepay ofyay otebooknay aperpay. 
 Anyay officialyay DDDay aracterchay eetshay isyay ayay inefay aceplay otay artstay untilyay youyay owknay whatyay informationyay youyay eednay andyay owhay youyay useyay ityay uringday ethay amegay. Uildingbay  Uenorbray Eachyay epstay ofyay aracterchay eationcray includesyay anyay exampleyay ofyay atthay epstay, withyay ayay ayerplay amednay  Obbay uildingbay ishay warfday aracterchay,  Uenorbray.1. 
 Oosechay ayay  Aceray Everyyay aracterchay elongsbay otay ayay aceray, oneyay ofyay ethay anymay intelligentyay umanoidhay eciesspay inyay ethay DDDay worldyay. 
 Ethay ostmay ommoncay ayerplay aracterchay acesray areyay warvesday, elvesyay, alflingshay, andyay umanshay. 
 Omesay acesray alsoyay avehay ubracessay, uchsay asyay ountainmay warfday oryay woodyay elfyay. 
 Apterchay 2 ovidespray oremay informationyay aboutyay esethay acesray, asyay wellyay asyay ethay esslay widespreadyay acesray ofyay agonborndray, omesgnay, alf-elveshay, alf-orcshay, andyay ieflingstay. Ethay aceray youyay oosechay ontributescay otay youryay aracter’schay identityyay inyay anyay importantyay wayyay, ybay establishingyay ayay eneralgay appearanceyay andyay ethay aturalnay alentstay ainedgay omfray ulturecay andyay ancestryyay. 
 Youryay aracter’schay aceray antsgray articularpay acialray aitstray, uchsay asyay ecialspay ensessay, oficiencypray withyay ertaincay weaponsyay oryay oolstay, oficiencypray inyay oneyay oryay oremay illsskay, oryay ethay abilityyay otay useyay inormay ellsspay. 
 Esethay aitstray ometimessay ovetailday withyay ethay apabilitiescay ofyay ertainclassescay (eesay epstay 2). 
 Orfay exampleyay, ethay acialray aitstray ofyay ightfootlay alflingshay akemay emthay exceptionalyay oguesray, andyay ighhay elvesyay endtay otay ebay owerfulpay wizardsyay. 
 Ometimessay ayingplay againstyay ypetay ancay ebay unfay, ootay. 
 Alf-orchay aladinspay andyay ountainmay warfday wizardsyay, orfay exampleyay, ancay ebay unusualyay utbay emorablemay aracterschay. Youryay aceray alsoyay increasesyay oneyay oryay oremay ofyay youryay abilityyay oresscay, whichyay youyay etermineday inyay epstay 3. 
 Otenay esethay increasesyay andyay ememberray otay applyyay emthay aterlay. Ecordray ethay aitstray antedgray ybay youryay aceray onyay youryay aracterchay eetshay. 
 Ebay uresay otay otenay youryay artingstay anguageslay andyay youryay asebay eedspay asyay wellyay. Uildingbay  Uenorbray,  Epstay 1 Obbay isyay ittingsay ownday otay eatecray ishay aracterchay. 
 Ehay ecidesday atthay ayay uffgray ountainmay warfday itsfay ethay aracterchay ehay wantsyay otay ayplay. 
 Ehay otesnay allyay ethay acialray aitstray ofyay warvesday onyay ishay aracterchay eetshay, includingyay ishay eedspay ofyay 25 eetfay andyay ethay anguageslay ehay owsknay:  Ommoncay andyay  Warvishday.2. 
 Oosechay ayay  Assclay  Everyyay adventureryay isyay ayay embermay ofyay ayay assclay. 
 Assclay oadlybray escribesday ayay aracter’schay ocationvay, whatyay ecialspay alentstay ehay oryay eshay ossessespay, andyay ethay acticstay ehay oryay eshay isyay ostmay ikelylay otay employyay whenyay exploringyay ayay ungeonday, ightingfay onstersmay, oryay engagingyay inyay ayay ensetay egotiationnay. 
 Ethay aracterchay assesclay areyay escribedday inyay apterchay 3. Youryay aracterchay eceivesray ayay umbernay ofyay enefitsbay omfray youryay oicechay ofyay assclay. 
 Anymay ofyay esethay enefitsbay areyay assclay eatures—capabilitiesfay (includingyay ellcastingspay) atthay etsay youryay aracterchay apartyay omfray embersmay ofyay otheryay assesclay. Youyay alsoyay aingay ayay umbernay ofyay oficienciespray: armoryay, weaponsyay, illsskay, avingsay owsthray, andyay ometimessay oolstay. 
 Youryay oficienciespray efineday anymay ofyay ethay ingsthay youryay aracterchay ancay oday articularlypay wellyay, omfray usingyay ertaincay weaponsyay otay ellingtay ayay onvincingcay ielay. Onyay youryay aracterchay eetshay, ecordray allyay ethay eaturesfay atthay youryay assclay ivesgay youyay atyay 1stay evellay. Evellay Ypicallytay, ayay aracterchay artsstay atyay 1stay evellay andyay advancesyay inyay evellay ybay adventuringyay andyay aininggay experienceyay ointspay (XPay). 
Ayay 1levelstlay aracterchay isyay inexperiencedyay inyay ethay adventuringyay worldyay, althoughyay ehay oryay eshay ightmay avehay eenbay ayay oldiersay oryay ayay iratepay andyay oneday angerousday ingsthay eforebay. Artingstay offyay atyay 1stay evellay arksmay youryay aracter’schay entryyay intoyay ethay adventuringyay ifelay. 
 Ecordray youryay evellay onyay youryay aracterchay eetshay. 
 Ifyay you’reyay artingstay atyay ayay igherhay evellay, ecordray ethay additionalyay elementsyay youryay assclay ivesgay youyay orfay youryay evelslay astpay 1stay. 
 Alsoyay ecordray youryay experienceyay ointspay. 
Ayay 1levelstlay aracterchay ashay 0 XPay Ayay igher-levelhay aracterchay ypicallytay eginsbay withyay ethay inimummay amountyay ofyay XPay equiredray otay eachray atthay evellay (eesay “ Eyondbay 1stay  Evellay” aterlay inyay isthay apterchay). Ithay  Ointspay andyay  Ithay  Iceday Youryay aracter’schay ithay ointspay efineday owhay oughtay youryay aracterchay isyay inyay ombatcay andyay otheryay angerousday ituationssay. 
 Youryay ithay ointspay areyay eterminedday ybay youryay  Ithay  Iceday (ortshay orfay  Ithay  Ointpay  Iceday). Abilityyay  Orescay  Ummarysay Engthstray Easuresmay:  Aturalnay athleticismyay, odilybay owerpay  Importantyay orfay:  Arbarianbay, ighterfay, aladinpay  Acialray  Increasesyay: Ountainmay warfday (+2)  Alf-orchay (+2) Agonborndray (+2)  Umanhay (+1) Exterityday Easuresmay:  Ysicalphay agilityyay, eflexesray, alancebay, oisepay  Importantyay orfay:  Onkmay, angerray, ogueray  Acialray  Increasesyay: Elfyay (+2)  Orestfay omegnay (+1) Alflinghay (+2)  Umanhay (+1) Onstitutioncay Easuresmay:  Ealthhay, aminastay, italvay orcefay  Importantyay orfay:  Everyoneyay  Acialray  Increasesyay: Warfday (+2)  Alf-orchay (+1) Outstay alflinghay (+1)  Umanhay (+1) Ockray omegnay (+1) Intelligenceyay Easuresmay:  Entalmay acuityyay, informationyay ecallray, analyticalyay illskay  Importantyay orfay:  Wizardyay  Acialray  Increasesyay: Ighhay elfyay (+1)  Ieflingtay (+1) Omegnay (+2)  Umanhay (+1) Wisdomyay Easuresmay:  Awarenessyay, intuitionyay, insightyay  Importantyay orfay:  Ericclay, uiddray  Acialray  Increasesyay: Illhay warfday (+1)  Umanhay (+1) Woodyay elfyay (+1) Arismachay Easuresmay:  Onfidencecay, eloquenceyay, eadershiplay  Importantyay orfay:  Ardbay, orcerersay, warlockyay  Acialray  Increasesyay: Alf-elfhay (+2)  Agonborndray (+1) Owdray (+1)  Umanhay (+1) Ightfootlay alflinghay (+1)  Ieflingtay (+2) Atyay 1stay evellay, youryay aracterchay ashay 1  Ithay  Ieday, andyay ethay ieday ypetay isyay eterminedday ybay youryay assclay. 
 Youyay artstay withyay ithay ointspay equalyay otay ethay ighesthay ollray ofyay atthay ieday, asyay indicatedyay inyay youryay assclay escriptionday. 
( Youyay alsoyay addyay youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay, whichyay you’llyay etermineday inyay epstay 3.)  Isthay isyay alsoyay youryay ithay ointpay aximummay. Ecordray youryay aracter’schay ithay ointspay onyay youryay aracterchay eetshay. 
 Alsoyay ecordray ethay ypetay ofyay  Ithay  Ieday youryay aracterchay usesyay andyay ethay umbernay ofyay  Ithay  Iceday youyay avehay. 
 Afteryay youyay estray, youyay ancay endspay  Ithay  Iceday otay egainray ithay ointspay (eesay “ Estingray” inyay apterchay 8). Oficiencypray  Onusbay Ethay abletay atthay appearsyay inyay youryay assclay escriptionday owsshay youryay oficiencypray onusbay, whichyay isyay +2 orfay ayay 1levelstlay aracterchay. 
 Youryay oficiencypray onusbay appliesyay otay anymay ofyay ethay umbersnay you’llyay ebay ecordingray onyay youryay aracterchay eetshay:•  Attackyay ollsray usingyay weaponsyay you’reyay oficientpray withyay•  Attackyay ollsray withyay ellsspay youyay astcay•  Abilityyay eckschay usingyay illsskay you’reyay oficientpray inyay•  Abilityyay eckschay usingyay oolstay you’reyay oficientpray withyay•  Avingsay owsthray you’reyay oficientpray inyay•  Avingsay owthray Day csay orfay ellsspay youyay astcay (explainedyay inyay eachyay ellcastingspay assclay) Youryay assclay eterminesday youryay weaponyay oficienciespray, youryay avingsay owthray oficienciespray, andyay omesay ofyay youryay illskay andyay ooltay oficienciespray. 
( Illsskay areyay escribedday inyay apterchay 7, oolstay inyay apterchay 5.)  Youryay ackgroundbay ivesgay youyay additionalyay illskay andyay ooltay oficienciespray, andyay omesay acesray ivegay youyay oremay oficienciespray. 
 Ebay uresay otay otenay allyay ofyay esethay oficienciespray, asyay wellyay asyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay, onyay youryay aracterchay eetshay. Youryay oficiencypray onusbay an’tcay ebay addedyay otay ayay inglesay ieday ollray oryay otheryay umbernay oremay anthay onceyay. 
 Occasionallyyay, youryay oficiencypray onusbay ightmay ebay odifiedmay (oubledday oryay alvedhay, orfay exampleyay) eforebay youyay applyyay ityay. 
 Ifyay ayay ircumstancecay uggestssay atthay youryay oficiencypray onusbay appliesyay oremay anthay onceyay otay ethay amesay ollray oryay atthay ityay ouldshay ebay ultipliedmay oremay anthay onceyay, youyay everthelessnay addyay ityay onlyyay onceyay, ultiplymay ityay onlyyay onceyay, andyay alvehay ityay onlyyay onceyay. Uildingbay  Uenorbray,  Epstay 2 Obbay imaginesyay  Uenorbray argingchay intoyay attlebay withyay anyay axeyay, oneyay ornhay onyay ishay elmethay okenbray offyay. 
 Ehay akesmay  Uenorbray ayay ighterfay andyay otesnay ethay ighter’sfay oficienciespray andyay 1levelstlay assclay eaturesfay onyay ishay aracterchay eetshay. Asyay ayay 1levelstlay ighterfay,  Uenorbray ashay 1  Ithay  Ie—aday day10— andyay artsstay withyay ithay ointspay equalyay otay 10 + ishay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay. 
 Obbay otesnay isthay, andyay willyay ecordray ethay inalfay umbernay afteryay ehay eterminesday  Uenor’sbray  Onstitutioncay orescay (eesay epstay 3). 
 Obbay alsoyay otesnay ethay oficiencypray onusbay orfay ayay 1levelstlay aracterchay, whichyay isyay +2.3. 
 Etermineday  Abilityyay  Oresscay Uchmay ofyay whatyay youryay aracterchay oesday inyay ethay amegay ependsday onyay ishay oryay erhay ixsay abilitiesyay:  Engthstray,  Exterityday,  Onstitutioncay,  Intelligenceyay,  Wisdomyay, andyay  Arismachay. Eachyay abilityyay ashay ayay orescay, whichyay isyay ayay umbernay youyay ecordray onyay youryay aracterchay eetshay. Ethay ixsay abilitiesyay andyay eirthay useyay inyay ethay amegay areyay escribedday inyay apterchay 7. 
abletay ovidespray ayay quickyay eferenceray orfay whatyay qualitiesyay areyay easuredmay ybay eachyay abilityyay, whatyay acesray increasesyay whichyay abilitiesyay, andyay whatyay assesclay onsidercay eachyay abilityyay articularlypay importantyay. Youyay enerategay youryay aracter'schay ixsay abilityyay oresscay andomlyray. 
 Ollray ourfay 6-idedsay iceday andyay ecordray ethay otaltay ofyay ethay ighesthay eethray iceday onyay ayay iecepay ofyay atchscray aperpay. 
 Oday isthay ivefay oremay imestay, osay atthay youyay avehay ixsay umbersnay. 
 Ifyay youyay wantyay otay avesay imetay oryay on’tday ikelay ethay ideayay ofyay andomlyray eterminingday abilityyay oresscay, youyay ancay useyay ethay ollowingfay oresscay insteadyay: 15, 14, 13, 12, 10, 8. Ownay aketay youryay ixsay umbersnay andyay writeyay eachyay umbernay esidebay oneyay ofyay youryay aracter’schay ixsay abilitiesyay otay assignyay oresscay otay  Engthstray,  Exterityday,  Onstitutioncay,  Intelligenceyay,  Wisdomyay, andyay  Arismachay. 
 Afterwardyay, akemay anyyay angeschay otay youryay abilityyay oresscay asyay ayay esultray ofyay youryay aceray oicechay. Afteryay assigningyay youryay abilityyay oresscay, etermineday youryay abilityyay odifiersmay usingyay ethay  Abilityyay  Oresscay andyay  Odifiersmay abletay. 
 Otay etermineday anyay abilityyay odifiermay withoutyay onsultingcay ethay abletay, ubtractsay 10 omfray ethay abilityyay orescay andyay enthay ivideday ethay esultray ybay 2 (oundray ownday). 
 Writeyay ethay odifiermay extnay otay eachyay ofyay youryay oresscay. Uildingbay  Uenorbray,  Epstay 3 Obbay ecidesday otay useyay ethay andardstay etsay ofyay oresscay (15, 14,13, 12, 10, 8) orfay  Uenor’sbray abilitiesyay. 
 Incesay e’shay ayay ighterfay, ehay utspay ishay ighesthay orescay, 15, inyay  Engthstray. 
 Ishay extnay- ighesthay, 14, oesgay inyay  Onstitutioncay. 
 Uenorbray ightmay ebay ayay ashbray ighterfay, utbay  Obbay ecidesday ehay wantsyay ethay warfday otay ebay olderyay, wiseryay, andyay ayay oodgay eaderlay, osay ehay utspay ecentday oresscay inyay  Wisdomyay andyay  Arismachay. 
 Afteryay applyingyay ishay acialray enefitsbay (increasingyay  Uenor’sbray  Onstitutioncay ybay2 andyay ishay  Engthstray ybay 2),  Uenor’sbray abilityyay oresscay andyay odifiersmay ooklay ikelay isthay:  Engthstray 17 (+3),  Exterityday 10 (+0),  Onstitutioncay 16 (+3),  Intelligenceyay 8 (-1),  Wisdomyay 13 (+1),  Arismachay 12 (+1). Obbay illsfay inyay  Uenor'sbray inalfay ithay ointspay: 10 + ishay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay ofyay +3, orfay ayay otaltay ofyay 13 ithay ointspay. Ariantvay:  Ustomizingcay  Abilityyay  Oresscay Atyay youryay  Ungeonday  Aster’smay optionyay, youyay ancay useyay isthay ariantvay orfay eterminingday youryay abilityyay oresscay. 
 Ethay ethodmay escribedday erehay allowsyay youyay otay uildbay ayay aracterchay withyay ayay etsay ofyay abilityyay oresscay youyay oosechay individuallyyay. Youyay avehay 27 ointspay otay endspay onyay youryay abilityyay oresscay. 
 Ethay ostcay ofyay eachyay orescay isyay ownshay onyay ethay  Abilityyay  Orescay  Ointpay  Ostcay abletay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay orescay ofyay 14 ostscay 7 ointspay. 
 Usingyay isthay ethodmay, 15 isyay ethay ighesthay abilityyay orescay youyay ancay endyay upyay withyay, eforebay applyingyay acialray increasesyay. 
 Youyay an’tcay avehay ayay orescay owerlay anthay 8. Isthay ethodmay ofyay eterminingday abilityyay oresscay enablesyay youyay otay eatecray ayay etsay ofyay eethray ighhay umbersnay andyay eethray owlay onesyay (15, 15, 15, 8, 8, 8), ayay etsay ofyay umbersnay atthay areyay aboveyay Abilityyay  Orescay  Ointpay  Ostcay Abilityyay  Oresscay andyay  Odifiersmay Orescay Odifiermay Orescay Odifier1-516-17+32-3-418-19+44-5-320-21+56-7-222-23+68-9-124-25+710-11+026-27+812-13+128-29+914-15+230+10averagemay andyay earlynay equalyay (13, 13, 13, 12, 12, 12), oryay anyyay etsay ofyay umbersnay etweenbay osethay extremesyay.4. 
 Escribeday  Youryay  Aracterchay Onceyay youyay owknay ethay asicbay amegay aspectsyay ofyay youryay aracterchay, it’syay imetay otay eshflay imhay oryay erhay outyay asyay ayay ersonpay. 
 Youryay aracterchay eedsnay ayay amenay. 
 Endspay ayay ewfay inutesmay inkingthay aboutyay whatyay ehay oryay eshay ookslay ikelay andyay owhay ehay oryay eshay ehavesbay inyay eneralgay ermstay. Usingyay ethay informationyay inyay apterchay 4, youyay ancay eshflay outyay youryay aracter’schay ysicalphay appearanceyay andyay ersonalitypay aitstray. 
 Oosechay youryay aracter’schay alignmentyay (ethay oralmay ompasscay atthay uidesgay ishay oryay erhay ecisionsday) andyay idealsyay. 
 Apterchay 4 alsoyay elpshay youyay identifyyay ethay ingsthay youryay aracterchay oldshay ostmay earday, alledcay ondsbay, andyay ethay awsflay atthay ouldcay oneyay ayday undermineyay imhay oryay erhay. Youryay aracter’schay ackgroundbay escribesday whereyay ehay oryay eshay amecay omfray, ishay oryay erhay originalyay occupationyay, andyay ethay aracter’schay aceplay inyay ethay DDDay worldyay. 
inyay apterchay 4, andyay ightmay ebay willingyay otay workyay withyay youyay otay aftcray ayay ackgroundbay at’sthay ayay oremay ecisepray itfay orfay youryay aracterchay oncept.Acay ackgroundbay ivesgay youryay aracterchay ayay ackgroundbay eaturefay (ayay eneralgay enefitbay) andyay oficiencypray inyay wotay illsskay, andyay ityay ightmay alsoyay ivegay youyay additionalyay anguageslay oryay oficiencypray withyay ertaincay indskay ofyay oolstay. 
 Ecordray isthay informationyay, alongyay withyay ethay ersonalitypay informationyay youyay evelopday, onyay youryay aracterchay eetshay. Youryay  Aracter’schay  Abilitiesyay Aketay youryay aracter’schay abilityyay oresscay andyay aceray intoyay accountyay asyay youyay eshflay outyay ishay oryay erhay appearanceyay andyay ersonalitypay. 
Ayay eryvay ongstray aracterchay withyay owlay  Intelligenceyay ightmay inkthay andyay ehavebay eryvay ifferentlyday omfray ayay eryvay artsmay aracterchay withyay owlay  Engthstray. Orfay exampleyay, ighhay  Engthstray usuallyyay orrespondscay withyay ayay urlybay oryay athleticyay odybay, whileyay ayay aracterchay withyay owlay  Engthstray ightmay ebay awnyscray oryay ump.Aplay aracterchay withyay ighhay  Exterityday isyay obablypray ithelay andyay imslay, whileyay ayay aracterchay withyay owlay  Exterityday ightmay ebay eitheryay anglygay andyay awkwardyay oryay eavyhay andyay ick-fingered.Athay aracterchay withyay ighhay  Onstitutioncay usuallyyay ookslay ealthyhay, withyay ightbray eyesyay andyay abundantyay energyyay. 
Ayay aracterchay withyay owlay  Onstitutioncay ightmay ebay icklysay oryay ail.Afray aracterchay withyay ighhay  Intelligenceyay ightmay ebay ighlyhay inquisitiveyay andyay udiousstay, whileyay ayay aracterchay withyay owlay  Intelligenceyay ightmay eakspay implysay oryay easilyyay orgetfay etails.Aday aracterchay withyay ighhay  Wisdomyay ashay oodgay udgmentjay, empathyyay, andyay ayay eneralgay awarenessyay ofyay what’syay oinggay on.Ayay aracterchay withyay owlay  Wisdomyay ightmay ebay absent-mindedyay, oolhardyfay, oryay oblivious.Ayay aracterchay withyay ighhay  Arismachay exudesyay onfidencecay, whichyay isyay usuallyyay ixedmay withyay ayay acefulgray oryay intimidatingyay esencepray. 
Ayay aracterchay withyay ayay owlay  Arismachay ightmay omecay acrossyay asyay abrasiveyay, inarticulateyay, oryay imidtay. Uildingbay  Uenorbray,  Epstay 4 Obbay illsfay inyay omesay ofyay  Uenor’sbray asicbay etailsday: ishay amenay, ishay exsay (alemay), ishay eighthay andyay weightyay, andyay ishay alignmentyay (awfullay oodgay). 
 Ishay ighhay  Engthstray andyay  Onstitutioncay uggestsay ayay ealthyhay, athleticyay odybay, andyay ishay owlay  Intelligenceyay uggestssay ayay egreeday ofyay orgetfulnessfay. Obbay ecidesday atthay  Uenorbray omescay omfray ayay oblenay inelay, utbay ishay anclay wasyay expelledyay omfray itsyay omelandhay whenyay  Uenorbray wasyay eryvay youngyay. 
 Ehay ewgray upyay workingyay asyay ayay ithsmay inyay ethay emoteray illagesvay ofyay  Icewindyay  Aleday. 
 Utbay  Uenorbray ashay ayay eroichay estiny—today eclaimray ishay omeland—sohay  Obbay ooseschay ethay olkfay erohay ackgroundbay orfay ishay warfday. Ehay otesnay ethay oficienciespray andyay ecialspay eaturefay isthay ackgroundbay ivesgay imhay. Obbay ashay ayay ettypray earclay icturepay ofyay  Uenor’sbray ersonalitypay inyay indmay, osay ehay ipsskay ethay ersonalitypay aitstray uggestedsay inyay ethay olkfay erohay ackgroundbay, otingnay insteadyay atthay  Uenorbray isyay ayay aringcay, ensitivesay warfday whoyay enuinelygay oveslay ishay iendsfray andyay alliesyay, utbay ehay ideshay isthay oftsay earthay ehindbay ayay uffgray, arlingsnay emeanorday. 
 Ehay ooseschay ethay idealyay ofyay airnessfay omfray ethay istlay inyay ishay ackgroundbay, otingnay atthay  Uenorbray elievesbay atthay onay oneyay isyay aboveyay ethay awlay. Ivengay ishay istoryhay,  Uenor’sbray ondbay isyay obviousyay: ehay aspiresyay otay omedaysay eclaimray  Ithralmay  Allhay, ishay omelandhay, omfray ethay adowshay agondray atthay ovedray ethay warvesday outyay. Ishay awflay isyay iedtay otay ishay aringcay, ensitivesay ature—henay ashay ayay oftsay otspay orfay orphansyay andyay waywardyay oulssay, eadinglay imhay otay owshay ercymay evenyay whenyay ityay ightmay otnay ebay warrantedyay.5. 
 Oosechay  Equipmentyay  Youryay assclay andyay ackgroundbay etermineday youryay aracter'schay artingstay equipmentyay, includingyay weaponsyay, armoryay, andyay otheryay adventuringyay eargay. 
 Ecordray isthay equipmentyay onyay youryay aracterchay eetshay. 
 Allyay uchsay itemsyay areyay etailedday inyay apterchay 5. Insteadyay ofyay akingtay ethay eargay ivengay otay youyay ybay youryay assclay andyay ackgroundbay, youyay ancay urchasepay youryay artingstay equipmentyay. 
 Youyay avehay ayay umbernay ofyay oldgay iecespay (gpay) otay endspay asedbay onyay youryay assclay, asyay ownshay inyay apterchay 5. 
 Extensiveyay istslay ofyay equipmentyay, withyay icespray, alsoyay appearyay inyay atthay apterchay. 
 Ifyay youyay wishyay, youyay ancay alsoyay avehay oneyay inkettray atyay onay ostcay (eesay ethay inkettray abletay atyay ethay endyay ofyay apterchay 5). Youryay  Engthstray orescay imitslay ethay amountyay ofyay eargay youyay ancay arrycay. 
 Ytray otnay otay urchasepay equipmentyay withyay ayay otaltay weightyay (inyay oundspay) exceedingyay youryay  Engthstray orescay imestay 15. 
 Apterchay 7 ashay oremay informationyay onyay arryingcay apacitycay. Armoryay  Assclay Youryay  Armoryay  Assclay (ACyay) epresentsray owhay wellyay youryay aracterchay avoidsyay eingbay woundedyay inyay attlebay. 
 Ingsthay atthay ontributecay otay youryay ACyay includeyay ethay armoryay youyay wearyay, ethay ieldshay youyay arrycay, andyay youryay  Exterityday odifiermay. 
 Otnay allyay aracterschay wearyay armoryay oryay arrycay ieldsshay, oweverhay. Withoutyay armoryay oryay ayay ieldshay, youryay aracter’schay ACyay equalsyay 10 + ishay oryay erhay  Exterityday odifiermay. 
 Ifyay youryay aracterchay wearsyay armoryay, arriescay ayay ieldshay, oryay othbay, alculatecay youryay ACyay usingyay ethay ulesray inyay apterchay 5. 
 Ecordray youryay ACyay onyay youryay aracterchay eetshay. Youryay aracterchay eedsnay otay ebay oficientpray withyay armoryay andyay ieldsshay otay wearyay andyay useyay emthay effectivelyyay, andyay youryay armoryay andyay ieldshay oficienciespray areyay eterminedday ybay youryay assclay. 
 Erethay areyay awbacksdray otay wearingyay armoryay oryay arryingcay ayay ieldshay ifyay youyay acklay ethay equiredray oficiencypray, asyay explainedyay inyay apterchay 5. Omesay ellsspay andyay assclay eaturesfay ivegay youyay ayay ifferentday wayyay otay alculatecay youryay ACyay. 
 Ifyay youyay avehay ultiplemay eaturesfay atthay ivegay youyay ifferentday waysyay otay alculatecay youryay ACyay, youyay oosechay whichyay oneyay otay useyay. Weaponsyay Orfay eachyay weaponyay youryay aracterchay wieldsyay, alculatecay ethay odifiermay youyay useyay whenyay youyay attackyay withyay ethay weaponyay andyay ethay amageday youyay ealday whenyay youyay ithay. Whenyay youyay akemay anyay attackyay withyay ayay weaponyay, youyay ollray ayay day20 andyay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay (utbay onlyyay ifyay youyay areyay oficientpray withyay ethay weaponyay) andyay ethay appropriateyay abilityyay odifiermay.•  Orfay attacksyay withyay eleemay weaponsyay, useyay youryay  Engthstray odifiermay orfay attackyay andyay amageday ollsray. 
Ayay weaponyay atthay ashay ethay inessefay opertypray, uchsay asyay ayay apierray, ancay useyay youryay  Exterityday odifiermay insteadyay.•  Orfay attacksyay withyay angedray weaponsyay, useyay youryay  Exterityday odifiermay orfay attackyay andyay amageday ollsray. 
 Uildingbay  Uenorbray,  Epstay 5 Obbay writesyay ownday ethay artingstay equipmentyay omfray ethay ighterfay assclay andyay ethay olkfay erohay ackgroundbay. 
 Ishay artingstay equipmentyay includesyay ainchay ailmay andyay ayay ieldshay, whichyay ombinecay otay ivegay  Uenorbray anyay  Armoryay  Assclay ofyay 18. Orfay  Uenor’sbray weaponsyay,  Obbay ooseschay ayay attleaxebay andyay wotay andaxeshay. 
 Ishay attleaxebay isyay ayay eleemay weaponyay, osay  Uenorbray usesyay ishay  Engthstray odifiermay orfay ishay attacksyay andyay amageday. 
 Ishay attackyay onusbay isyay ishay  Engthstray odifiermay (+3) usplay ishay oficiencypray onusbay (+2), orfay ayay otaltay ofyay +5. Ethay attleaxebay ealsday 1day8 ashingslay amageday, andyay  Uenorbray addsyay ishay  Engthstray odifiermay otay ethay amageday whenyay ehay itshay, orfay ayay otaltay ofyay 1day8 + 3 ashingslay amageday. 
 Whenyay owingthray ayay andaxehay,  Uenorbray ashay ethay amesay attackyay onusbay (andaxeshay, asyay ownthray weaponsyay, useyay  Engthstray orfay attacksyay andyay amageday), andyay ethay weaponyay ealsday 1day6 + 3 ashingslay amageday whenyay ityay itshay.6. 
 Omecay  Ogethertay Ostmay DDDay aracterschay on’tday workyay aloneyay. 
 Eachyay aracterchay aysplay ayay oleray withinyay ayay artypay, ayay oupgray ofyay adventurersyay workingyay ogethertay orfay ayay ommoncay urposepay. 
 Eamworktay andyay ooperationcay eatlygray improveyay youryay arty’spay anceschay otay urvivesay ethay anymay erilspay inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray. 
 Alktay otay youryay ellowfay ayersplay andyay youryay DMay otay ecideday whetheryay youryay aracterschay owknay oneyay anotheryay, owhay eythay etmay, andyay whatyay ortssay ofyay questsyay ethay oupgray ightmay undertakeyay. Eyondbay 1stay  Evellay Asyay youryay aracterchay oesgay onyay adventuresyay andyay overcomesyay allengeschay, ehay oryay eshay ainsgay experienceyay, epresentedray ybay experienceyay ointspay. 
Ayay aracterchay whoyay eachesray ayay ecifiedspay experienceyay ointpay otaltay advancesyay inyay apabilitycay. 
 Isthay advancementyay isyay alledcay aininggay ayay evellay. Whenyay youryay aracterchay ainsgay ayay evellay, ishay oryay erhay assclay oftenyay antsgray additionalyay eaturesfay, asyay etailedday inyay ethay assclay escriptionday. 
 Omesay ofyay esethay eaturesfay allowyay youyay otay increaseyay youryay abilityyay oresscay, eitheryay increasingyay wotay oresscay ybay 1 eachyay oryay increasingyay oneyay orescay ybay 2. 
 Youyay an’tcay increaseyay anyay abilityyay orescay aboveyay 20. 
 Inyay additionyay, everyyay aracter’schay oficiencypray onusbay increasesyay atyay ertaincay evelslay. Eachyay imetay youyay aingay ayay evellay, youyay aingay 1 additionalyay  Ithay  Ieday. 
 Ollray atthay  Ithay  Ieday, addyay youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay otay ethay ollray, andyay addyay ethay otaltay otay youryay ithay ointpay aximummay. 
 Alternativelyyay, youyay ancay useyay ethay ixedfay aluevay ownshay inyay youryay assclay entryyay, whichyay isyay ethay averageyay esultray ofyay ethay ieday ollray (oundedray upyay). Whenyay youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay increasesyay ybay 1, youryay ithay ointpay aximummay increasesyay ybay 1 orfay eachyay evellay youyay avehay attainedyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, whenyay  Uenorbray eachesray 8thay evellay asyay ayay ighterfay, ehay increasesyay ishay  Onstitutioncay orescay omfray 17 otay 18, usthay increasingyay ishay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay omfray +3 otay +4. 
 Ishay ithay ointpay aximummay enthay increasesyay ybay 8. Ethay  Aracterchay  Advancementyay abletay ummarizessay ethay XPay youyay eednay otay advanceyay inyay evelslay omfray evellay 1 oughthray evellay 20, andyay ethay oficiencypray onusbay orfay ayay aracterchay ofyay atthay evellay. 
 Onsultcay ethay informationyay inyay youryay aracter’schay assclay escriptionday otay eesay whatyay otheryay improvementsyay youyay aingay atyay eachyay evellay. Ierstay ofyay  Ayplay  Ethay adingshay inyay ethay  Aracterchay  Advancementyay abletay owsshay ethay ourfay ierstay ofyay ayplay. 
 Ethay ierstay on’tday avehay anyyay ulesray associatedyay withyay emthay; eythay areyay ayay eneralgay escriptionday ofyay owhay ethay ayplay experienceyay angeschay asyay aracterschay aingay evelslay. Inyay ethay irstfay iertay (evelslay 1-4), aracterschay areyay effectivelyyay apprenticeyay adventurersyay. 
 Eythay areyay earninglay ethay eaturesfay atthay efineday emthay asyay embersmay ofyay articularpay assesclay, includingyay ethay ajormay oiceschay atthay avorflay eirthay assclay eaturesfay asyay eythay advanceyay (uchsay asyay ayay wizard’syay  Arcaneyay  Aditiontray oryay ayay ighter’sfay  Artialmay  Archetypeyay). 
 Ethay eatsthray eythay acefay areyay elativelyray inormay, usuallyyay osingpay ayay angerday otay ocallay armsteadsfay oryay illagesvay. Inyay ethay econdsay iertay (evelslay 5-10), aracterschay omecay intoyay eirthay ownyay. 
 Anymay ellcastersspay aingay accessyay otay 3levelrdlay ellsspay atyay ethay artstay ofyay isthay iertay, ossingcray ayay ewnay esholdthray ofyay agicalmay owerpay withyay ellsspay uchsay asyay ireballfay andyay ightninglay oltbay. 
 Atyay isthay iertay, anymay weapon-usingyay assesclay aingay ethay abilityyay otay akemay ultiplemay attacksyay inyay oneyay oundray. 
 Esethay aracterschay avehay ecomebay importantyay, acingfay angersday atthay eatenthray itiescay andyay ingdomskay. Inyay ethay irdthay iertay (evelslay 11-16), aracterschay avehay eachedray ayay evellay ofyay owerpay atthay etssay emthay ighhay aboveyay ethay ordinaryyay opulacepay andyay akesmay emthay ecialspay evenyay amongyay adventurersyay. 
 Atyay 11thay evellay, anymay ellcastersspay aingay accessyay otay 6levelthlay ellsspay, omesay ofyay whichyay eatecray effectsyay eviouslypray impossibleyay orfay ayerplay aracterschay otay achieveyay. 
 Otheryay aracterschay aingay eaturesfay atthay allowyay emthay otay akemay oremay attacksyay oryay oday oremay impressiveyay ingsthay withyay osethay attacksyay. 
 Esethay ightymay adventurersyay oftenyay onfrontcay eatsthray otay wholeyay egionsray andyay ontinentscay. Atyay ethay ourthfay iertay (evelslay 17-20), aracterschay achieveyay ethay innaclepay ofyay eirthay assclay eaturesfay, ecomingbay eroichay (oryay illainousvay) archetypesyay inyay eirthay ownyay ightray. 
 Apterchay 2:  Acesray Ayay ISITVay OTay ONEyay OFyay ETHay EATGRay ITIESCay INyay THay Eworldsyay ofyay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray—  Waterdeepyay, ethay  Eefray  Itycay ofyay  Eyhawkgray, oryay evenyay uncannyyay  Igilsay, ethay  Itycay ofyay  Oorsday— overwhelmsyay ethay ensessay. 
 Oicesvay atterchay inyay ountlesscay ifferentday anguageslay. 
 Ethay ellssmay ofyay ookingcay inyay ozensday ofyay ifferentday uisinescay inglemay withyay ethay odorsyay ofyay owdedcray eetsstray andyay oorpay anitationsay. 
 Uildingsbay inyay yriadmay architecturalyay ylesstay isplayday ethay iverseday originsyay ofyay eirthay inhabitantsyay. Andyay ethay eoplepay emselves—peoplethay ofyay aryingvay izesay, apeshay, andyay olorcay, esseddray inyay ayay azzlingday ectrumspay ofyay ylesstay andyay ues—representhay anymay ifferentday acesray, omfray iminutiveday alflingshay andyay outstay warvesday otay ajesticallymay eautifulbay elvesyay, inglingmay amongyay ayay arietyvay ofyay umanhay ethnicitiesyay. Atteredscay amongyay ethay embersmay ofyay esethay oremay ommoncay acesray areyay ethay uetray exoticsyay: ayay ulkinghay agonborndray erehay, ushingpay ishay wayyay oughthray ethay owdcray, andyay ayay yslay ieflingtay erethay, urkinglay inyay ethay adowsshay withyay ischiefmay inyay erhay eyesyay. 
Ayay oupgray ofyay omesgnay aughslay asyay oneyay ofyay emthay activatesyay ayay everclay woodenyay oytay atthay ovesmay ofyay itsyay ownyay accordyay. 
 Alfhay- elvesyay andyay alf-orcshay ivelay andyay workyay alongsideyay umanshay, withoutyay ullyfay elongingbay otay ethay acesray ofyay eitheryay ofyay eirthay arentspay. 
 Andyay erethay, wellyay outyay ofyay ethay unlightsay, isyay ayay onelay ow—adray ugitivefay omfray ethay ubterraneansay expanseyay ofyay ethay  Underdarkyay, yingtray otay akemay ishay wayyay inyay ayay worldyay atthay earsfay ishay indkay. Oosingchay ayay  Aceray Umanshay areyay ethay ostmay ommoncay eoplepay inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay, utbay eythay ivelay andyay workyay alongsideyay warvesday, elvesyay, alflingshay, andyay ountlesscay otheryay antasticfay eciesspay. 
 Youryay aracterchay elongsbay otay oneyay ofyay esethay eoplespay. Otnay everyyay intelligentyay aceray ofyay ethay ultiversemay isyay appropriateyay orfay ayay ayer-controlledplay adventureryay. 
 Warvesday, elvesyay, alflingshay, andyay umanshay areyay ethay ostmay ommoncay acesray otay oducepray ethay ortsay ofyay adventurersyay whoyay akemay upyay ypicaltay artiespay. 
 Agonborndray, omesgnay, alf-elveshay, alfhay- orcsyay, andyay ieflingstay areyay esslay ommoncay asyay adventurersyay. 
 Owdray, ayay ubracesay ofyay elvesyay, areyay alsoyay uncommonyay. Youryay oicechay ofyay aceray affectsyay anymay ifferentday aspectsyay ofyay youryay aracterchay. 
 Ityay establishesyay undamentalfay qualitiesyay atthay existyay oughoutthray youryay aracter’schay adventuringyay areercay. 
 Whenyay akingmay isthay ecisionday, eepkay inyay indmay ethay indkay ofyay aracterchay youyay wantyay otay ayplay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay alflinghay ouldcay ebay ayay oodgay oicechay orfay ayay eakysnay ogueray, ayay warfday akesmay ayay oughtay warrioryay, andyay anyay elfyay ancay ebay ayay astermay ofyay arcaneyay agicmay. Youryay aracterchay aceray otnay onlyyay affectsyay youryay abilityyay oresscay andyay aitstray utbay alsoyay ovidespray ethay uescay orfay uildingbay youryay aracter’schay orystay. 
 Eachyay ace’sray escriptionday inyay isthay apterchay includesyay informationyay otay elphay youyay oleplayray ayay aracterchay ofyay atthay aceray, includingyay ersonalitypay, ysicalphay appearanceyay, eaturesfay ofyay ocietysay, andyay acialray alignmentyay endenciestay. 
 Esethay etailsday areyay uggestionssay otay elphay youyay inkthay aboutyay youryay aracterchay; adventurersyay ancay eviateday widelyyay omfray ethay ormnay orfay eirthay aceray. 
 It’syay worthwhileyay otay onsidercay whyyay youryay aracterchay isyay ifferentday, asyay ayay elpfulhay wayyay otay inkthay aboutyay youryay aracter’schay ackgroundbay andyay ersonalitypay. Acialray  Aitstray Ethay escriptionday ofyay eachyay aceray includesyay acialray aitstray atthay areyay ommoncay otay embersmay ofyay atthay aceray. 
 Ethay ollowingfay entriesyay appearyay amongyay ethay aitstray ofyay ostmay acesray. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay Everyyay aceray increasesyay oneyay oryay oremay ofyay ayay aracter’sabilitychay oresscay. Ageyay Ethay ageyay entryyay otesnay ethay ageyay whenyay ayay embermay ofyay ethay aceray isyay onsideredcay anyay adultyay, asyay wellyay asyay ethay ace’sray expectedyay ifespanlay. 
 Isthay informationyay ancay elphay youyay ecideday owhay oldyay youryay aracterchay isyay atyay ethay artstay ofyay ethay amegay. 
 Youyay ancay oosechay anyyay ageyay orfay youryay aracterchay, whichyay ouldcay ovidepray anyay explanationyay orfay omesay ofyay youryay abilityyay oresscay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay ayplay ayay youngyay oryay eryvay oldyay aracterchay, youryay ageyay ouldcay explainyay ayay articularlypay owlay  Engthstray oryay  Onstitutioncay orescay, whileyay advancedyay ageyay ouldcay accountyay orfay ayay ighhay  Intelligenceyay oryay  Wisdomyay. Alignmentyay Ostmay acesray avehay endenciestay owardtay ertaincay alignmentsyay, escribedday inyay isthay entryyay. 
 Esethay areyay otnay indingbay orfay ayerplay aracterschay, utbay onsideringcay whyyay youryay warfday isyay aoticchay, orfay exampleyay, inyay efianceday ofyay awfullay warfday ocietysay ancay elphay youyay etterbay efineday youryay aracterchay. Izesay Aracterschay ofyay ostmay acesray areyay  Ediummay, ayay izesay ategorycay includingyay eaturescray atthay areyay oughlyray 4 otay 8 eetfay alltay. 
 Embersmay ofyay ayay ewfay acesray areyay  Allsmay (etweenbay 2 andyay 4 eetfay alltay), whichyay eansmay atthay ertaincay ulesray ofyay ethay amegay affectyay emthay ifferentlyday. 
 Ethay ostmay importantyay ofyay esethay ulesray isyay atthay  Allsmay aracterschay avehay oubletray wieldingyay eavyhay weaponsyay, asyay explainedyay inyay apterchay 6. Eedspay Youryay eedspay eterminesday owhay arfay youyay ancay ovemay whenyay avelingtray (apterchay 8) andyay ightingfay (apterchay 9). Anguageslay Ybay irtuevay ofyay youryay aceray, youryay aracterchay ancay eakspay, eadray, andyay writeyay ertaincay anguageslay. 
 Apterchay 4 istslay ethay ostmay ommoncay anguageslay ofyay ethay DDDay ultiversemay. Ubracessay Omesay acesray avehay ubracessay. 
 Embersmay ofyay ayay ubracesay avehay ethay aitstray ofyay ethay arentpay aceray inyay additionyay otay ethay aitstray ecifiedspay orfay eirthay ubracesay. 
 Elationshipsray amongyay ubracessay aryvay ignificantlysay omfray aceray otay aceray andyay worldyay otay worldyay. 
 Ortshay andyay Outstay Oldbay andyay ardyhay, warvesday areyay ownknay asyay illedskay warriorsyay, inersmay, andyay workersyay ofyay onestay andyay etalmay. 
 Oughthay eythay andstay wellyay underyay 5 eetfay alltay, warvesday areyay osay oadbray andyay ompactcay atthay eythay ancay weighyay asyay uchmay asyay ayay umanhay andingstay earlynay wotay eetfay allertay. 
 Eirthay ouragecay andyay enduranceyay areyay alsoyay easilyyay ayay atchmay orfay anyyay ofyay ethay argerlay olkfay. Warvenday inskay angesray omfray eepday ownbray otay ayay alerpay uehay ingedtay withyay edray, utbay ethay ostmay ommoncay adesshay areyay ightlay ownbray oryay eepday antay, ikelay ertaincay onestay ofyay earthyay. 
 Eirthay airhay, wornyay onglay utbay inyay implesay ylesstay, isyay usuallyyay ackblay, aygray, oryay ownbray, oughthay alerpay warvesday oftenyay avehay edray airhay. 
 Alemay warvesday aluevay eirthay eardsbay ighlyhay andyay oomgray emthay arefullycay. Onglay  Emorymay,  Onglay  Udgesgray Warvesday ancay ivelay otay ebay oremay anthay 400 yearsyay oldyay, osay ethay oldestyay ivinglay warvesday oftenyay ememberray ayay eryvay ifferentday worldyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, omesay ofyay ethay oldestyay warvesday ivinglay inyay  Itadelcay  Elbarrfay (inyay ethay worldyay ofyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray) ancay ecallray ethay ayday, oremay anthay eethray enturiescay agoyay, whenyay orcsyay onqueredcay ethay ortressfay andyay ovedray emthay intoyay anyay exileyay atthay astedlay overyay 250 yearsyay. 
 Isthay ongevitylay antsgray emthay ayay erspectivepay onyay ethay worldyay atthay orter-livedshay acesray uchsay asyay umanshay andyay alflingshay acklay. Warvesday areyay olidsay andyay enduringyay ikelay ethay ountainsmay eythay ovelay, weatheringyay ethay assagepay ofyay enturiescay withyay oicstay enduranceyay andyay ittlelay angechay. 
 Eythay espectray ethay aditionstray ofyay eirthay ansclay, acingtray eirthay ancestryyay ackbay otay ethay oundingfay ofyay eirthay ostmay ancientyay ongholdsstray inyay ethay youthyay ofyay ethay worldyay, andyay on'tday abandonyay osethay aditionstray ightlylay. 
 Artpay ofyay osethay aditionstray isyay evotionday otay ethay odsgay ofyay ethay warvesday, whoyay upholdyay ethay warvenday idealsyay ofyay industriousyay aborlay, illskay inyay attlebay, andyay evotionday otay ethay orgefay. Individualyay warvesday areyay eterminedday andyay oyallay, uetray otay eirthay wordyay andyay ecisiveday inyay actionyay, ometimessay otay ethay ointpay ofyay ubbornnessstay. 
 Anymay warvesday avehay ayay ongstray ensesay Ingdomskay ichray inyay ancientyay andeurgray, allshay arvedcay intoyay ethay ootsray ofyay ountainsmay, ethay echoingyay ofyay ickspay andyay ammershay inyay eepday inesmay andyay azingblay orgesfay, ayay ommitmentcay otay anclay andyay aditiontray, andyay ayay urningbay atredhay ofyay oblinsgay andyay orcs—theseyay ommoncay eadsthray uniteyay allyay warvesday.“ Yeryay atelay, elfyay!” amecay ethay oughray edgeyay ofyay ayay amiliarfay oicevay. 
 Uenorbray  Attlehammerbay walkedyay upyay ethay ackbay ofyay ishay eadday oefay, isregardingday ethay actfay atthay ethay eavyhay onstermay aylay onyay optay ofyay ishay elvenyay iendfray. 
 Inyay itespay ofyay ethay addedyay iscomfortday, ethay warf’sday onglay, ointedpay, often-brokenyay osenay andyay aygray- eakedstray oughthay ill-fierystay edray eardbay amecay asyay ayay welcomeyay ightsay otay  Izztdray. 
“ Ewknay I’dyay indfay yeyay inyay oubletray ifyay Iyay amecay outyay anyay' ookedlay orfay ye!"—Ryay. 
Ayay. 
ofyay usticejay, andyay eythay areyay owslay otay orgetfay wrongsyay eythay avehay ufferedsay. 
Ayay wrongyay oneday otay oneyay warfday isyay ayay wrongyay oneday otay ethay warf’sday entireyay anclay, osay whatyay eginsbay asyay oneyay warf’sday unthay orfay engeancevay ancay ecomebay ayay ull-blownfay anclay eudfay. Ansclay andyay  Ingdomskay  Warvenday ingdomskay etchstray eepday eneathbay ethay ountainsmay whereyay ethay warvesday inemay emsgay andyay eciouspray etalsmay andyay orgefay itemsyay ofyay wonderyay. 
 Eythay ovelay ethay eautybay andyay artistryyay ofyay eciouspray etalsmay andyay inefay ewelryjay, andyay inyay omesay warvesday isthay ovelay estersfay intoyay avariceyay. 
 Whateveryay wealthyay eythay an’tcay indfay inyay eirthay ountainsmay, eythay aingay oughthray adetray. 
 Eythay islikeday oatsbay, osay enterprisingyay umanshay andyay alflingshay equentlyfray andlehay adetray inyay warvenday oodsgay alongyay wateryay outesray. 
 Ustworthytray embersmay ofyay otheryay acesray areyay welcomeyay inyay warfday ettlementssay, oughthay omesay areasyay areyay offyay imitslay evenyay otay emthay. Ethay iefchay unityay ofyay warvenday ocietysay isyay ethay anclay, andyay warvesday ighlyhay aluevay ocialsay andingstay.
