 Evenyay warvesday whoyay ivelay arfay omfray eirthay ownyay ingdomskay erishchay eirthay anclay identitiesyay andyay affiliationsyay, ecognizeray elatedray warvesday, andyay invokeyay eirthay ancestorsyay’ amesnay inyay oathsyay andyay ursescay. 
 Otay ebay anlessclay isyay ethay worstyay atefay atthay ancay efallbay ayay warfday. Warvesday inyay otheryay andslay areyay ypicallytay artisansyay, especiallyyay weaponsmithsyay, armorersyay, andyay ewelersjay. 
 Omesay ecomebay ercenariesmay oryay odyguardsbay, ighlyhay oughtsay afteryay orfay eirthay ouragecay andyay oyaltylay. Odsgay,  Oldgay, andyay  Anclay Warvesday whoyay aketay upyay ethay adventuringyay ifelay ightmay ebay otivatedmay ybay ayay esireday orfay easure—fortray itsyay ownyay akesay, orfay ayay ecificspay urposepay, oryay evenyay outyay ofyay anyay altruisticyay esireday otay elphay othersyay. 
 Otheryay warvesday areyay ivendray ybay ethay ommandcay oryay inspirationyay ofyay ayay eityday, ayay irectday allingcay oryay implysay ayay esireday otay ingbray oryglay otay oneyay ofyay ethay warfday odsgay. 
 Anclay andyay ancestryyay areyay alsoyay importantyay otivatorsmay. 
Ayay warfday ightmay eeksay otay estoreray ayay an’sclay ostlay onorhay, avengeyay anyay ancientyay wrongyay ethay anclay ufferedsay, oryay earnyay ayay ewnay aceplay withinyay ethay anclay afteryay avinghay eenbay exiledyay. 
 Oryay ayay warfday ightmay earchsay orfay ethay axeyay wieldedyay ybay ayay ightymay ancestoryay, ostlay onyay ethay ieldfay ofyay attlebay enturiescay agoyay. Owslay otay  Usttray Warvesday etgay alongyay assablypay wellyay withyay ostmay otheryay acesray. 
“ Ethay ifferenceday etweenbay anyay acquaintanceyay andyay ayay iendfray isyay aboutyay ayay undredhay yearsyay,” isyay ayay warfday ayingsay atthay ightmay ebay yperbolehay, utbay ertainlycay ointspay otay owhay ifficultday ityay ancay ebay orfay ayay embermay ofyay ayay ort-livedshay aceray ikelay umanshay otay earnyay ayay warf’sday usttray. Elvesyay. 
“ It’syay otnay wiseyay otay ependday onyay ethay elvesyay. 
 Onay ellingtay whatyay anyay elfyay willyay oday extnay; whenyay ethay ammerhay eetsmay ethay orc’syay eadhay, ey’rethay asyay aptyay otay artstay ingingsay asyay otay ullpay outyay ayay wordsay. 
 Ey’rethay ightyflay andyay ivolousfray. 
 Wotay ingsthay otay ebay aidsay orfay emthay, oughthay:  Eythay on’tday avehay anymay ithssmay, utbay ethay onesyay eythay avehay oday eryvay inefay workyay. 
 Andyay whenyay orcsyay oryay oblinsgay omecay eamingstray ownday outyay ofyay ethay ountainsmay, anyay elf’syay oodgay otay avehay atyay youryay ackbay. 
 Otnay asyay oodgay asyay ayay warfday, aybemay, utbay onay oubtday eythay atehay ethay orcsyay asyay uchmay asyay weyay oday.” Alflingshay. 
“ Uresay, ey’rethay easantplay olkfay. 
 Utbay owshay emay ayay alflinghay erohay. 
 Anyay empireyay, ayay iumphanttray armyyay. 
 Evenyay ayay easuretray orfay ethay agesyay ademay ybay alflinghay andshay. 
 Othingnay. 
 Owhay ancay youyay aketay emthay eriouslysay?” Umanshay. 
“ Youyay aketay ethay imetay otay etgay otay owknay ayay umanhay, andyay ybay enthay ethay uman’shay onyay erhay eathbedday. 
 Ifyay you’reyay uckylay, e’sshay otgay in—akay aughterday oryay anddaughtergray, aybe—who’smay otgay andshay andyay earthay asyay oodgay asyay ershay. 
 At’sthay whenyay youyay ancay akemay ayay umanhay iendfray. 
 Andyay watchyay emthay ogay!  Eythay etsay eirthay eartshay onyay omethingsay, ey’llthay etgay ityay, whetheryay it’syay ayay agon’sdray oardhay oryay anyay empire’syay onethray. 
 Warfday  Amesnay Ayay warf’sday amenay isyay antedgray ybay ayay anclay elderyay, inyay accordanceyay withyay aditiontray. 
 Everyyay operpray warvenday amenay ashay eenbay usedyay andyay eusedray ownday oughthray ethay enerationsgay. 
Ayay warf’sday amenay elongsbay otay ethay anclay, otnay otay ethay individual.Ayay warfday whoyay isusesmay oryay ingsbray ameshay otay ayay anclay amenay isyay ippedstray ofyay ethay amenay andyay orbiddenfay ybay awlay otay useyay anyyay warvenday amenay inyay itsyay aceplay. Alemay  Amesnay:  Adrikyay,  Alberichyay,  Aernbay,  Arenddbay,  Ottorbray,  Uenorbray,  Ainday,  Arrakday,  Elgday,  Eberkyay,  Einkilyay,  Argrimfay,  Intflay,  Ardaingay,  Arbekhay,  Ildrakkay,  Orgranmay,  Orsikyay,  Oskaryay,  Angrimray,  Urikray,  Aklinntay,  Oradinthay,  Orinthay,  Ordektay,  Aubontray,  Avoktray,  Ulfgaryay,  Eitvay,  Ondalvay  Emalefay  Amesnay:  Amberyay,  Artinyay,  Audhildyay,  Ardrynbay,  Agnalday,  Iesaday,  Eldethyay,  Alkrunnfay,  Inellenfay,  Unnlodagay,  Urdisgay,  Eljahay,  Inhlay,  Athrakay,  Istrydkray,  Ildeyay,  Iftrasalay,  Ardredmay,  Iswynnray,  Annlsay,  Orberatay,  Orggatay,  Istravay  Anclay  Amesnay:  Alderkbay,  Attlehammerbay,  Awnanvilbray,  Ankilday,  Ireforgefay,  Ostbeardfray,  Orunngay,  Olderhekhay,  Ironfistyay,  Oderrlay,  Utgehrlay,  Umnaheimray,  Akelnstray,  Orunntay,  Ungartyay Warfday  Aitstray Youryay warfday aracterchay ashay anyay assortmentyay ofyay inbornyay abilitiesyay, artpay andyay arcelpay ofyay warvenday aturenay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Onstitutioncay orescay increasesyay ybay 2. Ageyay. 
 Warvesday aturemay atyay ethay amesay ateray asyay umanshay, utbay ey’rethay onsideredcay youngyay untilyay eythay eachray ethay ageyay ofyay 50. 
 Onyay averageyay, eythay ivelay aboutyay 350 yearsyay. Alignmentyay. 
 Ostmay warvesday areyay awfullay, elievingbay irmlyfay inyay ethay enefitsbay ofyay ayay well-orderedyay ocietysay. 
 Eythay endtay owardtay oodgay asyay wellyay, withyay ayay ongstray ensesay ofyay airfay ayplay andyay ayay eliefbay atthay everyoneyay eservesday otay areshay inyay ethay enefitsbay ofyay ayay ustjay orderyay. Izesay. 
 Warvesday andstay etweenbay 4 andyay 5 eetfay alltay andyay averageyay aboutyay 150 oundspay. 
 Youryay izesay isyay  Ediummay. Eedspay. 
 Youryay asebay walkingyay eedspay isyay 25 eetfay. 
 Youryay eedspay isyay otnay educedray ybay wearingyay eavyhay armoryay. Arkvisionday. 
 Accustomedyay otay ifelay undergroundyay, youyay avehay uperiorsay isionvay inyay arkday andyay imday onditionscay. 
 Youyay ancay eesay inyay imday ightlay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay asyay ifyay ityay wereyay ightbray ightlay, andyay inyay arknessday asyay ifyay ityay wereyay imday ightlay. 
 Youyay an’tcay iscernday olorcay inyay arknessday, onlyyay adesshay ofyay aygray. Warvenday  Esilienceray. 
 Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay oisonpay, andyay youyay avehay esistanceray againstyay oisonpay amageday (explainedyay inyay apterchay 9). Warvenday  Ombatcay  Ainingtray. 
 Youyay avehay oficiencypray withyay ethay attleaxebay, andaxehay, owingthray ammerhay, andyay warhammeryay. Ooltay  Oficiencypray. 
 Youyay aingay oficiencypray withyay ethay artisan’syay oolstay ofyay youryay oicechay: ith’ssmay oolstay, ewer’sbray uppliessay, oryay ason’smay oolstay. Onecunningstay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay akemay anyay  Intelligenceyay ( Istoryhay) eckchay elatedray otay ethay originyay ofyay oneworkstay, youyay areyay onsideredcay oficientpray inyay ethay  Istoryhay illskay andyay addyay oubleday youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay ethay eckchay, insteadyay ofyay youryay ormalnay oficiencypray onusbay. Anguageslay. 
 Youyay ancay eakspay, eadray, andyay writeyay  Ommoncay andyay  Warvishday. 
 Warvishday isyay ullfay ofyay ardhay onsonantscay andyay utturalgay oundssay, andyay osethay aracteristicschay illspay overyay intoyay whateveryay otheryay anguagelay ayay warfday ightmay eakspay. Ubracesay. 
 Wotay ainmay ubracessay ofyay warvesday opulatepay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay: illhay warvesday andyay ountainmay warvesday. 
 Oosechay oneyay ofyay esethay ubracessay. Illhay  Warfday Asyay ayay illhay warfday, youyay avehay eenkay ensessay, eepday intuitionyay, andyay emarkableray esilienceray. 
 Ethay oldgay warvesday ofyay  Aerunfay inyay eirthay ightymay outhernsay ingdomkay areyay illhay warvesday, asyay areyay ethay exiledyay  Eidarnay andyay ethay ebasedday  Arklay ofyay  Ynnkray inyay ethay  Agonlancedray ettingsay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Wisdomyay orescay increasesyay ybay 1. Warvenday  Oughnesstay. 
 Youryay ithay ointpay aximummay increasesyay ybay 1, andyay ityay increasesyay ybay 1 everyyay imetay youyay aingay ayay evellay. Ountainmay  Warfday Asyay ayay ountainmay warfday, you'reyay ongstray andyay ardyhay, accustomedyay otay ayay ifficultday ifelay inyay uggedray erraintay. 
 You’reyay obablypray onyay ethay alltay idesay (orfay ayay warfday), andyay endtay owardtay ighterlay olorationcay. 
 Ethay ieldshay warvesday ofyay orthernnay  Aerunfay, asyay wellyay asyay ethay ulingray  Ylarhay anclay andyay ethay oblenay  Aewarday anclay ofyay  Agonlancedray, areyay ountainmay warvesday. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Engthstray orescay increasesyay ybay 2. Warvenday  Armoryay  Ainingtray. 
 Youyay avehay oficiencypray withyay ightlay andyay ediummay armoryay. Uergarday Inyay itiescay eepday inyay ethay  Underdarkyay ivelay ethay uergarday, oryay aygray warvesday. 
 Esethay iciousvay, ealthystay aveslay aderstray aidray ethay urfacesay worldyay orfay aptivescay, enthay ellsay eirthay eypray otay ethay otheryay acesray ofyay ethay  Underdarkyay. 
 Elf“Iyay AVEHay EVERNay IMAGINEDyay UCHSay EAUTYBay EXISTEDyay,” Oldmoongay aidsay oftlysay. 
 Ethay ay’sday archmay adhay eenbay ifficultday, utbay ethay ewardray atyay ethay endyay wasyay eyondbay eirthay eamsdray. Ethay ompanionscay oodstay onyay ayay ighhay iffclay overyay ethay abledfay itycay ofyay  Qualinostyay. Ourfay enderslay iresspay oseray omfray ethay ity’scay ornerscay ikelay istenglay- ingyay indlesspay, eirthay illiantbray whiteyay onestay arbledmay withyay iningshay ilversay. 
 Acefulgray archesyay, woopingsay omfray irespay otay irespay, oaredsay oughthray ethay airyay. 
 Aftedcray ybay ancientyay warvenday etalsmithsmay, eythay wereyay ongstray enoughyay otay oldhay ethay weightyay ofyay anyay armyyay, yetyay eythay appearedyay osay elicateday atthay ayay irdbay ightinglay onyay emthay ightmay overthrowyay ethay alancebay. 
 Esethay isteningglay archesyay wereyay ethay ity’scay onlyyay oundariesbay; erethay wasyay onay wallyay aroundyay  Qualinostyay. 
 Ethay elvenyay itycay openedyay itsyay armsyay ovinglylay otay ethay wildernessyay.— Argaretmay  Weisyay &  Acytray  Ickmanhay,  Agonsdray ofyay  Autumnyay  Wilighttay Elvesyay areyay ayay agicalmay eoplepay ofyay otherworldlyyay acegray, ivinglay inyay ethay worldyay utbay otnay entirelyyay artpay ofyay ityay. 
 Eythay ivelay inyay acesplay ofyay etherealyay eautybay, inyay ethay idstmay ofyay ancientyay orestsfay oryay inyay ilverysay iresspay itteringglay withyay aeriefay ightlay, whereyay oftsay usicmay iftsdray oughthray ethay airyay andyay entlegay agrancesfray waftyay onyay ethay eezebray. 
 Elvesyay ovelay aturenay andyay agicmay, artyay andyay artistryyay, usicmay andyay oetrypay, andyay ethay oodgay ingsthay ofyay ethay worldyay. Enderslay andyay  Acefulgray Withyay eirthay unearthlyyay acegray andyay inefay eaturesfay, elvesyay appearyay auntinglyhay eautifulbay otay umanshay andyay embersmay ofyay anymay otheryay acesray. 
 Eythay areyay ightlyslay ortershay anthay umanshay onyay averageyay, angingray omfray wellyay underyay 5 eetfay alltay otay ustjay overyay 6 eetfay. 
 Eythay areyay oremay enderslay anthay umanshay, weighingyay onlyyay 100 otay 145 oundspay. 
 Alesmay andfemalesyay areyay aboutyay ethay amesay eighthay, andyay alesmay areyay onlyyay arginallymay eavierhay anthay emalesfay. Elvesyay’ olorationcay encompassesyay ethay ormalnay umanhay angeray andyay alsoyay includesyay inskay inyay adesshay ofyay oppercay, onzebray, andyay almostyay uish-whiteblay, airhay ofyay eengray oryay ueblay, andyay eyesyay ikelay oolspay ofyay iquidlay oldgay oryay ilversay. 
 Elvesyay avehay onay acialfay andyay ittlelay odybay airhay. 
 Eythay avorfay elegantyay othingclay inyay ightbray olorscay, andyay eythay enjoyyay implesay yetyay ovelylay ewelry.Ajay  Imelesstay  Erspectivepay Elvesyay ancay ivelay wellyay overyay 700 yearsyay, ivinggay emthay ayay oadbray erspectivepay onyay eventsyay atthay ightmay oubletray ethay ortershay- ivedlay acesray oremay eeplyday. 
 Eythay areyay oremay oftenyay amusedyay anthay excitedyay, andyay oremay ikelylay otay ebay uriouscay anthay eedygray. 
 Eythay endtay otay emainray aloofyay andyay unfazedyay ybay ettypay appenstancehay. 
adventuringyay onyay ayay issionmay oryay earninglay ayay ewnay illskay oryay artyay, elvesyay ancay ebay ocusedfay andyay elentlessray. 
 Eythay areyay owslay otay akemay iendsfray andyay enemiesyay, andyay evenyay owerslay otay orgetfay emthay. 
 Eythay eplyray otay ettypay insultsyay withyay isdainday andyay otay erioussay insultsyay withyay engeancevay. Ikelay ethay anchesbray ofyay ayay youngyay eetray, elvesyay areyay exibleflay inyay ethay acefay ofyay angerday. 
 Eythay usttray inyay iplomacyday andyay ompromisecay otay esolveray ifferencesday eforebay eythay escalateyay otay iolencevay. 
 Eythay avehay eenbay ownknay otay etreatray omfray intrusionsyay intoyay eirthay woodlandyay omeshay, onfidentcay atthay eythay ancay implysay waityay ethay invadersyay outyay. 
 Utbay whenyay ethay eednay arisesyay, elvesyay evealray ayay ernstay artialmay idesay, emonstratingday illskay withyay wordsay, owbay, andyay ategystray. Iddenhay  Woodlandyay  Ealmsray Ostmay elvesyay wellday inyay allsmay orestfay illagesvay iddenhay amongyay ethay eestray. 
 Elvesyay unthay amegay, athergay oodfay, andyay owgray egetablesvay, andyay eirthay illskay andyay agicmay allowyay emthay otay upportsay emselvesthay withoutyay ethay eednay orfay earingclay andyay owingplay andlay. 
 Eythay areyay alentedtay artisansyay, aftingcray inelyfay workedyay othesclay andyay artyay objectsyay. 
 Eirthay ontactcay withyay outsidersyay isyay usuallyyay imitedlay, oughthay ayay ewfay elvesyay akemay ayay oodgay ivinglay ybay adingtray aftedcray itemsyay orfay etalsmay (whichyay eythay avehay onay interestyay inyay iningmay). Elvesyay encounteredyay outsideyay eirthay ownyay andslay areyay ommonlycay avelingtray instrelsmay, artistsyay, oryay agessay. 
 Umanhay oblesnay ompetecay orfay ethay ervicessay ofyay elfyay instructorsyay otay eachtay wordplaysay oryay agicmay otay eirthay ildrenchay. Explorationyay andyay  Adventureyay Elvesyay aketay upyay adventuringyay outyay ofyay wanderlustyay. 
 Incesay eythay areyay osay ong-livedlay, eythay ancay enjoyyay enturiescay ofyay explorationyay andyay iscoveryday. 
 Eythay islikeday ethay acepay ofyay umanhay ocietysay, whichyay isyay egimentedray omfray ayday otay ayday utbay onstantlycay angingchay overyay ecadesday, osay eythay indfay areerscay atthay etlay emthay aveltray eelyfray andyay etsay eirthay ownyay acepay. 
 Elvesyay alsoyay enjoyyay exercisingyay eirthay artialmay owesspray oryay aininggay eatergray agicalmay owerpay, andyay adventuringyay allowsyay emtothay oday osay. 
 Omesay ightmay oinjay withyay ebelsray ightingfay againstyay oppressionyay, andyay othersyay ightmay ecomebay ampionschay ofyay oralmay ausescay. Elfyay  Amesnay  Elvesyay areyay onsideredcay ildrenchay untilyay eythay eclareday emselvesthay adultsyay, omesay imetay afteryay ethay undredthhay irthdaybay, andyay eforebay isthay eriodpay eythay areyay alledcay ybay ildchay amesnay. Onyay eclaringday adulthoodyay, anyay elfyay electssay anyay adultyay amenay, althoughyay osethay whoyay ewknay imhay oryay erhay asyay ayay youngsteryay ightmay ontinuecay otay useyay ethay ildchay amenay. 
 Eachyay elf’syay adultyay amenay isyay ayay uniqueyay eationcray, oughthay ityay ightmay eflectray ethay amesnay ofyay espectedray individualsyay oryay otheryay amilyfay embersmay. 
 Ittlelay istinctionday existsyay etweenbay alemay amesnay andyay emalefay amesnay; ethay oupingsgray erehay eflectray onlyyay eneralgay endenciestay. 
 Inyay additionyay, everyyay elfyay earsbay ayay amilyfay amenay, ypicallytay ayay ombinationcay ofyay otheryay  Elvishyay wordsyay. 
 Aughtyhay utbay  Aciousgray Althoughyay eythay ancay ebay aughtyhay, elvesyay areyay enerallygay aciousgray evenyay otay osethay whoyay allfay ortshay ofyay eirthay ighhay expectationsyay— whichyay isyay ostmay on-elvesnay. 
 Illstay, eythay ancay indfay oodgay inyay ustjay aboutyay anyoneyay. Warvesday. 
“ Warvesday areyay ullday, umsyclay oafsyay. 
 Utbay whatyay eythay acklay inyay umorhay, ophisticationsay, andyay annersmay, eythay akemay upyay inyay alorvay. 
 Andyay Iyay ustmay admityay, eirthay estbay ithssmay oducepray artyay atthay approachesyay elvenyay qualityyay.” Alflingshay. 
“ Alflingshay areyay eoplepay ofyay implesay easuresplay, andyay atthay isyay otnay ayay qualityyay otay ornscay. 
 Ey’rethay oodgay olkfay, eythay arecay orfay eachyay otheryay andyay endtay eirthay ardensgay, andyay eythay avehay ovenpray emselvesthay oughertay anthay eythay eemsay whenyay ethay eednay arisesyay." Umanshay. 
“ Allyay atthay astehay, eirthay ambitionyay andyay ivedray otay accomplishyay omethingsay eforebay eirthay iefbray iveslay asspay awayyay— umanhay endeavorsyay eemsay osay utilefay ometimessay. 
 Utbay enthay youyay ooklay atyay whatyay eythay avehay accomplishedyay, andyay youyay avehay otay appreciateyay eirthay achievementsyay. 
 Ifyay onlyyay eythay ouldcay owslay ownday andyay earnlay omesay efinementray.” Emalefay  Adultyay  Amesnay:  Adrieyay,  Althaeayay,  Anastriannayay,  Andrasteyay,  Antinuayay,  Ethrynnabay,  Irelbay,  Aelynncay,  Usiliadray,  Ennayay,  Elosialfay,  Ieleniayay,  Elennethjay,  Eylethkay,  Eshannalay,  Ialay,  Erielemay,  Ialeemay,  Aivaranay,  Quelennayay,  Quillatheyay,  Arielsay,  Anairrashay,  Avashay,  Ilaquisay,  Eirastrathay,  Iathay,  Adaniavay,  Alanthevay,  Anaphiaxay  Amilyfay  Amesnay ( Ommoncay  Anslationstray):  Amakiiryay ( Emflowergay),  Amastaciayay ( Arflowerstay),  Alanodelgay ( Oonwhispermay),  Olimionhay ( Iamonddewday),  Ilphelkiiryay ( Emblossomgay),  Iadonlay ( Ilverfrondsay),  Eliamnemay ( Oakenheelyay),  Ai'lonay ( Ightbreezenay),  Iannodelsay ( Oonbrookmay),  Iloscientxay ( Oldpetalgay) Elfyay  Aitstray Youryay elfyay aracterchay ashay ayay arietyvay ofyay aturalnay abilitiesyay, ethay esultray ofyay ousandsthay ofyay yearsyay ofyay elvenyay efinementray. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Exterityday orescay increasesyay ybay 2. Ageyay. 
 Althoughyay elvesyay eachray ysicalphay aturitymay atyay aboutyay ethay amesay ageyay asyay umanshay, ethay elvenyay understandingyay ofyay adulthoodyay oesgay eyondbay ysicalphay owthgray otay encompassyay worldlyyay experienceyay. 
 Anyay elfyay ypicallytay aimsclay adulthoodyay andyay anyay adultyay amenay aroundyay ethay ageyay ofyay 100 andyay ancay ivelay otay ebay 750 yearsyay oldyay. Alignmentyay. 
 Elvesyay ovelay eedomfray, arietyvay, andyay elfsay- expressionyay, osay eythay eanlay onglystray owardtay ethay entlergay aspectsyay ofyay aoschay. 
 Eythay aluevay andyay otectpray othersyay' eedomfray asyay wellyay asyay eirthay ownyay, andyay eythay areyay oremay oftenyay oodgay anthay otnay. 
 Ethay owdray areyay anyay exceptionyay; eirthay exileyay intoyay ethay  Underdarkyay ashay ademay emthay iciousvay andyay angerousday. 
 Owdray areyay oremay oftenyay evilyay anthay otnay. Izesay. 
 Elvesyay angeray omfray underyay 5 otay overyay 6 eetfay alltay andyay avehay enderslay uildsbay. 
 Youryay izesay isyay  Ediummay. Eedspay. 
 Youryay asebay walkingyay eedspay isyay 30 eetfay. 
 Arkvisionday. 
 Accustomedyay otay wilittay orestsfay andyay ethay ightnay yskay, youyay avehay uperiorsay isionvay inyay arkday andyay imday onditionscay. 
 Youyay ancay eesay inyay imday ightlay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay asyay ifyay ityay wereyay ightbray ightlay, andyay inyay arknessday asyay ifyay ityay wereyay imday ightlay. 
 Youyay an’tcay iscernday olorcay inyay arknessday, onlyyay adesshay ofyay aygray. Eenkay  Ensessay. 
 Youyay avehay oficiencypray inyay ethay  Erceptionpay illskay. Eyfay  Ancestryyay. 
 Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay eingbay armedchay, andyay agicmay an’tcay utpay youyay otay eepslay. Ancetray. 
 Elvesyay on’tday eednay otay eepslay. 
 Insteadyay, eythay editatemay eeplyday, emainingray emiconscioussay, orfay 4 ourshay ayay ayday. 
( Ethay  Ommoncay wordyay orfay uchsay editationmay isyay “ancetray.”)  Whileyay editatingmay, youyay ancay eamdray afteryay ayay ashionfay; uchsay eamsdray areyay actuallyyay entalmay exercisesyay atthay avehay ecomebay eflexiveray oughthray yearsyay ofyay acticepray. 
 Afteryay estingray inyay isthay wayyay, youyay aingay ethay amesay enefitbay atthay ayay umanhay oesday omfray 8 ourshay ofyay eepslay. Anguageslay. 
 Youyay ancay eakspay, eadray, andyay writeyay  Ommoncay andyay  Elvishyay. 
 Elvishyay isyay uidflay, withyay ubtlesay intonationsyay andyay intricateyay ammargray. 
 Elvenyay iteraturelay isyay ichray andyay ariedvay, andyay eirthay ongssay andyay oemspay areyay amousfay amongyay otheryay acesray. 
 Anymay ardsbay earnlay eirthay anguagelay osay eythay ancay addyay  Elvishyay alladsbay otay eirthay epertoiresray. Ubracesay. 
 Ancientyay ividesday amongyay ethay elvenyay eoplepay esultedray inyay eethray ainmay ubracessay: ighhay elvesyay, woodyay elvesyay, andyay arkday elvesyay, whoyay areyay ommonlycay alledcay owdray. 
 Oosechay oneyay ofyay esethay ubracessay. 
 Inyay omesay worldsyay, esethay ubracessay areyay ividedday illstay urtherfay (uchsay asyay ethay unsay elvesyay andyay oonmay elvesyay ofyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray), osay ifyay youyay wishyay, youyay ancay oosechay ayay arrowernay ubracesay. Ighhay  Elfyay Asyay ayay ighhay elfyay, youyay avehay ayay eenkay indmay andyay ayay asterymay ofyay atyay eastlay ethay asicsbay ofyay agicmay. 
 Inyay anymay ofyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay, erethay areyay wotay indskay ofyay ighhay elvesyay. 
 Oneyay ypetay (whichyay includesyay ethay aygray elvesyay andyay alleyvay elvesyay ofyay  Eyhawkgray, ethay  Ilvanestisay ofyay  Agonlancedray, andyay ethay unsay elvesyay ofyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray) isyay aughtyhay andyay eclusiveray, elievingbay emselvesthay otay ebay uperiorsay otay on-elvesnay andyay evenyay otheryay elvesyay. 
 Ethay otheryay ypetay (includingyay ethay ighhay elvesyay ofyay  Eyhawkgray. 
ethay  Qualinestiyay ofyay  Agonlancedray, andyay ethay oonmay elvesyay ofyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray) areyay oremay ommoncay andyay oremay iendlyfray, andyay oftenyay encounteredyay amongyay umanshay andyay otheryay acesray. Ethay unsay elvesyay ofyay  Aerunfay (alsoyay alledcay oldgay elvesyay oryay unrisesay elvesyay) avehay onzebray inskay andyay airhay ofyay oppercay, ackblay, oryay oldengay ondblay. 
 Eirthay eyesyay areyay oldengay, ilversay, oryay ackblay. 
 Oonmay elvesyay (alsoyay alledcay ilversay elvesyay oryay aygray elvesyay) areyay uchmay alerpay, withyay alabasteryay inskay ometimessay ingedtay withyay ueblay. Eythay oftenyay avehay airhay ofyay ilver-whitesay, ackblay, oryay ueblay, utbay ariousvay adesshay ofyay ondblay, ownbray, andyay edray areyay otnay uncommonyay. 
 Eirthay eyesyay areyay ueblay oryay eengray andyay eckedflay withyay oldgay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Intelligenceyay orescay increasesyay ybay 1. Elfyay  Weaponyay  Ainingtray. 
 Antripcay. 
 Youyay owknay oneyay antripcay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay wizardyay ellspay istlay. 
 Intelligenceyay isyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay ityay. Extrayay  Anguagelay. 
 Youyay ancay eakspay, eadray, andyay writeyay oneyay extrayay anguagelay ofyay youryay oicechay. Woodyay  Elfyay Asyay ayay woodyay elfyay, youyay avehay eenkay ensessay andyay intuitionyay, andyay youryay eetflay eetfay arrycay youyay quicklyyay andyay ealthilystay oughthray youryay ativenay orestsfay. 
 Isthay ategorycay includesyay ethay wildyay elvesyay (ugachgray) ofyay  Eyhawkgray andyay ethay  Agonestikay ofyay  Agonlancedray, asyay wellyay asyay ethay acesray alledcay woodyay elvesyay inyay  Eyhawkgray andyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray. 
 Inyay  Aerunfay, woodyay elvesyay (alsoyay alledcay wildyay elvesyay, eengray elvesyay, oryay orestfay elvesyay) areyay eclusiveray andyay istrustingday ofyay on-elvesnay. Woodyay elvesyay’ inskay endstay otay ebay opperishcay inyay uehay, ometimessay withyay acestray ofyay eengray. 
 Eirthay airhay endstay owardtay ownsbray andyay acksblay, utbay ityay isyay occasionallyyay ondblay oryay opper-coloredcay. 
 Eirthay eyesyay areyay eengray, ownbray, oryay azelhay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Wisdomyay orescay increasesyay ybay 1. Elfyay  Weaponyay  Ainingtray. 
 Youyay avehay oficiencypray withyay ethay ongswordlay, ortswordshay, ortbowshay, andyay ongbowlay. Eetflay ofyay  Ootfay. 
 Youryay asebay walkingyay eedspay increasesyay otay 35 eetfay. Askmay ofyay ethay  Wildyay. 
 Youyay ancay attemptyay otay idehay evenyay whenyay youyay areyay onlyyay ightlylay obscuredyay ybay oliagefay, eavyhay ainray, allingfay owsnay, istmay, andyay otheryay aturalnay enomenaphay. Ethay  Arknessday ofyay ethay  Owdray Wereyay ityay otnay orfay oneyay enownedray exceptionyay, ethay aceray ofyay owdray wouldyay ebay universallyyay eviledray. 
 Otay ostmay, eythay areyay ayay aceray ofyay emon-worshipingday araudersmay wellingday inyay ethay ubterraneansay epthsday ofyay ethay  Underdarkyay, emergingyay onlyyay onyay ethay ackestblay ightsnay otay illagepay andyay aughterslay ethay urfacesay wellersday eythay espiseday. 
 Eirthay ocietysay isyay epravedday andyay eoccupiedpray withyay ethay avorfay ofyay  Olthlay, eirthay ider-goddessspay, whoyay anctionssay urdermay andyay ethay exterminationyay ofyay entireyay amiliesfay asyay oblenay ouseshay ievay orfay ositionpay. Yetyay oneyay owdray, atyay eastlay, okebray ethay oldmay. 
 Inyay ethay worldyay ofyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray,  Izztdray  Oday' Urdenyay, angerray ofyay ethay  Orthnay, ashay ovenpray ishay qualityyay asyay ayay ood-heartedgay efenderday ofyay ethay weakyay andyay innocentyay. 
 Ejectingray ishay eritagehay andyay adriftyay inyay ayay worldyay atthay ookslay uponyay imhay withyay errortay andyay oathinglay,  Izztdray isyay ayay odelmay orfay osethay ewfay owdray whoyay ollowfay inyay ishay ootstepsfay, yingtray otay indfay ayay ifelay apartyay omfray ethay evilyay ocietysay ofyay eirthay  Underdarkyay omeshay. Owdray owgray upyay elievingbay atthay urface-dwellingsay acesray areyay inferioryay, worthlessyay exceptyay asyay avesslay. 
 Owdray whoyay evelopday ayay onsciencecay oryay indfay ityay ecessarynay otay ooperatecay withyay embersmay ofyay otheryay acesray indfay ityay ardhay otay overcomeyay atthay ejudicepray, especiallyyay whenyay eythay areyay osay oftenyay onyay ethay eceivingray endyay ofyay atredhay. Arkday  Elfyay ( Owdray) Escendedday omfray anyay earlieryay ubracesay ofyay ark-skinnedday elvesyay, ethay owdray wereyay anishedbay omfray ethay urfacesay worldyay orfay ollowingfay ethay oddessgay  Olthlay ownday ethay athpay otay evilyay andyay orruptioncay. 
 Ownay eythay avehay uiltbay eirthay ownyay ivilizationcay inyay ethay epthsday ofyay ethay  Underdarkyay, atternedpay afteryay ethay  Wayyay ofyay  Olthlay. 
 Alsoyay alledcay arkday elvesyay, ethay owdray avehay ackblay inskay atthay esemblesray olishedpay obsidianyay andyay arkstay whiteyay oryay alepay yellowyay airhay. 
 Eythay ommonlycay avehay eryvay alepay eyesyay (osay alepay asyay otay ebay istakenmay orfay whiteyay) inyay adesshay ofyay ilaclay, ilversay, inkpay, edray, andyay ueblay. 
 Eythay endtay otay ebay allersmay andyay innerthay anthay ostmay elvesyay. Owdray adventurersyay areyay areray, andyay ethay aceray oesday otnay existyay inyay allyay worldsyay. 
 Eckchay withyay youryay  Ungeonday  Astermay otay eesay ifyay youyay ancay ayplay ayay owdray aracterchay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Arismachay orescay increasesyay ybay 1. Uperiorsay  Arkvisionday. 
 Youryay arkvisionday ashay ayay adiusray ofyay 120 eetfay. Unlightsay  Ensitivitysay. 
 Youyay avehay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray andyay onyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay atthay elyray onyay ightsay whenyay youyay, ethay argettay ofyay youryay attackyay, oryay whateveryay youyay areyay yingtray otay erceivepay isyay inyay irectday unlightsay. Owdray  Agicmay. 
 Youyay owknay ethay ancingday ightslay antripcay. 
 Whenyay youyay eachray 3rday evellay, youyay ancay astcay ethay aeriefay irefay ellspay onceyay erpay ayday. 
 Whenyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay, youyay ancay alsoyay astcay ethay arknessday ellspay onceyay erpay ayday. 
 Arismachay isyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay esethay ellsspay. Owdray  Weaponyay  Ainingtray. 
 Alflinghay Egisray ethay alflinghay, ethay onlyyay oneyay ofyay ishay indkay orfay undredshay ofyay ilesmay inyay anyyay irectionday, ockedlay ishay ingersfay ebay- indhay ishay eadhay andyay eanedlay ackbay againstyay ethay ossymay anketblay ofyay ethay eetray unktray. 
 Egisray wasyay ortshay, evenyay ybay ethay andardsstay ofyay ishay iminutiveday aceray, withyay ethay uffflay ofyay ishay urlycay ownbray ockslay arelybay estingcray ethay ee-footthray arkmay, utbay ishay ellybay wasyay amplyyay ickenedthay ybay ishay ovelay ofyay ayay oodgay ealmay, oryay everalsay, asyay ethay opportunitiesyay esentedpray emselvesthay. 
 Ethay ookedcray ickstay atthay ervedsay asyay ishay ishingfay olepay oseray upyay aboveyay imhay, enchedclay etweenbay wotay ofyay ishay oestay, andyay unghay outyay overyay ethay quietyay akelay, irroredmay erfectlypay inyay ethay assyglay urfacesay ofyay  Aermay  ualdon.—R.ADay. 
 Alvatoresay,  Ethay  Ystalcray  Ardlivesshay: ayay aceplay otay ettlesay inyay eacepay andyay quietyay, arfay omfray araudingmay onstersmay andyay ashingclay armiesyay; ayay azingblay irefay andyay ayay enerousgay ealmay; inefay inkdray andyay inefay onversationcay. 
 Oughthay omesay alflingshay ivelay outyay eirthay aysday inyay emoteray agriculturalyay ommunitiescay, othersyay ormfay omadicnay andsbay atthay aveltray onstantlycay, uredlay ybay ethay openyay oadray andyay ethay wideyay orizonhay otay iscoverday ethay wondersyay ofyay ewnay andslay andyay eoplespay. 
 Utbay evenyay esethay wanderersyay ovelay eacepay, oodfay, earthhay, andyay omehay, oughthay omehay ightmay ebay ayay wagonyay ostlingjay alongyay anyay irtday oadray oryay ayay aftray oatingflay ownriverday. Allsmay andyay  Acticalpray Ethay iminutiveday alflingshay urvivesay inyay ayay worldyay ullfay ofyay argerlay eaturescray ybay avoidingyay oticenay oryay, arringbay atthay, avoidingyay offenseyay. 
 Andingstay aboutyay 3 eetfay alltay, eythay appearyay elativelyray armlesshay andyay osay avehay anagedmay otay urvivesay orfay enturiescay inyay ethay adowshay ofyay empiresyay andyay onyay ethay edgesyay ofyay warsyay andyay oliticalpay ifestray. 
 Eythay areyay inclinedyay otay ebay outstay, weighingyay etweenbay 40 andyay 45 oundspay. Alflingshay’ inskay angesray omfray antay otay alepay withyay ayay uddyray astcay, andyay eirthay airhay isyay usuallyyay ownbray oryay andysay ownbray andyay wavyyay. 
 Eythay avehay ownbray oryay azelhay eyesyay. 
 Alflinghay enmay oftenyay ortspay onglay ideburnssay, utbay eardsbay areyay areray amongyay emthay andyay ustachesmay evenyay oremay osay. 
 Eythay ikelay otay wearyay implesay, omfortablecay, andyay acticalpray othesclay, avoringfay ightbray olorscay. Alflinghay acticalitypray extendsyay eyondbay eirthay othingclay. 
 Ey’rethay oncernedcay withyay asicbay eedsnay andyay implesay easuresplay andyay avehay ittlelay useyay orfay ostentationyay. 
 Evenyay ethay wealthiestyay ofyay alflingshay eepkay eirthay easurestray ockedlay inyay ayay ellarcay atherray anthay onyay isplayday orfay allyay otay eesay. 
 Eythay avehay ayay ackknay orfay indingfay ethay ostmay aightforwardstray olutionsay otay ayay oblempray, andyay avehay ittlelay atiencepay orfay itheringday. Indkay andyay  Uriouscay Alflingshay areyay anyay affableyay andyay eerfulchay eoplepay. 
 Eythay erishchay ethay ondsbay ofyay amilyfay andyay iendshipfray asyay wellyay asyay ethay omfortscay ofyay earthhay andyay omehay, arboringhay ewfay eamsdray ofyay oldgay oryay oryglay. 
 Affableyay andyay  Ositivecommunitypay, iendshipfray, wanderlustyay, oryay uriositycay. 
 Eythay ovelay iscoveringday ewnay ingsthay, evenyay implesay ingsthay, uchsay asyay anyay exoticyay oodfay oryay anyay unfamiliaryay ylestay ofyay othingclay. Alflingshay areyay easilyyay ovedmay otay itypay andyay atehay otay eesay anyyay ivinglay ingthay uffersay. 
 Eythay areyay enerousgay, appilyhay aringshay whatyay eythay avehay evenyay inyay eanlay imestay. Endblay intoyay ethay  Owdcray  Alflingshay areyay adeptyay atyay ittingfay intoyay ayay ommunitycay ofyay umanshay, warvesday, oryay elvesyay, akingmay emselvesthay aluablevay andyay welcomeyay. 
 Ethay ombinationcay ofyay eirthay inherentyay ealthstay andyay eirthay unassumingyay aturenay elpshay alflingshay otay avoidyay unwantedyay attentionyay. Alflingshay workyay eadilyray withyay othersyay, andyay eythay areyay oyallay otay eirthay iendsfray, whetheryay alflinghay oryay otherwiseyay. 
 Eythay ancay isplayday emarkableray erocityfay whenyay eirthay iendsfray, amiliesfay, oryay ommunitiescay areyay eatenedthray. Astoralpay  Easantriesplay Ostmay alflingshay ivelay inyay allsmay, eacefulpay ommunitiescay withyay argelay armsfay andyay well-keptyay ovesgray. 
 Eythay arelyray uildbay ingdomskay ofyay eirthay ownyay oryay evenyay oldhay uchmay andlay eyondbay eirthay quietyay iresshay. 
 Eythay ypicallytay on’tday ecognizeray anyyay ortsay ofyay alflinghay obilitynay oryay oyaltyray, insteadyay ookinglay otay amilyfay eldersyay otay uidegay emthay. 
 Amiliesfay eservepray eirthay aditionaltray waysyay espiteday ethay iseray andyay allfay ofyay empiresyay. Anymay alflingshay ivelay amongyay otheryay acesray, whereyay ethay alflingshay’ ardhay workyay andyay oyallay outlookyay offeryay emthay abundantyay ewardsray andyay eaturecray omfortscay. 
 Omesay alflinghay ommunitiescay aveltray asyay ayay wayyay ofyay ifelay, ivingdray wagonsyay oryay uidinggay oatsbay omfray aceplay otay aceplay andyay aintainingmay onay ermanentpay omehay. Alflingshay ytray otay etgay alongyay withyay everyoneyay elseyay andyay areyay oathlay otay akemay weepingsay eneralizations—especiallygay egativenay onesyay. Warvesday. 
“ Warvesday akemay oyallay iendsfray, andyay youyay ancay ountcay onyay emthay otay eepkay eirthay wordyay. 
 Utbay wouldyay ityay urthay emthay otay ilesmay onceyay inyay ayay whileyay?”  Elvesyay. 
" Ey’rethay osay eautifulbay!  Eirthay acesfay, eirthay usicmay, eirthay acegray andyay allyay. 
 It’syay ikelay eythay eppedstay outyay ofyay ayay wonderfulyay eamdray. 
 Utbay ere’sthay onay ellingtay what’syay oinggay onyay ehindbay eirthay ilingsmay aces—surelyfay oremay anthay eythay everyay etlay onyay.” Umanshay. 
“ Umanshay areyay ayay otlay ikelay usyay, eallyray. 
 Atyay eastlay omesay ofyay emthay areyay. 
 Epstay outyay ofyay ethay astlescay andyay eepskay, ogay alktay otay ethay armersfay andyay erdershay andyay you’llyay indfay oodgay, olidsay olkfay. 
 Otnay atthay ere’sthay anythingyay wrongyay withyay ethay aronsbay andyay oldiers—yousay avehay otay admireyay eirthay onvictioncay. 
 Andyay ybay otectingpray eirthay ownyay andslay, eythay otectpray usyay asyay wellyay.” Exploringyay  Opportunitiesyay Alflingshay usuallyyay etsay outyay onyay ethay adventurer’syay athpay otay efendday eirthay ommunitiescay, upportsay eirthay iendsfray, oryay exploreyay ayay wideyay andyay wonder-filledyay worldyay. 
 Orfay emthay, adventuringyay isyay esslay ayay areercay anthay anyay opportunityyay oryay ometimessay ayay ecessitynay. Alflinghay  Amesnay Ayay alflinghay ashay ayay ivengay amenay, ayay amilyfay amenay, andyay ossiblypay ayay icknamenay. 
 Anguageslay. 
 Youyay ancay eakspay, eadray, andyay writeyay  Ommoncay andyay  Alflinghay. 
 Ethay  Alflinghay anguagelay isn’tyay ecretsay, utbay alflingshay areyay oathlay otay areshay ityay withyay othersyay. 
 Eythay writeyay eryvay ittlelay, osay eythay on’tday avehay ayay ichray odybay ofyay iteraturelay. 
 Eirthay oralyay aditiontray, oweverhay, isyay eryvay ongstray. 
 Almostyay allyay alflingshay eakspay  Ommoncay otay onversecay withyay ethay eoplepay inyay whoseyay andslay eythay wellday oryay oughthray whichyay eythay areyay avelingtray. Ubracesay. 
 Ethay wotay ainmay indskay ofyay alflinghay, ightfootlay andyay outstay, areyay oremay ikelay oselyclay elatedray amiliesfay anthay uetray ubracessay. 
 Oosechay oneyay ofyay esethay ubracessay. Ightfootlay Asyay ayay ightfootlay alflinghay, youyay ancay easilyyay idehay omfray oticenay, evenyay usingyay otheryay eoplepay asyay overcay. 
 You’reyay inclinedyay otay ebay affableyay andyay etgay alongyay wellyay withyay othersyay. 
 Inyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray, ightfootlay alflingshay avehay eadspray ethay arthestfay andyay usthay areyay ethay ostmay ommoncay arietyvay. Ightfootslay areyay oremay onepray otay wanderlustyay anthay otheryay alflingshay, andyay oftenyay wellday alongsideyay otheryay acesray oryay aketay upyay ayay omadicnay ifelay. 
 Inyay ethay worldyay ofyay  Eyhawkgray, esethay alflingshay areyay alledcay airfeethay oryay allfellowstay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Arismachay orescay increasesyay ybay 1. Aturallynay  Ealthystay. 
 Youyay ancay attemptyay otay idehay evenyay whenyay youyay areyay obscuredyay onlyyay ybay ayay eaturecray atthay isyay atyay eastlay oneyay izesay argerlay anthay youyay. Outstay Asyay ayay outstay alflinghay, you’reyay ardierhay anthay averageyay andyay avehay omesay esistanceray otay oisonpay. 
 Omesay aysay atthay outsstay avehay warvenday oodblay. 
 Inyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray, esethay alflingshay areyay alledcay ongheartsstray, andyay ey’rethay ostmay ommoncay inyay ethay outhsay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Onstitutioncay orescay increasesyay ybay 1. Outstay  Esilienceray. 
 Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay oisonpay, andyay youyay avehay esistanceray againstyay oisonpay amageday. Alflinghay  Aitstray Youryay alflinghay aracterchay ashay ayay umbernay ofyay aitstray inyay ommoncay withyay allyay otheryay alflingshay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Exterityday orescay increasesyay ybay 2. Ageyay. 
Ayay alflinghay eachesray adulthoodyay atyay ethay ageyay ofyay 20 andyay enerallygay iveslay intoyay ethay iddlemay ofyay ishay oryay erhay econdsay enturycay. Alignmentyay. 
 Ostmay alflingshay areyay awfullay oodgay. 
 Asyay ayay uleray, eythay areyay ood-heartedgay andyay indkay, atehay otay eesay othersyay inyay ainpay, andyay avehay onay olerancetay orfay oppressionyay. 
 Eythay areyay alsoyay eryvay orderlyyay andyay aditionaltray, eaninglay eavilyhay onyay ethay upportsay ofyay eirthay ommunitycay andyay ethay omfortcay ofyay eirthay oldyay waysyay. Izesay. 
 Alflingshay averageyay aboutyay 3 eetfay alltay andyay weighyay aboutyay 40 oundspay. 
 Youryay izesay isyay  Allsmay. Eedspay. 
 Youryay asebay walkingyay eedspay isyay 25 eetfay. Uckylay. 
 Whenyay youyay ollray ayay 1 onyay anyay attackyay ollray, abilityyay eckchay, oryay avingsay owthray, youyay ancay erollray ethay ieday andyay ustmay useyay ethay ewnay ollray. Avebray. 
 Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay eingbay ightenedfray. Alflinghay  Imblenessnay. 
 Umanhay Esethay wereyay ethay oriesstay ofyay ayay estlessray eoplepay whoyay onglay agoyay ooktay otay ethay eassay andyay iversray inyay ongboatslay, irstfay otay illagepay andyay errorizetay, enthay otay ettlesay. 
 Yetyay erethay wasyay anyay energyyay, ayay ovelay ofyay adventureyay, atthay angsay omfray everyyay agepay. 
 Onglay intoyay ethay ightnay  Urielyay eadray, ightinglay andlecay afteryay eciouspray andlecay. E'dshay evernay ivengay uchmay oughtthay otay umanshay, utbay esethay oriesstay ascinatedfay erhay. 
 Inyay esethay yellowedyay agespay wereyay alestay ofyay oldbay eroeshay, angestray andyay iercefay animalsyay, ightymay imitivepray odsgay, andyay ayay agicmay atthay wasyay artpay andyay abricfay ofyay atthay istantday andlay.— Elaineyay  Unninghamcay,  Aughterday ofyay ethay  Owdray Inyay ethay eckoningsray ofyay ostmay worldsyay, umanshay areyay ethay youngestyay ofyay ethay ommoncay acesray, atelay otay arriveyay onyay ethay worldyay enescay andyay ort-livedshay inyay omparisoncay otay warvesday, elvesyay, andyay agonsdray. 
 Erhapspay ityay isyay ecausebay ofyay eirthay ortershay iveslay atthay eythay ivestray otay achieveyay asyay uchmay asyay eythay ancay inyay ethay yearsyay eythay areyay ivengay. 
 Oryay aybemay eythay eelfay eythay avehay omethingsay otay ovepray otay ethay elderyay acesray, andyay at’sthay whyyay eythay uildbay eirthay ightymay empiresyay onyay ethay oundationfay ofyay onquestcay andyay adetray. 
 Whateveryay ivesdray emthay, umanshay areyay ethay innovatorsyay, ethay achieversyay, andyay ethay ioneerspay ofyay ethay worlds.Ayay  Oadbray  Ectrumspay Withyay eirthay enchantpay orfay igrationmay andyay onquestcay, umanshay areyay oremay ysicallyphay iverseday anthay otheryay ommoncay acesray. 
 Erethay isyay onay ypicaltay umanhay. 
 Anyay individualyay ancay andstay omfray 5 eetfay otay ayay ittlelay overyay 6 eetfay alltay andyay weighyay omfray 125 otay 250 oundspay. 
 Umanhay inskay adesshay angeray omfray earlynay ackblay otay eryvay alepay, andyay airhay olorscay omfray ackblay otay ondblay (urlycay, inkykay, oryay aightstray); alesmay ightmay ortspay acialfay airhay atthay isyay arsespay oryay ickthay. 
Ayay otlay ofyay umanshay avehay ayay ashday ofyay onhumannay oodblay, evealingray intshay ofyay elfyay, orcyay, oryay otheryay ineageslay. 
 Umanshay eachray adulthoodyay inyay eirthay atelay eenstay andyay arelyray ivelay evenyay ayay inglesay enturycay. Arietyvay inyay  Allyay  Ingsthay Umanshay areyay ethay ostmay adaptableyay andyay ambitiousyay eoplepay amongyay ethay ommoncay acesray. 
 Eythay avehay widelyyay aryingvay astestay, oralsmay, andyay ustomscay inyay ethay anymay ifferentday andslay whereyay eythay avehay ettledsay. 
 Whenyay eythay ettlesay, oughthay, eythay aystay: eythay uildbay itiescay otay astlay orfay ethay agesyay, andyay eatgray ingdomskay atthay ancay ersistpay orfay onglay enturiescay. 
 Anyay individualyay umanhay ightmay avehay ayay elativelyray ortshay ifelay anspay, utbay ayay umanhay ationnay oryay ulturecay eservespray aditionstray withyay originsyay arfay eyondbay ethay eachray ofyay anyyay inglesay uman’shay emorymay. 
 Eythay ivelay ullyfay inyay ethay esent—makingpray emthay wellyay uitedsay otay ethay adventuringyay ife—butlay alsoyay anplay orfay ethay uturefay, ivingstray otay eavelay ayay astinglay egacylay. 
 Everyone’syay  Econdsay- Estbay  Iendsfray Ustjay asyay eadilyray asyay eythay ixmay withyay eachyay otheryay, umanshay inglemay withyay embersmay ofyay otheryay acesray. 
 Eythay etgay alongyay withyay almostyay everyoneyay, oughthay eythay ightmay otnay ebay oseclay otay anymay. 
 Umanshay ervesay asyay ambassadorsyay, iplomatsday, agistratesmay, erchantsmay, andyay unctionariesfay ofyay allyay indskay. Warvesday. 
“ Ey’rethay outstay olkfay, alwartstay iendsfray, andyay uetray otay eirthay wordyay. 
 Eirthay eedgray orfay oldgay isyay eirthay ownfallday, oughthay.” Elvesyay. 
“ It’syay estbay otnay otay wanderyay intoyay elvenyay woodsyay. 
 Eythay on'tday ikelay intrudersyay, andyay you’llyay asyay ikelylay ebay ewitchedbay asyay epperedpay withyay arrowsyay. 
 Illstay, ifyay anyay elfyay ancay etgay astpay atthay amnedday acialray idepray andyay actuallyyay eattray youyay ikelay anyay equalyay, youyay ancay earnlay ayay otlay omfray emthay.” Alflingshay. 
" It’syay ardhay otay eatbay ayay ealmay inyay ayay alflinghay omehay, asyay onglay asyay youyay on’tday ackcray youryay eadhay onyay ethay eiling—goodcay oodfay andyay oodgay oriesstay inyay ontfray ofyay ayay icenay, warmyay irefay. 
 Ifyay alflingshay adhay ayay edshray ofyay ambitionyay, eythay ightmay eallyray amountyay otay omethingsay.” Astinglay  Institutionsyay Whereyay ayay inglesay elfyay oryay warfday ightmay aketay onyay ethay esponsibilityray ofyay uardinggay ayay ecialspay ocationlay oryay ayay owerfulpay ecretsay, umanshay oundfay acredsay ordersyay andyay institutionsyay orfay uchsay urposespay. 
 Whileyay warfday ansclay andyay alflinghay eldersyay asspay onyay ethay ancientyay aditionstray otay eachyay ewnay enerationgay, umanhay emplestay, overnmentsgay, ibrarieslay, andyay odescay ofyay awlay ixfay eirthay aditionstray inyay ethay edrockbay ofyay istoryhay. 
 Umanshay eamdray ofyay immortalityyay, utbay (exceptyay orfay osethay ewfay whoyay eeksay undeathyay oryay ivineday ascensionyay otay escapeyay eath’sday utchesclay) eythay achieveyay ityay ybay ensuringyay atthay eythay willyay ebay ememberedray whenyay eythay areyay onegay. Althoughyay omesay umanshay ancay ebay enophobicxay, inyay eneralgay eirthay ocietiessay areyay inclusiveyay. 
 Umanhay andslay welcomeyay argelay umbersnay ofyay onhumansnay omparedcay otay ethay oportionpray ofyay umanshay whoyay ivelay inyay onhumannay andslay. Exemplarsyay ofyay  Ambitionyay Umanshay whoyay eeksay adventureyay areyay ethay ostmay aringday andyay ambitiousyay embersmay ofyay ayay aringday andyay ambitiousyay aceray. Eythay eeksay otay earnyay oryglay inyay ethay eyesyay ofyay eirthay ellowsfay ybay amassingyay owerpay, wealthyay, andyay amefay. 
 Oremay anthay otheryay eoplepay, umanshay ampionchay ausescay atherray anthay erritoriestay oryay oupsgray. Umanhay  Amesnay andyay  Ethnicitiesyay Avinghay osay uchmay oremay arietyvay anthay otheryay ulturescay, umanshay asyay ayay wholeyay avehay onay ypicaltay amesnay. 
 Omesay umanhay Alishitecay Ortershay andyay ighterslay inyay uildbay anthay ostmay otheryay umanshay,  Alishitescay avehay uskyday ownbray inskay, airhay, andyay eyesyay. 
 Ey’rethay oundfay imarilypray inyay outhwestsay  Aerunfay. Alishitecay  Amesnay: ( Alemay)  Aseiryay,  Ardeidbay,  Aseidhay,  Emedkhay,  Ehmenmay,  Udeimansay,  Asheirzay; (emalefay) Atalayay,  Eidilcay,  Amahay,  Asmaljay,  Eililmay,  Eiporasay,  Yasheirayay,  Asheidazay; (urnamessay)  Ashabay,  Umeinday,  Assanjay,  Alidkhay,  Ostanamay,  Asharpay,  Einray Ondathanchay Ondathanschay areyay enderslay, awny-skinnedtay olkfay withyay ownbray airhay atthay angesray omfray almostyay ondblay otay almostyay ackblay. 
 Ostmay areyay alltay andyay avehay eengray oryay ownbray eyesyay, utbay esethay aitstray areyay ardlyhay universalyay. 
 Umanshay ofyay  Ondathanchay escentday ominateday ethay entralcay andslay ofyay  Aerunfay. 
aroundyay ethay  Inneryay  Ea.parentssay ivegay eirthay ildrenchay amesnay omfray otheryay anguageslay, uchsay asyay  Warvishday oryay  Elvishyay (onouncedpray oremay oryay esslay orrectlycay), utbay ostmay arentspay ivegay amesnay atthay areyay inkedlay otay eirthay egion’sray ulturecay oryay otay ethay amingnay aditionstray ofyay eirthay ancestorsyay. Ethay aterialmay ulturecay andyay ysicalphay aracteristicschay ofyay umanshay ancay angechay wildlyyay omfray egionray otay egionray. Inyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray, orfay exampleyay, ethay othingclay, architectureyay, uisinecay, usicmay, andyay iteraturelay areyay ifferentday inyay ethay orthwesternnay andslay ofyay ethay  Ilversay  Archesmay anthay inyay istantday  Urmishtay oryay  Impilturyay otay ethay east—andyay evenyay oremay istinctiveday inyay ar-offfay  Arakay- Urtay. 
 Umanhay ysicalphay aracteristicschay, oughthay, aryvay accordingyay otay ethay ancientyay igrationsmay ofyay ethay earliestyay umanshay, osay atthay ethay umanshay ofyay ethay  Ilversay  Archesmay avehay everyyay ossiblepay ariationvay ofyay olorationcay andyay eaturesfay. Inyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray, inenay umanhay ethnicyay oupsgray areyay widelyyay ecognizedray, oughthay overyay ayay ozenday othersyay areyay oundfay inyay oremay ocalizedlay areasyay ofyay  Aerunfay. 
 Ondathanchay  Amesnay: ( Alemay)  Arvinday,  Ornday,  Evenduryay,  Orstaggay,  Imgray,  Elmhay,  Alarkmay,  Ornmay,  Andalray, Eddstay; (emalefay)  Arveeneyay,  Esveleyay,  Essailjhay,  Errikay,  Ureenelay,  Irimay,  Owanray,  Andrishay,  Esseletay; (urnamessay)  Amblecrownyay,  Uckmanbay,  Undragonday,  Evenwoodyay,  Eycastlegray,  Allstagtay Amaranday Oundfay imarilypray inyay ethay orthwestnay ofyay  Aerunfay,  Amaransday areyay ofyay oderatemay eighthay andyay uildbay, withyay inskay ueshay angingray omfray awnytay otay airfay. 
 Eirthay airhay isyay usuallyyay ownbray oryay ackblay, andyay eirthay eyeyay olorcay ariesvay widelyyay, oughthay ownbray isyay ostmay ommoncay. Amaranday  Amesnay: ( Alemay)  Orbay,  Odelfay,  Arglay,  Igorgray, Iganyay,  Ivoryay,  Osefkay,  Ivalmay,  Orelyay,  Avelpay,  Ergorsay; (emalefay)  Alethrayay,  Arakay,  Aterninkay,  Aramay,  Atalinay,  Olmayay,  Anatay,  Orazay; (urnamessay)  Erskbay,  Erninchay,  Otskday,  Ulenovkay,  Arskmay,  Emetsknay,  Emovshay,  Aragstay Illuskanyay Illuskansyay areyay alltay, air-skinnedfay olkfay withyay ueblay oryay eelystay aygray eyesyay. 
 Ostmay avehay aven-blackray airhay, utbay osethay whoyay inhabityay ethay extremeyay orthwestnay avehay ondblay, edray, oryay ightlay ownbray airhay. Illuskanyay  Amesnay: ( Alemay)  Anderyay,  Athblay,  Anbray,  Athfray, Ethgay,  Anderlay,  Uthlay,  Alcermay,  Orstay,  Amantay,  Urthyay; (emalefay)  Amafreyyay,  Ethabay,  Efreycay,  Ethrakay,  Aramay,  Olgayay,  Ilifreysay,  Westrayay; (urnamessay)  Ightwoodbray,  Elderhay,  Ornravenhay,  Ackmanlay,  Ormwindstay,  Windrivveryay Ulanmay Ominantday inyay ethay easternyay andyay outheasternsay oresshay ofyay ethay  Inneryay  Easay, ethay  Ulanmay areyay enerallygay alltay, imslay, andyay amber-skinnedyay, withyay eyesyay ofyay azelhay oryay ownbray. 
 Eirthay airhay angesray omfray ackblay otay arkday ownbray, utbay inyay ethay andslay whereyay ethay  Ulanmay areyay ostmay ominentpray, oblesnay andyay anymay otheryay  Ulanmay aveshay offyay allyay eirthay airhay. Ulanmay  Amesnay: ( Alemay)  Aothyay,  Arerisbay,  Ehputyay- Ikay, Ethothkay,  Umedmay,  Amasray,  Osay- Ehurkay,  Azarthay- Eday,  Urhuryay; (emalefay)  Arizimayay,  Athichay,  Ephisnay,  Ularanay,  Urithimay,  Efrissay,  Olathay,  Umarayay,  Oliszay; (urnamessay)  Ankhalabyay,  Anskuldyay,  Ezimfay,  Ahpethay,  Athandemnay,  Epretsay,  Uuthraktyay Ashemiray Ostmay oftenyay oundfay eastyay ofyay ethay  Inneryay  Easay andyay oftenyay intermingledyay withyay ethay  Ulanmay,  Ashemisray endtay otay ebay ortshay, outstay, andyay uscularmay. 
 Eythay usuallyyay avehay uskyday inskay, arkday eyesyay, andyay ickthay ackblay airhay. Ashemiray  Amesnay: ( Alemay)  Orivikbay,  Aurgarfay,  Andarjay,  Anitharkay,  Adislakmay,  Almevikray,  Aumarshay,  Adislakvlay; (emalefay)  Yevarrafay,  Ulmarrahay,  Immithyay,  Imzelyay, Avarranay,  Evarrashay,  Ammithtay. 
 Yuldrayay; (urnamessay)  Ergobachay,  Yerninaday,  Iltazyarayay,  Urnyetharamay,  Ayanogastay,  Ulmokinayay Oushay Ethay  Oushay areyay ethay ostmay umerousnay andyay owerfulpay ethnicyay oupgray inyay  Arakay- Urtay, arfay otay ethay eastyay ofyay  Aerunfay. 
 Eythay areyay yellowish-bronzeyay inyay uehay, withyay ackblay airhay andyay arkday eyesyay. 
 Oushay urnamessay areyay usuallyyay esentedpray eforebay ethay ivengay amenay. Oushay  Amesnay: ( Alemay)  Anyay,  Enchay,  Ichay,  Aifay,  Iangjay,  Unjay, Ianlay,  Onglay,  Engmay,  Onyay,  Anshay,  Uishay,  Wenyay; (emalefay) Aibay,  Aochay,  Iajay,  Eilay,  Eimay,  Qiaoyay,  Uishay,  Aitay; (urnamessay)  Ienchay,  Uanghay,  Aokay,  Ungkay,  Aolay,  Inglay,  Eimay,  Inpay,  Inshay,  Umsay,  Antay,  Wanyay Ethyriantay Widespreadyay alongyay ethay entireyay  Wordsay  Oastcay atyay ethay westernyay edgeyay ofyay  Aerunfay,  Ethyrianstay areyay ofyay ediummay uildbay andyay eighthay, withyay uskyday inskay atthay endstay otay owgray airerfay ethay artherfay orthnay eythay wellday. 
 Eirthay airhay andyay eyeyay olorcay ariesvay widelyyay, utbay ownbray airhay andyay ueblay eyesyay areyay ethay ostmay ommoncay. 
 Ethyrianstay imarilypray useyay  Ondathanchay amesnay. Uramitay Ativenay otay ethay outhernsay oreshay ofyay ethay  Inneryay  Easay, ethay  Uramitay eoplepay areyay enerallygay alltay andyay uscularmay, withyay arkday ahoganymay inskay, urlycay ackblay airhay, andyay arkday eyesyay. Uramitay  Amesnay: ( Alemay)  Antonyay,  Ieroday,  Arconmay,  Ieronpay,  Imardoray,  Omeroray,  Alazarsay,  Umberoyay; (emalefay)  Alamabay,  Onaday,  Ailafay,  Alanajay,  Uisalay,  Artamay,  Quarayay,  Elisesay,  Ondavay; (urnamessay)  Agostoyay,  Astorioyay,  Alabracay,  Omineday,  Alonefay,  Arivaldimay,  Isacarpay,  Amondoray Umanhay  Aitstray It’syay ardhay otay akemay eneralizationsgay aboutyay umanshay, utbay youryay umanhay aracterchay ashay esethay aitstray. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay abilityyay oresscay eachyay increaseyay ybay 1. Ageyay. 
 Umanshay eachray adulthoodyay inyay eirthay atelay eenstay andyay ivelay esslay anthay ayay enturycay. Alignmentyay. 
 Umanshay endtay owardtay onay articularpay alignmentyay. 
 Ethay estbay andyay ethay worstyay areyay oundfay amongyay emthay. Izesay. 
 Umanshay aryvay widelyyay inyay eighthay andyay uildbay, omfray arelybay 5 eetfay otay wellyay overyay 6 eetfay alltay. 
 Egardlessray ofyay youryay ositionpay inyay atthay angeray, youryay izesay isyay  Ediummay. Eedspay. 
 Youryay asebay walkingyay eedspay isyay 30 eetfay. 
 Anguageslay. 
 Youyay ancay eakspay, eadray, andyay writeyay  Ommoncay andyay oneyay extrayay anguagelay ofyay youryay oicechay. 
 Umanshay ypicallytay earnlay ethay anguageslay ofyay otheryay eoplespay eythay ealday withyay, includingyay obscureyay ialectsday. 
 Agonborndray Erhay atherfay oodstay onyay ethay irstfay ofyay ethay eethray airsstay atthay edlay ownday omfray ethay ortalpay, unmovingyay. 
 Ethay alesscay ofyay ishay acefay adhay owngray alerpay aroundyay ethay edgesyay, utbay  Anlessclay  Ehenmay illstay ookedlay asyay ifyay ehay ouldcay wrestleyay ownday ayay ireday earbay imhay- elfsay. 
 Ishay amiliarfay well-wornyay armoryay wasyay onegay, eplacedray ybay iolet-tintedvay alescay armoryay withyay ightbray ilverysay acingstray. 
 Erethay wasyay ayay azonblay onyay ishay armyay asyay wellyay, ethay arkmay ofyay omesay oreignfay ousehay. 
 Ethay wordsay atyay ishay ackbay wasyay ethay amesay, oughthay, ethay oneyay ehay adhay arriedcay incesay evenyay eforebay ehay adhay oundfay ethay winstay eftlay inyay waddlingsay atyay ethay atesgay ofyay  Arushyay  Ayem.father’svay acefay wasyay ayay illskay e'dshay eenbay ortunatefay otay earnlay. 
Ayay umanhay whoyay ouldn’tcay otspay ethay iftshay ofyay erhay eyesyay oryay  Avilar’shay wouldyay ertainlycay eesay onlyyay ethay indifferenceyay ofyay ayay agondray inyay  Anlessclay  Ehen’smay acefay. 
 Utbay ethay iftshay ofyay alesscay, ethay archyay ofyay ayay idgeray, ethay etsay ofyay ishay eyesyay, ethay apegay ofyay ishay eeth—hertay ather'sfay acefay okespay olumesvay. Utbay everyyay alescay ofyay ityay, isthay imetay, eemedsay ompletelycay illstay— ethay indifferenceyay ofyay ayay agondray, evenyay otay  Aridehfay.— Erinyay May. 
 Evansyay,  Ethay  Adversaryyay Ornbay ofyay agonsdray, asyay eirthay amenay oclaimspray, ethay agonborndray walkyay oudlypray oughthray ayay worldyay atthay eetsgray emthay withyay earfulfay incomprehensionyay. 
 Apedshay ybay aconicdray odsgay oryay ethay agonsdray emselvesthay, agonborndray originallyyay atchedhay omfray agondray eggsyay asyay ayay uniqueyay aceray, ombiningcay ethay estbay attributesyay ofyay agonsdray andyay umanoidshay. 
 Omesay agonborndray areyay aithfulfay ervantssay otay uetray agonsdray, othersyay ormfay ethay anksray ofyay oldierssay inyay eatgray warsyay, andyay illstay othersyay indfay emselvesthay adriftyay, withyay onay earclay allingcay inyay ifelay. Oudpray  Agondray  Inkay Agonborndray ooklay eryvay uchmay ikelay agonsdray andingstay erectyay inyay umanoidhay ormfay, oughthay eythay acklay wingsyay oryay ayay ailtay. 
 Ethay irstfay agonborndray adhay alesscay ofyay ibrantvay ueshay atchingmay ethay olorscay ofyay eirthay agondray inkay, utbay enerationsgay ofyay interbreedingyay avehay eatedcray ayay oremay uniformyay appearanceyay. 
 Eirthay allsmay, inefay alesscay areyay usuallyyay assbray oryay onzebray inyay olorcay, ometimessay angingray otay arletscay, ustray, oldgay, oryay opper-greencay. 
 Eythay areyay alltay andyay onglystray uiltbay, oftenyay andingstay oseclay otay 6 1/2 eetfay alltay andyay weighingyay 300 oundspay oryay oremay. 
 Eirthay andshay andyay eetfay areyay ongstray, alonliketay awsclay withyay eethray ingersfay andyay ayay umbthay onyay eachyay andhay. Ethay oodblay ofyay ayay articularpay ypetay ofyay agondray unsray eryvay ongstray oughthray omesay agonborndray ansclay. 
 Elfsay- Ufficientsay  Ansclay Otay anyyay agonborndray, ethay anclay isyay oremay importantyay anthay ifelay itselfyay. 
 Agonborndray oweyay eirthay evotionday andyay espectray otay eirthay anclay aboveyay allyay elseyay, evenyay ethay odsgay. 
 Eachyay agonborn’sdray onductcay eflectsray onyay ethay onorhay ofyay ishay oryay erhay anclay, andyay ingingbray ishonorday otay ethay anclay ancay esultray inyay expulsionyay andyay exileyay. 
 Eachyay agonborndray owsknay ishay oryay erhay ationstay andyay utiesday withinyay ethay anclay, andyay onorhay emandsday aintainingmay ethay oundsbay ofyay atthay osition.Apay ontinualcay ivedray orfay elf-improvementsay eflectsray ethay elf-sufficiencysay ofyay ethay aceray asyay ayay wholeyay. 
 Agonborndray aluevay illskay andyay excellenceyay inyay allyay endeavorsyay. 
 Eythay atehay otay ailfay, andyay eythay ushpay emselvesthay otay extremeyay effortsyay eforebay eythay ivegay upyay onyay omethingsay. 
Ayay agonborndray oldshay asterymay ofyay ayay articularpay illskay asyay ayay ifetimelay oalgay. 
 Embersmay ofyay otheryay acesray whoyay areshay ethay amesay ommitmentcay indfay ityay easyyay otay earnyay ethay espectray ofyay ayay agonborndray. Oughthay allyay agonborndray ivestray otay ebay elf-sufficientsay, eythay ecognizeray atthay elphay isyay ometimessay eedednay inyay ifficultday ituationssay. 
 Utbay ethay estbay ourcesay orfay uchsay elphay isyay ethay anclay, andyay whenyay ayay anclay eedsnay elphay, ityay urnstay otay anotheryay agonborndray anclay eforebay eekingsay aidyay omfray otheryay acesray— oryay evenyay omfray ethay odsgay. Agonborndray  Amesnay Agonborndray avehay ersonalpay amesnay ivengay atyay irthbay, utbay eythay utpay eirthay anclay amesnay irstfay asyay ayay arkmay ofyay onorhay. 
Ayay ildhoodchay amenay oryay icknamenay isyay oftenyay usedyay amongyay utchmatesclay asyay ayay escriptiveday ermtay oryay ayay ermtay ofyay endearmentyay. 
 Ethay amenay ightmay ecallray anyay eventyay oryay entercay onyay ayay abithay. Alemay  Amesnay:  Arjhanyay,  Alasarbay,  Arashbhay,  Onaarday,  Eshghay. 
 Eskanhay,  Ivkray,  Edrashmay,  Ehenmay,  Adarrnay,  Andjedpay,  Atrinpay,  Ogarrhay,  Amashshay,  Edinnshay,  Arhuntay,  Orinntay  Emalefay  Amesnay:  Akrayay,  Iribay,  Aarday,  Aridehfay,  Arannhay,  Avilarflay,  Erijhay,  Avakay,  Orinnkay,  Ishannmay,  Alanay,  Errapay,  Aiannray,  Orasay,  Urinasay,  Avathay,  Uadjityay Uncommonyay  Acesray Ethay agonborndray andyay ethay estray ofyay ethay acesray inyay isthay apterchay areyay uncommonyay. 
 Eythay on’tday existyay inyay everyyay worldyay ofyay DDDay, andyay evenyay whereyay eythay areyay oundfay, eythay areyay esslay widespreadyay anthay warvesday, elvesyay, alflingshay, andyay umanshay. Inyay ethay osmopolitancay itiescay ofyay ethay DDDay ultiversemay, ostmay eoplepay ardlyhay ooklay wicetay atyay embersmay ofyay evenyay ethay ostmay exoticyay acesray. 
 Utbay ethay allsmay ownstay andyay illagesvay atthay otday ethay ountrysidecay areyay ifferentday. 
 Ethay ommoncay olkfay aren’tyay accustomedyay otay eeingsay embersmay ofyay esethay acesray, andyay eythay eactray accordinglyyay. Agonborndray. 
 It’syay easyyay otay assumeyay atthay ayay agonborndray isyay ayay onstermay, especiallyyay ifyay ishay oryay erhay alesscay etraybay ayay omaticchray eritagehay. 
 Unlessyay ethay agonborndray artsstay eathingbray irefay andyay ausingcay estructionday, oughthay, eoplepay areyay ikelylay otay espondray withyay autioncay atherray anthay outrightyay earfay. Omegnay. 
 Omesgnay on’tday ooklay ikelay ayay eatthray andyay ancay quicklyyay isarmday uspicionsay withyay oodgay umorhay. 
 Ethay ommoncay olkfay areyay oftenyay uriouscay aboutyay omesgnay, ikelylay evernay avinghay eensay oneyay eforebay, utbay eythay areyay arelyray ostilehay oryay earfulfay. Alfhay- Elfyay. 
 Althoughyay anymay eoplepay avehay evernay eensay ayay alf-elfhay, irtuallyvay everyoneyay owsknay eythay existyay. 
Ayay alf-elfhay anger’sstray arrivalyay isyay ollowedfay ybay ossipgay ehindbay ethay alf-elf'shay ackbay andyay olenstay ancesglay acrossyay ethay ommoncay oomray, atherray anthay anyyay onfrontationcay oryay openyay uriositycay. Alfhay- Orcyay. 
 It’syay usuallyyay afesay otay assumeyay atthay ayay alf-orchay isyay elligerentbay andyay quickyay otay angeryay, osay eoplepay watchyay emselvesthay aroundyay anyay unfamiliaryay alf-orchay. 
 Opkeepersshay ightmay urreptitiouslysay idehay aluablevay oryay agilefray oodsgay whenyay ayay alf-orchay omescay inyay, andyay eoplepay owlyslay earclay outyay ofyay ayay averntay, assumingyay ayay ightfay willyay eakbray outyay oonsay. Ieflingtay. 
 Alf-orcshay areyay eetedgray withyay ayay acticalpray autioncay, utbay ieflingstay areyay ethay ubjectsay ofyay upernaturalsay earfay. 
 Ethay evilyay ofyay eirthay eritagehay isyay ainlyplay isiblevay inyay eirthay eaturesfay, andyay asyay arfay asyay ostmay eoplepay areyay oncernedcay, ayay ieflingtay ouldcay eryvay wellyay ebay ayay evilday aightstray omfray ethay  Inenay  Ellshay. 
 Ildhoodchay  Amesnay:  Imberclay,  Earbenderyay,  Eaperlay,  Iouspay,  Ieldbitershay,  Ealouszay  Anclay  Amesnay:  Ethtinthiallorclay,  Aardendrianday,  Elmirevday,  Achedandiondray,  Enkenkabradonfay,  Epeshkmolikkay,  Errhylonkay,  Imbatuulkay,  Inxakasendalorlay,  Yastanmay,  Emmonisnay,  Orixiusnay,  Ophinshtalajiiryay,  Exijandilinpray,  Estendeliathshay,  Urnurothtay,  Erthisathurgieshvay,  Yarjerityay Agonborndray  Aitstray Youryay aconicdray eritagehay anifestsmay inyay ayay arietyvay ofyay aitstray youyay areshay withyay otheryay agonborndray. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Engthstray orescay increasesyay ybay 2, andyay youryay  Arismachay orescay increasesyay ybay 1. Ageyay. 
 Youngyay agonborndray owgray quicklyyay. 
 Eythay walkyay ourshay afteryay atchinghay, attainyay ethay izesay andyay evelopmentday ofyay ayay 10-year-oldyay umanhay ildchay ybay ethay ageyay ofyay 3, andyay eachray adulthoodyay ybay 15. 
 Eythay ivelay otay ebay aroundyay 80. Alignmentyay. 
 Agonborndray endtay otay extremesyay, akingmay ayay onsciouscay oicechay orfay oneyay idesay oryay ethay otheryay inyay ethay osmiccay waryay etweenbay oodgay andyay evilyay (epresentedray ybay  Ahamutbay andyay  Iamattay, espectivelyray). 
 Ostmay agonborndray areyay oodgay, utbay osethay whoyay idesay withyay  Iamattay ancay ebay erribletay illainsvay. Izesay. 
 Agonborndray areyay allertay andyay eavierhay anthay umanshay, andingstay wellyay overyay 6 eetfay alltay andyay averagingyay almostyay 250 oundspay. 
 Youryay izesay isyay  Ediummay. Eedspay. 
 Youryay asebay walkingyay eedspay isyay 30 eetfay. Aconicdray  Ancestryyay Agondray Amageday  Ypetay Eathbray  Weaponyay Ackblay Acidyay5 ybay 30 ftay. 
inelay ( Exday. 
avesay) Ueblay Ightninglay5 ybay 30 ftay. 
inelay ( Exday. 
avesay) Assbray Irefay5 ybay 30 ftay. 
inelay ( Exday. 
avesay) Onzebray Ightninglay5 ybay 30 ftay. 
inelay ( Exday. 
avesay) Oppercay Acidyay5 ybay 30 ftay. 
inelay ( Exday. 
avesay) Oldcay Irefay15 ftay. 
onecay ( Exday. 
avesay) Eengray Oisonpay15 ftay. 
onecay ( Oncay. 
avesay) Edray Irefay15 ftay. 
onecay ( Exday. 
avesay) Ilversay Oldcay15 ftay. 
onecay ( Oncay. 
avesay) Whiteyay Oldcay 15 ftay. 
onecay ( Oncay. 
avesay) Aconiansindray ethay  Agonlancedray ettingsay, ethay ollowersfay ofyay ethay evilyay oddessgay  Akhisistay earnedlay ayay arkday itualray atthay etlay emthay orruptcay ethay eggsyay ofyay etallicmay agonsdray, oducingpray evilyay agonborndray alledcay aconiansdray. 
 Ivefay ypestay ofyay aconiansdray, orrespondingcay otay ethay ivefay ypestay ofyay etallicmay agonsdray, oughtfay orfay  Akhisistay inyay ethay  Waryay ofyay ethay  Ancelay: auraksyay (oldgay), aazbay (assbray), ozakbay (onzebray), apakkay (oppercay), andyay ivaksay (ilversay). 
 Inyay aceplay ofyay eirthay aconicdray eathbray weaponsyay, eythay avehay uniqueyay agicalmay abilitiesyay. 
 Aconicdray  Ancestryyay. 
 Youyay avehay aconicdray ancestryyay. 
 Oosechay oneyay ypetay ofyay agondray omfray ethay  Aconicdray  Ancestryyay abletay. 
 Youryay eathbray weaponyay andyay amageday esistanceray areyay eterminedday ybay ethay agondray ypetay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay abletay. Eathbray  Weaponyay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay exhaleyay estructiveday energyyay. 
 Youryay aconicdray ancestryyay eterminesday ethay izesay, apeshay, andyay amageday ypetay ofyay ethay exhalationyay. Whenyay youyay useyay youryay eathbray weaponyay, eachyay eaturecray inyay ethay areayay ofyay ethay exhalationyay ustmay akemay ayay avingsay owthray, ethay ypetay ofyay whichyay isyay eterminedday ybay youryay aconicdray ancestryyay. 
 Ethay DCay orfay isthay avingsay owthray equalsyay 8 + youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay + youryay oficiencypray onusbay. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 2day6 amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, andyay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
 Ethay amageday increasesyay otay 3day6 atyay 6thay evellay, 4day6 atyay 11thay evellay, andyay 5day6 atyay 16thay evellay. Afteryay youyay useyay youryay eathbray weaponyay, youyay an’tcay useyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay ompletecay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Amageday  Esistanceray. 
 Youyay avehay esistanceray otay ethay amageday ypetay associatedyay withyay youryay aconicdray ancestryyay. Anguageslay. 
 Youyay ancay eakspay, eadray, andyay writeyay  Ommoncay andyay  Aconicdray. 
 Aconicdray isyay oughtthay otay ebay oneyay ofyay ethay oldestyay anguageslay andyay isyay oftenyay usedyay inyay ethay udystay ofyay agicmay. 
 Omefairgnay airhay ashay ayay endencytay otay ickstay outyay inyay everyyay irectionday, asyay ifyay expressingyay ethay ome’sgnay insatiableyay interestyay inyay everythingyay around.Ayay ome’sgnay ersonalitypay isyay writyay argelay inyay ishay oryay erhay appearanceyay. 
Ayay alemay ome’sgnay eardbay, inyay ontrastcay otay ishay wildyay airhay, isyay eptkay arefullycay immedtray utbay oftenyay yledstay intoyay uriouscay orksfay oryay eatnay ointspay. 
Ayay ome’sgnay othingclay, oughthay usuallyyay ademay inyay odestmay earthyay onestay, isyay elaboratelyyay ecoratedday withyay embroideryyay, embossingyay, oryay eamingglay ewelsjay. Elightedday  Edicationday Asyay arfay asyay omesgnay areyay oncernedcay, eingbay aliveyay isyay ayay wonderfulyay ingthay, andyay eythay queezesay everyyay ounceyay ofyay enjoymentyay outyay ofyay eirthay eethray otay ivefay enturiescay ofyay ifelay. 
 Umanshay ightmay wonderyay aboutyay ettinggay oredbay overyay ethay oursecay ofyay uchsay ayay onglay ifelay, andyay elvesyay aketay entyplay ofyay imetay otay avorsay ethay eautiesbay ofyay ethay worldyay inyay eirthay onglay yearsyay, utbay omesgnay eemsay otay worryyay atthay evenyay withyay allyay atthay imetay, eythay an’tcay etgay inyay enoughyay ofyay ethay ingsthay eythay wantyay otay oday andyay eesay. Omesgnay eakspay asyay ifyay eythay an’tcay etgay ethay oughtsthay outyay ofyay eirthay eadshay astfay enoughyay. 
 Evenyay asyay eythay offeryay ideasyay andyay opinionsyay onyay ayay angeray ofyay ubjectssay, eythay illstay anagemay otay istenlay arefullycay otay othersyay, addingyay ethay appropriateyay exclamationsyay ofyay urprisesay andyay appreciationyay alongyay ethay wayyay. Innyskay andyay axen-hairedflay, ishay inskay walnutyay ownbray andyay ishay eyesyay ayay artlingstay urquoisetay,  Urgellbay oodstay alfhay asyay alltay asyay  Aeronyay imbclay upyay onyay ayay oolstay otay ooklay outyay ethay eepholepay. 
 Ikelay ostmay abhay- itationsyay inyay  Oebleyay, atthay articularpay enementtay adhay eenbay uiltbay orfay umanshay, andyay allersmay esidentsray opedcay withyay ethay esultingray awkwardnessyay asyay estbay eythay ouldcay. Utbay atyay eastlay ethay elativeray argenesslay ofyay ethay apartmentyay avegay  Urgellbay oomray otay ackpay inyay allyay ishay ome-sizedgnay eargay. 
 Ethay ontfray oomray wasyay ishay workshopyay, andyay ityay ontainedcay ayay ewilderingbay iscellanymay ofyay oolstay: ammershay, iselschay, awssay, ockpickslay, intedtay enseslay, eweler'sjay oupeslay, andyay arsjay ofyay owderedpay andyay eddedshray ingredientsyay orfay astingcay ellsspay. 
Ayay atfay aygray atcay, ethay age’smay amiliarfay, aylay urledcay atopyay ayay imoiregray. 
 Ityay openedyay itsyay eyesyay, avegay  Aeronyay ayay isdainfulday yellowyay arestay, enthay appearedyay otay ogay ackbay otay eepslay.— Ichardray  Eelay  Yersbay,  Ethay  Ackblay  Ouquetbay Ayay onstantcay umhay ofyay usybay activityyay ervadespay ethay warrensyay andyay eighborhoodsnay whereyay omesgnay ormfay eirthay oseclay- itknay ommunitiescay. 
 Ouderlay oundssay unctuatepay ethay umhay: ayay unchcray ofyay indinggray earsgay erehay, ayay inormay explosionyay erethay, ayay yelpyay ofyay urprisesay oryay iumphtray, andyay especiallyyay urstsbay ofyay aughterlay. 
 Omesgnay aketay elightday inyay ifelay, enjoyingyay everyyay omentmay ofyay inventionyay, explorationyay, investigationyay, eationcray, andyay ayplay. Ibrantvay  Expressionyay Ayay ome’sgnay energyyay andyay enthusiasmyay orfay ivinglay inesshay oughthray everyyay inchyay ofyay ishay oryay erhay inytay odybay. 
 Omesgnay averageyay ightlyslay overyay 3 eetfay alltay andyay weighyay 40 otay 45 oundspay. 
 Eirthay antay oryay ownbray acesfay areyay usuallyyay adornedyay withyay oadbray ilessmay (eneathbay eirthay odigiouspray osesnay), andyay eirthay ightbray eyesyay ineshay withyay excitementyay. 
 Oughthay omesgnay ovelay okesjay ofyay allyay indskay, articularlypay unspay andyay ankspray, ey’rethay ustjay asyay edicatedday otay ethay oremay erioussay askstay eythay undertakeyay. 
 Anymay omesgnay areyay illedskay engineersyay, alchemistsyay, inkerstay, andyay inventorsyay. 
 Ey’rethay willingyay otay akemay istakesmay andyay aughlay atyay emselvesthay inyay ethay ocesspray ofyay erfectingpay whatyay eythay oday, akingtay oldbay (ometimessay oolhardyfay) isksray andyay eamingdray argelay. Ightbray  Urrowsbay Omesgnay akemay eirthay omeshay inyay illyhay, woodedyay andslay. 
 Eythay ivelay undergroundyay utbay etgay oremay eshfray airyay anthay warvesday oday, enjoyingyay ethay aturalnay, ivinglay worldyay onyay ethay urfacesay wheneveryay eythay ancay. 
 Eirthay omeshay areyay wellyay iddenhay ybay othbay everclay onstructioncay andyay implesay illusionsyay. 
 Welcomeyay isitorsvay areyay quicklyyay usheredyay intoyay ethay ightbray, warmyay urrowsbay. 
 Osethay whoyay areyay otnay welcomeyay areyay unlikelyyay otay indfay ethay urrowsbay inyay ethay irstfay aceplay. Omesgnay whoyay ettlesay inyay umanhay andslay areyay ommonlycay emcuttersgay, engineersyay, agessay, oryay inkerstay. 
 Omesay umanhay amiliesfay etainray omegnay utorstay, ensuringyay atthay eirthay upilspay enjoyyay ayay ixmay ofyay erioussay earninglay andyay elightedday enjoymentyay. 
Ayay omegnay ightmay utortay everalsay enerationsgay ofyay ayay inglesay umanhay amilyfay overyay ethay oursecay ofyay ishay oryay erhay onglay ifelay. Omegnay  Amesnay Omesgnay ovelay amesnay, andyay ostmay avehay alfhay ayay ozenday oryay o.Asay ome'sgnay othermay, atherfay, anclay elderyay, auntsyay, andyay unclesyay eachyay ivegay ethay omegnay ayay amenay, andyay ariousvay icknamesnay omfray ustjay aboutyay everyoneyay elseyay ightmay oryay ightmay otnay ickstay overyay imetay. 
 Omegnay amesnay areyay ypicallytay ariantsvay onyay ethay amesnay ofyay ancestorsyay oryay istantday elativesray, oughthay omesay areyay urelypay ewnay inventionsyay. 
 Whenyay ealingday withyay umanshay andyay othersyay whoyay areyay “uffystay” aboutyay amesnay, ayay omegnay earnslay otay useyay onay oremay anthay eethray amesnay: ayay ersonalpay amenay, ayay anclay amenay, andyay ayay icknamenay, oosingchay ethay oneyay inyay eachyay ategorycay at’sthay ethay ostmay unfay otay aysay. Eepday  Omesgnay Ayay irdthay ubracesay ofyay omesgnay, ethay eepday omesgnay (oryay irfneblinsvay), ivelay inyay allsmay ommunitiescay atteredscay inyay ethay  Underdarkyay. 
 Unlikeyay ethay uergarday andyay ethay owdray, irfneblinsvay areyay asyay oodgay asyay eirthay urfacesay ousinscay. 
 Oweverhay, eirthay umorhay andyay enthusiasmyay areyay ampenedday ybay eirthay oppressiveyay environmentyay, andyay eirthay inventiveyay expertiseyay isyay irectedday ostlymay owardtay oneworkstay. Alemay  Amesnay:  Alstonyay,  Alvynyay,  Oddynockbay,  Occbray,  Urgellbay,  Imbleday,  Eldonyay,  Erkyyay,  Onkinfay,  Ugfray,  Erbogay,  Imblegay,  Imglay,  Ebeddojay,  Ellenkay,  Amfoodlenay,  Orrynyay,  Oondarray,  Eebosay,  Indrisay,  Warrynyay,  Wrennyay,  Ookzay  Emalefay  Amesnay:  Impnottinbay,  Eenabray,  Aramipcay,  Arlincay,  Onelladay,  Uvamilday,  Ellayay,  Ellyjobellyay,  Ellywickyay,  Illilay,  Oopmottinlay,  Orillalay,  Ardnabmay,  Issanay,  Yxnay,  Odayay,  Orlayay,  Oywynray,  Amilshay,  Anatay,  Waywocketyay,  Annazay  Anclay  Amesnay:  Erenbay,  Aergelday,  Olkorfay,  Arrickgay,  Acklenay,  Urnigmay,  Ingelnay,  Aulnorray,  Eppenschay,  Imberstay,  Urentay  Icknamesnay:  Alesloshyay,  Ashhearthyay,  Adgerbay,  Oakclay,  Oublelockday,  Ilchbatterfay,  Ipperfnay,  Ukay,  Imnay,  Oneshoeyay,  Ockpay,  Arklegemspay,  Umbleduckstay Eeingsay ethay  Worldyay Uriouscay andyay impulsiveyay, omesgnay ightmay aketay upyay adventuringyay asyay ayay wayyay otay eesay ethay worldyay oryay orfay ethay ovelay ofyay exploringyay. 
 Asyay overslay ofyay emsgay andyay otheryay inefay itemsyay, omesay omesgnay aketay otay adventuringyay asyay ayay quickyay, ifyay angerousday, athpay otay wealthyay. 
 Egardlessray ofyay whatyay ursspay emthay otay adventureyay, omesgnay whoyay adoptyay isthay wayyay ofyay ifelay ekeyay asyay uchmay enjoymentyay outyay ofyay ityay asyay eythay oday outyay ofyay anyyay otheryay activityyay eythay undertakeyay, ometimessay otay ethay eatgray annoyanceyay ofyay eirthay adventuringyay ompanionscay. Omegnay  Aitstray Youryay omegnay aracterchay ashay ertaincay aracteristicschay inyay ommoncay withyay allyay otheryay omesgnay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Intelligenceyay orescay increasesyay ybay 2. Ageyay. 
 Omesgnay aturemay atyay ethay amesay ateray umanshay oday, andyay ostmay areyay expectedyay otay ettlesay ownday intoyay anyay adultyay ifelay ybay aroundyay ageyay 40. 
 Eythay ancay ivelay 350 otay almostyay 500 yearsyay. Alignmentyay. 
 Omesgnay areyay ostmay oftenyay oodgay. 
 Osethay whoyay endtay owardtay awlay areyay agessay, engineersyay, esearchersray, olarsschay, investigatorsyay, oryay inventorsyay. 
 Osethay whoyay endtay owardtay aoschay areyay instrelsmay, icksterstray, wanderersyay, oryay ancifulfay ewelersjay. 
 Alwaysyay  Appreciativeyay It’syay areray orfay ayay omegnay otay ebay ostilehay oryay aliciousmay unlessyay ehay oryay eshay ashay ufferedsay ayay ievousgray injuryyay. 
 Omesgnay owknay atthay ostmay acesray on’tday areshay eirthay ensesay ofyay umorhay, utbay eythay enjoyyay anyone'syay ompanycay ustjay asyay eythay enjoyyay everythingyay elseyay eythay etsay outyay otay o.evenday ethay icksterstray amongyay emthay areyay oremay ayfulplay anthay iciousvay. Izesay. 
 Omesgnay areyay etweenbay 3 andyay 4 eetfay alltay andyay averageyay aboutyay 40 oundspay. 
 Youryay izesay isyay  Allsmay. Eedspay. 
 Youryay asebay walkingyay eedspay isyay 25 eetfay. 
 Arkvisionday. 
 Accustomedyay otay ifelay undergroundyay, youyay avehay uperiorsay isionvay inyay arkday andyay imday onditionscay. 
 Youyay ancay eesay inyay imday ightlay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay asyay ifyay ityay wereyay ightbray ightlay, andyay inyay arknessday asyay ifyay ityay wereyay imday ightlay. 
 Youyay an'tcay iscernday olorcay inyay arknessday, onlyyay adesshay ofyay aygray. Omegnay  Unningcay. 
 Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay allyay  Intelligenceyay,  Wisdomyay, andyay  Arismachay avingsay owsthray againstyay agicmay. Anguageslay. 
 Youyay ancay eakspay, eadray, andyay writeyay  Ommoncay andyay  Omishgnay. 
 Ethay  Omishgnay anguagelay, whichyay usesyay ethay  Warvishday iptscray, isyay enownedray orfay itsyay echnicaltay eatisestray andyay itsyay atalogscay ofyay owledgeknay aboutyay ethay aturalnay worldyay. Ubracesay. 
 Wotay ubracessay ofyay omesgnay areyay oundfay amongyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay: orestfay omesgnay andyay ockray omesgnay. 
 Oosechay oneyay ofyay esethay ubracessay. Orestfay  Omegnay Asyay ayay orestfay omegnay, youyay avehay ayay aturalnay ackknay orfay illusionyay andyay inherentyay quicknessyay andyay ealthstay. 
 Inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay, orestfay omesgnay areyay areray andyay ecretivesay. 
 Eythay athergay inyay iddenhay ommunitiescay inyay ylvansay orestsfay, usingyay illusionsyay andyay ickerytray otay oncealcay emselvesthay omfray eatsthray oryay otay askmay eirthay escapeyay ouldshay eythay ebay etectedday. 
 Orestfay omesgnay endtay otay ebay iendlyfray withyay otheryay ood-spiritedgay woodlandyay olkfay, andyay eythay egardray elvesyay andyay oodgay eyfay asyay eirthay ostmay importantyay alliesyay. 
 Esethay omesgnay alsoyay efriendbay allsmay orestfay animalsyay andyay elyray onyay emthay orfay informationyay aboutyay eatsthray atthay ightmay owlpray eirthay andslay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Exterityday orescay increasesyay ybay 1. Aturalnay  Illusionistyay. 
 Youyay owknay ethay inormay illusionyay antripcay. 
 Intelligenceyay isyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay ityay. Eakspay withyay  Allsmay  Eastsbay. 
 Oughthray oundssay andyay esturesgay, youyay ancay ommunicatecay implesay ideasyay withyay  Allsmay oryay allersmay eastsbay. 
 Orestfay omesgnay ovelay animalsyay andyay oftenyay eepkay quirrelssay, adgersbay, abbitsray, olesmay, woodpeckersyay, andyay otheryay eaturescray asyay elovedbay etspay. Ockray  Omegnay Asyay ayay ockray omegnay, youyay avehay ayay aturalnay inventivenessyay andyay ardinesshay eyondbay atthay ofyay otheryay omesgnay. 
 Ostmay omesgnay inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay areyay ockray omesgnay, includingyay ethay inkertay omesgnay ofyay ethay  Agonlancedray ettingsay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Onstitutioncay orescay increasesyay ybay 1. Artificer’syay  Orelay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay akemay anyay  Intelligenceyay ( Istoryhay) eckchay elatedray otay agicmay itemsyay, alchemicalyay objectsyay, oryay echnologicaltay evicesday, youyay ancay addyay wicetay youryay oficiencypray onusbay, insteadyay ofyay anyyay oficiencypray onusbay youyay ormallynay applyyay. Inkertay. 
 Youyay avehay oficiencypray withyay artisan’syay oolstay (inker’stay oolstay). 
 Usingyay osethay oolstay, youyay ancay endspay 1 ourhay andyay 10 gpay worthyay ofyay aterialsmay otay onstructcay ayay  Inytay ockworkclay eviceday (ACyay 5, 1 hpay).
