 Ethay eviceday easescay otay unctionfay afteryay 24 ourshay (unlessyay youyay endspay 1 ourhay epairingray ityay otay eepkay ethay eviceday unctioningfay), oryay whenyay youyay useyay youryay actionyay otay ismantleday ityay; atyay atthay imetay, youyay ancay eclaimray ethay aterialsmay usedyay otay eatecray ityay. 
 Youyay ancay avehay upyay otay eethray uchsay evicesday activeyay atyay ayay imetay. Whenyay youyay eatecray ayay eviceday, oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay optionsyay: Ockworkclay  Oytay. 
 Isthay oytay isyay ayay ockworkclay animalyay, onstermay, oryay ersonpay, uchsay asyay ayay ogfray, ousemay, irdbay, agondray, oryay oldiersay. 
 Whenyay acedplay onyay ethay oundgray, ethay oytay ovesmay 5 eetfay acrossyay ethay oundgray onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay inyay ayay andomray irectionday. 
 Ityay akesmay oisesnay asyay appropriateyay otay ethay eaturecray ityay epresentsray. Irefay  Arterstay. 
 Ethay eviceday oducespray ayay iniaturemay ameflay, whichyay youyay ancay useyay otay ightlay ayay andlecay, orchtay, oryay ampfirecay. 
 Usingyay ethay eviceday equiresray youryay actionyay. Usicmay  Oxbay. 
“ Anistay?” aidsay  Intflay esitantlyhay asyay ethay anmay earednay.“ Ethay amesay.”  Ethay ewcomer’snay eardedbay acefay itsplay inyay ayay wideyay ingray. 
 Ehay eldhay openyay ishay armsyay andyay, eforebay ethay warfday ouldcay opstay imhay, engulfedyay  Intflay inyay ayay ughay atthay iftedlay imhay offyay ethay oundgray. 
 Ethay warfday aspedclay ishay oldyay iendfray oseclay orfay ayay iefbray instantyay, enthay, ememberingray ishay ignityday, quirmedsay andyay eedfray imselfhay omfray ethay alf-elf’shay embraceyay.— Argaretmay  Weisyay andyay  Acytray  Ickmanhay,  Agonsdray ofyay  Autumnyay  Wilighttay Walkingyay inyay wotay worldsyay utbay ulytray elongingbay otay eithernay, alf-elveshay ombinecay whatyay omesay aysay areyay ethay estbay qualitiesyay ofyay eirthay elfyay andyay umanhay arentspay: umanhay uriositycay, inventivenessyay, andyay ambitionyay emperedtay ybay ethay efinedray ensessay, ovelay ofyay aturenay, andyay artisticyay astestay ofyay ethay elvesyay. 
 Omesay alf-elveshay ivelay amongyay umanshay, etsay apartyay ybay eirthay emotionalyay andyay ysicalphay ifferencesday, watchingyay iendsfray andyay ovedlay onesyay ageyay whileyay imetay arelybay ouchestay emthay. 
 Othersyay ivelay withyay ethay elvesyay, owinggray estlessray asyay eythay eachray adulthoodyay inyay ethay imelesstay elvenyay ealmsray, whileyay eirthay eerspay ontinuecay otay ivelay asyay ildrenchay. 
 Anymay alf-elveshay, unableyay otay itfay intoyay eitheryay ocietysay, oosechay iveslay ofyay olitarysay wanderingyay oryay oinjay withyay otheryay isfitsmay andyay outcastsyay inyay ethay adventuringyay ifelay. Ofyay  Wotay  Worldsyay  Otay umanshay, alf-elveshay ooklay ikelay elvesyay, andyay otay elvesyay, eythay ooklay umanhay. 
 Inyay eighthay, ey’rethay onyay arpay withyay othbay arentspay, oughthay ey’rethay eithernay asyay enderslay asyay elvesyay ornay asyay oadbray asyay umanshay. 
 Eythay angeray omfray underyay 5 eetfay otay aboutyay 6 eetfay alltay, andyay omfray 100 otay 180 oundspay, withyay enmay onlyyay ightlyslay allertay andyay eavierhay anthay womenyay. 
 Alf-elfhay enmay oday avehay acialfay airhay, andyay ometimessay owgray eardsbay otay askmay eirthay elvenyay ancestryyay. 
 Alf-elvenhay olorationcay andyay eaturesfay ielay omewheresay etweenbay eirthay umanhay andyay elfyay arentspay, andyay usthay owshay ayay arietyvay evenyay oremay onouncedpray anthay atthay oundfay amongyay eitheryay aceray. 
 Eythay endtay otay avehay ethay eyesyay ofyay eirthay elvenyay arentspay. Intflay quintedsay intoyay ethay ettingsay unsay. 
 Ehay oughtthay ehay awsay ethay igurefay ofyay ayay anmay idingstray upyay ethay athpay. 
 Andingstay,  Intflay ewdray ackbay intoyay ethay adowshay ofyay ayay alltay inepay otay eesay etterbay. 
 Ethay an'smay walkyay wasyay arkedmay ybay anyay easyyay ace—angray elvishyay acegray,  Intflay wouldyay avehay aidsay; yetyay ethay an’smay odybay adhay ethay icknessthay andyay ighttay usclesmay ofyay ayay umanhay, whileyay ethay acialfay airhay wasyay efinitelyday umankind’shay. 
 Allyay ethay warfday ouldcay eesay ofyay ethay an’smay acefay eneathbay ayay eengray oodhay wasyay antay inskay andyay ayay ownish-redbray eardbay. 
Ayay ongbowlay wasyay ungslay overyay oneyay ouldershay andyay ayay wordsay unghay atyay ishay eftlay idesay. 
 Ehay wasyay esseddray inyay oftsay eatherlay, arefullycay ooledtay inyay ethay intricateyay esignsday ethay elvesyay ovedlay. 
 Utbay onay elfyay inyay ethay worldyay ofyay  Ynnkray ouldcay owgray ayay eardbay ... 
 Iplomatsday oryay  Wanderersyay Alf-elveshay avehay onay andslay ofyay eirthay ownyay, oughthay eythay areyay welcomeyay inyay umanhay itiescay andyay omewhatsay esslay welcomeyay inyay elvenyay orestsfay. 
 Inyay argelay itiescay inyay egionsray whereyay elvesyay andyay umanshay interactyay oftenyay, alf-elveshay areyay ometimessay umerousnay enoughyay otay ormfay allsmay ommunitiescay ofyay eirthay ownyay. 
 Eythay enjoyyay ethay ompanycay ofyay otheryay alf-elveshay, ethay onlyyay eoplepay whoyay ulytray understandyay whatyay ityay isyay otay ivelay etweenbay esethay wotay worldsyay. Inyay ostmay artspay ofyay ethay worldyay, oughthay, alf-elveshay areyay uncommonyay enoughyay atthay oneyay ightmay ivelay orfay yearsyay withoutyay eetingmay anotheryay. 
 Omesay alf-elveshay eferpray otay avoidyay ompanycay altogetheryay, wanderingyay ethay wildsyay asyay apperstray, orestersfay, untershay, oryay adventurersyay andyay isitingvay ivilizationcay onlyyay arelyray. 
 Ikelay elvesyay, eythay areyay ivendray ybay ethay wanderlustyay atthay omescay ofyay eirthay ongevitylay. 
 Othersyay, inyay ontrastcay, owthray emselvesthay intoyay ethay ickthay ofyay ocietysay, uttingpay eirthay arismachay andyay ocialsay illsskay otay eatgray useyay inyay iplomaticday olesray oryay asyay windlerssay. Alfhay- Elfyay  Amesnay  Alf-elveshay useyay eitheryay umanhay oryay elvenyay amingnay onventionscay. 
 Asyay ifyay otay emphasizeyay atthay eythay on’tday eallyray itfay inyay otay eitheryay ocietysay, alf-elveshay aisedray amongyay umanshay areyay oftenyay ivengay elvenyay amesnay, andyay osethay aisedray amongyay elvesyay oftenyay aketay umanhay amesnay. Alfhay- Elfyay  Aitstray Youryay alf-elfhay aracterchay ashay omesay qualitiesyay inyay ommoncay withyay elvesyay andyay omesay atthay areyay uniqueyay otay alf-elveshay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Arismachay orescay increasesyay ybay 2, andyay wotay otheryay abilityyay oresscay ofyay youryay oicechay increaseyay ybay 1. Ageyay. 
 Alf-elveshay aturemay atyay ethay amesay ateray umanshay oday andyay eachray adulthoodyay aroundyay ethay ageyay ofyay 20. 
 Eythay ivelay uchmay ongerlay anthay umanshay, oweverhay, oftenyay exceedingyay 180 yearsyay. Alignmentyay. 
 Alf-elveshay areshay ethay aoticchay entbay ofyay eirthay elvenyay eritagehay. 
 Eythay aluevay othbay ersonalpay eedomfray andyay Excellentyay  Ambassadorsyay Anymay alf-elveshay earnlay atyay anyay earlyyay ageyay otay etgay alongyay withyay everyoneyay, efusingday ostilityhay andyay indingfay ommoncay oundgray. Asyay ayay aceray, eythay avehay elvenyay acegray withoutyay elvenyay aloofnessyay andyay umanhay energyyay withoutyay umanhay oorishnessbay. 
 Eythay oftenyay akemay excellentyay ambassadorsyay andyay o-betweensgay (exceptyay etweenbay elvesyay andyay umanshay, incesay eachyay idesay uspectssay ethay alf-elfhay ofyay avoringfay ethay other).creativeyay expressionyay, emonstratingday eithernay ovelay ofyay eaderslay ornay esireday orfay ollowersfay. 
 Eythay afechay atyay ulesray, esentray othersyay’ emandsday, andyay ometimessay ovepray unreliableyay, oryay atyay eastlay unpredictableyay. Izesay. 
 Alf-elveshay areyay aboutyay ethay amesay izesay asyay umanshay, angingray omfray 5 otay 6 eetfay alltay. 
 Youryay izesay isyay  Ediummay. Eedspay. 
 Youryay asebay walkingyay eedspay isyay 30 eetfay. 
 Arkvisionday. 
 Anksthay otay youryay elfyay oodblay, youyay avehay uperiorsay isionvay inyay arkday andyay imday onditionscay. 
 Youyay ancay eesay inyay imday ightlay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay asyay ifyay ityay wereyay ightbray ightlay, andyay inyay arknessday asyay ifyay ityay wereyay imday ightlay. 
 Youyay an’tcay iscernday olorcay inyay arknessday, onlyyay adesshay ofyay aygray. Eyfay  Ancestryyay. 
 Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay eingbay armedchay, andyay agicmay an’tcay utpay youyay otay eepslay. Illskay  Ersatilityvay. 
 Youyay aingay oficiencypray inyay wotay illsskay ofyay youryay oicechay. Anguageslay. 
 Whetheryay unitedyay underyay ethay eadershiplay ofyay ayay ightymay warlockyay oryay avinghay oughtfay otay ayay andstillstay afteryay yearsyay ofyay onflictcay, orcyay andyay umanhay ibestray ometimessay ormfay alliancesyay, oiningjay orcesfay intoyay ayay argerlay ordehay otay ethay errortay ofyay ivilizedcay andslay earbynay. 
 Whenyay esethay alliancesyay areyay ealedsay ybay arriagesmay, alf-orcshay areyay ornbay. 
 Omesay alf-orcshay iseray otay ecomebay oudpray iefschay ofyay orcyay ibestray, eirthay umanhay oodblay ivinggay emthay anyay edgeyay overyay eirthay ull-bloodedfay orcyay ivalsray. 
 Omesay enturevay intoyay ethay worldyay otay ovepray eirthay worthyay amongyay umanshay andyay otheryay oremay ivilizedcay acesray. 
 Anymay ofyay esethay ecomebay adventurersyay, achievingyay eatnessgray orfay eirthay ightymay eedsday andyay otorietynay orfay eirthay arbaricbay ustomscay andyay avagesay uryfay. Arredscay andyay  Ongstray  Alf-orcshay’ ayishgray igmentationpay, opingslay oreheadsfay, uttingjay awsjay, ominentpray eethtay, andyay oweringtay uildsbay akemay eirthay orcishyay eritagehay ainplay orfay allyay otay eesay. 
 Alf-orcshay andstay etweenbay 6 andyay 7 eetfay alltay andyay usuallyyay weighyay etweenbay 180 andyay 250 oundspay. Orcsyay egardray attlebay arsscay asyay okenstay ofyay idepray andyay ornamentalyay arsscay asyay ingsthay ofyay eautybay. 
 Otheryay arsscay, oughthay, arkmay anyay orcyay oryay alf-orchay asyay ayay ormerfay aveslay oryay ayay isgracedday exileyay. 
 Anyyay alf-orchay whoyay ashay ivedlay amongyay oryay earnay orcsyay ashay arsscay, whetheryay eythay areyay arksmay ofyay umiliationhay oryay ofyay idepray, ecountingray eirthay astpay exploitsyay andyay injuriesyay. 
 Uchsay ayay alf-orchay ivinglay amongyay umanshay ightmay isplayday esethay arsscay oudlypray oryay idehay emthay inyay ameshay. Ethay  Arkmay ofyay  Uumshgray Ethay one-eyedyay odgay  Uumshgray eatedcray ethay orcsyay, andyay evenyay osethay orcsyay whoyay urntay awayyay omfray ishay worshipyay an’tcay ullyfay escapeyay ishay influenceyay. 
 Ethay amesay isyay uetray ofyay alf-orcshay, oughthay eirthay umanhay oodblay oderatesmay ethay impactyay ofyay eirthay orcishyay eritagehay. 
 Omesay alf-orcshay earhay ethay whispersyay ofyay  Uumshgray inyay eirthay eamsdray, allingcay emthay otay unleashyay ethay ageray atthay immerssay withinyay emthay. 
 Othersyay eelfay  Uumsh’sgray Ethay warchiefyay  Urrenmhay ousedray imselfhay omfray ishay eeping-fursslay andyay ishay womenyay andyay ulledpay ayay ortshay auberkhay ofyay eavyhay eelstay ingsray overyay ishay ickthay, well-muscledyay orsotay. 
 Ehay usuallyyay oseray eforebay ostmay ofyay ishay warriorsyay, incesay ehay adhay ayay ongstray eakstray ofyay umanhay oodblay inyay imhay, andyay ehay oundfay ethay aylightday esslay othersomebay anthay ostmay ofyay ishay ibetray idday. 
 Amongyay ethay  Oodyblay  Ullsskay, ayay warrioryay wasyay udgedjay ybay ishay engthstray, ishay iercenessfay, andyay ishay witsyay. 
 Umanhay ancestryyay wasyay onay emishblay againstyay ayay warrior—providedyay ehay wasyay everyyay itbay asyay ongstray, enduringyay, andyay oodthirstyblay asyay ishay ull-bloodedfay inkay. 
 Alfhay- orcsyay whoyay wereyay weakeryay anthay eirthay orcyay omradescay idn'tday astlay onglay amongyay ethay  Oodyblay  Ullsskay oryay anyyay otheryay orcyay ibetray orfay atthay attermay. 
 Utbay ityay wasyay oftenyay uetray atthay ayay itbay ofyay umanhay oodblay avegay ayay warrioryay ustjay ethay ightray ixmay ofyay unningcay, ambitionyay, andyay elf-disciplinesay otay ogay arfay indeedyay, asyay  Urrenmhay adhay. 
exultationyay whenyay eythay oinjay inyay eleemay ombat—andcay eitheryay exultyay alongyay withyay imhay oryay ivershay withyay earfay andyay oathinglay. 
 Alf-orcshay areyay otnay evilyay ybay aturenay, utbay evilyay oesday urklay withinyay emthay, whetheryay eythay embraceyay ityay oryay ebelray againstyay ityay. Eyondbay ethay ageray ofyay  Uumshgray, alf-orcshay eelfay emotionyay owerfullypay. 
 Ageray oesn’tday ustjay quickenyay eirthay ulsepay, ityay akesmay eirthay odiesbay urnbay. 
 Anyay insultyay ingsstay ikelay acidyay, andyay adnesssay apssay eirthay engthstray. 
 Utbay eythay aughlay oudlylay andyay eartilyhay, andyay implesay odilybay easures—feastingplay, inkingdray, wrestlingyay, ummingdray, andyay wildyay ancing—fillday eirthay eartshay withyay oyjay. 
 Eythay endtay otay ebay ort-temperedshay andyay ometimessay ullensay, oremay inclinedyay otay actionyay anthay ontemplationcay andyay otay ightingfay anthay arguingyay. 
 Ethay ostmay accomplishedyay alf-orcshay areyay osethay withyay enoughyay elfsay- ontrolcay otay etgay ybay inyay ayay ivilizedcay andlay. Ibestray andyay  Umsslay Alf-orcshay ostmay oftenyay ivelay amongyay orcsyay. 
 Ofyay ethay otheryay acesray, umanshay areyay ostmay ikelylay otay acceptyay alf-orcshay, andyay alfhay- orcsyay almostyay alwaysyay ivelay inyay umanhay andslay whenyay otnay ivinglay amongyay orcyay ibestray. 
 Whetheryay ovingpray emselvesthay amongyay oughray arbarianbay ibestray oryay abblingscray otay urvivesay inyay ethay umsslay ofyay argerlay itiescay, alf-orcshay etgay ybay onyay eirthay ysicalphay ightmay, eirthay enduranceyay, andyay ethay eershay eterminationday eythay inherityay omfray eirthay umanhay ancestryyay. Alfhay- Orcyay  Amesnay Alf-orcshay usuallyyay avehay amesnay appropriateyay otay ethay ulturecay inyay whichyay eythay wereyay aisedray. 
Ayay alf-orchay whoyay wantsyay otay itfay inyay amongyay umanshay ightmay adetray anyay orcyay amenay orfay ayay umanhay amenay. 
 Omesay alf-orcshay withyay umanhay amesnay ecideday otay adoptyay ayay utturalgay orcyay amenay ecausebay eythay inkthay ityay akesmay emthay oremay intimidatingyay. Alemay  Orcyay  Amesnay:  Enchday,  Engfay,  Ellgay,  Enkhay,  Olghay,  Imshyay,  Ethkay,  Uskkray,  Urrenmhay,  Ontray,  Umpshay,  Okkthay  Emalefay  Orcyay  Amesnay:  Aggibay,  Emenyay,  Engongyay,  Ansifkay,  Yevmay,  Eeganay,  Ovakyay,  Ownkayay,  Authashay,  Uthasay,  Olavay,  Olenvay,  Yeveldayay Alfhay- Orcyay  Aitstray Youryay alf-orchay aracterchay ashay ertaincay aitstray erivingday omfray youryay oreyay ancestry.hateyay orcsyay. 
 Omesay areyay eservedray, yingtray otnay otay awdray attentionyay otay emselvesthay. 
Ayay ewfay emonstrateday ietypay andyay ood-heartednessgay asyay ubliclypay asyay eythay ancay (whetheryay oryay otnay uchsay emonstrationsday areyay enuinegay). 
 Andyay omesay implysay ytray otay ebay osay oughtay atthay othersyay ustjay avoidyay emthay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Engthstray orescay increasesyay ybay 2, andyay youryay  Onstitutioncay orescay increasesyay ybay 1. Ageyay. 
 Alf-orcshay aturemay ayay ittlelay asterfay anthay umanshay, eachingray adulthoodyay aroundyay ageyay 14. 
 Eythay ageyay oticeablynay asterfay andyay arelyray ivelay ongerlay anthay 75 yearsyay. Alignmentyay. 
 Alf-orcshay inherityay ayay endencytay owardtay aoschay omfray eirthay orcyay arentspay andyay areyay otnay onglystray inclinedyay owardtay oodgay. 
 Alf-orcshay aisedray amongyay oresyay andyay willingyay otay ivelay outyay eirthay iveslay amongyay emthay areyay usuallyyay evilyay. Izesay. 
 Alf-orcshay areyay omewhatsay argerlay andyay ulkierbay anthay umanshay, andyay eythay angeray omfray 5 otay wellyay overyay 6 eetfay alltay. 
 Youryay izesay isyay  Ediummay. Eedspay. 
 Youryay asebay walkingyay eedspay isyay 30 eetfay. Arkvisionday. 
 Anksthay otay youryay orcyay oodblay, youyay avehay uperiorsay isionvay inyay arkday andyay imday onditionscay. 
 Youyay ancay eesay inyay imday ightlay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay asyay ifyay ityay wereyay ightbray ightlay, andyay inyay arknessday asyay ifyay ityay wereyay imday ightlay. 
 Youyay an'tcay iscernday olorcay inyay arknessday, onlyyay adesshay ofyay aygray. Enacingmay. 
 Youyay aingay oficiencypray inyay ethay  Intimidationyay illskay. Elentlessray  Enduranceyay. 
 Whenyay youyay areyay educedray otay 0 ithay ointspay utbay otnay illedkay outrightyay, youyay ancay opdray otay 1 ithay ointpay insteadyay. 
 Youyay an’tcay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Avagesay  Attacksyay. 
 Whenyay youyay orescay ayay iticalcray ithay withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay ollray oneyay ofyay ethay weapon’syay amageday iceday oneyay additionalyay imetay andyay addyay ityay otay ethay extrayay amageday ofyay ethay iticalcray ithay. Anguageslay. 
 Youyay ancay eakspay, eadray, andyay writeyay  Ommoncay andyay  Orcyay. 
 Orcyay isyay ayay arshhay, atinggray anguagelay withyay ardhay onsonantscay. 
“ Utbay youyay oday eesay ethay wayyay eoplepay ooklay atyay youyay, evil’sday ildchay." Osethay ackblay eyesyay, oldcay asyay ayay winteryay ormstay, wereyay aringstay ightray intoyay erhay earthay andyay ethay uddensay eriousnesssay inyay ishay oicevay oltedjay erhay.“ Whatyay isyay ityay eythay aysay?" ehay askedyay. 
“ One’syay ayay uriositycay, wo’stay ayay onspiracycay—”“ Ee'sthray ayay ursecay,” eshay inishedfay. 
“ Youyay inkthay Iyay aven’thay eardhay atthay ubbishray efore?”“Ibay owknay youyay avehay.”  Whenyay eshay aredglay atyay imhay, ehay addedyay, “ It’syay otnay asyay ifyay I’myay umbingplay ethay epthsday ofyay youryay indmay, earday irlgay. 
 Atthay isyay ethay urdenbay ofyay everyyay ieflingtay. 
 Omesay eakbray underyay ityay, omesay akemay ityay ethay illstonemay aroundyay eirthay ecknay, omesay evelray inyay ityay.”  Ehay iltedtay ishay eadhay againyay, utinizingscray erhay, withthatyay wickedyay intglay inyay ishay eyesyay. 
“ Youyay ightfay ityay, on’tday youyay?  Ikelay ayay ittlelay wildcatyay, Iyay wageryay. 
 Everyyay ittlelay abjay andyay ommentcay ustjay arpensshay youryay awsclay.”— Erinyay May. 
 Evansyay,  Imstonebray  Angelsyay Otay ebay eetedgray withyay aresstay andyay whispersyay, otay uffersay iolencevay andyay insultyay onyay ethay eetstray, otay eesay istrustmay andyay earfay inyay everyyay eyeyay: isthay isyay ethay otlay ofyay ethay ieflingtay. 
 Andyay otay wisttay ethay ifeknay, ieflingstay owknay atthay isthay isyay ecausebay ayay actpay uckstray enerationsgay agoyay infusedyay ethay essenceyay ofyay  Asmodeus—overlordyay ofyay ethay  Inenay  Ells—intohay eirthay oodlineblay. 
 Eirthay appearanceyay andyay eirthay aturenay areyay otnay eirthay aultfay utbay ethay esultray ofyay anyay ancientyay insay, orfay whichyay eythay andyay eirthay ildrenchay andyay eirthay ildren’schay ildrenchay willyay alwaysyay ebay eldhay accountableyay. Infernalyay  Oodlineblay Ieflingstay areyay erivedday omfray umanhay oodlinesblay, andyay inyay ethay oadestbray ossiblepay ensesay, eythay illstay ooklay umanhay. 
 Oweverhay, eirthay infernalyay eritagehay ashay eftlay ayay earclay imprintyay onyay eirthay appearanceyay. 
 Ieflingstay avehay argelay ornshay atthay aketay anyyay ofyay ayay arietyvay ofyay apesshay: omesay avehay urlingcay ornshay ikelay ayay amray, othersyay avehay aightstray andyay alltay ornshay ikelay ayay azelle’sgay, andyay omesay iralspay upwardyay ikelay anyay antelopesyay’ ornshay. 
 Eythay avehay ickthay ailstay, ourfay otay ivefay eetfay onglay, whichyay ashlay oryay oilcay aroundyay eirthay egslay whenyay eythay etgay upsetyay oryay ervousnay. 
 Eirthay aninecay eethtay areyay arplyshay ointedpay, andyay eirthay eyesyay areyay olidsay olors—blackcay, edray, whiteyay, ilversay, oryay old—withgay onay isiblevay erasclay oryay upilpay. 
 Eirthay inskay onestay overcay ethay ullfay angeray ofyay umanhay olorationcay, utbay alsoyay includeyay ariousvay adesshay ofyay edray. 
ievesthay, oryay imecray ordslay. 
 Ometimessay eythay ivelay amongyay otheryay inoritymay opulationspay inyay enclavesyay whereyay eythay areyay eatedtray withyay oremay espectray. Ackinglay ayay omelandhay, ieflingstay owknay atthay eythay avehay otay akemay eirthay ownyay wayyay inyay ethay worldyay andyay atthay eythay avehay otay ebay ongstray otay urvivesay. 
 Eythay areyay otnay quickyay otay usttray anyoneyay whoyay aimsclay otay ebay ayay iendfray, utbay whenyay ayay iefling’stay ompanionscay emonstrateday atthay eythay usttray imhay oryay erhay, ethay ieflingtay earnslay otay extendyay ethay amesay usttray otay emthay. 
 Andyay onceyay ayay ieflingtay ivesgay omeonesay oyaltylay, ethay ieflingtay isyay ayay irmfay iendfray oryay allyyay orfay ifelay. Ieflingtay  Amesnay  Ieflingtay amesnay allfay intoyay eethray oadbray ategoriescay. 
 Ieflingstay ornbay intoyay anotheryay ulturecay ypicallytay avehay amesnay eflectiveray ofyay atthay ulturecay. 
 Omesay avehay amesnay erivedday omfray ethay  Infernalyay anguagelay, assedpay ownday oughthray enerationsgay, atthay eflectray eirthay iendishfay eritagehay. 
 Andyay omesay youngeryay ieflingstay, ivingstray otay indfay ayay aceplay inyay ethay worldyay, adoptyay ayay amenay atthay ignifiessay ayay irtuevay oryay otheryay onceptcay andyay enthay ytray otay embodyyay atthay onceptcay. 
 Orfay omesay, ethay osenchay amenay isyay ayay oblenay questyay. 
 Orfay othersyay, it’syay ayay imgray estinyday. Alemay  Infernalyay  Amesnay:  Akmenosyay,  Amnonyay,  Arakasbay,  Amakosday,  Ekemonyay,  Iadosyay,  Aironkay,  Eucislay,  Elechmay,  Ordaimay,  Orthosmay,  Elaiospay,  Amosskay,  Eraithay  Emalefay  Infernalyay  Amesnay:  Aktayay,  Anakisyay,  Yseisbray,  Iellacray,  Amaiaday,  Eayay,  Allistakay,  Erissalay,  Akariamay,  Emeianay,  Oriannayay,  Elaiaphay,  Ietaray “ Irtuevay”  Amesnay:  Artyay,  Arrioncay,  Antchay,  Eedcray,  Espairday,  Excellenceyay,  Earfay,  Oryglay,  Opehay,  Idealyay,  Usicmay,  Owherenay,  Openyay,  Oetrypay,  Questyay,  Andomray,  Everenceray,  Orrowsay,  Emeritytay,  Ormenttay,  Wearyyay Utualmay  Istrustmay Eoplepay endtay otay ebay uspicioussay ofyay ieflingstay, assumingyay atthay eirthay infernalyay eritagehay ashay eftlay itsyay arkmay onyay eirthay ersonalitypay andyay oralitymay, otnay ustjay eirthay appearanceyay. 
 Opkeepersshay eepkay ayay oseclay eyeyay onyay eirthay oodsgay whenyay ieflingstay enteryay eirthay oresstay, ethay owntay watchyay ightmay ollowfay ayay ieflingtay aroundyay orfay ayay whileyay, andyay emagoguesday ameblay ieflingstay orfay angestray appeningshay. Ethay ealityray, oughthay, isyay atthay ayay iefling’stay oodlineblay oesn’tday affectyay ishay oryay erhay ersonalitypay otay anyyay eatgray egreeday. 
 Yearsyay ofyay ealingday withyay istrustmay oesday eavelay itsyay arkmay onyay ostmay ieflingstay, andyay eythay espondray otay ityay inyay ifferentday waysyay. 
 Omesay oosechay otay ivelay upyay otay ethay wickedyay ereotypestay, utbay othersyay areyay irtuousvay. 
 Ostmay areyay implysay eryvay awareyay ofyay owhay eoplepay espondray otay emthay. 
 Afteryay ealingday withyay isthay istrustmay oughoutthray youthyay, ayay ieflingtay oftenyay evelopsday ethay abilityyay otay overcomeyay ejudicepray oughthray armchay oryay intimidationyay. Ieflingtay  Aitstray Ieflingstay areshay ertaincay acialray aitstray asyay ayay esultray ofyay eirthay infernalyay escentday. Abilityyay  Orescay  Increaseyay. 
 Youryay  Intelligenceyay orescay increasesyay ybay 1, andyay youryay  Arismachay orescay increasesyay ybay 2. Ageyay. 
 Ieflingstay aturemay atyay ethay amesay ateray asyay umanshay utbay ivelay ayay ewfay yearsyay ongerlay. Alignmentyay. 
 Ieflingstay ightmay otnay avehay anyay innateyay endencytay owardtay evilyay, utbay anymay ofyay emthay endyay upyay erethay. 
 Evilyay oryay otnay, anyay independentyay aturenay inclinesyay anymay ieflingstay owardtay ayay aoticchay alignmentyay. Izesay. 
 Ieflingstay areyay aboutyay ethay amesay izesay andyay uildbay asyay umanshay. 
 Youryay izesay isyay  Ediummay. Eedspay. 
 Youryay asebay walkingyay eedspay isyay 30 eetfay. Arkvisionday. 
 Anksthay otay youryay infernalyay eritagehay, youyay avehay uperiorsay isionvay inyay arkday andyay imday onditionscay. 
 Youyay ancay eesay inyay imday ightlay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay asyay ifyay ityay wereyay ightbray ightlay, andyay inyay arknessday asyay ifyay ityay wereyay imday ightlay. 
 Youyay an’tcay iscernday olorcay inyay arknessday, onlyyay adesshay ofyay aygray. Ellishhay  Esistanceray. 
 Youyay avehay esistanceray otay irefay amageday. Infernalyay  Egacylay. 
 Youyay owknay ethay aumaturgythay antripcay. 
 Onceyay youyay eachray 3rday evellay, youyay ancay astcay ethay ellishhay ebukeray ellspay onceyay erpay ayday asyay ayay 2levelndlay ellspay. 
 Onceyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay, youyay ancay alsoyay astcay ethay arknessday ellspay onceyay erpay ayday. 
 Arismachay isyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay esethay ellsspay. Anguageslay. 
 Apterchay 3:  Assesclay  ADVENTURERSyay AREyay EXTRAORDINARYyay EOPLEPay, ivendray ybay ayay irstthay orfay excitementyay intoyay ayay  ifelay atthay othersyay wouldyay evernay areday eadlay. 
 Eythay areyay eroeshay, ompelledcay otay exploreyay ethay  arkday acesplay ofyay ethay worldyay andyay aketay onyay echallengesthay atthay esserlay womenyay andyay enmay an’tcay andstay againstyay. Assclay isyay ethay imarypray efinitionday ofyay whatyay youryay aracterchay ancay oday. 
 It’syay oremay anthay ayay ofessionpray; it’syay youryay aracter’schay allingcay. 
 Assclay apesshay ethay wayyay youyay inkthay aboutyay ethay worldyay andyay interactyay withyay ityay andyay youryay elationshipray withyay otheryay eoplepay andyay owerspay inyay ethay ultiversemay. 
Ayay ighterfay, orfay exampleyay, ightmay iewvay ethay worldyay inyay agmaticpray ermstay ofyay ategystray andyay aneuveringmay, andyay eesay erselfhay asyay ustjay ayay awnpay inyay ayay uchmay argerlay amegay. 
Ayay ericclay, ybay ontrastcay, ightmay eesay imselfhay asyay ayay willingyay ervantsay inyay ayay od’sgay unfoldingyay anplay oryay ayay onflictcay ewingbray amongyay ariousvay eitiesday. 
 Whileyay ethay ighterfay ashay ontactscay inyay ayay ercenarymay ompanycay oryay armyyay, ethay ericclay ightmay owknay ayay umbernay ofyay iestspray, aladinspay, andyay evoteesday whoyay areshay ishay aithfay. Youryay assclay ivesgay youyay ayay arietyvay ofyay ecialspay eaturesfay, uchsay asyay ayay ighter’sfay asterymay ofyay weaponsyay andyay armoryay, andyay ayay wizard’syay ellsspay. 
 Atyay owlay evelslay, youryay assclay ivesgay youyay onlyyay wotay oryay eethray eaturesfay, utbay asyay youyay advanceyay inyay evellay youyay aingay oremay andyay youryay existingyay eaturesfay oftenyay improveyay. 
 Eachyay assclay entryyay inyay isthay apterchay includesyay ayay abletay ummarizingsay ethay enefitsbay youyay aingay atyay everyyay evellay, andyay ayay etailedday explanationyay ofyay eachyay oneyay. Adventurersyay ometimessay advanceyay inyay oremay anthay oneyay assclay. 
Ayay ogueray ightmay witchsay irectionday inyay ifelay andyay wearsay ethay oathyay ofyay ayay aladinpay. 
Ayay arbarianbay ightmay iscoverday atentlay agicalmay abilityyay andyay abbleday inyay ethay orcerersay assclay whileyay ontinuingcay otay advanceyay asyay ayay arbarianbay. 
 Elvesyay areyay ownknay otay ombinecay artialmay asterymay withyay agicalmay ainingtray andyay advanceyay asyay ightersfay andyay wizardsyay imultaneouslysay. 
Ayay alltay umanhay ibesmantray idesstray oughthray ayay izzardblay, apeddray inyay urfay andyay eftinghay ishay axeyay. 
 Ehay aughslay asyay ehay argeschay owardtay ethay ostfray iantgay whoyay aredday oachpay ishay eople’spay elkyay erd.Ahay alf-orchay arlssnay atyay ethay atestlay allengerchay otay erhay authorityyay overyay eirthay avagesay ibetray, eadyray otay eakbray ishay ecknay withyay erhay arebay andshay asyay eshay idday otay ethay astlay ixsay ivalsray. Othingfray atyay ethay outhmay, ayay warfday amsslay ishay elmethay intoyay ethay acefay ofyay ishay owdray oefay, enthay urnstay otay ivedray ishay armoredyay elbowyay intoyay ethay utgay ofyay anotheryay. Esethay arbariansbay, ifferentday asyay eythay ightmay ebay, areyay efinedday ybay eirthay ageray: unbridledyay, unquenchableyay, andyay unthinkingyay uryfay. 
 Oremay anthay ayay eremay emotionyay, eirthay angeryay isyay ethay erocityfay ofyay ayay orneredcay edatorpray, ethay unrelentingyay assaultyay ofyay ayay ormstay, ethay urningchay urmoiltay ofyay ethay easay. Orfay omesay, eirthay ageray ingsspray omfray ayay ommunioncay withyay iercefay animalyay iritsspay. 
 Othersyay awdray omfray ayay oilingray eservoirray ofyay angeryay atyay ayay worldyay ullfay ofyay ainpay. 
 Orfay everyyay arbarianbay, ageray isyay ayay owerpay atthay uelsfay otnay ustjay ayay attlebay enzyfray utbay alsoyay uncannyyay eflexesray, esilienceray, andyay eatsfay ofyay engthstray. Imalpray  Instinctyay  Eoplepay ofyay ownstay andyay itiescay aketay idepray inyay owhay eirthay ivilizedcay waysyay etsay emthay apartyay omfray animalsyay, asyay ifyay enyingday one’syay ownyay aturenay wasyay ayay arkmay ofyay uperioritysay. 
 Otay ayay arbarianbay, oughthay, ivilizationcay isyay onay irtuevay, utbay ayay ignsay ofyay weaknessyay. 
 Ethay ongstray embraceyay eirthay animalyay aturenay- eenkay instinctsyay, imalpray ysicalityphay, andyay erociousfay ageray. 
 Arbariansbay areyay uncomfortableyay whenyay edgedhay inyay ybay wallsyay andyay owdscray. 
 Eythay ivethray inyay ethay wildsyay ofyay eirthay omelandshay: ethay undratay, unglejay, oryay asslandsgray whereyay eirthay ibestray ivelay andyay unthay. Arbariansbay omecay aliveyay inyay ethay aoschay ofyay ombatcay. Eythay ancay enteryay ayay erserkbay atestay whereyay ageray akestay overyay, ivinggay emthay uperhumansay engthstray andyay esilienceray. 
Ayay arbarianbay ancay awdray onyay isthay eservoirray ofyay uryfay onlyyay ayay ewfay imestay withoutyay estingray, utbay osethay ewfay agesray areyay usuallyyay ufficientsay otay efeatday whateveryay eatsthray arise.Ayay  Ifelay ofyay  Angerday  Otnay everyyay embermay ofyay ethay ibestray eemedday “arbariansbay” ybay ionsscay ofyay ivilizedcay ocietysay ashay ethay arbarianbay assclay. 
Ayay uetray arbarianbay amongyay esethay eoplepay isyay asyay uncommonyay asyay ayay illedskay ighterfay inyay ayay owntay, andyay ehay oryay eshay aysplay ayay imilarsay oleray asyay ayay otectorpray ofyay ethay eoplepay andyay ayay eaderlay inyay imestay ofyay waryay. 
onstersmay. 
 Arbariansbay argechay eadlonghay intoyay atthay angerday osay atthay eirthay eoplepay on’tday avehay otay. Eirthay ouragecay inyay ethay acefay ofyay angerday akesmay arbariansbay erfectlypay uitedsay orfay adventuringyay. 
 Wanderingyay isyay oftenyay ayay wayyay ofyay ifelay orfay eirthay ativenay ibestray, andyay ethay ootlessray ifelay ofyay ethay adventureryay isyay ittlelay ardshiphay orfay ayay arbarianbay. 
 Omesay arbariansbay issmay ethay ose-knitclay amilyfay ucturesstray ofyay ethay ibetray, utbay eventuallyyay indfay emthay eplacedray ybay ethay ondsbay ormedfay amongyay ethay embersmay ofyay eirthay adventuringyay artiespay. Eatingcray ayay  Arbarianbay  Whenyay eatingcray ayay arbarianbay aracterchay, inkthay aboutyay whereyay youryay aracterchay omescay omfray andyay ishay oryay erhay aceplay inyay ethay worldyay. 
 Alktay withyay youryay DMay aboutyay anyay appropriateyay originyay orfay youryay arbarianbay. 
 Idday youyay omecay omfray ayay istantday andlay, akingmay youyay ayay angerstray inyay ethay areayay ofyay ethay ampaigncay? Oryay isyay ethay ampaigncay etsay inyay ayay ough-and-tumbleray ontierfray whereyay arbariansbay areyay ommoncay? Whatyay edlay youyay otay aketay upyay ethay adventuringyay ifelay?  Wereyay youyay uredlay otay ettledsay andslay ybay ethay omisepray ofyay ichesray?  Idday youyay oinjay orcesfay withyay oldierssay ofyay osethay andslay otay acefay ayay aredshay eatthray?  Idday onstersmay oryay anyay invadingyay ordehay ivedray youyay outyay ofyay youryay omelandhay, akingmay youyay ayay ootlessray efugeeray?  Erhapspay youyay wereyay ayay isonerpray ofyay waryay, oughtbray inyay ainschay otay “ivilizedcay” andslay andyay onlyyay ownay ableyay otay winyay youryay eedomfray. 
 Oryay youyay ightmay avehay eenbay astcay outyay omfray youryay eoplepay ecausebay ofyay ayay imecray youyay ommittedcay, ayay abootay youyay iolatedvay, oryay ayay oupcay atthay emovedray youyay omfray ayay ositionpay ofyay authorityyay. Quickyay  Uildbay Youyay ancay akemay ayay arbarianbay quicklyyay ybay ollowingfay esethay uggestionssay. 
 Irstfay, utpay youryay ighesthay abilityyay orescay inyay  Engthstray, ollowedfay ybay  Onstitutioncay. 
 Equipmentyay Youyay artstay withyay ethay ollowingfay equipmentyay, inyay additionyay otay ethay equipmentyay antedgray ybay youryay ackgroundbay:• (ayay) ayay eataxegray oryay (bay) anyyay artialmay eleemay weaponyay• (ayay) wotay andaxeshay oryay (bay) anyyay implesay weaponyay •  Anyay explorer’syay ackpay andyay ourfay avelinsjay Ageray  Inyay attlebay, youyay ightfay withyay imalpray erocityfay. 
 Onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay enteryay ayay ageray asyay ayay onusbay actionyay. Whileyay agingray, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay ifyay youyay aren’tyay wearingyay eavyhay armoryay:•  Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay  Engthstray eckschay andyay  Engthstray avingsay owsthray.•  Whenyay youyay akemay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay usingyay  Engthstray, youyay aingay ayay onusbay otay ethay amageday ollray atthay increasesyay asyay youyay aingay evelslay asyay ayay arbarianbay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Ageray  Amageday olumncay ofyay ethay  Arbarianbay abletay.•  Youyay avehay esistanceray otay udgeoningblay, iercingpay, andyay ashingslay amageday. Ifyay youyay areyay ableyay otay astcay ellsspay, youyay an’tcay astcay emthay oryay oncentratecay onyay emthay whileyay agingray. Youryay ageray astslay orfay 1 inutemay. 
 Ityay endsyay earlyyay ifyay youyay areyay ockedknay unconsciousyay oryay ifyay youryay urntay endsyay andyay youyay aven’thay attackedyay ayay ostilehay eaturecray incesay youryay astlay urntay oryay akentay amageday incesay enthay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay endyay youryay ageray onyay youryay urntay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay. Onceyay youyay avehay agedray ethay umbernay ofyay imestay ownshay orfay youryay arbarianbay evellay inyay ethay  Agesray olumncay ofyay ethay  Arbarianbay abletay, youyay ustmay inishfay ayay onglay estray eforebay youyay ancay ageray againyay. Unarmoredyay  Efenseday Whileyay youyay areyay otnay wearingyay anyyay armoryay, youryay  Armoryay  Assclay equalsyay 10 + youryay  Exterityday odifiermay + youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay ayay ieldshay andyay illstay aingay isthay enefitbay. Ecklessray  Attackyay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay owthray asideyay allyay oncerncay orfay efenseday otay attackyay withyay iercefay esperationday. 
 Whenyay youyay akemay youryay irstfay attackyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay ecideday otay attackyay ecklesslyray. 
 Oingday osay ivesgay youyay advantageyay onyay eleemay weaponyay attackyay ollsray usingyay  Engthstray uringday isthay urntay, utbay attackyay ollsray againstyay youyay avehay advantageyay untilyay youryay extnay urntay. Angerday  Ensesay Atyay 2nday evellay, youyay aingay anyay uncannyyay ensesay ofyay whenyay ingsthay earbynay aren’tyay asyay eythay ouldshay ebay, ivinggay youyay anyay edgeyay whenyay youyay odgeday awayyay omfray angerday. Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay  Exterityday avingsay owsthray againstyay effectsyay atthay youyay ancay eesay, uchsay asyay apstray andyay ellsspay. 
 Otay aingay isthay enefitbay, youyay an’tcay ebay indedblay, eafenedday, oryay incapacitatedyay. Imalpray  Athpay Atyay 3rday evellay, youyay oosechay ayay athpay atthay apesshay ethay aturenay ofyay youryay ageray. 
 Oosechay ethay  Athpay ofyay ethay  Erserkerbay oryay ethay  Athpay ofyay ethay  Otemtay  Warrioryay, othbay etailedday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay escriptionday. 
 Eginningbay atyay 15thay evellay, youryay ageray isyay osay iercefay atthay ityay endsyay earlyyay onlyyay ifyay youyay allfay unconsciousyay oryay ifyay youyay oosechay otay endyay ityay. Indomitableyay  Ightmay  Eginningbay atyay 18thay evellay, ifyay youryay otaltay orfay ayay  Engthstray eckchay isyay esslay anthay youryay  Engthstray orescay, youyay ancay useyay atthay orescay inyay aceplay ofyay ethay otaltay. Imalpray  Ampionchay  Atyay 20thay evellay, youyay embodyyay ethay owerpay ofyay ethay wildsyay. 
 Youryay  Engthstray andyay  Onstitutioncay oresscay increaseyay ybay 4. 
 Youryay aximummay orfay osethay oresscay isyay ownay 24. Imalpray  Athspay Ageray urnsbay inyay everyyay arbarian’sbay earthay, ayay urnacefay atthay ivesdray imhay oryay erhay owardtay eatnessgray. 
 Ifferentday Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay Whenyay youyay eachray 4thay evellay, andyay againyay atyay 8thay, 12thay, 16thay, andyay 19thay evellay, youyay ancay increaseyay oneyay abilityyay orescay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 2, oryay youyay ancay increaseyay wotay abilityyay oresscay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 1. 
 Asyay ormalnay, youyay an’tcay increaseyay anyay abilityyay orescay aboveyay 20 usingyay isthay eaturefay. Extrayay  Attackyay  Eginningbay atyay 5thay evellay, youyay ancay attackyay wicetay, insteadyay ofyay onceyay, wheneveryay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. Astfay  Ovementmay Artingstay atyay 5thay evellay, youryay eedspay increasesyay ybay 10 eetfay whileyay youyay aren’tyay wearingyay eavyhay armoryay. Eralfay  Instinctyay Ybay 7thay evellay, youryay instinctsyay areyay osay onedhay atthay youyay avehay advantageyay onyay initiativeyay ollsray. Additionallyyay, ifyay youyay areyay urprisedsay atyay ethay eginningbay ofyay ombatcay andyay aren’tyay incapacitatedyay, youyay ancay actyay ormallynay onyay youryay irstfay urntay, utbay onlyyay ifyay youyay enteryay youryay ageray eforebay oingday anythingyay elseyay onyay atthay urntay. Utalbray  Iticalcray  Eginningbay atyay 9thay evellay, youyay ancay ollray oneyay additionalyay weaponyay amageday ieday whenyay eterminingday ethay extrayay amageday orfay ayay iticalcray ithay withyay ayay eleemay attackyay. Isthay increasesyay otay wotay additionalyay iceday atyay 13thay evellay andyay eethray additionalyay iceday atyay 17thay evellay. Elentlessray  Ageray  Artingstay atyay 11thay evellay, youryay ageray ancay eepkay youyay ightingfay espiteday ievousgray woundsyay. 
 Ifyay youyay opdray otay 0 ithay ointspay whileyay you’reyay agingray andyay on’tday ieday outrightyay, youyay ancay akemay ayay DCay 10  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay youyay ucceedsay, youyay opdray otay 1 ithay ointpay insteadyay. Eachyay imetay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay afteryay ethay irstfay, ethay DCay increasesyay ybay 5. 
 Whenyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray, ethay DCay esetsray otay 10.arbariansbay attributeyay eirthay ageray otay ifferentday ourcessay, oweverhay. 
 Orfay omesay, ityay isyay anyay internalyay eservoirray whereyay ainpay, iefgray, andyay angeryay areyay orgedfay intoyay ayay uryfay ardhay asyay eelstay. 
 Othersyay eesay ityay asyay ayay iritualspay essingblay, ayay iftgay ofyay ayay otemtay animalyay. Athpay ofyay ethay  Erserkerbay Orfay omesay arbariansbay, ageray isyay ayay eansmay otay anyay end-—thatyay endyay eingbay iolencevay. 
 Ethay  Athpay ofyay ethay  Erserkerbay isyay ayay athpay ofyay untrammeledyay uryfay, ickslay withyay oodblay. 
 Asyay youyay enteryay ethay erserker’sbay ageray, youyay illthray inyay ethay aoschay ofyay attlebay, eedlesshay ofyay youryay ownyay ealthhay oryay well-beingyay. Enzyfray Artingstay whenyay youyay oosechay isthay athpay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay ancay ogay intoyay ayay enzyfray whenyay youyay ageray. 
 Ifyay youyay oday osay, orfay ethay urationday ofyay youryay ageray youyay ancay akemay ayay inglesay eleemay weaponyay attackyay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay afteryay isthay oneyay. 
 Whenyay youryay ageray endsyay, youyay uffersay oneyay evellay ofyay exhaustionyay (asyay escribedday inyay appendixyay Ayay). Indlessmay  Ageray Eginningbay atyay 6thay evellay, youyay an’tcay ebay armedchay oryay ightenedfray whileyay agingray. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay armedchay oryay ightenedfray whenyay youyay enteryay youryay ageray, ethay effectyay isyay uspendedsay orfay ethay urationday ofyay ethay ageray. Intimidatingyay  Esencepray Eginningbay atyay 10thay evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ightenfray omeonesay withyay youryay enacingmay esencepray. Whenyay youyay oday osay, oosechay oneyay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray ancay eesay oryay earhay youyay, ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray (DCay equalyay otay 8 + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Arismachay odifiermay) oryay ebay ightenedfray ofyay youyay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
eaturecray untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
 Isthay effectyay endsyay ifyay ethay eaturecray endsyay itsyay urntay outyay ofyay inelay ofyay ightsay oryay oremay anthay 60 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay. Ifyay ethay eaturecray ucceedssay onyay itsyay avingsay owthray, youyay an'tcay useyay isthay eaturefay onyay atthay eaturecray againyay orfay 24 ourshay. Etaliationray Artingstay atyay 14thay evellay, whenyay youyay aketay amageday omfray ayay eaturecray atthay isyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay akemay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay againstyay atthay eaturecray. Athpay ofyay ethay  Otemtay  Warrioryay Ethay  Athpay ofyay ethay  Otemtay  Warrioryay isyay ayay iritualspay ourneyjay, asyay ethay arbarianbay acceptsyay ayay iritspay animalyay asyay uidegay, otectorpray, andyay inspirationyay. 
 Inyay attlebay, youryay otemtay iritspay illsfay youyay withyay upernaturalsay ightmay, addingyay agicalmay uelfay otay youryay arbarianbay ageray. Ostmay arbarianbay ibestray onsidercay ayay otemtay animalyay otay ebay inkay otay ayay articularpay anclay. 
 Inyay uchsay asescay, ityay isyay unusualyay orfay anyay individualyay otay avehay oremay anthay oneyay otemtay animalyay iritspay, oughthay exceptionsyay existyay. Iritspay  Eekersay Yoursyay isyay ayay athpay atthay eekssay attunementyay withyay ethay aturalnay worldyay, ivinggay youyay ayay inshipkay withyay eastsbay. 
 Atyay 3rday evellay whenyay youyay adoptyay isthay athpay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay astcay ethay eastbay ensesay andyay eakspay withyay animalsyay ellsspay, utbay onlyyay asyay itualsray, asyay escribedday inyay apterchay 10. Otemtay  Iritspay Atyay 3rday evellay, whenyay youyay adoptyay isthay athpay, youyay oosechay ayay otemtay iritspay andyay aingay itsyay eaturefay. 
 Youyay ustmay akemay oryay acquireyay ayay ysicalphay otemtay objectyay- anyay amuletyay oryay imilarsay adornment—thatyay incorporatesyay urfay oryay eathersfay, awsclay, eethtay, oryay onesbay ofyay ethay otemtay animalyay. 
 Atyay youryay optionyay, youyay alsoyay aingay inormay ysicalphay attributesyay atthay areyay eminiscentray ofyay youryay otemtay iritspay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay avehay ayay earbay otemtay iritspay, youyay ightmay ebay unusuallyyay airyhay andyay ickthay- innedskay, oryay ifyay youryay otemtay isyay ethay eagleyay, youryay eyesyay urntay ightbray yellowyay. Youryay otemtay animalyay ightmay ebay anyay animalyay elatedray otay osethay istedlay erehay utbay oremay appropriateyay otay youryay omelandhay. Orfay exampleyay, youyay ouldcay oosechay ayay awkhay oryay ulturevay inyay aceplay ofyay anyay eagleyay. Earbay. 
 Whileyay agingray, youyay avehay esistanceray otay allyay amageday exceptyay ychicpsay amageday. 
 Ethay iritspay ofyay ethay earbay akesmay youyay oughtay enoughyay otay andstay upyay otay anyyay unishmentpay. Eagleyay. 
 Whileyay you'reyay agingray andyay aren’tyay wearingyay eavyhay armoryay, otheryay eaturescray avehay isadvantageday onyay opportunityyay attackyay ollsray againstyay youyay, andyay youyay ancay useyay ethay  Ashday actionyay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. 
 Ethay iritspay ofyay ethay eagleyay akesmay youyay intoyay ayay edatorpray whoyay ancay weaveyay oughthray ethay ayfray withyay easeyay. Wolfyay,  Whileyay you'reyay agingray, youryay iendsfray avehay advantageyay onyay eleemay attackyay ollsray againstyay anyyay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay atthay isyay ostilehay otay youyay. 
 Ethay iritspay ofyay ethay wolfyay akesmay youyay ayay eaderlay ofyay untershay. Aspectyay ofyay ethay  Eastbay Atyay 6thay evellay, youyay aingay ayay agicalmay enefitbay asedbay onyay ethay otemtay animalyay ofyay youryay oicechay. 
 Youyay ancay oosechay ethay amesay animalyay youyay electedsay atyay 3rday evellay oryay ayay ifferentday oneyay. Earbay. 
 Youyay aingay ethay ightmay ofyay ayay earbay. 
 Youryay arryingcay apacitycay (includingyay aximummay oadlay andyay aximummay iftlay) isyay oubledday, andyay youyay avehay advantageyay onyay  Engthstray eckschay ademay otay ushpay, ullpay, iftlay, oryay eakbray objectsyay. Eagleyay. 
 Youyay aingay ethay eyesightyay ofyay anyay eagleyay. 
 Youyay ancay eesay upyay otay 1 ilemay awayyay withyay onay ifficultyday, ableyay otay iscernday evenyay inefay etailsday asyay oughthay ookinglay atyay omethingsay onay oremay anthay 100 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay. 
 Additionallyyay, imday ightlay oesn'tday imposeyay isadvantageday onyay youryay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay. Wolfyay,  Youyay aingay ethay untinghay ensibilitiessay ofyay ayay wolfyay. 
 Youyay ancay acktray otheryay eaturescray whileyay avelingtray atyay ayay astfay acepay, andyay youyay ancay ovemay ealthilystay whileyay avelingtray atyay ayay ormalnay acepay (eesay apterchay 8 orfay ulesray onyay aveltray acepay). Iritspay  Walkeryay Atyay 10thay evellay, youyay ancay astcay ethay ommunecay withyay aturenay ellspay, utbay onlyyay asyay ayay itualray. 
 Whenyay youyay oday osay, ayay iritualspay ersionvay ofyay oneyay ofyay ethay animalsyay youyay osechay orfay  Otemtay  Iritspay oryay  Aspectyay ofyay ethay  Eastbay appearsyay otay youyay otay onveycay ethay informationyay youyay eeksay. Otemictay  Attunementyay Atyay 14thay evellay, youyay aingay ayay agicalmay enefitbay asedbay onyay ayay otemtay animalyay ofyay youryay oicechay. 
 Youyay ancay oosechay ethay amesay animalyay youyay electedsay eviouslypray oryay ayay ifferentday oneyay. Earbay,  Whileyay you’reyay agingray, anyyay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay at’sthay ostilehay otay youyay ashay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay argetstay otheryay anthay youyay oryay anotheryay aracterchay withyay isthay eaturefay. 
 Anyay enemyyay isyay immuneyay otay isthay effectyay ifyay ityay an’tcay eesay oryay earhay youyay oryay ifyay ityay an’tcay ebay ightenedfray. Eagleyay. 
 Whileyay agingray, youyay avehay ayay yingflay eedspay equalyay otay youryay urrentcay walkingyay eedspay. 
 Isthay enefitbay worksyay onlyyay inyay ortshay urstsbay; youyay allfay ifyay youyay endyay youryay urntay inyay ethay airyay andyay othingnay elseyay isyay oldinghay youyay aloftyay. Wolfyay. 
 Inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay, wordsyay andyay usicmay areyay otnay ustjay ibrationsvay ofyay airyay, utbay ocalizationsvay withyay owerpay allyay eirthay ownyay. 
 Ethay ardbay isyay ayay astermay ofyay ongsay, eechspay, andyay ethay agicmay eythay ontaincay. 
 Ardsbay aysay atthay ethay ultiversemay wasyay okenspay intoyay existenceyay, atthay ethay wordsyay ofyay ethay odsgay avegay ityay apeshay, andyay atthay echoesyay ofyay esethay imordialpray  Wordsyay ofyay  Eationcray illstay esoundray oughoutthray ethay osmoscay. 
 Ethay usicmay ofyay ardsbay isyay anyay attemptyay otay atchsnay andyay arnesshay osethay echoesyay, ubtlysay wovenyay intoyay eirthay ellsspay andyay owerspay. Ethay eatestgray engthstray ofyay ardsbay isyay eirthay eershay ersatilityvay. 
 Anymay ardsbay eferpray otay ickstay otay ethay idelinessay inyay ombatcay, usingyay eirthay agicmay otay inspireyay eirthay alliesyay andyay inderhay eirthay oesfay omfray ayay istanceday. 
 Utbay ardsbay areyay apablecay ofyay efendingday emselvesthay inyay eleemay ifyay ecessarynay, usingyay eirthay agicmay otay olsterbay eirthay wordssay andyay armoryay. 
 Eirthay ellsspay eanlay owardtay armschay andyay illusionsyay atherray anthay atantlyblay estructiveday ellsspay. 
 Eythay avehay ayay wide-rangingyay owledgeknay ofyay anymay ubjectssay andyay ayay aturalnay aptitudeyay atthay etslay emthay oday almostyay anythingyay wellyay. 
 Ardsbay ecomebay astersmay ofyay ethay alentstay eythay etsay eirthay indsmay otay erfectingpay, omfray usicalmay erformancepay otay esotericyay owledgeknay. Earninglay omfray  Experienceyay Uetray ardsbay areyay otnay ommoncay inyay ethay worldyay. 
 Otnay everyyay instrelmay ingingsay inyay ayay averntay oryay esterjay avortingcay inyay ayay oyalray ourtcay isyay ayay ardbay. 
 Iscoveringday ethay agicmay iddenhay inyay usicmay equiresray ardhay udystay andyay omesay easuremay ofyay aturalnay alenttay atthay ostmay oubadourstray andyay ongleursjay acklay. 
 Ityay ancay ebay ardhay otay otspay ethay ifferenceday etweenbay esethay erformerspay andyay uetray ardsbay, oughthay. 
Ayay ard’sbay ifelay isyay entspay wanderingyay acrossyay ethay andlay atheringgay orelay, ellingtay oriesstay, andyay ivinglay onyay ethay atitudegray ofyay audiencesyay, uchmay ikelay anyyay otheryay entertaineryay. 
 Utbay ayay epthday ofyay owledgeknay, ayay evellay ofyay usicalmay illskay, andyay ayay ouchtay ofyay agicmay etsay ardsbay apartyay omfray eirthay ellowsfay. Onlyyay arelyray oday ardsbay ettlesay inyay oneyay aceplay orfay onglay, andyay eirthay aturalnay esireday otay avel—totray indfay ewnay alestay otay elltay, ewnay illsskay otay earnlay, andyay ewnay iscoveriesday eyondbay ethay orizon—makeshay anyay adventuringyay areercay ayay aturalnay allingcay. 
 Everyyay adventureyay isyay anyay opportunityyay otay earnlay, acticepray ayay arietyvay ofyay illsskay, enteryay ong-forgottenlay ombstay, iscoverday ostlay Ardbay Umminghay asyay eshay acestray erhay ingersfay overyay anyay ancientyay onumentmay inyay ayay ong-forgottenlay uinray, ayay alf-elfhay inyay uggedray eatherslay indsfay owledgeknay ingingspray intoyay erhay indmay, onjuredcay orthfay ybay ethay agicmay ofyay erhay ong—knowledgesay ofyay ethay eoplepay whoyay onstructedcay ethay onumentmay andyay ethay ythicmay agasay ityay epicts.Aday ernstay umanhay warrioryay angsbay ishay wordsay ythmicallyrhay againstyay ishay alescay ailmay, ettingsay ethay empotay orfay ishay waryay antchay andyay exhortingyay ishay ompanionscay otay averybray andyay eroismhay. 
worksyay ofyay agicmay, ecipherday oldyay omestay, aveltray otay angestray acesplay, oryay encounteryay exoticyay eaturescray. 
 Ardsbay ovelay otay accompanyyay eroeshay otay witnessyay eirthay eedsday irsthandfay. 
Ayay ardbay whoyay ancay elltay anyay awe-inspiringyay orystay omfray ersonalpay experienceyay earnsyay enownray amongyay otheryay ardsbay. 
 Indeedyay, afteryay ellingtay osay anymay oriesstay aboutyay eroeshay accomplishingyay ightymay eedsday, anymay ardsbay aketay esethay emesthay otay earthay andyay assumeyay eroichay olesray emselvesthay. Oficienciespray Armoryay:  Ightlay armoryay Weaponsyay:  Implesay weaponsyay, andhay ossbowscray, ongswordslay, apiersray, ortswordsshay  Oolstay:  Eethray usicalmay instrumentsyay ofyay youryay oicechay Avingsay  Owsthray:  Exterityday,  Arismachay  Illsskay:  Oosechay anyyay eethray Eatingcray ayay  Ardbay Ardsbay ivethray onyay oriesstay, whetheryay osethay oriesstay areyay uetray oryay otnay. 
 Youryay aracter’schay ackgroundbay andyay otivationsmay areyay otnay asyay importantyay asyay ethay oriesstay atthay ehay oryay eshay ellstay aboutyay emthay. 
 Erhapspay youyay adhay ayay ecuresay andyay undanemay ildhoodchay. 
 Ere’sthay onay oodgay orystay otay ebay oldtay aboutyay atthay, osay youyay ightmay aintpay yourselfyay asyay anyay orphanyay aisedray ybay ayay aghay inyay ayay ismalday wampsay. 
 Oryay youryay ildhoodchay ightmay ebay worthyyay ofyay ayay orystay. 
 Omesay ardsbay acquireyay eirthay agicalmay usicmay oughthray extraordinaryyay eansmay, includingyay ethay inspirationyay ofyay eyfay oryay otheryay upernaturalsay eaturescray. Idday youyay ervesay anyay apprenticeshipyay, udyingstay underyay ayay astermay, ollowingfay ethay oremay experiencedyay ardbay untilyay youyay wereyay eadyray otay ikestray outyay onyay youryay ownyay?  Oryay idday youyay attendyay ayay ollegecay whereyay youyay udiedstay ardicbay orelay andyay acticedpray youryay usicalmay agicmay?  Erhapspay youyay wereyay ayay youngyay unawayray oryay orphanyay, efriendedbay ybay ayay wanderingyay ardbay whoyay ecamebay youryay entormay. 
 Oryay youyay ightmay avehay eenbay ayay oiledspay oblenay ildchay utoredtay ybay ayay astermay. 
 Erhapspay youyay umbledstay intoyay ethay utchesclay ofyay ayay aghay, akingmay ayay argainbay orfay ayay usicalmay iftgay inyay additionyay otay youryay ifelay andyay eedomfray, utbay atyay whatyay ostcay? Equipmentyay Youyay artstay withyay ethay ollowingfay equipmentyay, inyay additionyay otay ethay equipmentyay antedgray ybay youryay ackgroundbay:• (ayay) ayay apierray, (bay) ayay ongswordlay, oryay (cay) anyyay implesay weaponyay• (ayay) ayay iplomat’sday ackpay oryay (bay) anyay entertainer'syay ackpay• (ayay) ayay utelay oryay (bay) anyyay otheryay usicalmay instrumentyay•  Eatherlay armoryay andyay ayay aggerday Ellcastingspay Youyay avehay earnedlay otay untangleyay andyay eshaperay ethay abricfay ofyay ealityray inyay armonyhay withyay youryay wishesyay andyay usicmay. 
 Youryay ellsspay areyay artpay ofyay youryay astvay epertoireray, agicmay atthay youyay ancay unetay otay ifferentday ituationssay. 
 Eesay apterchay 10 orfay ethay eneralgay ulesray ofyay ellcastingspay andyay apterchay 11 orfay ethay ardbay ellspay istlay. Antripscay Youyay owknay wotay antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay ardbay ellspay istlay. 
 Youyay earnlay additionalyay ardbay antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay atyay igherhay evelslay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Antripscay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Ardbay abletay. Assclay  Eaturesfay Asyay ayay ardbay, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay assclay eaturesfay. Ithay  Ointspay Ithay  Iceday: 1day8 erpay ardbay evellay Ithay  Ointspay atyay 1stay  Evellay: 8 + youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay  Ithay  Ointspay atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay: 1day8 (oryay 5) + youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay erpay ardbay evellay afteryay 1stay Quickyay  Uildbay Youyay ancay akemay ayay ardbay quicklyyay ybay ollowingfay esethay uggestionssay. 
 Irstfay, Arismachay ouldshay ebay youryay ighesthay abilityyay orescay, ollowedfay ybay  Exterityday. Econdsay, oosechay ethay entertaineryay ackgroundbay. 
 Ellspay  Otsslay Ethay  Ardbay abletay owsshay owhay anymay ellspay otsslay youyay avehay otay astcay youryay ellsspay ofyay 1stay evellay andyay igherhay. 
 Otay astcay oneyay ofyay esethay ellsspay, youyay ustmay expendyay ayay otslay ofyay ethay ell’sspay evellay oryay igherhay. 
 Youyay egainray allyay expendedyay ellspay otsslay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay owknay ethay 1levelstlay ellspay urecay woundsyay andyay avehay ayay 1levelstlay andyay ayay 2levelndlay ellspay otslay availableyay, youyay ancay astcay urecay woundsyay usingyay eitheryay otslay. Ellsspay  Ownknay ofyay 1stay  Evellay andyay  Igherhay Youyay owknay ourfay 1levelstlay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay ardbay ellspay istlay. Ethay  Ellsspay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Ardbay abletay owsshay whenyay youyay earnlay oremay ardbay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay. 
 Eachyay ofyay esethay ellsspay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay, asyay ownshay onyay ethay abletay. 
 Orfay instanceyay, whenyay youyay eachray 3rday evellay inyay isthay assclay, youyay ancay earnlay oneyay ewnay ellspay ofyay 1stay oryay 2nday evellay. Additionallyyay, whenyay youyay aingay ayay evellay inyay isthay assclay, youyay ancay oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ardbay ellsspay youyay owknay andyay eplaceray ityay withyay anotheryay ellspay omfray ethay ardbay ellspay istlay, whichyay alsoyay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay. Ellcastingspay  Abilityyay Arismachay isyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay youryay ardbay ellsspay. 
 Youryay agicmay omescay omfray ethay earthay andyay oulsay youyay ourpay intoyay ethay erformancepay ofyay youryay usicmay oryay orationyay. Youyay useyay youryay  Arismachay wheneveryay ayay ellspay efersray otay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, youyay useyay youryay  Arismamodifierchay whenyay ettingsay ethay avingsay owthray DCay orfay ayay ardbay ellspay youyay astcay andyay whenyay akingmay anyay attackyay ollray withyay oneyay. Ellspay avesay DCay = 8 + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Arismachay odifiermay Ellspay attackyay odifiermay = youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Arismachay odifiermay Itualray  Astingcay Youyay ancay astcay anyyay ardbay ellspay youyay owknay asyay ayay itualray ifyay atthay ellspay ashay ethay itualray agtay. Ellcastingspay  Ocusfay Youyay ancay useyay ayay usicalmay instrumentyay (oundfay inyay apterchay 5) asyay ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay orfay youryay ardbay ellsspay. Ardicbay  Inspirationyay Youyay ancay inspireyay othersyay oughthray irringstay wordsyay oryay usicmay. 
 Otay oday osay, youyay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay otay oosechay oneyay eaturecray otheryay anthay yourselfyay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay whoyay ancay earhay youyay. 
 Atthay eaturecray ainsgay oneyay  Ardicbay  Inspirationyay ieday, ayay day6. Onceyay withinyay ethay extnay 10 inutesmay, ethay eaturecray ancay ollray ethay ieday andyay addyay ethay umbernay olledray otay oneyay abilityyay eckchay, attackyay ollray, oryay avingsay owthray ityay akesmay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ancay waityay untilyay afteryay ityay ollsray ethay day20 eforebay ecidingday otay useyay ethay  Ardicbay  Inspirationyay ieday, utbay ustmay ecideday eforebay ethay DMay ayssay whetheryay ethay ollray ucceedssay oryay ailsfay. 
 Onceyay ethay  Ardicbay  Inspirationyay ieday isyay olledray, ityay isyay ostlay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay isthay eaturefay ayay umbernay ofyay imestay equalyay otay youryay  Arismachay odifiermay (ayay inimummay ofyay onceyay). 
 Youyay egainray anyyay expendedyay usesyay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Youryay  Ardicbay  Inspirationyay ieday angeschay whenyay youyay eachray ertaincay evelslay inyay isthay assclay. 
 Ethay ieday ecomesbay ayay day8 atyay 5thay evellay, ayay day10 atyay 10thay evellay, andyay ayay dlay2 atyay 15thay evellay. Ackjay ofyay  Allyay  Adestray Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay addyay alfhay youryay oficiencypray onusbay, oundedray ownday, otay anyyay abilityyay eckchay youyay akemay atthay oesn’tday alreadyyay includeyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay. Ongsay ofyay  Estray Eginningbay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay useyay oothingsay usicmay oryay orationyay otay elphay evitalizeray youryay woundedyay alliesyay uringday ayay ortshay estray. 
 Ifyay youyay oryay anyyay iendlyfray eaturescray whoyay ancay earhay youryay erformancepay egainray ithay ointspay atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay ortshay estray, eachyay ofyay osethay eaturescray egainsray anyay extrayay 1day6 ithay ointspay. Ethay extrayay ithay ointspay increaseyay whenyay youyay eachray ertaincay evelslay inyay isthay assclay: otay 1day8 atyay 9thay evellay, otay 1day10 atyay 13thay evellay, andyay otay 1day12 atyay 17thay evellay. Ardbay  Ollegecay Atyay 3rday evellay, youyay elveday intoyay ethay advancedyay echniquestay ofyay ayay ardbay ollegecay ofyay youryay oicechay: ethay  Ollegecay ofyay  Orelay oryay ethay  Ollegecay ofyay  Alorvay, othbay etailedday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay escriptionday. 
 Youryay oicechay antsgray youyay eaturesfay atyay 3rday evellay andyay againyay atyay 6thay andyay 14thay evellay. Expertiseyay  Atyay 3rday evellay, oosechay wotay ofyay youryay illskay oficienciespray. 
 Youryay oficiencypray onusbay isyay oubledday orfay anyyay abilityyay eckchay youyay akemay atthay usesyay eitheryay ofyay ethay osenchay oficienciespray. Atyay 10thay evellay, youyay ancay oosechay anotheryay wotay illskay oficienciespray otay aingay isthay enefitbay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay Whenyay youyay eachray 4thay evellay, andyay againyay atyay 8thay, 12thay, 16thay, andyay 19thay evellay, youyay ancay increaseyay oneyay abilityyay orescay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 2, oryay youyay ancay increaseyay wotay abilityyay oresscay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 1. 
 Asyay ormalnay, youyay an’tcay increaseyay anyay abilityyay orescay aboveyay 20 usingyay isthay eaturefay. Ontfay ofyay  Inspirationyay Eginningbay whenyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay, youyay egainray allyay ofyay youryay expendedyay usesyay ofyay  Ardicbay  Inspirationyay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Ountercharmcay Atyay 6thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay useyay usicalmay otesnay oryay wordsyay ofyay owerpay otay isruptday ind-influencingmay effectsyay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay artstay ayay erformancepay atthay astslay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
 Uringday atthay imetay, youyay andyay anyyay iendlyfray eaturescray withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay avehay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay eingbay ightenedfray oryay armed.Achay eaturecray ustmay ebay ableyay otay earhay youyay otay aingay isthay enefitbay. 
 Ethay erformancepay endsyay earlyyay ifyay youyay areyay incapacitatedyay oryay ilencedsay oryay ifyay youyay oluntarilyvay endyay ityay (onay actionyay equiredray). Agicalmay  Ecretssay Ybay 10thay evellay, youyay avehay underedplay agicalmay owledgeknay omfray ayay wideyay ectrumspay ofyay isciplinesday. 
 Oosechay wotay ellsspay omfray anyyay assclay, includingyay isthay oneyay. 
Ayay ellspay youyay oosechay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay youyay ancay astcay, asyay ownshay onyay ethay  Ardbay abletay, oryay ayay antripcay. Ethay osenchay ellsspay ountcay asyay ardbay ellsspay orfay youyay andyay areyay includedyay inyay ethay umbernay inyay ethay  Ellsspay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Ardbay abletay. Youyay earnlay wotay additionalyay ellsspay omfray anyyay assclay atyay 14thay evellay andyay againyay atyay 18thay evellay. Uperiorsay  Inspirationyay Atyay 20thay evellay, whenyay youyay ollray initiativeyay andyay avehay onay usesyay ofyay  Ardicbay  Inspirationyay eftlay, youyay egainray oneyay useyay. Ardbay  Ollegescay Ethay wayyay ofyay ayay ardbay isyay egariousgray. 
 Ardsbay eeksay eachyay otheryay outyay otay wapsay ongssay andyay oriesstay, oastbay ofyay eirthay accomplishmentsyay, andyay areshay eirthay owledgeknay. 
 Ardsbay ormfay ooselay associationsyay, whichyay eythay allcay ollegescay, otay acilitatefay eirthay atheringsgay andyay eservepray eirthay aditionstray. Ollegecay ofyay  Orelay  Ardsbay ofyay ethay  Ollegecay ofyay  Orelay owknay omethingsay aboutyay ostmay ingsthay, ollectingcay itsbay ofyay owledgeknay omfray ourcessay asyay iverseday asyay olarlyschay omestay andyay easantpay alestay. 
 Whetheryay ingingsay olkfay alladsbay inyay avernstay oryay elaborateyay ompositionscay inyay oyalray ourtscay, esethay ardsbay useyay eirthay iftsgay otay oldhay audiencesyay ellboundspay. 
 Whenyay ethay applauseyay iesday ownday, ethay audienceyay embersmay ightmay indfay emselvesthay questioningyay everythingyay eythay eldhay otay ebay uetray, omfray eirthay aithfay inyay ethay iesthoodpray ofyay ethay ocallay empletay otay eirthay oyaltylay otay ethay ingkay. Ethay oyaltylay ofyay esethay ardsbay ieslay inyay ethay ursuitpay ofyay eautybay andyay uthtray, otnay inyay ealtyfay otay ayay onarchmay oryay ollowingfay ethay enetstay ofyay ayay eityday. 
Ayay oblenay whoyay eepskay uchsay ayay ardbay asyay ayay eraldhay oryay advisoryay owsknay atthay ethay ardbay wouldyay atherray ebay onesthay anthay oliticpay. Ethay ollege’scay embersmay athergay inyay ibrarieslay andyay ometimessay inyay actualyay ollegescay, ompletecay withyay assroomsclay andyay ormitoriesday, otay areshay eirthay orelay withyay oneyay anotheryay. 
 Eythay alsoyay eetmay atyay estivalsfay oryay affairsyay ofyay atestay, whereyay eythay ancay exposeyay orruptioncay, unravelyay ieslay, andyay okepay unfay atyay elfsay- importantyay iguresfay ofyay authorityyay. Onusbay  Oficienciespray Whenyay youyay oinjay ethay  Ollegecay ofyay  Orelay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay aingay oficiencypray withyay eethray illsskay ofyay youryay oicechay. Uttingcay  Wordsyay Alsoyay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay earnlay owhay otay useyay youryay wityay otay istractday, onfusecay, andyay otherwiseyay apsay ethay onfidencecay andyay ompetencecay ofyay othersyay. 
 Whenyay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay akesmay anyay attackyay ollray, anyay abilityyay eckchay, oryay ayay amageday ollray, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay expendyay oneyay ofyay youryay usesyay ofyay  Ardicbay  Inspirationyay, ollingray ayay  Ardicbay  Inspirationyay ieday andyay ubtractingsay ethay umbernay olledray omfray ethay eature’scray ollray. 
eckchay ucceedssay oryay ailsfay, oryay eforebay ethay eaturecray ealsday itsyay amageday. 
 Ethay eaturecray isyay immuneyay ifyay ityay an’tcay earhay youyay oryay ifyay it’syay immuneyay otay eingbay armedchay. Additionalyay  Agicalmay  Ecretssay Atyay 6thay evellay, youyay earnlay wotay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray anyyay assclay. 
Ayay ellspay youyay oosechay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay youyay ancay astcay, asyay ownshay onyay ethay  Ardbay abletay, oryay ayay antripcay. 
 Ethay osenchay ellsspay ountcay asyay ardbay ellsspay orfay youyay utbay on’tday ountcay againstyay ethay umbernay ofyay ardbay ellsspay youyay owknay. Eerlesspay  Illskay Artingstay atyay 14thay evellay, whenyay youyay akemay anyay abilityyay eckchay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay useyay ofyay  Ardicbay  Inspirationyay. 
 Ollray ayay  Ardicbay  Inspirationyay ieday andyay addyay ethay umbernay olledray otay youryay abilityyay eckchay. 
 Youyay ancay oosechay otay oday osay afteryay youyay oilray ethay ieday orfay ethay abilityyay eckchay, utbay eforebay ethay DMay ellstay youyay whetheryay youyay ucceedsay oryay ailfay. Ollegecay ofyay  Alorvay Ardsbay ofyay ethay  Ollegecay ofyay  Alorvay areyay aringday aldsskay whoseyay alestay eepkay aliveyay ethay emorymay ofyay ethay eatgray eroeshay ofyay ethay astpay, andyay erebythay inspireyay ayay ewnay enerationgay ofyay eroeshay. 
 Esethay ardsbay athergay inyay eadmay allshay oryay aroundyay eatgray onfiresbay otay ingsay ethay eedsday ofyay ethay ightymay, othbay astpay andyay esentpray. 
 Eythay aveltray ethay andlay otay witnessyay eatgray eventsyay irsthandfay andyay otay ensureyay atthay ethay emorymay ofyay osethay eventsyay oesn’tday asspay omfray ethay worldyay. 
 Withyay eirsongsthay, eythay inspireyay othersyay otay eachray ethay amesay eightshay ofyay accomplishmentyay asyay ethay eroeshay ofyay oldyay. Onusbay  Oficienciespray Whenyay youyay oinjay ethay  Ollegecay ofyay  Alorvay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay aingay oficiencypray withyay ediummay armoryay, ieldsshay, andyay artialmay weaponsyay. Ombatcay  Inspirationyay Alsoyay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay earnlay otay inspireyay othersyay inyay attle.Abay eaturecray atthay ashay ayay  Ardicbay  Inspirationyay ieday omfray youyay ancay ollray atthay ieday andyay addyay ethay umbernay olledray otay ayay weaponyay amageday ollray ityay ustjay ademay. 
 Alternativelyyay, whenyay anyay attackyay ollray isyay ademay againstyay ethay eaturecray, ityay ancay useyay itsyay eactionray otay ollray ethay  Ardicbay  Inspirationyay ieday andyay addyay ethay umbernay olledray otay itsyay ACyay againstyay atthay attackyay, afteryay eeingsay ethay ollray utbay eforebay owingknay whetheryay ityay itshay oryay issesmay. Extrayay  Attackyay Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, youyay ancay attackyay wicetay, insteadyay ofyay onceyay, wheneveryay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. Attlebay  Agicmay Atyay 14thay evellay, youyay avehay asteredmay ethay artyay ofyay weavingyay ellcastingspay andyay weaponyay useyay intoyay ayay inglesay armonioushay actyay. 
 Armsyay andyay eyesyay upraisedyay owardtay ethay unsay andyay ayay ayerpray onyay ishay ipslay, anyay elfyay eginsbay otay owglay withyay anyay inneryay ightlay atthay illsspay outyay otay ealhay ishay attle-wornbay ompanionscay. Antingchay ayay ongsay ofyay oryglay, ayay warfday wingssay ishay axeyay inyay wideyay wathssay otay utcay oughthray ethay anksray ofyay orcsyay arrayedyay againstyay imhay, outingshay aisepray otay ethay odsgay withyay everyyay oe’sfay allfay. Allingcay ownday ayay ursecay uponyay ethay orcesfay ofyay undeathyay, ayay umanhay iftslay erhay olyhay ymbolsay asyay ightlay ourspay omfray ityay otay ivedray ackbay ethay ombieszay owdingcray inyay onyay erhay ompanionscay. Ericsclay areyay intermediariesyay etweenbay ethay ortalmay worldyay andyay ethay istantday anesplay ofyay ethay odsgay. 
 Asyay ariedvay asyay ethay odsgay eythay ervesay, ericsclay ivestray otay embodyyay ethay andiworkhay ofyay eirthay eitiesday. 
 Onay ordinaryyay iestpray, ayay ericclay isyay imbuedyay withyay ivineday agicmay. Ealershay andyay  Warriorsyay Ivineday agicmay, asyay ethay amenay uggestssay, isyay ethay owerpay ofyay ethay odsgay, owingflay omfray emthay intoyay ethay worldyay. 
 Ericsclay areyay onduitscay orfay atthay owerpay, anifestingmay ityay asyay iraculousmay effectsyay. 
 Ethay odsgay on’tday antgray isthay owerpay otay everyoneyay whoyay  eekssay ityay, utbay onlyyay otay osethay osenchay otay ulfillfay ayay ighhay allingcay. Arnessinghay ivineday agicmay oesn’tday elyray onyay udystay oryay ainingtray. 
Ayay ericclay ightmay earnlay ormulaicfay ayerspray andyay ancientyay itesray, utbay ethay abilityyay otay astcay ericclay ellsspay eliesray onyay evotionday andyay anyay intuitiveyay ensesay ofyay ayay eity’sday wishesyay. Ericsclay ombinecay ethay elpfulhay agicmay ofyay ealinghay andyay inspiringyay eirthay alliesyay withyay ellsspay atthay armhay andyay inderhay oesfay. 
 Eythay ancay ovokepray aweyay andyay eaddray, aylay ursescay ofyay agueplay oryay oisonpay, andyay evenyay allcay ownday amesflay omfray eavenhay otay onsumecay eirthay enemiesyay. 
 Orfay osethay evildoersyay whoyay willyay enefitbay ostmay omfray ayay acemay otay ethay eadhay, ericsclay ependday onyay eirthay ombatcay ainingtray otay etlay emthay wadeyay intoyay eleemay withyay ethay owerpay ofyay ethay odsgay onyay eirthay idesay. Ivineday  Agentsyay Otnay everyyay acolyteyay oryay officiantyay atyay ayay empletay oryay ineshray isyay ayay ericclay. 
 Omesay iestspray areyay alledcay otay ayay implesay ifelay ofyay empletay ervicesay, arryingcay outyay eirthay odsgay’ willyay oughthray ayerpray andyay acrificesay, otnay ybay agicmay andyay engthstray ofyay armsyay. 
 Inyay omesay itiescay, iesthoodpray amountsyay otay ayay oliticalpay officeyay, iewedvay asyay ayay eppingstay onestay otay igherhay ositionspay ofyay authorityyay andyay involvingyay onay ommunioncay withyay ayay odgay atyay allyay. 
 Uetray ericsclay areyay areray inyay ostmay ierarchieshay. Whenyay ayay ericclay akestay upyay anyay adventuringyay ifelay, ityay isyay usuallyyay ecausebay ishay oryay erhay odgay emandsday ityay. 
 Ursuingpay ethay oalsgay ofyay ethay odsgay oftenyay involvesyay avingbray angersday eyondbay ethay wallsyay ofyay ivilizationcay, itingsmay evilyay oryay eekingsay olyhay elicsray inyay ancientyay ombstay. 
eirthay eitiesday’ worshipersyay, whichyay ancay eanmay ightingfay ampagingray orcsyay, egotiatingnay eacepay etweenbay warringyay ationsnay, oryay ealingsay ayay ortalpay atthay wouldyay allowyay ayay emonday incepray otay enteryay ethay worldyay. Ostmay adventuringyay ericsclay aintainmay omesay onnectioncay otay establishedyay emplestay andyay ordersyay ofyay eirthay aithsfay. 
Ayay empletay ightmay askyay orfay ayay eric’sclay aidyay, oryay ayay ighhay iestpray ightmay ebay inyay ayay ositionpay otay emandday ityay. Eatingcray ayay  Ericclay Asyay youyay eatecray ayay ericclay, ethay ostmay importantyay questionyay otay onsidercay isyay whichyay eityday otay ervesay andyay whatyay inciplespray youyay wantyay youryay aracterchay otay embodyyay. 
 Appendixyay Bay includesyay istslay ofyay anymay ofyay ethay odsgay ofyay ethay ultiversemay. 
 Eckchay withyay youryay DMay otay earnlay whichyay eitiesday areyay inyay youryay ampaigncay. Onceyay you’veyay osenchay ayay eityday, onsidercay youryay eric'sclay elationshipray otay atthay odgay. 
 Idday youyay enteryay isthay ervicesay willinglyyay?  Oryay idday ethay odgay oosechay youyay, impellingyay youyay intoyay ervicesay withyay onay egardray orfay youryay wishesyay?  Owhay oday ethay empletay iestspray ofyay youryay aithfay egardray youyay: asyay ayay ampionchay oryay ayay oublemakertray?  Whatyay areyay youryay ultimateyay oalsgay?  Oesday youryay eityday avehay ayay ecialspay asktay inyay indmay orfay youyay?  Oryay areyay youyay ivingstray otay ovepray yourselfyay worthyyay ofyay ayay eatgray questyay? Quickyay  Uildbay Youyay ancay akemay ayay ericclay quicklyyay ybay ollowingfay esethay uggestionssay. 
 Irstfay,  Wisdomyay ouldshay ebay youryay ighesthay abilityyay orescay, ollowedfay ybay  Engthstray oryay  Onstitutioncay. 
 Ellcastingspay Asyay ayay onduitcay orfay ivineday owerpay, youyay ancay astcay ericclay ellsspay. 
 Eesay apterchay 10 orfay ethay eneralgay ulesray ofyay ellcastingspay andyay apterchay 11 orfay ethay ericclay ellspay istlay. Antripscay Atyay 1stay evellay, youyay owknay eethray antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay ericclay ellspay istlay. 
 Youyay earnlay additionalyay ericclay antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay atyay igherhay evelslay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Antripscay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Ericclay abletay. Eparingpray andyay  Astingcay  Ellsspay Ethay  Ericclay abletay owsshay owhay anymay ellspay otsslay youyay avehay otay astcay youryay ellsspay ofyay 1stay evellay andyay igherhay. 
 Otay astcay oneyay ofyay esethay ellsspay, youyay ustmay expendyay ayay otslay ofyay ethay ell’sspay evellay oryay igherhay. 
 Youyay egainray allyay expendedyay ellspay otsslay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Youyay eparepray ethay istlay ofyay ericclay ellsspay atthay areyay availableyay orfay youyay otay astcay, oosingchay omfray ethay ericclay ellspay istlay. 
 Whenyay youyay oday osay, oosechay ayay umbernay ofyay ericclay ellsspay equalyay otay youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay + youryay ericclay evellay (inimummay ofyay oneyay ellspay). 
 Ethay ellsspay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay areyay ayay 3levelrdlay ericclay, youyay avehay ourfay 1levelstlay andyay wotay 2levelndlay ellspay otsslay. 
 Withyay ayay  Wisdomyay ofyay 16, youryay istlay ofyay eparedpray ellsspay ancay includeyay ixsay ellsspay ofyay 1stay oryay 2nday evellay, inyay anyyay ombinationcay. 
 Ifyay youyay eparepray ethay 1levelstlay ellspay urecay woundsyay, youyay ancay astcay ityay usingyay ayay 1levelstlay oryay 2levelndlay otslay. 
 Astingcay ethay ellspay oesn’tday emoveray ityay omfray youryay istlay ofyay eparedpray ellsspay. Youyay ancay angechay youryay istlay ofyay eparedpray ellsspay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. 
 Eparingpray ayay ewnay istlay ofyay ericclay ellsspay equiresray imetay entspay inyay ayerpray andyay editationmay: atyay eastlay 1 inutemay erpay ellspay evellay orfay eachyay ellspay onyay youryay istlay. Ellcastingspay  Abilityyay Wisdomyay isyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay youryay ericclay ellsspay. 
 Ethay owerpay ofyay youryay ellsspay omescay omfray youryay evotionday otay youryay eityday. 
 Youyay useyay youryay  Wisdomyay wheneveryay ayay ericclay ellspay efersray otay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, youyay useyay youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay whenyay ettingsay ethay avingsay owthray DCay orfay ayay ericclay ellspay youyay astcay andyay whenyay akingmay anyay attackyay ollray withyay oneyay. Ellspay avesay DCay = 8 + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay Ellspay attackyay odifiermay = youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay Itualray  Astingcay Youyay ancay astcay ayay ericclay ellspay asyay ayay itualray ifyay atthay ellspay ashay ethay itualray agtay andyay youyay avehay ethay ellspay eparedpray. Ellcastingspay  Ocusfay Youyay ancay useyay ayay olyhay ymbolsay (oundfay inyay apterchay 5) asyay ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay orfay youryay ericclay ellsspay. Ivineday  Omainday Oosechay oneyay omainday elatedray otay youryay eityday:  Owledgeknay,  Ifelay,  Ightlay,  Aturenay,  Empesttay,  Ickerytray, oryay  Waryay. 
 Eachyay omainday isyay etailedday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay escriptionday, andyay eachyay oneyay ovidespray examplesyay ofyay odsgay associatedyay withyay ityay. 
 Youryay oicechay antsgray youyay omainday ellsspay andyay otheryay eaturesfay whenyay youyay oosechay ityay atyay 1stay evellay. 
 Ityay alsoyay antsgray youyay additionalyay waysyay otay useyay  Annelchay  Ivinityday whenyay youyay aingay atthay eaturefay atyay 2nday evellay, andyay additionalyay enefitsbay atyay 6thay, 8thay, andyay 17thay evelslay. Omainday  Ellsspay Eachyay omainday ashay ayay istlay ofyay ells—itsspay omainday ellsspay— atthay youyay aingay atyay ethay ericclay evelslay otednay inyay ethay omainday escriptionday. 
 Onceyay youyay aingay ayay omainday ellspay, youyay alwaysyay avehay ityay eparedpray, andyay ityay oesn’tday ountcay againstyay ethay umbernay ofyay ellsspay youyay ancay eparepray eachyay ayday. Ifyay youyay avehay ayay omainday ellspay atthay oesn’tday appearyay onyay ethay ericclay ellspay istlay, ethay ellspay isyay onethelessnay ayay ericclay ellspay orfay youyay. Annelchay  Ivinityday Atyay 2nday evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay annelchay ivineday energyyay irectlyday omfray youryay eityday, usingyay atthay energyyay otay uelfay agicalmay effectsyay. 
 Youyay artstay withyay wotay uchsay effectsyay:  Urntay  Undeadyay andyay anyay effectyay eterminedday ybay youryay omainday. 
 Omesay omainsday antgray youyay additionalyay effectsyay asyay youyay advanceyay inyay evelslay, asyay otednay inyay ethay omainday escriptionday. Whenyay youyay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday, youyay oosechay whichyay effectyay otay eatecray. 
 Youyay ustmay enthay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray otay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday againyay. Omesay  Annelchay  Ivinityday effectsyay equireray avingsay owsthray. 
youyay ancay useyay ityay eethray imestay etweenbay estsray.
