 Whenyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray, youyay egainray youryay expendedyay usesyay. Annelchay  Ivinityday:  Urntay  Undeadyay  Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay esentpray youryay olyhay ymbolsay andyay eakspay ayay ayerpray ensuringcay ethay undeadyay. 
 Eachyay undeadyay atthay ancay eesay oryay earhay youyay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray ailsfay itsyay avingsay owthray, ityay isyay urnedtay orfay 1 inutemay oryay untilyay ityay akestay anyyay amage.Aday urnedtay eaturecray ustmay endspay itsyay urnstay yingtray otay ovemay asyay arfay awayyay omfray youyay asyay ityay ancay, andyay ityay an’tcay willinglyyay ovemay otay ayay acespay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Ityay alsoyay an’tcay aketay eactionsray. 
 Orfay itsyay actionyay, ityay ancay useyay onlyyay ethay  Ashday actionyay oryay ytray otay escapeyay omfray anyay effectyay atthay eventspray ityay omfray ovingmay. 
 Ifyay ere’sthay owherenay otay ovemay, ethay eaturecray ancay useyay ethay  Odgeday actionyay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay Whenyay youyay eachray 4thay evellay, andyay againyay atyay 8thay, 12thay, 16thay, andyay 19thay evellay, youyay ancay increaseyay oneyay abilityyay orescay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 2, oryay youyay ancay increaseyay wotay abilityyay oresscay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 1. 
 Asyay ormalnay, youyay an’tcay increaseyay anyay abilityyay orescay aboveyay 20 usingyay isthay eaturefay. Estroyday  Undeadyay Artingstay atyay 5thay evellay, whenyay anyay undeadyay ailsfay itsyay avingsay owthray againstyay youryay  Urntay  Undeadyay eaturefay, ethay eaturecray isyay instantlyyay estroyedday ifyay itsyay allengechay atingray isyay atyay oryay elowbay ayay ertaincay esholdthray, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Estroyday  Undeadyay abletay. Estroyday  Undeadyay Ericclay  Evellay Estroysday  Undeadyay ofyay hcRthay1/2 oryay ower8thlay1 oryay ower11thlay2 oryay ower14thlay3 oryay ower17thlay4 oryay owerlay Ivineday  Interventionyay Eginningbay atyay 10thay evellay, youyay ancay allcay onyay youryay eityday otay interveneyay onyay youryay ehalfbay whenyay youryay eednay isyay eatgray. Imploringyay youryay eity’sday aidyay equiresray youyay otay useyay youryay actionyay. 
 Escribeday ethay assistanceyay youyay eeksay, andyay ollray ercentilepay iceday. 
 Ifyay youyay ollray ayay umbernay equalyay otay oryay owerlay anthay youryay ericclay evellay, youryay eityday intervenesyay. 
 Ethay DMay ooseschay ethay aturenay ofyay ethay interventionyay; ethay effectyay ofyay anyyay ericclay ellspay oryay ericclay omainday ellspay wouldyay ebay appropriateyay. Ifyay youryay eityday intervenesyay, youyay an’tcay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay orfay 7 aysday. 
 Otherwiseyay, youyay ancay useyay ityay againyay afteryay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Atyay 20thay evellay, youryay allcay orfay interventionyay ucceedssay automaticallyyay, onay ollray equiredray. Ivineday  Omainsday Inyay ayay antheonpay, everyyay eityday ashay influenceyay overyay ifferentday aspectsyay ofyay ortalmay ifelay andyay ivilizationcay, alledcay ayay eity’sday omainday. 
 Allyay ethay omainsday overyay whichyay ayay eityday ashay influenceyay areyay alledcay ethay eity’sday ortfoliopay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ethay ortfoliopay ofyay ethay  Eekgray odgay  Apolloyay includesyay edomainsthay ofyay  Owledgeknay,  Ifelay, andyay  Ightlay. 
 Asyay ayay ericclay, youyay oosechay oneyay aspectyay ofyay youryay eity’sday ortfoliopay otay emphasizeyay, andyay youyay areyay antedgray owerspay elatedray otay atthay omainday. Youryay oicechay ightmay orrespondcay otay ayay articularpay ectsay edicatedday otay youryay eityday. 
 Apolloyay, orfay exampleyay, ouldcay ebay worshipedyay inyay oneyay egionray asyay  Oebusphay (“adiantray”)  Apolloyay, emphasizingyay ishay influenceyay overyay ethay  Ightlay omainday, andyay inyay ayay ifferentday aceplay asyay  Apolloyay  Acesiusyay (“ealinghay”), emphasizingyay ishay associationyay withyay ethay  Ifelay omainday. 
 Alternativelyyay, youryay oicechay ofyay omainday ouldcay implysay ebay ayay attermay ofyay ersonalpay eferencepray, ethay aspectyay ofyay ethay eityday atthay appealsyay otay youyay ostmay. Eachyay omain’sday escriptionday ivesgay examplesyay ofyay eitiesday whoyay avehay influenceyay overyay atthay omainday. 
 Odsgay areyay includedyay omfray ethay worldsyay ofyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray,  Eyhawkgray,  Agonlancedray, andyay  Eberronyay ampaigncay ettingssay, asyay wellyay asyay omfray ethay  Elticcay,  Eekgray,  Orsenay, andyay  Egyptianyay antheonspay ofyay antiquityyay. Owledgeknay  Omainday Ethay odsgay ofyay owledge—includingknay  Oghmayay,  Occobbay,  Ileangay,  Aureonyay, andyay  Oth—valuethay earninglay andyay understandingyay aboveyay allyay. 
 Omesay eachtay atthay owledgeknay isyay otay ebay atheredgay andyay aredshay inyay ibrarieslay andyay universitiesyay, oryay omotepray ethay acticalpray owledgeknay ofyay aftcray andyay inventionyay. 
 Omesay eitiesday oardhay owledgeknay andyay eepkay itsyay ecretssay otay emselvesthay. 
 Andyay omesay omisepray eirthay ollowersfay atthay eythay willyay aingay emendoustray owerpay ifyay eythay unlockyay ethay ecretssay ofyay ethay ultiversemay. 
 Ollowersfay ofyay esethay odsgay udystay esotericyay orelay, ollectcay oldyay omestay, elveday intoyay ethay ecretsay acesplay ofyay ethay earthyay, andyay earnlay allyay eythay ancay. 
 Omesay odsgay ofyay owledgeknay omotepray ethay acticalpray owledgeknay ofyay aftcray andyay inventionyay, includingyay ithsmay eitiesday ikelay  Ondgay,  Eorxray,  Onataryay,  Oradinmay,  Ephaestushay, andyay  Oibhniugay. Owledgeknay  Omainday  Ellsspay Ericclay  Evellay Ells1stcommandspay, identify3rdauguryyay, uggestion5thnondetectionsay, eakspay withyay ead7tharcaneday eyeyay, onfusion9thlegendcay orelay, yingscray Essingsblay ofyay  Owledgeknay Atyay 1stay evellay, youyay earnlay wotay anguageslay ofyay youryay oicechay. Youyay alsoyay ecomebay oficientpray inyay youryay oicechay ofyay wotay ofyay ethay ollowingfay illsskay:  Arcanayay,  Istoryhay,  Aturenay, oryay  Eligionray. Youryay oficiencypray onusbay isyay oubledday orfay anyyay abilityyay eckchay youyay akemay atthay usesyay eitheryay ofyay osethay illsskay. Annelchay  Ivinityday: Owledgeknay ofyay ethay  Agesyay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday otay aptay intoyay ayay ivineday wellyay ofyay owledgeknay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay oosechay oneyay illskay oryay ooltay. 
 Orfay 10 inutesmay, youyay avehay oficiencypray withyay ethay osenchay illskay oryay ooltay. Annelchay  Ivinityday:  Eadray  Oughtsthay  Atyay 6thay evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday otay eadray ayay eature’scray oughtsthay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, oosechay oneyay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Atthay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray ucceedssay onyay ethay avingsay owthray, youyay an’tcay useyay isthay eaturefay onyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Ifyay ethay eaturecray ailsfay itsyay avesay, youyay ancay eadray itsyay urfacesay oughtsthay (osethay oremostfay inyay itsyay indmay, eflectingray itsyay urrentcay emotionsyay andyay whatyay ityay isyay activelyyay inkingthay aboutyay) whenyay ityay isyay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Isthay effectyay astslay orfay 1 inutemay. Uringday atthay imetay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay endyay isthay effectyay andyay astcay ethay uggestionsay ellspay onyay ethay eaturecray withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay. 
 Ethay argettay automaticallyyay ailsfay itsyay avingsay owthray againstyay ethay ellspay. Otentpay  Ellcastingspay Artingstay atyay 8thay evellay, youyay addyay youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay otay ethay amageday youyay ealday withyay anyyay ericclay antripcay. Isionsvay ofyay ethay  Astpay Artingstay atyay 17thay evellay, youyay ancay allcay upyay isionsvay ofyay ethay astpay atthay elateray otay anyay objectyay youyay oldhay oryay youryay immediateyay urroundingssay. 
 Youyay endspay atyay eastlay 1 inutemay inyay editationmay andyay ayerpray, enthay eceiveray eamlikedray, adowyshay impsesglay ofyay ecentray eventsyay. 
 Youyay ancay editatemay inyay isthay wayyay orfay ayay umbernay ofyay inutesmay equalyay otay youryay  Wisdomyay orescay andyay ustmay aintainmay oncentrationcay uringday atthay imetay, asyay ifyay youyay wereyay astingcay ayay ellspay. Onceyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay, youyay an’tcay useyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Objectyay  Eadingray. 
 Oldinghay anyay objectyay asyay youyay editatemay, youyay ancay eesay isionsvay ofyay ethay object’syay eviouspray owneryay. Afteryay editatingmay orfay 1 inutemay, youyay earnlay owhay ethay owneryay acquiredyay andyay ostlay ethay objectyay, asyay wellyay asyay ethay ostmay ecentray ignificantsay eventyay involvingyay ethay objectyay andyay atthay owneryay. Ifyay ethay objectyay wasyay ownedyay ybay anotheryay eaturecray inyay ethay ecentray astpay (withinyay ayay umbernay ofyay aysday equalyay otay youryay  Wisdomyay orescay), youyay ancay endspay 1 additionalyay inutemay orfay eachyay owneryay otay earnlay ethay amesay informationyay aboutyay atthay eaturecray. Areayay  Eadingray. 
 Asyay youyay editatemay, youyay eesay isionsvay ofyay ecentray eventsyay inyay youryay immediateyay icinityvay (ayay oomray, eetstray, unneltay, earingclay, oryay ethay ikelay, upyay otay ayay 50-ootfay ubecay), oinggay ackbay ayay umbernay ofyay aysday equalyay otay youryay  Wisdomyay orescay. 
 Orfay eachyay inutemay youyay editatemay, youyay earnlay aboutyay oneyay ignificantsay eventyay, eginningbay withyay ethay ostmay ecentray. 
 Ignificantsay eventsyay ypicallytay involveyay owerfulpay emotionsyay, uchsay asyay attlesbay andyay etrayalsbay, arriagesmay andyay urdersmay, irthsbay andyay uneralsfay. 
 Oweverhay, eythay ightmay alsoyay includeyay oremay undanemay eventsyay atthay areyay everthelessnay importantyay inyay youryay urrentcay ituationsay. Ifelay  Omainday  Ethay  Ifelay omainday ocusesfay onyay ethay ibrantvay ositivepay energy—oneyay ofyay ethay undamentalfay orcesfay ofyay ethay universeyay— atthay ustainssay allyay ifelay. 
 Ethay odsgay ofyay ifelay omotepray italityvay andyay ealthhay oughthray ealinghay ethay icksay andyay woundedyay, aringcay orfay osethay inyay eednay, andyay ivingdray awayyay ethay orcesfay ofyay eathday andyay undeathyay. 
 Almostyay anyyay on-evilnay eityday ancay aimclay influenceyay overyay isthay omainday, articularlypay agriculturalyay eitiesday (uchsay asyay  Aunteachay,  Arawaiyay, andyay  Emeterday), unsay odsgay (uchsay asyay  Athanderlay,  Elorpay, andyay  Eray- Orakhtyhay), odsgay Onusbay  Oficiencypray Whenyay youyay oosechay isthay omainday atyay 1stay evellay, youyay aingay oficiencypray withyay eavyhay armoryay. Iscipleday ofyay  Ifelay Alsoyay artingstay atyay 1stay evellay, youryay ealinghay ellsspay areyay oremay effectiveyay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay useyay ayay ellspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay otay estoreray ithay ointspay otay ayay eaturecray, ethay eaturecray egainsray additionalyay ithay ointspay equalyay otay 2 + ethay ell’sspay evellay. Annelchay  Ivinityday:  Eservepray  Ifelay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday otay ealhay ethay adlybay injuredyay. Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay esentpray youryay olyhay ymbolsay andyay evokeyay ealinghay energyyay atthay ancay estoreray ayay umbernay ofyay ithay ointspay equalyay otay ivefay imestay youryay ericclay evellay. 
 Oosechay anyyay eaturescray withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay, andyay ivideday osethay ithay ointspay amongyay emthay. 
 Isthay eaturefay ancay estoreray ayay eaturecray otay onay oremay anthay alfhay ofyay itsyay ithay ointpay aximummay. 
 Youyay an’tcay useyay isthay eaturefay onyay anyay undeadyay oryay ayay onstructcay. Essedblay  Ealerhay Eginningbay atyay 6thay evellay, ethay ealinghay ellsspay youyay astcay onyay othersyay ealhay youyay asyay wellyay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay atthay estoresray ithay ointspay otay ayay eaturecray otheryay anthay youyay, youyay egainray ithay ointspay equalyay otay 2 + ethay ell’sspay evellay. Ivineday  Ikestray Atyay 8thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay infuseyay youryay weaponyay ikesstray withyay ivineday energyyay. 
 Onceyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay ausecay ethay attackyay otay ealday anyay extrayay 1day8 adiantray amageday otay ethay argettay. 
 Whenyay youyay eachray 14thay evellay, ethay extrayay amageday increasesyay otay 2day8. Upremesay  Ealinghay Artingstay atyay 17thay evellay, whenyay youyay wouldyay ormallynay ollray oneyay oryay oremay iceday otay estoreray ithay ointspay withyay ayay ellspay, youyay insteadyay useyay ethay ighesthay umbernay ossiblepay orfay eachyay ieday. 
 Orfay exampleyay, insteadyay ofyay estoringray 2day6 ithay ointspay otay ayay eaturecray, youyay estoreray 12. Ightlay  Omainday Odsgay ofyay ight—includinglay  Elmhay,  Athanderlay,  Oltusphay,  Anchalabray, ethay  Ilversay  Ameflay,  Elenusbay,  Apolloyay, andyay  Eray- Orakhty—promotehay ethay idealsyay ofyay ebirthray andyay enewalray, uthtray, igilancevay, andyay eautybay, oftenyay usingyay ethay ymbolsay ofyay ethay unsay. 
 Onusbay  Antripcay Whenyay youyay oosechay isthay omainday atyay 1stay evellay, youyay aingay ethay ightlay antripcay ifyay youyay on’tday alreadyyay owknay ityay. Wardingyay  Areflay Alsoyay atyay 1stay evellay, youyay ancay interposeyay ivineday ightlay etweenbay yourselfyay andyay anyay attackingyay enemyyay. 
 Whenyay youyay areyay attackedyay ybay ayay eaturecray withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay atthay youyay ancay eesay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay imposeyay isadvantageday onyay ethay attackyay ollray, ausingcay ightlay otay areflay eforebay ethay attackeryay eforebay ityay itshay oryay issesmay. 
 Anyay attackeryay atthay an’tcay ebay indedblay isyay immuneyay otay isthay eaturefay. Youyay ancay useyay isthay eaturefay ayay umbernay ofyay imestay equalyay otay youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay (ayay inimummay ofyay onceyay). 
 Youyay egainray allyay expendedyay usesyay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Annelchay  Ivinityday:  Adianceray ofyay ethay  Awnday Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday otay arnesshay unlightsay, anishingbay arknessday andyay ealingday adiantray amageday otay youryay oesfay. Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay esentpray youryay olyhay ymbolsay, andyay anyyay agicalmay arknessday withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay isyay ispelledday. 
 Additionallyyay, eachyay ostilehay eaturecray withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay adiantray amageday equalyay otay 2day10 + youryay ericclay evellay onyay ayay ailedfay avingsay owthray, andyay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay ashay otaltay overcay omfray youyay isyay otnay affectedyay. Improvedyay  Areflay Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, youyay ancay alsoyay useyay youryay  Wardingyay  Areflay eaturefay whenyay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay attacksyay ayay eaturecray otheryay anthay youyay. Otentpay  Ellcastingspay Artingstay atyay 8thay evellay, youyay addyay youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay otay ethay amageday youyay ealday withyay anyyay ericclay antripcay. Oronacay ofyay  Ightlay Artingstay atyay 17thay evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay activateyay anyay aurayay ofyay unlightsay atthay astslay orfay 1 inutemay oryay untilyay youyay ismissday ityay usingyay anotheryay actionyay. 
 Youyay emityay ightbray ightlay inyay ayay 60-ootfay adiusray andyay imday ightlay 30 eetfay eyondbay atthay. 
 Youryay enemiesyay inyay ethay ightbray ightlay avehay isadvantageday onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay anyyay ellspay atthay ealsday irefay oryay adiantray amageday. Aturenay  Omainday Odsgay ofyay aturenay areyay asyay ariedvay asyay ethay aturalnay worldyay itselfyay, omfray inscrutableyay odsgay ofyay ethay eepday orestsfay (uchsay asyay  Ilvanussay,  Obadyay- Aihay,  Islevchay,  Alinorbay, andyay  Anpay) otay iendlyfray eitiesday associatedyay withyay articularpay ingsspray andyay ovesgray (uchsay asyay  Eldathyay). 
 Uidsdray evereray aturenay asyay ayay wholeyay andyay ightmay ervesay oneyay ofyay esethay eitiesday, acticingpray ysteriousmay itesray andyay ecitingray all-but-forgottenyay ayerspray inyay eirthay ownyay ecretsay onguetay. 
 Utbay anymay ofyay esethay odsgay avehay ericsclay asyay wellyay, ampionschay whoyay aketay ayay oremay activeyay oleray inyay advancingyay ethay interestsyay ofyay ayay articularpay aturenay odgay. 
 Esethay ericsclay ightmay unthay ethay evilyay onstrositiesmay atthay espoilday ethay woodlandsyay, essblay ethay arvesthay ofyay ethay aithfulfay, oryay witheryay ethay opscray ofyay osethay whoyay angeryay eirthay odsgay. Aturenay  Omainday  Ellsspay Ericclay  Evellay Ells1stanimalspay iendshipfray, eakspay withyay animals3rdbarkskinyay, ikespay owth5thplantgray owthgray, windyay wall7thdominateyay eastbay, aspinggray ine9thinsectvay agueplay, eetray idestray Ericclay  Evellay Ells1stburningspay andshay, aeriefay ire3rdflamingfay eresphay, orchingscay ay5thdaylightray, ireball7thguardianfay ofyay aithfay, wallyay ofyay ire9thflamefay ikestray, yingacrossscray ethay yskay. 
 Othersyay areyay irelesstay entinelssay whoseyay eyesyay iercepay everyyay adowshay andyay eesay oughthray everyyay eceptionday. 
 Omesay areyay eitiesday ofyay eautybay andyay artistryyay, whoyay eachtay atthay artyay isyay ayay ehiclevay orfay ethay oul'ssay improvementyay. 
 Acolyteyay ofyay  Aturenay Atyay 1stay evellay, youyay earnlay oneyay uiddray antripcay ofyay youryay oicechay. 
 Youyay alsoyay aingay oficiencypray inyay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay illsskay ofyay youryay oicechay:  Animalyay  Andlinghay,  Aturenay, oryay  Urvivalsay. Onusbay  Oficiencypray Alsoyay atyay 1stay evellay, youyay aingay oficiencypray withyay eavyhay armoryay. Annelchay  Ivinityday:  Armchay  Animalsyay andyay  Antsplay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday otay armchay animalsyay andyay antsplay. Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay esentpray youryay olyhay ymbolsay andyay invokeyay ethay amenay ofyay youryay eityday. 
 Eachyay eastbay oryay antplay eaturecray atthay ancay eesay youyay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray ailsfay itsyay avingsay owthray, ityay isyay armedchay ybay youyay orfay 1 inutemay oryay untilyay ityay akestay amageday. 
 Whileyay ityay isyay armedchay ybay youyay, ityay isyay iendlyfray otay youyay andyay otheryay eaturescray youyay esignateday. Ampenday  Elementsyay Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, whenyay youyay oryay ayay eaturecray withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay akestay acidyay, oldcay, irefay, ightninglay, oryay underthay amageday, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay antgray esistanceray otay ethay eaturecray againstyay atthay instanceyay ofyay ethay amageday. Ivineday  Ikestray Atyay 8thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay infuseyay youryay weaponyay ikesstray withyay ivineday energyyay. 
 Onceyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay ausecay ethay attackyay otay ealday anyay extrayay 1day8 oldcay, irefay, oryay ightninglay amageday (youryay oicechay) otay ethay argettay. 
 Whenyay youyay eachray 14thay evellay, ethay extrayay amageday increasesyay otay 2day8. Astermay ofyay  Aturenay Atyay 17thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay ommandcay animalsyay andyay antplay eaturescray. 
 Whileyay eaturescray areyay armedchay ybay youryay  Armchay  Animalsyay andyay  Antsplay eaturefay, youyay ancay aketay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay otay erballyvay ommandcay whatyay eachyay ofyay osethay eaturescray willyay oday onyay itsyay extnay urntay. Empesttay  Omainday Odsgay whoseyay ortfoliospay includeyay ethay  Empesttay omainday- includingyay  Alostay,  Umberleeyay,  Ordkay,  Eboimzay, ethay  Evourerday,  Euszay, andyay  Or—governthay ormsstay, easay, andyay yskay. 
 Eythay includeyay odsgay ofyay ightninglay andyay underthay, odsgay ofyay earthquakesyay, omesay irefay odsgay, andyay ertaincay odsgay ofyay iolencevay, ysicalphay engthstray, andyay ouragecay. 
 Inyay omesay antheonspay, ayay odgay ofyay isthay omainday ulesray overyay otheryay eitiesday andyay isyay ownknay orfay wiftsay usticejay eliveredday ybay underboltsthay. 
 Inyay ethay antheonspay ofyay eafaringsay eoplepay, odsgay ofyay isthay omainday areyay oceanyay eitiesday andyay ethay atronspay ofyay ailorssay. 
 Empesttay odsgay endsay eirthay ericsclay otay inspireyay earfay inyay ethay ommoncay olkfay, eitheryay otay eepkay osethay olkfay onyay ethay athpay ofrighteousnessyay oryay otay encourageyay emthay otay offeryay acrificessay ofyay opitiationpray otay wardyay offyay ivineday wrathyay. Empesttay  Omainday  Ellsspay Ericclay  Evellay Ells1stfogspay oudclay, underwave3rdgustthay ofyay windyay, atter5thcallshay ightninglay, eetslay orm7thcontrolstay wateryay, iceyay orm9thdestructivestay waveyay, insectyay agueplay Onusbay  Oficienciespray Atyay 1stay evellay, youyay aingay oficiencypray withyay artialmay weaponsyay andyay eavyhay armoryay. Wrathyay ofyay ethay  Ormstay Alsoyay atyay 1stay evellay, youyay ancay underouslythay ebukeray attackersyay. 
 Whenyay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay atthay youyay ancay eesay itshay youyay withyay anyay attackyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay ausecay ethay eaturecray otay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Ethay eaturecray akestay 2day8 ightninglay oryay underthay amageday (youryay oicechay) onyay ayay ailedfay avingsay owthray, andyay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Youyay ancay useyay isthay eaturefay ayay umbernay ofyay imestay equalyay otay youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay (ayay inimummay ofyay onceyay). 
 Youyay egainray allyay expendedyay usesyay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Annelchay  Ivinityday:  Estructiveday  Wrathyay  Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday otay wieldyay ethay owerpay ofyay ethay ormstay withyay uncheckedyay erocityfay. Whenyay youyay ollray ightninglay oryay underthay amageday, youyay ancay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday otay ealday aximummay amageday, insteadyay ofyay ollingray. Underboltthay  Ikestray Atyay 6thay evellay, whenyay youyay ealday ightninglay amageday otay ayay  Argelay oryay allersmay eaturecray, youyay ancay alsoyay ushpay ityay upyay otay 10 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay. Ivineday  Ikestray Atyay 8thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay infuseyay youryay weaponyay ikesstray withyay ivineday energyyay. 
 Onceyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay ausecay ethay attackyay otay ealday anyay extrayay 1day8 underthay amageday otay ethay argettay. 
 Whenyay youyay eachray 14thay evellay, ethay extrayay amageday increasesyay otay 2day8. Ormbornstay Atyay 17thay evellay, youyay avehay ayay yingflay eedspay equalyay otay youryay urrentcay walkingyay eedspay wheneveryay youyay areyay otnay undergroundyay oryay indoorsyay. Ickerytray  Omainday Odsgay ofyay ickery—suchtray asyay  Ymoratay,  Eshababay,  Olidammarayay, ethay  Avelertray,  Arlgay  Ittergoldglay, andyay  Oki—arelay ischief-makersmay andyay instigatorsyay whoyay andstay asyay ayay onstantcay allengechay otay ethay acceptedyay orderyay amongyay othbay odsgay andyay ortalsmay. 
 Ey’rethay atronspay ofyay ievesthay, oundrelsscay, amblersgay, ebelsray, andyay iberatorslay. 
 Eirthay ericsclay areyay ayay isruptiveday orcefay inyay ethay worldyay, uncturingpay idepray, ockingmay yrantstay, ealingstay omfray ethay ichray, eeingfray aptivescay, andyay outingflay ollowhay aditionstray. 
ubterfugesay, ankspray, eceptionday, andyay eftthay atherray anthay irectday onfrontationcay. Ickerytray  Omainday  Ellsspay Essingblay ofyay ethay  Ickstertray  Artingstay whenyay youyay oosechay isthay omainday atyay 1stay evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ouchtay ayay willingyay eaturecray otheryay anthay yourselfyay otay ivegay ityay advantageyay onyay  Exterityday ( Ealthstay) eckschay. 
 Isthay essingblay astslay orfay 1 ourhay oryay untilyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay. Annelchay  Ivinityday:  Invokeyay  Uplicityday Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday otay eatecray anyay illusoryyay uplicateday ofyay yourselfyay. Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay eatecray ayay erfectpay illusionyay ofyay yourselfyay atthay astslay orfay 1 inutemay, oryay untilyay youyay oselay youryay oncentrationcay (asyay ifyay youyay wereyay oncentratingcay onyay ayay ellspay). 
 Ethay illusionyay appearsyay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay ovemay ethay illusionyay upyay otay 30 eetfay otay ayay acespay youyay ancay eesay, utbay ityay ustmay emainray withinyay 120 eetfay ofyay youyay. Orfay ethay urationday, youyay ancay astcay ellsspay asyay oughthay youyay wereyay inyay ethay illusion’syay acespay, utbay youyay ustmay useyay youryay ownyay ensessay. 
 Additionallyyay, whenyay othbay youyay andyay youryay illusionyay areyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ayay eaturecray atthay ancay eesay ethay illusionyay, youyay avehay advantageyay onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay atthay eaturecray, ivengay owhay istractingday ethay illusionyay isyay otay ethay argettay. Annelchay  Ivinityday:  Oakclay ofyay  Adowsshay Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday otay anishvay. Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ecomebay invisibleyay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
 Youyay ecomebay isiblevay ifyay youyay attackyay oryay astcay ayay ellspay. Ivineday  Ikestray Atyay 8thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay infuseyay youryay weaponyay ikesstray withyay oison—apay iftgay omfray youryay eityday. 
 Onceyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay ausecay ethay attackyay otay ealday anyay extrayay 1day8 oisonpay amageday otay ethay argettay. 
 Whenyay youyay eachray 14thay evellay, ethay extrayay amageday increasesyay otay 2day8. Improvedyay  Uplicityday Atyay 17thay evellay, youyay ancay eatecray upyay otay ourfay uplicatesday ofyay yourselfyay, insteadyay ofyay oneyay, whenyay youyay useyay  Invokeyay  Uplicityday. 
 Asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay ovemay anyyay umbernay ofyay emthay upyay otay 30 eetfay, otay ayay aximummay angeray ofyay 120 eetfay. Waryay  Omainday  Waryay ashay anymay anifestationsmay. 
 Ityay ancay akemay eroeshay ofyay ordinaryyay eoplepay. 
 Ityay ancay ebay esperateday andyay orrifichay, withyay actsyay ofyay ueltycray andyay owardicecay eclipsingyay instancesyay ofyay excellenceyay andyay ouragecay. 
 Inyay eitheryay asecay, ethay odsgay ofyay warwatchyay overyay warriorsyay andyay ewardray emthay orfay eirthay eatgray eedsday. 
 Ethay ericsclay ofyay uchsay odsgay excelyay inyay attlebay, inspiringyay othersyay otay ightfay ethay oodgay ightfay oryay offeringyay actsyay ofyay iolencevay asyay ayerspray. 
 Odsgay ofyay waryay includeyay ampionschay ofyay onorhay andyay ivalrychay (uchsay asyay  Ormtay,  Eironeoushay, andyay  Irikay-  Olithjay) asyay wellyay asyay odsgay ofyay estructionday andyay illagepay (uchsay asyay  Erythnulyay, ethay  Uryfay,  Uumshgray, andyay  Aresyay) andyay odsgay ofyay onquestcay andyay ominationday (uchsay asyay  Anebay,  Extorhay, andyay  Aglubiyetmay). 
 Otheryay waryay odsgay (uchsay asyay  Empustay,  Ikenay, andyay  Uadanay) aketay ayay oremay eutralnay ancestay, omotingpray waryay inyay allyay itsyay anifestationsmay andyay upportingsay warriorsyay inyay anyyay ircumstancecay. Waryay  Omainday  Ellsspay Ericclay  Evellay Ells1stdivinespay avorfay, ieldshay ofyay aith3rdmagicfay weaponyay, iritualspay weapon5thcrusader’syay antlemay, iritspay uardians7thfreedomgay ofyay ovementmay, oneskin9thflamestay ikestray, oldhay onstermay Onusbay  Oficienciespray Atyay 1stay evellay, youyay aingay oficiencypray withyay artialmay weaponsyay andyay eavyhay armoryay. Waryay  Iestpray Omfray 1stay evellay, youryay odgay eliversday oltsbay ofyay inspirationyay otay youyay whileyay youyay areyay engagedyay inyay attlebay. 
 Whenyay youyay useyay ethay  Attackyay actionyay, youyay ancay akemay oneyay weaponyay attackyay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay. Youyay ancay useyay isthay eaturefay ayay umbernay ofyay imestay equalyay otay youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay (ayay inimummay ofyay onceyay). 
 Youyay egainray allyay expendedyay usesyay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Annelchay  Ivinityday:  Uidedgay  Ikestray  Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday otay ikestray withyay upernaturalsay accuracyyay. 
 Whenyay youyay akemay anyay attackyay ollray, youyay ancay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday otay aingay ayay +10 onusbay otay ethay ollray. 
 Youyay akemay isthay oicechay afteryay youyay eesay ethay ollray, utbay eforebay ethay DMay ayssay whetheryay ethay attackyay itshay oryay issesmay. Annelchay  Ivinityday:  Waryay  Od’sgay  Essingblay Atyay 6thay evellay, whenyay ayay eaturecray withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay akesmay anyay attackyay ollray, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay antgray atthay eaturecray ayay +10 onusbay otay ethay ollray, usingyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday. 
 Youyay akemay isthay oicechay afteryay youyay eesay ethay ollray, utbay eforebay ethay DMay ayssay whetheryay ethay attackyay itshay oryay issesmay. Ivineday  Ikestray Atyay 8thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay infuseyay youryay weaponyay ikesstray withyay ivineday energyyay. 
 Onceyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay ausecay ethay attackyay otay ealday anyay extrayay 1day8 amageday ofyay ethay amesay ypetay ealtday ybay ethay weaponyay otay ethay argettay. 
 Uiddray Oldinghay ighhay ayay arledgnay affstay wreathedyay withyay ollyhay, anyay elfyay ummonssay ethay uryfay ofyay ethay ormstay andyay allscay ownday explosiveyay oltsbay ofyay ightninglay otay itesmay ethay orch-carryingtay orcsyay whoyay eatenthray erhay orestfay. Ouchingcray outyay ofyay ightsay onyay ayay ighhay eetray anchbray inyay ethay ormfay ofyay ayay eopardlay, ayay umanhay eerspay outyay ofyay ethay unglejay atyay ethay angestray onstructioncay ofyay ayay empletay ofyay  Evilyay  Elementalyay  Airyay, eepingkay ayay oseclay eyeyay onyay ethay ultistscay’ activitiesyay. Wingingsay ayay adeblay ormedfay ofyay urepay irefay, ayay alf-elfhay argeschay intoyay ayay assmay ofyay eletalskay oldierssay, underingsay ethay unnaturalyay agicmay atthay ivesgay ethay oulfay eaturescray ethay ockingmay emblancesay ofyay ifelay. Whetheryay allingcay onyay ethay elementalyay orcesfay ofyay aturenay oryay emulatingyay ethay eaturescray ofyay ethay animalyay worldyay, uidsdray areyay anyay embodimentyay ofyay ature’snay esilienceray, unningcay, andyay uryfay. 
 Eythay aimclay onay asterymay overyay aturenay. 
 Insteadyay, eythay eesay emselvesthay asyay extensionsyay ofyay ature’snay indomitableyay willyay. Owerpay ofyay  Aturenay Uidsdray evereray aturenay aboveyay allyay, aininggay eirthay ellsspay andyay otheryay agicalmay owerspay eitheryay omfray ethay orcefay ofyay aturenay itselfyay oryay omfray ayay aturenay eityday. 
 Anymay uidsdray ursuepay ayay ysticmay iritualityspay ofyay anscendenttray unionyay withyay aturenay atherray anthay evotionday otay ayay ivineday entityyay, whileyay othersyay ervesay odsgay ofyay wildyay aturenay, animalsyay, oryay elementalyay orcesfay. 
 Ethay ancientyay uidicdray aditionstray areyay ometimessay alledcay ethay  Oldyay  Aithfay, inyay ontrastcay otay ethay worshipyay ofyay odsgay inyay emplestay andyay inesshray. Uiddray ellsspay areyay orientedyay owardtay aturenay andyay animalsyay— ethay owerpay ofyay oothtay andyay awclay, ofyay unsay andyay oonmay, ofyay irefay andyay ormstay. 
 Uidsdray alsoyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay aketay onyay animalyay ormsfay, andyay omesay uidsdray akemay ayay articularpay udystay ofyay isthay acticepray, evenyay otay ethay ointpay whereyay eythay eferpray animalyay ormfay otay eirthay aturalnay ormfay. Eservepray ethay  Alancebay Orfay uidsdray, aturenay existsyay inyay ayay ecariouspray alancebay. 
andyay water—mustyay emainray inyay equilibriumyay. 
 Ifyay oneyay elementyay wereyay otay aingay owerpay overyay ethay othersyay, ethay worldyay ouldcay ebay estroyedday, awndray intoyay oneyay ofyay ethay elementalyay anesplay andyay okenbray apartyay intoyay itsyay omponentcay elementsyay. 
 Usthay, uidsdray opposeyay ultscay ofyay  Elementalyay  Evilyay andyay othersyay whoyay omotepray oneyay elementyay otay ethay exclusionyay ofyay othersyay. Uidsdray areyay alsoyay oncernedcay withyay ethay elicateday ecologicalyay alancebay atthay ustainssay antplay andyay animalyay ifelay, andyay ethay eednay orfay ivilizedcay olkfay otay ivelay inyay armonyhay withyay aturenay, otnay inyay oppositionyay otay ityay. 
 Uidsdray acceptyay atthay whichyay isyay uelcray inyay aturenay, andyay eythay atehay atthay whichyay isyay unnaturalyay, includingyay aberrationsyay (uchsay asyay eholdersbay andyay indmay ayersflay) andyay undeadyay (uchsay asyay ombieszay andyay ampiresvay). 
 Uidsdray ometimessay eadlay aidsray againstyay uchsay eaturescray, especiallyyay whenyay ethay onstersmay encroachyay onyay ethay uidsdray’ erritorytay. Uidsdray areyay oftenyay oundfay uardinggay acredsay itessay oryay watchingyay overyay egionsray ofyay unspoiledyay aturenay. 
 Utbay whenyay ayay ignificantsay angerday arisesyay, eateningthray ature’snay alancebay oryay ethay andslay eythay otectpray, uidsdray aketay onyay ayay oremay activeyay oleray inyay ombatingcay ethay eatthray, asyay adventurersyay. Eatingcray ayay  Uiddray  Whenyay akingmay ayay uiddray, onsidercay whyyay youryay aracterchay ashay uchsay ayay oseclay ondbay withyay aturenay. 
 Erhapspay youryay aracterchay iveslay inyay ayay ocietysay whereyay ethay  Oldyay  Aithfay illstay ivesthray, oryay wasyay aisedray ybay ayay uiddray afteryay eingbay abandonedyay inyay ethay epthsday ofyay ayay orestfay. 
 Erhapspay youryay aracterchay adhay ayay amaticdray encounteryay withyay ethay iritsspay ofyay aturenay, omingcay acefay otay acefay withyay ayay iantgay eagleyay oryay ireday wolfyay andyay urvivingsay ethay experienceyay. 
 Aybemay youryay aracterchay wasyay ornbay uringday anyay epicyay ormstay oryay ayay olcanicvay eruptionyay, whichyay wasyay interpretedasyay ayay ignsay atthay ecomingbay ayay uiddray wasyay artpay ofyay youryay aracter’schay estinyday. Avehay youyay alwaysyay eenbay anyay adventureryay asyay artpay ofyay youryay uidicdray allingcay, oryay idday youyay irstfay endspay imetay asyay ayay aretakercay ofyay ayay acredsay ovegray oryay ingspray?  Erhapspay youryay omelandhay wasyay efouledbay ybay evilyay, andyay youyay ooktay upyay anyay adventuringyay ifelay inyay opeshay ofyay indingfay ayay ewnay omehay oryay urposepay. Quickyay  Uildbay Youyay ancay akemay ayay uiddray quicklyyay ybay ollowingfay esethay uggestionssay. 
 Irstfay,  Wisdomyay ouldshay ebay youryay ighesthay abilityyay orescay, ollowedfay ybay  Onstitutioncay. 
 Illsskay:  Oosechay wotay omfray  Arcanayay,  Animalyay  Andlinghay,  Insightyay,  Edicinemay,  Aturenay,  Erceptionpay,  Eligionray, andyay  Urvivalsay Equipmentyay Youyay artstay withyay ethay ollowingfay equipmentyay, inyay additionyay otay ethay equipmentyay antedgray ybay youryay ackgroundbay:• (ayay) ayay woodenyay ieldshay oryay (bay) anyyay implesay weaponyay • (ayay) ayay imitarscay oryay (bay) anyyay implesay eleemay weaponyay•  Eatherlay armoryay, anyay explorer’syay ackpay, andyay ayay uidicdray ocusfay Uidicdray Youyay owknay  Uidicdray, ethay ecretsay anguagelay ofyay uidsdray. 
 Youyay ancay eakspay ethay anguagelay andyay useyay ityay otay eavelay iddenhay essagesmay. 
 Youyay andyay othersyay whoyay owknay isthay anguagelay automaticallyyay otspay uchsay ayay essagemay. 
 Othersyay otspay ethay essage’smay esencepray withyay ayay uccessfulsay DCay 15  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckchay utbay an’tcay ecipherday ityay withoutyay agicmay. Ellcastingspay Awingdray onyay ethay ivineday essenceyay ofyay aturenay itselfyay, youyay ancay astcay ellsspay otay apeshay atthay essenceyay otay youryay willyay. 
 Eesay apterchay 10 orfay ethay eneralgay ulesray ofyay ellcastingspay andyay apterchay 11 orfay ethay uiddray ellspay istlay. Antripscay Atyay 1stay evellay, youyay owknay wotay antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay uiddray ellspay istlay. 
 Youyay earnlay additionalyay uiddray antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay atyay igherhay evelslay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Antripscay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Uiddray abletay. Eparingpray andyay  Astingcay  Ellsspay Ethay  Uiddray abletay owsshay owhay anymay ellspay otsslay youyay avehay otay astcay youryay ellsspay ofyay 1stay evellay andyay igherhay. 
 Otay astcay oneyay ofyay esethay uiddray ellsspay, youyay ustmay expendyay ayay otslay ofyay ethay ell’sspay evellay oryay igherhay. 
 Youyay egainray allyay expendedyay ellspay otsslay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Youyay eparepray ethay istlay ofyay uiddray ellsspay atthay areyay availableyay orfay youyay otay astcay, oosingchay omfray ethay uiddray ellspay istlay. 
 Whenyay youyay oday osay, oosechay ayay umbernay ofyay uiddray ellsspay equalyay otay youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay + youryay uiddray evellay (inimummay ofyay Acredsay  Antsplay andyay  Woodyay Ayay uiddray oldshay ertaincay antsplay otay ebay acredsay, articularlypay alderyay, ashyay, irchbay, elderyay, azelhay, ollyhay, uniperjay, istletoemay, oakyay, owanray, willowyay, andyay yewyay. 
 Uidsdray oftenyay useyay uchsay antsplay asyay artpay ofyay ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay, incorporatingyay engthslay ofyay oakyay oryay yewyay oryay igsspray ofyay istletoemay. Imilarlysay, ayay uiddray usesyay uchsay woodsyay otay akemay otheryay objectsyay, uchsay asyay weaponsyay andyay ieldsshay. 
 Yewyay isyay associatedyay withyay eathday andyay ebirthray, osay weaponyay andleshay orfay imitarsscay oryay icklessay ightmay ebay ashionedfay omfray ityay. 
 Ashyay isyay associatedyay withyay ifelay andyay oakyay withyay engthstray. 
 Esethay woodsyay akemay excellentyay aftshay oryay wholeyay weaponsyay, uchsay asyay ubsclay oryay quarterstaffsyay, asyay wellyay asyay ieldsshay. 
 Alderyay isyay associatedyay withyay airyay, andyay ityay ightmay ebay usedyay orfay ownthray weaponsyay, uchsay asyay artsday oryay avelinsjay. Uidsdray omfray egionsray atthay acklay ethay antsplay escribedday erehay avehay osenchay otheryay antsplay otay aketay onyay imilarsay usesyay. 
 Orfay instanceyay, ayay uiddray ofyay ayay esertday egionray ightmay aluevay ethay yuccayay eetray andyay actuscay ants.oneplay ellspay). 
 Ethay ellsspay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay areyay ayay 3levelrdlay uiddray, youyay avehay ourfay 1levelstlay andyay wotay 2levelndlay ellspay otsslay. 
 Withyay ayay  Wisdomyay ofyay 16, youryay istlay ofyay eparedpray ellsspay ancay includeyay ixsay ellsspay ofyay 1stay oryay 2nday evellay, inyay anyyay ombinationcay. 
 Ifyay youyay eparepray ethay 1levelstlay ellspay urecay woundsyay, youyay ancay astcay ityay usingyay ayay 1levelstlay oryay 2levelndlay otslay. 
 Astingcay ethay ellspay oesn’tday emoveray ityay omfray youryay istlay ofyay eparedpray ellsspay. Youyay ancay alsoyay angechay youryay istlay ofyay eparedpray ellsspay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. 
 Eparingpray ayay ewnay istlay ofyay uiddray ellsspay equiresray imetay entspay inyay ayerpray andyay editationmay: atyay eastlay 1 inutemay erpay ellspay evellay orfay eachyay ellspay onyay youryay istlay. Ellcastingspay  Abilityyay Wisdomyay isyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay youryay uiddray ellsspay, incesay youryay agicmay awsdray uponyay youryay evotionday andyay attunementyay otay aturenay. 
 Youyay useyay youryay  Wisdomyay wheneveryay ayay ellspay efersray otay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, youyay useyay youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay whenyay ettingsay ethay avingsay owthray DCay orfay ayay uiddray ellspay youyay astcay andyay whenyay akingmay anyay attackyay ollray withyay oneyay. Ellspay avesay DCay = 8 + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay Ellspay attackyay odifiermay = youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay Itualray  Astingcay Youyay ancay astcay ayay uiddray ellspay asyay ayay itualray ifyay atthay ellspay ashay ethay itualray agtay andyay youyay avehay ethay ellspay eparedpray. Ellcastingspay  Ocusfay Youyay ancay useyay ayay uidicdray ocusfay (oundfay inyay apterchay 5) asyay ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay orfay youryay uiddray ellsspay. Wildyay  Apeshay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay agicallymay assumeyay ethay apeshay ofyay ayay eastbay atthay youyay avehay eensay eforebay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay isthay eaturefay wicetay. 
 Youyay egainray expendedyay usesyay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Youryay uiddray evellay eterminesday ethay eastsbay youyay ancay ansformtray intoyay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Eastbay  Apesshay abletay. 
 Atyay 2nday evellay, orfay exampleyay, youyay ancay ansformtray intoyay anyyay eastbay atthay ashay ayay allengechay atingray ofyay 1/4 oryay owerlay atthay oesn’tday avehay ayay yingflay oryay wimmingsay eedspay. Eastbay  Apesshay Evellay Axmay. 
CRay Imitationslay Example2ndyay1/4 Onay yingflay oryay wimmingsay eedspay Wolf4thyay1/2 Onay yingflay eedspay Ocodile8thcray1— Iantgay eagleyay Youyay ancay aystay inyay ayay eastbay apeshay orfay ayay umbernay ofyay ourshay equalyay otay alfhay youryay uiddray evellay (oundedray ownday). 
 Youyay enthay evertray otay youryay ormalnay ormfay unlessyay youyay expendyay anotheryay useyay ofyay isthay eaturefay. 
 Youyay ancay evertray otay youryay ormalnay ormfay earlieryay ybay usingyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. 
•  Youryay amegay atisticsstay areyay eplacedray ybay ethay atisticsstay ofyay ethay eastbay, utbay youyay etainray youryay alignmentyay, ersonalitypay, andyay  Intelligenceyay,  Wisdomyay, andyay  Arismachay oresscay. 
 Youyay alsoyay etainray allyay ofyay youryay illskay andyay avingsay owthray oficienpray- iescay, inyay additionyay otay aininggay osethay ofyay ethay eaturecray. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray ashay ethay amesay oficiencypray asyay youyay andyay ethay onusbay inyay itsyay atstay ockblay isyay igherhay anthay yoursyay, useyay ethay eature’scray onusbay insteadyay ofyay yoursyay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray ashay anyyay egendarylay oryay airlay actionsyay, youyay an'tcay useyay emthay.•  Whenyay youyay ansformtray, youyay assumeyay ethay east’sbay ithay ointspay andyay  Ithay  Iceday. 
 Whenyay youyay evertray otay youryay ormalnay ormfay, youyay eturnray otay ethay umbernay ofyay ithay ointspay youyay adhay eforebay youyay ansformedtray. 
 Oweverhay, ifyay youyay evertray asyay ayay esultray ofyay oppingdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, anyyay excessyay amageday arriescay overyay otay youryay ormalnay ormfay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay aketay 10 amageday inyay animalyay ormfay andyay avehay onlyyay 1 ithay ointpay eftlay, youyay evertray andyay aketay 9 amageday. 
 Asyay onglay asyay ethay excessyay amageday oesn’tday educeray youryay ormalnay ormfay otay 0 ithay ointspay, youyay aren’tyay ockedknay unconsciousyay.•  Youyay an’tcay astcay ellsspay, andyay youryay abilityyay otay eakspay oryay aketay anyyay actionyay atthay equiresray andshay isyay imitedlay otay ethay apabilitiescay ofyay youryay eastbay ormfay. 
 Ansformingtray oesn’tday eakbray youryay oncentrationcay onyay ayay ellspay you’veyay alreadyyay astcay, oweverhay, oryay eventpray youyay omfray akingtay actionsyay atthay areyay artpay ofyay ayay ellspay, uchsay asyay allcay ightninglay, atthay you’veyay alreadyyay astcay.•  Youyay etainray ethay enefitbay ofyay anyyay eaturesfay omfray youryay assclay, aceray, oryay otheryay ourcesay andyay ancay useyay emthay ifyay ethay ewnay ormfay isyay ysicallyphay apablecay ofyay oingday osay. 
 Oweverhay, youyay an’tcay useyay anyyay ofyay youryay ecialspay ensessay, uchsay asyay arkviday- ionsay, unlessyay youryay ewnay ormfay alsoyay ashay atthay ensesay.•  Youyay oosechay whetheryay youryay equipmentyay allsfay otay ethay oundgray inyay youryay acespay, ergesmay intoyay youryay ewnay ormfay, oryay isyay wornyay ybay ityay. 
 Wornyay equipmentyay unctionsfay asyay ormalnay, utbay ethay DMay ecidesday whetheryay ityay isyay acticalpray orfay ethay ewnay ormfay otay wearyay ayay iecepay ofyay equipmentyay, asedbay onyay ethay eacray- ure’stay apeshay andyay izesay. 
 Youryay equipmentyay oesn’tday angechay izesay oryay apeshay otay atchmay ethay ewnay ormfay, andyay anyyay equipmentyay atthay ethay ewnay ormfay an’tcay wearyay ustmay eitheryay allfay otay ethay oundgray oryay ergemay withyay ityay. Equipmentyay atthay ergesmay withyay ethay ormfay ashay onay effectyay untilyay youyay eavelay ethay ormfay. Uiddray  Irclecay Atyay 2nday evellay, youyay oosechay otay identifyyay withyay ayay irclecay ofyay uidsdray: ethay  Irclecay ofyay ethay  Andlay oryay ethay  Irclecay ofyay ethay  Oonmay, othbay etailedday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay escriptionday. 
 Youryay oicechay antsgray youyay eaturesfay atyay 2nday evellay andyay againyay atyay 6thay, 10thay, andyay 14thay evellay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay Whenyay youyay eachray 4thay evellay, andyay againyay atyay 8thay, 12thay, 16thay, andyay 19thay evellay, youyay ancay increaseyay oneyay abilityyay orescay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 2, oryay youyay ancay increaseyay wotay abilityyay oresscay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 1. 
 Asyay ormalnay, youyay an’tcay increaseyay anyay abilityyay orescay aboveyay 20 usingyay isthay eaturefay. Artingstay atyay 18thay evellay, ethay imalpray agicmay atthay youyay wieldyay ausescay youyay otay ageyay oremay owlyslay. 
 Orfay everyyay 10 yearsyay atthay asspay, youryay odybay agesyay onlyyay 1 yearyay. Eastbay  Ellsspay Eginningbay atyay 18thay evellay, youyay ancay astcay anymay ofyay youryay uiddray ellsspay inyay anyyay apeshay youyay assumeyay usingyay  Wildyay  Apeshay. 
 Additionallyyay, youyay ancay ignoreyay ethay erbalvay andyay omaticsay omponentscay ofyay youryay uiddray ellsspay, asyay wellyay asyay anyyay aterialmay omponentscay atthay acklay ayay ostcay andyay aren’tyay onsumedcay ybay ayay ellspay. 
 Youyay aingay isthay enefitbay inyay othbay youryay ormalnay apeshay andyay youryay eastbay apeshay omfray  Wildyay  Apeshay. Uiddray  Irclescay Oughthay eirthay organizationyay isyay invisibleyay otay ostmay outsidersyay, uidsdray areyay artpay ofyay ayay ocietysay atthay ansspay ethay andlay, ignoringyay oliticalpay ordersbay. 
 Allyay uidsdray areyay ominallynay embersmay ofyay isthay uidicdray ocietysay, oughthay omesay individualsyay areyay osay isolatedyay atthay eythay avehay evernay eensay anyyay igh-rankinghay embersmay ofyay ethay ocietysay oryay articipatedpay inyay uidicdray atheringsgay. 
 Uidsdray ecognizeray eachyay otheryay asyay othersbray andyay isterssay. 
 Ikelay eaturescray ofyay ethay wildernessyay, oweverhay, uidsdray ometimessay ompetecay withyay oryay evenyay eypray onyay eachyay otheryay. Atyay ayay ocallay alescay, uidsdray areyay organizedyay intoyay irclescay atthay areshay ertaincay erspectivespay onyay aturenay, alancebay, andyay ethay wayyay ofyay ethay uiddray. Irclecay ofyay ethay  Andlay Ethay  Irclecay ofyay ethay  Andlay isyay ademay upyay ofyay ysticsmay andyay agessay whoyay afeguardsay ancientyay owledgeknay andyay itesray oughthray ayay astvay oralyay aditiontray. 
 Esethay uidsdray eetmay withinyay acredsay irclescay ofyay eestray oryay andingstay onesstay otay whisperyay imalpray ecretssay inyay  Uidicdray. 
 Ethay ircle’scay wisestyay embersmay esidepray asyay ethay iefchay iestspray ofyay ommunitiescay atthay oldhay otay ethay  Oldyay  Aithfay andyay ervesay asyay advisorsyay otay ethay ulersray ofyay osethay olkfay. Asyay ayay embermay ofyay isthay irclecay, youryay agicmay isyay influencedyay ybay ethay andlay whereyay youyay wereyay initiatedyay intoyay ethay ircle’scay ysteriousmay itesray. Onusbay  Antripcay Whenyay youyay oosechay isthay irclecay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay earnlay oneyay additionalyay uiddray antripcay ofyay youryay oicechay. Aturalnay  Ecoveryray Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay egainray omesay ofyay youryay agicalmay energyyay ybay ittingsay inyay editationmay andyay ommuningcay withyay aturenay. 
 Uringday ayay ortshay estray, youyay oosechay expendedyay ellspay otsslay otay ecoverray. 
 Ethay ellspay otsslay ancay avehay ayay ombinedcay evellay atthay isyay equalyay otay oryay esslay anthay alfhay youryay uiddray evellay (oundedray upyay), andyay onenay ofyay ethay otsslay ancay ebay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay. 
 Youyay an’tcay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray  Orfay exampleyay, whenyay youyay areyay ayay 4levelthlay uiddray, youyay ancay ecoverray upyay otay wotay evelslay worthyay ofyay ellspay otsslay. 
 Youyay ancay ecoverray eitheryay ayay 2levelndlay otslay oryay wotay 1levelstlay otsslay. Irclecay  Ellsspay Youryay ysticalmay onnectioncay otay ethay andlay infusesyay youyay withyay ethay abilityyay otay astcay ertaincay ellsspay. 
 Atyay 3rday, 5thay, 7thay, andyay 9thay evellay youyay aingay accessyay otay irclecay ellsspay onnectedcay otay ethay andlay whereyay youyay ecamebay ayay uiddray. 
 Oosechay atthay and—arcticlay, oastcay, esertday, orestfay, asslandgray, ountainmay, wampsay, oryay  Underdark—andyay onsultcay ethay associatedyay istlay ofyay ellsspay. Onceyay youyay aingay accessyay otay ayay irclecay ellspay, youyay alwaysyay avehay ityay eparedpray, andyay ityay oesn’tday ountcay againstyay ethay umbernay ofyay ellsspay youyay ancay eparepray eachyay ayday. 
 And’slay  Idestray Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, ovingmay oughthray onmagicalnay ifficultday erraintay ostscay youyay onay extrayay ovementmay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay asspay oughthray onmagicalnay antsplay withoutyay eingbay owedslay ybay emthay andyay withoutyay akingtay amageday omfray emthay ifyay eythay avehay ornsthay, inesspay, oryay ayay imilarsay azardhay. Inyay additionyay, youyay avehay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay antsplay atthay areyay agicallymay eatedcray oryay anipulatedmay otay impedeyay ovementmay, uchsay osethay eatedcray ybay ethay entangleyay ellspay. Ature’snay  Wardyay Whenyay youyay eachray 10thay evellay, youyay an’tcay ebay armedchay oryay ightenedfray ybay elementalsyay oryay eyfay, andyay youyay areyay immuneyay otay oisonpay andyay iseaseday. Ature’snay  Anctuarysay Whenyay youyay eachray 14thay evellay, eaturescray ofyay ethay aturalnay worldyay ensesay youryay onnectioncay otay aturenay andyay ecomebay esitanthay otay attackyay youyay. 
 Whenyay ayay eastbay oryay antplay eaturecray attacksyay youyay, atthay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray againstyay youryay uiddray ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray ustmay oosechay ayay ifferentday argettay, oryay ethay attackyay automaticallyyay issesmay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay eaturecray isyay immuneyay otay isthay effectyay orfay 24 ourshay. Ethay eaturecray isyay awareyay ofyay isthay effectyay eforebay ityay akesmay itsyay attackyay againstyay youyay. Irclecay ofyay ethay  Oonmay Uidsdray ofyay ethay  Irclecay ofyay ethay  Oonmay areyay iercefay uardiansgay ofyay ethay wildsyay. 
 Eirthay orderyay athersgay underyay ethay ullfay oonmay otay areshay ewsnay andyay adetray warningsyay. 
 Eythay aunthay ethay eepestday artspay ofyay ethay wildernessyay, whereyay eythay ightmay ogay orfay weeksyay onyay endyay eforebay ossingcray athspay withyay anotheryay umanoidhay eaturecray, etlay aloneyay anotheryay uiddray. Angeablechay asyay ethay oonmay, ayay uiddray ofyay isthay irclecay ightmay owlpray asyay ayay eatgray atcay oneyay ightnay, oarsay overyay ethay eetopstray asyay anyay eagleyay ethay extnay ayday, andyay ashcray oughthray ethay undergrowthyay inyay earbay ormfay otay ivedray offyay ayay espassingtray onstermay. 
 Ethay wildyay isyay inyay ethay uid'sdray oodblay. Ombatcay  Wildyay  Apeshay Whenyay youyay oosechay isthay irclecay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay useyay  Wildyay  Apeshay onyay youryay urntay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay, atherray anthay asyay anyay actionyay. Additionallyyay, whileyay youyay areyay ansformedtray ybay  Wildyay  Apeshay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay otay expendyay oneyay ellspay otslay otay egainray 1day8 ithay ointspay erpay evellay ofyay ethay ellspay otslay expendedyay. Irclecay  Ormsfay Ethay itesray ofyay youryay irclecay antgray youyay ethay abilityyay otay ansformtray intoyay oremay angerousday animalyay ormsfay. 
 Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay  Wildyay  Apeshay otay ansformtray intoyay ayay eastbay withyay ayay allengechay atingray asyay ighhay asyay 1 (youyay ignoreyay ethay  Axmay. 
CRay olumncay ofyay ethay  Eastbay  Apesshay abletay, utbay ustmay abideyay ybay ethay otheryay imitationslay erethay). Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, youyay ancay ansformtray intoyay ayay eastbay withyay ayay allengechay atingray asyay ighhay asyay youryay uiddray evellay ividedday ybay 3, oundedray ownday. Imalpray  Ikestray Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, youryay attacksyay inyay eastbay ormfay ountcay asyay agicalmay orfay ethay urposepay ofyay overcomingyay esistanceray andyay immunityyay otay onmagicalnay attacksyay andyay amageday. Elementalyay  Wildyay  Apeshay Atyay 10thay evellay, youyay ancay expendyay wotay usesyay ofyay  Wildyay  Apeshay atyay ethay amesay imetay otay ansformtray intoyay anyay airyay elementalyay, anyay earthyay elementalyay, ayay irefay elementalyay, oryay ayay wateryay elementalyay. Ousandthay  Ormsfay Ybay 14thay evellay, youyay avehay earnedlay otay useyay agicmay otay alteryay youryay ysicalphay ormfay inyay oremay ubtlesay waysyay. 
 Youyay ancay astcay ethay alteryay elfsay ellspay atyay willyay. Uidsdray andyay ethay  Odsgay Omesay uidsdray eneratevay ethay orcesfay ofyay aturenay emselvesthay, utbay ostmay uidsdray areyay evotedday otay oneyay ofyay ethay anymay aturenay eitiesday worshipedyay inyay ethay ultiversemay (ethay istslay ofyay odsgay inyay appendixyay Bay includeyay anymay uchsay eitiesday). 
 Ethay worshipyay ofyay esethay eitiesday isyay oftenyay onsideredcay ayay oremay ancientyay aditiontray anthay ethay aithsfay ofyay ericsclay andyay urbanizedyay eoplespay. 
 Inyay actfay, inyay ethay worldyay ofyay  Eyhawkgray, ethay uidicdray aithfay isyay alledcay ethay  Oldyay  Aithfay, andyay ityay aimsclay anymay adherentsyay amongyay armersfay, orestersfay, ishersfay, andyay othersyay whoyay ivelay oselyclay withyay aturenay. 
 Isthay aditiontray includesyay ethay worshipyay ofyay  Aturenay asyay ayay imalpray orcefay eyondbay ersonificationpay, utbay alsoyay encompassesyay ethay worshipyay ofyay  Eorybay, ethay  Oerthyay  Othermay, asyay wellyay asyay evoteesday ofyay  Obadyay- Aihay,  Ehlonnayay, andyay  Ulaayay. Inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay  Eyhawkgray andyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray, uidicdray irclescay areyay otnay usuallyyay onnectedcay otay ethay aithfay ofyay ayay inglesay aturenay eityday. 
 Anyyay ivengay irclecay inyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray, orfay exampleyay, ightmay includeyay uidsdray whoyay evereray  Ilvanussay, Ielikkimay,  Eldathyay,  Aunteachay, oryay evenyay ethay arshhay  Odsgay ofyay  Uryfay:  Alostay,  Alarmay,  Aurilyay, andyay  Umberleeyay. 
 Esethay aturenay odsgay areyay oftenyay alledcay ethay  Irstfay  Irclecay, ethay irstfay amongyay ethay uidsdray, andyay ostmay uidsdray ountcay emthay allyay (evenyay ethay iolentvay onesyay) asyay worthyyay ofyay enerationvay. Ethay uidsdray ofyay  Eberronyay oldhay animisticyay eliefsbay ompletelycay unconnectedyay otay ethay  Overeignsay  Osthay, ethay  Arkday  Ixsay, oryay anyyay ofyay ethay otheryay eligionsray ofyay ethay worldyay. 
 Eythay elievebay atthay everyyay ivinglay ingthay andyay everyyay aturalnay enomenon—sunphay, oonmay, windyay, irefay, andyay ethay worldyay itself—hasyay ayay iritspay. 
 Eirthay ellsspay, enthay, areyay ayay eansmay otay ommunicatecay withyay andyay ommandcay esethay iritsspay. 
 Ifferentday uidicdray ectssay, oughthay, oldhay ifferentday ilosophiesphay aboutyay ethay operpray elationshipray ofyay esethay iritsspay otay eachyay otheryay andyay otay ethay orcesfay ofyay ivilizationcay. 
 Ighterfay Ayay umanhay inyay angingclay ateplay armoryay oldshay erhay ieldshay eforebay erhay asyay eshay unsray owardtay ethay assedmay oblinsgay. 
 Anyay elfyay ehindbay erhay, adclay inyay uddedstay eatherlay armoryay, epperspay ethay oblinsgay withyay arrowsyay oosedlay omfray ishay exquisiteyay owbay. 
 Ethay alf-orchay earbynay outsshay ordersyay, elpinghay ethay wotay ombatantscay oordinatecay eirthay assaultyay otay ethay estbay advantage.Ayay warfday inyay ainchay ailmay interposesyay ishay ieldshay etweenbay ethay ogre’syay ubclay andyay ishay ompanioncay, ockingknay ethay eadlyday owblay asideyay. 
 Ishay ompanioncay, ayay alf-elfhay inyay alescay armoryay, wingssay wotay imitarsscay inyay ayay indingblay whirlyay asyay eshay irclescay ethay ogreyay, ookinglay orfay ayay indblay otspay inyay itsyay efenses.Aday adiatorglay ightsfay orfay ortspay inyay anyay arenayay, ayay astermay withyay ishay identtray andyay etnay, illedskay atyay opplingtay oesfay andyay ovingmay emthay aroundyay orfay ethay owd’scray elight—andday ishay ownyay acticaltay advantageyay. 
 Ishay opponent’syay wordsay aresflay withyay ueblay ightlay anyay instantyay eforebay eshay endssay ightninglay ashingflay orthfay otay itesmay imhay. Allyay ofyay esethay eroeshay areyay ightersfay, erhapspay ethay ostmay iverseday assclay ofyay aracterschay inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray. 
 Questingyay ightsknay, onqueringcay overlordsyay, oyalray ampionschay, eliteyay ootfay oldierssay, ardenedhay ercenariesmay, andyay anditbay ings—askay ightersfay, eythay allyay areshay anyay unparalleledyay asterymay withyay weaponsyay andyay armoryay, andyay ayay oroughthay owledgeknay ofyay ethay illsskay ofyay ombatcay. 
 Andyay eythay areyay wellyay acquaintedyay withyay eathday, othbay etingmay ityay outyay andyay aringstay ityay efiantlyday inyay ethay acefay. Wellyay- Oundedray  Ecialistsspay Ightersfay earnlay ethay asicsbay ofyay allyay ombatcay ylesstay. 
 Everyyay ighterfay ancay wingsay anyay axeyay, encefay withyay ayay apierray, wieldyay ayay ongswordlay oryay ayay eatswordgray, useyay ayay owbay, andyay evenyay aptray oesfay inyay ayay etnay withyay omesay egreeday ofyay illskay. 
 Ikewiselay, ayay ighterfay isyay adeptyay withyay ieldsshay andyay everyyay ormfay ofyay armoryay. 
 Eyondbay atthay asicbay egreeday ofyay amiliarityfay, eachyay ighterfay ecializesspay inyay ayay ertaincay ylestay ofyay ombatcay. 
 Omesay oncentratecay onyay archeryyay, omesay onyay ightingfay withyay wotay weaponsyay atyay onceyay, andyay omesay onyay augmentingyay eirthay artialmay illsskay withyay agicmay. 
 Isthay ombinationcay ofyay oadbray eneralgay abilityyay andyay extensiveyay ecializationspay akesmay ightersfay uperiorsay ombatantscay onyay attlefieldsbay andyay inyay ungeonsday alikeyay. Ainedtray orfay  Angerday  Otnay everyyay embermay ofyay ethay itycay watchyay, ethay illagevay ilitiamay, oryay ethay queen’syay armyyay isyay ayay ighterfay. 
 Ostmay ofyay esethay oopstray areyay elativelyray untrainedyay oldierssay withyay onlyyay ethay ostmay asicbay ombatcay owledgeknay. 
 Omesay ightersfay eelfay awndray otay useyay eirthay ainingtray asyay adventurersyay. 
 Ethay ungeonday elvingday, onstermay ayingslay, andyay otheryay angerousday workyay ommoncay amongyay adventurersyay isyay econdsay aturenay orfay ayay ighterfay, otnay allyay atthay ifferentday omfray ethay ifelay ehay oryay eshay eftlay ehindbay. 
 Erethay areyay eatergray isksray, erhapspay, utbay alsoyay uchmay eatergray ewards—fewray ightersfay inyay ethay itycay watchyay avehay ethay opportunityyay otay iscoverday ayay agicmay ameflay onguetay wordsay, orfay exampleyay. Eatingcray ayay  Ighterfay Asyay youyay uildbay youryay ighterfay, inkthay aboutyay wotay elatedray elementsyay ofyay youryay aracter'schay ackgroundbay:  Whereyay idday youyay etgay youryay ombatcay ainingtray, andyay whatyay etsay youyay apartyay omfray ethay undanemay warriorsyay aroundyay youyay?  Wereyay youyay articularlypay uthlessray?  Idday youyay etgay extrayay elphay omfray ayay entormay, erhapspay ecausebay ofyay youryay exceptionalyay edicationday?  Whatyay ovedray youyay otay isthay ainingtray inyay ethay irstfay aceplay? Ayay eatthray otay youryay omelandhay, ayay irstthay orfay evengeray, oryay ayay eednay otay ovepray yourselfyay ightmay allyay avehay eenbay actorsfay. Youyay ightmay avehay enjoyedyay ormalfay ainingtray inyay ayay oble’snay armyyay oryay inyay ayay ocallay ilitiamay. 
 Erhapspay youyay ainedtray inyay ayay waryay academyyay, earninglay ategystray, acticstay, andyay ilitarymay istoryhay. 
 Oryay youyay ightmay ebay elf-taught—unpolishedsay utbay wellyay estedtay. 
 Idday youyay aketay upyay ethay wordsay asyay ayay wayyay otay escapeyay ethay imitslay ofyay ifelay onyay ayay armfay, oryay areyay youyay ollowingfay ayay oudpray amilyfay aditiontray?  Whereyay idday youyay acquireyay youryay weaponsyay andyay armoryay?  Eythay ightmay avehay eenbay ilitarymay issueyay oryay amilyfay eirloomshay, oryay erhapspay youyay impedscray andyay avedsay orfay yearstoyay uybay emthay. 
 Youryay armamentsyay areyay ownay amongyay youryay ostmay importantyay ossessions—thepay onlyyay ingsthay atthay andstay etweenbay youyay andyay eath’sday embraceyay. Quickyay  Uildbay Youyay ancay akemay ayay ighterfay quicklyyay ybay ollowingfay esethay uggestionssay. 
 Irstfay, akemay  Engthstray oryay  Exterityday youryay ighesthay abilityyay orescay, ependingday onyay whetheryay youyay wantyay otay ocusfay onyay eleemay weaponsyay oryay onyay archeryyay (oryay inessefay weaponsyay). 
 Youryay ext-highestnay orescay ouldshay ebay  Onstitutioncay, oryay  Intelligenceyay ifyay youyay anplay otay adoptyay ethay  Eldritchyay  Ightknay artialmay archetypeyay. 
 Illsskay:  Oosechay wotay illsskay omfray  Acrobaticsyay,  Animalyay  Andlinghay,  Athleticsyay,  Istoryhay,  Insightyay,  Intimidationyay,  Erceptionpay, andyay  Urvivalsay Equipmentyay Youyay artstay withyay ethay ollowingfay equipmentyay, inyay additionyay otay ethay equipmentyay antedgray ybay youryay ackgroundbay:• (ayay) ainchay ailmay oryay (bay) eatherlay, ongbowlay, andyay 20 arrowsyay• (ayay) ayay artialmay weaponyay andyay ayay ieldshay oryay (bay) wotay artialmay weaponsyay• (ayay) ayay ightlay ossbowcray andyay 20 oltsbay oryay (bay) wotay andaxeshay• (ayay) ayay ungeoneer’sday ackpay oryay (bay) anyay explorer’syay ackpay Ightingfay  Ylestay Youyay adoptyay ayay articularpay ylestay ofyay ightingfay asyay youryay ecialtyspay. 
 Oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay optionsyay. 
 Youyay an’tcay aketay ayay  Ightingfay  Ylestay optionyay oremay anthay onceyay, evenyay ifyay youyay aterlay etgay otay oosechay againyay. Archeryyay Youyay aingay ayay +2 onusbay otay attackyay ollsray youyay akemay withyay angedray weaponsyay. Efenseday Whileyay youyay areyay wearingyay armoryay, youyay aingay ayay +1 onusbay otay ACyay. Uelingday Whenyay youyay areyay wieldingyay ayay eleemay weaponyay inyay oneyay andhay andyay onay otheryay weaponsyay, youyay aingay ayay +2 onusbay otay amageday ollsray withyay atthay weaponyay. Eatgray  Weaponyay  Ightingfay Whenyay youyay ollray ayay 1 oryay 2 onyay ayay amageday ieday orfay anyay attackyay youyay akemay withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay atthay youyay areyay wieldingyay withyay wotay andshay, youyay ancay erollray ethay ieday andyay ustmay useyay ethay ewnay ollray, evenyay ifyay ethay ewnay ollray isyay ayay 1 oryay ayay 2. 
 Ethay weaponyay ustmay avehay ethay wo-handedtay oryay ersatilevay opertypray orfay youyay otay aingay isthay enefitbay. Otectionpray Whenyay ayay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay attacksyay ayay argettay otheryay anthay youyay atthay isyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay imposeyay isadvantageday onyay ethay attackyay ollray. 
 Youyay ustmay ebay wieldingyay ayay ieldshay. Wotay- Weaponyay  Ightingfay Whenyay youyay engageyay inyay wo-weapontay ightingfay, youyay ancay addyay youryay abilityyay odifiermay otay ethay amageday ofyay ethay econdsay attackyay. Econdsay  Windyay Youyay avehay ayay imitedlay wellyay ofyay aminastay atthay youyay ancay awdray onyay otay otectpray yourselfyay omfray armhay. 
 Onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay otay egainray ithay ointspay equalyay otay 1day10 + youryay ighterfay evellay. Onceyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay, youyay ustmay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray eforebay youyay ancay useyay ityay againyay. Actionyay  Urgesay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay ushpay yourselfyay eyondbay youryay ormalnay imitslay orfay ayay omentmay. 
 Onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay aketay oneyay additionalyay actionyay onyay optay ofyay youryay egularray actionyay andyay ayay ossiblepay onusbay actionyay. Onceyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay, youyay ustmay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray eforebay youyay ancay useyay ityay againyay. 
 Artingstay atyay 17thay evellay, youyay ancay useyay ityay wicetay eforebay ayay estray, utbay onlyyay onceyay onyay ethay amesay urntay. Artialmay  Archetypeyay Atyay 3rday evellay, youyay oosechay anyay archetypeyay atthay youyay ivestray otay emulateyay inyay youryay ombatcay ylesstay andyay echniquestay. 
 Oosechay  Ampionchay,  Attlebay  Astermay, oryay  Eldritchyay  Ightknay, allyay etailedday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay escriptionday. 
 Ethay archetypeyay youyay oosechay antsgray youyay eaturesfay atyay 3rday evellay andyay againyay atyay 7thay, 10thay, 15thay, andyay 18thay evellay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay Whenyay youyay eachray 4thay evellay, andyay againyay atyay 6thay, 8thay, 12thay, 14thay, 16thay, andyay 19thay evellay, youyay ancay increaseyay oneyay abilityyay orescay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 2, oryay youyay ancay increaseyay wotay abilityyay oresscay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 1. 
 Asyay ormalnay, youyay an’tcay increaseyay anyay abilityyay orescay aboveyay 20 usingyay isthay eaturefay. Extrayay  Attackyay  Eginningbay atyay 5thay evellay, youyay ancay attackyay wicetay, insteadyay ofyay onceyay, wheneveryay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. Ethay umbernay ofyay attacksyay increasesyay otay eethray whenyay youyay eachray 11thay evellay inyay isthay assclay andyay otay ourfay whenyay youyay eachray 20thay evellay inyay isthay assclay. Indomitableyay  Eginningbay atyay 9thay evellay, youyay ancay erollray ayay avingsay owthray atthay youyay ailfay. 
 Ifyay youyay oday osay, youyay ustmay useyay ethay ewnay ollray, andyay youyay an’tcay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Youyay ancay useyay isthay eaturefay wicetay etweenbay onglay estsray artingstay atyay 13thay evellay andyay eethray imestay etweenbay onglay estsray artingstay atyay 17thay evellay. Artialmay  Archetypesyay Ifferentday ightersfay oosechay ifferentday approachesyay otay erfectingpay eirthay ightingfay owesspray. 
 Additionalyay  Ightingfay  Ylestay Atyay 10thay evellay, youyay ancay oosechay ayay econdsay optionyay omfray ethay Ightingfay  Ylestay assclay eaturefay. Urvivorsay Atyay 18thay evellay, youyay attainyay ethay innaclepay ofyay esilienceray inyay attlebay. 
 Atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay, youyay egainray ithay ointspay equalyay otay 5 + youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay ifyay youyay avehay onay oremay anthay alfhay ofyay youryay ithay ointspay eftlay. 
 Youyay on’tday aingay isthay enefitbay ifyay youyay avehay 0 ithay ointspay. Attlebay  Astermay Osethay whoyay emulateyay ethay archetypalyay  Attlebay  Astermay employyay artialmay echniquestay assedpay ownday oughthray enerationsgay. 
 Otay ayay  Attlebay  Astermay, ombatcay isyay anyay academicyay ieldfay, ometimessay includingyay ubjectssay eyondbay attlebay uchsay asyay weaponsmithingyay andyay alligraphycay. 
 Otnay everyyay ighterfay absorbsyay ethay essonslay ofyay istoryhay, eorythay, andyay artistryyay atthay areyay eflectedray inyay ethay  Attlebay  Astermay archetypeyay, utbay osethay whoyay oday areyay well-roundedyay ightersfay ofyay eatgray illskay andyay owledgeknay. Ombatcay  Uperioritysay Whenyay youyay oosechay isthay archetypeyay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay earnlay aneuversmay atthay areyay ueledfay ybay ecialspay iceday alledcay uperioritysay iceday. Aneuversmay. 
 Youyay earnlay eethray aneuversmay ofyay youryay oicechay, whichyay areyay etailedday underyay “ Aneuversmay” elowbay. 
 Anymay aneuversmay enhanceyay anyay attackyay inyay omesay wayyay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay onlyyay oneyay aneuvermay erpay attackyay. Youyay earnlay wotay additionalyay aneuversmay ofyay youryay oicechay atyay 7thay, 10thay, andyay 15thay evellay. 
 Eachyay imetay youyay earnlay ewnay aneuversmay, youyay ancay alsoyay eplaceray oneyay aneuvermay youyay owknay withyay ayay ifferentday oneyay. Uperioritysay  Iceday. 
 Youyay avehay ourfay uperioritysay iceday, whichyay areyay sdsay. 
Ayay uperioritysay ieday isyay expendedyay whenyay youyay useyay ityay. 
 Youyay egainray allyay ofyay youryay expendedyay uperioritysay iceday whenyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Youyay aingay anotheryay uperioritysay ieday atyay 7thay evellay andyay oneyay oremay atyay 15thay evellay. Avingsay  Owsthray. 
 Omesay ofyay youryay aneuversmay equireray youryay argettay otay akemay ayay avingsay owthray otay esistray ethay aneuver’smay effectsyay. 
 Ethay avingsay owthray DCay isyay alculatedcay asyay ollowsfay: Aneuvermay avesay DCay = 8 + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Engthstray oryay  Exterityday odifiermay (youryay oicechay) Udentstay ofyay  Waryay Atyay 3rday evellay, youyay aingay oficiencypray withyay oneyay ypetay ofyay artisan’syay oolstay ofyay youryay oicechay. Owknay  Youryay  Enemyyay Artingstay atyay 7thay evellay, ifyay youyay endspay atyay eastlay 1 inutemay observingyay oryay interactingyay withyay anotheryay eaturecray outsideyay ombatcay, youyay ancay earnlay ertaincay informationyay aboutyay itsyay apabilitiescay omparedcay otay youryay ownyay. 
•  Engthstray orescay•  Exterityday orescay•  Onstitutioncay orescay•  Armoryay  Assclay•  Urrentcay ithay ointspay•  Otaltay assclay evelslay (ifyay anyyay)•  Ighterfay assclay evelslay (ifyay anyyay) Improvedyay  Ombatcay  Uperioritysay Atyay 10thay evellay, youryay uperioritysay iceday urntay intoyay 0sdsay. 
 At18thyay evellay, eythay urntay intoyay sdlsay. Elentlessray Artingstay atyay 15thay evellay, whenyay youyay ollray initiativeyay andyay avehay onay uperioritysay iceday emainingray, youyay egainray 1 uperioritysay ieday. Aneuversmay Ethay aneuversmay areyay esentedpray inyay alphabeticalyay orderyay. Ommander’scay  Ikestray. 
 Whenyay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay orgofay oneyay ofyay youryay attacksyay andyay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay otay irectday oneyay ofyay youryay ompanionscay otay ikestray. 
 Whenyay youyay oday osay, oosechay ayay iendlyfray eaturecray whoyay ancay eesay oryay earhay youyay andyay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday. 
 Atthay eaturecray ancay immediatelyyay useyay itsyay eactionray otay akemay oneyay weaponyay attackyay, addingyay ethay uperioritysay ieday otay ethay attack’syay amageday ollray. Isarmingday  Attackyay. 
 Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday otay attemptyay otay isarmday ethay argettay, orcingfay ityay otay opdray oneyay itemyay ofyay youryay oicechay atthay it’syay oldinghay. 
 Youyay addyay ethay uperioritysay ieday otay ethay attack’syay amageday ollray, andyay ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Engthstray avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ityay opsdray ethay objectyay youyay oosechay. 
 Ethay objectyay andslay atyay itsyay eetfay. Istractingday  Ikestray. 
 Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday otay istractday ethay eaturecray, ivinggay youryay alliesyay anyay openingyay. 
 Youyay addyay ethay uperioritysay ieday otay ethay attack’syay amageday ollray. 
 Ethay extnay attackyay ollray againstyay ethay argettay ybay anyay attackeryay otheryay anthay youyay ashay advantageyay ifyay ethay attackyay isyay ademay eforebay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Evasiveyay  Ootworkfay. 
 Whenyay youyay ovemay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday, ollingray ethay ieday andyay addingyay ethay umbernay olledray otay youryay ACyay untilyay youyay opstay ovingmay. Eintingfay  Attackyay. 
 Youyay ancay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday andyay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay otay eintfay, oosingchay oneyay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay asyay youryay argettay. 
 Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay youryay extnay attackyay ollray againstyay atthay eaturecray. 
 Ifyay atthay attackyay itshay, addyay ethay uperioritysay ieday otay ethay attack’syay amageday ollray. Oadinggay  Attackyay. 
 Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday otay attemptyay otay oadgay ethay argettay intoyay attackingyay youyay. 
 Youyay addyay ethay uperioritysay ieday otay ethay attack’syay amageday ollray, andyay ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay argettay ashay isadvantageday onyay allyay attackyay ollsray againstyay argetstay otheryay anthay youyay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Unginglay  Attackyay. 
 Whenyay youyay akemay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday otay increaseyay youryay eachray orfay atthay attackyay ybay 5 eetfay. 
 Ifyay youyay ithay, youyay addyay ethay uperioritysay ieday otay ethay attack’syay amageday ollray. Aneuveringmay  Attackyay. 
 Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday otay aneuvermay oneyay ofyay youryay omradescay intoyay ayay oremay advantageousyay ositionpay. 
 Youyay addyay ethay uperioritysay ieday otay ethay attack’syay amageday ollray, andyay youyay oosechay ayay iendlyfray eaturecray whoyay ancay eesay oryay earhay youyay. 
 Atthay eaturecray ancay useyay itsyay eactionray otay ovemay upyay otay alfhay itsyay eedspay withoutyay ovokingpray opportunityyay attacksyay omfray ethay argettay ofyay youryay attackyay. Enacingmay  Attackyay. 
 Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday otay attemptyay otay ightenfray ethay argettay. 
 Youyay addyay ethay uperioritysay ieday otay ethay attack’syay amageday ollray, andyay ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ityay isyay ightenedfray ofyay youyay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Arrypay. 
 Whenyay anotheryay eaturecray amagesday youyay withyay ayay eleemay attackyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray andyay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday otay educeray ethay amageday ybay ethay umbernay youyay ollray onyay youryay uperioritysay ieday + youryay  Exterityday odifiermay. Ecisionpray  Attackyay. 
 Whenyay youyay akemay ayay weaponyay attackyay ollray againstyay ayay eaturecray, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday otay addyay ityay otay ethay ollray. 
 Youyay ancay useyay isthay aneuvermay eforebay oryay afteryay akingmay ethay attackyay ollray, utbay eforebay anyyay effectsyay ofyay ethay attackyay areyay appliedyay. Ushingpay  Attackyay. 
 Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday otay attemptyay otay ivedray ethay argettay ackbay. 
 Youyay addyay ethay uperioritysay ieday otay ethay attack'syay amageday ollray, andyay ifyay ethay argettay isyay  Argelay oryay allersmay, ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Engthstray avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, youyay ushpay ethay argettay upyay otay 15 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay. Allyray. 
 Onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay andyay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday otay olsterbay ethay esolveray ofyay oneyay ofyay youryay ompanionscay. 
 Whenyay youyay oday osay, oosechay ayay iendlyfray eaturecray whoyay ancay eesay oryay earhay youyay. 
 Atthay eaturecray ainsgay emporarytay ithay ointspay equalyay otay ethay uperioritysay ieday ollray + youryay  Arismachay odifiermay. Iposteray. 
 Whenyay ayay eaturecray issesmay youyay withyay ayay eleemay attackyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray andyay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday otay akemay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay againstyay ethay eaturecray. 
 Ifyay youyay ithay, youyay addyay ethay uperioritysay ieday otay ethay attack'syay amageday ollray. Weepingsay  Attackyay. 
 Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday otay attemptyay otay amageday anotheryay eaturecray withyay ethay amesay attackyay. 
 Oosechay anotheryay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay originalyay argettay andyay withinyay youryay eachray. 
 Ifyay ethay originalyay attackyay ollray wouldyay ithay ethay econdsay eaturecray, ityay akestay amageday equalyay otay ethay umbernay youyay ollray onyay youryay uperioritysay ieday. 
 Ethay amageday isyay ofyay ethay amesay ypetay ealtday ybay ethay originalyay attackyay. Iptray  Attackyay. 
 Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay uperioritysay ieday otay attemptyay otay ockknay ethay argettay ownday. 
 Youyay addyay ethay uperioritysay ieday otay ethay attack’syay amageday ollray, andyay ifyay ethay argettay isyay  Argelay oryay allersmay, ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Engthstray avingsay owthray.
