 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, youyay ockknay ethay argettay onepray. Eldritchyay  Ightknay Ethay archetypalyay  Eldritchyay  Ightknay ombinescay ethay artialmay asterymay ommoncay otay allyay ightersfay withyay ayay arefulcay udystay ofyay agicmay. 
 Eldritchyay  Ightsknay useyay agicalmay echniquestay imilarsay otay osethay acticedpray ybay wizardsyay. 
onyay wotay ofyay ethay eightyay oolsschay ofyay agicmay: abjurationyay andyay evocationyay. 
 Abjurationyay ellsspay antgray anyay  Eldritchyay  Ightknay additionalyay otectionpray inyay attlebay, andyay evocationyay ellsspay ealday amageday otay anymay oesfay atyay onceyay, extendingyay ethay ighter’sfay eachray inyay ombatcay. 
 Esethay ightsknay earnlay ayay omparativelycay allsmay umbernay ofyay ellsspay, ommittingcay emthay otay emorymay insteadyay ofyay eepingkay emthay inyay ayay ellbookspay. Ellcastingspay Whenyay youyay eachray 3rday evellay, youyay augmentyay youryay artialmay owesspray withyay ethay abilityyay otay astcay ellsspay. 
 Eesay apterchay 10 orfay ethay eneralgay ulesray ofyay ellcastingspay andyay apterchay 11 orfay ethay wizardyay ellspay istlay. Antripscay. 
 Youyay earnlay wotay antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay wizardyay ellspay istlay. 
 Youyay earnlay anyay additionalyay wizardyay antripcay ofyay youryay oicechay atyay 10thay evellay. Ellspay  Otsslay. 
 Ethay  Eldritchyay  Ightknay  Ellcastingspay abletay owsshay owhay anymay ellspay otsslay youyay avehay otay astcay youryay ellsspay ofyay 1stay evellay andyay igherhay. 
 Otay astcay oneyay ofyay esethay ellsspay, youyay ustmay expendyay ayay otslay ofyay ethay ell’sspay evellay oryay igherhay. 
 Youyay egainray allyay expendedyay ellspay otsslay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay owknay ethay 1levelstlay ellspay ieldshay andyay avehay ayay 1levelstlay andyay ayay 2levelndlay ellspay otslay availableyay, youyay ancay astcay ieldshay usingyay eitheryay otslay. Ellsspay  Ownknay ofyay 1stay- Evellay andyay  Igherhay. 
 Youyay owknay eethray 1levelstlay wizardyay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay, wotay ofyay whichyay youyay ustmay oosechay omfray ethay abjurationyay andyay evocationyay ellsspay onyay ethay wizardyay ellspay istlay. Ethay  Ellsspay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Eldritchyay  Ightknay  Ellcastingspay abletay owsshay whenyay youyay earnlay oremay wizardyay ellsspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay. 
 Eachyay ofyay esethay ellsspay ustmay ebay anyay abjurationyay oryay evocationyay ellspay ofyay youryay oicechay, andyay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay. 
 Orfay instanceyay, whenyay youyay eachray 7thay evellay inyay isthay assclay, youyay ancay earnlay oneyay ewnay ellspay ofyay 1stay oryay 2nday evellay. Ethay ellsspay youyay earnlay atyay 8thay, 14thay, andyay 20thay evellay ancay omecay omfray anyyay oolschay ofyay agicmay. Wheneveryay youyay aingay ayay evellay inyay isthay assclay, youyay ancay eplaceray oneyay ofyay ethay wizardyay ellsspay youyay owknay withyay anotheryay ellspay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay wizardyay ellspay istlay. 
 Ethay ewnay ellspay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay, andyay ityay ustmay ebay anyay abjurationyay oryay evocationyay ellspay, unlessyay you’reyay eplacingray ethay ellspay youyay ainedgay atyay 8thay, 14thay, oryay 20thay evellay. Ellcastingspay  Abilityyay. 
 Intelligenceyay isyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay youryay wizardyay ellsspay, incesay youyay earnlay youryay ellsspay oughthray udystay andyay emorizationmay. 
 Youyay useyay youryay  Intelligenceyay wheneveryay ayay ellspay efersray otay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, youyay useyay youryay  Intelligenceyay odifiermay whenyay ettingsay ethay avingsay owthray DCay orfay ayay wizardyay ellspay youyay astcay andyay whenyay akingmay anyay attackyay ollray withyay oneyay. Ellspay avesay DCay = 8 + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Intelligenceyay odifiermay Ellspay attackyay odifiermay = youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Intelligenceyay odifiermay Weaponyay  Ondbay Atyay 3rday evellay, youyay earnlay ayay itualray atthay eatescray ayay agicalmay ondbay etweenbay yourselfyay andyay oneyay weaponyay. 
 Youyay erformpay ethay itualray overyay ethay oursecay ofyay 1 ourhay, whichyay ancay ebay oneduringday ayay ortshay estray. 
 Ethay weaponyay ustmay ebay withinyay youryay eachray oughoutthray ethay itualray, atyay ethay onclusioncay ofyay whichyay youyay ouchtay ethay weaponyay andyay orgefay ethay ondbay. Onceyay youyay avehay ondedbay ayay weaponyay otay yourselfyay, youyay an’tcay ebay isarmedday ofyay atthay weaponyay unlessyay youyay areyay incapacitatedyay. 
 Ifyay ityay isyay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay, youyay ancay ummonsay atthay weaponyay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, ausingcay ityay otay eleporttay instantlyyay otay youryay andhay. Youyay ancay avehay upyay otay wotay ondedbay weaponsyay, utbay ancay ummonsay onlyyay oneyay atyay ayay imetay withyay youryay onusbay actionyay. Ifyay youyay attemptyay otay ondbay withyay ayay irdthay weaponyay, youyay ustmay eakbray ethay ondbay withyay oneyay ofyay ethay otheryay wotay. Waryay  Agicmay Eginningbay atyay 7thay evellay, whenyay youyay useyay youryay actionyay otay astcay ayay antripcay, youyay ancay akemay oneyay weaponyay attackyay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay. Eldritchyay  Ikestray Atyay 10thay evellay, youyay earnlay owhay otay akemay youryay weaponyay ikesstray undercutyay ayay eature’scray esistanceray otay youryay ellsspay. 
 Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, atthay eaturecray ashay isadvantageday onyay ethay extnay avingsay owthray ityay akesmay againstyay ayay ellspay youyay astcay eforebay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Arcaneyay  Argechay Atyay 15thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay eleporttay upyay otay 30 eetfay otay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay youyay ancay eesay whenyay youyay useyay youryay  Actionyay  Urgesay. 
 Onkmay Erhay istsfay ayay urblay asyay eythay eflectday anyay incomingyay ailhay ofyay arrowsyay, ayay alf-elfhay ingsspray overyay ayay arricadebay andyay owsthray erselfhay intoyay ethay assedmay anksray ofyay obgoblinshay onyay ethay otheryay idesay. 
 Eshay whirlsyay amongyay emthay, ockingknay eirthay owsblay asideyay andyay endingsay emthay eelingray, untilyay atyay astlay eshay andsstay aloneyay. Akingtay ayay eepday eathbray, ayay umanhay overedcay inyay attoostay ettlessay intoyay ayay attlebay ancestay. 
 Asyay ethay irstfay argingchay orcsyay eachray imhay, ehay exhalesyay andyay ayay astblay ofyay irefay oarsray omfray ishay outhmay, engulfingyay ishay oesfay. Ovingmay withyay ethay ilencesay ofyay ethay ightnay, ayay ack-cladblay alflinghay epsstay intoyay ayay adowshay eneathbay anyay archyay andyay emergesyay omfray anotheryay inkyyay adowshay onyay ayay alconybay ayay one’sstay owthray awayyay. 
 Eshay idesslay erhay adeblay eefray ofyay itsyay othclay- wrappedyay abbardscay andyay eerspay oughthray ethay openyay windowyay atyay ethay yranttay incepray, osay ulnerablevay inyay ethay ipgray ofyay eepslay. Whateveryay eirthay isciplineday, onksmay areyay unitedyay inyay eirthay abilityyay otay agicallymay arnesshay ethay energyyay atthay owsflay inyay eirthay odiesbay. 
 Whetheryay anneledchay asyay ayay ikingstray isplayday ofyay ombatcay owesspray oryay ayay ubtlersay ocusfay ofyay efensiveday abilityyay andyay eedspay, isthay energyyay infusesyay allyay atthay ayay onkmay oesday. Ethay  Agicmay ofyay  Ikay Onksmay akemay arefulcay udystay ofyay ayay agicalmay energyyay atthay ostmay onasticmay aditionstray allcay ikay. 
 Isthay energyyay isyay anyay elementyay ofyay ethay agicmay atthay uffusessay ethay ultiverse—specificallymay, ethay elementyay atthay owsflay oughthray ivinglay odiesbay. 
 Onksmay arnesshay isthay owerpay withinyay emselvesthay otay eatecray agicalmay effectsyay andyay exceedyay eirthay odiesbay' ysicalphay apabilitiescay, andyay omesay ofyay eirthay ecialspay attacksyay ancay inderhay ethay owflay ofyay ikay inyay eirthay opponentsyay. 
 Usingyay isthay energyyay, onksmay annelchay uncannyyay eedspay andyay engthstray intoyay eirthay unarmedyay ikesstray. 
 Asyay eythay aingay experienceyay, eirthay artialmay ainingtray andyay eirthay asterymay ofyay ikay ivesgay emthay oremay owerpay overyay eirthay odiesbay andyay ethay odiesbay ofyay eirthay oesfay. Ainingtray andyay  Asceticismyay Allsmay walledyay oistersclay otday ethay andscapeslay ofyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay, inytay efugesray omfray ethay owflay ofyay ordinaryyay ifelay, whereyay imetay eemssay otay andstay illstay. 
 Ethay onksmay whoyay ivelay erethay eeksay ersonalpay erfectionpay oughthray ontemplationcay andyay igorousray ainingtray. 
 Anymay enteredyay ethay onasterymay asyay ildrenchay, entsay otay ivelay erethay whenyay eirthay arentspay iedday, whenyay oodfay ouldn’tcay ebay oundfay otay upportsay emthay, oryay inyay eturnray orfay omesay indnesskay atthay ethay onksmay adhay erformedpay orfay eirthay amiliesfay. Omesay onksmay ivelay entirelyyay apartyay omfray ethay urroundingsay opulationpay, ecludedsay omfray anythingyay atthay ightmay impedeyay eirthay iritualspay ogresspray. 
emergingyay onlyyay otay ervesay asyay iesspay oryay assassinsyay atyay ethay ommandcay ofyay eirthay eaderlay, ayay oblenay atronpay, oryay omesay otheryay ortalmay oryay ivineday owerpay. Ethay ajoritymay ofyay onksmay on’tday unshay eirthay eighborsnay, akingmay equentfray isitsvay otay earbynay ownstay oryay illagesvay andyay exchangingyay eirthay ervicesay orfay oodfay andyay otheryay oodsgay. 
 Asyay ersatilevay warriorsyay, onksmay oftenyay endyay upyay otectingpray eirthay eighborsnay omfray onstersmay oryay yrantstay. Orfay ayay onkmay, ecomingbay anyay adventureryay eansmay eavinglay ayay ucturedstray, ommunalcay ifestylelay otay ecomebay ayay wandereryay. 
 Isthay ancay ebay ayay arshhay ansitiontray, andyay onksmay on’tday undertakeyay ityay ightlylay. 
 Osethay whoyay eavelay eirthay oistersclay aketay eirthay workyay eriouslysay, approachingyay eirthay adventuresyay asyay ersonalpay eststay ofyay eirthay ysicalphay andyay iritualspay owthgray. Asyay ayay uleray, onksmay arecay ittlelay orfay aterialmay wealthyay andyay areyay ivendray ybay ayay esireday otay accomplishyay ayay eatergray issionmay anthay erelymay ayingslay onstersmay andyay underingplay eirthay easure.CREATINGtray Ayay ONKMay Asyay youyay akemay youryay onkmay aracterchay, inkthay aboutyay youryay onnectioncay otay ethay onasterymay whereyay youyay earnedlay youryay illsskay andyay entspay youryay ormativefay yearsyay. 
 Wereyay youyay anyay orphanyay oryay ayay ildchay eftlay onyay ethay onastery’smay esholdthray?  Idday youryay arentspay omisepray youyay otay ethay onasterymay inyay atitudegray orfay ayay ervicesay erformedpay ybay ethay onksmay?  Idday youyay enteryay isthay ecludedsay ifelay otay idehay omfray ayay imecray youyay ommittedcay?  Oryay idday youyay oosechay ethay onasticmay ifelay orfay yourselfyay? Onsidercay whyyay youyay eftlay. 
 Idday ethay eadhay ofyay youryay onasterymay oosechay youyay orfay ayay articularlypay importantyay issionmay eyondbay ethay oisterclay?  Erhapspay youyay wereyay astcay outyay ecausebay ofyay omesay iolationvay ofyay ethay ommunity’scay ulesray. 
 Idday youyay eaddray eavinglay, oryay wereyay youyay appyhay otay ogay?  Isyay erethay omethingsay youyay opehay otay accomplishyay outsideyay ethay onasterymay?  Areyay youyay eageryay otay eturnray otay youryay omehay? Asyay ayay esultray ofyay ethay ucturedstray ifelay ofyay ayay onasticmay ommunitycay andyay ethay isciplineday equiredray otay arnesshay ikay, onksmay areyay almostyay alwaysyay awfullay inyay alignmentyay. Quickyay  Uildbay Youyay ancay akemay ayay onkmay quicklyyay ybay ollowingfay esethay uggestionssay. 
 Irstfay, akemay  Exterityday youryay ighesthay abilityyay orescay, ollowedfay ybay  Wisdomyay. 
 Unarmoredyay  Efenseday Eginningbay atyay 1stay evellay, whileyay youyay areyay wearingyay onay armoryay andyay otnay wieldingyay ayay ieldshay, youryay ACyay equalsyay 10 + youryay  Exterityday odifiermay + youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay. Artialmay  Artsyay Atyay 1stay evellay, youryay acticepray ofyay artialmay artsyay ivesgay youyay asterymay ofyay ombatcay ylesstay atthay useyay unarmedyay ikesstray andyay onkmay weaponsyay, whichyay areyay ortswordsshay andyay anyyay implesay eleemay weaponsyay atthay on’tday avehay ethay wo-handedtay oryay eavyhay opertypray. Youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay whileyay youyay areyay unarmedyay oryay wieldingyay onlyyay onkmay weaponsyay andyay youyay aren’tyay wearingyay armoryay oryay wieldingyay ayay ieldshay:•  Youyay ancay useyay  Exterityday insteadyay ofyay  Engthstray orfay ethay attackyay andyay amageday ollsray ofyay youryay unarmedyay ikesstray andyay onkmay weaponsyay.•  Youyay ancay ollray ayay day4 inyay aceplay ofyay ethay ormalnay amageday ofyay youryay unarmedyay ikestray oryay onkmay weaponyay. 
 Isthay ieday angeschay asyay youyay aingay onkmay evelslay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Artialmay  Artsyay olumncay ofyay ethay  Onkmay abletay.•  Whenyay youyay useyay ethay  Attackyay actionyay withyay anyay unarmedyay ikestray oryay ayay onkmay weaponyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay akemay oneyay unarmedyay ikestray asyay ayay onusbay actionyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay andyay attackyay withyay ayay quarteryay- affstay, youyay ancay alsoyay akemay anyay unarmedyay ikestray asyay ayay onusbay actionyay, assumingyay youyay aven'thay alreadyyay akentay ayay onusbay actionyay isthay urntay. Ertaincay onasteriesmay useyay ecializedspay ormsfay ofyay ethay onkmay weaponsyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, youyay ightmay useyay ayay ubclay atthay isyay wotay engthslay ofyay woodyay onnectedcay ybay ayay ortshay ainchay (alledcay ayay unchakunay) oryay ayay icklesay withyay ayay ortershay, aighterstray adeblay (alledcay ayay amakay). 
 Whateveryay amenay youyay useyay orfay ayay onkmay weaponyay, youyay ancay useyay ethay amegay atisticsstay ovidedpray orfay ethay weaponyay inyay apterchay 5. Ikay  Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youryay ainingtray allowsyay youyay otay arnesshay ethay ysticmay energyyay ofyay ikay. 
 Youryay accessyay otay isthay energyyay isyay epresentedray ybay ayay umbernay ofyay ikay ointspay. 
 Youryay onkmay evellay eterminesday ethay umbernay ofyay ointspay youyay avehay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Ikay  Ointspay olumncay ofyay ethay  Onkmay abletay. Youyay ancay endspay esethay ointspay otay uelfay ariousvay ikay eaturesfay. 
 Youyay artstay owingknay eethray uchsay eaturesfay:  Urryflay ofyay  Owsblay,  Atientpay  Efenseday, andyay  Epstay ofyay ethay  Windyay. 
 Youyay earnlay oremay ikay eaturesfay asyay youyay aingay evelslay inyay isthay assclay. Whenyay youyay endspay ayay ikay ointpay, ityay isyay unavailableyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray, atyay ethay endyay ofyay whichyay youyay awdray allyay ofyay youryay expendedyay ikay ackbay intoyay yourselfyay. 
 Youyay ustmay endspay atyay eastlay 30 inutesmay ofyay ethay estray editatingmay otay egainray youryay ikay ointspay. Omesay ofyay youryay ikay eaturesfay equireray youryay argettay otay akemay ayay avingsay owthray otay esistray ethay eature’sfay effectsyay. 
 Ethay avingsay owthray DCay isyay alculatedcay asyay ollowsfay: Ikay avesay DCay = 8 + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay Urryflay ofyay  Owsblay Immediatelyyay afteryay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay endspay 1 ikay ointpay otay akemay wotay unarmedyay ikesstray asyay ayay onusbay actionyay. Atientpay  Efenseday Youyay ancay endspay 1 ikay ointpay otay aketay ethay  Odgeday actionyay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. Epstay ofyay ethay  Windyay Youyay ancay endspay 1 ikay ointpay otay aketay ethay  Isengageday oryay  Ashday actionyay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, andyay youryay umpjay istanceday isyay oubledday orfay ethay urntay. Unarmoredyay  Ovementmay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youryay eedspay increasesyay ybay 10 eetfay whileyay youyay areyay otnay wearingyay armoryay oryay wieldingyay ayay ieldshay. 
 Isthay onusbay increasesyay whenyay youyay eachray ertaincay onkmay evelslay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Onkmay abletay. Atyay 9thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay ovemay alongyay erticalvay urfacessay andyay acrossyay iquidslay onyay youryay urntay withoutyay allingfay uringday ethay ovemay. Onasticmay  Aditiontray Whenyay youyay eachray 3rday evellay, youyay ommitcay yourselfyay otay ayay onasticmay aditiontray: ethay  Wayyay ofyay ethay  Openyay  Andhay, ethay  Wayyay ofyay  Adowshay, oryay ethay  Wayyay ofyay ethay  Ourfay  Elementsyay, allyay etailedday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay escriptionday. 
 Youryay aditiontray antsgray youyay eaturesfay atyay 3rday evellay andyay againyay atyay 6thay, 11thay, andyay 17thay evellay. Eflectday  Issilesmay  Artingstay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay eflectday oryay atchcay ethay issilemay whenyay youyay areyay ithay ybay ayay angedray weaponyay attackyay. 
 Whenyay youyay oday osay, ethay amageday youyay aketay omfray ethay attackyay isyay educedray ybay 1day10 + youryay  Exterityday odifiermay + youryay onkmay evellay. Ifyay youyay educeray ethay amageday otay 0, youyay ancay atchcay ethay issilemay ifyay ityay isyay allsmay enoughyay orfay youyay otay oldhay inyay oneyay andhay andyay youyay avehay atyay eastlay oneyay andhay eefray. 
 Ifyay youyay atchcay ayay issilemay inyay isthay wayyay, youyay ancay endspay 1 ikay ointpay otay akemay ayay angedray attackyay withyay ethay weaponyay oryay iecepay ofyay ammunitionyay youyay ustjay aughtcay, asyay artpay ofyay ethay amesay eactionray. 
 Youyay akemay isthay attackyay withyay oficiencypray, egardlessray ofyay youryay weaponyay oficienciespray, andyay ethay issilemay ountscay asyay ayay onkmay weaponyay orfay ethay attackyay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay Whenyay youyay eachray 4thay evellay, andyay againyay atyay 8thay, 12thay, 16thay, andyay 19thay evellay, youyay ancay increaseyay oneyay abilityyay orescay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 2, oryay youyay ancay increaseyay wotay abilityyay oresscay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 1. 
 Extrayay  Attackyay Eginningbay atyay 5thay evellay, youyay ancay attackyay wicetay, insteadyay ofyay onceyay, wheneveryay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. Unningstay  Ikestray Artingstay atyay 5thay evellay, youyay ancay interfereyay withyay ethay owflay ofyay ikay inyay anyay opponent’syay odybay. 
 Whenyay youyay ithay anotheryay eaturecray withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay endspay 1 ikay ointpay otay attemptyay ayay unningstay ikestray. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray oryay ebay unnedstay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Ikay- Empoweredyay  Ikesstray Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, youryay unarmedyay ikesstray ountcay asyay agicalmay orfay ethay urposepay ofyay overcomingyay esistanceray andyay immunityyay otay onmagicalnay attacksyay andyay amageday. Evasionyay Atyay 7thay evellay, youryay instinctiveyay agilityyay etslay youyay odgeday outyay ofyay ethay wayyay ofyay ertaincay areayay effectsyay, uchsay asyay ayay ueblay agon’sdray ightninglay eathbray oryay ayay ireballfay ellspay. 
 Whenyay youyay areyay ubjectedsay otay anyay effectyay atthay allowsyay youyay otay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray otay aketay onlyyay alfhay amageday, youyay insteadyay aketay onay amageday ifyay youyay ucceedsay onyay ethay avingsay owthray, andyay onlyyay alfhay amageday ifyay youyay ailfay. Illnessstay ofyay  Indmay Artingstay atyay 7thay evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay endyay oneyay effectyay onyay yourselfyay atthay isyay ausingcay youyay otay ebay armedchay oryay ightenedfray. Uritypay ofyay  Odybay Atyay 10thay evellay, youryay asterymay ofyay ethay ikay owingflay oughthray youyay akesmay youyay immuneyay otay iseaseday andyay oisonpay. Onguetay ofyay ethay  Unsay andyay  Oonmay Artingstay atyay 13thay evellay, youyay earnlay otay ouchtay ethay ikay ofyay otheryay indsmay osay atthay youyay understandyay allyay okenspay anguageslay. 
 Oreovermay, anyyay eaturecray atthay ancay understandyay ayay anguagelay ancay understandyay whatyay youyay aysay. Iamondday  Oulsay Eginningbay atyay 14thay evellay, youryay asterymay ofyay ikay antsgray youyay oficiencypray inyay allyay avingsay owsthray. Additionallyyay, wheneveryay youyay akemay ayay avingsay owthray andyay ailfay, youyay ancay endspay 1 ikay ointpay otay erollray ityay andyay aketay ethay econdsay esultray. Uringday atthay imetay, youyay alsoyay avehay esistanceray otay allyay amageday utbay orcefay amageday. Additionallyyay, youyay ancay endspay 8 ikay ointspay otay astcay ethay astralyay ojectionpray ellspay, withoutyay eedingnay aterialmay omponentscay. 
 Whenyay youyay oday osay, youyay an’tcay aketay anyyay otheryay eaturescray withyay youyay. Erfectpay  Elfsay Atyay 20thay evellay, whenyay youyay ollray orfay initiativeyay andyay avehay onay ikay ointspay emainingray, youyay egainray 4 ikay ointspay. Onasticmay  Aditionstray Eethray aditionstray ofyay onasticmay ursuitpay areyay ommoncay inyay ethay onasteriesmay atteredscay acrossyay ethay ultiversemay. 
 Ostmay onasteriesmay acticepray oneyay aditiontray exclusivelyyay, utbay ayay ewfay onorhay ethay eethray aditionstray andyay instructyay eachyay onkmay accordingyay otay ishay oryay erhay aptitudeyay andyay interestyay. 
 Allyay eethray aditionstray elyray onyay ethay amesay asicbay echniquestay, ivergingday asyay ethay udentstay owsgray oremay adeptyay. 
 Usthay, ayay onkmay eednay oosechay ayay aditiontray onlyyay uponyay eachingray 3rday evellay. Wayyay ofyay ethay  Openyay  Andhay  Onksmay ofyay ethay  Wayyay ofyay ethay  Openyay  Andhay areyay ethay ultimateyay astersmay ofyay artialmay artsyay ombatcay, whetheryay armedyay oryay unarmedyay. 
 Eythay earnlay echniquestay otay ushpay andyay iptray eirthay opponentsyay, anipulatemay ikay otay ealhay amageday otay eirthay odiesbay, andyay acticepray advancedyay editationmay atthay ancay otectpray emthay omfray armhay. Openyay  Andhay  Echniquetay Artingstay whenyay youyay oosechay isthay aditiontray atyay 3rday evellay, youyay ancay anipulatemay youryay enemy’syay ikay whenyay youyay arnesshay youryay ownyay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay oneyay ofyay ethay attacksyay antedgray ybay youryay  Urryflay ofyay  Owsblay, youyay ancay imposeyay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay effectsyay onyay atthay argettay:•  Ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay ebay ockedknay onepray.•  Ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Engthstray avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay, youyay ancay ushpay ityay upyay otay 15 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay.•  Ityay an’tcay aketay eactionsray untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Wholenessyay ofyay  Odybay Atyay 6thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay ealhay yourselfyay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay egainray ithay ointspay equalyay otay eethray imestay Imelesstay  Odybay  Atyay 15thay evellay, youryay ikay ustainssay youyay osay atthay youyay uffersay onenay ofyay ethay ailtyfray ofyay oldyay ageyay, andyay youyay an'tcay ebay agedyay agicallymay. 
 Youyay ancay illstay ieday ofyay oldyay ageyay, oweverhay. 
youryay onkmay evellay. 
 Youyay ustmay inishfay ayay onglay estray eforebay youyay ancay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay. Anquilitytray Eginningbay atyay 11thay evellay, youyay ancay enteryay ayay ecialspay editationmay atthay urroundssay youyay withyay anyay aurayay ofyay eacepay. 
 Atyay ethay endyay ofyay ayay onglay estray, youyay aingay ethay effectyay ofyay ayay anctuarysay ellspay atthay astslay untilyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay onglay estray (ethay ellspay ancay endyay earlyyay asyay ormalnay). 
 Ethay avingsay owthray DCay orfay ethay ellspay equalsyay 8 + youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay + youryay oficiencypray onusbay. Quiveringyay  Almpay Atyay 17thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay etsay upyay ethallay ibrationsvay inyay omeone’ssay odybay. 
 Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay anyay unarmedyay ikestray, youyay ancay endspay 3 ikay ointspay otay artstay esethay imperceptibleyay ibrationsvay, whichyay astlay orfay ayay umbernay ofyay aysday equalyay otay youryay onkmay evellay. 
 Ethay ibrationsvay areyay armlesshay unlessyay youyay useyay youryay actionyay otay endyay emthay. Otay oday osay, youyay andyay ethay argettay ustmay ebay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay. 
 Whenyay youyay useyay isthay actionyay, ethay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay, ityay isyay educedray otay 0 ithay ointspay. 
 Ifyay ityay ucceedssay, ityay akestay 10day10 ecroticnay amageday. Youyay ancay avehay onlyyay oneyay eaturecray underyay ethay effectyay ofyay isthay eaturefay atyay ayay imetay. 
 Youyay ancay oosechay otay endyay ethay ibrationsvay armlesslyhay withoutyay usingyay anyay actionyay. Wayyay ofyay  Adowshay  Onksmay ofyay ethay  Wayyay ofyay  Adowshay ollowfay ayay aditiontray atthay aluesvay ealthstay andyay ubterfugesay. 
 Esethay onksmay ightmay ebay alledcay injasnay oryay adowdancersshay, andyay eythay ervesay asyay iesspay andyay assassinsyay. 
 Ometimessay ethay embersmay ofyay ayay injanay onasterymay areyay amilyfay embersmay, ormingfay ayay anclay wornsay otay ecrecysay aboutyay eirthay artsyay andyay issionsmay. 
 Otheryay onasteriesmay areyay oremay ikelay ievesthay’ uildsgay, iringhay outyay eirthay ervicessay otay oblesnay, ichray erchantsmay, oryay anyoneyay elseyay whoyay ancay aypay eirthay eesfay. 
 Egardlessray ofyay eirthay ethodsmay, ethay eadshay ofyay esethay onasteriesmay expectyay ethay unquestioningyay obedienceyay ofyay eirthay udentsstay. Adowshay  Artsyay Artingstay whenyay youyay oosechay isthay aditiontray atyay 3rday evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay ikay otay uplicateday ethay effectsyay ofyay ertaincay ellsspay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay endspay 2 ikay ointspay otay astcay arknessday, arkvisionday, asspay withoutyay acetray, oryay ilencesay, withoutyay ovidingpray aterialmay omponentscay. 
 Additionallyyay, youyay aingay ethay inormay illusionyay antripcay ifyay youyay on’tday alreadyyay owknay ityay. Adowshay  Epstay Atyay 6thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay epstay omfray oneyay adowshay intoyay anotheryay. 
 Whenyay youyay areyay inyay imday ightlay oryay arknessday, asyay ayay onusbay actionyay youyay ancay eleporttay upyay otay 60 eetfay otay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay youyay ancay eesay atthay isyay alsoyay inyay imday ightlay oryay arknessday. 
 Youyay enthay avehay advantageyay onyay ethay irstfay eleemay attackyay youyay akemay eforebay ethay endyay ofyay ethay urntay. Oakclay ofyay  Adowsshay Ybay 11thay evellay, youyay avehay earnedlay otay ecomebay oneyay withyay ethay adowsshay. 
 Whenyay youyay areyay inyay anyay areayay ofyay imday ightlay oryay arknessday, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ecomebay invisibleyay. 
 Youyay emainray invisibleyay untilyay youyay akemay anyay attackyay, astcay ayay ellspay, oryay areyay inyay anyay areayay ofyay ightbray ightlay. Opportunistyay Atyay 17thay evellay, youyay ancay exploityay ayay eature'scray omentarymay istractionday whenyay ityay isyay ithay ybay anyay attackyay. 
 Wheneveryay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay isyay ithay ybay anyay attackyay ademay ybay ayay eaturecray otheryay anthay youyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay akemay ayay eleemay attackyay againstyay atthay eaturecray. Wayyay ofyay ethay  Ourfay  Elementsyay Youyay ollowfay ayay onasticmay aditiontray atthay eachestay youyay otay arnesshay ethay elementsyay. 
 Whenyay youyay ocusfay youryay ikay, youyay ancay alignyay yourselfyay withyay ethay orcesfay ofyay eationcray andyay endbay ethay ourfay elementsyay otay youryay willyay, usingyay emthay asyay anyay extensionyay ofyay youryay odybay. 
 Omesay embersmay ofyay isthay aditiontray edicateday emselvesthay otay ayay inglesay elementyay, utbay othersyay weaveyay ethay elementsyay ogethertay. Anymay onksmay ofyay isthay aditiontray attootay eirthay odiesbay withyay epresentationsray ofyay eirthay ikay owerspay, ommonlycay imaginedyay asyay oilingcay agonsdray, utbay alsoyay asyay oenixesphay, ishfay, antsplay, ountainsmay, andyay estingcray wavesyay. Iscipleday ofyay ethay  Elementsyay  Whenyay youyay oosechay isthay aditiontray atyay 3rday evellay, youyay earnlay agicalmay isciplinesday atthay arnesshay ethay owerpay ofyay ethay ourfay elementsyay. 
Ayay isciplineday equiresray youyay otay endspay ikay ointspay eachyay imetay youyay useyay ityay. Youyay owknay ethay  Elementalyay  Attunementyay isciplineday andyay oneyay otheryay elementalyay isciplineday ofyay youryay oicechay, whichyay areyay etailedday inyay ethay “ Elementalyay  Isciplinesday” ectionsay elowbay. 
 Youyay earnlay oneyay additionalyay elementalyay isciplineday ofyay youryay oicechay atyay 6thay, 11thay, andyay 17thay evellay. Wheneveryay youyay earnlay ayay ewnay elementalyay isciplineday, youyay ancay alsoyay eplaceray oneyay elementalyay isciplineday atthay youyay alreadyyay owknay withyay ayay ifferentday isciplineday. Astingcay  Elementalyay  Ellsspay. 
 Omesay elementalyay isciplinesday allowyay youyay otay astcay ellsspay. 
 Eesay apterchay 10 orfay ethay eneralgay ulesray ofyay ellcastingspay. 
 Otay astcay oneyay ofyay esethay ellsspay, youyay useyay itsyay astingcay imetay andyay otheryay ulesray, utbay youyay on’tday eednay otay ovidepray aterialmay omponentscay orfay ityay. Onceyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay inyay isthay assclay, youyay ancay endspay additionalyay ikay ointspay otay increaseyay ethay evellay ofyay anyay elementalyay isciplineday ellspay atthay youyay astcay, ovidedpray atthay ethay ellspay ashay anyay enhancedyay effectyay atyay ayay igherhay evellay, asyay urningbay andshay oesday. 
 Ethay ell'sspay evellay increasesyay ybay 1 orfay eachyay additionalyay ikay ointpay youyay endspay. 
 Elementalyay  Isciplinesday Ethay elementalyay isciplinesday areyay esentedpray inyay alphabeticalyay orderyay. 
 Ifyay ayay isciplineday equiresray ayay evellay, youyay ustmay ebay atthay evellay inyay isthay assclay otay earnlay ethay isciplineday. Eathbray ofyay  Winteryay (17thay  Evellay  Equiredray). 
 Youyay ancay endspay 6 ikay ointspay otay astcay onecay ofyay oldcay. Enchclay ofyay ethay  Orthnay  Windyay (6thay  Evellay  Equiredray). 
 Youyay ancay endspay 3 ikay ointspay otay astcay oldhay ersonpay. Elementalyay  Attunementyay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ieflybray ontrolcay elementalyay orcesfay earbynay, ausingcay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay effectsyay ofyay youryay oicechay:•  Eatecray ayay armlesshay, instantaneousyay ensorysay effectyay elatedray otay airyay, earthyay, irefay, oryay wateryay, uchsay asyay ayay owershay ofyay arksspay, ayay uffpay ofyay windyay, ayay ayspray ofyay ightlay istmay, oryay ayay entlegay umblingray ofyay onestay.•  Instantaneouslyyay ightlay oryay uffsnay outyay ayay andlecay, ayay orchtay, oryay ayay allsmay ampfirecay.•  Illchay oryay warmyay upyay otay 1 oundpay ofyay onlivingnay aterialmay orfay upyay otay 1 ourhay.•  Ausecay earthyay, irefay, wateryay, oryay istmay atthay ancay itfay withinyay ayay 1-ootfay ubecay otay apeshay itselfyay intoyay ayay udecray ormfay youyay esig­nateday orfay 1 inutemay. Eternalyay  Ountainmay  Efenseday (11thay  Evellay  Equiredray). Youyay ancay endspay 5 ikay ointspay otay astcay oneskinstay, argetingtay yourselfyay. Angsfay ofyay ethay  Irefay  Akesnay. 
 Whenyay youyay useyay ethay  Attackyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay endspay 1 ikay ointpay otay ausecay endrilstay ofyay ameflay otay etchstray outyay omfray youryay istsfay andyay eetfay. 
 Youryay eachray withyay youryay unarmedyay ikesstray increasesyay ybay 10 eetfay orfay atthay actionyay, asyay wellyay asyay ethay estray ofyay ethay urn.Atay ithay withyay uchsay anyay attackyay ealsday irefay amageday insteadyay ofyay udgeoningblay amageday, andyay ifyay youyay endspay 1 ikay ointpay whenyay ethay attackyay itshay, ityay alsoyay ealsday anyay extrayay 1day10 irefay amageday. Istfay ofyay  Ourfay  Understhay. 
 Youyay ancay endspay 2 ikay ointspay otay astcay underwavethay. Istfay ofyay  Unbrokenyay  Airyay. 
 Youyay ancay eatecray ayay astblay ofyay ompressedcay airyay atthay ikesstray ikelay ayay ightymay istfay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay endspay 2 ikay ointspay andyay oosechay ayay eaturecray withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Atthay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Engthstray avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray akestay 3day10 udgeoningblay amageday, usplay anyay extrayay 1day10 udgeoningblay amageday orfay eachyay additionalyay ikay ointpay youyay endspay, andyay youyay ancay ushpay ethay eaturecray upyay otay 20 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay andyay ockknay ityay onepray. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay eaturecray akestay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday, andyay youyay on’tday ushpay ityay oryay ockknay ityay onepray. Amesflay ofyay ethay  Oenixphay (11thay  Evellay  Equiredray). 
 Youyay ancay endspay 4 ikay ointspay otay astcay ireballfay. Onggay ofyay ethay  Ummitsay (6thay  Evellay  Equiredray). 
 Youyay ancay endspay 3 ikay ointspay otay astcay attershay. Istmay  Ancestay (11thay  Evellay  Equiredray). 
 Youyay ancay endspay 4 ikay ointspay otay astcay aseousgay ormfay, argetingtay yourselfyay. Ideray ethay  Windyay (11thay  Evellay  Equiredray). 
 Youyay ancay endspay4 ikay ointspay otay astcay yflay, argetingtay yourselfyay. Iverray ofyay  Ungryhay  Ameflay (17thay  Evellay  Equiredray). 
 Youyay ancay endspay 5 ikay ointspay otay astcay wallyay ofyay irefay. Ushray ofyay ethay  Alegay  Iritsspay. 
 Youyay ancay endspay 2 ikay ointspay otay astcay ustgay ofyay windyay. Apeshay ethay  Owingflay  Iverray. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay endspay 1 ikay ointpay otay oosechay anyay areayay ofyay iceyay oryay wateryay onay argerlay anthay 30 eetfay onyay ayay idesay withinyay 120 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Youyay ancay angechay wateryay otay iceyay withinyay ethay areayay andyay icevay ersavay, andyay youyay ancay eshaperay iceyay inyay ethay areayay inyay anyyay annermay youyay oosechay. 
 Youyay ancay aiseray oryay owerlay ethay ice’syay elevationyay, eatecray oryay illfay inyay ayay enchtray, erectyay oryay attenflay ayay wallyay, oryay ormfay ayay illarpay. 
 Ethay extentyay ofyay anyyay uchsay angeschay an’tcay exceedyay alfhay ethay area’syay argestlay imensionday. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay affectyay ayay 30-ootfay quaresay, youyay ancay eatecray ayay illarpay upyay otay 15 eetfay ighhay, aiseray oryay owerlay ethay quare’ssay elevationyay ybay upyay otay 15 eetfay, igday ayay enchtray upyay otay 15 eetfay eepday, andyay osay onyay. 
 Youyay an’tcay apeshay ethay iceyay otay aptray oryay injureyay ayay eaturecray inyay ethay areayay. Weepingsay  Indercay  Ikestray. 
 Youyay ancay endspay 2 ikay ointspay otay astcay urningbay andshay. Wateryay  Whipyay. 
 Youyay ancay endspay 2 ikay ointspay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay otay eatecray ayay whipyay ofyay wateryay atthay ovesshay andyay ullspay ayay eaturecray otay unbalanceyay ityay. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay atthay isyay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray akestay 3day10 udgeoningblay amageday, usplay anyay extrayay 1day10 udgeoningblay amageday orfay eachyay additionalyay ikay ointpay youyay endspay, andyay youyay ancay eitheryay ockknay ityay onepray oryay ullpay ityay upyay otay 25 eetfay oserclay otay youyay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay eaturecray akestay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday, andyay youyay on’tday ullpay ityay oryay ockknay ityay onepray. Waveyay ofyay  Ollingray  Earthyay (17thay  Evellay  Equiredray). 
 Youyay ancay endspay 6 ikay ointspay otay astcay wallyay ofyay onestay. Onasticmay  Ordersyay Ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay ontaincay ayay ultitudemay ofyay onasteriesmay andyay onasticmay aditionstray. 
 Inyay andslay withyay anyay  Asianyay ulturalcay avorflay, uchsay asyay  Oushay  Unglay arfay otay ethay eastyay ofyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray, esethay onasteriesmay areyay associatedyay withyay ilosophicalphay aditionstray andyay artialmay artsyay acticepray. 
 Ethay  Ironyay  Andhay  Oolschay, ethay  Ivefay  Arsstay  Oolschay, ethay  Orthernnay  Istfay  Oolschay, andyay ethay  Outhernsay  Arstay  Oolschay ofyay  Oushay  Unglay eachtay ifferentday approachesyay otay ethay ysicalphay, entalmay, andyay iritualspay isciplinesday ofyay ethay onkmay. 
 Omesay ofyay esethay onasteriesmay avehay eadspray otay ethay westernyay andslay ofyay  Aerunfay, articularlypay inyay acesplay withyay argelay  Oushay immigrantyay ommunitiescay, uchsay asyay  Eskthay andyay  Westgateyay. Otheryay onasticmay aditionstray areyay associatedyay withyay eitiesday whoyay eachtay ethay aluevay ofyay ysicalphay excellenceyay andyay entalmay isciplineday. Inyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray, ethay orderyay ofyay ethay  Arkday  Oonmay isyay ademay upyay ofyay onksmay edicatedday otay  Arshay (oddessgay ofyay osslay), whoyay aintainmay ecretsay ommunitiescay inyay emoteray illshay, ackbay alliesyay, andyay ubterraneansay ideawayshay. 
 Onasteriesmay ofyay  Ilmateryay (odgay ofyay enduranceyay) areyay amednay afteryay owersflay, andyay eirthay ordersyay arrycay ethay amesnay ofyay eatgray eroeshay ofyay ethay aithfay; ethay  Isciplesday ofyay  Aintsay  Ollarssay ethay  Wicetay- Artyredmay esideray inyay ethay  Onasterymay ofyay ethay  Yellowyay  Oseray earnay  Amaraday. 
 Ethay onasteriesmay ofyay  Eberronyay ombinecay ethay udystay ofyay artialmay artsyay withyay ayay ifelay ofyay olarshipschay. 
 Ostmay areyay evotedday otay ethay eitiesday ofyay ethay  Overeignsay  Osthay. Inyay ethay worldyay ofyay  Agonlancedray, ostmay onksmay areyay evotedday otay  Ajeremay, odgay ofyay editationmay andyay oughtthay. 
 Aladinpay  Adclay inyay ateplay armoryay atthay eamsglay inyay ethay unlightsay espiteday ethay ustday andyay imegray ofyay onglay aveltray, ayay umanhay ayslay ownday erhay wordsay andyay ieldshay andyay acesplay erhay andshay onyay ayay ortallymay woundedyay anmay. 
 Ivineday adianceray inesshay omfray erhay andshay, ethay an’smay woundsyay itknay osedclay, andyay ishay eyesyay openyay wideyay withyay amazement.Ayay warfday ouchescray ehindbay anyay outcropyay, ishay ackblay oakclay akingmay imhay earlynay invisibleyay inyay ethay ightnay, andyay watchesyay anyay orcyay waryay andbay elebratingcay itsyay ecentray ictoryvay. 
 Ilentlysay, ehay alksstay intoyay eirthay idstmay andyay whispersyay anyay oathyay, andyay wotay oresyay areyay eadday eforebay eythay evenyay ealizeray ehay isyay erethay. Ilversay airhay iningshay inyay ayay aftshay ofyay ightlay atthay eemssay otay illuminateyay onlyyay imhay, anyay elfyay aughslay withyay exultationyay. 
 Ishay earspay ashesflay ikelay ishay eyesyay asyay ehay absjay againyay andyay againyay atyay ayay wistedtay iantgay, untilyay atyay astlay ishay ightlay overcomesyay itsyay ideoushay arknessday. Whateveryay eirthay originyay andyay eirthay issionmay, aladinspay areyay unitedyay ybay eirthay oathsyay otay andstay againstyay ethay orcesfay ofyay evilyay. 
 Whetheryay wornsay eforebay ayay od’sgay altaryay andyay ethay witnessyay ofyay ayay iestpray, inyay ayay acredsay adeglay eforebay aturenay iritsspay andyay eyfay eingsbay, oryay inyay ayay omentmay ofyay esperationday andyay iefgray withyay ethay eadday asyay ethay onlyyay witnessyay, ayay aladin’spay oathyay isyay ayay owerfulpay ondbay. 
 Ityay isyay ayay ourcesay ofyay owerpay atthay urnstay ayay evoutday warrioryay intoyay ayay essedblay ampionchay. Ethay  Ausecay ofyay  Ighteousnessray Ayay aladinpay wearssay otay upholdyay usticejay andyay ighteousnessray, otay andstay withyay ethay oodgay ingsthay ofyay ethay worldyay againstyay ethay encroachingyay arknessday, andyay otay unthay ethay orcesfay ofyay evilyay whereveryay eythay urklay. 
 Ifferentday aladinspay ocusfay onyay ariousvay aspectsyay ofyay ethay ausecay ofyay ighteousnessray, utbay allyay areyay oundbay ybay ethay oathsyay atthay antgray emthay owerpay otay oday eirthay acredsay workyay. 
 Althoughyay anymay aladinspay areyay evotedday otay odsgay ofyay oodgay, ayay aladin’spay owerpay omescay asyay uchmay omfray ayay ommitmentcay otay usticejay itselfyay asyay ityay oesday omfray ayay odgay. Aladinspay aintray orfay yearsyay otay earnlay ethay illsskay ofyay ombatcay, asteringmay ayay arietyvay ofyay weaponsyay andyay armoryay. 
 Evenyay osay, eirthay artialmay illsskay areyay econdarysay otay ethay agicalmay owerpay eythay wieldyay: owerpay otay ealhay ethay icksay andyay injuredyay, otay itesmay ethay wickedyay andyay ethay undeadyay, andyay otay otectpray ethay innocentyay andyay osethay whoyay oinjay emthay inyay ethay ightfay orfay usticejay. Eyondbay ethay  Undanemay  Ifelay Almostyay ybay efinitionday, ethay ifelay ofyay ayay aladinpay isyay anyay adventuringyay ifelay. 
 Ethay  Aladinpay Evellay Oficiencypray Onusbay Eaturesfay— Ellspay  Otsslay erpay  Ellspay  Evel—1st2nd3rd4th5th1stlay+2 Ivineday  Ensesay,  Aylay onyay  Ands—————2ndhay+2 Ightingfay  Ylestay,  Ellcastingspay,  Ivineday  Ite2————3rdsmay+2 Ivineday  Ealthhay,  Acredsay  Oath3————4thyay+2 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement3————5thyay+3 Extrayay  Attack42———6thyay+3 Aurayay ofyay  Otection42———7thpray+3 Acredsay  Oathyay eature43———8thfay+3 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement43———9th+4—432——10thyay+4 Aurayay ofyay  Ourage432——11thcay+4 Improvedyay  Ivineday  Ite433——12thsmay+4 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement433——13th+5—4331—14thyay+5 Eansingclay  Ouch4331—15thtay+5 Acredsay  Oathyay eature4332—16thfay+5 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement4332—17th+6—4333118thyay+6 Aurayay improvements4333119thyay+6 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement4333220thyay+6 Acredsay  Oathyay eature43332evilfay. 
 Ightersfay areyay areray enoughyay amongyay ethay anksray ofyay ethay ilitiasmay andyay armiesyay ofyay ethay worldyay, utbay evenyay ewerfay eoplepay ancay aimclay ethay uetray allingcay ofyay ayay aladinpay. 
 Whenyay eythay oday eceiveray ethay allcay, esethay warriorsyay urntay omfray eirthay ormerfay occupationsyay andyay aketay upyay armsyay otay ightfay evilyay. 
 Ometimessay eirthay oathsyay eadlay emthay intoyay ethay ervicesay ofyay ethay owncray asyay eaderslay ofyay eliteyay oupsgray ofyay ightsknay, utbay evenyay enthay eirthay oyaltylay isyay irstfay otay ethay ausecay ofyay ighteousnessray, otnay otay owncray andyay ountrycay. Adventuringyay aladinspay aketay eirthay workyay eriouslysay. 
Ayay elveday intoyay anyay ancientyay uinray oryay ustyday yptcray ancay ebay ayay questyay ivendray ybay ayay igherhay urposepay anthay ethay acquisitionyay ofyay easuretray. 
 Evilyay urkslay inyay ungeonsday andyay imevalpray orestsfay, andyay evenyay ethay allestsmay ictoryvay againstyay ityay ancay ilttay ethay osmiccay alancebay awayyay omfray oblivionyay. Eatingcray ayay  Aladinpay Ethay ostmay importantyay aspectyay ofyay ayay aladinpay aracterchay isyay ethay aturenay ofyay ishay oryay erhay olyhay questyay. 
 Althoughyay ethay assclay eaturesfay elatedray otay youryay oathyay on'tday appearyay untilyay youyay eachray 3rday evellay, anplay aheadyay orfay atthay oicechay ybay eadingray ethay oathyay escriptionsday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay. 
 Areyay youyay ayay evotedday ervantsay ofyay oodgay, oyallay otay ethay odsgay ofyay usticejay andyay onorhay, ayay olyhay ightknay inyay iningshay armoryay enturingvay orthfay otay itesmay evilyay?  Areyay youyay ayay oriousglay ampionchay ofyay ethay ightlay, erishingchay everythingyay eautifulbay atthay andsstay againstyay ethay adowshay, ayay ightknay whoseyay oathyay escendsday omfray aditionstray olderyay anthay anymay ofyay ethay odsgay?  Oryay areyay youyay anyay embitteredyay onerlay wornsay otay aketay engeancevay onyay osethay whoyay avehay oneday eatgray evilyay, entsay asyay anyay angelyay ofyay eathday ybay ethay odsgay oryay ivendray ybay youryay eednay orfay evengeray?  Appendixyay Bay istslay anymay eitiesday worshipedyay ybay aladinspay oughoutthray ethay ultiversemay, uchassay  Ormtay,  Yrtay,  Eironeoushay, Aladinepay,  Irikay- Olithjay,  Olday  Arrahyay, ethay  Ilversay  Ameflay, Ahamutbay,  Athenayay,  Eray- Orakhtyhay, andyay  Eimdallhay. Owhay idday youyay experienceyay youryay allcay otay ervesay asyay ayay aladinpay?  Idday youyay earhay ayay whisperyay omfray anyay unseenyay odgay oryay angelyay whileyay youyay wereyay atyay ayerpray?  Idday anotheryay aladinpay ensesay ethay otentialpay withinyay youyay andyay ecideday otay aintray youyay asyay ayay quiresay?  Oryay idday omesay erribletay event—theyay estructionday ofyay youryay omehay, erhapspay— ivedray youyay otay youryay questsyay?  Erhapspay youyay umbledstay intoyay ayay acredsay ovegray oryay ayay iddenhay elvenyay enclaveyay andyay oundfay yourselfyay alledcay otay otectpray allyay uchsay efugesray ofyay oodnessgay andyay eautybay. 
 Oryay youyay ightmay avehay ownknay omfray youryay earliestyay emoriesmay atthay ethay aladin’spay ifelay wasyay youryay allingcay, almostyay asyay ifyay youyay adhay eenbay entsay intoyay ethay worldyay withyay atthay urposepay ampedstay onyay youryay oulsay. Asyay uardiansgay againstyay ethay orcesfay ofyay wickednessyay, aladinspay areyay arelyray ofyay anyyay evilyay alignmentyay. 
 Ostmay ofyay emthay walkyay ethay athspay ofyay aritychay andyay usticejay. 
 Onsidercay owhay youryay alignmentyay olorscay ethay wayyay youyay ursuepay youryay olyhay questyay andyay ethay annermay inyay whichyay youyay onductcay yourselfyay eforebay odsgay andyay ortalsmay. 
 Youryay oathyay andyay alignmentyay ightmay ebay inyay armonyhay, oryay youryay oathyay ightmay epresentray andardsstay ofyay ehaviorbay atthay youyay avehay otnay yetyay attainedyay. Quickyay  Uildbay Youyay ancay akemay ayay aladinpay quicklyyay ybay ollowingfay esethay uggestionssay. 
 Irstfay,  Engthstray ouldshay ebay youryay ighesthay abilityyay orescay, ollowedfay ybay  Arismachay. 
 Assclay  Eaturesfay Ightingfay  Ylestay Asyay ayay aladinpay, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay assclay eaturesfay. Ithay  Ointspay Ithay  Iceday: 1day10 erpay aladinpay evellay Ithay  Ointspay atyay 1stay  Evellay: 10 + youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay  Ithay  Ointspay atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay: 1day10 (oryay 6) + youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay erpay aladinpay evellay afteryay 1stay Oficienciespray Armoryay:  Allyay armoryay, ieldsshay Weaponsyay:  Implesay weaponsyay, artialmay weaponsyay Oolstay:  Onenay Avingsay  Owsthray:  Wisdomyay,  Arismachay  Illsskay:  Oosechay wotay omfray  Athleticsyay,  Insightyay,  Intimidationyay,  Edicinemay,  Ersuasionpay, andyay  Eligionray Equipmentyay Youyay artstay withyay ethay ollowingfay equipmentyay, inyay additionyay otay ethay equipmentyay antedgray ybay youryay ackgroundbay:• (ayay) ayay artialmay weaponyay andyay ayay ieldshay oryay (bay) wotay artialmay weaponsyay• (ayay) ivefay avelinsjay oryay (bay) anyyay implesay eleemay weaponyay• (ayay) ayay iest’spray ackpay oryay (bay) anyay explorer’syay ackpay•  Ainchay ailmay andyay ayay olyhay ymbolsay Ivineday  Ensesay  Ethay esencepray ofyay ongstray evilyay egistersray onyay youryay ensessay ikelay ayay oxiousnay odoryay, andyay owerfulpay oodgay ingsray ikelay eavenlyhay usicmay inyay youryay earsyay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay openyay youryay awarenessyay otay etectday uchsay orcesfay. 
 Untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay, youyay owknay ethay ocationlay ofyay anyyay elestialcay, iendfay, oryay undeadyay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay atthay isyay otnay ehindbay otaltay overcay. 
 Youyay owknay ethay ypetay (elestialcay, iendfay, oryay undeadyay) ofyay anyyay eingbay whoseyay esencepray youyay ensesay, utbay otnay itsyay identityyay (ethay ampirevay  Ountcay  Ahdstray onvay  Arovichzay, orfay instanceyay). 
 Withinyay ethay amesay adiusray, youyay alsoyay etectday ethay esencepray ofyay anyyay aceplay oryay objectyay atthay ashay eenbay onsecratedcay oryay esecratedday, asyay withyay ethay allowhay ellspay. Youyay ancay useyay isthay eaturefay ayay umbernay ofyay imestay equalyay otay1 + youryay  Arismachay odifiermay. 
 Whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray, youyay egainray allyay expendedyay usesyay. Aylay onyay  Andshay Youryay essedblay ouchtay ancay ealhay woundsyay. 
 Youyay avehay ayay oolpay ofyay ealinghay owerpay atthay eplenishesray whenyay youyay aketay ayay onglay estray. 
 Withyay atthay oolpay, youyay ancay estoreray ayay otaltay umbernay ofyay ithay ointspay equalyay otay youryay aladinpay evellay xay 5. Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay ouchtay ayay eaturecray andyay awdray owerpay omfray ethay oolpay otay estoreray ayay umbernay ofyay ithay ointspay otay atthay eaturecray, upyay otay ethay aximummay amountyay emainingray inyay youryay oolpay. Alternativelyyay, youyay ancay expendyay 5 ithay ointspay omfray youryay oolpay ofyay ealinghay otay urecay ethay argettay ofyay oneyay iseaseday oryay eutralizenay oneyay oisonpay affectingyay ityay. 
 Youyay ancay urecay ultiplemay iseasesday andyay eutralizenay ultiplemay oisonspay withyay ayay inglesay useyay ofyay  Aylay onyay  Andshay, expendingyay ithay ointspay eparatelysay orfay eachyay oneyay. Isthay eaturefay ashay onay effectyay onyay undeadyay andyay onstructscay. Atyay 2nday evellay, youyay adoptyay ayay ylestay ofyay ightingfay asyay youryay ecialtyspay. 
 Oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay optionsyay. 
 Youyay an’tcay aketay ayay  Ightingfay  Ylestay optionyay oremay anthay onceyay, evenyay ifyay youyay aterlay etgay otay oosechay againyay. Efenseday Whileyay youyay areyay wearingyay armoryay, youyay aingay ayay +1 onusbay otay ACyay. 
 Uelingday Whenyay youyay areyay wieldingyay ayay eleemay weaponyay inyay oneyay andhay andyay onay otheryay weaponsyay, youyay aingay ayay +2 onusbay otay amageday ollsray withyay atthay weaponyay. Eatgray  Weaponyay  Ightingfay Whenyay youyay ollray ayay 1 oryay 2 onyay ayay amageday ieday orfay anyay attackyay youyay akemay withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay atthay youyay areyay wieldingyay withyay wotay andshay, youyay ancay erollray ethay ieday andyay ustmay useyay ethay ewnay ollray. 
 Ethay weaponyay ustmay avehay ethay wo-handedtay oryay ersatilevay opertypray orfay youyay otay aingay isthay enefitbay. Otectionpray Whenyay ayay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay attacksyay ayay argettay otheryay anthay youyay atthay isyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay imposeyay isadvantageday onyay ethay attackyay ollray. Youyay ustmay ebay wieldingyay ayay ieldshay. Ellcastingspay Ybay 2nday evellay, youyay avehay earnedlay otay awdray onyay ivineday agicmay oughthray editationmay andyay ayerpray otay astcay ellsspay asyay ayay ericclay oesday. 
 Eesay apterchay 10 orfay ethay eneralgay ulesray ofyay ellcastingspay andyay apterchay 11 orfay ethay aladinpay ellspay istlay. Eparingpray andyay  Astingcay  Ellsspay Ethay  Aladinpay abletay owsshay owhay anymay ellspay otsslay youyay avehay otay astcay youryay ellsspay. 
 Otay astcay oneyay ofyay youryay aladinpay ellsspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ustmay expendyay ayay otslay ofyay ethay ell’sspay evellay oryay igherhay. 
 Youyay egainray allyay expendedyay ellspay otsslay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Youyay eparepray ethay istlay ofyay aladinpay ellsspay atthay areyay availableyay orfay youyay otay astcay, oosingchay omfray ethay aladinpay ellspay istlay. 
 Whenyay youyay oday osay, oosechay ayay umbernay ofyay aladinpay ellsspay equalyay otay youryay  Arismachay odifiermay + alfhay youryay aladinpay evellay, oundedray ownday (inimummay ofyay oneyay ellspay). 
 Ethay ellsspay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay areyay ayay 5levelthlay aladinpay, youyay avehay ourfay 1levelstlay andyay wotay 2levelndlay ellspay otsslay. 
 Withyay ayay  Arismachay ofyay 14, youryay istlay ofyay eparedpray ellsspay ancay includeyay ourfay ellsspay ofyay 1stay oryay 2nday evellay, inyay anyyay ombinationcay. 
 Ifyay youyay eparepray ethay 1levelstlay ellspay urecay woundsyay, youyay ancay astcay ityay usingyay ayay 1levelstlay oryay ayay 2levelndlay otslay. 
 Astingcay ethay ellspay oesn’tday emoveray ityay omfray youryay istlay ofyay eparedpray ellsspay. Youyay ancay angechay youryay istlay ofyay eparedpray ellsspay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. 
youryay onvictionscay. 
 Youyay useyay youryay  Arismachay wheneveryay ayay ellspay efersray otay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, youyay useyay youryay  Arismachay odifiermay whenyay ettingsay ethay avingsay owthray DCay orfay ayay aladinpay ellspay youyay astcay andyay whenyay akingmay anyay attackyay ollray withyay oneyay. Ellspay avesay DCay = 8 + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Arismachay odifiermay Ellspay attackyay odifiermay = youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Arismachay odifiermay Ellcastingspay  Ocusfay Youyay ancay useyay ayay olyhay ymbolsay (oundfay inyay apterchay 5) asyay ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay orfay youryay aladinpay ellsspay. Ivineday  Itesmay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay aladinpay ellspay otslay otay ealday adiantray amageday otay ethay argettay, inyay additionyay otay ethay weapon’syay amageday. 
 Ethay extrayay amageday isyay 2day8 orfay ayay 1levelstlay ellspay otslay, usplay 1day8 orfay eachyay ellspay evellay igherhay anthay 1stay, otay ayay aximummay ofyay 5day8. 
 Ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 ifyay ethay argettay isyay anyay undeadyay oryay ayay iendfay. Ivineday  Ealthhay Ybay 3rday evellay, ethay ivineday agicmay owingflay oughthray youyay akesmay youyay immuneyay otay iseaseday. Acredsay  Oathyay Whenyay youyay eachray 3rday evellay, youyay wearsay ethay oathyay atthay indsbay youyay asyay ayay aladinpay oreverfay. 
 Upyay otay isthay imetay youyay avehay eenbay inyay ayay eparatorypray agestay, ommittedcay otay ethay athpay utbay otnay yetyay wornsay otay ityay. 
 Ownay youyay oosechay ethay  Oathyay ofyay  Evotionday, ethay  Oathyay ofyay ethay  Ancientsyay, oryay ethay  Oathyay ofyay  Engeancevay, allyay etailedday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay escriptionday. Youryay oicechay antsgray youyay eaturesfay atyay 3rday evellay andyay againyay atyay 7thay, 15thay, andyay 20thay evellay. 
 Osethay eaturesfay includeyay oathyay ellsspay andyay ethay  Annelchay  Ivinityday eaturefay. Oathyay  Ellsspay Eachyay oathyay ashay ayay istlay ofyay associatedyay ellsspay. 
 Youyay aingay accessyay otay esethay ellsspay atyay ethay evelslay ecifiedspay inyay ethay oathyay escriptionday. 
 Onceyay youyay aingay accessyay otay anyay oathyay ellspay, youyay alwaysyay avehay ityay eparedpray. 
 Oathyay ellsspay on’tday ountcay againstyay ethay umbernay ofyay ellsspay youyay ancay eparepray eachyay ayday. Ifyay youyay aingay anyay oathyay ellspay atthay oesn’tday appearyay onyay ethay aladinpay ellspay istlay, ethay ellspay isyay onethelessnay ayay aladinpay ellspay orfay youyay. Annelchay  Ivinityday Youryay oathyay allowsyay youyay otay annelchay ivineday energyyay otay uelfay agicalmay effectsyay. 
 Eachyay  Annelchay  Ivinityday optionyay ovidedpray ybay youryay oathyay explainsyay owhay otay useyay ityay. Whenyay youyay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday, youyay oosechay whichyay optionyay otay useyay. 
 Youyay ustmay enthay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray otay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday againyay. Omesay  Annelchay  Ivinityday effectsyay equireray avingsay owsthray. 
 Whenyay youyay useyay uchsay anyay effectyay omfray isthay assclay, ethay DCay equalsyay youryay aladinpay ellspay avesay DCay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay Whenyay youyay eachray 4thay evellay, andyay againyay atyay 8thay, 12thay, 16thay, andyay 19thay evellay, youyay ancay increaseyay oneyay abilityyay orescay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 2, oryay youyay ancay increaseyay wotay abilityyay oresscay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 1. 
 Asyay ormalnay, youyay an’tcay increaseyay anyay abilityyay orescay aboveyay 20 usingyay isthay eaturefay. Extrayay  Attackyay Eginningbay atyay 5thay evellay, youyay ancay attackyay wicetay, insteadyay ofyay onceyay, wheneveryay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. Aurayay ofyay  Otectionpray Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, wheneveryay youyay oryay ayay iendlyfray eaturecray withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay ustmay akemay ayay avingsay owthray, ethay eaturecray ainsgay ayay onusbay otay ethay avingsay owthray equalyay otay youryay  Arismachay odifiermay (withyay ayay inimummay onusbay ofyay +1). 
 Youyay ustmay ebay onsciouscay otay antgray isthay onusbay. Atyay 18thay evellay, ethay angeray ofyay isthay aurayay increasesyay otay 30 eetfay. Aurayay ofyay  Ouragecay Artingstay atyay 10thay evellay, youyay andyay iendlyfray eaturescray withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay an’tcay ebay ightenedfray whileyay youyay areyay onsciouscay. Atyay 18thay evellay, ethay angeray ofyay isthay aurayay increasesyay otay 30 eetfay. Improvedyay  Ivineday  Itesmay Ybay 11thay evellay, youyay areyay osay uffusedsay withyay ighteousray ightmay atthay allyay youryay eleemay weaponyay ikesstray arrycay ivineday owerpay withyay emthay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay, ethay eaturecray akestay anyay extrayay 1day8 adiantray amageday. 
 Ifyay youyay alsoyay useyay youryay  Ivineday  Itesmay withyay anyay attackyay, youyay addyay isthay amageday otay ethay extrayay amageday ofyay youryay  Ivineday  Itesmay. Eansingclay  Ouchtay Eginningbay atyay 14thay evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay endyay oneyay ellspay onyay yourselfyay oryay onyay oneyay willingyay eaturecray atthay youyay ouchtay. Youyay ancay useyay isthay eaturefay ayay umbernay ofyay imestay equalyay otay youryay  Arismachay odifiermay (ayay inimummay ofyay onceyay). 
 Youyay egainray expendedyay usesyay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Acredsay  Oathsyay Ecomingbay ayay aladinpay involvesyay akingtay owsvay atthay ommitcay ethay aladinpay otay ethay ausecay ofyay ighteousnessray, anyay activeyay athpay ofyay ightingfay wickednessyay. 
 Ethay inalfay oathyay, akentay whenyay ehay oryay eshay eachesray 3rday evellay, isyay ethay ulminationcay ofyay allyay ethay aladin’spay ainingtray. 
 Omesay aracterschay withyay isthay assclay on’tday onsidercay emselvesthay uetray aladinspay untilyay eythay avehay eachedray 3rday evellay andyay ademay isthay oathyay. 
 Orfay othersyay, ethay actualyay wearingsay ofyay ethay oathyay isyay ayay ormalityfay, anyay officialyay ampstay onyay whatyay ashay alwaysyay eenbay uetray inyay ethay aladin’spay earthay. Oathyay ofyay  Evotionday Ethay  Oathyay ofyay  Evotionday indsbay ayay aladinpay otay ethay oftiestlay idealsyay ofyay usticejay, irtuevay, andyay orderyay. 
actingyay withyay onorhay inyay ursuitpay ofyay usticejay andyay ethay eatergray oodgay. 
 Eythay oldhay emselvesthay otay ethay ighesthay andardsstay ofyay onductcay, andyay omesay, orfay etterbay oryay worseyay, oldhay ethay estray ofyay ethay worldyay otay ethay amesay andardsstay. 
 Anymay whoyay wearsay isthay oathyay areyay evotedday otay odsgay ofyay awlay andyay oodgay andyay useyay eirthay odsgay’ enetstay asyay ethay easuremay ofyay eirthay evotionday. 
 Eythay oldhay angels—theyay erfectpay ervantssay ofyay ood—asgay eirthay idealsyay, andyay incorporateyay imagesyay ofyay angelicyay wingsyay intoyay eirthay elmetshay oryay oatscay ofyay armsyay. Enetstay ofyay  Evotionday Oughthay ethay exactyay wordsyay andyay icturesstray ofyay ethay  Oathyay ofyay  Evotionday aryvay, aladinspay ofyay isthay oathyay areshay esethay enetstay. Onestyhay. 
 On’tday ielay oryay eatchay. 
 Etlay youryay wordyay ebay youryay omisepray. Ouragecay. 
 Evernay earfay otay actyay, oughthay autioncay isyay wiseyay. 
 Ompassioncay. 
 Aidyay othersyay, otectpray ethay weakyay, andyay unishpay osethay whoyay eatenthray emthay. 
 Owshay ercymay otay youryay oesfay, utbay empertay ityay withyay wisdomyay. Onorhay. 
 Eattray othersyay withyay airnessfay, andyay etlay youryay onorablehay eedsday ebay anyay exampleyay otay emthay. 
 Oday asyay uchmay oodgay asyay ossiblepay whileyay ausingcay ethay eastlay amountyay ofyay armhay. Utyday. 
 Ebay esponsibleray orfay youryay actionsyay andyay eirthay onsequencescay, otectpray osethay entrustedyay otay youryay arecay, andyay obeyyay osethay whoyay avehay ustjay authorityyay overyay youyay. Oathyay  Ellsspay Youyay aingay oathyay ellsspay atyay ethay aladinpay evelslay istedlay. Eakingbray  Youryay  Oathyay Ayay aladinpay iestray otay oldhay otay ethay ighesthay andardsstay ofyay onductcay, utbay evenyay ethay ostmay irtuousvay aladinpay isyay alliblefay. 
 Ometimessay ethay ightray athpay ovespray ootay emandingday, ometimessay ayay ituationsay allscay orfay ethay esserlay ofyay wotay evilsyay, andyay ometimessay ethay eathay ofyay emotionyay ausescay ayay aladinpay otay ansgresstray ishay oryay erhay oath.Ayay aladinpay whoyay ashay okenbray ayay owvay ypicallytay eekssay absolutionyay omfray ayay ericclay whoyay aresshay ishay oryay erhay aithfay oryay omfray anotheryay aladinpay ofyay ethay amesay orderyay. 
 Ethay aladinpay ightmay endspay anyay allyay- ightnay igilvay inyay ayerpray asyay ayay ignsay ofyay enitencepay, oryay undertakeyay ayay astfay oryay imilarsay actyay ofyay elf-denialsay. 
 Afteryay ayay iteray ofyay onfessioncay andyay orgivenessfay, ethay aladinpay artsstay eshfray. Ifyay ayay aladinpay willfullyyay iolatesvay ishay oryay erhay oathyay andyay owsshay onay ignsay ofyay epentanceray, ethay onsequencescay ancay ebay oremay erioussay. Atyay ethay sdMsay iscretionday, anyay impenitentyay aladinpay ightmay ebay orcedfay otay abandonyay isthay assclay andyay adoptyay anotheryay, oryay erhapspay otay aketay ethay  Oathbreakeryay aladinpay optionyay atthay appearsyay inyay ethay  Ungeonday  Aster'smay  Uidegay. 
eactionsray. 
 Orfay itsyay actionyay, ityay ancay useyay onlyyay ethay  Ashday actionyay oryay ytray otay escapeyay omfray anyay effectyay atthay eventspray ityay omfray ovingmay. 
 Ifyay ere’sthay owherenay otay ovemay, ethay eaturecray ancay useyay ethay  Odgeday actionyay. Aurayay ofyay  Evotionday Artingstay atyay 7thay evellay, youyay andyay iendlyfray eaturescray withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay an’tcay ebay armedchay whileyay youyay areyay onsciouscay. 
 Atyay 18thay evellay, ethay angeray ofyay isthay aurayay increasesyay otay 30 eetfay. Uritypay ofyay  Iritspay Eginningbay atyay 15thay evellay, youyay areyay alwaysyay underyay ethay effectsyay ofyay ayay otectionpray omfray evilyay andyay oodgay ellspay. Olyhay  Imbusnay Atyay 20thay evellay, asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay emanateyay anyay aurayay ofyay unlightsay. 
 Orfay 1 inutemay, ightbray ightlay inesshay omfray youyay inyay ayay 30-ootfay adiusray, andyay imday ightlay inesshay 30 eetfay eyondbay atthay. Wheneveryay anyay enemyyay eaturecray artsstay itsyay urntay inyay ethay ightbray ightlay, ethay eaturecray akestay 10 adiantray amageday. Inyay additionyay, orfay ethay urationday, youyay avehay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay ellsspay astcay ybay iendsfay oryay undeadyay. Onceyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay, youyay an’tcay useyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Oathyay ofyay ethay  Ancientsyay Ethay  Oathyay ofyay ethay  Ancientsyay isyay asyay oldyay asyay ethay aceray ofyay elvesyay andyay ethay itualsray ofyay ethay uidsdray. 
 Ometimessay alledcay eyfay ightsknay, eengray ightsknay, oryay ornedhay ightsknay, aladinspay whoyay wearsay isthay oathyay astcay eirthay otlay withyay ethay idesay ofyay ethay ightlay inyay ethay osmiccay ugglestray againstyay arknessday ecausebay eythay ovelay ethay eautifulbay andyay ife-givinglay ingsthay ofyay ethay worldyay, otnay ecessarilynay ecausebay eythay elievebay inyay inciplespray ofyay onorhay, ouragecay, andyay usticejay. 
 Eythay adornyay eirthay armoryay andyay othingclay withyay imagesyay ofyay owinggray ings—leavesthay, antlersyay, oryay owers—toflay eflectray eirthay ommitmentcay otay eservingpray ifelay andyay ightlay inyay ethay worldyay. Enetstay ofyay ethay  Ancientsyay Ethay enetstay ofyay ethay  Oathyay ofyay ethay  Ancientsyay avehay eenbay eservedpray orfay uncountedyay enturiescay. 
 Isthay oathyay emphasizesyay ethay inciplespray ofyay oodgay aboveyay anyyay oncernscay ofyay awlay oryay aoschay. 
 Itsyay ourfay entralcay inciplespray areyay implesay. Oathyay ofyay  Evotionday  Ellsspay Aladinpay  Evellay Ells3rdprotectionspay omfray evilyay andyay oodgay, anctuary5thlessersay estorationray, onezay ofyay uth9thbeacontray ofyay opehay, ispelday agic13thfreedommay ofyay ovementmay, uardiangay ofyay aith17thcommunefay, ameflay ikestray Annelchay  Ivinityday Whenyay youyay aketay isthay oathyay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay wotay  Annelchay  Ivinityday optionsyay. Acredsay  Weaponyay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay imbueyay oneyay weaponyay atthay youyay areyay oldinghay withyay ositivepay energyyay, usingyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday. 
 Orfay 1 inutemay, youyay addyay youryay  Arismachay odifiermay otay attackyay ollsray ademay withyay atthay weaponyay (withyay ayay inimummay onusbay ofyay +1). 
 Ethay weaponyay alsoyay emitsyay ightbray ightlay inyay ayay 20-ootfay adiusray andyay imday ightlay 20 eetfay eyondbay atthay. 
 Ifyay ethay weaponyay isyay otnay alreadyyay agicalmay, ityay ecomesbay agicalmay orfay ethay urationday. Youyay ancay endyay isthay effectyay onyay youryay urntay asyay artpay ofyay anyyay otheryay actionyay. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay onay ongerlay oldinghay oryay arryingcay isthay weaponyay, oryay ifyay youyay allfay unconsciousyay, isthay effectyay endsyay. Urntay ethay  Unholyyay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay esentpray youryay olyhay ymbolsay andyay eakspay ayay ayerpray ensuringcay iendsfay andyay undeadyay, usingyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday. 
 Eachyay iendfay oryay undeadyay atthay ancay eesay oryay earhay youyay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray ailsfay itsyay avingsay owthray, ityay isyay urnedtay orfay 1 inutemay oryay untilyay ityay akestay amage.Aday urnedtay eaturecray ustmay endspay itsyay urnstay yingtray otay ovemay asyay arfay awayyay omfray youyay asyay ityay ancay, andyay ityay an’tcay willinglyyay ovemay otay ayay acespay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Indlekay ethay  Ightlay. 
 Oughthray youryay actsyay ofyay ercymay, indnesskay, andyay orgivenessfay, indlekay ethay ightlay ofyay opehay inyay ethay worldyay, eatingbay ackbay espairday. Eltershay ethay  Ightlay. 
 Whereyay erethay isyay oodgay, eautybay, ovelay, andyay aughterlay inyay ethay worldyay, andstay againstyay ethay wickednessyay atthay wouldyay wallowsay ityay. 
 Whereyay ifelay ourishesflay, andstay againstyay ethay orcesfay atthay wouldyay enderray ityay arrenbay. Eservepray  Youryay  Ownyay  Ightlay. 
 Elightday inyay ongsay andyay aughterlay, inyay eautybay andyay artyay. 
 Ifyay youyay allowyay ethay ightlay otay ieday inyay youryay ownyay earthay, youyay an’tcay eservepray ityay inyay ethay worldyay. Ebay ethay  Ightlay. 
 Ebay ayay oriousglay eaconbay orfay allyay whoyay ivelay inyay espairday. 
 Etlay ethay ightlay ofyay youryay oyjay andyay ouragecay ineshay orthfay inyay allyay youryay eedsday. Oathyay  Ellsspay Youyay aingay oathyay ellsspay atyay ethay aladinpay evelslay isted.symbollay, andyay eachyay eyfay oryay iendfay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay atthay ancay earhay youyay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray isyay urnedtay orfay 1 inutemay oryay untilyay ityay akestay amage.Aday urnedtay eaturecray ustmay endspay itsyay urnstay yingtray otay ovemay asyay arfay awayyay omfray youyay asyay ityay ancay, andyay ityay an’tcay willinglyyay ovemay otay ayay acespay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Ityay alsoyay an’tcay aketay eactionsray. 
 Orfay itsyay actionyay, ityay ancay useyay onlyyay ethay  Ashday actionyay oryay ytray otay escapeyay omfray anyay effectyay atthay eventspray ityay omfray ovingmay. 
 Ifyay ere’sthay owherenay otay ovemay, ethay eaturecray ancay useyay ethay  Odgeday actionyay. Ifyay ethay eature’scray uetray ormfay isyay oncealedcay ybay anyay illusionyay, apeshiftingshay, oryay otheryay effectyay, atthay ormfay isyay evealedray whileyay ityay isyay urnedtay. Aurayay ofyay  Wardingyay Eginningbay atyay 7thay evellay, ancientyay agicmay ieslay osay eavilyhay uponyay youyay atthay ityay ormsfay anyay eldritchyay wardyay. 
 Youyay andyay iendlyfray eaturescray withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay avehay esistanceray otay amageday omfray ellsspay. Atyay 18thay evellay, ethay angeray ofyay isthay aurayay increasesyay otay 30 eetfay. Undyingyay  Entinelsay Artingstay atyay 15thay evellay, whenyay youyay areyay educedray otay 0 ithay ointspay andyay areyay otnay illedkay outrightyay, youyay ancay oosechay otay opdray otay 1 ithay ointpay insteadyay. 
 Onceyay youyay useyay isthay abilityyay, youyay an’tcay useyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Additionallyyay, youyay uffersay onenay ofyay ethay awbacksdray ofyay oldyay ageyay, andyay youyay an’tcay ebay agedyay agicallymay. Elderyay  Ampionchay Atyay 20thay evellay, youyay ancay assumeyay ethay ormfay ofyay anyay ancientyay orcefay ofyay aturenay, akingtay onyay anyay appearanceyay youyay oosechay. Orfay exampleyay, youryay inskay ightmay urntay eengray oryay aketay onyay ayay ark-likebay exturetay, youryay airhay ightmay ecomebay eafylay oryay ossmay- ikelay, oryay youyay ightmay outspray antlersyay oryay ayay ion-likelay anemay. Usingyay youryay actionyay, youyay undergoyay ayay ansformationtray. Orfay 1 inutemay, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay, youyay egainray 10 ithay ointspay.•  Wheneveryay youyay astcay ayay aladinpay ellspay atthay ashay ayay astingcay imetay ofyay 1 actionyay, youyay ancay astcay ityay usingyay ayay onusbay actionyay insteadyay.•  Enemyyay eaturescray withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay avehay isadvan­tageday onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay youryay aladinpay ellsspay andyay  Annelchay  Ivinityday optionsyay. Onceyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay, youyay an’tcay useyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Oathyay ofyay  Engeancevay Ethay  Oathyay ofyay  Engeancevay isyay ayay olemnsay ommitmentcay otay unishpay osethay whoyay avehay ommittedcay ayay ievousgray insay. 
 Whenyay evilyay orcesfay aughterslay elplesshay illagersvay, whenyay anyay entireyay eoplepay urnstay againstyay ethay willyay ofyay ethay odsgay, whenyay ayay ievesthay’ uildgay owsgray ootay iolentvay andyay owerfulpay, whenyay ayay agondray ampagesray oughthray ethay ountryside—atcay imestay ikelay esethay, aladinspay ariseyay andyay wearsay anyay  Oathyay ofyay  Engeancevay otay etsay ightray atthay whichyay ashay onegay wrongyay. 
 Otay esethay aladinspay— ometimessay alledcay avengersyay oryay arkday ights—theirknay ownyay uritypay isyay otnay asyay importantyay asyay eliveringday usticejay. Oathyay ofyay ethay  Ancientsyay  Ellsspay Aladinpay  Evellay Ells3rdensnaringspay ikestray, eakspay withyay animals5thmoonbeamyay, istymay ep9thplantstay owthgray, otectionpray omfray energy13thiceyay ormstay, oneskin17thcommunestay withyay aturenay, eetray idestray Annelchay  Ivinityday Whenyay youyay aketay isthay oathyay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay wotay  Annelchay  Ivinityday optionsyay. Ature’snay  Wrathyay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday otay invokeyay imevalpray orcesfay otay ensnareyay ayay oefay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay ausecay ectralspay inesvay otay ingspray upyay andyay eachray orfay ayay eaturecray withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay atthay youyay ancay eesay. Ethay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Engthstray oryay  Exterityday avingsay owthray (itsyay oicechay) oryay ebay estrainedray. 
 Whileyay estrainedray ybay ethay inesvay, ethay eaturecray epeatsray ethay avingsay owthray atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ityay eesfray itselfyay andyay ethay inesvay anishvay. Urntay ethay  Aithlessfay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday otay utteryay ancientyay wordsyay atthay areyay ainfulpay orfay eyfay andyay iendsfay otay earhay. 
 Enetstay ofyay  Engeancevay Ethay enetstay ofyay ethay  Oathyay ofyay  Engeancevay aryvay ybay aladinpay, utbay allyay ethay enetstay evolveray aroundyay unishingpay wrongdoersyay ybay anyyay eansmay ecessarynay. 
 Aladinspay whoyay upholdyay esethay enetstay areyay willingyay otay acrificesay evenyay eirthay ownyay ighteousnessray otay etemay outyay usticejay uponyay osethay whoyay oday evilyay, osay ethay aladinspay areyay oftenyay eutralnay oryay awfullay eutralnay inyay alignmentyay. 
 Ethay orecay inciplespray ofyay ethay enetstay areyay utallybray implesay. Ightfay ethay  Eatergray  Evilyay. 
 Acedfay withyay ayay oicechay ofyay ightingfay ymay wornsay oesfay oryay ombatingcay ayay esserlay evilyay. 
Iyay oosechay ethay eatergray evilyay. Onay  Ercymay orfay ethay  Wickedyay. 
 Ordinaryyay oesfay ightmay winyay ymay ercymay, utbay ymay wornsay enemiesyay oday otnay. Ybay  Anyyay  Eansmay  Ecessarynay. 
 Ymay qualmsyay an’tcay etgay inyay ethay wayyay ofyay exterminatingyay ymay oesfay. Estitutionray. 
 Ifyay ymay oesfay wreakyay uinray onyay ethay worldyay, ityay isyay ecausebay Iyay ailedfay otay opstay emthay. 
Iyay ustmay elphay osethay armedhay ybay eirthay isdeedsmay. Oathyay  Ellsspay Youyay aingay oathyay ellsspay atyay ethay aladinpay evelslay istedlay. Annelchay  Ivinityday Whenyay youyay aketay isthay oathyay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay wotay  Annelchay  Ivinityday optionsyay. Abjureyay  Enemyyay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay esentpray youryay olyhay ymbolsay andyay eakspay ayay ayerpray ofyay enunciationday, usingyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday. 
 Oosechay oneyay eaturecray withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay atthay youyay ancay eesay. 
 Atthay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray, unlessyay ityay isyay immuneyay otay eingbay ightenedfray. 
 Iendsfay andyay undeadyay avehay isadvantageday onyay isthay avingsay owthray. Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray isyay ightenedfray orfay 1 inutemay oryay untilyay ityay akestay anyyay amageday. 
 Whileyay ightenedfray, ethay eature’scray eedspay isyay 0, andyay ityay an’tcay enefitbay omfray anyyay onusbay otay itsyay eedspay. Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay eature’scray eedspay isyay alvedhay orfay 1 inutemay oryay untilyay ethay eaturecray akestay anyyay amageday. Owvay ofyay  Enmityyay. 
 Asyay ayay onusbay actionyay, youyay ancay utteryay ayay owvay ofyay enmityyay againstyay ayay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay, usingyay youryay  Annelchay  Ivinityday. 
 Youyay aingay advantageyay onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay ethay eaturecray orfay 1 inutemay oryay untilyay ityay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay oryay allsfay unconsciousyay. Elentlessray  Avengeryay Ybay 7thay evellay, youryay upernaturalsay ocusfay elpshay youyay oseclay offyay ayay oe’sfay etreatray. 
 Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay anyay opportunityyay attackyay, youyay ancay ovemay upyay otay alfhay youryay eedspay immediatelyyay afteryay ethay attackyay andyay asyay artpay ofyay ethay amesay eactionray. 
 Isthay ovementmay oesn’tday ovokepray opportunityyay attacksyay. Oulsay ofyay  Engeancevay Artingstay atyay 15thay evellay, ethay authorityyay withyay whichyay youyay eakspay youryay  Owvay ofyay  Enmityyay ivesgay youyay eatergray owerpay overyay youryay oefay. 
 Whenyay ayay eaturecray underyay ethay effectyay ofyay youryay  Owvay ofyay  Enmityyay akesmay anyay attackyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay akemay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay againstyay atthay eaturecray ifyay ityay isyay withinyay angeray. Avengingyay  Angelyay Atyay 20thay evellay, youyay ancay assumeyay ethay ormfay ofyay anyay angelicyay avengeryay. 
 Usingyay youryay actionyay, youyay undergoyay ayay ansformationtray. 
 Orfay 1 ourhay, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Wingsyay outspray omfray youryay ackbay andyay antgray youyay ayay yingflay eedspay ofyay 60 eetfay.•  Youyay emanateyay anyay aurayay ofyay enacemay inyay ayay 30-ootfay adiusray. 
 Ethay irstfay imetay anyyay enemyyay eaturecray entersyay ethay aurayay oryay artsstay itsyay urntay erethay uringday ayay attlebay, ethay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ecomebay ight­enedfray ofyay youyay orfay 1 inutemay oryay untilyay ityay akestay anyyay amageday. 
 Angerray Oughray andyay wildyay ookinglay, ayay umanhay alksstay aloneyay oughthray ethay adowsshay ofyay eestray, untinghay ethay oresyay ehay owsknay areyay anningplay ayay aidray onyay ayay earbynay armfay. 
 Utchingclay ayay ortswordshay inyay eachyay andhay, ehay ecomesbay ayay whirlwindyay ofyay eelstay, uttingcay ownday oneyay enemyyay afteryay anotheryay. Afteryay umblingtay awayyay omfray ayay onecay ofyay eezingfray airyay, anyay elfyay indsfay erhay eetfay andyay awsdray ackbay erhay owbay otay ooselay anyay arrowyay atyay ethay whiteyay agondray. 
 Uggingshray offyay ethay waveyay ofyay earfay atthay emanatesyay omfray ethay agondray ikelay ethay oldcay ofyay itsyay eathbray, eshay endssay oneyay arrowyay afteryay anotheryay otay indfay ethay apsgay etweenbay ethay agon’sdray ickthay alesscay. Oldinghay ishay andhay ighhay, ayay alf-elfhay whistlesyay otay ethay awkhay atthay irclescay ighhay aboveyay imhay, allingcay ethay irdbay ackbay otay ishay idesay. 
 Whisperingyay instructionsyay inyay  Elvishyay, ehay ointspay otay ethay owlbearyay e’shay eenbay ackingtray andyay endssay ethay awkhay otay istractday ethay eaturecray whileyay ehay eadiesray ishay owbay. Arfay omfray ethay ustlebay ofyay itiescay andyay ownstay, astpay ethay edgeshay atthay eltershay ethay ostmay istantday armsfay omfray ethay errorstay ofyay ethay wildyay, amidyay ethay ense-packedday eestray ofyay acklesstray orestsfay andyay acrossyay wideyay andyay emptyyay ainsplay, angersray eepkay eirthay unendingyay watchyay. Eadlyday  Untershay  Warriorsyay ofyay ethay wildernessyay, angersray ecializespay inyay untinghay ethay onstersmay atthay eatenthray ethay edgesyay ofyay ivilization—humanoidcay aidersray, ampagingray eastsbay andyay onstrositiesmay, erribletay iantsgay, andyay eadlyday agonsdray. 
 Eythay earnlay otay acktray eirthay quarryyay asyay ayay edatorpray oesday, ovingmay ealthilystay oughthray ethay wildsyay andyay idinghay emselvesthay inyay ushbray andyay ubbleray.
