 Angersray ocusfay eirthay ombatcay ainingtray onyay echniquestay atthay areyay articularlypay usefulyay againstyay eirthay ecificspay avoredfay oesfay. Anksthay otay eirthay amiliarityfay withyay ethay wildsyay, angersray acquireyay ethay abilityyay otay astcay ellsspay atthay arnesshay ature’snay owerpay, uchmay asyay ayay uiddray oesday. 
 Eirthay ellsspay, ikelay eirthay ombatcay abilitiesyay, emphasizeyay eedspay, ealthstay, andyay ethay unthay. 
Ayay anger’sray alentstay andyay abilitiesyay areyay onedhay withyay eadlyday ocusfay onyay ethay imgray asktay ofyay otectingpray ethay orderlandsbay. Independentyay  Adventurersyay Oughthay ayay angerray ightmay akemay ayay ivinglay asyay ayay unterhay, ayay uidegay, oryay ayay ackertray, ayay anger’sray uetray allingcay isyay otay efendday ethay outskirtsyay ofyay ivilizationcay omfray ethay avagesray ofyay onstersmay andyay umanoidhay ordeshay atthay esspray inyay omfray ethay wildyay. 
 Inyay omesay acesplay, angersray athergay inyay ecretivesay ordersyay oryay oinjay orcesfay withyay uidicdray irclescay. 
 Anymay angersray, oughthay, areyay independentyay almostyay otay ayay aultfay, owingknay atthay, whenyay ayay agondray oryay ayay andbay ofyay orcsyay attacksyay, ayay angerray ightmay ebay ethay irst—andfay ossiblypay ethay ast—linelay ofyay efenseday. Isthay iercefay independenceyay akesmay angersray wellyay uitedsay otay adventuringyay, incesay eythay areyay accustomedyay otay ifelay arfay omfray ethay omfortscay ofyay ayay ydray edbay andyay ayay othay athbay. 
 Ethay  Angerray Evellay Oficiencypray Onusbay Eaturesfay Ellsspay Ownknay— Ellspay  Otsslay erpay  Ellspay  Evel—1st2nd3rd4th5th1stlay+2 Avoredfay  Enemyyay,  Aturalnay  Explorer——————2ndyay+2 Ightingfay  Ylestay,  Ellcasting22————3rdspay+2 Angerray  Archetypeyay,  Imevalpray  Awareness33————4thyay+2 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement33————5thyay+3 Extrayay  Attack442———6thyay+3 Avoredfay  Enemyyay andyay  Aturalnay  Exploreryay improvements442———7thyay+3 Angerray  Archetypeyay eature543———8thfay+3 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay,  And’slay  Ide543———9th+4—6432——10thstray+4 Aturalnay  Exploreryay improvementyay,  Idehay inyay  Ainplay  Ight6432——11thsay+4 Angerray  Archetypeyay eature7433——12thfay+4 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement7433——13th+5—84331—14thyay+5 Avoredfay  Enemyyay improvementyay,  Anish84331—15thvay+5 Angerray  Archetypeyay eature94332—16thfay+5 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement94332—17th+6—104333118thyay+6 Eralfay  Enses104333119thsay+6 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement114333220thyay+6 Oefay  Ayer1143332mixtureslay ofyay amusementyay, ustrationfray, andyay ompassioncay. Utbay eythay quicklyyay earnlay atthay otheryay adventurersyay whoyay ancay arrycay eirthay ownyay weightyay inyay ayay ightfay againstyay ivilization’scay oesfay areyay worthyay anyyay extrayay urdenbay. 
 Oddledcay itycay olkfay ightmay otnay owknay owhay otay eedfay emselvesthay oryay indfay eshfray wateryay inyay ethay wildyay, utbay eythay akemay upyay orfay ityay inyay otheryay waysyay. Eatingcray ayay  Angerray Asyay youyay eatecray youryay angerray aracterchay, onsidercay ethay aturenay ofyay ethay ainingtray atthay avegay youyay youryay articularpay apabilitiescay. 
 Idday youyay aintray withyay ayay inglesay entormay, wanderingyay ethay wildsyay ogethertay untilyay youyay asteredmay ethay anger’sray waysyay?  Idday youyay eavelay youryay apprenticeshipyay, oryay wasyay youryay entormay ainslay— erhapspay ybay ethay amesay indkay ofyay onstermay atthay ecamebay youryay avoredfay enemyyay?  Oryay erhapspay youyay earnedlay youryay illsskay asyay artpay ofyay ayay andbay ofyay angersray affiliatedyay withyay ayay uidicdray irclecay, ainedtray inyay ysticmay athspay asyay wellyay asyay wildernessyay orelay. 
 Youyay ightmay ebay elf-taughtsay, ayay ecluseray whoyay earnedlay ombatcay illsskay, ackingtray, andyay evenyay ayay agicalmay onnectioncay otay aturenay oughthray ethay ecessitynay ofyay urvivingsay inyay ethay wildsyay. What’syay ethay ourcesay ofyay youryay articularpay atredhay ofyay ayay ertaincay indkay ofyay enemyyay?  Idday ayay onstermay illkay omeonesay youyay ovedlay oryay estroyday youryay omehay illagevay?  Oryay idday youyay eesay ootay uchmay ofyay ethay estructionday esethay onstersmay ausecay andyay ommitcay yourselfyay otay einingray inyay eirthay epredationsday?  Isyay youryay adventuringyay areercay ayay ontinuationcay ofyay youryay workyay inyay otectingpray ethay orderlandsbay, oryay ayay ignificantsay angechay? Whatyay ademay youyay oinjay upyay withyay ayay andbay ofyay adventurersyay? Oday youyay indfay ityay allengingchay otay eachtay ewnay alliesyay ethay waysyay ofyay ethay wildyay, oryay oday youyay welcomeyay ethay eliefray omfray olitudesay atthay eythay offeryay? Quickyay  Uildbay Youyay ancay akemay ayay angerray quicklyyay ybay ollowingfay esethay uggestionssay. 
 Irstfay, akemay  Exterityday youryay ighesthay abilityyay orescay, ollowedfay ybay  Wisdomyay. 
 Youyay areyay articularlypay amiliarfay withyay oneyay ypetay ofyay aturalnay environmentyay andyay areyay adeptyay atyay avelingtray andyay urvivingsay inyay uchsay egionsray. 
 Oosechay oneyay ypetay ofyay avoredfay erraintay: arcticyay, oastcay, esertday, orestfay, asslandgray, ountainmay, wampsay, oryay ethay  Underdarkyay. 
 Whenyay youyay akemay anyay  Intelligenceyay oryay  Wisdomyay eckchay elatedray otay youryay avoredfay erraintay, youryay oficiencypray onusbay isyay oubledday ifyay youyay areyay usingyay ayay illskay atthay you’reyay oficientpray inyay. Whileyay avelingtray orfay anyay ourhay oryay oremay inyay youryay avoredfay erraintay, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Ifficultday erraintay oesn’tday owslay youryay oup’sgray aveltray.•  Youryay oupgray an’tcay ecomebay ostlay exceptyay ybay agicalmay eansmay.•  Evenyay whenyay youyay areyay engagedyay inyay anotheryay activityyay whileyay avelingtray (uchsay asyay oragingfay, avigatingnay, oryay ackingtray), youyay emainray alertyay otay angerday.•  Ifyay youyay areyay avelingtray aloneyay, youyay ancay ovemay ealthilystay atyay ayay ormalnay acepay.•  Whenyay youyay oragefay, youyay indfay wicetay asyay uchmay oodfay asyay youyay ormallynay wouldyay.•  Whileyay ackingtray otheryay eaturescray, youyay alsoyay earnlay eirthay exactyay umbernay, eirthay izessay, andyay owhay onglay agoyay eythay assedpay oughthray ethay areayay. Youyay oosechay additionalyay avoredfay erraintay ypestay atyay 6thay andyay 10thay evellay. Ightingfay  Ylestay Atyay 2nday evellay, youyay adoptyay ayay articularpay ylestay ofyay ightingfay asyay youryay ecialtyspay. 
 Oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay optionsyay. 
 Youyay an’tcay aketay ayay  Ightingfay  Ylestay optionyay oremay anthay onceyay, evenyay ifyay youyay aterlay etgay otay oosechay againyay. Archeryyay Youyay aingay ayay +2 onusbay otay attackyay ollsray youyay akemay withyay angedray weaponsyay. Efenseday Whileyay youyay areyay wearingyay armoryay, youyay aingay ayay +1 onusbay otay ACyay. Uelingday Whenyay youyay areyay wieldingyay ayay eleemay weaponyay inyay oneyay andhay andyay onay otheryay weaponsyay, youyay aingay ayay +2 onusbay otay amageday ollsray withyay atthay weaponyay. Wotay- Weaponyay  Ightingfay Whenyay youyay engageyay inyay wo-weapontay ightingfay, youyay ancay addyay youryay abilityyay odifiermay otay ethay amageday ofyay ethay econdsay attackyay. Ellcastingspay  Ybay ethay imetay youyay eachray 2nday evellay, youyay avehay earnedlay otay useyay ethay agicalmay essenceyay ofyay aturenay otay astcay ellsspay, uchmay asyay ayay uiddray oesday. 
 Eesay apterchay 10 orfay ethay eneralgay ulesray ofyay ellcastingspay andyay apterchay 11 orfay ethay angerray ellspay istlay. Ellspay  Otsslay Ethay  Angerray abletay owsshay owhay anymay ellspay otsslay youyay avehay otay astcay youryay ellsspay ofyay 1stay evellay andyay igherhay. 
 Otay astcay oneyay ofyay esethay ellsspay, youyay ustmay expendyay ayay otslay ofyay ethay ell’sspay evellay oryay igherhay. 
 Youyay egainray allyay expendedyay ellspay otsslay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay owknay ethay 1levelstlay ellspay animalyay iendshipfray andyay avehay ayay 1levelstlay andyay ayay 2levelndlay ellspay otslay availableyay, youyay ancay astcay animalyay iendshipfray usingyay eitheryay otslay. Ellsspay  Ownknay ofyay 1stay  Evellay andyay  Igherhay Youyay owknay wotay 1levelstlay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay angerray ellspay istlay. Ethay  Ellsspay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Angerray abletay owsshay whenyay youyay earnlay oremay angerray ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay. 
 Eachyay ofyay esethay ellsspay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay• (ayay) alescay ailmay oryay (bay) eatherlay armoryay• (ayay) wotay ortswordsshay oryay (bay) wotay implesay eleemay weaponsyay• (ayay) ayay ungeoneer’sday ackpay oryay (bay) anyay explorer’syay ackpay• Ayay ongbowlay andyay ayay quiveryay ofyay 20 arrowsyay Avoredfay  Enemyyay Eginningbay atyay 1stay evellay, youyay avehay ignificantsay experienceyay udyingstay, ackingtray, untinghay, andyay evenyay alkingtay otay ayay ertaincay ypetay ofyay enemyyay. Oosechay ayay ypetay ofyay avoredfay enemyyay: aberrationsyay, eastsbay, elestialscay, onstructscay, agonsdray, elementalsyay, eyfay, iendsfay, iantsgay, onstrositiesmay, oozesyay, antsplay, oryay undeadyay. 
 Alternativelyyay, youyay ancay electsay wotay acesray ofyay umanoidhay (uchsay asyay ollsgnay andyay orcsyay) asyay avoredfay enemiesyay. Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay  Wisdomyay ( Urvivalsay) eckschay otay acktray youryay avoredfay enemiesyay, asyay wellyay asyay onyay  Intelligenceyay eckschay otay ecallray informationyay aboutyay emthay. Whenyay youyay aingay isthay eaturefay, youyay alsoyay earnlay oneyay anguagelay ofyay youryay oicechay atthay isyay okenspay ybay youryay avoredfay enemiesyay, ifyay eythay eakspay oneyay atyay allyay. Youyay oosechay oneyay additionalyay avoredfay enemyyay, asyay wellyay asyay anyay associatedyay anguagelay, atyay 6thay andyay 14thay evellay. 
ellspay otsslay. 
 Orfay instanceyay, whenyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay inyay isthay assclay, youyay ancay earnlay oneyay ewnay ellspay ofyay 1stay oryay 2nday evellay. Additionallyyay, whenyay youyay aingay ayay evellay inyay isthay assclay, youyay ancay oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay angerray ellsspay youyay owknay andyay eplaceray ityay withyay anotheryay ellspay omfray ethay angerray ellspay istlay, whichyay alsoyay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay. Ellcastingspay  Abilityyay Wisdomyay isyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay youryay angerray ellsspay, incesay youryay agicmay awsdray onyay youryay attunementyay otay aturenay. 
 Youyay useyay youryay  Wisdomyay wheneveryay ayay ellspay efersray otay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, youyay useyay youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay whenyay ettingsay ethay avingsay owthray DCay orfay ayay angerray ellspay youyay astcay andyay whenyay akingmay anyay attackyay ollray withyay oneyay. Ellspay avesay DCay = 8 + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay Ellspay attackyay odifiermay = youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay Angerray  Archetypeyay Atyay 3rday evellay, youyay oosechay anyay archetypeyay atthay youyay ivestray otay emulateyay:  Unterhay oryay  Eastbay  Astermay, othbay etailedday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay escriptionday. 
 Youryay oicechay antsgray youyay eaturesfay atyay 3rday evellay andyay againyay atyay 7thay, 11thay, andyay 15thay evellay. Imevalpray  Awarenessyay Eginningbay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay andyay expendyay oneyay angerray ellspay otslay otay ocusfay youryay awarenessyay onyay ethay egionray aroundyay youyay. 
 Orfay 1 inutemay erpay evellay ofyay ethay ellspay otslay youyay expendyay, youyay ancay ensesay whetheryay ethay ollowingfay ypestay ofyay eaturescray areyay esentpray withinyay 1 ilemay ofyay youyay (oryay withinyay upyay otay 6 ilesmay ifyay youyay areyay inyay youryay avoredfay erraintay): aberrationsyay, elestialscay, agonsdray, elementalsyay, eyfay, iendsfay, andyay undeadyay. 
 Isthay eaturefay oesn’tday evealray ethay eaturescray’ ocationlay oryay umbernay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay Whenyay youyay eachray 4thay evellay, andyay againyay atyay 8thay, 12thay, 16thay, andyay 19thay evellay, youyay ancay increaseyay oneyay abilityyay orescay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 2, oryay youyay ancay increaseyay wotay abilityyay oresscay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 1. 
 Asyay ormalnay, youyay an’tcay increaseyay anyay abilityyay orescay aboveyay 20 usingyay isthay eaturefay. Extrayay  Attackyay Eginningbay atyay 5thay evellay, youyay ancay attackyay wicetay, insteadyay ofyay onceyay, wheneveryay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. And’slay  Idestray Artingstay atyay 8thay evellay, ovingmay oughthray onmagicalnay ifficultday erraintay ostscay youyay onay extrayay ovementmay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay asspay oughthray onmagicalnay antsplay withoutyay eingbay owedslay ybay emthay andyay withoutyay akingtay amageday omfray emthay ifyay eythay avehay ornsthay, inesspay, oryay ayay imilarsay azardhay. Inyay additionyay, youyay avehay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay antsplay atthay areyay agicallymay eatedcray oryay anipulatedmay otay impedeyay ovementmay, uchsay osethay eatedcray ybay ethay entangleyay ellspay. Idehay inyay  Ainplay  Ightsay  Artingstay atyay 10thay evellay, youyay ancay endspay 1 inutemay eatingcray amouflagecay orfay yourselfyay. 
 Youyay ustmay avehay accessyay otay eshfray udmay, irtday, antsplay, ootsay, andyay otheryay aturallynay occurringyay aterialsmay withyay whichyay otay eatecray youryay amouflagecay. Onceyay youyay areyay amouflagedcay inyay isthay wayyay, youyay ancay ytray otay idehay ybay essingpray yourselfyay upyay againstyay ayay olidsay urfacesay, uchsay asyay ayay eetray oryay wallyay, atthay isyay atyay eastlay asyay alltay andyay wideyay asyay youyay areyay. 
 Youyay aingay ayay +10 onusbay otay  Exterityday ( Ealthstay) eckschay asyay onglay asyay youyay emainray erethay withoutyay ovingmay oryay akingtay actionsyay. 
 Onceyay youyay ovemay oryay aketay anyay actionyay oryay ayay eactionray, youyay ustmay amouflagecay yourselfyay againyay otay aingay isthay enefitbay. Anishvay Artingstay atyay 14thay evellay, youyay ancay useyay ethay  Idehay actionyay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. 
 Alsoyay, youyay an’tcay ebay ackedtray ybay onmagicalnay eansmay, unlessyay youyay oosechay otay eavelay ayay ailtray. Eralfay  Ensessay Atyay 18thay evellay, youyay aingay eternaturalpray ensessay atthay elphay youyay ightfay eaturescray youyay an’tcay eesay. 
 Whenyay youyay attackyay ayay eaturecray youyay an’tcay eesay, youryay inabilityyay otay eesay ityay oesn’tday imposeyay isadvantageday onyay youryay attackyay ollsray againstyay ityay. Youyay areyay alsoyay awareyay ofyay ethay ocationlay ofyay anyyay invisibleyay eaturecray withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay, ovidedpray atthay ethay eaturecray isn’tyay iddenhay omfray youyay andyay youyay aren’tyay indedblay oryay eafenedday. Oefay  Ayerslay Atyay 20thay evellay, youyay ecomebay anyay unparalleledyay unterhay ofyay youryay enemiesyay. 
 Onceyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay, youyay ancay addyay youryay  Wisdomyay odifiermay otay ethay attackyay ollray oryay ethay amageday ollray ofyay anyay attackyay youyay akemay againstyay oneyay ofyay youryay avoredfay enemiesyay. 
 Angerray  Archetypesyay Ethay idealyay ofyay ethay angerray ashay wotay assicclay expressionsyay: ethay  Unterhay andyay ethay  Eastbay  Astermay. Unterhay Emulatingyay ethay  Unterhay archetypeyay eansmay acceptingyay youryay aceplay asyay ayay ulwarkbay etweenbay ivilizationcay andyay ethay errorstay ofyay ethay wildernessyay. 
 Asyay youyay walkyay ethay  Unter’shay athpay, youyay earnlay ecializedspay echniquestay orfay ightingfay ethay eatsthray youyay acefay, omfray ampagingray ogresyay andyay ordeshay ofyay orcsyay otay oweringtay iantsgay andyay errifyingtay agonsdray. Unter’shay  Eypray Atyay 3rday evellay, youyay aingay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay eaturesfay ofyay youryay oicechay. Olossuscay  Ayerslay. 
 Youryay enacitytay ancay wearyay ownday ethay ostmay otentpay oesfay. 
 Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, ethay eaturecray akestay anyay extrayay 1day8 amageday ifyay it’syay elowbay itsyay ithay ointpay aximummay. 
 Youyay ancay ealday isthay extrayay amageday onlyyay onceyay erpay urntay. Iantgay  Illerkay. 
 Whenyay ayay  Argelay oryay argerlay eaturecray withinyay5 eetfay ofyay youyay itshay oryay issesmay youyay withyay anyay attackyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay attackyay atthay eaturecray immediatelyyay afteryay itsyay attackyay, ovidedpray atthay youyay ancay eesay ethay eaturecray. Ordehay  Eakerbray. 
 Onceyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay whenyay youyay akemay ayay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay akemay anotheryay attackyay withyay ethay amesay weaponyay againstyay ayay ifferentday eaturecray atthay isyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay originalyay argettay andyay withinyay angeray ofyay youryay weaponyay. Efensiveday  Acticstay Atyay 7thay evellay, youyay aingay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay eaturesfay ofyay youryay oicechay. Escapeyay ethay  Ordehay. 
 Opportunityyay attacksyay againstyay youyay areyay ademay withyay isadvantageday. Ultiattackmay  Efenseday. 
 Whenyay ayay eaturecray itshay youyay withyay anyay attackyay, youyay aingay ayay +4 onusbay otay ACyay againstyay allyay ubsequentsay attacksyay ademay ybay atthay eaturecray orfay ethay estray ofyay ethay urntay. Eelstay  Willyay. 
 Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay eingbay ightenedfray. Ultiattackmay Atyay 11thay evellay, youyay aingay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay eaturesfay ofyay youryay oicechay. Olleyvay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay akemay ayay angedray attackyay againstyay anyyay umbernay ofyay eaturescray withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay ayay ointpay youyay ancay eesay withinyay youryay weapon’syay angeray. 
 Youyay ustmay avehay ammunitionyay orfay eachyay argettay, asyay ormalnay, andyay youyay akemay ayay eparatesay attackyay ollray orfay eachyay argettay. Whirlwindyay  Attackyay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay akemay ayay eleemay attackyay againstyay anyyay umbernay ofyay eaturescray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay, withyay ayay eparatesay attackyay ollray orfay eachyay argettay. Uperiorsay  Unter’shay  Efenseday Atyay 15thay evellay, youyay aingay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay eaturesfay ofyay youryay oicechay. Evasionyay. 
 Youyay ancay imblynay odgeday outyay ofyay ethay wayyay ofyay ertaincay areayay effectsyay, uchsay asyay ayay edray agon’sdray ieryfay eathbray oryay ayay ightninglay oltbay ellspay. 
 Whenyay youyay areyay ubjectedsay otay anyay effectyay atthay allowsyay youyay otay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray otay aketay onlyyay alfhay amageday, youyay insteadyay aketay onay amageifday youyay ucceedsay onyay ethay avingsay owthray, andyay onlyyay alfhay amageday ifyay youyay ailfay. Andstay  Againstyay ethay  Idetay. 
 Whenyay ayay ostilehay eaturecray issesmay youyay withyay ayay eleemay attackyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay orcefay atthay eaturecray otay epeatray ethay amesay attackyay againstyay anotheryay eaturecray (otheryay anthay itselfyay) ofyay youryay oicechay. Uncannyyay  Odgeday. 
 Whenyay anyay attackeryay atthay youyay ancay eesay itshay youyay withyay anyay attackyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay alvehay ethay attack’syay amageday againstyay youyay. Eastbay  Astermay Ethay  Eastbay  Astermay archetypeyay embodiesyay ayay iendshipfray etweenbay ethay ivilizedcay acesray andyay ethay eastsbay ofyay ethay worldyay. 
 Unitedyay inyay ocusfay, eastbay andyay angerray workyay asyay oneyay otay ightfay ethay onstrousmay oesfay atthay eatenthray ivilizationcay andyay ethay wildernessyay alikeyay. 
 Emulatingyay ethay  Eastbay  Astermay archetypeyay eansmay ommittingcay yourselfyay otay isthay idealyay, workingyay inyay artnershippay withyay anyay animalyay asyay itsyay ompanioncay andyay iendfray. Anger’sray  Ompanioncay Atyay 3rday evellay, youyay aingay ayay eastbay ompanioncay atthay accompaniesyay youyay onyay youryay adventuresyay andyay isyay ainedtray otay ightfay alongsideyay youyay. 
 Oosechay ayay eastbay atthay isyay onay argerlay anthay  Ediummay andyay atthay ashay ayay allengechay atingray ofyay 1/4 oryay owerlay (appendixyay Day esentspray atisticsstay orfay ethay awkhay, astiffmay, andyay antherpay asyay examplesyay). 
 Addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay ethay east’sbay ACyay, attackyay ollsray, andyay amageday ollsray, asyay wellyay asyay otay anyyay avingsay owsthray andyay illsskay ityay isyay oficientpray inyay. 
 Itsyay ithay ointpay aximummay equalsyay itsyay ormalnay aximummay oryay ourfay imestay youryay angerray evellay, whicheveryay isyay igherhay. Ethay eastbay obeysyay youryay ommandscay asyay estbay asyay ityay ancay. 
 Ityay akestay itsyay urntay onyay youryay initiativeyay, oughthay ityay oesn’tday aketay anyay actionyay unlessyay youyay ommandcay ityay otay. 
 Onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay erballyvay ommandcay ethay eastbay whereyay otay ovemay (onay actionyay equiredray ybay youyay). 
 Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay erballyvay ommandcay ityay otay aketay ethay  Attackyay,  Ashday,  Isengageday,  Odgeday, oryay  Elphay actionyay. 
 Oguesray evoteday asyay uchmay effortyay otay asteringmay ethay useyay ofyay ayay arietyvay ofyay illsskay asyay eythay oday otay erfectingpay eirthay ombatcay abilitiesyay, ivinggay emthay ayay oadbray expertiseyay atthay ewfay otheryay aracterschay ancay atchmay. 
 Anymay oguesray ocusfay onyay ealthstay andyay eceptionday, whileyay othersyay efineray ethay illsskay atthay elphay emthay inyay ayay ungeonday environmentyay, uchsay asyay imbingclay, indingfay andyay isarmingday apstray, andyay openingyay ockslay. Whenyay ityay omescay otay ombatcay, oguesray ioritizepray unningcay overyay utebray engthstray. 
Ayay ogueray wouldyay atherray akemay oneyay ecisepray ikestray, acingplay ityay exactlyyay whereyay ethay attackyay willyay urthay ethay argettay ostmay, anthay wearyay anyay opponentyay ownday withyay ayay arragebay ofyay attacksyay. 
 Oguesray avehay anyay almostyay upernaturalsay ackknay orfay avoidingyay angerday, andyay ayay ewfay earnlay agicalmay ickstray otay upplementsay eirthay otheryay abilities.Ayay  Adyshay  Ivinglay Everyyay owntay andyay itycay ashay itsyay areshay ofyay oguesray. 
 Ostmay ofyay emthay ivelay upyay otay ethay worstyay ereotypesstay ofyay ethay assclay, akingmay ayay ivinglay asyay urglarsbay, assassinsyay, utpursescay, andyay oncay artistsyay. 
 Oftenyay, esethay oundrelsscay areyay organizedyay intoyay ievesthay’ uildsgay oryay imecray amiliesfay. 
 Entyplay ofyay oguesray operateyay independentlyyay, utbay evenyay eythay ometimessay ecruitray apprenticesyay otay elphay emthay inyay eirthay amsscay andyay eistshay. 
Ayay ewfay oguesray akemay anyay onesthay ivinglay asyay Ogueray Illskay andyay  Ecisionpray Ignalingsay orfay erhay ompanionscay otay waityay, ayay alflinghay eepscray orwardfay oughthray ethay ungeonday allhay. 
 Eshay essespray anyay earyay otay ethay oorday, enthay ullspay outyay ayay etsay ofyay oolstay andyay ickspay ethay ocklay inyay ethay inkblay ofyay anyay eyeyay. 
 Enthay eshay isappearsday intoyay ethay adowsshay asyay erhay ighterfay iendfray ovesmay orwardfay otay ickkay ethay oorday open.Ayay umanhay urkslay inyay ethay adowsshay ofyay anyay alleyyay whileyay ishay accompliceyay eparespray orfay erhay artpay inyay ethay ambushyay. 
 Whenyay eirthay arget—atay otoriousnay aver—passesslay ethay alleywayyay, ethay accompliceyay iescray outyay, ethay averslay omescay otay investigateyay, andyay ethay assassin’syay adeblay utscay ishay oatthray eforebay ehay ancay akemay ayay oundsay. Uppressingsay ayay igglegay, ayay omegnay wagglesyay erhay ingersfay andyay agicallymay iftslay ethay eykay ingray omfray ethay uard’sgay eltbay. Inyay ayay omentmay, ethay eyskay areyay inyay erhay andhay, ethay ellcay oorday isyay openyay, andyay eshay andyay erhay ompanionscay areyay eefray otay akemay eirthay escapeyay. Oguesray elyray onyay illskay, ealthstay, andyay eirthay oesfay’ ulnerabilitiesvay otay etgay ethay upperyay andhay inyay anyyay ituationsay. 
ocksmithslay, investigatorsyay, oryay exterminatorsyay, whichyay ancay ebay ayay angerousday objay inyay ayay worldyay whereyay ireday ats—andray wererats—hauntyay ethay ewerssay. Asyay adventurersyay, oguesray allfay onyay othbay idessay ofyay ethay awlay. 
 Omesay areyay ardenedhay iminalscray whoyay ecideday otay eeksay eirthay ortunefay inyay easuretray oardshay, whileyay othersyay aketay upyay ayay ifelay ofyay adventureyay otay escapeyay omfray ethay awlay. 
 Omesay avehay earnedlay andyay erfectedpay eirthay illsskay withyay ethay explicityay urposepay ofyay infiltratingyay ancientyay uinsray andyay iddenhay yptscray inyay earchsay ofyay easuretray. Eatingcray ayay  Ogueray  Asyay youyay eatecray youryay ogueray aracterchay, onsidercay ethay aracter’schay elationshipray otay ethay awlay. 
 Oday youyay avehay ayay iminalcray ast—orpay esentpray?  Areyay youyay onyay ethay unray omfray ethay awlay oryay omfray anyay angryyay ievesthay’ uildgay astermay?  Oryay idday youyay eavelay youryay uildgay inyay earchsay ofyay iggerbay isksray andyay iggerbay ewardsray?  Isyay ityay eedgray atthay ivesdray youyay inyay youryay adventuresyay, oryay omesay otheryay esireday oryay idealyay? Whatyay wasyay ethay iggertray atthay edlay youyay awayyay omfray youryay eviouspray ifelay?  Idday ayay eatgray oncay oryay eisthay onegay erriblytay wrongyay ausecay youyay otay eevaluateray youryay areercay?  Aybemay youyay wereyay uckylay andyay ayay uccessfulsay obberyray avegay youyay ethay oincay youyay eedednay otay escapeyay ethay qualorsay ofyay youryay ifelay. Idday wanderlustyay inallyfay allcay youyay awayyay omfray youryay omehay?  Erhapspay youyay uddenlysay oundfay yourselfyay utcay offyay omfray youryay amilyfay oryay youryay entormay, andyay youyay adhay otay indfay ayay ewnay eansmay ofyay upportsay. 
 Oryay aybemay youyay ademay ayay ewnay iend—anotherfray embermay ofyay youryay adventuringyay arty—whopay owedshay youyay ewnay ossibilitiespay orfay earningyay ayay ivinglay andyay employingyay youryay articularpay alentstay. Ethay  Ogueray Evellay Oficiencypray Onusbay Eaksnay Attackyay Eatures1st+21dfay6 Expertiseyay,  Eaksnay  Attackyay,  Ievesthay’  Ant2nd+21dcay6 Unningcay  Action3rd+22dyay6 Oguishray  Archetype4th+22dyay6 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement5th+33dyay6 Uncannyyay  Odge6th+33dday6 Expertise7th+34dyay6 Evasion8th+34dyay6 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement9th+45dyay6 Oguishray  Archetypeyay eature10th+45dfay6 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement11th+46dyay6 Eliableray  Alent12th+46dtay6 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement13th+57dyay6 Oguishray  Archetypeyay eature14th+57dfay6 Indsense15th+58dblay6 Ipperyslay  Ind16th+58dmay6 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement17th+69dyay6 Oguishray  Archetypeyay eature18th+69dfay6 Elusive19th+610dyay6 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement20th+610dyay6 Okestray ofyay  Ucklay Quickyay  Uildbay Youyay ancay akemay ayay ogueray quicklyyay ybay ollowingfay esethay uggestionssay. 
 Irstfay. 
 Exterityday ouldshay ebay youryay ighesthay abilityyay orescay. 
 Akemay  Intelligenceyay youryay ext-highestnay ifyay youyay wantyay otay excelyay atyay  Investigationyay oryay anplay otay aketay upyay ethay  Arcaneyay  Ickstertray archetypeyay. 
 Oosechay  Arismachay insteadyay ifyay youyay anplay otay emphasizeyay eceptionday andyay ocialsay interactionyay. 
 Econdsay, oosechay ethay arlatanchay ackgroundbay. Assclay  Eaturesfay Asyay ayay ogueray, youyay avehay ethay ollowingfay assclay eaturesfay. Ithay  Ointspay Ithay  Iceday: 1day8 erpay ogueray evellay Ithay  Ointspay atyay 1stay  Evellay: 8 + youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay  Ithay  Ointspay atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay: 1day8 (oryay 5) + youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay erpay ogueray evellay afteryay 1stay Oficienciespray Armoryay:  Ightlay armoryay Weaponsyay:  Implesay weaponsyay, andhay ossbowscray, ongswordslay, apiersray, ortswordsshay  Oolstay:  Ievesthay’ oolstay Avingsay  Owsthray:  Exterityday. 
 Intelligenceyay  Illsskay:  Oosechay ourfay omfray  Acrobaticsyay,  Athleticsyay,  Eceptionday. 
 Insightyay,  Intimidationyay,  Investigationyay,  Erceptionpay,  Erformancepay. 
 Equipmentyay Youyay artstay withyay ethay ollowingfay equipmentyay, inyay additionyay otay ethay equipmentyay antedgray ybay youryay ackgroundbay:• (ayay) ayay apierray oryay (bay) ayay ortswordshay• (ayay) ayay ortbowshay andyay quiveryay ofyay 20 arrowsyay oryay (bay) ayay ortswordshay• (ayay) ayay urglar’sbay ackpay, (bay) ayay ungeoneer’sday ackpay, oryay (cay) anyay explorer’syay ackpay•  Eatherlay armoryay, wotay aggersday, andyay ievesthay’ oolstay Expertiseyay  Atyay 1stay evellay, oosechay wotay ofyay youryay illskay oficienciespray, oryay oneyay ofyay youryay illskay oficienciespray andyay youryay oficiencypray withyay ievesthay’ oolstay. 
 Youryay oficiencypray onusbay isyay oubledday orfay anyyay abilityyay eckchay youyay akemay atthay usesyay eitheryay ofyay ethay osenchay oficienciespray. Atyay 6thay evellay, youyay ancay oosechay wotay oremay ofyay youryay oficienciespray (inyay illsskay oryay withyay ievesthay’ oolstay) otay aingay isthay enefitbay. Eaksnay  Attackyay Eginningbay atyay 1stay evellay, youyay owknay owhay otay ikestray ubtlysay andyay exploityay ayay oe’sfay istractionday. 
 Onceyay erpay urntay, youyay ancay ealday anyay extrayay 1day6 amageday otay oneyay eaturecray youyay ithay withyay anyay attackyay ifyay youyay avehay advantageyay onyay ethay attackyay ollray. 
 Ethay attackyay ustmay useyay ayay inessefay oryay ayay angedray weaponyay. Youyay on’tday eednay advantageyay onyay ethay attackyay ollray ifyay anotheryay enemyyay ofyay ethay argettay isyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ityay, atthay enemyyay isn’tyay incapacitatedyay, andyay youyay on’tday avehay isadvantageday onyay ethay attackyay ollray. Ethay amountyay ofyay ethay extrayay amageday increasesyay asyay youyay aingay evelslay inyay isthay assclay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Eaksnay  Attackyay olumncay ofyay ethay  Ogueray abletay. Ievesthay’  Antcay Uringday youryay ogueray ainingtray youyay earnedlay ievesthay’ antcay, ayay ecretsay ixmay ofyay ialectday, argonjay, andyay odecay atthay allowsyay youyay otay idehay essagesmay inyay eeminglysay ormalnay onversationcay. 
 Onlyyay anotheryay eaturecray atthay owsknay ievesthay’ antcay understandsyay uchsay essagesmay. 
 Ityay akestay ourfay imestay ongerlay otay onveycay uchsay ayay essagemay anthay ityay oesday otay eakspay ethay amesay ideayay ainlyplay. Inyay additionyay, youyay understandyay ayay etsay ofyay ecretsay ignssay andyay ymbolssay usedyay otay onveycay ortshay, implesay essagesmay, uchsay asyay whetheryay anyay areayay isyay angerousday oryay ethay erritorytay ofyay ayay ievesthay’ uildgay, whetheryay ootlay isyay earbynay, oryay whetheryay epeoplethay inyay anyay areayay areyay easyyay arksmay oryay willyay ovidepray ayay afesay ousehay orfay ievesthay onyay ethay unray. Unningcay  Actionyay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youryay quickyay inkingthay andyay agilityyay allowyay youyay otay ovemay andyay actyay quicklyyay. 
 Youyay ancay aketay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay inyay ombatcay. 
 Isthay actionyay ancay ebay usedyay onlyyay otay aketay ethay  Ashday,  Isengageday, oryay  Idehay actionyay. Oguishray  Archetypeyay Atyay 3rday evellay, youyay oosechay anyay archetypeyay atthay youyay emulateyay inyay ethay exerciseyay ofyay youryay ogueray abilitiesyay:  Iefthay,  Assassinyay, oryay  Arcaneyay  Ickstertray, allyay etailedday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay escriptionday. 
 Youryay archetypeyay oicechay antsgray youyay eaturesfay atyay 3rday evellay andyay enthay againyay atyay 9thay, 13thay, andyay 17thay evellay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay Whenyay youyay eachray 4thay evellay, andyay againyay atyay 8thay, 10thay, 12thay, 16thay, andyay 19thay evellay, youyay ancay increaseyay oneyay abilityyay orescay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 2, oryay youyay ancay increaseyay wotay abilityyay oresscay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 1. 
 Asyay ormalnay, youyay an’tcay increaseyay anyay abilityyay orescay aboveyay 20 usingyay isthay eaturefay. Uncannyyay  Odgeday Artingstay atyay 5thay evellay, whenyay anyay attackeryay atthay youyay ancay eesay itshay youyay withyay anyay attackyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay alvehay ethay attack’syay amageday againstyay youyay. Evasionyay Eginningbay atyay 7thay evellay, youyay ancay imblynay odgeday outyay ofyay ethay wayyay ofyay ertaincay areayay effectsyay, uchsay asyay ayay edray agon’sdray ieryfay eathbray oryay anyay iceyay ormstay ellspay. 
 Whenyay youyay areyay ubjectedsay otay anyay effectyay atthay allowsyay youyay otay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray otay aketay onlyyay alfhay amageday, youyay insteadyay aketay onay amageday ifyay youyay ucceedsay onyay ethay avingsay owthray, andyay onlyyay alfhay amageday ifyay youyay ailfay. Eliableray  Alenttay Ybay 11thay evellay, youyay avehay efinedray youryay osenchay illsskay untilyay eythay approachyay erfectionpay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay akemay anyay abilityyay eckchay atthay etslay youyay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay, youyay ancay eattray ayay day20 ollray ofyay 9 oryay owerlay asyay ayay 10. Indsenseblay  Artingstay atyay 14thay evellay, ifyay youyay areyay ableyay otay earhay, youyay areyay awareyay ofyay ethay ocationlay ofyay anyyay iddenhay oryay invisibleyay eaturecray withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay. Ipperyslay  Indmay Ybay 15thay evellay, youyay avehay acquiredyay eatergray entalmay engthstray. 
 Youyay aingay oficiencypray inyay  Wisdomyay avingsay owsthray. Elusiveyay Eginningbay atyay 18thay evellay, youyay areyay osay evasiveyay atthay attackersyay arelyray aingay ethay upperyay andhay againstyay youyay. 
 Okestray ofyay  Ucklay Atyay 20thay evellay, youyay avehay anyay uncannyyay ackknay orfay ucceedingsay whenyay youyay eednay otay. 
 Ifyay youryay attackyay issesmay ayay argettay withinyay angeray, youyay ancay urntay ethay issmay intoyay ayay ithay. 
 Alternativelyyay, ifyay youyay ailfay anyay abilityyay eckchay, youyay ancay eattray ethay day20 ollray asyay ayay 20. Onceyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay, youyay an’tcay useyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Oguishray  Archetypesyay Oguesray avehay anymay eaturesfay inyay ommoncay, includingyay eirthay emphasisyay onyay erfectingpay eirthay illsskay, eirthay ecisepray andyay eadlyday approachyay otay ombatcay, andyay eirthay increasinglyyay quickyay eflexesray. 
 Utbay ifferentday oguesray eerstay osethay alentstay inyay aryingvay irectionsday, embodiedyay ybay ethay ogueray archetypesyay. 
 Youryay oicechay ofyay archetypeyay isyay ayay eflectionray ofyay youryay ocusfay— otnay ecessarilynay anyay indicationyay ofyay youryay osenchay ofessionpray, utbay ayay escriptionday ofyay youryay eferredpray echniquestay. Iefthay Youyay onehay youryay illsskay inyay ethay arcenouslay artsyay. 
 Urglarsbay, anditsbay, utpursescay, andyay otheryay iminalscray ypicallytay ollowfay isthay archetypeyay, utbay osay oday oguesray whoyay eferpray otay inkthay ofyay emselvesthay asyay ofessionalpray easuretray eekerssay, explorersyay, elversday, andyay investigatorsyay. 
 Inyay additionyay otay improvingyay youryay agilityyay andyay ealthstay, youyay earnlay illsskay usefulyay orfay elvingday intoyay ancientyay uinsray, eadingray unfamiliaryay anguageslay, andyay usingyay agicmay itemsyay youyay ormallynay ouldn’tcay employyay. Astfay  Andshay Artingstay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay ancay useyay ethay onusbay actionyay antedgray ybay youryay  Unningcay  Actionyay otay akemay ayay  Exterityday ( Eightslay ofyay  Andhay) eckchay, useyay youryay ievesthay’ oolstay otay isarmday ayay aptray oryay openyay ayay ocklay, oryay aketay ethay  Useyay anyay  Objectyay actionyay. Econdsay- Orystay  Workyay Whenyay youyay oosechay isthay archetypeyay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay imbclay asterfay anthay ormalnay; imbingclay onay ongerlay ostscay youyay extrayay ovementmay. Inyay additionyay, whenyay youyay akemay ayay unningray umpjay, ethay istanceday youyay overcay increasesyay ybay ayay umbernay ofyay eetfay equalyay otay youryay  Exterityday odifiermay. Upremesay  Eaksnay Artingstay atyay 9thay evellay, youyay avehay advantageyay onyay ayay  Exterityday ( Ealthstay) eckchay ifyay youyay ovemay onay oremay anthay alfhay youryay eedspay onyay ethay amesay urntay. Useyay  Agicmay  Eviceday Ybay 13thay evellay, youyay avehay earnedlay enoughyay aboutyay ethay workingsyay ofyay agicmay atthay youyay ancay improviseyay ethay useyay ofyay itemsyay evenyay whenyay eythay areyay otnay intendedyay orfay youyay. 
 Youyay ignoreyay allyay assclay, aceray, andyay evellay equirementsray onyay ethay useyay ofyay agicmay itemsyay. Ief’sthay  Eflexesray Whenyay youyay eachray 17thay evellay, youyay avehay ecomebay adeptyay atyay ayinglay ambushesyay andyay quicklyyay escapingyay angerday. 
 Youyay ancay aketay wotay urnstay uringday ethay irstfay oundray ofyay anyyay ombatcay. 
 Youyay aketay youryay irstfay urntay atyay youryay ormalnay initiativeyay andyay yoursecondyay urntay atyay youryay initiativeyay inusmay 10. 
 Youyay an’tcay useyay isthay eaturefay whenyay youyay areyay urprisedsay. Assassinyay Youyay ocusfay youryay ainingtray onyay ethay imgray artyay ofyay eathday. 
 Osethay whoyay adhereyay otay isthay archetypeyay areyay iverseday: iredhay illerskay, iesspay, ountybay untershay, andyay evenyay eciallyspay anointedyay iestspray ainedtray otay exterminateyay ethay enemiesyay ofyay eirthay eityday. 
 Ealthstay, oisonpay, andyay isguiseday elphay youyay eliminateyay youryay oesfay withyay eadlyday efficiencyyay. Onusbay  Oficienciespray Whenyay youyay oosechay isthay archetypeyay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay aingay oficiencypray withyay ethay isguiseday itkay andyay ethay oisoner’spay itkay. Assassinateyay Artingstay atyay 3rday evellay, youyay areyay atyay youryay eadliestday whenyay youyay etgay ethay opdray onyay youryay enemiesyay. 
 Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay anyyay eaturecray atthay asn’thay akentay ayay urntay inyay ethay ombatcay yetyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, anyyay ithay youyay orescay againstyay ayay eaturecray atthay isyay urprisedsay isyay ayay iticalcray ithay. Infiltrationyay  Expertiseyay Artingstay atyay 9thay evellay, youyay ancay unfailinglyyay eatecray alsefay identitiesyay orfay yourselfyay. 
 Youyay ustmay endspay evensay aysday andyay 25 gpay otay establishyay ethay istoryhay, ofessionpray, andyay affiliationsyay orfay anyay identityyay. 
 Youyay an’tcay establishyay anyay identityyay atthay elongsbay otay omeonesay elseyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, youyay ightmay acquireyay appropriateyay othingclay, etterslay ofyay introductionyay, andyay officialyay- ookinglay ertificationcay otay establishyay yourselfyay asyay ayay embermay ofyay ayay adingtray ousehay omfray ayay emoteray itycay osay youyay ancay insinuateyay yourselfyay intoyay ethay ompanycay ofyay otheryay wealthyyay erchantsmay. Ereafterthay, ifyay youyay adoptyay ethay ewnay identityyay asyay ayay isguiseday, otheryay eaturescray elievebay youyay otay ebay atthay ersonpay untilyay ivengay anyay obviousyay easonray otnay otay. Impostoryay Atyay 13thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay unerringlyyay imicmay anotheryay erson’spay eechspay, writingyay, andyay ehaviorbay. Youyay ustmay endspay atyay eastlay eethray ourshay udyingstay esethay eethray omponentscay ofyay ethay erson’spay ehaviorbay, isteninglay otay eechspay, examiningyay andwritinghay, andyay observingyay annerismsmay. Youryay useray isyay indiscernibleyay otay ethay asualcay observeryay. 
 Ifyay ayay waryyay eaturecray uspectssay omethingsay isyay amissyay, youyay avehay advantageyay onyay anyyay  Arismachay ( Eceptionday) eckchay youyay akemay otay avoidyay etectionday. Eathday  Ikestray Artingstay atyay 17thay evellay, youyay ecomebay ayay astermay ofyay instantyay eathday. 
 Whenyay youyay attackyay andyay ithay ayay eaturecray atthay isyay urprisedsay, ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray (DCay 8 + youryay  Exterityday odifiermay + youryay oficiencypray onusbay). 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oubleday ethay amageday ofyay youryay attackyay againstyay ethay eaturecray. Arcaneyay  Ickstertray  Omesay oguesray enhanceyay eirthay ine-honedfay illsskay ofyay ealthstay andyay agilityyay withyay agicmay, earninglay ickstray ofyay enchantmentyay andyay illusionyay. 
 Ellcastingspay Whenyay youyay eachray 3rday evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay astcay ellsspay. 
 Eesay apterchay 10 orfay ethay eneralgay ulesray ofyay ellcastingspay andyay apterchay 11 orfay ethay wizardyay ellspay istlay. Antripscay. 
 Youyay earnlay eethray antripscay: agemay andhay andyay wotay otheryay antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay wizardyay ellspay istlay. 
 Youyay earnlay anotheryay wizardyay antripcay ofyay youryay oicechay atyay 10thay evellay. Ellspay  Otsslay. 
 Ethay  Arcaneyay  Ickstertray  Ellcastingspay abletay owsshay owhay anymay ellspay otsslay youyay avehay otay astcay youryay ellsspay ofyay 1stay evellay andyay igherhay. 
 Otay astcay oneyay ofyay esethay ellsspay, youyay ustmay expendyay ayay otslay ofyay ethay ell'sspay evellay oryay igherhay. 
 Youyay egainray allyay expendedyay ellspay otsslay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay owknay ethay 1levelstlay ellspay armchay ersonpay andyay avehay ayay 1levelstlay andyay ayay 2levelndlay ellspay otslay availableyay, youyay ancay astcay armchay ersonpay usingyay eitheryay otslay. Ellsspay  Ownknay ofyay 1stay- Evellay andyay  Igherhay. 
 Youyay owknay eethray 1levelstlay wizardyay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay, wotay ofyay whichyay youyay ustmay oosechay omfray ethay enchantmentyay andyay illusionyay ellsspay onyay ethay wizardyay ellspay istlay. Ethay  Ellsspay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Arcaneyay  Ickstertray  Ellcastingspay abletay owsshay whenyay youyay earnlay oremay wizardyay ellsspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay. 
 Eachyay ofyay esethay ellsspay ustmay ebay anyay enchantmentyay oryay illusionyay ellspay ofyay youryay oicechay, andyay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay. 
 Orfay instanceyay, whenyay youyay eachray 7thay evellay inyay isthay assclay, youyay ancay earnlay oneyay ewnay ellspay ofyay 1stay oryay 2nday evellay. Ethay ellsspay youyay earnlay atyay 8thay, 14thay, andyay 20thay evellay ancay omecay omfray anyyay oolschay ofyay agicmay. Wheneveryay youyay aingay ayay evellay inyay isthay assclay, youyay ancay eplaceray oneyay ofyay ethay wizardyay ellsspay youyay owknay withyay anotheryay ellspay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay wizardyay ellspay istlay. 
 Ethay ewnay ellspay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay, andyay ityay ustmay ebay anyay enchantmentyay oryay illusionyay ellspay, unlessyay you’reyay eplacingray ethay ellspay youyay ainedgay atyay 8thay, 14thay, oryay 20thay evellay. Ellcastingspay  Abilityyay. 
 Intelligenceyay isyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay youryay wizardyay ellsspay, incesay youyay earnlay youryay ellsspay oughthray edicatedday udystay andyay emorizationmay. Youyay useyay youryay  Intelligenceyay wheneveryay ayay ellspay efersray otay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, youyay useyay youryay  Intelligenceyay odifiermay whenyay ettingsay ethay avingsay owthray DCay orfay ayay wizardyay ellspay youyay astcay andyay whenyay akingmay anyay attackyay ollray withyay oneyay. Ellspay avesay DCay = 8 + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Intelligenceyay odifiermay Ellspay attackyay odifiermay = youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Intelligenceyay odifiermay Agemay  Andhay  Egerdemainlay Artingstay atyay 3rday evellay, whenyay youyay astcay agemay andhay, youyay ancay akemay ethay ectralspay andhay invisibleyay, andyay youyay ancay erformpay ethay ollowingfay additionalyay askstay withyay ityay:•  Youyay ancay owstay oneyay objectyay ethay andhay isyay oldinghay inyay ayay ontainercay wornyay oryay arriedcay ybay anotheryay eaturecray.•  Youyay ancay etrieveray anyay objectyay inyay ayay ontainercay wornyay oryay arriedcay ybay anotheryay eaturecray.•  Youyay ancay useyay ievesthay’ oolstay otay ickpay ockslay andyay isarmday apstray atyay angeray. Arcaneyay  Ickstertray  Ellcastingspay Ogueray Evellay Antripscay Ownknay Ellsspay Ownknay— Ellspay  Otsslay erpay  Ellspay  Evel—1st2nd3rd4th3rd332———4th343———5th343———6th343———7th3542——8th3642——9th3642——10th4743——11th4843——12th4843——13th49432—14th410432—15th410432—16th411433—17th411433—18th411433—19th412433120thlay4134331 Youyay ancay erformpay oneyay ofyay esethay askstay withoutyay eingbay oticednay ybay ayay eaturecray ifyay youyay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday ( Eightslay ofyay  Andhay) eckchay ontestedcay ybay ethay eature’scray  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckchay. Inyay additionyay, youyay ancay useyay ethay onusbay actionyay antedgray ybay youryay  Unningcay  Actionyay otay ontrolcay ethay andhay. Agicalmay  Ambushyay Artingstay atyay 9thay evellay, ifyay youyay areyay iddenhay omfray ayay eaturecray whenyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay onyay ityay, ethay eaturecray ashay isadvantageday onyay anyyay avingsay owthray ityay akesmay againstyay ethay ellspay isthay urntay. Ersatilevay  Ickstertray Atyay 13thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay istractday argetstay withyay youryay agemay andhay. 
 Asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay esignateday ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay ectralspay andhay eatedcray ybay ethay ellspay. 
 Oingday osay ivesgay youyay advantageyay onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay atthay eaturecray untilyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay urntay. Ellspay  Iefthay Atyay 17thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay agicallymay ealstay ethay owledgeknay ofyay owhay otay astcay ayay ellspay omfray anotheryay ellcasterspay. Immediatelyyay afteryay ayay eaturecray astscay ayay ellspay atthay argetstay youyay oryay includesyay youyay inyay itsyay areayay ofyay effectyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay orcefay ethay eaturecray otay akemay ayay avingsay owthray withyay itsyay ellcastingspay abilityyay odifiermay. 
 Ethay DCay equalsyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, youyay egatenay ethay ell’sspay effectyay againstyay youyay, andyay youyay ealstay ethay owledgeknay ofyay ethay ellspay ifyay ityay isyay atyay eastlay 1stay evellay andyay ofyay ayay evellay youyay ancay astcay (ityay oesn’tday eednay otay ebay ayay wizardyay ellspay). 
 Orfay ethay extnay 8 ourshay, youyay owknay ethay ellspay andyay ancay astcay ityay usingyay youryay ellspay otsslay. 
 Orcerersay Oldengay eyesyay ashingflay, ayay umanhay etchesstray outyay erhay andhay andyay unleashesyay ethay agonfiredray atthay urnsbay inyay erhay einsvay. Asyay anyay infernoyay agesray aroundyay erhay oesfay, eatherylay wingsyay eadspray omfray erhay ackbay andyay eshay akestay otay ethay airyay. Onglay airhay whippedyay ybay ayay onjuredcay windyay, ayay alf-elfhay eadsspray ishay armsyay wideyay andyay owsthray ishay eadhay ackbay. 
 Iftinglay imhay omentarilymay offyay ethay oundgray, ayay waveyay ofyay agicmay urgessay upyay inyay imhay, oughthray imhay, andyay outyay omfray imhay inyay ayay ightymay astblay ofyay ightninglay. Ouchingcray ehindbay ayay alagmitestay, ayay alflinghay ointspay ayay ingerfay atyay ayay argingchay oglodytetray. 
Ayay astblay ofyay irefay ingsspray omfray erhay ingerfay otay ikestray ethay eaturecray. 
 Eshay ucksday ackbay ehindbay ethay ockray ormationfay withyay ayay ingray, unawareyay atthay erhay wildyay agicmay ashay urnedtay erhay inskay ightbray ueblay. Orcererssay arrycay ayay agicalmay irthrightbay onferredcay uponyay emthay ybay anyay exoticyay oodlineblay, omesay otherworldlyyay influenceyay, oryay exposureyay otay unknownyay osmiccay orcesfay. Oneyay an’tcay udystay orcerysay asyay oneyay earnslay ayay anguagelay, anyyay oremay anthay oneyay ancay earnlay otay ivelay ayay egendarylay ifelay. 
 Onay oneyay ooseschay orcerysay; ethay owerpay ooseschay ethay orcerersay. Agicmay isyay ayay artpay ofyay everyyay orcerersay, uffusingsay odybay, indmay, andyay iritspay withyay ayay atentlay owerpay atthay waitsyay otay ebay appedtay. 
 Omesay orcererssay wieldyay agicmay atthay ingsspray omfray anyay ancientyay oodlineblay infusedyay withyay ethay agicmay ofyay agonsdray. 
 Othersyay arrycay ayay awray, uncontrolledyay agicmay withinyay emthay, ayay aoticchay ormstay atthay anifestsmay inyay unexpectedyay waysyay. Ethay appearanceyay ofyay orceroussay owerspay isyay wildlyyay unpredictableyay. 
 Omesay aconicdray oodlinesblay oducepray exactlyyay oneyay orcerersay inyay everyyay enerationgay, utbay inyay otheryay ineslay ofyay escentday everyyay individualyay isyay ayay orcerersay. 
 Ostmay ofyay ethay imetay, ethay alentstay ofyay orcerysay appearyay asyay apparentyay ukesflay. 
 Omesay orcererssay an’tcay amenay ethay originyay ofyay eirthay owerpay, whileyay othersyay acetray ityay otay angestray eventsyay inyay eirthay ownyay iveslay. 
 Ethay ouchtay ofyay ayay emonday, ethay essingblay ofyay ayay yaddray atyay ayay aby’sbay irthbay, oryay ayay astetay ofyay ethay wateryay omfray ayay ysteriousmay ingspray ightmay arkspay ethay iftgay ofyay orcerysay. Osay ootay ightmay ethay iftgay ofyay ayay eityday ofyay agicmay, exposureyay otay ethay elementalyay orcesfay ofyay ethay  Inneryay  Anesplay oryay ethay addeningmay aoschay ofyay  Imbolay, oryay ayay impseglay intoyay ethay inneryay workingsyay ofyay ealityray. Orcererssay avehay onay useyay orfay ethay ellbooksspay andyay ancientyay omestay ofyay agicmay orelay atthay wizardsyay elyray onyay, ornay oday eythay elyray onyay ayay atronpay otay antgray eirthay ellsspay asyay warlocksyay oday. Ybay earninglay otay arnesshay andyay annelchay eirthay ownyay inbornyay agicmay, eythay ancay iscoverday ewnay andyay aggeringstay waysyay otay unleashyay atthay owerpay. Unexplainedyay  Owerspay  Orcererssay areyay areray inyay ethay worldyay, andyay it’syay unusualyay otay indfay ayay orcerersay whoyay isyay otnay involvedyay inyay ethay adventuringyay ifelay inyay omesay wayyay. 
 Eoplepay withyay agicalmay owerpay eethingsay inyay eirthay einsvay oonsay iscoverday atthay ethay owerpay oesn’tday ikelay otay aystay quietyay. 
 Ethay  Orcerersay Evellay Oficiencypray Onusbay Orcerysay Ointspay Eaturesfay Antripscay Ownknay Ellsspay Ownknay— Ellspay  Otsslay erpay  Ellspay  Evel—1st2nd3rd4th5th6th7th8th9th1stlay+2— Ellcastingspay,  Orceroussay  Origin422————————2ndyay+22 Ontfay ofyay  Agic433————————3rdmay+23 Etamagic4442———————4thmay+24 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement5543———————5th+35—56432——————6thyay+36 Orceroussay  Originyay eature57433——————7th+37—584331—————8thfay+38 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement594332—————9th+49—51043331————10thyay+410 Etamagic61143332————11th+411—612433321———12thmay+412 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement612433321———13th+513—6134333211——14thyay+514 Orceroussay  Originyay eature6134333211——15th+515—61443332111—16thfay+516 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement61443332111—17thyay+617 Etamagic61543332111118thmay+618 Orceroussay  Originyay eature61543333111119thfay+619 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement61543333211120thyay+620 Orceroussay  Estorationray615433332211 Orcererssay oftenyay avehay obscureyay oryay quixoticyay otivationsmay ivingdray emthay otay adventureyay. 
 Omesay eeksay ayay eatergray understandingyay ofyay ethay agicalmay orcefay atthay infusesyay emthay, oryay ethay answeryay otay ethay ysterymay ofyay itsyay originyay. 
 Othersyay opehay otay indfay ayay wayyay otay etgay idray ofyay ityay, oryay otay unleashyay itsyay ullfay otentialpay. 
 Whateveryay eirthay oalsgay, orcererssay areyay everyyay itbay asyay usefulyay otay anyay adventuringyay artypay asyay wizardsyay, akingmay upyay orfay ayay omparativecay acklay ofyay eadthbray inyay eirthay agicalmay owledgeknay withyay enormousyay exibilityflay inyay usingyay ethay ellsspay eythay owknay. Eatingcray ayay  Orcerersay  Ethay ostmay importantyay questionyay otay onsidercay whenyay eatingcray youryay orcerersay isyay ethay originyay ofyay youryay owerpay. 
 Asyay ayay artingstay aracterchay, you'llyay oosechay anyay originyay atthay iestay otay ayay aconicdray oodlineblay oryay ethay influenceyay ofyay wildyay agicmay, utbay ethay exactyay ourcesay ofyay youryay owerpay isyay upyay otay youyay otay ecideday. 
 Isyay ityay ayay amilyfay ursecay, assedpay ownday otay youyay omfray istantday ancestorsyay?  Oryay idday omesay extraordinaryyay eventyay eavelay youyay essedblay withyay inherentyay agicmay utbay erhapspay arredscay asyay wellyay? Owhay oday youyay eelfay aboutyay ethay agicalmay owerpay oursingcay oughthray youyay?  Oday youyay embraceyay ityay, ytray otay astermay ityay, oryay evelray inyay itsyay unpredictableyay aturenay?  Isyay ityay ayay essingblay oryay ayay ursecay?  Idday youyay eeksay ityay outyay, oryay idday ityay indfay youyay?  Idday youyay avehay ethay optionyay otay efuseray ityay, andyay oday youyay wishyay youyay adhay?  Whatyay oday youyay intendyay otay oday withyay ityay?  Erhapspay youyay eelfay ikelay you’veyay eenbay ivengay isthay owerpay orfay omesay oftylay urposepay. 
 Oryay youyay ightmay ecideday atthay ethay owerpay ivesgay youyay ethay ightray otay oday whatyay youyay wantyay, otay aketay whatyay youyay wantyay omfray osethay whoyay acklay uchsay owerpay. 
 Erhapspay youryay owerlinkspay youyay otay ayay owerfulpay individualyay inyay ethay world—theyay eyfay eaturecray atthay essedblay youyay atyay irthbay, ethay agondray whoyay utpay ayay opdray ofyay itsyay oodblay intoyay youryay einsvay, ethay ichlay whoyay eatedcray youyay asyay anyay experimentyay, oryay ethay eityday whoyay osechay youyay otay arrycay isthay owerpay. Quickyay  Uildbay Youyay ancay akemay ayay orcerersay quicklyyay ybay ollowingfay esethay uggestionssay. 
 Irstfay,  Arismachay ouldshay ebay youryay ighesthay abilityyay orescay, ollowedfay ybay  Onstitutioncay. 
 Econdsay, oosechay ethay ermithay ackgroundbay. 
 Equipmentyay Youyay artstay withyay ethay ollowingfay equipmentyay, inyay additionyay otay ethay equipmentyay antedgray ybay youryay ackgroundbay:• (ayay) ayay ightlay ossbowcray andyay 20 oltsbay oryay (bay) anyyay implesay weaponyay• (ayay) ayay omponentcay ouchpay oryay (bay) anyay arcaneyay ocusfay• (ayay) ayay ungeoneer’sday ackpay oryay (bay) anyay explorer’syay ackpay•  Wotay aggersday Ellcastingspay  Anyay eventyay inyay youryay astpay, oryay inyay ethay ifelay ofyay ayay arentpay oryay ancestoryay, eftlay anyay indelibleyay arkmay onyay youyay, infusingyay youyay withyay arcaneyay agicmay. 
 Isthay ontfay ofyay agicmay, whateveryay itsyay originyay, uelsfay youryay ellsspay. 
 Eesay apterchay 10 orfay ethay eneralgay ulesray ofyay ellcastingspay andyay apterchay 11 orfay ethay orcerersay ellspay istlay. Antripscay Atyay 1stay evellay, youyay owknay ourfay antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay orcerersay ellspay istlay. 
 Youyay earnlay additionalyay orcerersay antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay atyay igherhay evelslay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Antripscay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Orcerersay abletay. Ellspay  Otsslay Ethay  Orcerersay abletay owsshay owhay anymay ellspay otsslay youyay avehay otay astcay youryay ellsspay ofyay 1stay evellay andyay igherhay. 
 Otay astcay oneyay ofyay esethay orcerersay ellsspay, youyay ustmay expendyay ayay otslay ofyay ethay ell’sspay evellay oryay igherhay. 
 Youyay egainray allyay expendedyay ellspay otsslay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay owknay ethay 1levelstlay ellspay urningbay andshay andyay avehay ayay 1levelstlay andyay ayay 2levelndlay ellspay otslay availableyay, youyay ancay astcay urningbay andshay usingyay eitheryay otslay. Ellsspay  Ownknay ofyay 1stay  Evellay andyay  Igherhay Youyay owknay wotay 1levelstlay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay orcerersay ellspay istlay. Ethay  Ellsspay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Orcerersay abletay owsshay whenyay youyay earnlay oremay orcerersay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay. 
 Eachyay ofyay esethay ellsspay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay. 
 Orfay instanceyay, whenyay youyay eachray 3rday evellay inyay isthay assclay, youyay ancay earnlay oneyay ewnay ellspay ofyay 1stay oryay 2nday evellay. Additionallyyay, whenyay youyay aingay ayay evellay inyay isthay assclay, youyay ancay oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay orcerersay ellsspay youyay owknay andyay eplaceray ityay withyay anotheryay ellspay omfray ethay orcerersay ellspay istlay, whichyay alsoyay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay. Ellcastingspay  Abilityyay Arismachay isyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay youryay orcerersay ellsspay, incesay ethay owerpay ofyay youryay agicmay eliesray onyay youryay abilityyay otay ojectpray youryay willyay intoyay ethay worldyay. 
 Youyay useyay youryay  Arismachay wheneveryay ayay ellspay efersray otay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, youyay useyay youryay  Arismachay odifiermay whenyay ettingsay ethay avingsay owthray DCay orfay ayay orcerersay ellspay youyay astcay andyay whenyay akingmay anyay attackyay ollray withyay oneyay. Ellspay avesay DCay = 8 + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Arismachay odifiermay Ellspay attackyay odifiermay = youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Arismachay odifiermay Ellcastingspay  Ocusfay Youyay ancay useyay anyay arcaneyay ocusfay (oundfay inyay apterchay 5) asyay ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay orfay youryay orcerersay ellsspay. Orceroussay  Originyay  Oosechay ayay orceroussay originyay, whichyay escribesday ethay ourcesay ofyay youryay innateyay agicalmay owerpay:  Aconicdray  Oodlineblay oryay  Wildyay  Agicmay, othbay etailedday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay escriptionday. Youryay oicechay antsgray youyay eaturesfay whenyay youyay oosechay ityay atyay 1stay evellay andyay againyay atyay 6thay, 14thay, andyay 18thay evellay. Ontfay ofyay  Agicmay Atyay 2nday evellay, youyay aptay intoyay ayay eepday wellspringyay ofyay agicmay withinyay yourselfyay. 
 Isthay wellspringyay isyay epresentedray ybay orcerysay ointspay, whichyay allowyay youyay otay eatecray ayay arietyvay ofyay agicalmay effectsyay. Orcerysay  Ointspay Youyay avehay 2 orcerysay ointspay, andyay youyay aingay oremay asyay youyay eachray igherhay evelslay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Orcerysay  Ointspay olumncay ofyay ethay  Orcerersay abletay. 
 Youyay ancay evernay avehay oremay orcerysay ointspay anthay ownshay onyay ethay abletay orfay youryay evellay. 
 Youyay egainray allyay entspay orcerysay ointspay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Exibleflay  Astingcay Youyay ancay useyay youryay orcerysay ointspay otay aingay additionalyay ellspay otsslay, oryay acrificesay ellspay otsslay otay aingay additionalyay orcerysay ointspay. 
 Youyay earnlay otheryay waysyay otay useyay youryay orcerysay ointspay asyay youyay eachray igherhay evelslay. Eatingcray  Ellspay  Otsslay. 
 Youyay ancay ansformtray unexpendedyay orcerysay ointspay intoyay oneyay ellspay otslay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. 
 Ethay  Eatingcray  Ellspay  Otsslay abletay owsshay ethay ostcay ofyay eatingcray ayay ellspay otslay ofyay ayay ivengay evellay. 
 Youyay ancay eatecray ellspay otsslay onay igherhay inyay evellay anthay 5thay. Eatingcray  Ellspay  Otsslay Ellspay  Otslay Orcerysay Evellay Ointpay  Ost1st22nd33rd54th65thcay7 Onvertingcay ayay  Ellspay  Otslay otay  Orcerysay  Ointspay. 
 Asyay abonusyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay ellspay otslay andyay aingay ayay umbernay ofyay orcerysay ointspay equalyay otay ethay ot’sslay evellay. Etamagicmay Atyay 3rday evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay wisttay youryay ellsspay otay uitsay youryay eedsnay. 
 Youyay aingay wotay ofyay ethay ollowingfay  Etamagicmay optionsyay ofyay youryay oicechay. 
 Arefulcay  Ellspay Whenyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay atthay orcesfay otheryay eaturescray otay akemay ayay avingsay owthray, youyay ancay otectpray omesay ofyay osethay eaturescray omfray ethay ell’sspay ullfay orcefay. 
 Otay oday osay, youyay endspay 1 orcerysay ointpay andyay oosechay ayay umbernay ofyay osethay eaturescray upyay otay youryay  Arismachay odifiermay (inimummay ofyay oneyay eaturecray). 
Ayay osenchay eaturecray automaticallyyay ucceedssay onyay itsyay avingsay owthray againstyay ethay ellspay. Istantday  Ellspay Whenyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay atthay ashay ayay angeray ofyay 5 eetfay oryay eatergray, youyay ancay endspay 1 orcerysay ointpay otay oubleday ethay angeray ofyay ethay ellspay. Whenyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay atthay ashay ayay angeray ofyay ouchtay, youyay ancay endspay 1 orcerysay ointpay otay akemay ethay angeray ofyay ethay ellspay 30 eetfay. Empoweredyay  Ellspay Whenyay youyay ollray amageday orfay ayay ellspay, youyay ancay endspay 1 orcerysay ointpay otay erollray ayay umbernay ofyay ethay amageday iceday upyay otay youryay  Arismachay odifiermay (inimummay ofyay oneyay). 
 Youyay ustmay useyay ethay ewnay ollsray. Youyay ancay useyay  Empoweredyay  Ellspay evenyay ifyay youyay avehay alreadyyay usedyay ayay ifferentday  Etamagicmay optionyay uringday ethay astingcay ofyay ethay ellspay. Extendedyay  Ellspay Whenyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay atthay ashay ayay urationday ofyay 1 inutemay oryay ongerlay, youyay ancay endspay 1 orcerysay ointpay otay oubleday itsyay urationday, otay ayay aximummay urationday ofyay 24 ourshay. Eightenedhay  Ellspay Whenyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay atthay orcesfay ayay eaturecray otay akemay ayay avingsay owthray otay esistray itsyay effectsyay, youyay ancay endspay 3 orcerysay ointspay otay ivegay oneyay argettay ofyay ethay ellspay isadvantageday onyay itsyay irstfay avingsay owthray ademay againstyay ethay ellspay. Quickenedyay  Ellspay Whenyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay atthay ashay ayay astingcay imetay ofyay 1 actionyay, youyay ancay endspay 2 orcerysay ointspay otay angechay ethay astingcay imetay otay 1 onusbay actionyay orfay isthay astingcay. Ubtlesay  Ellspay Whenyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay, youyay ancay endspay 1 orcerysay ointpay otay astcay ityay withoutyay anyyay omaticsay oryay erbalvay omponentscay. Winnedtay  Ellspay Whenyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay atthay argetstay onlyyay oneyay eaturecray andyay oesn’tday avehay ayay angeray ofyay elfsay, youyay ancay endspay ayay umbernay ofyay orcerysay ointspay equalyay otay ethay ell’sspay evellay otay argettay ayay econdsay eaturecray inyay angeray withyay ethay amesay ellspay (1 orcerysay ointpay ifyay ethay ellspay isyay ayay antripcay). Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay Whenyay youyay eachray 4thay evellay, andyay againyay atyay 8thay, 12thay, 16thay, andyay 19thay evellay, youyay ancay increaseyay oneyay abilityyay orescay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 2, oryay youyay ancay increaseyay wotay abilityyay oresscay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 1. 
 Asyay ormalnay, youyay an’tcay increaseyay anyay abilityyay orescay aboveyay 20 usingyay isthay eaturefay. Orceroussay  Estorationray Atyay 20thay evellay, youyay egainray 4 expendedyay orcerysay ointspay wheneveryay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay estray. Orceroussay  Originsyay Ifferentday orcererssay aimclay ifferentday originsyay orfay eirthay innateyay agicmay. 
 Althoughyay anymay ariationsvay existyay, ostmay ofyay esethay originsyay allfay intoyay wotay ategoriescay: ayay aconicdray oodlineblay andyay wildyay agicmay. Aconicdray  Oodlineblay  Youryay innateyay agicmay omescay omfray aconicdray agicmay atthay wasyay ingledmay withyay youryay oodblay oryay atthay ofyay youryay ancestorsyay. 
 Ostmay oftenyay, orcererssay withyay isthay originyay acetray eirthay escentday ackbay otay ayay ightymay orcerersay ofyay ancientyay imestay whoyay ademay ayay argainbay withyay ayay agondray oryay whoyay ightmay evenyay avehay aimedclay ayay agondray arentpay. 
 Omesay ofyay esethay oodlinesblay areyay wellyay establishedyay inyay ethay worldyay, utbay ostmay areyay obscureyay. 
 Anyyay ivengay orcerersay ouldcay ebay ethay irstfay ofyay ayay ewnay oodlineblay, asyay ayay esultray ofyay ayay actpay oryay omesay otheryay exceptionalyay ircumstancecay. Agondray  Ancestoryay Atyay 1stay evellay, youyay oosechay oneyay ypetay ofyay agondray asyay youryay ancestoryay. 
 Ethay amageday ypetay associatedyay withyay eachyay agondray isyay usedyay ybay eaturesfay youyay aingay aterlay. Aconicdray  Ancestryyay Agondray Amageday  Ypetay Ackblay Acidyay Ueblay Ightninglay Assbray Irefay Onzebray Ightninglay Oppercay Acidyay Oldcay Irefay Eengray Oisonpay Edray Irefay Ilversay Oldcay Whiteyay Oldcay Youyay ancay eakspay, eadray, andyay writeyay  Aconicdray. 
 Additionallyyay, wheneveryay youyay akemay ayay  Arismachay eckchay whenyay interactingyay withyay agonsdray, youryay oficiencypray onusbay isyay oubledday ifyay ityay appliesyay otay ethay eckchay. Aconicdray  Esilienceray Asyay agicmay owsflay oughthray youryay odybay, ityay ausescay ysicalphay aitstray ofyay youryay agondray ancestorsyay otay emergeyay. 
 Atyay 1stay evellay, youryay ithay ointpay aximummay increasesyay ybay 1 andyay increasesyay ybay 1 againyay wheneveryay youyay aingay ayay evellay inyay isthay assclay. Additionallyyay, artspay ofyay youryay inskay areyay overedcay ybay ayay inthay eenshay ofyay agon-likedray alesscay. 
 Agondray  Wingsyay Atyay 14thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay outspray ayay airpay ofyay agondray wingsyay omfray youryay ackbay, aininggay ayay yingflay eedspay equalyay otay youryay urrentcay eedspay. 
 Youyay ancay eatecray esethay wingsyay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. 
 Eythay astlay untilyay youyay ismissday emthay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. Youyay an’tcay anifestmay youryay wingsyay whileyay wearingyay armoryay unlessyay ethay armoryay isyay ademay otay accommodateyay emthay, andyay othingclay otnay ademay otay accommodateyay youryay wingsyay ightmay ebay estroyedday whenyay youyay anifestmay emthay. Aconicdray  Esencepray Eginningbay atyay 18thay evellay, youyay ancay annelchay ethay eaddray esencepray ofyay youryay agondray ancestoryay, ausingcay osethay aroundyay youyay otay ecomebay awestruckyay oryay ightenedfray. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay endspay 5 orcerysay ointspay otay awdray onyay isthay owerpay andyay exudeyay anyay aurayay ofyay aweyay oryay earfay (youryay oicechay) otay ayay istanceday ofyay 60 eetfay. 
 Orfay 1 inutemay oryay untilyay youyay oselay youryay oncentrationcay (asyay ifyay youyay wereyay astingcay ayay oncentrationcay ellspay), eachyay ostilehay eaturecray atthay artsstay itsyay urntay inyay isthay aurayay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ebay armedchay (ifyay youyay osechay aweyay) oryay ightenedfray (ifyay youyay osechay earfay) untilyay ethay aurayay endsyay. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay ucceedssay onyay isthay avingsay owthray isyay immuneyay otay youryay aurayay orfay 24 ourshay. Wildyay  Agicmay Youryay innateyay agicmay omescay omfray ethay wildyay orcesfay ofyay aoschay atthay underlieyay ethay orderyay ofyay eationcray. 
 Youyay ightmay avehay enduredyay exposureyay otay omesay ormfay ofyay awray agicmay, erhapspay oughthray ayay anarplay ortalpay eadinglay otay  Imbolay, ethay  Elementalyay  Anesplay, oryay ethay ysteriousmay  Arfay  Ealmray. 
 Erhapspay youyay wereyay essedblay ybay ayay owerfulpay eyfay eaturecray oryay arkedmay ybay ayay emonday. 
 Oryay youryay agicmay ouldcay ebay ayay ukeflay ofyay youryay irthbay, withyay onay apparentyay ausecay oryay easonray. 
 Oweverhay ityay amecay otay ebay, isthay aoticchay agicmay urnschay withinyay youyay, waitingyay orfay anyyay outletyay. Wildyay  Agicmay  Urgesay Artingstay whenyay youyay oosechay isthay originyay atyay 1stay evellay, youryay ellcastingspay ancay unleashyay urgessay ofyay untamedyay agicmay. 
 Immediatelyyay afteryay youyay astcay ayay orcerersay ellspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay DMay ancay avehay youyay ollray ayay day20. 
 Ifyay youyay ollray ayay 1, ollray onyay ethay  Wildyay  Agicmay  Urgesay abletay otay eatecray ayay andomray agicalmay effectyay. Idestay ofyay  Aoschay Artingstay atyay 1stay evellay, youyay ancay anipulatemay ethay orcesfay ofyay ancechay andyay aoschay otay aingay advantageyay onyay oneyay attackyay ollray, abilityyay eckchay, oryay avingsay owthray. 
 Onceyay youyay oday osay, youyay ustmay inishfay ayay onglay estray eforebay youyay ancay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay. Anyyay imetay eforebay youyay egainray ethay useyay ofyay isthay eaturefay, ethay DMay ancay avehay youyay ollray onyay ethay  Wildyay  Agicmay  Urgesay abletay immediatelyyay afteryay youyay astcay ayay orcerersay ellspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay. 
 Youyay enthay egainray ethay useyay ofyay isthay eaturefay. Endbay  Ucklay Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, youyay avehay ethay abilityyay otay wisttay atefay usingyay youryay wildyay agicmay. 
 Whenyay anotheryay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay akesmay anyay attackyay ollray, anyay abilityyay eckchay, oryay ayay avingsay owthray, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray andyay endspay 2 orcerysay ointspay otay ollray 1day4 andyay applyyay ethay umbernay olledray asyay ayay onusbay oryay enaltypay (youryay oicechay) otay ethay eature’scray ollray. 
 Youcanyay oday osay afteryay ethay eaturecray ollsray utbay eforebay anyyay effectsyay ofyay ethay ollray occuryay. Ontrolledcay  Aoschay Atyay 14thay evellay, youyay aingay ayay odicummay ofyay ontrolcay overyay ethay urgessay ofyay youryay wildyay agicmay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay ollray onyay ethay  Wildyay  Agicmay  Urgesay abletay, youyay ancay ollray wicetay andyay useyay eitheryay umbernay. Ellspay  Ombardmentbay Eginningbay atyay 18thay evellay, ethay armfulhay energyyay ofyay youryay ellsspay intensifiesyay. 
 Whenyay youyay ollray amageday orfay ayay ellspay andyay ollray ethay ighesthay umbernay ossiblepay onyay anyyay ofyay ethay iceday, oosechay oneyay ofyay osethay iceday, ollray ityay againyay andyay addyay atthay ollray otay ethay amageday. 
 Wildyay  Agicmay  Urgedsay100 Effectdyay100 Effectyay01-02 Ollray onyay isthay abletay atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay orfay ethay extnay inutemay, ignoringyay isthay esultray onyay ubsequentsay ollsray.45-46 Youyay astcay evitatelay onyay yourself.47-48Ayay unicornyay ontrolledcay ybay ethay DMay appearsyay inyay ayay acespay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay, enthay isappearsday 1 inutemay aterlay.03-04 Orfay ethay extnay inutemay, youyay ancay eesay anyyay invisibleyay eaturecray ifyay youyay avehay inelay ofyay ightsay otay ityay.49-50 Youyay an’tcay eakspay orfay ethay extnay inutemay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay ytray, inkpay ubblesbay oatflay outyay ofyay youryay outh.05-06Amay odronmay osenchay andyay ontrolledcay ybay ethay DMay appearsyay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay, enthay isappearsday 1 inutemay ater.51-52Alay ectralspay ieldshay overshay earnay youyay orfay ethay extnay inutemay, antinggray youyay ayay +2 onusbay otay ACyay andyay immunityyay otay agicmay issilemay.07-08 Youyay astcay ireballfay asyay ayay 3levelrdlay ellspay enteredcay onyay yourselfyay.53-54 Youyay areyay immuneyay otay eingbay intoxicatedyay ybay alcoholyay orfay ethay extnay 5day6 aysday.09-10 Youyay astcay agicmay issilemay asyay ayay 5levelthlay ellspay.55-56 Youryay airhay allsfay outyay utbay owsgray ackbay withinyay 24 ourshay.11-12 Ollray ayay day10. 
 Youryay eighthay angeschay ybay ayay umbernay ofyay inchesyay equalyay otay ethay ollray. 
 Ifyay ethay ollray isyay oddyay, youyay inkshray. 
 Ifyay ethay ollray isyay evenyay, youyay owgray.57-58 Orfay ethay extnay inutemay, anyyay ammableflay objectyay youyay ouchtay atthay isn’tyay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay ybay anotheryay eaturecray urstsbay intoyay ameflay.13-14 Youyay astcay onfusioncay enteredcay onyay yourselfyay.59-60 Youyay egainray youryay owest-levellay expendedyay ellspay otslay.15-16 Orfay ethay extnay inutemay, youyay egainray 5 ithay ointspay atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay.61-62 Orfay ethay extnay inutemay, youyay ustmay outshay whenyay youyay eakspay.63-64 Youyay astcay ogfay oudclay enteredcay onyay yourselfyay.17-18 Youyay owgray ayay onglay eardbay ademay ofyay eathersfay atthay emainsray untilyay youyay eezesnay, atyay whichyay ointpay ethay eathersfay explodeyay outyay omfray youryay acefay.65-66 Upyay otay eethray eaturescray youyay oosechay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay aketay 4day10 ightninglay amageday.67-68 Youyay areyay ightenedfray ybay ethay earestnay eaturecray untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay.19-20 Youyay astcay easegray enteredcay onyay yourselfyay.21-22 Eaturescray avehay isadvantageday onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay ethay extnay ellspay youyay astcay inyay ethay extnay inutemay atthay involvesyay ayay avingsay owthray.69-70 Eachyay eaturecray withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay ecomesbay invisibleyay orfay ethay extnay inutemay. 
 Ethay invisibilityyay endsyay onyay ayay eaturecray whenyay ityay attacksyay oryay astscay ayay ellspay.23-24 Youryay inskay urnstay ayay ibrantvay adeshay ofyay ueblay. 
Ayay emoveray ursecay ellspay ancay endyay isthay effectyay.71-72 Youyay aingay esistanceray otay allyay amageday orfay ethay extnay inute.73-74Amay andomray eaturecray withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay ecomesbay oisonedpay orfay 1day4 ourshay.25-26 Anyay eyeyay appearsyay onyay youryay oreheadfay orfay ethay extnay inutemay. 
 Uringday atthay imetay, youyay avehay advantageyay onyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay atthay elyray onyay ightsay.75-76 Youyay owglay withyay ightbray ightlay inyay ayay 30-ootfay adiusray orfay ethay extnay inutemay. 
 Anyyay eaturecray atthay endsyay itsyay urntay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay isyay indedblay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay itsyay extnay urntay.27-28 Orfay ethay extnay inutemay, allyay youryay ellsspay withyay ayay astingcay imetay ofyay 1 actionyay avehay ayay astingcay imetay ofyay 1 onusbay actionyay.77-78 Youyay astcay olymorphpay onyay yourselfyay. 
 Ifyay youyay ailfay ethay avingsay owthray, youyay urntay intoyay ayay eepshay orfay ethay ell’sspay urationday.29-30 Youyay eleporttay upyay otay 60 eetfay otay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay.79-80 Illusoryyay utterfliesbay andyay owerflay etalspay utterflay inyay ethay airyay withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay orfay ethay extnay inutemay.31-32 Youyay areyay ansportedtray otay ethay  Astralyay  Aneplay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay, afteryay whichyay imetay youyay eturnray otay ethay acespay youyay eviouslypray occupiedyay oryay ethay earestnay unoccupiedyay acespay ifyay atthay acespay isyay occupiedyay.81-82 Youyay ancay aketay oneyay additionalyay actionyay immediatelyyay.83-84 Eachyay eaturecray withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay akestay 1day10 ecroticnay amageday. 
 Youyay egainray ithay ointspay equalyay otay ethay umsay ofyay ethay ecroticnay amageday ealtday.33-34 Aximizemay ethay amageday ofyay ethay extnay amagingday ellspay youyay astcay withinyay ethay extnay inutemay.85-86 Youyay astcay irrormay imageyay.35-36 Ollray ayay day10. 
 Youryay ageyay angeschay ybay ayay umbernay ofyay yearsyay equalyay otay ethay ollray. 
 Ifyay ethay ollray isyay oddyay, youyay etgay youngeryay (inimummay 1 yearyay oldyay). 
 Ifyay ethay ollray isyay evenyay, youyay etgay olderyay.87-88 Youyay astcay yflay onyay ayay andomray eaturecray withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay.89-90 Youyay ecomebay invisibleyay orfay ethay extnay inutemay. 
 Uringday atthay imetay, otheryay eaturescray an’tcay earhay youyay. 
 Ethay invisibilityyay endsyay ifyay youyay attackyay oryay astcay ayay ell.37-381dspay6 umphsflay ontrolledcay ybay ethay DMay appearyay inyay unoccupiedyay acesspay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay andyay areyay ightenedfray ofyay youyay. 
 Eythay anishvay afteryay 1 inutemay.91-92 Ifyay youyay ieday withinyay ethay extnay inutemay, youyay immediatelyyay omecay ackbay otay ifelay asyay ifyay ybay ethay eincarnateray ellspay.39-40 Youyay egainray 2day10 ithay ointspay.93-94 Youryay izesay increasesyay ybay oneyay izesay ategorycay orfay ethay extnay inutemay.41-42 Youyay urntay intoyay ayay ottedpay antplay untilyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
 Whileyay ayay antplay, youyay areyay incapacitatedyay andyay avehay ulnerabilityvay otay allyay amageday. 
 Warlockyay Withyay ayay eudodragonpsay urledcay onyay ishay ouldershay, ayay youngyay elfyay inyay oldengay obesray ilessmay warmlyyay, weavingyay ayay agicalmay armchay intoyay ishay oneyedhay wordsyay andyay endingbay ethay alacepay entinelsay otay ishay willyay. Asyay amesflay ingspray otay ifelay inyay erhay andshay, ayay wizenedyay umanhay whispersyay ethay ecretsay amenay ofyay erhay emonicday atronpay, infusingyay erhay ellspay withyay iendishfay agicmay. Iftingshay ishay azegay etweenbay ayay atteredbay ometay andyay ethay oddyay alignmentyay ofyay ethay arsstay overheadyay, ayay wild-eyedyay ieflingtay antschay ethay ysticmay itualray atthay willyay openyay ayay oorwayday otay ayay istantday worldyay. Warlocksyay areyay eekerssay ofyay ethay owledgeknay atthay ieslay iddenhay inyay ethay abricfay ofyay ethay ultiversemay. 
 Oughthray actspay ademay withyay ysteriousmay eingsbay ofyay upernaturalsay owerpay, warlocksyay unlockyay agicalmay effectsyay othbay ubtlesay andyay ectacularspay. 
 Awingdray onyay ethay ancientyay owledgeknay ofyay eingsbay uchsay asyay eyfay oblesnay, emonsday, evilsday, agshay, andyay alienyay entitiesyay ofyay ethay  Arfay  Ealmray, warlocksyay iecepay ogethertay arcaneyay ecretssay otay olsterbay eirthay ownyay owerpay. Wornsay andyay  Eholdenbay Ayay warlockyay isyay efinedday ybay ayay actpay withyay anyay otherworldlyyay eingbay. 
 Ometimessay ethay elationshipray etweenbay warlockyay andyay atronpay isyay ikelay atthay ofyay ayay ericclay andyay ayay eityday, oughthay ethay eingsbay atthay ervesay asyay atronspay orfay warlocksyay areyay otnay odsgay. 
Ayay warlockyay ightmay eadlay ayay ultcay edicatedday otay ayay emonday incepray, anyay archdevilyay, oryay anyay utterlyyay alienyay entity—beingsyay otnay ypicallytay ervedsay ybay ericsclay. 
 Oremay oftenyay, oughthay, ethay arrangementyay isyay imilarsay otay atthay etweenbay ayay astermay andyay anyay apprenticeyay. 
 Ethay warlockyay earnslay andyay owsgray inyay owerpay, atyay ethay ostcay ofyay occasionalyay ervicessay erformedpay onyay ethay atron’spay ehalfbay. Ethay agicmay estowedbay onyay ayay warlockyay angesray omfray inormay utbay astinglay alterationsyay otay ethay warlock'syay eingbay (uchsay asyay ethay abilityyay otay eesay inyay arknessday oryay otay eadray anyyay anguagelay) otay accessyay otay owerfulpay ellsspay.
