 Unlikeyay ookishbay wizardsyay, warlocksyay upplementsay eirthay agicmay withyay omesay acilityfay atyay and-to-handhay ombatcay. 
 Eythay areyay omfortablecay inyay ightlay armoryay andyay owknay owhay otay useyay implesay weaponsyay. Elversday intoyay  Ecretssay Warlocksyay areyay ivendray ybay anyay insatiableyay eednay orfay owledgeknay andyay owerpay, whichyay ompelscay emthay intoyay eirthay actspay andyay apesshay eirthay iveslay. 
 Isthay irstthay ivesdray warlocksyay intoyay eirthay actspay andyay apesshay eirthay aterlay areerscay asyay wellyay. Oriesstay ofyay warlocksyay indingbay emselvesthay otay iendsfay areyay widelyyay ownknay. 
 Utbay anymay warlocksyay ervesay atronspay atthay areyay otnay iendishfay. 
 Ometimessay ayay avelertray inyay ethay wildsyay omescay otay ayay angelystray eautifulbay owertay, eetsmay itsyay eyfay ordlay oryay adylay, andyay umblesstay intoyay ayay actpay withoutyay eingbay ullyfay awareyay ofyay ityay. 
 Ethay  Warlockyay Evellay Oficiencypray Onusbay Eaturesfay Antripscay Ownknay Ellsspay Ownknay Ellspay Otsslay Otslay Evellay Invocationsyay Own1stknay+2 Otherworldlyyay  Atronpay,  Actpay  Agic2211st—2ndmay+2 Eldritchyay  Invocations2321st23rdyay+2 Actpay  Oon2422nd24thbay+2 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement3522nd25th+3—3623rd36thyay+3 Otherworldlyyay  Atronpay eature3723rd37th+3—3824th48thfay+3 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement3924th49th+4—31025th510thyay+4 Otherworldlyyay  Atronpay eature41025th511thfay+4 Ysticmay  Arcanumyay (6thay evel)41135th512thlay+4 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement41135th613thyay+5 Ysticmay  Arcanumyay (7thay evel)41235th614thlay+5 Otherworldlyyay  Atronpay eature41235th615thfay+5 Ysticmay  Arcanumyay (8thay evel)41335th716thlay+5 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement41335th717thyay+6 Ysticmay  Arcanumyay (9thay evel)41445th718th+6—41445th819thlay+6 Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvement41545th820thyay+6 Eldritchyay  Aster41545th8forbiddenmay orelay, ayay illiantbray utbay azedcray udent’sstay indmay isyay openedyay otay ealitiesray eyondbay ethay aterialmay worldyay andyay otay ethay alienyay eingsbay atthay wellday inyay ethay outeryay oidvay. Onceyay ayay actpay isyay ademay, ayay warlock’syay irstthay orfay owledgeknay andyay owerpay an’tcay ebay akedslay withyay eremay udystay andyay esearchray. 
 Onay oneyay akesmay ayay actpay withyay uchsay ayay ightymay atronpay ifyay ehay oryay eshay oesn’tday intendyay otay useyay ethay owerpay usthay ainedgay. 
 Atherray, ethay astvay ajoritymay ofyay warlocksyay endspay eirthay aysday inyay activeyay ursuitpay ofyay eirthay oalsgay, whichyay ypicallytay eansmay omesay indkay ofyay adventuringyay. 
 Urthermorefay, ethay emandsday ofyay eirthay atronspay ivedray warlocksyay owardtay adventureyay. Eatingcray ayay  Warlockyay Asyay youyay akemay youryay warlockyay aracterchay, endspay omesay imetay inkingthay aboutyay youryay atronpay andyay ethay obligationsyay atthay youryay actpay imposesyay uponyay youyay. 
 Whatyay edlay youyay otay akemay ethay actpay, andyay owhay idday youyay akemay ontactcay withyay youryay atronpay?  Wereyay youyay educedsay intoyay ummoningsay ayay evilday, oryay idday youyay eeksay outyay ethay itualray atthay wouldyay allowyay youyay otay akemay ontactcay withyay anyay alienyay elderyay odgay?  Idday youyay earchsay orfay youryay atronpay, oryay idday youryay atronpay indfay andyay oosechay youyay?  Oday youyay afechay underyay ethay obligationsyay ofyay youryay actpay oryay ervesay oyfullyjay inyay anticipationyay ofyay ethay ewardsray omisedpray otay youyay? Workyay withyay youryay DMay otay etermineday owhay igbay ayay artpay youryay actpay willyay ayplay inyay youryay aracter’schay adventuringyay areercay. Youryay atron’spay emandsday ightmay ivedray youyay intoyay adventuresyay, oryay eythay ightmay onsistcay entirelyyay ofyay allsmay avorsfay youyay ancay oday etweenbay adventuresyay. Whatyay indkay ofyay elationshipray oday youyay avehay withyay youryay atronpay?  Isyay ityay iendlyfray, antagonisticyay, uneasyyay, oryay omanticray?  Owhay importantyay oesday youryay atronpay onsidercay youyay otay ebay?  Whatyay artpay oday youyay ayplay inyay youryay atron’spay ansplay?  Oday youyay owknay otheryay ervantssay ofyay youryay atronpay? Owhay oesday youryay atronpay ommunicatecay withyay youyay?  Ifyay youyay avehay ayay amiliarfay, ityay ightmay occasionallyyay eakspay withyay youryay atron’spay oicevay. 
 Omesay warlocksyay indfay essagesmay omfray eirthay atronspay etchedyay onyay eestray, ingledmay amongyay eatay eaveslay, oryay adriftyay inyay ethay ouds—messagesclay atthay onlyyay ethay warlockyay ancay eesay. 
 Otheryay warlocksyay onversecay withyay eirthay atronspay inyay eamsdray oryay wakingyay isionsvay, oryay ealday onlyyay withyay intermediariesyay. Quickyay  Uildbay Youyay ancay akemay ayay warlockyay quicklyyay ybay ollowingfay esethay uggestionssay. 
 Irstfay,  Arismachay ouldshay ebay youryay ighesthay abilityyay orescay, ollowedfay ybay  Onstitutioncay. 
 Econdsay, oosechay ethay arlatanchay ackgroundbay. 
 Oficienciespray Armoryay:  Ightlay armoryay  Weaponsyay:  Implesay weaponsyay  Oolstay:  Onenay Avingsay  Owsthray:  Wisdomyay,  Arismachay  Illsskay:  Oosechay wotay illsskay omfray  Arcanayay, Eceptionday,  Istoryhay,  Intimidationyay,  Investigationyay, Aturenay, andyay  Eligionray Equipmentyay Youyay artstay withyay ethay ollowingfay equipmentyay, inyay additionyay otay ethay equipmentyay antedgray ybay youryay ackgroundbay:• (ayay) ayay ightlay ossbowcray andyay 20 oltsbay oryay (bay) anyyay implesay weaponyay• (ayay) ayay omponentcay ouchpay oryay (bay) anyay arcaneyay ocusfay• (ayay) ayay olar’sschay ackpay oryay (bay) ayay ungeoneer’sday ackpay•  Eatherlay armoryay, anyyay implesay weaponyay, andyay wotay aggersday Otherworldlyyay  Atronpay Atyay 1stay evellay, youyay avehay uckstray ayay argainbay withyay anyay otherworldlyyay eingbay ofyay youryay oicechay: ethay  Archfeyyay, ethay  Iendfay, oryay ethay  Eatgray  Oldyay  Oneyay, eachyay ofyay whichyay isyay etailedday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay escriptionday. 
 Youryay oicechay antsgray youyay eaturesfay atyay 1stay evellay andyay againyay atyay 6thay, 10thay, andyay 14thay evellay. Actpay  Agicmay Youryay arcaneyay esearchray andyay ethay agicmay estowedbay onyay youyay ybay youryay atronpay avehay ivengay youyay acilityfay withyay ellsspay. 
 Eesay apterchay 10 orfay ethay eneralgay ulesray ofyay ellcastingspay andyay apterchay 11 orfay ethay warlockyay ellspay istlay. Antripscay Youyay owknay wotay antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay warlockyay ellspay istlay. 
 Youyay earnlay additionalyay warlockyay antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay atyay igherhay evelslay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Antripscay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Warlockyay abletay. Ellspay  Otsslay Ethay  Warlockyay abletay owsshay owhay anymay ellspay otsslay youyay avehay. 
 Ethay abletay alsoyay owsshay whatyay ethay evellay ofyay osethay otsslay isyay; allyay ofyay youryay ellspay otsslay areyay ethay amesay evellay. 
 Otay astcay oneyay ofyay youryay warlockyay ellsspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ustmay expendyay ayay ellspay otslay. 
 Youyay egainray allyay expendedyay ellspay otsslay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Orfay exampleyay, whenyay youyay areyay 5thay evellay, youyay avehay wotay 3levelrdlay ellspay otsslay. 
 Otay astcay ethay 1levelstlay ellspay underwavethay, youyay ustmay endspay oneyay ofyay osethay otsslay, andyay youyay astcay ityay asyay ayay 3levelrdlay ellspay. Ellsspay  Ownknay ofyay 1stay  Evellay andyay  Igherhay  Atyay 1stay evellay, youyay owknay wotay 1levelstlay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay warlockyay ellspay istlay. Ethay  Ellsspay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Warlockyay abletay owsshay whenyay youyay earnlay oremay warlockyay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay ofyay 1stay evellay andyay igherhay. 
Ayay ellspay youyay oosechay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay onay igherhay anthay what’syay ownshay inyay ethay able'stay  Otslay  Evellay olumncay orfay youryay evellay. 
 Whenyay youyay eachray 6thay evellay, orfay exampleyay, youyay earnlay ayay ewnay warlockyay ellspay, whichyay ancay ebay 1stay, 2nday, oryay 3rday evellay. Additionallyyay, whenyay youyay aingay ayay evellay inyay isthay assclay, youyay ancay oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay warlockyay ellsspay youyay owknay andyay eplaceray ityay withyay anotheryay ellspay omfray ethay warlockyay ellspay istlay, whichyay alsoyay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay. Ellcastingspay  Abilityyay Arismachay isyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay youryay warlockyay ellsspay, osay youyay useyay youryay  Arismachay wheneveryay ayay ellspay efersray otay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, youyay useyay youryay  Arismachay odifiermay whenyay ettingsay ethay avingsay owthray DCay orfay ayay warlockyay ellspay youyay astcay andyay whenyay akingmay anyay attackyay ollray withyay oneyay. Ellspay avesay DCay = 8 + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Arismachay odifiermay Ellspay attackyay odifiermay = youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Arismachay odifiermay Ellcastingspay  Ocusfay Youyay ancay useyay anyay arcaneyay ocusfay (oundfay inyay apterchay 5) asyay ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay orfay youryay warlockyay ellsspay. Eldritchyay  Invocationsyay  Inyay youryay udystay ofyay occultyay orelay, youyay avehay unearthedyay eldritchyay invocationsyay, agmentsfray ofyay orbiddenfay owledgeknay atthay imbueyay youyay withyay anyay abidingyay agicalmay abilityyay. Atyay 2nday evellay, youyay aingay wotay eldritchyay invocationsyay ofyay youryay oicechay. 
 Youryay invocationyay optionsyay areyay etailedday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay escriptionday. 
 Whenyay youyay aingay ertaincay warlockyay evelslay, youyay aingay additionalyay invocationsyay ofyay youryay oicechay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Invocationsyay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Warlockyay abletay. Additionallyyay, whenyay youyay aingay ayay evellay inyay isthay assclay, youyay ancay oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay invocationsyay youyay owknay andyay eplaceray ityay withyay anotheryay invocationyay atthay youyay ouldcay earnlay atyay atthay evellay. Actpay  Oonbay Atyay 3rday evellay, youryay otherworldlyyay atronpay estowsbay ayay iftgay uponyay youyay orfay youryay oyallay ervicesay. 
 Youyay aingay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay eaturesfay ofyay youryay oicechay. Actpay ofyay ethay  Ainchay Youyay earnlay ethay indfay amiliarfay ellspay andyay ancay astcay ityay asyay ayay itualray. 
 Ethay ellspay oesn’tday ountcay againstyay youryay umbernay ofyay ellsspay ownknay. Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, youyay ancay oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ormalnay ormsfay orfay youryay amiliarfay oryay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay ecialspay ormsfay: impyay, eudodragonpsay, quasityay, oryay itespray. Additionallyyay, whenyay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay, youyay ancay orgofay oneyay ofyay youryay ownyay attacksyay otay allowyay youryay amiliarfay otay akemay oneyay attackyay ofyay itsyay ownyay. Actpay ofyay ethay  Adeblay Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay eatecray ayay actpay weaponyay inyay youryay emptyyay andhay. 
 Youyay ancay oosechay ethay ormfay atthay isthay eleemay weaponyay akestay eachyay imetay youyay eatecray ityay (eesay apterchay 5 orfay weaponyay optionsyay). 
 Youyay areyay oficientpray withyay ityay whileyay youyay wieldyay ityay. 
 Youryay actpay weaponyay isappearsday ifyay ityay isyay oremay anthay 5 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay orfay 1 inutemay oryay oremay. 
 Ityay alsoyay isappearsday ifyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay, ifyay youyay ismissday ethay weaponyay (onay actionyay equiredray), oryay ifyay youyay ieday. Youyay ancay ansformtray oneyay agicmay weaponyay intoyay youryay actpay weaponyay ybay erformingpay ayay ecialspay itualray whileyay youyay oldhay ethay weaponyay. 
 Youyay erformpay ethay itualray overyay ethay oursecay ofyay 1 ourhay, whichyay ancay ebay oneday uringday ayay ortshay estray. Youyay ancay enthay ismissday ethay weaponyay, untingshay ityay intoyay anyay extradimensionalyay acespay, andyay ityay appearsyay wheneveryay youyay eatecray youryay actpay weaponyay ereafterthay. 
 Youyay an’tcay affectyay anyay artifactyay oryay ayay entientsay weaponyay inyay isthay wayyay. 
 Ethay weaponyay easescay eingbay youryay actpay weaponyay ifyay youyay ieday, ifyay youyay erformpay ethay 1-ourhay itualray onyay ayay ifferentday weaponyay, oryay ifyay youyay useyay ayay 1-ourhay itualray otay eakbray youryay ondbay otay ityay. 
 Ethay weaponyay appearsyay atyay youryay eetfay ifyay ityay isyay inyay ethay extradimensionalyay acespay whenyay ethay ondbay eaksbray. Actpay ofyay ethay  Ometay Youryay atronpay ivesgay youyay ayay imoiregray alledcay ayay  Ookbay ofyay  Adowsshay. 
 Whenyay youyay aingay isthay eaturefay, oosechay eethray antripscay omfray anyyay ass’sclay ellspay istlay. 
 Whileyay ethay ookbay isyay onyay youryay ersonpay, youyay ancay astcay osethay antripscay atyay willyay. 
 Eythay on’tday ountcay againstyay youryay umbernay ofyay antripscay ownknay. Ifyay youyay oselay youryay  Ookbay ofyay  Adowsshay, youyay ancay erformpay ayay 1-ourhay eremonycay otay eceiveray ayay eplacementray omfray youryay atronpay. 
 Isthay eremonycay ancay ebay erformedpay uringday ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray, andyay ityay estroysday ethay eviouspray ookbay. 
 Ethay ookbay urnstay otay ashyay whenyay youyay ieday. Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay Whenyay youyay eachray 4thay evellay, andyay againyay atyay 8thay, 12thay, 16thay, andyay 19thay evellay, youyay ancay increaseyay oneyay abilityyay orescay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 2, oryay youyay ancay increaseyay wotay abilityyay oresscay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 1. 
 Asyay ormalnay, youyay an'tcay increaseyay anyay abilityyay orescay aboveyay 20 usingyay isthay eaturefay. Ysticmay  Arcanumyay Atyay 11thay evellay, youryay atronpay estowsbay uponyay youyay ayay agicalmay ecretsay alledcay anyay arcanumyay. 
 Oosechay oneyay 6levelthlay ellspay omfray ethay warlockyay ellspay istlay asyay isthay arcanumyay. Youyay ancay astcay youryay arcanumyay ellspay onceyay withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay. 
 Youyay ustmay inishfay ayay onglay estray eforebay youyay ancay oday osay againyay. Atyay igherhay evelslay, youyay aingay oremay warlockyay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay atthay ancay ebay astcay inyay isthay wayyay: oneyay 7levelthlay ellspay atyay 13thay evellay, oneyay 8levelthlay ellspay atyay 15thay evellay, andyay oneyay 9levelthlay ellspay atyay 17thay evellay. 
 Youyay egainray allyay usesyay ofyay youryay  Ysticmay  Arcanumyay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Eldritchyay  Astermay Atyay 20thay evellay, youyay ancay awdray onyay youryay inneryay eserveray ofyay ysticalmay owerpay whileyay entreatingyay youryay atronpay otay egainray expendedyay ellspay otsslay. 
 Youyay ancay endspay 1 inutemay entreatingyay youryay atronpay orfay aidyay otay egainray allyay youryay expendedyay ellspay otsslay omfray youryay  Actpay  Agicmay eaturefay. 
 Onceyay youyay egainray ellspay otsslay withyay isthay eaturefay, youyay ustmay inishfay ayay onglay estray eforebay youyay ancay oday osay againyay. Youryay  Actpay  Oonbay Eachyay  Actpay  Oonbay optionyay oducespray ayay ecialspay eaturecray oryay anyay objectyay atthay eflectsray youryay atron’spay aturenay. Actpay ofyay ethay  Ainchay. 
 Youryay amiliarfay isyay oremay unningcay anthay ayay ypicaltay amiliarfay. 
 Itsyay efaultday ormfay ancay ebay ayay eflectionray ofyay youryay atronpay, withyay itesspray andyay eudodragonspsay iedtay otay ethay  Archfeyyay andyay impsyay andyay quasitsyay iedtay otay ethay  Iendfay. 
 Ecausebay ethay  Eatgray  Oldyay  One’syay aturenay isyay inscrutableyay, anyyay amiliarfay ormfay isyay uitablesay orfay ityay. Actpay ofyay ethay  Adeblay. 
 Ifyay youryay atronpay isyay ethay  Archfeyyay, youryay weaponyay ightmay ebay ayay enderslay adeblay wrappedyay inyay eafylay inesvay. Ifyay youyay ervesay ethay  Iendfay, youryay weaponyay ouldcay ebay anyay axeyay ademay ofyay ackblay etalmay andyay adornedyay withyay ecorativeday amesflay. 
 Ifyay youryay atronpay isyay ethay  Eatgray  Oldyay  Oneyay, youryay weaponyay ightmay ebay anyay ancient-lookingyay earspay, withyay ayay emstonegay embeddedyay inyay itsyay eadhay, arvedcay otay ooklay ikelay ayay erribletay unblinkingyay eyeyay. Actpay ofyay ethay  Ometay. 
 Youryay  Ookbay ofyay  Adowsshay ightmay ebay ayay inefay, ilt-edgedgay ometay withyay ellsspay ofyay enchantmentyay andyay illusionyay, iftedgay otay youyay ybay ethay ordlylay  Archfeyyay. 
 Ityay ouldcay ebay ayay weightyyay ometay oundbay inyay emonday idehay uddedstay withyay ironyay, oldinghay ellsspay ofyay onjurationcay andyay ayay wealthyay ofyay orbiddenfay orelay aboutyay ethay inistersay egionsray ofyay ethay osmoscay, ayay iftgay ofyay ethay  Iendfay. 
 Oryay ityay ouldcay ebay ethay atteredtay iaryday ofyay ayay unaticlay ivendray admay ybay ontactcay withyay ethay  Eatgray  Oldyay  Oneyay, oldinghay apsscray ofyay ellsspay atthay onlyyay youryay ownyay urgeoningbay insanityyay allowsyay youyay otay understandyay andyay astcay. 
 Otherworldlyyay  Atronspay Ethay eingsbay atthay ervesay asyay atronspay orfay warlocksyay areyay ightymay inhabitantsyay ofyay otheryay anesplay ofyay existence—notyay odsgay, utbay almostyay odlikegay inyay eirthay owerpay. 
 Ariousvay atronspay ivegay eirthay warlocksyay accessyay otay ifferentday owerspay andyay invocationsyay, andyay expectyay ignificantsay avorsfay inyay eturnray. Omesay atronspay ollectcay warlocksyay, olingday outyay ysticmay owledgeknay elativelyray eelyfray oryay oastingbay ofyay eirthay abilityyay otay indbay ortalsmay otay eirthay willyay. 
 Otheryay atronspay estowbay eirthay owerpay onlyyay udginglygray, andyay ightmay akemay ayay actpay withyay onlyyay oneyay warlockyay. 
 Warlocksyay whoyay ervesay ethay amesay atronpay ightmay iewvay eachyay otheryay asyay alliesyay, iblingssay, oryay ivalsray. Ethay  Archfeyyay Youryay atronpay isyay ayay ordlay oryay adylay ofyay ethay eyfay, ayay eaturecray ofyay egendlay whoyay oldshay ecretssay atthay wereyay orgottenfay eforebay ethay ortalmay acesray wereyay ornbay. 
 Isthay eing’sbay otivationsmay areyay oftenyay inscrutableyay, andyay ometimessay whimsicalyay, andyay ightmay involveyay ayay ivingstray orfay eatergray agicalmay owerpay oryay ethay ettlingsay ofyay age-oldyay udgesgray. 
 Eingsbay ofyay isthay ortsay includeyay ethay  Incepray ofyay  Ostfray; ethay  Queenyay ofyay  Airyay andyay  Arknessday, ulerray ofyay ethay  Oamingglay  Ourtcay;  Itaniatay ofyay ethay  Ummersay  Ourtcay; erhay onsortcay  Oberonyay, ethay  Eengray  Ordlay;  Yrsamhay, ethay  Incepray ofyay  Oolsfay; andyay ancientyay agshay. Expandedyay  Ellspay  Istlay Ethay  Archfeyyay etslay youyay oosechay omfray anyay expandedyay istlay ofyay ellsspay whenyay youyay earnlay ayay warlockyay ellspay. 
 Eyfay  Esencepray Artingstay atyay 1stay evellay, youryay atronpay estowsbay uponyay youyay ethay abilityyay otay ojectpray ethay eguilingbay andyay earsomefay esencepray ofyay ethay eyfay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay ausecay eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 10-ootfay ubecay originatingyay omfray youyay otay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray againstyay youryay warlockyay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Ethay eaturescray atthay ailfay eirthay avingsay owsthray areyay allyay armedchay oryay ightenedfray ybay youyay (youryay oicechay) untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Onceyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay, youyay an’tcay useyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Istymay  Escapeyay Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, youyay ancay anishvay inyay ayay uffpay ofyay istmay inyay esponseray otay armhay. 
 Whenyay youyay aketay amageday, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay urntay invisibleyay andyay eleporttay upyay otay 60 eetfay otay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay youyay ancay eesay. 
 Youyay emainray invisibleyay untilyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay oryay untilyay youyay attackyay oryay astcay ayay ellspay. Onceyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay, youyay an'tcay useyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Eguilingbay  Efensesday Eginningbay atyay 10thay evellay, youryay atronpay eachestay youyay owhay otay urntay ethay ind-affectingmay agicmay ofyay youryay enemiesyay againstyay emthay. 
 Youyay areyay immuneyay otay eingbay armedchay, andyay whenyay anotheryay eaturecray attemptsyay otay armchay youyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay attemptyay otay urntay ethay armchay ackbay onyay atthay eaturecray. 
 Ethay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray againstyay youryay warlockyay ellspay avesay DCay oryay ebay armedchay ybay youyay orfay 1 inutemay oryay untilyay ethay eaturecray akestay anyyay amageday. Arkday  Eliriumday Artingstay atyay 14thay evellay, youyay ancay ungeplay ayay eaturecray intoyay anyay illusoryyay ealmray. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, oosechay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray againstyay youryay warlockyay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ityay isyay armedchay oryay ightenedfray ybay youyay (youryay oicechay) orfay 1 inutemay oryay untilyay youryay oncentrationcay isyay okenbray (asyay ifyay youyay areyay oncentratingcay onyay ayay ellspay). 
 Isthay effectyay endsyay earlyyay ifyay ethay eaturecray akestay anyyay amageday. Untilyay isthay illusionyay endsyay, ethay eaturecray inksthay ityay isyay ostlay inyay ayay istymay ealmray, ethay appearanceyay ofyay whichyay youyay oosechay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ancay eesay andyay earhay onlyyay itselfyay, youyay, andyay ethay illusionyay. Youyay ustmay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray eforebay youyay ancay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay. Ethay  Iendfay  Youyay avehay ademay ayay actpay withyay ayay iendfay omfray ethay owerlay anesplay ofyay existenceyay, ayay eingbay whoseyay aimsyay areyay evilyay, evenyay ifyay youyay ivestray againstyay osethay aimsyay. 
 Uchsay eingsbay esireday ethay orruptioncay oryay estructionday ofyay allyay ingsthay, ultimatelyyay includingyay youyay. 
 Iendsfay owerfulpay enoughyay otay orgefay ayay actpay includeyay emonday ordslay uchsay asyay  Emogorgonday,  Orcusyay,  Azfray’ Urb-luuyay, andyay  Aphometbay; archdevilsyay uchsay asyay  Asmodeusyay,  Ispaterday,  Ephistophelesmay, andyay  Elialbay; itpay iendsfay andyay alorsbay atthay areyay especiallyyay ightymay; andyay ultrolothsyay andyay otheryay ordslay ofyay ethay yugolothsyay. Expandedyay  Ellspay  Istlay Ethay  Iendfay etslay youyay oosechay omfray anyay expandedyay istlay ofyay ellsspay whenyay youyay earnlay ayay warlockyay ellspay. 
 Ethay ollowingfay ellsspay areyay addedyay otay ethay warlockyay ellspay istlay orfay youyay. Iendfay  Expandedyay  Ellsspay Ellspay  Evellay Ells1stburningspay andshay, ommand2ndblindness/deafnesscay, orchingscay ay3rdfireballray, inkingstay oud4thfireclay ieldshay, wallyay ofyay ire5thflamefay ikestray, allowhay Arkday  One’syay  Essingblay Artingstay atyay 1stay evellay, whenyay youyay educeray ayay ostilehay eaturecray otay 0 ithay ointspay, youyay aingay emporarytay ithay ointspay equalyay otay youryay  Arismachay odifiermay + youryay warlockyay evellay (inimummay ofyay 1). Arkday  One’syay  Ownyay  Ucklay Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, youyay ancay allcay onyay youryay atronpay otay alteryay atefay inyay youryay avorfay. 
 Whenyay youyay akemay anyay abilityyay eckchay oryay ayay avingsay owthray, youyay ancay useyay isthay eaturefay otay addyay ayay day10 otay youryay ollray. 
 Youyay ancay oday osay afteryay eeingsay ethay initialyay ollray utbay eforebay anyyay ofyay ethay oll’sray effectsyay occuryay. Onceyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay, youyay an’tcay useyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Iendishfay  Esilienceray Artingstay atyay 10thay evellay, youyay ancay oosechay oneyay amageday ypetay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. 
 Youyay aingay esistanceray otay atthay amageday ypetay untilyay youyay oosechay ayay ifferentday oneyay withyay isthay eaturefay. 
 Amageday omfray agicalmay weaponsyay oryay ilversay weaponsyay ignoresyay isthay esistanceray. Urlhay  Oughthray  Ellhay Artingstay atyay 14thay evellay, whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay anyay attackyay, youyay ancay useyay isthay eaturefay otay instantlyyay ansporttray ethay argettay oughthray ethay owerlay anesplay. 
 Ethay eaturecray isappearsday andyay urtleshay oughthray ayay ightmarenay andscapelay. Atyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay, ethay argettay eturnsray otay ethay acespay ityay eviouslypray occupiedyay, oryay ethay earestnay unoccupiedyay acespay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay otnay ayay iendfay, ityay akestay 10day10 ychicpsay amageday asyay ityay eelsray omfray itsyay orrifichay experienceyay. Onceyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay, youyay an’tcay useyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Ethay  Eatgray  Oldyay  Oneyay Youryay atronpay isyay ayay ysteriousmay entityyay whoseyay aturenay isyay utterlyyay oreignfay otay ethay abricfay ofyay ealityray. 
 Ityay ightmay omecay omfray ethay  Arfay  Ealmray, ethay acespay eyondbay ealityray, oryay ityay ouldcay ebay oneyay ofyay ethay elderyay odsgay ownknay onlyyay inyay egendslay. 
 Itsyay otivesmay areyay incomprehensibleyay otay ortalsmay, andyay itsyay owledgeknay osay immenseyay andyay ancientyay atthay evenyay ethay eatestgray ibrarieslay alepay inyay omparisoncay otay ethay astvay ecretssay ityay oldshay. 
 Expandedyay  Ellspay  Istlay Ethay  Eatgray  Oldyay  Oneyay etslay youyay oosechay omfray anyay expandedyay istlay ofyay ellsspay whenyay youyay earnlay ayay warlockyay ellspay. 
 Ethay ollowingfay ellsspay areyay addedyay otay ethay warlockyay ellspay istlay orfay youyay. Eatgray  Oldyay  Oneyay  Expandedyay  Ellsspay Ellspay  Evellay Ells1stdissonantspay whispersyay,  Asha'stay ideoushay aughter2nddetectlay oughtsthay, antasmalphay orce3rdclairvoyancefay, ending4thdominatesay eastbay,  Evard’syay ackblay entacles5thdominatetay ersonpay, elekinesistay Awakenedyay  Indmay Artingstay atyay 1stay evellay, youryay alienyay owledgeknay ivesgay youyay ethay abilityyay otay ouchtay ethay indsmay ofyay otheryay eaturescray. 
 Youyay ancay ommunicatecay elepathicallytay withyay anyyay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Youyay on’tday eednay otay areshay ayay anguagelay withyay ethay eaturecray orfay ityay otay understandyay youryay elepathictay utterancesyay, utbay ethay eaturecray ustmay ebay ableyay otay understandyay atyay eastlay oneyay anguagelay. Entropicyay  Wardyay Atyay 6thay evellay, youyay earnlay otay agicallymay wardyay yourselfyay againstyay attackyay andyay otay urntay anyay enemy’syay ailedfay ikestray intoyay oodgay ucklay orfay yourselfyay. 
 Whenyay ayay eaturecray akesmay anyay attackyay ollray againstyay youyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay imposeyay isadvantageday onyay atthay ollray. 
 Ifyay ethay attackyay issesmay youyay, youryay extnay attackyay ollray againstyay ethay eaturecray ashay advantageyay ifyay youyay akemay ityay eforebay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Onceyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay, youyay an’tcay useyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Oughtthay  Ieldshay Artingstay atyay 10thay evellay, youryay oughtsthay an’tcay ebay eadray ybay elepathytay oryay otheryay eansmay unlessyay youyay allowyay ityay. 
 Youyay alsoyay avehay esistanceray otay ychicpsay amageday, andyay wheneveryay ayay eaturecray ealsday ychicpsay amageday otay youyay, atthay eaturecray akestay ethay amesay amountyay ofyay amageday atthay youyay oday. Eatecray  Allthray Atyay 14thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay infectyay ayay umanoid’shay indmay withyay ethay alienyay agicmay ofyay youryay atronpay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ouchtay anyay incapacitatedyay umanoidhay. 
 Atthay eaturecray isyay enthay armedchay ybay youyay untilyay ayay emoveray ursecay ellspay isyay astcay onyay ityay, ethay armedchay onditioncay isyay emovedray omfray ityay, oryay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay. Youyay ancay ommunicatecay elepathicallytay withyay ethay armedchay eaturecray asyay onglay asyay ethay wotay ofyay youyay areyay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay. Eldritchyay  Invocationsyay Ifyay anyay eldritchyay invocationyay ashay erequisitespray, youyay ustmay eetmay emthay otay earnlay ityay. 
 Youyay ancay earnlay ethay invocationyay atyay ethay amesay imetay atthay youyay eetmay itsyay erequisitespray. Agonizingyay  Astblay Erequisitepray: eldritchyay astblay antripcay Whenyay youyay astcay eldritchyay astblay, addyay youryay  Arismachay odifiermay otay ethay amageday ityay ealsday onyay ayay ithay. Armoryay ofyay  Adowsshay Youyay ancay astcay agemay armoryay onyay yourselfyay atyay willyay, withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay oryay aterialmay omponentscay. Ascendantyay  Epstay  Erequisitepray: 9thay evellay Youyay ancay astcay evitatelay onyay yourselfyay atyay willyay, withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay oryay aterialmay omponentscay. Eastbay  Eechspay Youyay ancay astcay eakspay withyay animalsyay atyay willyay, withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay. Eguilingbay  Influenceyay Youyay aingay oficiencypray inyay ethay  Eceptionday andyay Ersuasionpay illsskay. Ewitchingbay  Whispersyay Erequisitepray: 7thay evellay Youyay ancay astcay ompulsioncay onceyay usingyay ayay warlockyay ellspay otslay. 
 Youyay an’tcay oday osay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Ookbay ofyay  Ancientyay  Ecretssay Erequisitepray:  Actpay ofyay ethay  Ometay eaturefay Youyay ancay ownay inscribeyay agicalmay itualsray inyay youryay  Ookbay ofyay  Adowsshay. 
 Oosechay wotay 1levelstlay ellsspay atthay avehay ethay itualray agtay omfray anyyay ass’sclay ellspay istlay. 
 Ethay ellsspay appearyay inyay ethay ookbay andyay on’tday ountcay againstyay ethay umbernay ofyay ellsspay youyay owknay. 
 Withyay youryay  Ookbay ofyay  Adowsshay inyay andhay, youyay ancay astcay ethay osenchay ellsspay asyay itualsray. 
 Youyay an’tcay astcay ethay ellsspay exceptyay asyay itualsray, unlessyay you’veyay earnedlay emthay ybay omesay otheryay eansmay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay astcay ayay warlockyay ellspay youyay owknay asyay ayay itualray ifyay ityay ashay ethay itualray agtay. Onyay youryay adventuresyay, youyay ancay addyay otheryay itualray ellsspay otay youryay  Ookbay ofyay  Adowsshay. 
 Whenyay youyay indfay uchsay ayay ellspay, youyay ancay addyay ityay otay ethay ookbay ifyay ethay ell’sspay evellay isyay equalyay otay oryay esslay anthay alfhay youryay warlockyay evellay (oundedray upyay) andyay ifyay youyay ancay arespay ethay imetay otay anscribetray ethay ellspay. 
 Orfay eachyay evellay ofyay ethay ellspay, ethay anscriptiontray ocesspray akestay 2 ourshay andyay ostscay 50 gpay orfay ethay areray inksyay eedednay otay inscribeyay ityay. Ainschay ofyay  Arcericay Erequisitepray: 15thay evellay,  Actpay ofyay ethay  Ainchay eaturefay Youyay ancay astcay oldhay onstermay atyay will—targetingyay ayay elestialcay, iendfay, oryay elemental—withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay oryay aterialmay omponentscay. 
 Youyay ustmay inishfay ayay onglay estray eforebay youyay ancay useyay isthay invocationyay onyay ethay amesay eaturecray againyay. Evil’sday  Ightsay Youyay ancay eesay ormallynay inyay arknessday, othbay agicalmay andyay onmagicalnay, otay ayay istanceday ofyay 120 eetfay. Eadfuldray  Wordyay  Erequisitepray: 7thay evellay Youyay ancay astcay onfusioncay onceyay usingyay ayay warlockyay ellspay otslay. 
 Eldritchyay  Earspay Erequisitepray: eldritchyay astblay antripcay Whenyay youyay astcay eldritchyay astblay, itsyay angeray isyay 300 eetfay. Eyesyay ofyay ethay  Uneray  Eeperkay Youyay ancay eadray allyay writingyay. Iendishfay  Igorvay Youyay ancay astcay alsefay ifelay onyay yourselfyay atyay willyay asyay ayay 1levelstlay ellspay, withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay oryay aterialmay omponentscay. Azegay ofyay  Wotay  Indsmay Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ouchtay ayay willingyay umanoidhay andyay erceivepay oughthray itsyay ensessay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
 Asyay onglay asyay ethay eaturecray isyay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay asyay youyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay onyay ubsequentsay urnstay otay aintainmay isthay onnectioncay, extendingyay ethay urationday untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
 Whileyay erceivingpay oughthray ethay otheryay eature’scray ensessay, youyay enefitbay omfray anyyay ecialspay ensessay ossessedpay ybay atthay eaturecray, andyay youyay areyay indedblay andyay eafenedday otay youryay ownyay urroundingssay. Ifedrinkerlay Erequisitepray: 12thay evellay,  Actpay ofyay ethay  Adeblay eaturefay Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay youryay actpay weaponyay, ethay eaturecray akestay extrayay ecroticnay amageday equalyay otay youryay  Arismachay odifiermay (inimummay 1). Askmay ofyay  Anymay  Acesfay Youyay ancay astcay isguiseday elfsay atyay willyay, withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay. Astermay ofyay  Yriadmay  Ormsfay  Erequisitepray: 15thay evellay Youyay ancay astcay alteryay elfsay atyay willyay, withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay. Inionsmay ofyay  Aoschay  Erequisitepray: 9thay evellay Youyay ancay astcay onjurecay elementalyay onceyay usingyay ayay warlockyay ellspay otslay. 
 Youyay an’tcay oday osay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Iremay ethay  Indmay  Erequisitepray: 5thay evellay Youyay ancay astcay owslay onceyay usingyay ayay warlockyay ellspay otslay. 
 Youyay an’tcay oday osay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Istymay  Isionsvay Youyay ancay astcay ilentsay imageyay atyay willyay, withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay oryay aterialmay omponentscay. Oneyay withyay  Adowsshay Erequisitepray: 5thay evellay Whenyay youyay areyay inyay anyay areayay ofyay imday ightlay oryay arknessday, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ecomebay invisibleyay untilyay youyay ovemay oryay aketay anyay actionyay oryay ayay eactionray. Otherworldlyyay  Eaplay  Erequisitepray: 9thay evellay Youyay ancay astcay umpjay onyay yourselfyay atyay willyay, withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay oryay aterialmay omponentscay. Epellingray  Astblay  Erequisitepray: eldritchyay astblay antripcay Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay eldritchyay astblay, youyay ancay ushpay ethay eaturecray upyay otay 10 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay inyay ayay aightstray inelay. Ulptorscay ofyay  Eshflay Erequisitepray: 7thay evellay Youyay ancay astcay olymorphpay onceyay usingyay ayay warlockyay ellspay otslay. 
 Youyay an’tcay oday osay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Ignsay ofyay  Illyay  Omenyay  Erequisitepray: 5thay evellay Youyay ancay astcay estowbay ursecay onceyay usingyay ayay warlockyay ellspay otslay. 
 Youyay an’tcay oday osay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Iefthay ofyay  Ivefay  Atesfay Youyay ancay astcay anebay onceyay usingyay ayay warlockyay ellspay otslay. 
 Youyay an’tcay oday osay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Irstingthay  Adeblay Erequisitepray: 5thay evellay,  Actpay ofyay ethay  Adeblay eaturefay Youyay ancay attackyay withyay youryay actpay weaponyay wicetay, insteadyay ofyay onceyay, wheneveryay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay. Isionsvay ofyay  Istantday  Ealmsray  Erequisitepray: 15thay evellay Youyay ancay astcay arcaneyay eyeyay atyay willyay, withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay. Oicevay ofyay ethay  Ainchay  Astermay  Erequisitepray:  Actpay ofyay ethay  Ainchay eaturefay Youyay ancay ommunicatecay elepathicallytay withyay youryay amiliarfay andyay erceivepay oughthray youryay amiliar’sfay ensessay asyay onglay asyay youyay areyay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay. 
 Wizardyay Adclay inyay ethay ilversay obesray atthay enoteday erhay ationstay, anyay elfyay osesclay erhay eyesyay otay utshay outyay ethay istractionsday ofyay ethay attlefieldbay andyay eginsbay erhay quietyay antchay. 
 Ingersfay weavingyay inyay ontfray ofyay erhay, eshay ompletescay erhay ellspay andyay auncheslay ayay inytay eadbay ofyay irefay owardtay ethay enemyyay anksray, whereyay ityay eruptsyay intoyay ayay onflagrationcay atthay engulfsyay ethay oldierssay. Eckingchay andyay echeckingray ishay workyay, ayay umanhay ibesscray anyay intricateyay agicmay irclecay inyay alkchay onyay ethay arebay onestay oorflay, enthay inklesspray owderedpay ironyay alongyay everyyay inelay andyay acefulgray urvecay. 
 Whenyay ethay irclecay isyay ompletecay, ehay onesdray ayay onglay incantationyay. 
Ayay olehay opensyay inyay acespay insideyay ethay irclecay, ingingbray ayay whiffyay ofyay imstonebray omfray ethay otherworldlyyay aneplay eyondbay. Ouchingcray onyay ethay oorflay inyay ayay ungeonday intersectionyay, ayay omegnay ossestay ayay andfulhay ofyay allsmay onesbay inscribedyay withyay ysticmay ymbolssay, utteringmay ayay ewfay wordsyay ofyay owerpay overyay emthay. 
 Osingclay ishay eyesyay otay eesay ethay isionsvay oremay earlyclay, ehay odsnay owlyslay, enthay opensyay ishay eyesyay andyay ointspay ownday ethay assagepay otay ishay eftlay. Wizardsyay areyay upremesay agic-usersmay, efinedday andyay unitedyay asyay ayay assclay ybay ethay ellsspay eythay astcay. 
 Awingdray onyay ethay ubtlesay weaveyay ofyay agicmay atthay ermeatespay ethay osmoscay, wizardsyay astcay ellsspay ofyay explosiveyay irefay, arcingyay ightninglay, ubtlesay eceptionday, andyay ute-forcebray indmay ontrolcay. 
 Eirthay agicmay onjurescay onstersmay omfray otheryay anesplay ofyay existenceyay, impsesglay ethay uturefay, oryay urnstay ainslay oesfay intoyay ombieszay. 
 Eirthay ightiestmay ellsspay angechay oneyay ubstancesay intoyay anotheryay, allcay eteorsmay ownday omfray ethay yskay, oryay openyay ortalspay otay otheryay worldsyay. Olarsschay ofyay ethay  Arcaneyay Wildyay andyay enigmaticyay, ariedvay inyay ormfay andyay unctionfay, ethay owerpay ofyay agicmay awsdray udentsstay whoyay eeksay otay astermay itsyay ysteriesmay. 
 Omesay aspireyay otay ecomebay ikelay ethay odsgay, apingshay ealityray itselfyay. 
 Oughthay ethay astingcay ofyay ayay ypicaltay ellspay equiresray erelymay ethay utteranceyay ofyay ayay ewfay angestray wordsyay, eetingflay esturesgay, andyay ometimessay ayay inchpay oryay umpclay ofyay exoticyay aterialsmay, esethay urfacesay omponentscay arelybay inthay atyay ethay expertiseyay attainedyay afteryay yearsyay ofyay apprenticeshipyay andyay ountlesscay ourshay ofyay udystay. Wizardsyay ivelay andyay ieday ybay eirthay ellsspay. 
 Everythingyay elseyay isyay econdarysay. 
 Eythay earnlay ewnay ellsspay asyay eythay experimentyay andyay owgray inyay experienceyay. 
 Ethay  Urelay ofyay  Owledgeknay Wizardsyay’ iveslay areyay eldomsay undanemay. 
 Ethay osestclay ayay wizardyay isyay ikelylay otay omecay otay anyay ordinaryyay ifelay isyay workingyay asyay ayay agesay oryay ecturerlay inyay ayay ibrarylay oryay universityyay, eachingtay othersyay ethay ecretssay ofyay ethay ultiversemay. 
 Otheryay wizardsyay ellsay eirthay ervicessay asyay ivinersday, ervesay inyay ilitarymay orcesfay, oryay ursuepay iveslay ofyay imecray oryay ominationday. Utbay ethay urelay ofyay owledgeknay andyay owerpay allscay evenyay ethay ostmay unadventurousyay wizardsyay outyay ofyay ethay afetysay ofyay eirthay ibrarieslay andyay aboratorieslay andyay intoyay umblingcray uinsray andyay ostlay itiescay. 
 Ostmay wizardsyay elievebay atthay eirthay ounterpartscay inyay ancientyay ivilizationscay ewknay ecretssay ofyay agicmay atthay avehay eenbay ostlay otay ethay agesyay, andyay iscoveringday osethay ecretssay ouldcay unlockyay ethay athpay otay ayay owerpay eatergray anthay anyyay agicmay availableyay inyay ethay esentpray ageyay. Eatingcray ayay  Wizardyay __________ Eatingcray ayay wizardyay aracterchay emandsday ayay ackstorybay ominatedday ybay atyay eastlay oneyay extraordinaryyay eventyay. 
 Owhay idday youryay aracterchay irstfay omecay intoyay ontactcay withyay agicmay?  Owhay idday youyay iscoverday youyay adhay anyay aptitudeyay orfay ityay?  Oday youyay avehay ayay aturalnay alenttay, oryay idday youyay implysay udystay ardhay andyay acticepray incessantlyyay?  Idday youyay encounteryay ayay agicalmay eaturecray oryay anyay ancientyay ometay atthay aughttay youyay ethay asicsbay ofyay agicmay? Whatyay ewdray youyay orthfay omfray youryay ifelay ofyay udystay?  Idday youryay irstfay astetay ofyay agicalmay owledgeknay eavelay youyay ungryhay orfay oremay?  Avehay youyay eceivedray wordyay ofyay ayay ecretsay epositoryray ofyay owledgeknay otnay yetyay underedplay ybay anyyay otheryay wizardyay?  Erhapspay you’reyay implysay eageryay otay utpay youryay ewfoundnay agicalmay illsskay otay ethay esttay inyay ethay acefay ofyay angerday. Quickyay  Uildbay Youyay ancay akemay ayay wizardyay quicklyyay ybay ollowingfay esethay uggestionssay. 
 Irstfay,  Intelligenceyay ouldshay ebay youryay ighesthay abilityyay orescay, ollowedfay ybay  Onstitutioncay oryay  Exterityday. Ifyay youyay anplay otay oinjay ethay  Oolschay ofyay  Enchantmentyay, akemay  Arismachay youryay ext-bestnay orescay. 
 Econdsay, oosechay ethay agesay ackgroundbay. 
 Equipmentyay Youyay artstay withyay ethay ollowingfay equipmentyay, inyay additionyay otay ethay equipmentyay antedgray ybay youryay ackgroundbay:• (ayay) ayay quarterstaffyay oryay (bay) ayay aggerday• (ayay) ayay omponentcay ouchpay oryay (bay) anyay arcaneyay ocusfay• (ayay) ayay olar’sschay ackpay oryay (bay) anyay explorer’syay ackpay• Ayay ellbookspay Ellcastingspay Asyay ayay udentstay ofyay arcaneyay agicmay, youyay avehay ayay ellbookspay ontainingcay ellsspay atthay owshay ethay irstfay immeringsglay ofyay youryay uetray owerpay. 
 Eesay apterchay 10 orfay ethay eneralgay ulesray ofyay ellcastingspay andyay apterchay 11 orfay ethay wizardyay ellspay istlay. Antripscay Atyay 1stay evellay, youyay owknay eethray antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray ethay wizardyay ellspay istlay. 
 Youyay earnlay additionalyay wizardyay antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay atyay igherhay evelslay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Antripscay  Ownknay olumncay ofyay ethay  Wizardyay abletay. Youryay  Ellbookspay Ethay ellsspay atthay youyay addyay otay youryay ellbookspay asyay youyay aingay evelslay eflectray ethay arcaneyay esearchray youyay onductcay onyay youryay ownyay, asyay wellyay asyay intellectualyay eakthroughsbray youyay avehay adhay aboutyay ethay aturenay ofyay ethay ultiversemay. 
 Youyay ightmay indfay otheryay ellsspay uringday youryay adventuresyay. 
 Youyay ouldcay iscoverday ayay ellspay ecordedray onyay ayay ollscray inyay anyay evilyay wizard'syay estchay, orfay exampleyay, oryay inyay ayay ustyday ometay inyay anyay ancientyay ibrarylay. Opyingcay ayay  Ellspay intoyay ethay  Ookbay. 
 Whenyay youyay indfay ayay wizardyay ellspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay addyay ityay otay youryay ellbookspay ifyay ityay isyay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay andyay ifyay youyay ancay arespay ethay imetay otay ecipherday andyay opycay ityay. Opyingcay ayay ellspay intoyay youryay ellbookspay involvesyay eproducingray ethay asicbay ormfay ofyay ethay ellspay, enthay ecipheringday ethay uniqueyay ystemsay ofyay otationnay usedyay ybay ethay wizardyay whoyay wroteyay ityay. 
 Youyay ustmay acticepray ethay ellspay untilyay youyay understandyay ethay oundssay oryay esturesgay equiredray, enthay anscribetray ityay intoyay youryay ellbookspay usingyay youryay ownyay otationnay. Orfay eachyay evellay ofyay ethay ellspay, ethay ocesspray akestay 2 ourshay andyay ostscay 50 gpay. 
 Ethay ostcay epresentsray aterialmay omponentscay youyay expendyay asyay youyay experimentyay withyay ethay ellspay otay astermay ityay, asyay wellyay asyay ethay inefay inksyay youyay eednay otay ecordray ityay. 
 Onceyay youyay avehay entspay isthay imetay andyay oneymay, youyay ancay eparepray ethay ellspay ustjay ikelay youryay otheryay ellsspay. Eplacingray ethay  Ookbay. 
 Youyay ancay opycay ayay ellspay omfray youryay ownyay ellbookspay intoyay anotheryay ook—forbay exampleyay, ifyay youyay wantyay otay akemay ayay ackupbay opycay ofyay youryay ellbookspay. 
 Isthay isyay ustjay ikelay opyingcay ayay ewnay ellspay intoyay youryay ellbookspay, utbay asterfay andyay easieryay, incesay youyay understandyay youryay ownyay otationnay andyay alreadyyay owknay owhay otay astcay ethay ellspay. 
 Youyay eednay endspay onlyyay 1 ourhay andyay 10 gpay orfay eachyay evellay ofyay ethay opiedcay ellspay. Ifyay youyay oselay youryay ellbookspay, youyay ancay useyay ethay amesay ocedurepray otay anscribetray ethay ellsspay atthay youyay avehay eparedpray intoyay ayay ewnay ellbookspay. 
 Illingfay outyay ethay emainderray ofyay youryay ellbookspay equiresray youyay otay indfay ewnay ellsspay otay oday osay, asyay ormalnay. 
 Orfay isthay easonray, anymay wizardsyay eepkay ackupbay ellbooksspay inyay ayay afesay aceplay. Ethay  Ook’sbay  Appearanceyay. 
 Youryay ellbookspay isyay ayay uniqueyay ompilationcay ofyay ellsspay, withyay itsyay ownyay ecorativeday ourishesflay andyay arginmay otesnay. 
 Ityay ightmay ebay ayay ainplay, unctionalfay eatherlay olumevay atthay youyay eceivedray asyay ayay iftgay omfray youryay astermay, ayay inelyfay oundbay ilt-edgedgay ometay youyay oundfay inyay anyay ancientyay ibrarylay, oryay evenyay ayay ooselay ollectioncay ofyay otesnay oungedscray ogethertay afteryay youyay ostlay youryay eviouspray ellbookspay inyay ayay ishapmay. Ellbookspay Atyay 1stay evellay, youyay avehay ayay ellbookspay ontainingcay ixsay 1levelstlay wizardyay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay. Eparingpray andyay  Astingcay  Ellsspay Ethay  Wizardyay abletay owsshay owhay anymay ellspay otsslay youyay avehay otay astcay youryay ellsspay ofyay 1stay evellay andyay igherhay. 
 Otay astcay oneyay ofyay esethay ellsspay, youyay ustmay expendyay ayay otslay ofyay ethay ell’sspay evellay oryay igherhay. 
 Youyay egainray allyay expendedyay ellspay otsslay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Youyay eparepray ethay istlay ofyay wizardyay ellsspay atthay areyay availableyay orfay youyay otay astcay. 
 Otay oday osay. 
oosechay ayay umbernay ofyay wizardyay ellsspay omfray youryay ellbookspay equalyay otay youryay  Intelligenceyay odifiermay + youryay wizardyay evellay (inimummay ofyay oneyay ellspay). 
 Ethay ellsspay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay you'reyay ayay 3levelrdlay wizardyay, youyay avehay ourfay 1levelstlay andyay wotay 2levelndlay ellspay otsslay. 
 Withyay anyay  Intelligenceyay ofyay 16, youryay istlay ofyay eparedpray ellsspay ancay includeyay ixsay ellsspay ofyay 1stay oryay 2nday evellay, inyay anyyay ombinationcay, osenchay omfray youryay ellbookspay. 
 Ifyay youyay eparepray ethay 1levelstlay ellspay agicmay issilemay, youyay ancay astcay ityay usingyay ayay 1levelstlay oryay ayay 2levelndlay otslay. 
 Astingcay ethay ellspay oesn’tday emoveray ityay omfray youryay istlay ofyay eparedpray ellsspay. Youyay ancay angechay youryay istlay ofyay eparedpray ellsspay whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. 
 Eparingpray ayay ewnay istlay ofyay wizardyay ellsspay equiresray imetay entspay udyingstay youryay ellbookspay andyay emorizingmay ethay incantationsyay andyay esturesgay youyay ustmay akemay otay astcay ethay ellspay: atyay eastlay 1 inutemay erpay ellspay evellay orfay eachyay ellspay onyay youryay istlay. Ellcastingspay  Abilityyay Intelligenceyay isyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay youryay wizardyay ellsspay, incesay youyay earnlay youryay ellsspay oughthray edicatedday udystay andyay emorizationmay. 
 Youyay useyay youryay  Intelligenceyay wheneveryay ayay ellspay efersray otay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay. Inyay additionyay, youyay useyay youryay  Intelligenceyay odifiermay whenyay ettingsay ethay avingsay owthray DCay orfay ayay wizardyay ellspay youyay astcay andyay whenyay akingmay anyay attackyay ollray withyay oneyay. Ellspay avesay DCay = 8 + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay  Intelligenceyay odifiermay Ellspay attackyay odifiermay = youryay oficiencypray onusbay + youryay intelligenceyay odifiermay Itualray  Astingcay Youyay ancay astcay ayay wizardyay ellspay asyay ayay itualray ifyay atthay ellspay ashay ethay itualray agtay andyay youyay avehay ethay ellspay inyay youryay ellbookspay. 
 Youyay on'tday eednay otay avehay ethay ellspay eparedpray. Ellcastingspay  Ocusfay Youyay ancay useyay anyay arcaneyay ocusfay (oundfay inyay apterchay 5) asyay ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay orfay youryay wizardyay ellsspay. Earninglay  Ellsspay ofyay 1stay  Evellay andyay  Igherhay Eachyay imetay youyay aingay ayay wizardyay evellay, youyay ancay addyay wotay wizardyay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay otay youryay ellbookspay. 
 Eachyay ofyay esethay ellsspay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay orfay whichyay youyay avehay ellspay otsslay, asyay ownshay onyay ethay  Wizardyay abletay. 
 Arcaneyay  Ecoveryray Youyay avehay earnedlay otay egainray omesay ofyay youryay agicalmay energyyay ybay udyingstay youryay ellbookspay. 
 Onceyay erpay ayday whenyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay estray, youyay ancay oosechay expendedyay ellspay otsslay otay ecoverray. 
 Ethay ellspay otsslay ancay avehay ayay ombinedcay evellay atthay isyay equalyay otay oryay esslay anthay alfhay youryay wizardyay evellay (oundedray upyay), andyay onenay ofyay ethay otsslay ancay ebay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay you’reyay ayay 4levelthlay wizardyay, youyay ancay ecoverray upyay otay wotay evelslay worthyay ofyay ellspay otsslay. 
 Youyay ancay ecoverray eitheryay ayay 2levelndlay ellspay otslay oryay wotay 1levelstlay ellspay otsslay. Arcaneyay  Aditiontray Whenyay youyay eachray 2nday evellay, youyay oosechay anyay arcaneyay aditiontray, apingshay youryay acticepray ofyay agicmay oughthray oneyay ofyay eightyay oolsschay:  Abjurationyay,  Onjurationcay,  Ivinationday,  Enchantmentyay,  Evocationyay,  Illusionyay,  Ecromancynay, oryay  Ansmutationtray, allyay etailedday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay assclay escriptionday. Youryay oicechay antsgray youyay eaturesfay atyay 2nday evellay andyay againyay atyay 6thay, 10thay, andyay 14thay evellay. Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay Whenyay youyay eachray 4thay evellay, andyay againyay atyay 8thay, 12thay, 16thay, andyay 19thay evellay, youyay ancay increaseyay oneyay abilityyay orescay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 2, oryay youyay ancay increaseyay wotay abilityyay oresscay ofyay youryay oicechay ybay 1. 
 Asyay ormalnay, youyay an’tcay increaseyay anyay abilityyay orescay aboveyay 20 usingyay isthay eaturefay. Ellspay  Asterymay Atyay 18thay evellay, youyay avehay achievedyay uchsay asterymay overyay ertaincay ellsspay atthay youyay ancay astcay emthay atyay willyay. 
 Oosechay ayay 1levelstlay wizardyay ellspay andyay ayay 2levelndlay wizardyay ellspay atthay areyay inyay youryay ellbookspay. 
 Youyay ancay astcay osethay ellsspay atyay eirthay owestlay evellay withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay whenyay youyay avehay emthay eparedpray. 
 Ifyay youyay wantyay otay astcay eitheryay ellspay atyay ayay igherhay evellay, youyay ustmay expendyay ayay ellspay otslay asyay ormalnay. Ybay endingspay 8 ourshay inyay udystay, youyay ancay exchangeyay oneyay oryay othbay ofyay ethay ellsspay youyay osechay orfay ifferentday ellsspay ofyay ethay amesay evelslay. Ignaturesay  Ellsspay Whenyay youyay eachray 20thay evellay, youyay aingay asterymay overyay wotay owerfulpay ellsspay andyay ancay astcay emthay withyay ittlelay effortyay. 
 Oosechay wotay 3levelrdlay wizardyay ellsspay inyay youryay ellbookspay asyay youryay ignaturesay ellsspay. 
 Youyay alwaysyay avehay esethay ellsspay eparedpray, eythay on’tday ountcay againstyay ethay umbernay ofyay ellsspay youyay avehay eparedpray, andyay youyay ancay astcay eachyay ofyay emthay onceyay atyay 3rday evellay withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay. 
 Whenyay youyay oday osay, youyay an’tcay oday osay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Ifyay youyay wantyay otay astcay eitheryay ellspay atyay ayay igherhay evellay, youyay ustmay expendyay ayay ellspay otslay asyay ormalnay. Arcaneyay  Aditionstray Ethay udystay ofyay wizardryyay isyay ancientyay, etchingstray ackbay otay ethay earliestyay ortalmay iscoveriesday ofyay agicmay. 
 Ityay isyay irmlyfay establishedyay inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay, withyay ariousvay aditionstray edicatedday otay itsyay omplexcay udystay. Ethay ostmay ommoncay arcaneyay aditionstray inyay ethay ultiversemay evolveray aroundyay ethay oolsschay ofyay agicmay. 
 Wizardsyay oughthethray agesyay avehay atalogedcay ousandsthay ofyay ellsspay, oupinggray emthay intoyay eightyay ategoriescay alledcay oolsschay, asyay escribedday inyay apterchay 10. 
 Inyay omesay acesplay, esethay aditionstray areyay iterallylay oolsschay; ayay wizardyay ightmay udystay atyay ethay  Oolschay ofyay  Illusionyay whileyay anotheryay udiesstay acrossyay owntay atyay ethay  Oolschay ofyay  Enchantmentyay. 
 Inyay otheryay institutionsyay, ethay oolsschay areyay oremay ikelay academicyay epartmentsday, withyay ivalray acultiesfay ompetingcay orfay udentsstay andyay undingfay. 
 Evenyay wizardsyay whoyay aintray apprenticesyay inyay ethay olitudesay ofyay eirthay ownyay owerstay useyay ethay ivisionday ofyay agicmay intoyay oolsschay asyay ayay earninglay eviceday, incesay ethay ellsspay ofyay eachyay oolschay equireray asterymay ofyay ifferentday echniquestay. Oolschay ofyay  Abjurationyay Ethay  Oolschay ofyay  Abjurationyay emphasizesyay agicmay atthay ocksblay, anishesbay, oryay otectspray. 
 Etractorsday ofyay isthay oolschay aysay atthay itsyay aditiontray isyay aboutyay enialday, egationnay atherray anthay ositivepay assertionyay. 
 Youyay understandyay, oweverhay, atthay endingyay armfulhay effectsyay, otectingpray ethay weakyay, andyay anishingbay evilyay influencesyay isyay anythingyay utbay ayay ilosophicalphay oidvay. 
 Ityay isyay ayay oudpray andyay espectedray ocationvay. Alledcay abjurersyay, embersmay ofyay isthay oolschay areyay oughtsay whenyay alefulbay iritsspay equireray exorcismyay, whenyay importantyay ocationslay ustmay ebay uardedgay againstyay agicalmay yingspay, andyay whenyay ortalspay otay otheryay anesplay ofyay existenceyay ustmay ebay osedclay. Abjurationyay  Avantsay Eginningbay whenyay youyay electsay isthay oolschay atyay 2nday evellay, ethay oldgay andyay imetay youyay ustmay endspay otay opycay anyay abjurationyay ellspay intoyay youryay ellbookspay isyay alvedhay. Arcaneyay  Wardyay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay weaveyay agicmay aroundyay yourselfyay orfay otectionpray. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay anyay abjurationyay ellspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay imultaneouslysay useyay ayay andstray ofyay ethay ell’sspay agicmay otay eatecray ayay agicalmay wardyay onyay yourselfyay atthay astslay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. 
 Ethay wardyay ashay ithay ointspay equalyay otay wicetay youryay wizardyay evellay + youryay  Intelligenceyay odifiermay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay aketay amageday, ethay wardyay akestay ethay amageday insteadyay. 
 Ifyay isthay amageday educesray ethay wardyay otay 0 ithay ointspay, youyay aketay anyyay emainingray amageday. Whileyay ethay wardyay ashay 0 ithay ointspay, ityay an’tcay absorbyay amageday, utbay itsyay agicmay emainsray. 
 Wheneveryay youyay astcay anyay abjurationyay ellspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay wardyay egainsray ayay umbernay ofyay ithay ointspay equalyay otay wicetay ethay evellay ofyay ethay ellspay. Onceyay youyay eatecray ethay wardyay, youyay an'tcay eatecray ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Ojectedpray  Wardyay Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, whenyay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay akestay amageday, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay ausecay youryay  Arcaneyay  Wardyay otay absorbyay atthay amageday. 
 Ellspay  Esistanceray Artingstay atyay 14thay evellay, youyay avehay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay ellsspay. Urthermorefay, youyay avehay esistanceray againstyay ethay amageday ofyay ellsspay. Oolschay ofyay  Onjurationcay Asyay ayay onjurercay, youyay avorfay ellsspay atthay oducepray objectsyay andyay eaturescray outyay ofyay inthay airyay. 
 Youyay ancay onjurecay illowingbay oudsclay ofyay illingkay ogfay oryay ummonsay eaturescray omfray elsewhereyay otay ightfay onyay youryay ehalfbay. 
 Asyay youryay asterymay owsgray, youyay earnlay ellsspay ofyay ansportationtray andyay ancay eleporttay yourselfyay acrossyay astvay istancesday, evenyay otay otheryay anesplay ofyay existenceyay, inyay anyay instantyay. Onjurationcay  Avantsay Eginningbay whenyay youyay electsay isthay oolschay atyay 2nday evellay, ethay oldgay andyay imetay youyay ustmay endspay otay opycay ayay onjurationcay ellspay intoyay youryay ellbookspay isyay alvedhay. Inormay  Onjurationcay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay whenyay youyay electsay isthay oolschay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay onjurecay upyay anyay inanimateyay objectyay inyay youryay andhay oryay onyay ethay oundgray inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Isthay objectyay ancay ebay onay argerlay anthay 3 eetfay onyay ayay idesay andyay weighyay onay oremay anthay 10 oundspay, andyay itsyay ormfay ustmay ebay atthay ofyay ayay onmagicalobjectnay atthay youyay avehay eensay. 
 Ethay objectyay isyay isiblyvay agicalmay, adiatingray imday ightlay outyay otay 5 eetfay. Ethay objectyay isappearsday afteryay 1 ourhay, whenyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay, oryay ifyay ityay akestay anyyay amageday. Enignbay  Anspositiontray Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay eleporttay upyay otay 30 eetfay otay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay atthay youyay ancay eesay. 
 Alternativelyyay, youyay ancay oosechay ayay acespay withinyay angeray atthay isyay occupiedyay ybay ayay  Allsmay oryay  Ediummay eaturecray. 
 Ifyay atthay eaturecray isyay willingyay, youyay othbay eleporttay, wappingsay acesplay. Onceyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay, youyay an’tcay useyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray oryay youyay astcay ayay onjurationcay ellspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay. Ocusedfay  Onjurationcay Eginningbay atyay 10thay evellay, whileyay youyay areyay oncentratingcay onyay ayay onjurationcay ellspay, youryay oncentrationcay an’tcay ebay okenbray asyay ayay esultray ofyay akingtay amageday. Urableday  Ummonssay Artingstay atyay 14thay evellay, anyyay eaturecray atthay youyay ummonsay oryay eatecray withyay ayay onjurationcay ellspay ashay 30 emporarytay ithay ointspay. Oolschay ofyay  Ivinationday  Ethay ounselcay ofyay ayay ivinerday isyay oughtsay ybay oyaltyray andyay ommonerscay alikeyay, orfay allyay eeksay ayay earerclay understandingyay ofyay ethay astpay, esentpray, andyay uturefay. 
 Asyay ayay ivinerday, youyay ivestray otay artpay ethay eilsvay ofyay acespay, imetay, andyay onsciousnesscay osay atthay youyay ancay eesay earlyclay. 
 Youyay workyay otay astermay ellsspay ofyay iscernmentday, emoteray iewingvay, upernaturalsay owledgeknay, andyay oresightfay. Ivinationday  Avantsay Eginningbay whenyay youyay electsay isthay oolschay atyay 2nday evellay, ethay oldgay andyay imetay youyay ustmay endspay otay opycay ayay ivinationday ellspay intoyay youryay ellbookspay isyay alvedhay. Ortentpay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay whenyay youyay oosechay isthay oolschay, impsesglay ofyay ethay uturefay eginbay otay esspray inyay onyay youryay awarenessyay. 
 Whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray, ollray wotay 0sdsay andyay ecordray ethay umbersnay olledray. 
 Youyay ancay eplaceray anyyay attackyay ollray, avingsay owthray, oryay abilityyay eckchay ademay ybay youyay oryay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withyay oneyay ofyay esethay oretellingfay ollsray. 
 Youyay ustmay oosechay otay oday osay eforebay ethay ollray, andyay youyay ancay eplaceray ayay ollray inyay isthay wayyay onlyyay onceyay erpay urntay. Eachyay oretellingfay ollray ancay ebay usedyay onlyyay onceyay. 
 Whenyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray, youyay oselay anyyay unusedyay oretellingfay ollsray. Expertyay  Ivinationday Eginningbay atyay 6thay evellay, astingcay ivinationday ellsspay omescay osay easilyyay otay youyay atthay ityay expendsyay onlyyay ayay actionfray ofyay youryay ellcastingspay effortsyay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay ayay ivinationday ellspay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay, youyay egainray oneyay expendedyay ellspay otslay. 
 Ethay otslay youyay egainray ustmay ebay ofyay ayay evellay owerlay anthay ethay ellspay youyay astcay andyay an’tcay ebay igherhay anthay 5thay evellay. Ethay  Irdthay  Eyeyay Artingstay atyay 10thay evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay increaseyay youryay owerspay ofyay erceptionpay. 
oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay, whichyay astslay untilyay youyay areyay incapacitatedyay oryay youyay aketay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. 
 Youyay an’tcay useyay ethay eaturefay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay estray. Arkvisionday. 
 Youyay aingay arkvisionday outyay otay ayay angeray ofyay 60 eetfay, asyay escribedday inyay apterchay 8. Etherealyay  Ightsay. 
 Youyay ancay eesay intoyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay. Eatergray  Omprehensioncay. 
 Youyay ancay eadray anyyay anguagelay. 
 Eesay  Invisibilityyay. 
 Youyay ancay eesay invisibleyay eaturescray andyay objectsyay withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay atthay areyay withinyay inelay ofyay ightsay. Eatergray  Ortentpay Artingstay atyay 14thay evellay, ethay isionsvay inyay youryay eamsdray intensifyyay andyay aintpay ayay oremay accurateyay icturepay inyay youryay indmay ofyay whatyay isyay otay omecay. 
 Youyay ollray eethray 0sdsay orfay youryay  Ortentpay eaturefay, atherray anthay wotay. Oolschay ofyay  Enchantmentyay Asyay ayay embermay ofyay ethay  Oolschay ofyay  Enchantmentyay, youyay avehay onedhay youryay abilityyay otay agicallymay entranceyay andyay eguilebay otheryay eoplepay andyay onstersmay. 
 Omesay enchantersyay areyay eacemakerspay whoyay ewitchbay ethay iolentvay otay aylay ownday eirthay armsyay andyay armchay ethay uelcray intoyay owingshay ercymay. 
 Othersyay areyay yrantstay whoyay agicallymay indbay ethay unwillingyay intoyay eirthay ervicesay. 
 Ostmay enchantersyay allfay omewheresay inyay etweenbay. Enchantmentyay  Avantsay Eginningbay whenyay youyay electsay isthay oolschay atyay 2nday evellay, ethay oldgay andyay imetay youyay ustmay endspay otay opycay anyay enchantmentyay ellspay intoyay youryay ellbookspay isyay alvedhay. Ypnotichay  Azegay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay whenyay youyay oosechay isthay oolschay, youryay oftsay wordsyay andyay enchantingyay azegay ancay agicallymay enthrallyay anotheryay eaturecray. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, oosechay oneyay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay ancay eesay oryay earhay youyay, ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray againstyay youryay wizardyay ellspay avesay DCay oryay ebay armedchay ybay youyay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
 Ethay armedchay eature’scray eedspay opsdray otay 0, andyay ethay eaturecray isyay incapacitatedyay andyay isiblyvay azedday. Onyay ubsequentsay urnstay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay aintainmay isthay effectyay, extendingyay itsyay urationday untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
 Oweverhay, ethay effectyay endsyay ifyay youyay ovemay oremay anthay 5 eetfay awayyay omfray ethay eaturecray, ifyay ethay eaturecray ancay eithernay eesay ornay earhay youyay, oryay ifyay ethay eaturecray akestay amageday. Onceyay ethay effectyay endsyay, oryay ifyay ethay eaturecray ucceedssay onyay itsyay initialyay avingsay owthray againstyay isthay effectyay, youyay an’tcay useyay isthay eaturefay onyay atthay eaturecray againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Instinctiveyay  Armchay Eginningbay atyay 6thay evellay, whenyay ayay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay akesmay anyay attackyay ollray againstyay youyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay ivertday ethay attackyay, ovidedpray atthay anotheryay eaturecray isyay withinyay ethay attack’syay angeray. 
 Ethay attackeryay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray againstyay youryay wizardyay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay attackeryay ustmay argettay ethay eaturecray atthay isyay osestclay otay ityay, otnay includingyay youyay oryay itselfyay. 
 Ifyay ultiplemay eaturescray areyay osestclay, ethay attackeryay ooseschay whichyay oneyay otay argettay. Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, youyay an’tcay useyay isthay eaturefay onyay ethay attackeryay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Youyay ustmay oosechay otay useyay isthay eaturefay eforebay owingknay whetheryay ethay attackyay itshay oryay issesmay. 
 Eaturescray atthay an’tcay ebay armedchay areyay immuneyay otay isthay effectyay. Itsplay  Enchantmentyay Artingstay atyay 10thay evellay, whenyay youyay astcay anyay enchantmentyay ellspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay atthay argetstay onlyyay oneyay eaturecray, youyay ancay avehay ityay argettay ayay econdsay eaturecray. Alteryay  Emoriesmay Atyay 14thay evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay akemay ayay eaturecray unawareyay ofyay youryay agicalmay influenceyay onyay ityay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay anyay enchantmentyay ellspay otay armchay oneyay oryay oremay eaturescray, youyay ancay alteryay oneyay eature’scray understandingyay osay atthay ityay emainsray unawareyay ofyay eingbay armedchay. Additionallyyay, onceyay eforebay ethay ellspay expiresyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ytray otay akemay ethay osenchay eaturecray orgetfay omesay ofyay ethay imetay ityay entspay armedchay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay anyay  Intelligenceyay avingsay owthray againstyay youryay wizardyay ellspay avesay DCay oryay oselay ayay umbernay ofyay ourshay ofyay itsyay emoriesmay equalyay otay 1 + youryay  Arismachay odifiermay (inimummay 1). 
 Youyay ancay akemay ethay eaturecray orgetfay esslay imetay, andyay ethay amountyay ofyay imetay an’tcay exceedyay ethay urationday ofyay youryay enchantmentyay ellspay. Oolschay ofyay  Evocationyay  Youyay ocusfay youryay udystay onyay agicmay atthay eatescray owerfulpay elementalyay effectsyay uchsay asyay itterbay oldcay, earingsay ameflay, ollingray underthay, acklingcray ightninglay, andyay urningbay acidyay. 
 Omesay evokersyay indfay employmentyay inyay ilitarymay orcesfay, ervingsay asyay artilleryyay otay astblay enemyyay armiesyay omfray afaryay. 
 Othersyay useyay eirthay ectacularspay owerpay otay otectpray ethay weakyay, whileyay omesay eeksay eirthay ownyay aingay asyay anditsbay, adventurersyay, oryay aspiringyay yrantstay. Evocationyay  Avantsay Eginningbay whenyay youyay electsay isthay oolschay atyay 2nday evellay, ethay oldgay andyay imetay youyay ustmay endspay otay opycay anyay evocationyay ellspay intoyay youryay ellbookspay isyay alvedhay. Ulptscay  Ellsspay Eginningbay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay ancay eatecray ocketspay ofyay elativeray afetysay withinyay ethay effectsyay ofyay youryay evocationyay ellsspay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay anyay evocationyay ellspay atthay affectsyay otheryay eaturescray atthay youyay ancay eesay, youyay ancay oosechay ayay umbernay ofyay emthay equalyay otay 1 + ethay ell’sspay evellay. 
 Ethay osenchay eaturescray automaticallyyay ucceedsay onyay eirthay avingsay owsthray againstyay ethay ellspay, andyay eythay aketay onay amageday ifyay eythay wouldyay ormallynay aketay alfhay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay. Otentpay  Antripcay Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, youryay amagingday antripscay affectyay evenyay eaturescray atthay avoidyay ethay untbray ofyay ethay effectyay. 
 Overchannelyay Artingstay atyay 14thay evellay, youyay ancay increaseyay ethay owerpay ofyay youryay implersay ellsspay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay ayay wizardyay ellspay ofyay 5thay evellay oryay owerlay atthay ealsday amageday, youyay ancay ealday aximummay amageday withyay atthay ellspay. Ethay irstfay imetay youyay oday osay, youyay uffersay onay adverseyay effectyay. 
 Ifyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay eforebay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray, youyay aketay 2day12 ecroticnay amageday orfay eachyay evellay ofyay ethay ellspay, immediatelyyay afteryay youyay astcay ityay. 
 Eachyay imetay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay eforebay inishingfay ayay onglay estray, ethay ecroticnay amageday erpay ellspay evellay increasesyay ybay 1day12. 
 Isthay amageday ignoresyay esistanceray andyay immunityyay. Oolschay ofyay  Illusionyay Youyay ocusfay youryay udiesstay onyay agicmay atthay azzlesday ethay ensessay, efuddlesbay ethay indmay, andyay ickstray evenyay ethay wisestyay olkfay. 
 Youryay agicmay isyay ubtlesay, utbay ethay illusionsyay aftedcray ybay youryay eenkay indmay akemay ethay impossibleyay eemsay ealray. 
 Omesay illusionists—includingyay anymay omegnay wizards—areyay enignbay icksterstray whoyay useyay eirthay ellsspay otay entertainyay. 
 Othersyay areyay oremay inistersay astersmay ofyay eceptionday, usingyay eirthay illusionsyay otay ightenfray andyay oolfay othersyay orfay eirthay ersonalpay aingay. Illusionyay  Avantsay Eginningbay whenyay youyay electsay isthay oolschay atyay 2nday evellay, ethay oldgay andyay imetay youyay ustmay endspay otay opycay anyay illusionyay ellspay intoyay youryay ellbookspay isyay alvedhay. Improvedyay  Inormay  Illusionyay Whenyay youyay oosechay isthay oolschay atyay 2nday evellay, youyay earnlay ethay inormay illusionyay antripcay. 
 Ifyay youyay alreadyyay owknay isthay antripcay, youyay earnlay ayay ifferentday wizardyay antripcay ofyay yourchoiceyay. 
 Ethay antripcay oesn’tday ountcay againstyay youryay umbernay ofyay antripscay ownknay. Whenyay youyay astcay inormay illusionyay, youyay ancay eatecray othbay ayay oundsay andyay anyay imageyay withyay ayay inglesay astingcay ofyay ethay ellspay. Alleablemay  Illusionsyay Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, whenyay youyay astcay anyay illusionyay ellspay atthay ashay ayay urationday ofyay 1 inutemay oryay ongerlay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay angechay ethay aturenay ofyay atthay illusionyay (usingyay ethay ell’sspay ormalnay arameterspay orfay ethay illusionyay), ovidedpray atthay youyay ancay eesay ethay illusionyay. Illusoryyay  Elfsay Eginningbay atyay 10thay evellay, youyay ancay eatecray anyay illusoryyay uplicateday ofyay yourselfyay asyay anyay instantyay, almostyay instinctualyay eactionray otay angerday. 
 Whenyay ayay eaturecray akesmay anyay attackyay ollray againstyay youyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay interposeyay ethay illusoryyay uplicateday etweenbay ethay attackeryay andyay yourselfyay. 
 Ethay attackyay automaticallyyay issesmay youyay, enthay ethay illusionyay issipatesday. Onceyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay, youyay an’tcay useyay ityay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Illusoryyay  Ealityray Ybay 14thay evellay, youyay avehay earnedlay ethay ecretsay ofyay weavingyay adowshay agicmay intoyay youryay illusionsyay otay ivegay emthay ayay emisay- ealityray. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay anyay illusionyay ellspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay oosechay oneyay inanimateyay, onmagicalnay objectyay atthay isyay artpay ofyay ethay illusionyay andyay akemay atthay objectyay ealray. 
 Youyay ancay oday isthay onyay youryay urntay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay whileyay ethay ellspay isyay ongoingyay. 
 Ethay objectyay emainsray ealray orfay 1 inutemay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, youyay ancay eatecray anyay illusionyay ofyay ayay idgebray overyay ayay asmchay andyay enthay akemay ityay ealray onglay enoughyay orfay youryay alliesyay otay osscray. Ethay objectyay an’tcay ealday amageday oryay otherwiseyay irectlyday armhay anyoneyay. Oolschay ofyay  Ecromancynay Ethay  Oolschay ofyay  Ecromancynay exploresyay ethay osmiccay orcesfay ofyay ifelay, eathday, andyay undeathyay. 
 Asyay youyay ocusfay youryay udiesstay inyay isthay aditiontray, youyay earnlay otay anipulatemay ethay energyyay atthay animatesyay allyay ivinglay ingsthay. 
 Asyay youyay ogresspray, youyay earnlay otay apsay ethay ifelay orcefay omfray ayay eaturecray asyay youryay agicmay estroysday itsyay odybay, ansformingtray atthay italvay energyyay intoyay agicalmay owerpay youyay ancay anipulatemay. Ostmay eoplepay eesay ecromancersnay asyay enacingmay, oryay evenyay illainousvay, ueday otay ethay oseclay associationyay withyay eathday. Otnay allyay ecromancersnay areyay evilyay, utbay ethay orcesfay eythay anipulatemay areyay onsideredcay abootay ybay anymay ocietiessay. Ecromancynay  Avantsay Eginningbay whenyay youyay electsay isthay oolschay atyay 2nday evellay, ethay oldgay andyay imetay youyay ustmay endspay otay opycay ayay ecromancynay ellspay intoyay youryay ellbookspay isyay alvedhay. Imgray  Arvesthay Atyay 2nday evellay, youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay eapray ifelay energyyay omfray eaturescray youyay illkay withyay youryay ellsspay. 
 Onceyay erpay urntay whenyay youyay illkay oneyay oryay oremay eaturescray withyay ayay ellspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay egainray ithay ointspay equalyay otay wicetay ethay ell’sspay evellay, oryay eethray imestay itsyay evellay ifyay ethay ellspay elongsbay otay ethay  Oolschay ofyay  Ecromancynay. 
 Undeadyay  Allsthray Atyay 6thay evellay, youyay addyay ethay animateyay eadday ellspay otay youryay ellbookspay ifyay ityay isyay otnay erethay alreadyyay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay animateyay eadday, youyay ancay argettay oneyay additionalyay orpsecay oryay ilepay ofyay onesbay, eatingcray anotheryay ombiezay oryay eletonskay, asyay appropriateyay. Wheneveryay youyay eatecray anyay undeadyay usingyay ayay ecromancynay ellspay, ityay ashay additionalyay enefitsbay:•  Ethay eature’scray ithay ointpay aximummay isyay increasedyay ybay anyay amountyay equalyay otay youryay wizardyay evellay.•  Ethay eaturecray addsyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay itsyay weaponyay amageday ollsray. Inuredyay otay  Undeathyay Eginningbay atyay 10thay evellay, youyay avehay esistanceray otay ecroticnay amageday, andyay youryay ithay ointpay aximummay an'tcay ebay educedray. 
 Youyay avehay entspay osay uchmay imetay ealingday withyay undeadyay andyay ethay orcesfay atthay animateyay emthay atthay youyay avehay ecomebay inuredyay otay omesay ofyay eirthay worstyay effectsyay. Ommandcay  Undeadyay Artingstay atyay 14thay evellay, youyay ancay useyay agicmay otay ingbray undeadyay underyay youryay ontrolcay, evenyay osethay eatedcray ybay otheryay wizardsyay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay oosechay oneyay undeadyay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Atthay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray againstyay youryay wizardyay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Ifyay ityay ucceedssay, youyay an’tcay useyay isthay eaturefay onyay ityay againyay. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay, ityay ecomesbay iendlyfray otay youyay andyay obeysyay youryay ommandscay untilyay youyay useyay isthay eaturefay againyay. Intelligentyay undeadyay areyay arderhay otay ontrolcay inyay isthay wayyay. Ifyay ethay argettay ashay anyay  Intelligenceyay ofyay 8 oryay igherhay, ityay ashay advantageyay onyay ethay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay ethay avingsay owthray andyay ashay anyay  Intelligenceyay ofyay 12 oryay igherhay, ityay ancay epeatray ethay avingsay owthray atyay ethay endyay ofyay everyyay ourhay untilyay ityay ucceedssay andyay eaksbray eefray. Oolschay ofyay  Ansmutationtray Youyay areyay ayay udentstay ofyay ellsspay atthay odifymay energyyay andyay attermay. 
 Otay youyay, ethay worldyay isyay otnay ayay ixedfay ingthay, utbay eminentlyyay utablemay, andyay youyay elightday inyay eingbay anyay agentyay ofyay angechay. Youyay wieldyay ethay awray uffstay ofyay eationcray andyay earnlay otay alteryay othbay ysicalphay ormsfay andyay entalmay qualitiesyay. 
 Youryay agicmay ivesgay youyay ethay oolstay otay ecomebay ayay ithsmay onyay eality’sray orgefay. Omesay ansmuterstray areyay inkererstay andyay anksterspray, urningtay eoplepay intoyay oadstay andyay ansformingtray oppercay intoyay ilversay orfay unfay andyay occasionalyay ofitpray. 
 Othersyay ursuepay eirthay agicalmay udiesstay withyay eadlyday eriousnesssay, eekingsay ethay owerpay ofyay ethay odsgay otay akemay andyay estroyday worldsyay. Ansmutationtray  Avantsay Eginningbay whenyay youyay electsay isthay oolschay atyay 2nday evellay, ethay oldgay andyay imetay youyay ustmay endspay otay opycay ayay ansmutationtray ellspay intoyay youryay ellbookspay isyay alvedhay. Inormay  Alchemyyay Artingstay atyay 2nday evellay whenyay youyay electsay isthay oolschay, youyay ancay emporarilytay alteryay ethay ysicalphay opertiespray ofyay oneyay onmagicalnay objectyay, angingchay ityay omfray oneyay ubstancesay intoyay anotheryay. 
 Youyay erformpay ayay ecialspay alchemicalyay ocedurepray onyay oneyay objectyay omposedcay entirelyyay ofyay woodyay, onestay (utbay otnay ayay emstonegay), ironyay, oppercay, oryay ilversay, ansformingtray ityay intoyay ayay ifferentday oneyay ofyay osethay aterialsmay. 
 Orfay eachyay 10 inutesyoumay endspay erformingpay ethay ocedurepray, youyay ancay ansformtray upyay otay 1 ubiccay ootfay ofyay aterialmay. 
 Afteryay 1 ourhay, oryay untilyay youyay oselay youryay oncentrationcay (asyay ifyay youyay wereyay oncentratingcay onyay ayay ellspay), ethay aterialmay evertsray otay itsyay originalyay ubstancesay. Ansmuter’stray  Onestay Artingstay atyay 6thay evellay, youyay ancay endspay 8 ourshay eatingcray ayay ansmuter’stray onestay atthay oresstay ansmutationtray agicmay. 
 Youyay ancay enefitbay omfray ethay onestay yourselfyay oryay ivegay ityay otay anotheryay eaturecray. 
Ayay eaturecray ainsgay ayay enefitbay ofyay youryay oicechay asyay onglay asyay ethay onestay isyay inyay ethay eature’scray ossessionpay. 
 Whenyay youyay eatecray ethay onestay, oosechay ethay enefitbay omfray ethay ollowingfay optionsyay:•  Arkvisionday outyay otay ayay angeray ofyay 60 eetfay, asyay escribedday inyay apterchay 8•  Anyay increaseyay otay eedspay ofyay 10 eetfay whileyay ethay eaturecray isyay unencumberedyay•  Oficiencypray inyay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owsthray•  Esistanceray otay acidyay, oldcay, irefay, ightninglay, oryay underthay amageday (youryay oicechay wheneveryay youyay oosechay isthay enefitbay) Eachyay imetay youyay astcay ayay ansmutationtray ellspay ofyay 1stay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay angechay ethay effectyay ofyay youryay onestay ifyay ethay onestay isyay onyay youryay ersonpay. Ifyay youyay eatecray ayay ewnay ansmuter’stray onestay, ethay eviouspray oneyay easescay otay unctionfay.
