Apechangershay Atyay 10thay evellay, youyay addyay ethay olymorphpay ellspay otay youryay ellbookspay, ifyay ityay isyay otnay erethay alreadyyay. 
 Youyay ancay astcay olymorphpay withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay. 
 Whenyay youyay oday osay, youyay ancay argettay onlyyay yourselfyay andyay ansformtray intoyay ayay eastbay whoseyay allengechay atingray isyay 1 oryay owerlay. Onceyay youyay astcay olymorphpay inyay isthay wayyay, youyay an’tcay oday osay againyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray, oughthay youyay ancay illstay astcay ityay ormallynay usingyay anyay availableyay ellspay otslay. Astermay  Ansmutertray  Artingstay atyay 14thay evellay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay onsumecay ethay eserveray ofyay ansmutationtray agicmay oredstay withinyay youryay ansmuter’stray onestay inyay ayay inglesay urstbay. 
 Whenyay youyay oday osay, oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay effectsyay. 
 Youryay ansmuter’stray onestay isyay estroyedday andyay an’tcay ebay emaderay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Ajormay  Ansformationtray. 
 Youyay ancay ansmutetray oneyay onmagicalnay object—noyay argerlay anthay ayay 5-ootfay ube—intocay anotheryay onmagicalnay objectyay ofyay imilarsay izesay andyay assmay andyay ofyay equalyay oryay esserlay aluevay. 
 Youyay ustmay endspay 10 inutesmay andlinghay ethay objectyay otay ansformtray ityay. Anaceapay. 
 Youyay emoveray allyay ursescay, iseasesday, andyay oisonspay affectingyay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ouchtay withyay ethay ansmuter’stray onestay. 
 Ethay eaturecray alsoyay egainsray allyay itsyay ithay ointspay. Estoreray  Ifelay. 
 Youyay astcay ethay aiseray eadday ellspay onyay ayay eaturecray youyay ouchtay withyay ethay ansmuter’stray onestay, withoutyay expendingyay ayay ellspay otslay oryay eedingnay otay avehay ethay ellspay inyay youryay ellbookspay. Estoreray  Youthyay. 
 Youyay ouchtay ethay ansmuter’stray onestay otay ayay willingyay eaturecray, andyay atthay eature’scray apparentyay ageyay isyay educedray ybay 3day10 yearsyay, otay ayay inimummay ofyay 13 yearsyay. 
 Apterchay 4:  Ersonalitypay andyay  Ackgroundbay ARACTERSCHay AREyay EFINEDDay YBay UCHMay OREMay ATHay Eirnthay aceray andyay assclay. 
 Ey’rethay individualsyay withyay eirthay ownyay oriesstay, interestsyay, onnectionscay, andyay apabilitiescay eyondbay osethay atthay assclay andyay aceray efineday. 
 Isthay apterchay expoundsyay onyay ethay etailsday atthay istinguishday aracterschay omfray oneyay anotheryay, includingyay ethay asicsbay ofyay amenay andyay ysicalphay escriptionday, ethay ulesray ofyay ackgroundsbay andyay anguageslay, andyay ethay inerfay ointspay ofyay ersonalitypay andyay alignmentyay. Aracterchay  Etailsday Youryay aracter’schay amenay andyay ysicalphay escriptionday ightmay ebay ethay irstfay ingsthay atthay ethay otheryay ayersplay atyay ethay abletay earnlay aboutyay youyay. 
 It’syay worthyay inkingthay aboutyay owhay esethay aracteristicschay eflectray ethay aracterchay youyay avehay inyay indmay. Amenay Youryay aracter’schay aceray escriptionday includesyay amplesay amesnay orfay embersmay ofyay atthay aceray. 
 Utpay omesay oughtthay intoyay youryay amenay evenyay ifyay you’reyay ustjay ickingpay oneyay omfray ayay istlay. Exsay Youyay ancay ayplay ayay alemay oryay emalefay aracterchay withoutyay aininggay anyyay ecialspay enefitsbay oryay indranceshay. 
 Inkthay aboutyay owhay youryay aracterchay oesday oryay oesday otnay onformcay otay ethay oaderbray ulture’scay expectationsyay ofyay exsay, endergay, andyay exualsay ehaviorbay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay alemay owdray ericclay efiesday ethay aditionaltray endergay ivisionsday ofyay owdray ocietysay, whichyay ouldcay ebay ayay easonray orfay youryay aracterchay otay eavelay atthay ocietysay andyay omecay otay ethay urfacesay. Ikatay andyay  Artemisyay:  Ontrastingcay  Aracterschay Ethay etailsday inyay isthay apterchay akemay ayay igbay ifferenceday inyay ettingsay youryay aracterchay apartyay omfray everyyay otheryay aracterchay. 
 Onsidercay ethay ollowingfay wotay umanhay ightersfay. Ailinghay omfray ethay  Agonlancedray ettingsay,  Ikatay  Waylanyay wasyay ayay ashbray eenagertay whoyay adhay ayay oughray ildhoodchay. 
 Ethay aughterday ofyay ayay iefthay, eshay anray awayyay omfray omehay andyay acticedpray erhay ather’sfay adetray onyay ethay eetsstray ofyay  Olacesay. 
 Whenyay eshay iedtray otay obray ethay oprietorpray ofyay ethay  Innyay ofyay ethay  Astlay  Omehay, ehay aughtcay erhay andyay ooktay erhay underyay ishay wingyay, ivinggay erhay ayay objay asyay ayay armaidbay. 
 Utbay whenyay ethay agonarmiesdray aidlay wasteyay otay ethay owntay ofyay  Olacesay andyay estroyedday ethay innyay, ecessitynay orcedfay  Ikatay intoyay adventureyay alongsideyay ethay iendsfray e’dshay ownknay omfray erhay ildhoodchay. 
 Erhay illskay asyay ayay ighterfay (ayay yingfray anpay emainsray oneyay ofyay erhay avoritefay weaponsyay) ombinedcay withyay erhay istoryhay onyay ethay eetsstray avegay erhay illsskay invaluableyay inyay erhay adventuringyay areercay. Artemisyay  Entreriyay ewgray upyay onyay ethay eetsstray ofyay  Alimportcay inyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray. 
 Ehay usedyay ishay witsyay, engthstray, andyay agilityyay otay arvecay outyay ishay ownyay erritorytay inyay oneyay ofyay ethay ity'scay undredshay ofyay oorpay antyshay ownstay. 
 Afteryay everalsay yearsyay, ehay attractedyay ethay oticenay ofyay oneyay ofyay ethay ostmay owerfulpay ievesthay’ uildsgay inyay ethay itycay, andyay ehay ascendedyay ethay anksray ofyay ethay uildgay quicklyyay espiteday ishay youthyay. 
 Artemisyay ecamebay ethay avoredfay assassinyay ofyay oneyay ofyay ethay ity’scay ashaspay, whoyay entsay imhay otay ar-offfay  Icewindyay  Aleday otay ecoverray omesay olenstay emsgay. 
 E’shay ayay ofessionalpray illerkay, onstantlycay allengingchay imselfhay otay improveyay ishay illsskay. Ikatay andyay  Artemisyay areyay othbay umanhay andyay othbay ightersfay (withyay omesay experienceyay asyay oguesray), ossessingpay imilarlysay ighhay  Engthstray andyay  Exterityday oresscay, utbay erethay ethay imilaritysay endsyay. Youyay on’tday eednay otay ebay onfinedcay otay inarybay otionsnay ofyay exsay andyay endergay. 
 Ethay elfyay odgay  Orelloncay  Arethianlay isyay oftenyay eensay asyay androgynousyay oryay ermaphroditichay, orfay exampleyay, andyay omesay elvesyay inyay ethay ultiversemay areyay ademay inyay  Orellon’scay imageyay. 
 Youyay ouldcay alsoyay ayplay ayay emalefay aracterchay whoyay esentspray erselfhay asyay ayay anmay, ayay anmay whoyay eelsfay appedtray inyay ayay emalefay odybay, oryay ayay eardedbay emalefay warfday whoyay ateshay eingbay istakenmay orfay ayay alemay. 
 Ikewiselay, youryay aracter’schay exualsay orientationyay isyay orfay youyay otay ecideday. Eighthay andyay  Weightyay Youyay ancay ecideday youryay aracter’schay eighthay andyay weightyay, usingyay ethay informationyay ovidedpray inyay youryay aceray escriptionday oryay onyay ethay  Andomray  Eighthay andyay  Weightyay abletay. 
 Inkthay aboutyay whatyay youryay aracter’schay abilityyay oresscay ightmay aysay aboutyay ishay oryay erhay eighthay andyay weightyay. 
Ayay weakyay utbay agileyay aracterchay ightmay ebay inthay. 
Ayay ongstray andyay oughtay aracterchay ightmay ebay alltay oryay ustjay eavyhay. Ifyay youyay wantyay otay, youyay ancay ollray andomlyray orfay youryay aracter’schay eighthay andyay weightyay usingyay ethay  Andomray  Eighthay andyay  Weightyay abletay. 
 Ethay iceday ollray ivengay inyay ethay  Eighthay  Odifiermay olumncay eterminesday ethay aracter’schay extrayay eighthay (inyay inchesyay) eyondbay ethay asebay eighthay. 
 Atthay amesay umbernay ultipliedmay ybay ethay iceday ollray oryay quantityyay ivengay inyay ethay  Weightyay  Odifiermay olumncay eterminesday ethay aracter’schay extrayay weightyay (inyay oundspay) eyondbay ethay asebay weightyay. Andomray  Eighthay andyay  Weightyay Asebay Eighthay Asebay Weightyay Aceray Eighthay Odifiermay Weightyay Odifiermay Uman4'8"+2dhay10110 xlbxay (2day4) lbay. Warfday, ill3'8”+2dhay4115 xlbxay (2day6) lbay. Warfday, ountain4'+2dmay4130 xlbxay (2day6) lbay. Elfyay, igh4’6"+2dhay1090 xlbxay (1day4) lbay. Elfyay, wood4'6"+2dyay10100 xlbxay (1day4) lbay. Elfyay, ow4'5"+2ddray675 xlbxay (1day6) lbay. Alfling2'7"+2dhay435 xlbxay 1 lbay. Agonborn5'6"+2ddray8175 xlbxay (2day6) lbay. Omegnay2' 11"+2day435 xlbxay 1 lbay. Alf-elf4'9"+2dhay8110 xlbxay (2day4) lbay. Alf-orc4'10"+2dhay10140 xlbxay (2day6) lbay. Iefling4'9"+2dtay8110 xlbxay (2day4) lbay. Orfay exampleyay, asyay ayay umanhay,  Ikatay ashay ayay eighthay ofyay 4 eetfay 8 inchesyay usplay 2day10 inchesyay. 
 Erhay ayerplay ollsray 2day10 andyay etsgay ayay otaltay ofyay 12, osay  Ikatay andsstay 5 eetfay 8 inchesyay alltay. 
 Enthay ethay ayerplay usesyay atthay amesay ollray ofyay 12 andyay ultipliesmay ityay ybay 2day4 oundspay. 
 Erhay 2day4 ollray isyay 3, osay  Ikatay weighsyay anyay extrayay 36 oundspay (12 xay 3) onyay optay ofyay erhay asebay 110 oundspay, orfay ayay otaltay ofyay 146 oundspay. Otheryay  Ysicalphay  Aracteristicschay Youyay oosechay youryay aracter’schay ageyay andyay ethay olorcay ofyay ishay oryay erhay airhay, eyesyay, andyay inskay. 
 Ikatay andyay  Artemisyay:  Aracterchay  Etailsday Onsidercay owhay ethay amesnay  Ikatay  Waylanyay andyay  Artemisyay  Entreriyay etsay esethay aracterschay apartyay omfray eachyay otheryay andyay eflectray eirthay ersonalitiespay. 
 Ikatay isyay ayay youngyay womanyay eterminedday otay ovepray atthay e'sshay otnay ustjay ayay idkay anyyay oremay, andyay erhay amenay akesmay erhay oundsay youngyay andyay ordinaryyay. 
 Artemisyay  Entreriyay omescay omfray anyay exoticyay andlay andyay arriescay ayay oremay ysteriousmay amenay. Ikatay isyay ineteennay yearsyay oldyay atyay ethay artstay ofyay erhay adventuringyay areercay andyay ashay auburnyay airhay, eengray eyesyay, airfay inskay withyay ecklesfray, andyay ayay olemay onyay erhay ightray iphay. 
 Artemisyay isyay ayay allsmay anmay, ompactcay andyay allyay wiryyay usclemay. 
 Ehay ashay angularyay eaturesfay andyay ighhay eekboneschay, andyay ehay alwaysyay eemssay inyay eednay ofyay ayay aveshay. 
 Ishay aven-blackray airhay isyay ickthay andyay ullfay, utbay ishay eyesyay areyay aygray andyay ifeless—betrayinglay ethay emptinessyay ofyay ishay ifelay andyay oulsay. Alignmentyay Ayay ypicaltay eaturecray inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray ashay anyay alignmentyay, whichyay oadlybray escribesday itsyay oralmay andyay ersonalpay attitudesyay. 
 Alignmentyay isyay ayay ombinationcay ofyay wotay actorsfay: oneyay identifiesyay oralitymay (oodgay, evilyay, oryay eutralnay), andyay ethay otheryay escribesday attitudesyay owardtay ocietysay andyay orderyay (awfullay, aoticchay, oryay eutralnay). 
 Usthay, inenay istinctday alignmentsyay efineday ethay ossiblepay ombinationscay. Esethay iefbray ummariessay ofyay ethay inenay alignmentsyay escribeday ethay ypicaltay ehaviorbay ofyay ayay eaturecray withyay atthay alignmentyay. 
 Individualsyay ightmay aryvay ignificantlysay omfray atthay ypicaltay ehaviorbay, andyay ewfay eoplepay areyay erfectlypay andyay onsistentlycay aithfulfay otay ethay eceptspray ofyay eirthay alignmentyay. Awfullay oodgay (LGay) eaturescray ancay ebay ountedcay onyay otay oday ethay ightray ingthay asyay expectedyay ybay ocietysay. 
 Oldgay agonsdray, aladinspay, andyay ostmay warvesday areyay awfullay oodgay. Eutralnay oodgay (NGay) olkfay oday ethay estbay eythay ancay otay elphay othersyay accordingyay otay eirthay eedsnay. 
 Anymay elestialscay, omesay oudclay iantsgay, andyay ostmay omesgnay areyay eutralnay oodgay. Aoticchay oodgay (CGay) eaturescray actyay asyay eirthay onsciencecay irectsday, withyay ittlelay egardray orfay whatyay othersyay expectyay. 
 Oppercay agonsdray, anymay elvesyay, andyay unicornsyay areyay aoticchay oodgay. Awfullay eutralnay (LNay) individualsyay actyay inyay accordanceyay withyay awlay, aditiontray, oryay ersonalpay odescay. 
 Anymay onksmay andyay omesay wizardsyay areyay awfullay eutralnay. Eutralnay (Nay) isyay ethay alignmentyay ofyay osethay whoyay eferpray otay eerstay earclay ofyay oralmay questionsyay andyay on’tday aketay idessay, Warvishday  Iptscray:  Amplesay  Alphabetdoingyay whatyay eemssay estbay atyay ethay imetay. 
 Izardfolklay, ostmay uidsdray, andyay anymay umanshay areyay eutralnay. Aoticchay eutralnay (CNay) eaturescray ollowfay eirthay whimsyay, oldinghay eirthay ersonalpay eedomfray aboveyay allyay elseyay. Anymay arbariansbay andyay oguesray, andyay omesay ardsbay, areyay aoticchay eutralnay. Awfullay evilyay (ELay) eaturescray ethodicallymay aketay whatyay eythay wantyay, withinyay ethay imitslay ofyay ayay odecay ofyay aditiontray, oyaltylay, oryay orderyay. 
 Evilsday, ueblay agonsdray, andyay obgoblinshay areyay awfullay evilyay. Eutralnay evilyay (ENay) isyay ethay alignmentyay ofyay osethay whoyay oday whateveryay eythay ancay etgay awayyay withyay, withoutyay ompassioncay oryay qualmsyay. 
 Anymay owdray, omesay oudclay iantsgay, andyay yugolothsyay areyay eutralnay evilyay. Aoticchay evilyay (ECay) eaturescray actyay withyay arbitraryyay iolencevay, urredspay ybay eirthay eedgray, atredhay, oryay oodlustblay. 
 Emonsday, edray agonsdray, andyay orcsyay areyay aoticchay evilyay. Alignmentyay inyay ethay  Ultiversemay  Orfay anymay inkingthay eaturescray, alignmentyay isyay ayay oralmay oicechay. 
 Umanshay, warvesday, elvesyay, andyay otheryay umanoidhay acesray ancay oosechay whetheryay otay ollowfay ethay athspay ofyay oodgay oryay evilyay, awlay oryay aoschay. 
 Accordingyay otay ythmay, ethay ood-alignedgay odsgay whoyay eatedcray esethay acesray avegay emthay eefray willyay otay oosechay eirthay oralmay athspay, owingknay atthay oodgay withoutyay eefray willyay isyay averyslay. Ethay evilyay eitiesday whoyay eatedcray otheryay acesray, oughthay, ademay osethay acesray otay ervesay emthay. 
 Osethay acesray avehay ongstray inbornyay endenciestay atthay atchmay ethay aturenay ofyay eirthay odsgay. 
 Ostmay orcsyay areshay ethay iolentvay, avagesay aturenay ofyay ethay orcyay odgay,  Uumshgray, andyay areyay usthay inclinedyay owardtay evilyay. 
 Evenyay ifyay anyay orcyay ooseschay ayay oodgay alignmentyay, ityay ugglesstray againstyay itsyay innateyay endenciestay orfay itsyay entireyay ifelay. 
( Evenyay alf-orcshay eelfay ethay ingeringlay ullpay ofyay ethay orcyay od’sgay influenceyay.) Alignmentyay isyay anyay essentialyay artpay ofyay ethay aturenay ofyay elestialscay andyay iendsfay. 
Ayay evilday oesday otnay oosechay otay ebay awfullay evilyay, andyay ityay oesn’tday endtay owardtay awfullay evilyay, utbay atherray ityay isyay awfullay evilyay inyay itsyay essenceyay. 
 Ifyay ityay omehowsay easedcay otay ebay awfullay evilyay, ityay wouldyay easecay otay ebay ayay evilday. Ostmay eaturescray atthay acklay ethay apacitycay orfay ationalray oughtthay oday otnay avehay alignments—theyyay areyay unalignedyay. 
 Uchsay ayay eaturecray isyay incapableyay ofyay akingmay ayay oralmay oryay ethicalyay oicechay andyay actsyay accordingyay otay itsyay estialbay aturenay. 
 Anguageslay  Youryay aceray indicatesyay ethay anguageslay youryay aracterchay ancay eakspay ybay efaultday, andyay youryay ackgroundbay ightmay ivegay youyay accessyay otay oneyay oryay oremay additionalyay anguageslay ofyay youryay oicechay. 
 Otenay esethay anguageslay onyay youryay aracterchay eetshay. Oosechay youryay anguageslay omfray ethay  Andardstay  Anguageslay abletay, oryay oosechay oneyay atthay isyay ommoncay inyay youryay ampaigncay. 
 Withyay youryay sdMsay ermissionpay, youyay ancay insteadyay oosechay ayay anguagelay omfray ethay  Exoticyay  Anguageslay abletay oryay ayay ecretsay anguagelay, uchsay asyay ievesthay’ antcay oryay ethay onguetay ofyay uidsdray. Omesay ofyay esethay anguageslay areyay actuallyyay amiliesfay ofyay anguageslay withyay anymay ialectsday. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ethay  Imordialpray anguagelay includesyay ethay  Auranyay,  Aquanyay,  Ignanyay, andyay  Errantay ialectsday, oneyay orfay eachyay ofyay ethay ourfay elementalyay anesplay. 
 Eaturescray atthay eakspay ifferentday ialectsday ofyay ethay amesay anguagelay ancay ommunicatecay withyay oneyay anotheryay. Andardstay  Anguageslay Anguagelay Ypicaltay  Eakersspay Iptscray Ommoncay Umanshay Ommoncay Warvishday Warvesday Warvishday Elvishyay Elvesyay Elvishyay Iantgay Ogresyay, iantsgay Warvishday Omishgnay Omesgnay Warvishday Oblingay Oblinoidsgay Warvishday Alflinghay Alflingshay Ommoncay Orcyay Orcsyay Warvishday Exoticyay  Anguageslay Anguagelay Ypicaltay  Eakersspay Iptscray Abyssalyay Emonsday Infernalyay Elestialcay Elestialscay Elestialcay Aconicdray Agons,dragonborndray Aconicdray Eepday  Eechspay Indmay ayersflay, eholdersbay--- Infernalyay Evilsday Infernalyay Imordialpray Elementalsyay Warvishday Ylvansay Eyfay eaturescray Elvishyay Undercommonyay  Underdarkyay aderstray Elvishyay Ikatay andyay  Artemisyay:  Alignmentyay Ikatay  Waylanyay isyay eutralnay oodgay, undamentallyfay ood-heartedgay andyay ivingstray otay elphay othersyay whereyay eshay ancay. 
 Artemisyay isyay awfullay evilyay, unconcernedyay withyay ethay aluevay ofyay entientsay ifelay utbay atyay eastlay ofessionalpray inyay ishay approachyay otay urdermay. Asyay anyay evilyay aracterchay,  Artemisyay isyay otnay anyay idealyay adventureryay. 
 Ehay eganbay ishay areercay asyay ayay illainvay, andyay onlyyay ooperatescay withyay eroeshay whenyay ehay ust—andmay whenyay it’syay inyay ishay ownyay estbay interestsyay. 
 Inyay ostmay amesgay, evilyay adventurersyay ausecay oblemspray inyay oupsgray alongsideyay othersyay whoyay on’tday areshay eirthay interestsyay andyay objectivesyay. 
 Enerallygay, evilyay alignmentsyay areyay orfay illainsvay andyay onstersmay. Ersonalpay  Aracteristicschay Eshingflay outyay youryay aracter’schay ersonality—thepay arrayyay ofyay aitstray, annerismsmay, abitshay, eliefsbay, andyay awsflay atthay ivegay ayay ersonpay ayay uniqueyay identity—willyay elphay youyay ingbray imhay oryay erhay otay ifelay asyay youyay ayplay ethay amegay. 
 Ourfay ategoriescay ofyay aracteristicschay areyay esentedpray erehay: ersonalitypay aitstray, idealsyay, ondsbay, andyay awsflay. 
 Eyondbay osethay ategoriescay, inkthay aboutyay youryay aracter’schay avoritefay wordsyay oryay asesphray, icstay andyay abitualhay esturesgay, icesvay andyay etpay eevespay, andyay whateveryay elseyay youyay ancay imagineyay. Eachyay ackgroundbay esentedpray aterlay inyay isthay apterchay includesyay uggestedsay aracteristicschay atthay youyay ancay useyay otay arkspay youryay imaginationyay. 
 You’reyay otnay oundbay otay osethay optionsyay, utbay ey’rethay ayay oodgay artingstay ointpay. Ersonalitypay  Aitstray Ivegay youryay aracterchay wotay ersonalitypay aitstray. 
 Ersonalitypay aitstray areyay allsmay, implesay waysyay otay elphay youyay etsay youryay aracterchay apartyay omfray everyyay otheryay aracterchay. 
 Youryay ersonalitypay aitstray ouldshay elltay youyay omethingsay interestingyay andyay unfay aboutyay youryay aracterchay. 
 Eythay ouldshay ebay elfsay- escriptionsday atthay areyay ecificspay aboutyay whatyay akesmay youryay aracterchay andstay outyay. 
“I’myay artsmay” isyay otnay ayay oodgay aittray, ecausebay ityay escribesday ayay otlay ofyay aracterschay. 
 Ikatay andyay  Artemisyay:  Ersonalpay  Aracteristicschay Ikatay andyay  Artemisyay avehay istinctday ersonalitypay aitstray. 
 Ikatay  Waylanyay islikesday oastfulnessbay andyay ashay ayay earfay ofyay eightshay esultingray omfray ayay adbay allfay uringday erhay areercay asyay ayay iefthay. 
 Artemisyay  Entreriyay isyay alwaysyay eparedpray orfay ethay worstyay andyay ovesmay withyay ayay quickyay, ecisepray onfidencecay. Onsidercay eirthay idealsyay. 
 Ikatay  Waylanyay isyay innocentyay, almostyay ildlikechay, elievingbay inyay ethay aluevay ofyay ifelay andyay ethay importanceyay ofyay appreciatingyay everyoneyay. 
 Eutralnay oodgay inyay alignmentyay, eshay eavesclay otay idealsyay ofyay ifelay andyay espectray. 
 Artemisyay  Entreriyay evernay allowsyay ishay emotionsyay otay astermay imhay, andyay ehay onstantlycay allengeschay imselfhay otay improveyay ishay illsskay. 
 Ishay awfullay evilyay alignmentyay ivesgay imhay idealsyay ofyay impartialityyay andyay ayay ustlay orfay owerpay. Ikatay  Waylan’syay ondbay isyay otay ethay  Innyay ofyay ethay  Astlay  Omehay. 
 Ethay inn’syay oprietorpray avegay erhay ayay ewnay ancechay atyay ifelay, andyay erhay iendshipfray withyay erhay adventuringyay ompanionscay wasyay orgedfay uringday erhay imetay workingyay erethay. 
 Itsyay estructionday ybay ethay araudingmay agonarmiesdray ivesgay  Ikatay ayay eryvay ersonalpay easonray otay atehay emthay withyay ayay ieryfay assionpay. 
 Erhay ondbay ightmay ebay asedphray asyay “Iyay willyay oday whateveryay ityay akestay otay unishpay ethay agonarmiesdray orfay ethay estructionday ofyay ethay  Innyay ofyay ethay  Astlay  Omehay.” Artemisyay  Entreri’syay ondbay isyay ayay angestray, almostyay aradoxicalpay elationshipray withyay  Izztdray  Oday’ Urdenyay, ishay equalyay inyay wordplaysay andyay imgray eterminationday. 
 Inyay ishay irstfay attlebay withyay  Izztdray, Artemisyay ecognizedray omethingsay ofyay imselfhay inyay ishay opponentyay, omesay indicationyay atthay ifyay ishay ifelay adhay onegay ifferentlyday, ehay ightmay avehay edlay ayay ifelay oremay ikelay ethay eroichay ow’sdray. 
 Omfray atthay omentmay,  Artemisyay isyay oremay anthay ayay iminalcray assassin—heyay isyay anyay antiheroyay, ivendray ybay ishay ivalryray withyay  Izztdray. 
 Ishay ondbay ightmay ebay asedphray asyay “Iyay willyay otnay estray untilyay Iyay avehay ovedpray yselfmay etterbay anthay  Izztdray  Oday’ Urdenyay.” Eachyay ofyay esethay aracterschay alsoyay ashay anyay importantyay awflay. Ikatay  Waylanyay isyay aivenay andyay emotionallyyay ulnerablevay, youngeryay anthay erhay ompanionscay andyay annoyedyay atthay eythay illstay inkthay ofyay erhay asyay ethay idkay eythay ewknay yearsyay agoyay. 
 Eshay ightmay evenyay ebay emptedtay otay actyay againstyay erhay inciplespray ifyay e'sshay onvincedcay atthay ayay articularpay achievementyay wouldyay emonstrateday erhay aturitymay. 
 Artemisyay  Entreriyay isyay ompletelycay walledyay offyay omfray anyyay ersonalpay elationshipray andyay ustjay wantsyay otay ebay eftlay alone.Ayay usefulyay aceplay otay artstay inkingthay aboutyay ersonalitypay aitstray isyay otay ooklay atyay youryay ighesthay andyay owestlay abilityyay oresscay andyay efineday oneyay aittray elatedray otay eachyay. 
 Eitheryay oneyay ouldcay ebay ositivepay oryay egativenay: youyay ightmay workyay ardhay otay overcomeyay ayay owlay orescay, orfay exampleyay, oryay ebay ockycay aboutyay youryay ighhay orescay. Aconicdray  Iptscray:  Amplesay  Alphabetyay Idealsyay Escribeday oneyay idealyay atthay ivesdray youryay aracterchay. 
 Youryay idealsyay areyay ethay ingsthay atthay youyay elievebay inyay ostmay onglystray, ethay undamentalfay oralmay andyay ethicalyay inciplespray atthay ompelcay youyay otay actyay asyay youyay oday. 
 Idealsyay encompassyay everythingyay omfray youryay ifelay oalsgay otay youryay orecay eliefbay ystemsay. Idealsyay ightmay answeryay anyyay ofyay esethay questionsyay:  Whatyay areyay ethay inciplespray atthay youyay willyay evernay etraybay?  Whatyay wouldyay omptpray youyay otay akemay acrificessay?  Whatyay ivesdray youyay otay actyay andyay uidesgay youryay oalsgay andyay ambitionsyay?  Whatyay isyay ethay inglesay ostmay importantyay ingthay youyay ivestray orfay? Youyay ancay oosechay anyyay idealsyay youyay ikelay, utbay youryay aracter’schay alignmentyay isyay ayay oodgay aceplay otay artstay efiningday emthay. 
 Eachyay ackgroundbay inyay isthay apterchay includesyay ixsay uggestedsay idealsyay. 
 Ivefay ofyay emthay areyay inkedlay otay aspectsyay ofyay alignmentyay: awlay, aoschay, oodgay, evilyay, andyay eutralitynay. 
 Ethay astlay oneyay ashay oremay otay oday withyay ethay articularpay ackgroundbay anthay withyay oralmay oryay ethicalyay erspectivespay. Ondsbay Eatecray oneyay ondbay orfay youryay aracterchay. 
 Ondsbay epresentray ayay aracter’schay onnectionscay otay eoplepay, acesplay, andyay eventsyay inyay ethay worldyay. 
 Eythay ietay youyay otay ingsthay omfray youryay ackgroundbay. 
 Eythay ightmay inspireyay youyay otay eightshay ofyay eroismhay, oryay eadlay youyay otay actyay againstyay youryay ownyay estbay interestsyay ifyay eythay areyay eatenedthray. 
 Eythay ancay workyay eryvay uchmay ikelay idealsyay, ivingdray ayay aracter’schay otivationsmay andyay oalsgay. Ondsbay ightmay answeryay anyyay ofyay esethay questionsyay:  Whomyay oday youyay arecay ostmay aboutyay?  Otay whatyay aceplay oday youyay eelfay ayay ecialspay onnectioncay?  Whatyay isyay youryay ostmay easuredtray ossessionpay? Youryay ondsbay ightmay ebay iedtay otay youryay assclay, youryay ackgroundbay, youryay aceray, oryay omesay otheryay aspectyay ofyay youryay aracter’schay istoryhay oryay ersonalitypay. 
 Youyay ightmay alsoyay aingay ewnay ondsbay overyay ethay oursecay ofyay youryay adventuresyay. Awsflay Inallyfay, oosechay ayay awflay orfay youryay aracterchay. 
 Youryay aracter’schay awflay epresentsray omesay icevay, ompulsioncay, earfay, oryay weakness—inyay articularpay, anythingyay atthay omeonesay elseyay ouldcay exploityay otay ingbray youyay otay uinray oryay ausecay youyay otay actyay againstyay youryay estbay interestsyay. 
 Inspirationyay Inspirationyay isyay ayay uleray ethay  Ungeonday  Astermay ancay useyay otay ewardray youyay orfay ayingplay youryay aracterchay inyay ayay wayyay at’sthay uetray otay ishay oryay erhay ersonalitypay aitstray, idealyay, ondbay, andyay awflay. 
 Ybay usingyay inspirationyay, youyay ancay awdray onyay youryay ersonalitypay aittray ofyay ompassioncay orfay ethay owntroddenday otay ivegay youyay anyay edgeyay inyay egotiatingnay withyay ethay  Eggarbay  Incepray. 
 Oryay inspirationyay ancay etlay youyay allcay onyay youryay ondbay otay ethay efenseday ofyay youryay omehay illagevay otay ushpay astpay ethay effectyay ofyay ayay ellspay atthay ashay eenbay aidlay onyay youyay. Aininggay  Inspirationyay Youryay DMay ancay oosechay otay ivegay youyay inspirationyay orfay ayay arietyvay ofyay easonsray. 
 Ypicallytay, Day msay awardyay ityay whenyay youyay ayplay outyay youryay ersonalitypay aitstray, ivegay inyay otay ethay awbacksdray esentedpray ybay ayay awflay oryay ondbay, andyay otherwiseyay ortraypay youryay aracterchay inyay ayay ompellingcay wayyay. 
 Youryay DMay willyay elltay youyay owhay youyay ancay earnyay inspirationyay inyay ethay amegay. Youyay eitheryay avehay inspirationyay oryay youyay on’t—youday an’tcay ockpilestay ultiplemay “inspirationsyay” orfay aterlay useyay. Usingyay  Inspirationyay Ifyay youyay avehay inspirationyay, youyay ancay expendyay ityay whenyay youyay akemay anyay attackyay ollray, avingsay owthray, oryay abilityyay eckchay. 
 Endingspay youryay inspirationyay ivesgay youyay advantageyay onyay atthay ollray. Additionallyyay, ifyay youyay avehay inspirationyay, youyay ancay ewardray anotheryay ayerplay orfay oodgay oleplayingray, everclay inkingthay, oryay implysay oingday omethingsay excitingyay inyay ethay amegay. Whenyay anotheryay ayerplay aracterchay oesday omethingsay atthay eallyray ontributescay otay ethay orystay inyay ayay unfay andyay interestingyay wayyay, youyay ancay ivegay upyay youryay inspirationyay otay ivegay atthay aracterchay inspirationyay. Ackgroundsbay Everyyay orystay ashay ayay eginningbay. 
 Youryay aracter’schay ackgroundbay evealsray whereyay youyay amecay omfray, owhay youyay ecamebay anyay adventureryay, andyay youryay aceplay inyay ethay worldyay. Youryay ighterfay ightmay avehay eenbay ayay ourageouscay ightknay oryay ayay izzledgray oldiersay. 
 Youryay wizardyay ouldcay avehay eenbay ayay agesay oryay anyay artisanyay. 
 Youryay ogueray ightmay avehay ottengay ybay asyay ayay uildgay iefthay oryay ommandedcay audiencesyay asyay ayay esterjay. Oosingchay ayay ackgroundbay ovidespray youyay withyay importantyay orystay uescay aboutyay youryay aracter’schay identityyay. 
 Ethay ostmay importantyay questionyay otay askyay aboutyay youryay ackgroundbay isyay whatyay angedchay?  Whyyay idday youyay opstay oingday whateveryay youryay ackgroundbay escribesday andyay artstay adventuringyay?  Whereyay idday youyay etgay ethay oneymay otay urchasepay youryay artingstay eargay, oryay, ifyay youyay omecay omfray ayay wealthyyay ackgroundbay, whyyay on'tday youyay avehay oremay oneymay?  Owhay idday youyay earnlay ethay illsskay ofyay youryay assclay?  Whatyay etssay youyay apartyay omfray ordinaryyay eoplepay whoyay areshay youryay ackgroundbay? Ikatay andyay  Artemisyay:  Ackgroundsbay Ikatay  Waylanyay andyay  Artemisyay  Entreriyay othbay ivedlay eirthay earliestyay yearsyay asyay eetstray urchinsyay. 
 Ika’stay aterlay areercay asyay ayay armaidbay idn’tday eallyray angechay erhay, osay eshay ightmay oosechay ethay urchinyay ackgroundbay, aininggay oficiencypray inyay ethay  Eightslay ofyay  Andhay andyay  Ealthstay illsskay, andyay earninglay ethay oolstay ofyay ethay ievingthay adetray. 
 Artemisyay isyay oremay efinedday ybay ishay iminalcray ackgroundbay, ivinggay imhay illsskay inyay  Eceptionday andyay  Ealthstay, asyay wellyay asyay oficiencypray withyay ethay oolstay ofyay ieverythay andyay oisonpay. Ethay amplesay ackgroundsbay inyay isthay apterchay ovidepray othbay oncretecay enefitsbay (eaturesfay, oficienciespray, andyay anguageslay) andyay oleplayingray uggestionssay. Oficienciespray Eachyay ackgroundbay ivesgay ayay aracterchay oficiencypray inyay wotay illsskay. 
 Illsskay areyay escribedday inyay apterchay 7. Inyay additionyay, ostmay ackgroundsbay ivegay ayay aracterchay oficiencypray withyay oneyay oryay oremay oolstay. 
 Oolstay andyay ooltay oficienciespray areyay etailedday inyay apterchay 5. Ifyay ayay aracterchay wouldyay aingay ethay amesay oficiencypray omfray wotay ifferentday ourcessay, ehay oryay eshay ancay oosechay ayay ifferentday oficiencypray ofyay ethay amesay indkay (illskay oryay ooltay) insteadyay. Anguageslay Omesay ackgroundsbay alsoyay allowyay aracterschay otay earnlay additionalyay anguageslay eyondbay osethay ivengay ybay aceray. Eesay “ Anguageslay” earlieryay inyay isthay apterchay. Equipmentyay Eachyay ackgroundbay ovidespray ayay ackagepay ofyay artingstay equipmentyay. 
 Ifyay youyay useyay ethay optionalyay uleray omfray apterchay 5 otay endspay oincay onyay eargay, youyay oday otnay eceiveray ethay artingstay equipmentyay omfray youryay ackgroundbay. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay Ayay ackgroundbay ontainscay uggestedsay ersonalpay aracteristicschay asedbay onyay youryay ackgroundbay. 
 Youyay ancay ickpay aracteristicschay, ollray iceday otay etermineday emthay andomlyray, oryay useyay ethay uggestionssay asyay inspirationyay orfay aracteristicschay ofyay youryay ownyay eationcray. Ustomizingcay ayay  Ackgroundbay  Youyay ightmay wantyay otay weaktay omesay ofyay ethay eaturesfay ofyay ayay ackgroundbay osay ityay etterbay itsfay youryay aracterchay oryay ethay ampaigncay ettingsay. 
 Otay ustomizecay ayay ackgroundbay, youyay ancay eplaceray oneyay eaturefay withyay anyyay otheryay oneyay, oosechay anyyay wotay illsskay, andyay oosechay ayay otaltay ofyay wotay ooltay oficienciespray oryay anguageslay omfray ethay amplesay ackgroundsbay. 
 Youyay ancay eitheryay useyay ethay equipmentyay ackagepay omfray youryay ackgroundbay oryay endspay oincay onyay eargay asyay escribedday inyay apterchay 5. 
aitstray, oneyay idealyay, oneyay ondbay, andyay oneyay awflay. 
 Ifyay youyay an’tcay indfay ayay eaturefay atthay atchesmay youryay esiredday ackgroundbay, workyay withyay youryay DMay otay eatecray oneyay. Acolyteyay Youyay avehay entspay youryay ifelay inyay ethay ervicesay ofyay ayay empletay otay ayay ecificspay odgay oryay antheonpay ofyay odsgay. 
 Youyay actyay asyay anyay intermediaryyay etweenbay ethay ealmray ofyay ethay olyhay andyay ethay ortalmay worldyay, erformingpay acredsay itesray andyay offeringyay acrificessay inyay orderyay otay onductcay worshipersyay intoyay ethay esencepray ofyay ethay ivineday. 
 Youyay areyay otnay ecessarilynay ayay eric-performingclay acredsay itesray isyay otnay ethay amesay ingthay asyay annelingchay ivineday owerpay. Oosechay ayay odgay, ayay antheonpay ofyay odsgay, oryay omesay otheryay quasi-divineyay eingbay omfray amongyay osethay istedlay inyay appendixyay Bay oryay osethay ecifiedspay ybay youryay DMay, andyay workyay withyay youryay DMay otay etailday ethay aturenay ofyay youryay eligiousray ervicesay. Wereyay youyay ayay esserlay unctionaryfay inyay ayay empletay, aisedray omfray ildhoodchay otay assistyay ethay iestspray inyay ethay acredsay itesray?  Oryay wereyay youyay ayay ighhay iestpray whoyay uddenlysay experiencedyay ayay allcay otay ervesay youryay odgay inyay ayay ifferentday wayyay?  Erhapspay youyay wereyay ethay eaderlay ofyay ayay allsmay ultcay outsideyay ofyay anyyay establishedyay empletay ucturestray, oryay evenyay anyay occultyay oupgray atthay ervedsay ayay iendishfay astermay atthay youyay ownay enyday. Illskay  Oficienciespray:  Insightyay,  Eligionray  Anguageslay:  Wotay ofyay youryay oicechay  Equipmentyay: Ayay olyhay ymbolsay (ayay iftgay otay youyay whenyay youyay enteredyay ethay iesthoodpray), ayay ayerpray ookbay oryay ayerpray wheelyay, 5 icksstay ofyay incenseyay, estmentsvay, ayay etsay ofyay ommoncay othesclay, andyay ayay eltbay ouchpay ontainingcay 15 gpay Eaturefay:  Eltershay ofyay ethay  Aithfulfay Asyay anyay acolyteyay, youyay ommandcay ethay espectray ofyay osethay whoyay areshay youryay aithfay, andyay youyay ancay erformpay ethay eligiousray eremoniescay ofyay youryay eityday. 
 Youyay andyay youryay adventuringyay ompanionscay ancay expectyay otay eceiveray eefray ealinghay andyay arecay atyay ayay empletay, ineshray, oryay otheryay establishedyay esencepray ofyay youryay aithfay, oughthay youyay ustmay ovidepray anyyay aterialmay omponentscay eedednay orfay ellsspay. 
 Osethay whoyay areshay youryay eligionray willyay upportsay youyay (utbay onlyyay youyay) atyay ayay odestmay ifestylelay. Youyay ightmay alsoyay avehay iestay otay ayay ecificspay empletay edicatedday otay youryay osenchay eityday oryay antheonpay, andyay youyay avehay ayay esidenceray erethay. 
 Isthay ouldcay ebay ethay empletay whereyay youyay usedyay otay ervesay, ifyay youyay emainray onyay oodgay ermstay withyay ityay, oryay ayay empletay whereyay youyay avehay oundfay ayay ewnay omehay. 
 Whileyay earnay youryay empletay, youyay ancay allcay uponyay ethay iestspray orfay assistanceyay, ovidedpray ethay assistanceyay youyay askyay orfay isyay otnay azardoushay andyay youyay emainray inyay oodgay andingstay withyay youryay empletay. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay Acolytesyay areyay apedshay ybay eirthay experienceyay inyay emplestay oryay otheryay eligiousray ommunitiescay. 
 Eirthay udystay ofyay ethay istoryhay andyay enetstay ofyay eirthay aithfay andyay eirthay elationshipsray otay emplestay, inesshray, oryay ierarchieshay affectyay eirthay annerismsmay andyay idealsyay. 
 Eirthay awsflay ightmay ebay omesay iddenhay ypocrisyhay oryay ereticalhay ideayay, oryay anyay idealyay oryay ondbay akentay otay anyay extreme.dyay8 Ersonalitypay  ait1ITray idolizeyay ayay articularpay erohay ofyay ymay aithfay, andyay onstantlycay eferray otay atthay erson’spay eedsday andyay example.3Iyay eesay omensyay inyay everyyay eventyay andyay actionyay. 
 Ethay odsgay ytray otay eakspay otay usyay, weyay ustjay eednay otay istenlay4 Othingnay ancay akeshay ymay optimisticyay attitude.5Iyay quoteyay (oryay isquotemay) acredsay extstay andyay overbspray inyay almostyay everyyay ituation.6Isay amyay oleranttay (oryay intolerantyay) ofyay otheryay aithsfay andyay espectray (oryay ondemncay) ethay worshipyay ofyay otheryay ods.7I'vegay enjoyedyay inefay oodfay, inkdray, andyay ighhay ocietysay amongyay ymay emple’stay eliteyay. 
 Oughray ivinglay atesgray onyay e.8I’vemay entspay osay onglay inyay ethay empletay atthay Iyay avehay ittlelay acticalpray experienceyay ealingday withyay eoplepay inyay ethay outsideyay world.dyay6 Idealyay1 Aditiontray. 
 Ethay ancientyay aditionstray ofyay worshipyay andyay acrificesay ustmay ebay eservedpray andyay upheldyay. 
( Awfullay)2 Aritychay. 
Iyay alwaysyay ytray otay elphay osethay inyay eednay, onay attermay whatyay ethay ersonalpay ostcay. 
( Oodgay)3 Angechay. 
 Weyay ustmay elphay ingbray aboutyay ethay angeschay ethay odsgay areyay onstantlycay workingyay inyay ethay worldyay. 
( Aoticchay)4 Owerpay. 
Iyay opehay otay oneyay ayday iseray otay ethay optay ofyay ymay aith’sfay eligiousray ierarchyhay. 
( Awfullay)5 Aithfay. 
Iyay usttray atthay ymay eityday willyay uidegay ymay actionsyay, Iyay avehay aithfay atthay ifyay Iyay workyay ardhay, ingsthay willyay ogay wellyay. 
( Awfullay)6 Aspirationyay. 
Iyay eeksay otay ovepray yselfmay worthyyay ofyay ymay od’sgay avorfay ybay atchingmay ymay actionsyay againstyay ishay oryay erhay eachingstay. 
 Arlatanchay  Youyay avehay alwaysyay adhay ayay wayyay withyay eoplepay. 
 Youyay owknay whatyay akesmay emthay icktay, youyay ancay easetay outyay eirthay eartshay' esiresday afteryay ayay ewfay inutesmay ofyay onversationcay, andyay withyay ayay ewfay eadinglay questionsyay youyay ancay eadray emthay ikelay eythay wereyay ildren'schay ooksbay. 
 It’syay ayay usefulyay alenttay, andyay oneyay atthay you’reyay erfectlypay willingyay otay useyay orfay youryay advantageyay. Youyay owknay whatyay eoplepay wantyay andyay youyay eliverday, oryay atherray, youyay omisepray otay eliverday. 
 Ommoncay ensesay ouldshay eerstay eoplepay awayyay omfray ingsthay atthay oundsay ootay oodgay otay ebay uetray, utbay ommoncay ensesay eemssay otay ebay inyay ortshay upplysay whenyay you’reyay aroundyay. 
 Ethay ottlebay ofyay ink-coloredpay iquidlay willyay urelysay urecay atthay unseemlyyay ashray, isthay ointment—nothingyay oremay anthay ayay itbay ofyay atfay withyay ayay inklespray ofyay ilversay ust—canday estoreray youthyay andyay igorvay, andyay ere’sthay ayay idgebray inyay ethay itycay atthay ustjay appenshay otay ebay orfay alesay. 
 Esethay arvelsmay oundsay implausibleyay, utbay youyay akemay emthay oundsay ikelay ethay ealray ealday. Illskay  Oficienciespray:  Eceptionday,  Eightslay ofyay  Andhay  Ooltay  Oficienciespray:  Isguiseday itkay, orgeryfay itkay  Equipmentyay: Ayay etsay ofyay inefay othesclay, ayay isguiseday itkay, oolstay ofyay ethay oncay ofyay youryay oicechay (entay opperedstay ottlesbay illedfay withyay oloredcay iquidlay, ayay etsay ofyay weightedyay iceday, ayay eckday ofyay arkedmay ardscay, oryay ayay ignetsay ingray ofyay anyay imaginaryyay ukeday), andyay ayay eltbay ouchpay ontainingcay 15 gpay Avoritefay  Emesschay Everyyay arlatanchay ashay anyay angleyay ehay oryay eshay usesyay inyay eferencepray otay otheryay emesschay. 
 Oosechay ayay avoritefay amscay oryay ollray onyay ethay abletay elow.dbay8 Ersonalitypay  ait1ITray allfay inyay andyay outyay ofyay ovelay easilyyay, andyay amyay alwaysyay ursuingpay omeone.2Isay avehay ayay okejay orfay everyyay occasionyay, especiallyyay occasionsyay whereyay umorhay isyay inappropriateyay.3 Atteryflay isyay ymay eferredpray icktray orfay ettinggay whatyay Iyay want.4I’myay ayay ornbay amblergay whoyay an'tcay esistray akingtay ayay iskray orfay ayay otentialpay ayoff.5Ipay ielay aboutyay almostyay everythingyay, evenyay whenyay ere’sthay onay oodgay easonray otay.6 Arcasmsay andyay insultsyay areyay ymay weaponsyay ofyay oice.7Ichay eepkay ultiplemay olyhay ymbolssay onyay emay andyay invokeyay whateveryay eityday ightmay omecay inyay usefulyay atyay anyyay ivengay oment.8Imay ocketpay anythingyay Iyay eesay atthay ightmay avehay omesay alue.dvay6 Idealyay1 Independenceyay. 
Iyay amyay ayay eefray irit—nospay oneyay ellstay emay whatyay otay oday. 
( Aoticchay)2 Airnessfay. 
Iyay evernay argettay eoplepay whoyay an’tcay affordyay otay oselay ayay ewfay oinscay. 
( Awfullay)3 Aritychay. 
Iyay istributeday ethay oneymay Iyay acquireyay otay ethay eoplepay whoyay eallyray eednay ityay. 
( Oodgay)4 Eativitycray. 
Iyay evernay unray ethay amesay oncay wicetay. 
( Aoticchay)5 Iendshipfray. 
 Aterialmay oodsgay omecay andyay ogay. 
 Ondsbay ofyay iendshipfray astlay oreverfay. 
( Oodgay)6 Aspirationyay. 
I’myay eterminedday otay akemay omethingsay ofyay yselfmay. 
( Any)dyay6 ond1IBay eecedflay ethay wrongyay ersonpay andyay ustmay workyay otay ensureyay atthay isthay individualyay evernay ossescray athspay withyay emay oryay osethay Iyay arecay about.2Iyay oweyay everythingyay otay ymay entor—amay orriblehay ersonpay who’syay obablypray ottingray inyay ailjay omewheresay.3 Omewheresay outyay erethay, Iyay avehay ayay ildchay whoyay oesn’tday owknay emay. 
I’myay akingmay ethay worldyay etterbay orfay imhay oryay er.4Ihay omecay omfray ayay oblenay amilyfay, andyay oneyay ayday I’llyay eclaimray ymay andslay andyay itletay omfray osethay whoyay olestay emthay omfray e.5Amay owerfulpay ersonpay illedkay omeonesay Iyay ovelay. 
 Omesay ayday oonsay, I’llyay avehay ymay evenge.6Iray windledsay andyay uinedray ayay ersonpay whoyay idn’tday eserveday ityay. 
Iyay eeksay otay atoneyay orfay ymay isdeedsmay utbay ightmay evernay ebay ableyay otay orgivefay yself.dmay6 aw1IFlay an’tcay esistray ayay ettypray ace.2I'mfay alwaysyay inyay ebtday. 
Iyay endspay ymay ill-gottenyay ainsgay onyay ecadentday uxurieslay asterfay anthay Iyay ingbray emthay in..3I’myay onvincedcay atthay onay oneyay ouldcay everyay oolfay emay ethay wayyay Iyay oolfay others.4I’myay ootay eedygray orfay ymay ownyay oodgay. 
Iyay an’tcay esistray akingtay ayay iskray ifyay ere’sthay oneymay involved.5Iyay an’tcay esistray windlingsay eoplepay whoyay areyay oremay owerfulpay anthay e.6Imay atehay otay admityay ityay andyay willyay atehay yselfmay orfay ityay, utbay I'llyay unray andyay eservepray ymay ownyay idehay ifyay ethay oinggay etsgay ough.dtay6 am1IScay eatchay atyay amesgay ofyay ance.2Ichay aveshay oinscay oryay orgefay ocuments.3Iday insinuateyay yselfmay intoyay eople’spay iveslay otay eypray onyay eirthay weaknessyay andyay ecuresay eirthay ortunes.4Ifay utpay onyay ewnay identitiesyay ikelay othes.5Iclay unray eight-of-handslay onscay onyay eetstray orners.6Icay onvincecay eoplepay atthay worthlessyay unkjay isyay worthyay eirthay ard-earnedhay oneymay. Eaturefay:  Alsefay  Identityyay  Youyay avehay eatedcray ayay econdsay identityyay atthay includesyay ocumentationday, establishedyay acquaintancesyay, andyay isguisesday atthay allowyay youyay otay assumeyay atthay ersonapay. 
 Additionallyyay, youyay ancay orgefay ocumentsday includingyay officialyay aperspay andyay ersonalpay etterslay, asyay onglay asyay youyay avehay eensay anyay exampleyay ofyay ethay indkay ofyay ocumentday oryay ethay andwritinghay youyay areyay yingtray otay opycay. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay Arlatanschay areyay olorfulcay aracterschay whoyay oncealcay eirthay uetray elvessay ehindbay ethay asksmay eythay onstructcay. 
 Eythay eflectray whatyay eoplepay wantyay otay eesay, whatyay eythay wantyay otay elievebay, andyay owhay eythay eesay ethay worldyay. 
 Iminalcray Youyay areyay anyay experiencedyay iminalcray withyay ayay istoryhay ofyay eakingbray ethay awlay. 
 Youyay avehay entspay ayay otlay ofyay imetay amongyay otheryay iminalscray andyay illstay avehay ontactscay withinyay ethay iminalcray underworldyay. 
 You’reyay arfay oserclay anthay ostmay eoplepay otay ethay worldyay ofyay urdermay, eftthay, andyay iolencevay atthay ervadespay ethay underbellyyay ofyay ivilizationcay, andyay youyay avehay urvivedsay upyay otay isthay ointpay ybay outingflay ethay ulesray andyay egulationsray ofyay ocietysay. Illskay  Oficienciespray:  Eceptionday,  Ealthstay  Ooltay  Oficienciespray:  Oneyay ypetay ofyay aminggay etsay, ievesthay’ oolstay Equipmentyay: Ayay owbarcray, ayay etsay ofyay arkday ommoncay othesclay includingyay ayay oodhay, andyay ayay eltbay ouchpay ontainingcay 15 gpay Iminalcray  Ecialtyspay Erethay areyay anymay indskay ofyay iminalscray, andyay withinyay ayay ievesthay’ uildgay oryay imilarsay iminalcray organizationyay, individualyay embersmay avehay articularpay ecialtiesspay. 
 Evenyay iminalscray whoyay operateyay outsideyay ofyay uchsay organizationsyay avehay ongstray eferencespray orfay ertaincay indskay ofyay imescray overyay othersyay. 
 Oosechay ethay oleray youyay ayedplay inyay youryay iminalcray ifelay, oryay ollray onyay ethay abletay elow.dbay8 Ecialtydspay8 Ecialtyspay1 Ackmailerblay5 Ighwayhay obberray2 Urglarbay6 Iredhay illerkay3 Enforceryay7 Ickpocketpay4 Encefay8 Ugglersmay Eaturefay:  Iminalcray  Ontactcay Youyay avehay ayay eliableray andyay ustworthytray ontactcay whoyay actsyay asyay youryay iaisonlay otay ayay etworknay ofyay otheryay iminalscray. 
 Youyay owknay owhay otay etgay essagesmay otay andyay omfray youryay ontactcay, evenyay overyay eatgray istancesday; ecificallyspay, youyay owknay ethay ocallay essengersmay, orruptcay aravancay astersmay, andyay eedysay ailorssay whoyay ancay eliverday essagesmay orfay youyay. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay Iminalscray ightmay eemsay ikelay illainsvay onyay ethay urfacesay, andyay anymay ofyay emthay areyay illainousvay otay ethay orecay. 
 Utbay omesay avehay anyay abundanceyay ofyay endearingyay, ifyay otnay edeemingray, aracteristicschay. 
 Erethay ightmay ebay onorhay amongyay ievesthay, utbay iminalscray arelyray owshay anyyay espectray orfay awlay oryay authority.dyay8 Ersonalitypay  ait4ITray wouldyay atherray akemay ayay ewnay iendfray anthay ayay ewnay enemy.8Iyay owblay upyay atyay ethay ightestslay insult.dyay6 Idealyay1 Onorhay. 
Iyay on’tday ealstay omfray othersyay inyay ethay adetray. 
( Awfullay)2 Eedomfray. 
 Ainschay areyay eantmay otay ebay okenbray, asyay areyay osethay whoyay wouldyay orgefay emthay. 
( Aoticchay)3 Aritychay. 
Iyay ealstay omfray ethay wealthyyay osay atthay Iyay ancay elphay eoplepay inyay eednay. 
( Oodgay)4 Eedgray. 
Iyay willyay oday whateveryay ityay akestay otay ecomebay wealthyyay. 
( Evilyay)5 Eoplepay. 
I’myay oyallay otay ymay iendsfray, otnay otay anyyay idealsyay, andyay everyoneyay elseyay ancay aketay ayay iptray ownday ethay  Yxstay orfay allyay Iyay arecay. 
( Eutralnay)6 Edemptionray. 
 Ere’sthay ayay arkspay ofyay oodgay inyay everyoneyay. 
( Ood)dgay6 Ond1I’mbay yingtray otay aypay offyay anyay oldyay ebtday Iyay oweyay otay ayay enerousgay enefactorbay.2 Ymay ill-gottenyay ainsgay ogay otay upportsay ymay amilyfay.3 Omethingsay importantyay wasyay akentay omfray emay, andyay Iyay aimyay otay ealstay ityay ack.4Ibay willyay ecomebay ethay eatestgray iefthay atthay everyay ived.5I’mlay uiltygay ofyay ayay erribletay imecray. 
Iyay opehay Iyay ancay edeemray yselfmay orfay ityay.6 Omeonesay Iyay ovedlay iedday ecausebay ofyay ayay istakemay Iyay ademay. 
 Ariantvay  Iminalcray:  Yspay Althoughyay youryay apabilitiescay areyay otnay uchmay ifferentday omfray osethay ofyay ayay urglarbay oryay ugglersmay, youyay earnedlay andyay acticedpray emthay inyay ayay eryvay ifferentday ontextcay: asyay anyay espionageyay agentyay. 
 Youyay ightmay avehay eenbay anyay officiallyyay anctionedsay agentyay ofyay ethay owncray, oryay erhapspay youyay oldsay ethay ecretssay youyay uncoveredyay otay ethay ighesthay idderbay. Entertaineryay Youyay ivethray inyay ontfray ofyay anyay audienceyay. 
 Youyay owknay owhay otay entranceyay emthay, entertainyay emthay, andyay evenyay inspireyay emthay. 
 Youryay oeticspay ancay irstay ethay eartshay ofyay osethay whoyay earhay youyay, awakeningyay iefgray oryay oyjay, aughterlay oryay angeryay. 
 Youryay usicmay aisesray eirthay iritsspay oryay apturescay eirthay orrowsay. 
 Youryay anceday epsstay aptivatecay, youryay umorhay utscay otay ethay quickyay. 
 Whateveryay echniquestay youyay useyay, youryay artyay isyay youryay ifelay. Illskay  Oficienciespray:  Acrobaticsyay,  Erformancepay  Ooltay  Oficienciespray:  Isguiseday itkay, oneyay ypetay ofyay usicalmay instrumentyay  Equipmentyay: Ayay usicalmay instrumentyay (oneyay ofyay youryay oicechay), ethay avorfay ofyay anyay admireryay (ovelay etterlay, ocklay ofyay airhay, oryay inkettray), ayay ostumecay, andyay ayay eltbay ouchpay ontainingcay 15 gpay Entertaineryay  Outinesray Ayay oodgay entertaineryay isyay ersatilevay, icingspay upyay everyyay erformancepay withyay ayay arietyvay ofyay ifferentday outinesray. 
 Oosechay oneyay otay eethray outinesray oryay ollray onyay ethay abletay elowbay otay efineday youryay expertiseyay asyay anyay entertainer.dyay10 Entertaineryay  Outinedray10 Entertaineryay  Outineray1 Actoryay6 Instrumentalistyay2 Ancerday7 Oetpay3 Ire-eaterfay8 Inger4jestersay9 Oryteller5jugglerstay10 Umblertay Eaturefay:  Ybay  Opularpay  Emandday Youyay ancay alwaysyay indfay ayay aceplay otay erformpay, usuallyyay inyay anyay innyay oryay averntay utbay ossiblypay withyay ayay ircuscay, atyay ayay eaterthay, oryay evenyay inyay ayay oble’snay ourtcay. 
 Atyay uchsay ayay aceplay, youyay eceiveray eefray odginglay andyay oodfay ofyay ayay odestmay oryay omfortablecay andardstay (ependingday onyay ethay qualityyay ofyay ethay establishmentyay), asyay onglay asyay youyay erformpay eachyay ightnay. 
 Inyay additionyay, youryay erformancepay akesmay youyay omethingsay ofyay ayay ocallay igurefay. 
 Whenyay angersstray ecognizeray youyay inyay ayay owntay whereyay youyay avehay erformedpay, eythay ypicallytay aketay ayay ikinglay otay youyay. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay  Uccessfulsay entertainersyay avehay otay ebay ableyay otay apturecay andyay oldhay anyay audience’syay attentionyay, osay eythay endtay otay avehay amboyantflay oryay orcefulfay ersonalitiespay. 
 Ey’rethay inclinedyay owardtay ethay omanticray andyay oftenyay ingclay otay igh-mindedhay idealsyay aboutyay ethay acticepray ofyay artyay andyay ethay appreciationyay ofyay eauty.dbay8 Ersonalitypay  ait1ITray owknay ayay orystay elevantray otay almostyay everyyay ituationsay.2 Wheneveryay Iyay omecay otay ayay ewnay aceplay, Iyay ollectcay ocallay umorsray andyay eadspray ossip.3I’mgay ayay opelesshay omanticray, alwaysyay earchingsay orfay atthay “ecialspay omeonesay.”4 Obodynay aysstay angryyay atyay emay oryay aroundyay emay orfay onglay, incesay Iyay ancay efuseday anyyay amountyay ofyay ension.5Itay ovelay ayay oodgay insultyay, evenyay oneyay irectedday atyay e.6Imay etgay itterbay ifyay I’myay otnay ethay entercay ofyay attention.7I’llyay ettlesay orfay othingnay esslay anthay erfection.8Ipay angechay ymay oodmay oryay ymay indmay asyay quicklyyay asyay Iyay angechay eykay inyay ayay ong.dsay6 Awflay1 Whenyay Iyay eesay omethingsay aluablevay, Iyay an’tcay inkthay aboutyay anythingyay utbay owhay otay ealstay ityay.2 Whenyay acedfay withyay ayay oicechay etweenbay oneymay andyay ymay iendsfray, Iyay usuallyyay oosechay ethay oneymay.3 Ifyay ere’sthay ayay anplay, I’llyay orgetfay ityay. 
 Ifyay Iyay on’tday orgetfay ityay, I’llyay ignoreyay it.4Iyay avehay ayay “elltay” atthay evealsray whenyay I'myay ying.5Ilay urntay ailtay andyay unray whenyay ingsthay ooklay adbay.6 Anyay innocentyay ersonpay isyay inyay isonpray orfay ayay imecray atthay Iyay ommittedcay. 
day6 Idealyay1 Eautybay. 
 Whenyay Iyay erformpay, Iyay akemay ethay worldyay etterbay anthay ityay wasyay. 
( Oodgay)2 Aditiontray. 
 Ethay oriesstay, egendslay, andyay ongssay ofyay ethay astpay ustmay evernay ebay orgottenfay, orfay eythay eachtay usyay whoyay weyay areyay. 
( Awfullay)3 Eativitycray. 
 Ethay worldyay isyay inyay eednay ofyay ewnay ideasyay andyay oldbay actionyay. 
( Aoticchay)4 Eedgray. 
I’myay onlyyay inyay ityay orfay ethay oneymay andyay amefay. 
( Evilyay)5 Eoplepay. 
Iyay ikelay eeingsay ethay ilessmay onyay eople’spay acesfay whenyay Iyay erformpay. 
 At’sthay allyay atthay attersmay. 
( Eutralnay)6 Onestyhay. 
 Artyay ouldshay eflectray ethay oulsay; ityay ouldshay omecay omfray withinyay andyay evealray whoyay weyay eallyray areyay. 
( Any)dyay6 Ondbay1 Ymay instrumentyay isyay ymay ostmay easuredtray ossessionpay, andyay ityay emindsray emay ofyay omeonesay Iyay ovelay.2 Omeonesay olestay ymay eciouspray instrumentyay, andyay omedaysay I’llyay etgay ityay ack.3Ibay wantyay otay ebay amousfay, whateveryay ityay akes.4Itay idolizeyay ayay erohay ofyay ethay oldyay alestay andyay easuremay ymay eedsday againstyay atthay erson’s.5Ipay willyay oday anythingyay otay ovepray yselfmay uperiorsay otay ymay atedhay ival.6Iray wouldyay oday anythingyay orfay ethay otheryay embersmay ofyay ymay oldyay oupe.dtray6 Aw1I’llflay oday anythingyay otay winyay amefay andyay enown.2I’mray ayay uckersay orfay ayay ettypray ace.3Afay andalscay eventspray emay omfray everyay oinggay omehay againyay. 
 Atthay indkay ofyay oubletray eemssay otay ollowfay emay around.4Iyay onceyay atirizedsay ayay oblenay whoyay illstay wantsyay ymay eadhay. 
 Ityay wasyay ayay istakemay atthay Iyay willyay ikelylay epeat.5Iray avehay oubletray eepingkay ymay uetray eelingsfay iddenhay. 
 Ymay arpshay onguetay andslay emay inyay oubletray.6 Espiteday ymay estbay effortsyay, Iyay amyay unreliableyay otay ymay iendsfray. Illskay  Oficienciespray:  Animalyay  Andlinghay,  Urvivalsay  Ooltay  Oficienciespray:  Oneyay ypetay ofyay artisan’syay oolstay, ehiclesvay (andlay) Equipmentyay: Ayay etsay ofyay artisan’syay oolstay (oneyay ofyay youryay oicechay), ayay ovelshay, anyay ironyay otpay, ayay etsay ofyay ommoncay othesclay, andyay ayay eltbay ouchpay ontainingcay 10 gpay Efiningday  Eventyay Youyay eviouslypray ursuedpay ayay implesay ofessionpray amongyay ethay easantrypay, erhapspay asyay ayay armerfay, inermay, ervantsay, epherdshay, woodcutteryay, oryay avediggergray. 
 Utbay omethingsay appenedhay atthay etsay youyay onyay ayay ifferentday athpay andyay arkedmay youyay orfay eatergray ingsthay. 
 Oosechay oryay andomlyray etermineday ayay efiningday eventyay atthay arkedmay youyay asyay ayay erohay ofyay ethay eoplepay. Ariantvay  Entertaineryay:  Adiatorglay Ayay adiatorglay isyay asyay uchmay anyay entertaineryay asyay anyyay instrelmay oryay ircuscay erformerpay, ainedtray otay akemay ethay artsyay ofyay ombatcay intoyay ayay ectaclespay ethay owdcray ancay enjoyyay. 
 Isthay indkay ofyay ashyflay ombatcay isyay youryay entertaineryay outineray, oughthay youyay ightmay alsoyay avehay omesay illsskay asyay ayay umblertay oryay actoryay. Usingyay youryay  Ybay  Opularpay  Emandday eaturefay, youyay ancay indfay ayay aceplay otay erformpay inyay anyyay aceplay atthay eaturesfay ombatcay orfay entertainment—perhapsyay ayay adiatorialglay arenayay oryay ecretsay itpay ightingfay ubclay. 
 Youyay ancay eplaceray ethay usicalmay instrumentyay inyay youryay equipmentyay ackagepay withyay anyay inexpensiveyay utbay unusualyay weaponyay, uchsay asyay ayay identtray oryay etnay. Olkfay  Erohay Youyay omecay omfray ayay umblehay ocialsay ankray, utbay youyay areyay estinedday orfay osay uchmay oremay. 
 Alreadyyay ethay eoplepay ofyay youryay omehay illagevay egardray youyay asyay eirthay ampionchay, andyay youryay estinyday allscay youyay otay andstay againstyay ethay yrantstay andyay onstersmay atthay eatenthray ethay ommoncay olkfay everywhereyay. Eaturefay:  Usticray  Ospitalityhay Incesay youyay omecay omfray ethay anksray ofyay ethay ommoncay olkfay, youyay itfay inyay amongyay emthay withyay easeyay. 
 Youyay ancay indfay ayay aceplay otay idehay, estray, oryay ecuperateray amongyay otheryay ommonerscay, unlessyay youyay avehay ownshay yourselfyay otay ebay ayay angerday otay emthay. 
 Eythay willyay ieldshay youyay omfray ethay awlay oryay anyoneyay elseyay earchingsay orfay youyay, oughthay eythay willyay otnay iskray eirthay iveslay orfay youyay. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay Ayay olkfay erohay isyay oneyay ofyay ethay ommoncay eoplepay, orfay etterbay oryay orfay worseyay. 
 Ostmay olkfay eroeshay ooklay onyay eirthay umblehay originsyay asyay ayay irtuevay, otnay ayay ortcomingshay, andyay eirthay omehay ommunitiescay emainray eryvay importantyay otay em.dthay10 Efiningday  Event1Iyay oodstay upyay otay ayay yrant’stay agents.2Iyay avedsay eoplepay uringday ayay aturalnay isaster.3Iday oodstay aloneyay againstyay ayay erribletay onster.4Imay olestay omfray ayay orruptcay erchantmay otay elphay ethay oor.5Ipay edlay ayay ilitiamay otay ightfay offyay anyay invadingyay army.6Iyay okebray intoyay ayay yrant’stay astlecay andyay olestay weaponsyay otay armyay ethay eople.7Ipay ainedtray ethay easantrypay otay useyay armfay implementsyay asyay weaponsyay againstyay ayay yrant’stay oldiers.8Asay ordlay escindedray anyay unpopularyay ecreeday afteryay Iyay edlay ayay ymbolicsay actyay ofyay otectpray againstyay it.9Ayay elestialcay, eyfay, oryay imilarsay eaturecray avegay emay ayay essingblay oryay evealedray ymay ecretsay originyay.10 Ecruitedray intoyay ayay ord’slay armyyay, Iyay oseray otay eadershiplay andyay wasyay ommendedcay orfay ymay eroism.dhay8 Ersonalitypay  ait1ITray udgejay eoplepay ybay eirthay actionsyay, otnay eirthay wordsyay.2 Ifyay omeonesay isyay inyay oubletray, I’myay alwaysyay eadyray otay endlay elphay.3 Whenyay Iyay etsay ymay indmay otay omethingsay, Iyay ollowfay oughthray onay attermay whatyay etsgay inyay ymay way.4Iyay avehay ayay ongstray ensesay ofyay airfay ayplay andyay alwaysyay ytray otay indfay ethay ostmay equitableyay olutionsay otay arguments.5I’myay onfidentcay inyay ymay ownyay abilitiesyay andyay oday whatyay Iyay ancay otay instillyay onfidencecay inyay othersyay.6 Inkingthay isyay orfay otheryay eoplepay. 
Iyay eferpray action.7Iyay isusemay onglay wordsyay inyay anyay attemptyay otay oundsay arter.8Ismay etgay oredbay easilyyay. 
day6 Idealyay1 Espectray. 
 Eoplepay eserveday otay ebay eatedtray withyay ignityday andyay espectray. 
( Oodgay)2 Airnessfay. 
 Onay oneyay ouldshay etgay eferentialpray eatmenttray eforebay ethay awlay, andyay onay oneyay isyay aboveyay ethay awlay. 
( Awfullay)3 Eedomfray. 
 Yrantstay ustmay otnay ebay allowedyay otay oppressyay ethay eoplepay. 
( Aoticchay)4 Ightmay. 
 Ifyay Iyay ecomebay ongstray, Iyay ancay aketay whatyay Iyay wantyay— whatyay Iyay eserveday. 
( Evilyay)5 Inceritysay. 
 Ere’sthay onay oodgay inyay etendingpray otay ebay omethingsay I’myay otnay. 
( Eutralnay)6 Estinyday. 
 Othingnay andyay onay oneyay ancay eerstay emay awayyay omfray ymay igherhay allingcay. 
( Any)dyay6 ond1IBay avehay ayay amilyfay, utbay Iyay avehay onay ideayay whereyay eythay areyay. 
 Oneyay ayday, Iyay opehay otay eesay emthay again.2Iyay workedyay ethay andlay, Iyay ovelay ethay andlay, andyay Iyay willyay otectpray ethay and.3Alay oudpray oblenay onceyay avegay emay ayay orriblehay eatingbay, andyay Iyay willyay aketay ymay evengeray onyay anyyay ullybay Iyay encounteryay.4 Ymay oolstay areyay ymbolssay ofyay ymay astpay ifelay, andyay Iyay arrycay emthay osay atthay Iyay willyay evernay orgetfay ymay oots.5Iray otectpray osethay whoyay annotcay otectpray emselves.6Ithay wishyay ymay ildhoodchay weetheartsay adhay omecay withyay emay otay ursuepay ymay estinyday. Uildgay  Artisanyay Youyay areyay ayay embermay ofyay anyay artisan’syay uildgay, illedskay inyay ayay articularpay ieldfay andyay oselyclay associatedyay withyay otheryay artisansyay. 
 Youyay areyay ayay well-establishedyay artpay ofyay ethay ercantilemay worldyay, eedfray ybay alenttay andyay wealthyay omfray ethay onstraintscay ofyay ayay eudalfay ocialsay orderyay. 
 Youyay earnedlay youryay illsskay asyay anyay apprenticeyay otay ayay astermay artisanyay, underyay ethay onsorshipspay ofyay youryay uildgay, untilyay youyay ecamebay ayay astermay inyay youryay ownyay ightray. Illskay  Oficienciespray:  Insightyay,  Ersuasionpay  Ooltay  Oficienciespray:  Oneyay ypetay ofyay artisan’syay oolstay  Anguageslay:  Oneyay ofyay youryay oicechay Equipmentyay: Ayay etsay ofyay artisan’syay oolstay (oneyay ofyay youryay oicechay), ayay etterlay ofyay introductionyay omfray youryay uildgay, ayay etsay ofyay aveler’stray othesclay, andyay ayay eltbay ouchpay ontainingcay 15 gpay Uildgay  Usinessbay Uildsgay areyay enerallygay oundfay inyay itiescay argelay enoughyay otay upportsay everalsay artisansyay acticingpray ethay amesay adetray. 
 Oweverhay, youryay uildgay ightmay insteadyay ebay ayay ooselay etworknay ofyay artisansyay whoyay eachyay workyay inyay ayay ifferentday illagevay withinyay ayay argerlay ealmray. 
 Workyay withyay youryay DMay otay etermineday ethay aturenay ofyay youryay uildgay. 
 Asyay ayay embermay ofyay youryay uildgay, youyay owknay ethay illsskay eedednay otay eatecray inishedfay itemsyay omfray awray aterialsmay (eflectedray inyay youryay oficiencypray withyay ayay ertaincay indkay ofyay artisan’syay oolstay), asyay wellyay asyay ethay inciplespray ofyay adetray andyay oodgay usinessbay acticespray. 
 Ethay questionyay ownay isyay whetheryay youyay abandonyay youryay adetray orfay adventureyay, oryay aketay onyay ethay extrayay effortyay otay weaveyay adventuringyay andyay adetray ogethertay. Eaturefay:  Uildgay  Embershipmay  Asyay anyay establishedyay andyay espectedray embermay ofyay ayay uildgay, youyay ancay elyray onyay ertaincay enefitsbay atthay embershipmay ovidespray. 
 Youryay ellowfay uildgay embersmay willyay ovidepray youyay withyay odginglay andyay oodfay ifyay ecessarynay, andyay aypay orfay youryay uneralfay ifyay eedednay. 
 Inyay omesay itiescay andyay ownstay, ayay uildhallgay offersyay ayay entralcay aceplay otay eetmay otheryay embersmay ofyay youryay ofessionpray, whichyay ancay ebay ayay oodgay aceplay otay eetmay otentialpay atronspay, alliesyay, oryay irelingshay. Uildsgay oftenyay wieldyay emendoustray oliticalpay owerpay. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay accusedyay ofyay ayay imecray, youryay uildgay willyay upportsay youyay ifyay ayay oodgay asecay ancay ebay ademay orfay youryay innocenceyay oryay ethay imecray isyay ustifiablejay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay aingay accessyay otay owerfulpay oliticalpay iguresfay oughthray ethay uildgay, ifyay youyay areyay ayay embermay inyay oodgay andingstay. 
 Uchsay onnectionscay ightmay equireray ethay onationday ofyay oneymay oryay agicmay itemsyay otay ethay uild’sgay offerscay. Youyay ustmay aypay uesday ofyay 5 gpay erpay onthmay otay ethay uildgay. 
 Ifyay youyay issmay aymentspay, youyay ustmay akemay upyay ackbay uesday otay emainray inyay ethay uild’sgay oodgay acesgray. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay Uildgay artisansyay areyay amongyay ethay ostmay ordinaryyay eoplepay inyay ethay world—untilyay eythay etsay ownday eirthay oolstay andyay aketay upyay anyay adventuringyay areercay. 
 Eythay understandyay ethay aluevay ofyay  ardhay workyay andyay ethay importanceyay ofyay ommunitycay, utbay ey’rethay ulnerablevay otay inssay ofyay eedgray andyay ovetousnesscay. Ariantvay  Uildgay  Artisanyay:  Uildgay  Erchantmay  Insteadyay ofyay anyay artisansyay’ uildgay, youyay ightmay elongbay otay ayay uildgay ofyay aderstray, aravancay astersmay, oryay opkeepersshay. 
 Youyay on’tday aftcray itemsyay yourselfyay utbay earnyay ayay ivinglay ybay uyingbay andyay ellingsay ethay worksyay ofyay othersyay (oryay ethay awray aterialsmay artisansyay eednay otay acticepray eirthay aftcray). 
 Youryay uildgay ightmay ebay ayay argelay erchantmay onsortiumcay (oryay amilyfay) withyay interestsyay acrossyay ethay egionray. 
 Erhapspay youyay ansportedtray oodsgay omfray oneyay aceplay otay anotheryay, ybay ipshay, wagonyay, oryay aravancay, oryay oughtbay emthay omfray avelingtray aderstray andyay oldsay emthay inyay youryay ownyay ittlelay opshay. 
 Inyay omesay waysyay, ethay avelingtray erchant’smay ifelay endslay itselfyay otay adventureyay arfay oremay anthay ethay ifelay ofyay anyay artisanyay. Atherray anthay oficiencypray withyay artisan’syay oolstay, youyay ightmay ebay oficientpray withyay avigator’snay oolstay oryay anyay additionalyay anguagelay. 
 Andyay insteadyay ofyay artisan’syay oolstay, youyay ancay artstay withyay ayay ulemay andyay ayay art.dcay8 Ersonalitypay  ait1ITray elievebay atthay anythingyay worthyay oingday isyay worthyay oingday ightray. 
Iyay an’tcay elphay it—I’myay ayay erfectionist.2I’mpay ayay obsnay whoyay ookslay ownday onyay osethay whoyay an’tcay appreciateyay inefay art.3Iyay alwaysyay wantyay otay owknay owhay ingsthay workyay andyay whatyay akesmay eoplepay ick.4I’mtay ullfay ofyay wittyyay aphorismsyay andyay avehay ayay overbpray orfay everyyay occasion.5I’myay uderay otay eoplepay whoyay acklay ymay ommitmentcay otay ardhay workyay andyay airfay ay.6Iplay ikelay otay alktay atyay engthlay aboutyay ymay ofession.7Ipray on’tday artpay withyay ymay oneymay easilyyay andyay willyay agglehay irelesslytay otay etgay ethay estbay ealday ossible.8I’mpay wellyay ownknay orfay ymay workyay, andyay Iyay wantyay otay akemay uresay everyoneyay appreciatesyay ityay. 
I'myay alwaysyay akentay abackyay whenyay eoplepay aven’thay eardhay ofyay e.dmay6 Idealyay1 Ommunitycay. 
 Ityay isyay ethay utyday ofyay allyay ivilizedcay eoplepay otay engthenstray ethay ondsbay ofyay ommunitycay andyay ethay ecuritysay ofyay ivilizationcay. 
( Awfullay)2 Enerositygay. 
 Ymay alentstay wereyay ivengay otay emay osay atthay Iyay ouldcay useyay emthay otay enefitbay ethay worldyay. 
( Oodgay)3 Eedomfray. 
 Everyoneyay ouldshay ebay eefray otay ursuepay ishay oryay erhay ownyay ivelihoodlay. 
( Aoticchay)4 Eedgray. 
I’myay onlyyay inyay ityay orfay ethay oneymay. 
( Evilyay)5 Eoplepay. 
I’myay ommittedcay otay ethay eoplepay Iyay arecay aboutyay, otnay otay idealsyay. 
( Eutralnay)6 Aspirationyay. 
Iyay workyay ardhay otay ebay ethay estbay erethay isyay atyay ymay aft.dcray6 Ondbay1 Ethay workshopyay whereyay Iyay earnedlay ymay adetray isyay ethay ostmay importantyay aceplay inyay ethay worldyay otay e.2Imay eatedcray ayay eatgray workyay orfay omeonesay, andyay enthay oundfay emthay unworthyyay otay eceiveray ityay. 
I’myay illstay ookinglay orfay omeonesay worthy.3Iyay oweyay ymay uildgay ayay eatgray ebtday orfay orgingfay emay intoyay ethay ersonpay Iyay amyay oday.4Itay ursuepay wealthyay otay ecuresay omeone’ssay ovelay.5 Oneyay ayday Iyay willyay eturnray otay ymay uildgay andyay ovepray atthay Iyay amyay ethay eatestgray artisanyay ofyay emthay all.6Iyay willyay etgay evengeray onyay ethay evilyay orcesfay atthay estroyedday ymay aceplay ofyay usinessbay andyay uinedray ymay ivelihood.dlay6 Aw1I’llflay oday anythingyay otay etgay ymay andshay onyay omethingsay areray oryay iceless.2I’mpray quickyay otay assumeyay atthay omeonesay isyay yingtray otay eatchay emay.3 Onay oneyay ustmay everyay earnlay atthay Iyay onceyay olestay oneymay omfray uildgay offers.4I’mcay evernay atisfiedsay withyay whatyay Iyay ave—Ihay alwaysyay wantyay ore.5Imay wouldyay illkay otay acquireyay ayay oblenay itle.6I’mtay orriblyhay ealousjay ofyay anyoneyay whoyay ancay outshineyay ymay andiworkhay. 
 Ermithay Youyay ivedlay inyay eclusion—eithersay inyay ayay elteredshay ommunitycay uchsay asyay ayay onasterymay, oryay entirelyyay alone—foryay ayay ormativefay artpay ofyay youryay ifelay. 
 Inyay youryay imetay apartyay omfray ethay amorclay ofyay ocietysay, youyay oundfay quietyay, olitudesay, andyay erhapspay omesay ofyay ethay answersyay youyay wereyay ookinglay orfay. Illskay  Oficienciespray:  Edicinemay,  Eligionray  Ooltay  Oficienciespray:  Erbalismhay itkay  Anguageslay:  Oneyay ofyay youryay oicechay Equipmentyay: Ayay ollscray asecay uffedstay ullfay ofyay otesnay omfray youryay udiesstay oryay ayerspray, ayay winteryay anketblay, ayay etsay ofyay ommoncay othesclay, anyay erbalismhay itkay, andyay 5 gpay Ifelay ofyay  Eclusionsay Whatyay wasyay ethay easonray orfay youryay isolationyay, andyay whatyay angedchay otay allowyay youyay otay endyay youryay olitudesay?  Youyay ancay workyay withyay youryay DMay otay etermineday ethay exactyay aturenay ofyay youryay eclusionsay, oryay youyay ancay oosechay oryay ollray onyay ethay abletay elowbay otay etermineday ethay easonray ehindbay youryay eclusionsay. Eaturefay:  Iscoveryday Ethay quietyay eclusionsay ofyay youryay extendedyay ermitagehay avegay youyay accessyay otay ayay uniqueyay andyay owerfulpay iscoveryday. 
 Ethay exactyay aturenay ofyay isthay evelationray ependsday onyay ethay aturenay ofyay youryay eclusionsay. 
 Ityay ightmay ebay ayay eatgray uthtray aboutyay ethay osmoscay, ethay eitiesday, ethay owerfulpay eingsbay ofyay ethay outeryay anesplay, oryay ethay orcesfay ofyay aturenay. 
 Ityay ouldcay ebay ayay itesay atthay onay oneyay elseyay ashay everyay eensay. 
 Youyay ightmay avehay uncoveredyay ayay actfay atthay ashay onglay eenbay orgottenfay, oryay unearthedyay omesay elicray ofyay ethay astpay atthay ouldcay ewriteray istoryhay. 
 Ityay ightmay ebay informationyay atthay wouldyay ebay amagingday otay ethay eoplepay whoyay oryay onsignedcay youyay otay exileyay, andyay encehay ethay easonray orfay youryay eturnray otay ocietysay. Workyay withyay youryay DMay otay etermineday ethay etailsday ofyay youryay iscoveryday andyay itsyay impactyay onyay ethay ampaigncay. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay Omesay ermitshay areyay wellyay uitedsay otay ayay ifelay ofyay eclusionsay, whereasyay othersyay afechay againstyay ityay andyay onglay orfay ompanycay. 
 Whetheryay eythay embraceyay olitudesay oryay onglay otay escapeyay ityay, ethay olitarysay ifelay apesshay eirthay attitudesyay andyay idealsyay. 
Ayay ewfay areyay ivendray ightlyslay admay ybay eirthay yearsyay apartyay omfray ociety.dsay8 Ifelay ofyay  eclusion1ISay wasyay earchingsay orfay iritualspay enlightenment.2Iyay wasyay artakingpay ofyay ommunalcay ivinglay inyay accordanceyay withyay ethay ictatesday ofyay ayay eligiousray order.3Iyay wasyay exiledyay orfay ayay imecray Iyay idn’tday ommit.4Icay etreatedray omfray ocietysay afteryay ayay ife-alteringlay event.dyay8 Ifelay ofyay  eclusion5ISay eedednay ayay quietyay aceplay otay workyay onyay ymay artyay, iteraturelay, usicmay, oryay anifesto.6Imay eedednay otay ommunecay withyay aturenay, arfay omfray ivilization.7Icay wasyay ethay aretakercay ofyay anyay ancientyay uinray oryay elic.8Iray wasyay ayay ilgrimpay inyay earchsay ofyay ayay ersonpay, aceplay, oryay elicray ofyay iritualspay ignificance.dsay8 Ersonalitypay  Ait1I’vetray eenbay isolatedyay orfay osay onglay atthay Iyay arelyray eakspay, eferringpray esturesgay andyay ethay occasionalyay unt.2Igray amyay utterlyyay erenesay, evenyay inyay ethay acefay ofyay isasterday.3 Ethay eaderlay ofyay ymay ommunitycay adhay omethingsay wiseyay otay aysay onyay everyyay opictay, andyay Iyay amyay eageryay otay areshay atthay wisdom.4Iyay eelfay emendoustray empathyyay orfay allyay whoyay uffer.5I’msay obliviousyay otay etiquetteyay andyay ocialsay expectations.6Iyay onnectcay everythingyay atthay appenshay otay emay otay ayay andgray, osmiccay an.7Iplay oftenyay etgay ostlay inyay ymay ownyay oughtsthay andyay ontemplationcay, ecomingbay obliviousyay otay ymay urroundings.8Isay amyay workingyay onyay ayay andgray ilosophicalphay eorythay andyay ovelay aringshay ymay ideas.dyay6 Idealyay1 Eatergray  Oodgay. 
 Ymay iftsgay areyay eantmay otay ebay aredshay withyay allyay, otnay usedyay orfay ymay ownyay enefitbay. 
( Oodgay)2 Ogiclay. 
 Emotionsyay ustmay otnay oudclay ouryay ensesay ofyay whatyay isyay ightray andyay uetray, oryay ouryay ogicallay inkingthay. 
( Awfullay)3 Eefray  Inkingthay. 
 Inquiryyay andyay uriositycay areyay ethay illarspay ofyay ogresspray. 
( Aoticchay)4 Owerpay. 
 Olitudesay andyay ontemplationcay areyay athspay owardtay ysticalmay oryay agicalmay owerpay. 
( Evilyay)5 Ivelay andyay  Etlay  Ivelay. 
 Eddlingmay inyay ethay affairsyay ofyay othersyay onlyyay ausescay oubletray. 
( Eutralnay)6 Elfsay- Owledgeknay. 
 Ifyay youyay owknay yourselfyay, ere’sthay othingnay eftlay otay owknay. 
 Otheryay  Ermitshay Isthay ermithay ackgroundbay assumesyay ayay ontemplativecay ortsay ofyay eclusionsay atthay allowsyay oomray orfay udystay andyay ayerpray. 
 Ifyay youyay wantyay otay ayplay ayay uggedray wildernessyay ecluseray whoyay iveslay offyay ethay andlay whileyay unningshay ethay ompanycay ofyay otheryay eoplepay, ooklay atyay ethay outlanderyay ackgroundbay. 
 Onyay ethay otheryay andhay, ifyay youyay wantyay otay ogay inyay ayay oremay eligiousray irectionday, ethay acolyteyay ightmay ebay whatyay you’reyay ookinglay orfay. 
 Oryay youyay ouldcay evenyay ebay ayay arlatanchay, osingpay asyay ayay wiseyay andyay olyhay ersonpay andyay ettinglay iouspay oolsfay upportsay youyay. Oblenay Youyay understandyay wealthyay, owerpay, andyay ivilegepray. 
 Youyay arrycay ayay oblenay itletay, andyay youryay amilyfay ownsyay andlay, ollectscay axestay, andyay wieldsyay ignificantsay oliticalpay influenceyay. 
 Youyay ightmay ebay ayay amperedpay aristocratyay unfamiliaryay withyay workyay oryay iscomfortday, ayay ormerfay erchantmay ustjay elevatedyay otay ethay obilitynay, oryay ayay isinheritedday oundrelscay withyay ayay isproportionateday ensesay ofyay entitlementyay. 
 Oryay youyay ouldcay ebay anyay onesthay, ard-workinghay andownerlay whoyay arescay eeplyday aboutyay ethay eoplepay whoyay ivelay andyay workyay onyay youryay andlay, eenlykay awareyay ofyay youryay esponsibilityray otay emthay. Workyay withyay youryay DMay otay omecay upyay withyay anyay appropriateyay itletay andyay etermineday owhay uchmay authorityyay atthay itletay arriescay. 
Ayay oblenay itletay oesn’tday andstay onyay itsyay own—it’syay onnectedcay otay anyay entireyay amilyfay, andyay whateveryay itletay youyay oldhay, youyay willyay asspay ityay ownday otay youryay ownyay ildrenchay. 
 Otnay onlyyay oday youyay eednay otay etermineday youryay oblenay itletay, utbay youyay ouldshay alsoyay workyay withyay ethay DMay otay escribeday youryay amilyfay andyay eirthay influenceyay onyay youyay. Isyay youryay amilyfay oldyay andyay establishedyay, oryay wasyay youryay itletay onlyyay ecentlyray estowedbay?  Owhay uchmay influenceyay oday eythay wieldyay, andyay overyay whatyay areayay?  Whatyay indkay ofyay eputationdoesray youryay amilyfay avehay amongyay ethay otheryay aristocratsyay ofyay ethay egionray?  Owhay oday ethay ommoncay eoplepay egardray emthay? What’syay youryay ositionpay inyay ethay amilyfay?  Areyay youyay ethay eirhay otay ethay eadhay ofyay ethay amilyfay?  Avehay youyay alreadyyay inheritedyay ethay itletay?  Owhay oday youyay eelfay aboutyay atthay esponsibilityray?  Oryay areyay youyay osay arfay ownday ethay inelay ofyay inheritanceyay atthay onay oneyay arescay whatyay youyay oday, asyay onglay asyay youyay on’tday embarrassyay ethay amilyfay?  Owhay oesday ethay eadhay ofyay youryay amilyfay eelfay aboutyay youryay adventuringyay areercay?  Areyay youyay inyay youryay amily’sfay oodgay acesgray, oryay unnedshay ybay ethay estray ofyay youryay amilyfay? Oesday youryay amilyfay avehay ayay oatcay ofyay armsyay?  Anyay insigniayay youyay ightmay wearyay onyay ayay ignetsay ingray?  Articularpay olorscay youyay wearyay allyay ethay imetay?  Anyay animalyay youyay egardray asyay ayay ymbolsay ofyay youryay inelay oryay evenyay ayay iritualspay embermay ofyay ethay amilyfay? Esethay etailsday elphay establishyay youryay amilyfay andyay youryay itletay asyay eaturesfay ofyay ethay worldyay ofyay ethay ampaigncay. Illskay  Oficienciespray:  Istoryhay,  Ersuasionpay  Ooltay  Oficienciespray:  Oneyay ypetay ofyay aminggay etsay  Anguageslay:  Oneyay ofyay youryay oicechay Equipmentyay: Ayay etsay ofyay inefay othesclay, ayay ignetsay ingray, ayay ollscray ofyay edigreepay, andyay ayay ursepay ontainingcay 25 gpay Eaturefay:  Ositionpay ofyay  Ivilegepray Anksthay otay youryay oblenay irthbay, eoplepay areyay inclinedyay otay inkthay ethay estbay ofyay youyay. 
 Youyay areyay welcomeyay inyay ighhay ocietysay, andyay eoplepay assumeyay youyay avehay ethay ightray otay ebay whereveryay youyay areyay. 
 Ethay ommoncay olkfay akemay everyyay effortyay otay accommodateyay youyay andyay avoidyay youryay ispleasureday, andyay otheryay eoplepay ofyay ighhay irthbay eattray youyay asyay ayay embermay ofyay ethay amesay ocialsay eresphay. 
 Youyay ancay ecuresay anyay audienceyay withyay ayay ocallay oblenay ifyay youyay eednay otay. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay Oblesnay areyay ornbay andyay aisedray otay ayay eryvay ifferentday ifestylelay anthay ostmay eoplepay everyay experienceyay, andyay eirthay ersonalitiespay eflectray atthay upbringingyay. 
Ayay oblenay itletay omescay withyay ayay ethoraplay ofyay onds—responsibilitiesbay otay amilyfay, otay otheryay oblesnay (includingyay ethay overeignsay), otay ethay eoplepay entrustedyay otay ethay amily’sfay arecay, oryay evenyay otay ethay itletay itselfyay. 
 Utbay isthay esponsibilityray isyay oftenyay ayay oodgay wayyay otay undermineyay ayay oble.dnay6 Ondbay1 Othingnay isyay oremay importantyay anthay ethay otheryay embersmay ofyay ymay ermitagehay, orderyay, oryay association.2Iyay enteredyay eclusionsay otay idehay omfray ethay onesyay whoyay ightmay illstay ebay untinghay emay. 
Iyay ustmay omedaysay onfrontcay em.3I’mthay illstay eekingsay ethay enlightenmentyay Iyay ursuedpay inyay ymay eclusionsay, andyay ityay illstay eludesyay e.4Imay enteredyay eclusionsay ecausebay Iyay ovedlay omeonesay Iyay ouldcay otnay avehay.5 Ouldshay ymay iscoveryday omecay otay ightlay, ityay ouldcay ingbray uinray otay ethay worldyay.6 Ymay isolationyay avegay emay eatgray insightyay intoyay ayay eatgray evilyay atthay onlyyay Iyay ancay estroy.dday6 Awflay1 Ownay atthay I'veyay eturnedray otay ethay worldyay, Iyay enjoyyay itsyay elightsday ayay ittlelay ootay uch.2Imay arborhay arkday, oodthirstyblay oughtsthay atthay ymay isolationyay andyay editationmay ailedfay otay quell.3Iyay amyay ogmaticday inyay ymay oughtsthay andyay ilosophy.4Iphay etlay ymay eednay otay winyay argumentsyay overshadowyay iendshipsfray andyay armony.5I’dhay iskray ootay uchmay otay uncoveryay ayay ostlay itbay ofyay owledge.6Iknay ikelay eepingkay ecretssay andyay won’tyay areshay emthay withyay anyone.dyay8 Ersonalitypay  Aittray1 Ymay eloquentyay atteryflay akesmay everyoneyay Iyay alktay otay eelfay ikelay ethay ostmay wonderfulyay andyay importantyay ersonpay inyay ethay worldyay.2 Ethay ommoncay olkfay ovelay emay orfay ymay indnesskay andyay enerositygay.3 Onay oneyay ouldcay oubtday ybay ookinglay atyay ymay egalray earingbay atthay Iyay amyay ayay utcay aboveyay ethay unwashedyay asses.4Imay aketay eatgray ainspay otay alwaysyay ooklay ymay estbay andyay ollowfay ethay atestlay ashions.5Ifay on’tday ikelay otay etgay ymay andshay irtyday, andyay Iyay won’tyay ebay aughtcay eadday inyay unsuitableyay accommodationsyay.6 Espiteday ymay oblenay irthbay, Iyay oday otnay aceplay yselfmay aboveyay otheryay olkfay. 
 Ariantvay  Oblenay:  Ightknay Ayay ighthoodknay isyay amongyay ethay owestlay oblenay itlestay inyay ostmay ocietiessay, utbay ityay ancay ebay ayay athpay otay igherhay atusstay. 
 Ifyay youyay wishyay otay ebay ayay ightknay, oosechay ethay  Etainersray eaturefay (eesay ethay idebarsay) insteadyay ofyay ethay  Ositionpay ofyay  Ivilegepray eaturefay. 
 Oneyay ofyay youryay ommonercay etainersray isyay eplacedray ybay ayay oblenay whoyay ervessay asyay youryay quiresay, aidingyay youyay inyay exchangeyay orfay  Ariantvay  Eaturefay:  Etainersray Ifyay youryay aracterchay ashay ayay oblenay ackgroundbay, youyay aymay electsay isthay ackgroundbay eaturefay insteadyay ofyay  Ositionpay ofyay  Ivilegepray. Youyay avehay ethay ervicesay ofyay eethray etainersray oyallay otay youryay amilyfay.
