 Esethay etainersray ancay ebay attendantsyay oryay essengersmay, andyay oneyay ightmay ebay ayay ajordomomay. 
 Youryay etainersray areyay ommonerscay whoyay ancay erformpay undanemay askstay orfay youyay, utbay eythay oday otnay ightfay orfay youyay, willyay otnay ollowfay youyay intoyay obviouslyyay angerousday areasyay (uchsay asyay ungeonsday), andyay willyay eavelay ifyay eythay areyay equentlyfray endangeredyay oryay abused.trainingyay onyay ishay oryay erhay ownyay athpay otay ighthoodknay. 
 Youryay wotay emainingray etainersray ightmay includeyay ayay oomgray otay arecay orfay youryay orsehay andyay ayay ervantsay whoyay olishespay youryay armoryay (andyay evenyay elpshay youyay utpay ityay onyay). Asyay anyay emblemyay ofyay ivalrychay andyay ethay idealsyay ofyay ourtlycay ovelay, youyay ightmay includeyay amongyay youryay equipmentyay ayay annerbay oryay otheryay okentay omfray ayay oblenay ordlay oryay adylay otay whomyay youyay avehay ivengay youryay eart—inhay ayay astechay ortsay ofyay evotionday.( Isthay ersonpay ouldcay ebay youryay ond.)OUTLANDERbay Youyay ewgray upyay inyay ethay wildsyay, arfay omfray ivilizationcay andyay ethay omfortscay ofyay owntay andyay echnologytay. 
 You’veyay witnessedyay ethay igrationmay ofyay erdshay argerlay anthay orestsfay, urvivedsay weatheryay oremay extremeyay anthay anyyay ity-dwellercay ouldcay omprehendcay, andyay enjoyedyay ethay olitudesay ofyay eingbay ethay onlyyay inkingthay eaturecray orfay ilesmay inyay anyyay irectionday. 
 Ethay wildsyay areyay inyay youryay oodblay, whetheryay youyay wereyay ayay omadnay, anyay exploreryay, ayay ecluseray, ayay unter-gathererhay, oryay evenyay ayay araudermay. 
 Evenyay inyay acesplay whereyay youyay on’tday owknay ethay ecificspay eaturesfay ofyay ethay erraintay, youyay owknay ethay waysyay ofyay ethay wildyay. Illskay  Oficienciespray:  Athleticsyay,  Urvivalsay  Ooltay  Oficienciespray:  Oneyay ypetay ofyay usicalmay instrumentyay  Anguageslay:  Oneyay ofyay youryay oicechay  Equipmentyay: Ayay affstay, ayay untinghay aptray, ayay ophytray omfray anyay animalyay youyay illedkay, ayay etsay ofyay aveler’stray othesclay, andyay ayay eltbay ouchpay ontainingcay 10 gpay Originyay You'veyay eenbay otay angestray acesplay andyay eensay ingsthay atthay othersyay annotcay eginbay otay athomfay. 
 Onsidercay omesay ofyay ethay istantday andslay youyay avehay isitedvay, andyay owhay eythay impactedyay youyay. 
 Youyay ancay ollray onyay ethay ollowingfay abletay otay etermineday youryay occupationyay uringday youryay imetay inyay ethay wildyay, oryay oosechay oneyay atthay estbay itsfay youryay aracter.dchay10 Origindyay10 Originyay1 Oresterfay6 Ountybay unterhay2 Appertray7 Ilgrimpay3 Omesteaderhay8 Ibaltray omadnay4 Uidegay9 Unter-gathererhay5 Exileyay oryay outcastyay10 Ibaltray araudermay Eaturefay:  Wandereryay Youyay avehay anyay excellentyay emorymay orfay apsmay andyay eographygay, andyay youyay ancay alwaysyay ecallray ethay eneralgay ayoutlay ofyay erraintay, ettlementssay, andyay otheryay eaturesfay aroundyay youyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, youyay ancay indfay oodfay andyay eshfray wateryay orfay yourselfyay andyay upyay otay ivefay otheryay eoplepay eachyay ayday, ovidedpray atthay ethay andlay offersyay erriesbay, allsmay amegay, wateryay, andyay osay orthfay. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay Oftenyay onsideredcay uderay andyay uncouthyay amongyay ivilizedcay olkfay, outlandersyay avehay ittlelay espectray orfay ethay icetiesnay ofyay ifelay inyay ethay itiescay. 
 Ethay iestay ofyay ibetray, anclay, amilyfay, andyay ethay aturalnay worldyay ofyay whichyay eythay areyay ayay artpay areyay ethay ostmay importantyay ondsbay otay ostmay outlanders.dyay6 Idealyay1 Espectray. 
 Espectray isyay ueday otay emay ecausebay ofyay ymay ositionpay, utbay allyay eoplepay egardlessray ofyay ationstay eserveday otay ebay eatedtray withyay ignityday. 
( Oodgay)2 Esponsibilityray. 
 Ityay isyay ymay utyday otay espectray ethay authorityyay ofyay osethay aboveyay emay, ustjay asyay osethay elowbay emay ustmay espectray inemay. 
( Awfullay)3 Independenceyay. 
Iyay ustmay ovepray atthay Iyay ancay andlehay yselfmay withoutyay ethay oddlingcay ofyay ymay amilyfay. 
( Aoticchay)4 Owerpay. 
 Ifyay Iyay ancay attainyay oremay owerpay, onay oneyay willyay elltay emay whatyay otay oday. 
( Evilyay)5 Amilyfay. 
 Oodblay unsray ickerthay anthay wateryay. 
( Anyyay)6 Oblenay  Obligationyay. 
 Ityay isyay ymay utyday otay otectpray andyay arecay orfay ethay eoplepay eneathbay emay. 
day8 Ersonalitypay  Ait1I’mtray ivendray ybay ayay wanderlustyay atthay edlay emay awayyay omfray ome.2Ihay watchyay overyay ymay iendsfray asyay ifyay eythay wereyay ayay itterlay ofyay ewbornnay ups.3Ipay onceyay anray wenty-fivetay ilesmay withoutyay oppingstay otay warnyay otay ymay anclay ofyay anyay approachingyay orcyay ordehay. 
I’dyay oday ityay againyay ifyay Iyay adhay o.4Itay avehay ayay essonlay orfay everyyay ituationsay, awndray omfray observingyay ature.5Inay aceplay onay ockstay inyay wealthyyay oryay well-manneredyay olkfay. 
 Oneymay andyay annersmay won’tyay avesay youyay omfray ayay ungryhay owlbear.6I’myay alwaysyay ickingpay ingsthay upyay, absentlyyay iddlingfay withyay emthay, andyay ometimessay accidentallyyay eakingbray em.7Ithay eelfay arfay oremay omfortablecay aroundyay animalsyay anthay eople.8Ipay wasyay, inyay actfay, aisedray ybay wolves.dyay6 Idealyay1 Angechay. 
 Ifelay isyay ikelay ethay easonssay, inyay onstantcay angechay, andyay weyay ustmay angechay withyay ityay. 
( Aoticchay)2 Eatergray  Oodgay. 
 Ityay isyay eachyay erson’spay esponsibilityray otay akemay ethay ostmay appinesshay orfay ethay wholeyay ibetray. 
( Oodgay)3 Onorhay. 
 Ifyay Iyay ishonorday yselfmay, Iyay ishonorday ymay wholeyay anclay. 
( Awfullay)4 Ightmay. 
 Ethay ongeststray areyay eantmay otay uleray. 
( Evilyay)5 Aturenay. 
 Ethay aturalnay worldyay isyay oremay importantyay anthay allyay ethay onstructscay ofyay ivilizationcay. 
( Eutralnay)6 Oryglay. 
Iyay ustmay earnyay oryglay inyay attlebay, orfay yselfmay andyay ymay anclay. 
( Any)dyay6 Ondbay1 Ymay amilyfay, anclay, oryay ibetray isyay ethay ostmay importantyay ingthay inyay ymay ifelay, evenyay whenyay eythay areyay arfay omfray emay.2 Anyay injuryyay otay ethay unspoiledyay wildernessyay ofyay ymay omehay isyay anyay injuryyay otay e.3Imay willyay ingbray erribletay wrathyay ownday onyay ethay evildoersyay whoyay estroyedday ymay omeland.4Ihay amyay ethay astlay ofyay ymay ibetray, andyay ityay isyay upyay otay emay otay ensureyay eirthay amesnay enteryay egend.5Ilay uffersay awfulyay isionsvay ofyay ayay omingcay isasterday andyay willyay oday anythingyay otay eventpray ityay.6 Ityay isyay ymay utyday otay ovidepray ildrenchay otay ustainsay ymay ibe.dtray6 aw1IFlay amyay ootay enamoredyay ofyay aleyay, wineyay, andyay otheryay intoxicantsyay.2 Ere’sthay onay oomray orfay autioncay inyay ayay ifelay ivedlay otay ethay ullest.3Ifay ememberray everyyay insultyay I’veyay eceivedray andyay ursenay ayay ilentsay esentmentray owardtay anyoneyay who’syay everyay wrongedyay e.4Imay amyay owslay otay usttray embersmay ofyay otheryay acesray, ibestray, andyay ocietiessay.5 Iolencevay isyay ymay answeryay otay almostyay anyyay allengechay.6 On’tday expectyay emay otay avesay osethay whoyay an’tcay avesay emselvesthay. 
 Ityay isyay ature’snay wayyay atthay ethay ongstray ivethray andyay ethay weakyay erishpay. Agesay Youyay entspay yearsyay earninglay ethay orelay ofyay ethay ultiversemay. 
 Youyay ouredscay anuscriptsmay, udiedstay ollsscray, andyay istenedlay otay ethay eatestgray expertsyay onyay ethay ubjectssay atthay interestyay youyay. 
 Eaturefay:  Esearcherray Whenyay youyay attemptyay otay earnlay oryay ecallray ayay iecepay ofyay orelay, ifyay youyay oday otnay owknay atthay informationyay, youyay oftenyay owknay whereyay andyay omfray whomyay youyay ancay obtainyay ityay. 
 Usuallyyay, isthay informationyay omescay omfray ayay ibrarylay, iptoriumscray, universityyay, oryay ayay agesay oryay otheryay earnedlay ersonpay oryay eaturecray. 
 Youryay DMay ightmay uleray atthay ethay owledgeknay youyay eeksay isyay ecretedsay awayyay inyay anyay almostyay inaccessibleyay aceplay, oryay atthay ityay implysay annotcay ebay oundfay. 
 Unearthingyay ethay eepestday ecretssay ofyay ethay ultiversemay ancay equireray anyay adventureyay oryay evenyay ayay wholeyay ampaigncay. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay Agessay areyay efinedday ybay eirthay extensiveyay udiesstay, andyay eirthay aracteristicschay eflectray isthay ifelay ofyay udystay. 
 Evotedday otay olarlyschay ursuitspay, ayay agesay aluesvay owledgeknay ighlyhay— ometimessay inyay itsyay ownyay ightray, ometimessay asyay ayay eansmay owardtay otheryay ideals.dyay8 Ersonalitypay  ait1ITray useyay olysyllabicpay wordsyay atthay onveycay ethay impressionyay ofyay eatgray erudition.2I'veyay eadray everyyay ookbay inyay ethay world’syay eatestgray ibrarieslay— oryay Iyay ikelay otay oastbay atthay Iyay ave.3I'mhay usedyay otay elpinghay outyay osethay whoyay aren’tyay asyay artsmay asyay Iyay amyay, andyay Iyay atientlypay explainyay anythingyay andyay everythingyay otay othersyay.4 Ere’sthay othingnay Iyay ikelay oremay anthay ayay oodgay ystery.5I’mmay willingyay otay istenlay otay everyyay idesay ofyay anyay argumentyay eforebay Iyay akemay ymay ownyay udgment.6Ijay .

otay e.7Imay amyay orriblyhay, orriblyhay awkwardyay inyay ocialsay ituations.8I’msay onvincedcay atthay eoplepay areyay alwaysyay yingtray otay ealstay ymay ecrets.dsay6 Idealyay1 Owledgeknay. 
 Ethay athpay otay owerpay andyay elf-improvementsay isyay oughthray owledgeknay. 
( Eutralnay)2 Eautybay. 
 Whatyay isyay eautifulbay ointspay usyay eyondbay itselfyay owardtay whatyay isyay uetray. 
( Oodgay)3 Ogiclay. 
 Emotionsyay ustmay otnay oudclay ouryay ogicallay inkingthay. 
( Awfullay)4 Onay  Imitslay. 
 Othingnay ouldshay etterfay ethay infiniteyay ossibilitypay inherentyay inyay allyay existenceyay. 
( Aoticchay)5 Owerpay. 
 Owledgeknay isyay ethay athpay otay owerpay andyay ominationday. 
( Evilyay)6 Elfsay- Improvementyay. 
 Ethay oalgay ofyay ayay ifelay ofyay udystay isyay ethay ettermentbay ofyay oneselfyay. 
( Any)dyay6 Ondbay1 Ityay isyay ymay utyday otay otectpray ymay udents.2Istay avehay anyay ancientyay exttay atthay oldshay erribletay ecretssay atthay ustmay otnay allfay intoyay ethay wrongyay ands.3Ihay workyay otay eservepray ayay ibrarylay, universityyay, iptoriumscray, oryay onasterymay.4 Ymay ife’slay workyay isyay ayay eriessay ofyay omestay elatedray otay ayay ecificspay ieldfay ofyay ore.5I'velay eenbay earchingsay ymay wholeyay ifelay orfay ethay answeryay otay ayay ertaincay question.6Iyay oldsay ymay oulsay orfay owledgeknay. 
Iyay opehay otay oday eatgray eedsday andyay winyay ityay ack.dbay6 aw1IFlay amyay easilyyay istractedday ybay ethay omisepray ofyay informationyay.2 Ostmay eoplepay eamscray andyay unray whenyay eythay eesay ayay emonday. 
 Ailorsay  Youyay ailedsay onyay ayay eagoingsay esselvay orfay yearsyay. 
 Inyay atthay imetay, youyay acedfay ownday ightymay ormsstay, onstersmay ofyay ethay eepday, andyay osethay whoyay wantedyay otay inksay youryay aftcray otay ethay ottomlessbay epthsday. 
 Youryay irstfay ovelay isyay ethay istantday inelay ofyay ethay orizonhay, utbay ethay imetay ashay omecay otay ytray youryay andhay atyay omethingsay ewnay. Iscussday ethay aturenay ofyay ethay ipshay youyay eviouslypray ailedsay withyay youryay  Ungeonday  Astermay. 
 Wasyay ityay ayay erchantmay ipshay, ayay avalnay esselvay, ayay ipshay ofyay iscoveryday, oryay ayay iratepay ipshay? Owhay amousfay (oryay infamousyay) isyay ityay?  Isyay ityay widelyyay aveledtray? Isyay ityay illstay ailingsay, oryay isyay ityay issingmay andyay esumedpray ostlay withyay allyay andshay? Whatyay wereyay youryay utiesday onyay oard—boatswainbay, aptaincay, avigatornay, ookcay, oryay omesay otheryay ositionpay?  Whoyay wereyay ethay aptaincay andyay irstfay atemay?  Idday youyay eavelay youryay ipshay onyay oodgay ermstay withyay youryay ellowsfay, oryay onyay ethay unray? Illskay  Oficienciespray:  Athleticsyay,  Erceptionpay  Ooltay  Oficienciespray:  Avigator’snay oolstay, ehiclesvay (wateryay)  Equipmentyay: Ayay elayingbay inpay (ubclay), 50 eetfay ofyay ilksay operay, ayay uckylay armchay uchsay asyay ayay abbitray ootfay oryay ayay allsmay onestay withyay ayay olehay inyay ethay entercay (oryay youyay aymay ollray orfay ayay andomray inkettray onyay ethay  Inketstray abletay inyay apterchay 5), ayay etsay ofyay ommoncay othesclay, andyay ayay eltbay ouchpay ontainingcay 10 gpay Eaturefay:  Ip’sshay  Assagepay Whenyay youyay eednay otay, youyay ancay ecuresay eefray assagepay onyay ayay ailingsay ipshay orfay yourselfyay andyay youryay adventuringyay ompanionscay. 
 Youyay ightmay ailsay onyay ethay ipshay youyay ervedsay onyay, oryay anotheryay ipshay youyay avehay oodgay elationsray withyay (erhapspay oneyay aptainedcay ybay ayay ormerfay ewmatecray). 
 Ecausebay you’reyay allingcay inyay ayay avorfay, youyay an’tcay ebay ertaincay ofyay ayay eduleschay oryay outeray atthay willyay eetmay youryay everyyay eednay. 
 Youryay  Ungeonday  Astermay willyay etermineday owhay onglay ityay akestay otay etgay whereyay youyay eednay otay ogay. 
 Inyay eturnray orfay youryay eefray assagepay, youyay andyay youryay ompanionscay areyay expectedyay otay assistyay ethay ewcray uringday ethay oyagevay. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay Ailorssay ancay ebay ayay oughray otlay, utbay ethay esponsibilitiesray ofyay ifelay onyay ayay ipshay akemay emthay enerallygay eliableray asyay wellyay. 
 Ifelay aboardyay ayay ipshay apesshay eirthay outlookyay andyay ormsfay eirthay ostmay importantyay attachments.dyay6 Idealyay1 Espectray. 
 Ethay ingthay atthay eepskay ayay ipshay ogethertay isyay utualmay espectray etweenbay aptaincay andyay ewcray. 
( Oodgay)2 Airnessfay. 
 Weyay allyay oday ethay workyay, osay weyay allyay areshay inyay ethay ewardsray. 
( Awfullay)3 Eedomfray. 
 Ethay easay isyay eedom—thefray eedomfray otay ogay anywhereyay andyay oday anythingyay. 
( Aoticchay)4 Asterymay. 
I’myay ayay edatorpray, andyay ethay otheryay ipsshay onyay ethay easay areyay ymay eypray. 
( Evilyay)5 Eoplepay. 
I’myay ommittedcay otay ymay ewmatescray, otnay otay idealsyay. 
( Eutralnay)6 Aspirationyay. 
 Omedaysay I’llyay ownyay ymay ownyay ipshay andyay artchay ymay ownyay estinyday. 
( Any)dyay6 Ond1I’mbay oyallay otay ymay aptaincay irstfay, everythingyay elseyay econdsay.2 Ethay ipshay isyay ostmay important—crewmatesyay andyay aptainscay omecay andyay o.3I’llgay alwaysyay ememberray ymay irstfay ipshay.4 Inyay ayay arborhay owntay, Iyay avehay ayay aramourpay whoseyay eyesyay earlynay olestay emay omfray ethay ea.5Isay wasyay eatedchay outyay ofyay ymay airfay areshay ofyay ethay ofitspray, andyay Iyay wantyay otay etgay ymay ueday.6 Uthlessray iratespay urderedmay ymay aptaincay andyay ewmatescray, underedplay ouryay ipshay, andyay eftlay emay otay ieday. 
 Engeancevay willyay ebay ine.dmay6 aw1IFlay ollowfay ordersyay, evenyay ifyay Iyay inkthay ey’rethay wrong.2I’llyay aysay anythingyay otay avoidyay avinghay otay oday extrayay workyay.3 Onceyay omeonesay questionsyay ymay ouragecay, Iyay evernay ackbay ownday onay attermay owhay angerousday ethay ituationsay.4 Onceyay Iyay artstay inkingdray, it’syay ardhay orfay emay otay op.5Istay an’tcay elphay utbay ocketpay ooselay oinscay andyay otheryay inketstray Iyay omecay acrossyay.6 Ymay idepray willyay obablypray eadlay otay ymay estructionday. Ariantvay  Ailorsay:  Iratepay Youyay entspay youryay youthyay underyay ethay waysay ofyay ayay eaddray iratepay, ayay uthlessray utthroatcay whoyay aughttay youyay owhay otay urvivesay inyay ayay worldyay ofyay arksshay andyay avagessay. 
 You’veyay indulgedyay inyay arcenylay onyay ethay ighhay eassay andyay entsay oremay anthay oneyay eservingday oulsay otay ayay inybray avegray. 
 Earfay andyay oodshedblay areyay onay angersstray otay youyay, andyay you’veyay arneredgay ayay omewhatsay unsavoryyay eputationray inyay anymay ayay ortpay owntay. Ifyay youyay ecideday atthay youryay ailingsay areercay involvedyay iracypay, youyay ancay oosechay ethay  Adbay  Eputationray eaturefay (eesay idebarsay) insteadyay ofyay ethay  Ip’sshay  Assagepay eaturefay. Ariantvay  Eaturefay:  Adbay  Eputationray Ifyay youryay aracterchay ashay ayay ailorsay ackgroundbay, youyay aymay electsay isthay ackgroundbay eaturefay insteadyay ofyay  Ip’sshay  Assagepay. Onay attermay whereyay youyay ogay, eoplepay areyay afraidyay ofyay youyay ueday otay youryay eputationray. 
 Oldiersay Waryay ashay eenbay youryay ifelay orfay asyay onglay asyay youyay arecay otay ememberray. 
 Youyay ainedtray asyay ayay youthyay, udiedstay ethay useyay ofyay weaponsyay andyay armoryay, earnedlay asicbay urvivalsay echniquestay, includingyay owhay otay aystay aliveyay onyay ethay attlefieldbay. 
 Youyay ightmay avehay eenbay artpay ofyay ayay andingstay ationalnay armyyay oryay ayay ercenarymay ompanycay, oryay erhapspay ayay embermay ofyay ayay ocallay ilitiamay whoyay oseray otay ominencepray uringday ayay ecentray waryay. Whenyay youyay oosechay isthay ackgroundbay, workyay withyay youryay DMay otay etermineday whichyay ilitarymay organizationyay youyay wereyay ayay artpay ofyay, owhay arfay oughthray itsyay anksray youyay ogressedpray, andyay whatyay indkay ofyay experiencesyay youyay adhay uringday youryay ilitarymay areercay. 
 Wasyay ityay ayay andingstay armyyay, ayay owntay uardgay, oryay ayay illagevay ilitiamay?  Oryay ityay ightmay avehay eenbay ayay oble’snay oryay erchant’smay ivatepray armyyay, oryay ayay ercenarymay ompanycay. Illskay  Oficienciespray:  Athleticsyay,  Intimidationyay  Ooltay  Oficienciespray:  Oneyay ypetay ofyay aminggay etsay, ehiclesvay (andlay) Equipmentyay:  Anyay insigniayay ofyay ankray, ayay ophytray akentay omfray ayay allenfay enemyyay (ayay aggerday, okenbray adeblay, oryay iecepay ofyay ayay annerbay), ayay etsay ofyay onebay iceday oryay eckday ofyay ardscay, ayay etsay ofyay ommoncay othesclay, andyay ayay eltbay ouchpay ontainingcay 10 gpay Ecialtyspay Uringday youryay imetay asyay ayay oldiersay, youyay adhay ayay ecificspay oleray otay ayplay inyay youryay unityay oryay armyyay. 
 Ollray ayay day8 oryay oosechay omfray ethay optionsyay inyay ethay abletay elowbay otay etermineday youryay ole:dray8 Ecialtydspay8 Ecialtyspay1 Officeryay6 Quartermasteryay2 Outscay7 Andardstay earerbay3 Infantryyay8 Upportsay affstay (ookcay, acksmithblay, oryay ethay ikelay)4 Avalrycay5 Ealerhay Eaturefay:  Ilitarymay  Ankray Youyay avehay ayay ilitarymay ankray omfray youryay areercay asyay ayay oldiersay. 
 Oldierssay oyallay otay youryay ormerfay ilitarymay organizationyay illstay ecognizeray youryay authorityyay andyay influenceyay, andyay eythay eferday otay youyay ifyay eythay areyay ofyay ayay owerlay ankray. 
 Youyay ancay invokeyay youryay ankray otay exertyay influenceyay overyay otheryay oldierssay andyay equisitionray implesay equipmentyay oryay orseshay orfay emporarytay useyay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay usuallyyay aingay accessyay otay iendlyfray ilitarymay encampmentsyay andyay ortressesfay whereyay youryay ankray isyay ecognizedray. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay Ethay orrorshay ofyay waryay ombinedcay withyay ethay igidray isciplineday ofyay ilitarymay ervicesay eavelay eirthay arkmay onyay allyay oldierssay, apingshay eirthay idealsyay, eatingcray ongstray ondsbay, andyay oftenyay eavinglay emthay arredscay andyay ulnerablevay otay earfay, ameshay, andyay atred.dhay8 Ersonalitypay  Ait1I'mtray alwaysyay olitepay andyay espectful.2I’mray auntedhay ybay emoriesmay ofyay waryay. 
Iyay an’tcay etgay ethay imagesyay ofyay iolencevay outyay ofyay ymay ind.3I’vemay ostlay ootay anymay iendsfray, andyay I’myay owslay otay akemay ewnay ones.4I’myay ullfay ofyay inspiringyay andyay autionarycay alestay omfray ymay ilitarymay experienceyay elevantray otay almostyay everyyay ombatcay ituation.5Isay ancay arestay ownday ayay ellhay oundhay withoutyay inching.6Iflay enjoyyay eingbay ongstray andyay ikelay eakingbray ings.7Ithay avehay ayay udecray ensesay ofyay umor.8Ihay acefay oblemspray ead-onhay. 
Ayay implesay, irectday olutionsay isyay ethay estbay athpay otay uccess.dsay6 Idealyay1 Eatergray  Oodgay. 
 Ouryay otlay isyay otay aylay ownday ouryay iveslay inyay efenseday ofyay othersyay. 
( Oodgay)2 Esponsibilityray. 
Iyay oday whatyay Iyay ustmay andyay obeyyay ustjay authorityyay. 
( Awfullay)3 Independenceyay. 
 Whenyay eoplepay ollowfay ordersyay indlyblay, eythay embraceyay ayay indkay ofyay yrannytay. 
( Aoticchay)4 Ightmay. 
 Inyay ifelay asyay inyay waryay, ethay ongerstray orcefay winsyay. 
( Evilyay)5 Ivelay andyay  Etlay  Ivelay. 
 Idealsyay aren’tyay worthyay illingkay overyay oryay oinggay otay waryay orfay. 
( Eutralnay)6 Ationnay. 
 Ymay itycay, ationnay, oryay eoplepay areyay allyay atthay attermay. 
 Urchinyay  Youyay ewgray upyay onyay ethay eetsstray aloneyay, orphanedyay, andyay oorpay. 
 Youyay adhay onay oneyay otay watchyay overyay youyay oryay otay ovidepray orfay youyay, osay youyay earnedlay otay ovidepray orfay yourselfyay. 
 Youyay oughtfay iercelyfay overyay oodfay andyay eptkay ayay onstantcay watchyay outyay orfay otheryay esperateday oulssay whoyay ightmay ealstay omfray youyay. 
 Youyay eptslay onyay ooftopsray andyay inyay alleywaysyay, exposedyay otay ethay elementsyay, andyay enduredyay icknesssay withoutyay ethay advantageyay ofyay edicinemay oryay ayay aceplay otay ecuperateray. 
 You’veyay urvivedsay espiteday allyay oddsyay, andyay idday osay oughthray unningcay, engthstray, eedspay, oryay omesay ombinationcay ofyay eachyay. Youyay eginbay youryay adventuringyay areercay withyay enoughyay oneymay otay ivelay odestlymay utbay ecurelysay orfay atyay eastlay entay aysday. 
 Owhay idday youyay omecay ybay atthay oneymay?  Whatyay allowedyay youyay otay eakbray eefray ofyay youryay esperateday ircumstancescay andyay embarkyay onyay ayay etterbay ifelay? Illskay  Oficienciespray:  Eightslay ofyay  Andhay,  Ealthstay  Ooltay  Oficienciespray:  Isguiseday itkay, ievesthay’ oolstay  Equipmentyay: Ayay allsmay ifeknay, ayay apmay ofyay ethay itycay youyay ewgray upyay inyay, ayay etpay ousemay, ayay okentay otay ememberray youryay arentspay ybay, ayay etsay ofyay ommoncay othesclay, andyay ayay eltbay ouchpay ontainingcay 10 gpay Eaturefay:  Itycay  Ecretssay Youyay owknay ethay ecretsay atternspay andyay owflay otay itiescay andyay ancay indfay assagespay oughthray ethay urbanyay awlspray atthay othersyay wouldyay issmay. 
 Whenyay youyay areyay otnay inyay ombatcay, youyay (andyay ompanionscay youyay eadlay) ancay aveltray etweenbay anyyay wotay ocationslay inyay ethay itycay wicetay asyay astfay asyay youryay eedspay wouldyay ormallynay allowyay. Uggestedsay  Aracteristicschay Urchinsyay areyay apedshay ybay iveslay ofyay esperateday overtypay, orfay oodgay andyay orfay illyay. 
 Eythay endtay otay ebay ivendray eitheryay ybay ayay ommitmentcay otay ethay eoplepay withyay whomyay eythay aredshay ifelay onyay ethay eetstray oryay ybay ayay urningbay esireday otay indfay ayay etterbay ifelay— andyay aybemay etgay omesay aybackpay onyay allyay ethay ichray eoplepay whoyay eatedtray emthay adly.dbay8 Ersonalitypay  ait1ITray idehay apsscray ofyay oodfay andyay inketstray awayyay inyay ymay ockets.2Ipay askyay ayay otlay ofyay questions.3Iyay ikelay otay queezesay intoyay allsmay acesplay whereyay onay oneyay elseyay ancay etgay otay e.4Imay eepslay withyay ymay ackbay otay ayay wallyay oryay eetray, withyay everythingyay Iyay ownyay wrappedyay inyay ayay undlebay inyay ymay arms.5Iyay eatyay ikelay ayay igpay andyay avehay adbay anners.6Imay inkthay anyoneyay who’syay icenay otay emay isyay idinghay evilyay intent.7Iyay on’tday ikelay otay athe.8Ibay untlyblay aysay whatyay otheryay eoplepay areyay intinghay atyay oryay iding.dhay6 Idealyay1 Espectray. 
 Allyay eoplepay, ichray oryay oorpay, eserveday espectray. 
( Oodgay)2 Ommunitycay. 
 Weyay avehay otay aketay arecay ofyay eachyay otheryay, ecausebay onay oneyay elseyay isyay oinggay otay oday ityay. 
( Awfullay)3 Angechay. 
 Ethay owlay areyay iftedlay upyay, andyay ethay ighhay andyay ightymay areyay oughtbray ownday. 
 Angechay isyay ethay aturenay ofyay ingsthay. 
( Aoticchay)4 Etributionray. 
 Ethay ichray eednay otay ebay ownshay whatyay ifelay andyay eathday areyay ikelay inyay ethay uttersgay. 
( Evilyay)5 Eoplepay. 
Iyay elphay ethay eoplepay whoyay elphay e—that’smay whatyay eepskay usyay aliveyay. 
( Eutralnay)6 Aspirationyay. 
I'myay oinggay otay ovepray atthay I'myay worthyyay ofyay ayay etterbay ife.dlay6 Ondbay1 Ymay owntay oryay itycay isyay ymay omehay, andyay I’llyay ightfay otay efendday it.2Iyay onsorspay anyay orphanageyay otay eepkay othersyay omfray enduringyay whatyay Iyay wasyay orcedfay otay endure.3Iyay oweyay ymay urvivalsay otay anotheryay urchinyay whoyay aughttay emay otay ivelay onyay ethay eets.4Istray oweyay ayay ebtday Iyay ancay evernay epayray otay ethay ersonpay whoyay ooktay itypay onyay e.5Imay escapedyay ymay ifelay ofyay overtypay ybay obbingray anyay importantyay ersonpay, andyay I’myay wantedyay orfay ityay.6 Onay oneyay elseyay ouldshay avehay otay endureyay ethay ardshipshay I’veyay eenbay ough.dthray6 Awflay1 Ifyay I'myay outnumberedyay, Iyay willyay unray awayyay omfray ayay ightfay.2 Oldgay eemssay ikelay ayay otlay ofyay oneymay otay emay, andyay I’llyay oday ustjay aboutyay anythingyay orfay oremay ofyay it.3Iyay willyay evernay ullyfay usttray anyoneyay otheryay anthay yself.4I’dmay atherray illkay omeonesay inyay eirthay eepslay enthay ightfay airfay.5 It’syay otnay ealingstay ifyay Iyay eednay ityay oremay anthay omeonesay elseyay.6 Eoplepay whoyay an'tcay aketay arecay ofyay emselvesthay etgay whatyay eythay eserve.dday6 ond1IBay wouldyay illstay aylay ownday ymay ifelay orfay ethay eoplepay Iyay ervedsay withyay.2 Omeonesay avedsay ymay ifelay onyay ethay attlefieldbay. 
 Embersmay ofyay ethay obilitynay adetray eitheryay inyay egallay ightsray, uchsay asyay ethay ightsray otay ayay inemay, ayay ortpay, oryay armlandfay, oryay inyay oldgay arsbay, easuringmay oldgay ybay ethay oundpay atherray anthay ybay ethay oincay. 
 Onlyyay erchantsmay, adventurersyay, andyay osethay offeringyay ofessionalpray ervicessay orfay irehay ommonlycay ealday inyay oinscay. Oinagecay  Ommoncay oinscay omecay inyay everalsay ifferentday enominationsday asedbay onyay ethay elativeray worthyay ofyay ethay etalmay omfray whichyay eythay areyay ademay. 
 Ethay eethray ostmay ommoncay oinscay areyay ethay oldgay iecepay (gpay), ethay ilversay iecepay (spay), andyay ethay oppercay iecepay (cpay). Withyay oneyay oldgay iecepay, ayay aracterchay ancay uybay ayay eltbay ouchpay, 50 eetfay ofyay oodgay operay, oryay ayay oatgay. 
Ayay illedskay (utbay otnay exceptionalyay) artisanyay ancay earnyay oneyay oldgay iecepay ayay ayday. 
 Ethay oldgay iecepay isyay ethay andardstay unityay ofyay easuremay orfay wealthyay, evenyay ifyay ethay oincay itselfyay isyay otnay ommonlycay usedyay. 
 Whenyay erchantsmay iscussday ealsday atthay involveyay oodsgay oryay ervicessay worthyay undredshay oryay ousandsthay ofyay oldgay iecespay, ethay ansactionstray on’tday usuallyyay involveyay ethay exchangeyay ofyay individualyay oinscay. 
 Atherray, ethay oldgay iecepay isyay ayay andardstay easuremay ofyay aluevay, andyay ethay actualyay exchangeyay isyay inyay oldgay arsbay, etterslay ofyay editcray, oryay aluablevay oodsgay. Oneyay oldgay iecepay isyay worthyay entay ilversay iecespay, ethay ostmay evalentpray oincay amongyay ommonerscay. 
Ayay ilversay iecepay uysbay ayay aborer’slay workyay orfay ayay ayday, ayay askflay ofyay amplay oilyay, oryay ayay ight’snay estray inyay ayay oorpay innyay. Oneyay ilversay iecepay isyay worthyay entay oppercay iecespay, whichyay areyay ommoncay amongyay aborerslay andyay eggarsbay. 
Ayay inglesay oppercay iecepay uysbay ayay andlecay, ayay orchtay, oryay ayay iecepay ofyay alkchay. Inyay additionyay, unusualyay oinscay ademay ofyay otheryay eciouspray etalsmay ometimessay appearyay inyay easuretray oardshay. 
 Ethay electrumyay iecepay (epyay) andyay ethay atinumplay iecepay (ppay) originateyay omfray allenfay empiresyay andyay ostlay ingdomskay, andyay eythay ometimessay arouseyay uspicionsay andyay epticismskay whenyay usedyay inyay ansactionstray. 
 Anyay electrumyay iecepay isyay worthyay ivefay ilversay iecespay, andyay ayay atinumplay iecepay isyay worthyay entay oldgay ieces.Apay andardstay oincay weighsyay aboutyay ayay irdthay ofyay anyay ounceyay, osay iftyfay oinscay weighyay ayay oundpay. Andardstay  Exchangeyay  Atesray Oincpspepgpppcay Oppercay (cpay)11/101/501/1001/1,000 Ilversay (spay)1011/51/101/100 Electrumyay (epyay)50511/21/20 Oldgay (gpay)10010211/10 Atinumplay (ppay)1,00010020101 Apterchay 5:  Equipmentyay ETHay ARKETPLACEMay OFyay Ayay ARGELay ITYCay EEMTay Withsay uyersbay andyay ellerssay ofyay anymay ortssay: warfday ithssmay andyay elfyay woodcarversyay, alflinghay armersfay andyay omegnay ewelersjay, otnay otay entionmay umanshay ofyay everyyay apeshay, izesay, andyay olorcay awndray omfray ayay ectrumspay ofyay ationsnay andyay ulturescay. 
 Inyay ethay argestlay itiescay, almostyay anythingyay imaginableyay isyay offeredyay orfay alesay, omfray exoticyay icesspay andyay uxuriouslay othingclay otay wickeryay asketsbay andyay acticalpray wordssay. Orfay anyay adventureryay, ethay availabilityyay ofyay armoryay, weaponsyay, ackpacksbay, operay, andyay imilarsay oodsgay isyay ofyay aramountpay importanceyay, incesay operpray equipmentyay ancay eanmay ethay ifferenceday etweenbay ifelay andyay eathday inyay ayay ungeonday oryay ethay untamedyay wildsyay. 
 Isthay apterchay etailsday ethay undanemay andyay exoticyay erchandisemay atthay adventurersyay ommonlycay indfay usefulyay inyay ethay acefay ofyay ethay eatsthray atthay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay esentpray. Artingstay  Equipmentyay Whenyay youyay eatecray youryay aracterchay, youyay eceiveray equipmentyay asedbay onyay ayay ombinationcay ofyay youryay assclay andyay ackgroundbay. 
 Alternativelyyay, youyay ancay artstay withyay ayay umbernay ofyay oldgay iecespay asedbay onyay youryay assclay andyay endspay emthay onyay itemsyay omfray ethay istslay inyay isthay apterchay. 
 Eesay ethay  Artingstay  Wealthyay ybay  Assclay abletay otay etermineday owhay uchmay oldgay youyay avehay otay endspay. Youyay ecideday owhay youryay aracterchay amecay ybay isthay artingstay equipmentyay. 
 Ityay ightmay avehay eenbay anyay inheritanceyay, oryay oodsgay atthay ethay aracterchay urchasedpay uringday ishay oryay erhay upbringingyay. 
 Youyay ightmay avehay eenbay equippedyay withyay ayay weaponyay, armoryay, andyay ayay ackpackbay asyay artpay ofyay ilitarymay ervicesay. 
 Youyay ightmay evenyay avehay olenstay youryay eargay. 
Ayay weaponyay ouldcay ebay ayay amilyfay eirloomhay, assedpay ownday omfray enerationgay otay enerationgay untilyay youryay aracterchay inallyfay ooktay upyay ethay antlemay andyay ollowedfay inyay anyay ancestor’syay adventurousyay ootstepsfay. Wealthyay Wealthyay appearsyay inyay anymay ormsfay inyay ayay DDDay worldyay. 
 Oinscay, emstonesgay, adetray oodsgay, artyay objectsyay, animalsyay, andyay opertypray ancay eflectray youryay aracter’schay inancialfay well-beingyay. 
 Ellingsay  Easuretray  Opportunitiesyay aboundyay otay indfay easuretray, equipmentyay, weaponsyay, armoryay, andyay oremay inyay ethay ungeonsday youyay exploreyay. 
 Ormallynay, youyay ancay ellsay youryay easurestray andyay inketstray whenyay youyay eturnray otay ayay owntay oryay otheryay ettlementsay, ovidedpray atthay youyay ancay indfay uyersbay andyay erchantsmay interestedyay inyay youryay ootlay. Armsyay,  Armoryay, andyay  Otheryay  Equipmentyay. 
 Asyay ayay eneralgay uleray, undamagedyay weaponsyay, armoryay, andyay otheryay equipmentyay etchfay alfhay eirthay ostcay whenyay oldsay inyay ayay arketmay. 
 Weaponsyay andyay armoryay usedyay ybay onstersmay areyay arelyray inyay oodgay enoughyay onditioncay otay ellsay. Agicmay  Itemsyay. 
 Ellingsay agicmay itemsyay isyay oblematicpray. 
 Indingfay omeonesay otay uybay ayay otionpay oryay ayay ollscray isn’tyay ootay ardhay, utbay otheryay itemsyay areyay outyay ofyay ethay ealmray ofyay ostmay utbay ethay wealthiestyay oblesnay. 
 Ikewiselay, asideyay omfray ayay ewfay ommoncay agicmay itemsyay, youyay won’tyay ormallynay omecay acrossyay agicmay itemsyay oryay ellsspay otay urchasepay. 
 Ethay aluevay ofyay agicmay isyay arfay eyondbay implesay oldgay andyay ouldshay alwaysyay ebay eatedtray asyay uchsay. Emsgay,  Ewelryjay, andyay  Artyay  Objectsyay. 
 Esethay itemsyay etainray eirthay ullfay aluevay inyay ethay arketplacemay, andyay youyay ancay eitheryay adetray emthay inyay orfay oincay oryay useyay emthay asyay urrencycay orfay otheryay ansactionstray. 
 Orfay exceptionallyyay aluablevay easurestray, ethay DMay ightmay equireray youyay otay indfay ayay uyerbay inyay ayay argelay owntay oryay argerlay ommunitycay irstfay. Adetray  Oodsgay. 
 Onyay ethay orderlandsbay, anymay eoplepay onductcay ansactionstray oughthray arterbay. 
 Ikelay emsgay andyay artyay objectsyay, adetray oods—barsgay ofyay ironyay, agsbay ofyay altsay, ivestocklay, andyay osay on—retainyay eirthay ullfay aluevay inyay ethay arketmay andyay ancay ebay usedyay asyay urrencycay. Armoryay andyay  Ieldsshay DDDay worldsyay areyay ayay astvay apestrytay ademay upyay ofyay anymay ifferentday ulturescay, eachyay withyay itsyay ownyay echnologytay evellay. Orfay isthay easonray, adventurersyay avehay accessyay otay ayay arietyvay ofyay armoryay ypestay, angingray omfray eatherlay armoryay otay ainchay ailmay otay ostlycay ateplay armoryay, withyay everalsay otheryay indskay ofyay armoryay inyay etweenbay. 
 Ethay  Armoryay abletay ollectscay ethay ostmay ommonlycay availableyay ypestay ofyay armoryay oundfay inyay ethay amegay andyay eparatessay emthay intoyay eethray ategoriescay: ightlay armoryay, ediummay armoryay, andyay eavyhay armoryay. 
 Anymay warriorsyay upplementsay eirthay armoryay withyay ayay ieldshay. Ariantvay:  Equipmentyay  Izessay Inyay ostmay ampaignscay, youyay ancay useyay oryay wearyay anyyay equipmentyay atthay youyay indfay onyay youryay adventuresyay, withinyay ethay oundsbay ofyay ommoncay ensesay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay urlybay alf-orchay won'tyay itfay inyay ayay alfling’shay eatherlay armoryay, andyay ayay omegnay wouldyay ebay wallowedsay upyay inyay ayay oudclay iant’sgay elegantyay oberay. Ethay DMay ancay imposeyay oremay ealismray. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay uitsay ofyay ateplay armoryay ademay orfay oneyay umanhay ightmay otnay itfay anotheryay oneyay withoutyay ignificantsay alterationsyay, andyay ayay uard’sgay uniformyay ightmay ebay isiblyvay ill-fittingyay whenyay anyay adventureryay iestray otay wearyay ityay asyay ayay isguiseday. Usingyay isthay ariantvay, whenyay adventurersyay indfay armoryay, othingclay, andyay imilarsay itemsyay atthay areyay ademay otay ebay wornyay, eythay ightmay eednay otay isitvay anyay armorsmithyay, ailortay, eatherworkerlay, oryay imilarsay expertyay otay akemay ethay itemyay wearableyay. 
 Ethay ostcay orfay uchsay workyay ariesvay omfray 10 otay 40 ercentpay ofyay ethay arketmay icepray ofyay ethay itemyay. 
 Ethay DMay ancay eitheryay ollray 1day4 xay 10 oryay etermineday ethay increaseyay inyay ostcay asedbay onyay ethay extentyay ofyay ethay alterationsyay equiredray. Ethay  Armoryay abletay owsshay ethay ostcay, weightyay, andyay otheryay opertiespray ofyay ethay ommoncay ypestay ofyay armoryay wornyay inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay. Armoryay  Oficiencypray. 
 Anyoneyay ancay utpay onyay ayay uitsay ofyay armoryay oryay apstray ayay ieldshay otay anyay armyay. 
 Onlyyay osethay oficientpray inyay ethay armor’syay useyay owknay owhay otay wearyay ityay effectivelyyay, oweverhay. 
 Youryay assclay ivesgay youyay oficiencypray withyay ertaincay ypestay ofyay armoryay. 
 Ifyay youyay wearyay armoryay atthay youyay acklay oficiencypray withyay, youyay avehay isadvantageday onyay anyyay abilityyay eckchay, avingsay owthray, oryay attackyay ollray atthay involvesyay  Engthstray oryay  Exterityday, andyay youyay an’tcay astcay ellsspay. Armoryay  Assclay (ACyay). 
 Armoryay otectspray itsyay weareryay omfray attacksyay. 
 Ethay armoryay (andyay ieldshay) youyay wearyay eterminesday youryay asebay  Armoryay  Assclay. Eavyhay  Armoryay. 
 Eavierhay armoryay interferesyay withyay ethay wearer’syay abilityyay otay ovemay quicklyyay, ealthilystay, andyay eelyfray. Ifyay ethay  Armoryay abletay owsshay “ stray 13” oryay “ stray 15” inyay ethay  Engthstray olumncay orfay anyay armoryay ypetay, ethay armoryay educesray ethay wearer’syay eedspay ybay 10 eetfay unlessyay ethay weareryay ashay ayay  Engthstray orescay equalyay otay oryay igherhay anthay ethay istedlay orescay. Ealthstay. 
 Ifyay ethay  Armoryay abletay owsshay “ Isadvantageday” inyay ethay  Ealthstay olumncay, ethay weareryay ashay isadvantageday onyay  Exterityday ( Ealthstay) eckschay. Ieldsshay. 
Ayay ieldshay isyay ademay omfray woodyay oryay etalmay andyay isyay arriedcay inyay oneyay andhay. 
 Wieldingyay ayay ieldshay increasesyay youryay  Armoryay  Assclay ybay 2. 
 Youyay ancay enefitbay omfray onlyyay oneyay ieldshay atyay ayay imetay. Ightlay  Armoryay Ademay omfray upplesay andyay inthay aterialsmay, ightlay armoryay avorsfay agileyay adventurersyay incesay ityay offersyay omesay otectionpray withoutyay acrificingsay obilitymay. 
 Ifyay youyay wearyay ightlay armoryay, youyay addyay youryay  Exterityday odifiermay otay ethay asebay umbernay omfray youryay armoryay ypetay otay etermineday youryay  Armoryay  Assclay. Addedpay. 
 Addedpay armoryay onsistscay ofyay quiltedyay ayerslay ofyay othclay andyay attingbay. Eatherlay. 
 Ethay eastplatebray andyay ouldershay otectorspray ofyay isthay armoryay areyay ademay ofyay eatherlay atthay ashay eenbay iffenedstay ybay eingbay oiledbay inyay oilyay. 
 Ethay estray ofyay ethay armoryay isyay ademay ofyay oftersay andyay oremay exibleflay aterialsmay. Uddedstay  Eatherlay. 
 Ademay omfray oughtay utbay exibleflay eatherlay, uddedstay eatherlay isyay einforcedray withyay ose-setclay ivetsray oryay ikesspay. Ediummay  Armoryay Ediummay armoryay offersyay oremay otectionpray anthay ightlay armoryay, utbay ityay alsoyay impairsyay ovementmay oremay. 
 Ifyay youyay wearyay ediummay armoryay, youyay addyay youryay  Exterityday odifiermay, otay ayay aximummay ofyay +2, otay ethay asebay umbernay omfray youryay armoryay ypetay otay etermineday youryay  Armoryay  Assclay. Idehay. 
 Isthay udecray armoryay onsistscay ofyay ickthay ursfay andyay eltspay. 
 Ityay isyay ommonlycay wornyay ybay arbarianbay ibestray, evilyay umanoidshay, andyay otheryay olkfay whoyay acklay accessyay otay ethay oolstay andyay aterialsmay eedednay otay eatecray etterbay armoryay. Ainchay  Irtshay. 
 Ademay ofyay interlockingyay etalmay ingsray, ayay ainchay irtshay isyay wornyay etweenbay ayerslay ofyay othingclay oryay eatherlay. 
 Isthay armoryay offersyay odestmay otectionpray otay ethay wearer’syay upperyay odybay andyay allowsyay ethay oundsay ofyay ethay ingsray ubbingray againstyay oneyay anotheryay otay ebay uffledmay ybay outeryay ayerslay. Alescay  Ailmay. 
 Ightlay  Armoryay Addedpay5 gpay11 +  Exday odifiermay— Isadvantageday8 lbay. Eatherlay10 gpay11 +  Exday odifiermay——10 lbay. Uddedstay eatherlay45 gpay12 +  Exday odifiermay——13 lbay. Ediummay  Armoryay Idehay10 gpay12 +  Exday odifiermay (axmay 2)——12 lbay. Ainchay irtshay50 gpay13 +  Exday odifiermay (axmay 2)——20 lbay. Alescay ailmay50 gpay14 +  Exday odifiermay (axmay 2)— Isadvantageday45 lbay. Eastplatebray400 gpay14 +  Exday odifiermay (axmay 2)——20 lbay. Alfhay ateplay750 gpay15 +  Exday odifiermay (axmay 2)— Isadvantageday40 lbay. Eavyhay  Armoryay Ingray ailmay30 gpay14— Isadvantageday40 lbay. Ainchay ailmay75 gpay16 stray 13 Isadvantageday55 lbay. Intsplay200 gpay17 stray 15 Isadvantageday60 lbay. Ateplay1,500 gpay18 stray 15 Isadvantageday65 lbay. Ieldshay Ieldshay10 gpay+2——6 .overlappinglbay iecespay ofyay etalmay, uchmay ikelay ethay alesscay ofyay ayay ishfay. 
 Ethay uitsay includesyay auntletsgay. Eastplatebray. 
 Isthay armoryay onsistscay ofyay ayay ittedfay etalmay estchay iecepay wornyay withyay upplesay eatherlay. 
 Althoughyay ityay eaveslay ethay egslay andyay armsyay elativelyray unprotectedyay, isthay armoryay ovidespray oodgay otectionpray orfay ethay wearer’syay italvay organsyay whileyay eavinglay ethay weareryay elativelyray unencumberedyay. Alfhay  Ateplay. 
 Alfhay ateplay onsistscay ofyay apedshay etalmay atesplay atthay overcay ostmay ofyay ethay wearer’syay odybay. 
 Ityay oesday otnay includeyay eglay otectionpray eyondbay implesay eavesgray atthay areyay attachedyay withyay eatherlay apsstray. Eavyhay  Armoryay Ofyay allyay ethay armoryay ategoriescay, eavyhay armoryay offersyay ethay estbay otectionpray. 
 Esethay uitssay ofyay armoryay overcay ethay entireyay odybay andyay areyay esignedday otay opstay ayay wideyay angeray ofyay attacksyay. 
 Onlyyay oficientpray warriorsyay ancay anagemay eirthay weightyay andyay ulkbay. Eavyhay armoryay oesn’tday etlay youyay addyay youryay  Exterityday odifiermay otay youryay  Armoryay  Assclay, utbay ityay alsoyay oesn’tday enalizepay youyay ifyay youryay  Exterityday odifiermay isyay egativenay. Ingray  Ailmay. 
 Isthay armoryay isyay eatherlay armoryay withyay eavyhay ingsray ewnsay intoyay ityay. 
 Ethay ingsray elphay einforceray ethay armoryay againstyay owsblay omfray wordssay andyay axesyay. 
 Ingray ailmay isyay inferioryay otay ainchay ailmay, andyay it'syay usuallyyay wornyay onlyyay ybay osethay whoyay an’tcay affordyay etterbay armoryay. Ainchay  Ailmay. 
 Ademay ofyay interlockingyay etalmay ingsray, ainchay ailmay includesyay ayay ayerlay ofyay quiltedyay abricfay wornyay underneathyay ethay ailmay otay eventpray afingchay andyay otay ushioncay ethay impactyay ofyay owsblay. 
 Ethay uitsay includesyay auntletsgay. Intsplay. 
 Isthay armoryay isyay ademay ofyay arrownay erticalvay ipsstray ofyay etalmay ivetedray otay ayay ackingbay ofyay eatherlay atthay isyay wornyay overyay othclay addingpay. 
 Exibleflay ainchay ailmay otectspray ethay ointsjay. Ateplay. 
 Ateplay onsistscay ofyay apedshay, interlockingyay etalmay atesplay otay overcay ethay entireyay odybay. 
Ayay uitsay ofyay ateplay includesyay auntletsgay, eavyhay eatherlay ootsbay, ayay isoredvay elmethay, andyay ickthay ayerslay ofyay addingpay underneathyay ethay armoryay. 
 Ategorycay Onday Offday Ightlay  Armoryay1 inutemay1 inutemay Ediummay  Armoryay5 inutesmay1 inutemay Eavyhay  Armoryay10 inutesmay5 inutesmay Ieldshay1 actionyay1 actionyay Ettinggay  Intoyay andyay  Outyay ofyay  Armoryay Ethay imetay ityay akestay otay onday oryay offday armoryay ependsday onyay ethay armor’syay ategorycay. Onday. 
 Isthay isyay ethay imetay ityay akestay otay utpay onyay armoryay. 
 Youyay enefitbay omfray ethay armor'syay ACyay onlyyay ifyay youyay aketay ethay ullfay imetay otay onday ethay uitsay ofyay armoryay. Offday. 
 Isthay isyay ethay imetay ityay akestay otay aketay offyay armoryay. 
 Ifyay youyay avehay elphay, educeray isthay imetay ybay alfhay. Weaponsyay Weaponyay  Oficiencypray Youryay aceray, assclay, andyay eatsfay ancay antgray youyay oficiencypray withyay ertaincay weaponsyay oryay ategoriescay ofyay weaponsyay. 
 Ethay wotay ategoriescay areyay implesay andyay artialmay. 
 Ostmay eoplepay ancay useyay implesay weaponsyay withyay oficiencypray. 
 Esethay weaponsyay includeyay ubsclay, acesmay, andyay otheryay weaponsyay oftenyay oundfay inyay ethay andshay ofyay ommonerscay. 
 Artialmay weaponsyay, includingyay wordssay, axesyay, andyay olearmspay, equireray oremay ecializedspay ainingtray otay useyay effectivelyyay. 
 Ostmay warriorsyay useyay artialmay weaponsyay ecausebay esethay weaponsyay utpay eirthay ightingfay ylestay andyay ainingtray otay estbay useyay. Oficiencypray withyay ayay weaponyay allowsyay youyay otay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay ethay attackyay ollray orfay anyyay attackyay youyay akemay withyay atthay weaponyay. 
 Ifyay youyay akemay anyay attackyay ollray usingyay ayay weaponyay withyay whichyay youyay acklay oficiencypray, youyay oday otnay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay ethay attackyay ollray. Weaponyay  Opertiespray Anymay weaponsyay avehay ecialspay opertiespray elatedray otay eirthay useyay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Weaponsyay abletay. Ammunitionyay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay ayay weaponyay atthay ashay ethay ammunitionyay opertypray otay akemay ayay angedray attackyay onlyyay ifyay youyay avehay ammunitionyay otay irefay omfray ethay weaponyay. 
 Eachyay imetay youyay attackyay withyay ethay weaponyay, youyay expendyay oneyay iecepay ofyay ammunitionyay. 
 Awingdray ethay ammunitionyay omfray ayay quiveryay, asecay, oryay otheryay ontainercay isyay artpay ofyay ethay attackyay. 
 Atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay attlebay, youyay ancay ecoverray alfhay youryay expendedyay ammunitionyay ybay akingtay ayay inutemay otay earchsay ethay attlefieldbay. Youryay assclay antsgray oficiencypray inyay ertaincay weaponsyay, eflectingray othbay ethay ass'sclay ocusfay andyay ethay oolstay youyay areyay ostmay ikelylay otay useyay. 
 Whetheryay youyay avorfay ayay ongswordlay oryay ayay ongbowlay, youryay weaponyay andyay youryay abilityyay otay wieldyay ityay effectivelyyay ancay eanmay ethay ifferenceday etweenbay ifelay andyay eathday whileyay adventuringyay. Ethay  Weaponsyay abletay owsshay ethay ostmay ommoncay weaponsyay usedyay inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay, eirthay icepray andyay weightyay, ethay amageday eythay ealday whenyay eythay ithay, andyay anyyay ecialspay opertiespray eythay ossesspay. 
 Everyyay weaponyay isyay assifiedclay asyay eitheryay eleemay oryay angedray. 
 Ifyay youyay useyay ayay weaponyay atthay ashay ethay ammunitionyay opertypray otay akemay ayay eleemay attackyay, youyay eattray ethay weaponyay asyay anyay improvisedyay weaponyay (eesay " Improvisedyay  Weaponsyay" aterlay inyay ethay ectionsay). 
Ayay ingslay ustmay ebay oadedlay otay ealday anyyay amageday whenyay usedyay inyay isthay wayyay. Inessefay. 
 Whenyay akingmay anyay attackyay withyay ayay inessefay weaponyay, youyay useyay youryay oicechay ofyay youryay  Engthstray oryay  Exterityday odifiermay orfay ethay attackyay andyay amageday ollsray. 
 Youyay ustmay useyay ethay amesay odifiermay orfay othbay ollsray. Eavyhay. 
 Allsmay eaturescray avehay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray withyay eavyhay weaponsyay. 
Ayay eavyhay weapon’syay izesay andyay ulkbay akemay ityay ootay argelay orfay ayay  Allsmay eaturecray otay useyay effectivelyyay. Ightlay. 
Ayay ightlay weaponyay isyay allsmay andyay easyyay otay andlehay, akingmay ityay idealyay orfay useyay whenyay ightingfay withyay wotay weaponsyay. 
 Eesay ethay ulesray orfay wo-weapontay ightingfay inyay apterchay 9. Oadinglay. 
 Ecausebay ofyay ethay imetay equiredray otay oadlay isthay weaponyay, youyay ancay irefay onlyyay oneyay iecepay ofyay ammunitionyay omfray ityay whenyay youyay useyay anyay actionyay, onusbay actionyay, oryay eactionray otay irefay ityay, egardlessray ofyay ethay umbernay ofyay attacksyay youyay ancay ormallynay akemay. Angeray. 
Ayay weaponyay atthay ancay ebay usedyay otay akemay ayay angedray attackyay ashay ayay angeray ownshay inyay arenthesespay afteryay ethay ammunitionyay oryay ownthray opertypray. 
 Ethay angeray istslay wotay umbersnay. 
 Ethay irstfay isyay ethay weapon’syay ormalnay angeray inyay eetfay, andyay ethay econdsay indicatesyay ethay weapon’syay aximummay angeray. 
 Whenyay attackingyay ayay argettay eyondbay ormalnay angeray, youyay avehay isadvantageday onyay ethay attackyay ollray. 
 Youyay an’tcay attackyay ayay argettay eyondbay ethay weapon’syay onglay angeray. Eachray. 
 Isthay weaponyay addsyay 5 eetfay otay youryay eachray whenyay youyay attackyay withyay ityay. Ecialspay. 
Ayay weaponyay withyay ethay ecialspay opertypray ashay unusualyay ulesray overninggay itsyay useyay, explainedyay inyay ethay weapon’syay escriptionday (eesay " Ecialspay  Weaponsyay" aterlay inyay isthay ectionsay). Ownthray. 
 Ifyay ayay weaponyay ashay ethay ownthray opertypray, youyay ancay owthray ethay weaponyay otay akemay ayay angedray attackyay. 
 Ifyay ethay weaponyay isyay ayay eleemay weaponyay, youyay useyay ethay amesay abilityyay odifiermay orfay atthay attackyay ollray andyay amageday ollray atthay youyay wouldyay useyay orfay ayay eleemay attackyay withyay ethay weaponyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay owthray ayay andaxehay, youyay useyay youryay  Engthstray, utbay ifyay youyay owthray ayay aggerday, youyay ancay useyay eitheryay youryay  Engthstray oryay youryay  Exterityday, incesay ethay aggerday ashay ethay inessefay opertypray. Wotay- Andedhay. 
 Isthay weaponyay equiresray wotay andshay otay useyay. Ersatilevay. 
 Isthay weaponyay ancay ebay usedyay withyay oneyay oryay wotay andshay. 
Ayay amageday aluevay inyay arenthesespay appearsyay withyay ethay operty—thepray amageday whenyay ethay weaponyay isyay usedyay withyay wotay andshay otay akemay ayay eleemay attackyay. Improvisedyay  Weaponsyay Ometimessay aracterschay on’tday avehay eirthay weaponsyay andyay avehay otay attackyay withyay whateveryay isyay oseclay atyay andhay. 
 Anyay improvisedyay weaponyay includesyay anyyay objectyay youyay ancay wieldyay inyay oneyay oryay wotay andshay, uchsay asyay okenbray assglay, ayay abletay eglay, ayay yingfray anpay, ayay wagonyay wheelyay, oryay ayay eadday oblingay. Inyay anymay asescay, anyay improvisedyay weaponyay isyay imilarsay otay anyay actualyay weaponyay andyay ancay ebay eatedtray asyay uchsay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay abletay eglay isyay akinyay otay ayay ubclay. 
 Anyay objectyay atthay earsbay onay esemblanceray otay ayay weaponyay ealsday 1day4 amageday (ethay DMay assignsyay ayay amageday ypetay appropriateyay otay ethay objectyay). 
 Ifyay ayay aracterchay usesyay ayay angedray weaponyay otay akemay ayay eleemay attackyay, oryay owsthray ayay eleemay weaponyay atthay oesday otnay avehay ethay ownthray opertypray, ityay alsoyay ealsday 1day4 amageday. 
 Anyay improvisedyay ownthray weaponyay ashay ayay ormalnay angeray ofyay 20 eetfay andyay ayay onglay angeray ofyay 60 eetfay. Ilveredsay  Weaponsyay Omesay onstersmay atthay avehay immunityyay oryay esistanceray otay onmagicalnay weaponsyay areyay usceptiblesay otay ilversay weaponsyay, osay autiouscay adventurersyay investyay extrayay oincay otay ateplay eirthay weaponsyay withyay ilversay. 
 Youyay ancay ilversay ayay inglesay weaponyay oryay entay iecespay ofyay ammunitionyay orfay 100 gpay. 
 Isthay ostcay epresentsray otnay onlyyay ethay icepray ofyay ethay ilversay, utbay ethay imetay andyay expertiseyay eedednay otay addyay ilversay otay ethay weaponyay withoutyay akingmay ityay esslay effectiveyay. Ecialspay  Weaponsyay Weaponsyay withyay ecialspay ulesray areyay escribedday erehay. Ancelay. 
 Youyay avehay isadvantageday whenyay youyay useyay ayay ancelay otay attackyay ayay argettay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Alsoyay, ayay ancelay equiresray wotay andshay otay wieldyay whenyay youyay aren’tyay ountedmay. Etnay. 
Ayay  Argelay oryay allersmay eaturecray ithay ybay ayay etnay isyay estrainedray untilyay ityay isyay eedfray. 
Ayay etnay ashay onay effectyay oncreaturesyay atthay areyay ormlessfay, oryay eaturescray atthay areyay  Ugehay oryay argerlay. 
Ayay eaturecray ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay akemay ayay DCay 10  Engthstray eckchay, eeingfray itselfyay oryay anotheryay eaturecray withinyay itsyay eachray onyay ayay uccesssay. 
 Ealingday 5 ashingslay amageday otay ethay etnay (ACyay 10) alsoyay eesfray ethay eaturecray withoutyay arminghay ityay, endingyay ethay effectyay andyay estroyingday ethay etnay. Whenyay youyay useyay anyay actionyay, onusbay actionyay, oryay eactionray otay attackyay withyay ayay etnay, youyay ancay akemay onlyyay oneyay attackyay egardlessray ofyay ethay umbernay ofyay attacksyay youyay ancay ormallynay akemay. Adventuringyay  Eargay Isthay ectionsay escribesday itemsyay atthay avehay ecialspay ulesray oryay equireray urtherfay explanationyay. Acidyay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay ashsplay ethay ontentscay ofyay isthay ialvay ontoyay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay oryay owthray ethay ialvay upyay otay 20 eetfay, atteringshay ityay onyay impactyay. 
 Inyay eitheryay asecay, akemay ayay angedray attackyay againstyay ayay eaturecray oryay objectyay, eatingtray ethay acidyay asyay anyay improvisedyay weaponyay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 2day6 acidyay amageday. Alchemist’syay  Irefay. 
 Isthay ickystay, adhesiveyay uidflay ignitesyay whenyay exposedyay otay airyay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay owthray isthay askflay upyay otay 20 eetfay, atteringshay ityay onyay impactyay. 
 Adventuringyay  Eargay Itemyay Ostcay Weightyay Abacusyay2 gpay2 lbay. Acidyay (ialvay)25 gpay1 lbay. Alchemist’syay irefay (askflay)50 gpay1 lbay. Ammunitionyay Arrowsyay (20)1 gpay1 lbay. Owgunblay eedlesnay (50)1 gpay1 lbay. Ossbowcray oltsbay (20)1 gpay1 1/2 lbay. Ingslay ulletsbay (20)4 cpay1 1/2 lbay. Antitoxinyay (ialvay)50 gpay— Arcaneyay ocusfay Ystalcray10 gpay1 lbay. Orbyay20 gpay3 lbay. Odray10 gpay2 lbay. Affstay5 gpay4 lbay. Wandyay10 gpay1 lbay. Ackpackbay2 gpay5 lbay. Allbay earingsbay (agbay ofyay 1,000)1 gpay2 lbay. Arrelbay2 gpay70 lbay. Asketbay4 spay2 lbay. Edrollbay1 gpay7 lbay. Ellbay1 gpay Anketblay5 spay3 lbay. Ockblay andyay ackletay1 gpay5 lbay. Ookbay25 gpay5 lbay. Ottlebay, assglay2 gpay2 lbay. Ucketbay5 cpay2 lbay. Altropscay (agbay ofyay 20)1 gpay2 lbay. Andlecay1 cpay— Asecay, ossbowcray oltbay1 gpay1 lbay. Asecay, apmay oryay ollscray1 gpay1 lbay. Ainchay (10 eetfay)5 gpay10 lbay. Alkchay (1 iecepay)1 cpay— Estchay5 gpay25 lbay. Imber'sclay itkay25 gpay12 lbay. Othesclay, ommoncay5 spay3 lbay. Othesclay, ostumecay5 gpay4 lbay. Othesclay, inefay15 gpay6 lbay. Othesclay, aveler’stray2 gpay4 lbay. Omponentcay ouchpay25 gpay2 lbay. Owbarcray2 gpay5 lbay. Uidicdray ocusfay Igspray ofyay istletoemay1 gpay— Otemtay1 gpay— Woodenyay affstay5 gpay4 lbay. Yewyay wandyay10 gpay1 lbay. Ishingfay ackletay1 gpay4 lbay. Askflay oryay ankardtay2 cpay1 lbay. Applinggray ookhay2 gpay4 lbay. Ammerhay1 gpay3 lbay. Ammerhay, edgeslay2 gpay10 lbay. Ealer’shay itkay5 gpay3 lbay. Itemyay Ostcay Weightyay Olyhay ymbolsay Amuletyay5 gpay1 lbay. Emblemyay5 gpay— Eliquaryray5 gpay2 lbay. Olyhay wateryay (askflay)25 gpay1 lbay. Ourglasshay25 gpay1 lbay. Untinghay aptray5 gpay25 lbay. Inkyay (1 ounceyay ottlebay)10 gpay— Inkyay enpay2 cpay— Ugjay oryay itcherpay2 cpay4 lbay. Adderlay (10-ootfay)1 spay25 lbay. Amplay5 spay1 lbay. Anternlay, ullseyebay10 gpay2 lbay. Anternlay, oodedhay5 gpay2 lbay. Ocklay10 gpay1 lbay. Agnifyingmay assglay100 gpay— Anaclesmay2 gpay6 lbay. Essmay itkay2 spay1 lbay. Irrormay, eelstay5 gpay1/2 lbay. Oilyay (askflay)1 spay1 lbay. Aperpay (oneyay eetshay)2 spay— Archmentpay (oneyay eetshay)1 spay— Erfumepay (ialvay)5 gpay— Ickpay, iner’smay2 gpay10 lbay. Itonpay5 cpay1/4 lbay. Oisonpay, asicbay (ialvay)100 gpay— Olepay (10-ootfay)5 cpay7 lbay. Otpay, ironyay2 gpay10 lbay. Otionpay ofyay ealinghay50 gpay1/2 lbay. Ouchpay5 spay1 lbay. Quiveryay1 gpay1 lbay. Amray, ortablepay4 gpay35 lbay. Ationsray (1 ayday)5 spay2 lbay. Obesray1 gpay4 lbay. Operay, empenhay (50 eetfay)1 gpay10 lbay. Operay, ilksay (50 eetfay)10 gpay5 lbay. Acksay1 cpay1/2 lbay. Alescay, erchant’smay5 gpay3 lbay. Ealingsay waxyay5 spay Ovelshay2 gpay5 lbay. Ignalsay whistleyay5 cpay— Ignetsay ingray5 gpay— Oapsay2 cpay— Ellbookspay50 gpay3 lbay. Ikesspay, ironyay (10)1 gpay5 lbay. Yglassspay1,000 gpay1 lbay. Enttay, wo-persontay2 gpay20 lbay. Inderboxtay5 spay1 lbay. Orchtay1 cpay1 lbay. Ialvay1 gpay— Waterskinyay2 spay5 lbay. 
ethay alchemist'syay irefay asyay anyay improvisedyay weaponyay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 1day4 irefay amageday atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay. 
Ayay eaturecray ancay endyay isthay amageday ybay usingyay itsyay actionyay otay akemay ayay DCay 10  Exterityday eckchay otay extinguishyay ethay amesflay. Antitoxinyay. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay inksdray isthay ialvay ofyay iquidlay ainsgay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay oisonpay orfay 1 ourhay. 
 Ityay onferscay onay enefitbay otay undeadyay oryay onstructscay. Arcaneyay  Ocusfay. 
 Anyay arcaneyay ocusfay isyay ayay ecialspay itemyay— anyay orbyay, ayay ystalcray, ayay odray, ayay eciallyspay onstructedcay affstay, ayay wand-likeyay engthlay ofyay woodyay, oryay omesay imilarsay itemyay— esignedday otay annelchay ethay owerpay ofyay arcaneyay ellsspay. 
Ayay orcerersay, warlockyay, oryay wizardyay ancay useyay uchsay anyay itemyay asyay ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay, asyay escribedday inyay apterchay 10. Allbay  Earingsbay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay illspay esethay inytay etalmay allsbay omfray eirthay ouchpay otay overcay ayay evellay areayay 10 eetfay quaresay. 
Ayay eaturecray ovingmay acrossyay ethay overedcay areayay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 10  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay allfay onepray. 
Ayay eaturecray ovingmay oughthray ethay areayay atyay alfhay eedspay oesn’tday eednay otay akemay ethay avingsay owthray. Ockblay andyay  Ackletay. 
Ayay etsay ofyay ulleyspay withyay ayay ablecay eadedthray oughthray emthay andyay ayay ookhay otay attachyay otay objectsyay, ayay ockblay andyay ackletay allowsyay youyay otay oisthay upyay otay ourfay imestay ethay weightyay youyay ancay ormallynay iftlay. Ookbay. 
Ayay ookbay ightmay ontaincay oetrypay, istoricalhay accountsyay, informationyay ertainingpay otay ayay articularpay ieldfay ofyay orelay, iagramsday andyay otesnay onyay omishgnay ontraptionscay, oryay ustjay aboutyay anythingyay elseyay atthay ancay ebay epresentedray usingyay exttay oryay icturespay. 
Ayay ookbay ofyay ellsspay isyay ayay ellbookspay (escribedday aterlay inyay isthay ectionsay). Altropscay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay eadspray ayay inglesay agbay ofyay altropscay otay overcay ayay 5-oot-squarefay areayay. 
 Anyyay eaturecray atthay entersyay ethay areayay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 15  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay opstay ovingmay andyay aketay 1 iercingpay amageday. 
 Untilyay ethay eaturecray egainsray atyay eastlay 1 ithay ointpay, itsyay walkingyay eedspay isyay educedray ybay 10 eetfay. 
Ayay eaturecray ovingmay oughthray ethay areayay atyay alfhay eedspay oesn’tday eednay otay akemay ethay avingsay owthray. Andlecay. 
 Orfay 1 ourhay, ayay andlecay edsshay ightbray ightlay inyay ayay 5-ootfay adiusray andyay imday ightlay orfay anyay additionalyay 5 eetfay. Asecay,  Ossbowcray  Oltbay. 
 Isthay woodenyay asecay ancay oldhay upyay otay wentytay ossbowcray oltsbay. Asecay,  Apmay oryay  Ollscray. 
 Isthay ylindricalcay eatherlay asecay ancay oldhay upyay otay entay olled-upray eetsshay ofyay aperpay oryay ivefay olled-upray eetsshay ofyay archmentpay. Ainchay. 
Ayay ainchay ashay 10 ithay ointspay. 
 Ityay ancay ebay urstbay withyay ayay uccessfulsay DCay 20  Engthstray eckchay. Imber’sclay  Itkay. 
Ayay imber’sclay itkay includesyay ecialspay itonspay, ootbay ipstay, ovesglay, andyay ayay arnesshay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay ethay imber’sclay itkay asyay anyay actionyay otay anchoryay yourselfyay; whenyay youyay oday, youyay an’tcay allfay oremay anthay 25 eetfay omfray ethay ointpay whereyay youyay anchoredyay yourselfyay, andyay youyay an'tcay imbclay oremay anthay 25 eetfay awayyay omfray atthay ointpay withoutyay undoingyay ethay anchoryay. Omponentcay  Ouchpay. 
Ayay omponentcay ouchpay isyay ayay allsmay, watertightyay eatherlay eltbay ouchpay atthay ashay ompartmentscay otay oldhay allyay ethay aterialmay omponentscay andyay otheryay ecialspay itemsyay youyay eednay otay astcay youryay ellsspay, exceptyay orfay osethay omponentscay atthay avehay ayay ecificspay ostcay (asyay indicatedyay inyay ayay ell'sspay escriptionday). Owbarcray. 
 Usingyay ayay owbarcray antsgray advantageyay otay  Engthstray eckschay whereyay ethay owbar’scray everagelay ancay ebay appliedyay. Uidicdray  Ocusfay. 
Ayay uidicdray ocusfay ightmay ebay ayay igspray ofyay istletoemay oryay ollyhay, ayay wandyay oryay epterscay ademay ofyay yewyay oryay anotheryay ecialspay woodyay, ayay affstay awndray wholeyay outyay ofyay ayay ivinglay eetray, oryay ayay otemtay objectyay incorporatingyay eathersfay, urfay, onesbay, andyay eethtay omfray acredsay animalsyay. 
Ayay uiddray ancay useyay uchsay anyay objectyay asyay ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay, asyay escribedday inyay apterchay 10. Ishingfay  Ackletay. 
 Isthay itkay includesyay ayay woodenyay odray, ilkensay inelay, orkwoodcay obbersbay, eelstay ookshay, eadlay inkerssay, elvetvay ureslay, andyay arrownay ettingnay. Ealer’shay  Itkay. 
 Isthay itkay isyay ayay eatherlay ouchpay ontainingcay andagesbay, alvessay, andyay intssplay. 
 Ethay itkay ashay entay usesyay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay expendyay oneyay useyay ofyay ethay itkay otay abilizestay ayay eaturecray atthay ashay 0 ithay ointspay, withoutyay eedingnay otay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay ( Edicinemay) eckchay. Olyhay  Ymbolsay. 
Ayay olyhay ymbolsay isyay ayay epresentationray ofyay ayay odgay oryay antheonpay. 
 Ityay ightmay ebay anyay amuletyay epictingday ayay ymbolsay epresentingray ayay eityday, ethay amesay ymbolsay arefullycay engravedyay oryay inlaidyay asyay anyay emblemyay onyay ayay ieldshay, oryay ayay inytay oxbay oldinghay ayay agmentfray ofyay ayay acredsay elicray. 
 Appendixyay Bay istslay ethay ymbolssay ommonlycay associatedyay withyay anymay odsgay inyay ethay ultiversemay. 
Ayay ericclay oryay aladinpay ancay useyay ayay olyhay ymbolsay asyay ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay, asyay escribedday inyay apterchay10. 
 Otay useyay ethay ymbolsay inyay isthay wayyay, ethay astercay ustmay oldhay ityay inyay andhay, wearyay ityay isiblyvay, oryay earbay ityay onyay ayay ieldshay. Olyhay  Wateryay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay ashsplay ethay ontentscay ofyay isthay askflay ontoyay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay oryay owthray ityay upyay otay 20 eetfay, atteringshay ityay onyay impactyay. 
 Inyay eitheryay asecay, akemay ayay angedray attackyay againstyay ayay argettay eaturecray, eatingtray ethay olyhay wateryay asyay anyay improvisedyay weaponyay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay ayay iendfay oryay undeadyay, ityay akestay 2day6 adiantray amageday. Equipmentyay  Ackspay Ethay artingstay equipmentyay youyay etgay omfray youryay assclay includesyay ayay ollectioncay ofyay usefulyay adventuringyay eargay, utpay ogethertay inyay ayay ackpay. 
 Ethay ontentscay ofyay esethay ackspay areyay istedlay erehay. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay uyingbay youryay artingstay equipmentyay, youyay ancay urchasepay ayay ackpay orfay ethay icepray ownshay, whichyay ightmay ebay eaperchay anthay uyingbay ethay itemsyay individuallyyay. Urglar’sbay  Ackpay (16 gpay). 
 Includesyay ayay ackpackbay, ayay agbay ofyay 1,000 allbay earingsbay, 10 eetfay ofyay ingstray, ayay ellbay, 5 andlescay, ayay owbarcray, ayay ammerhay, 10 itonspay, ayay oodedhay anternlay, 2 asksflay ofyay oilyay, 5 aysday ationsray, ayay inderboxtay, andyay ayay waterskinyay. 
 Ethay ackpay alsoyay ashay 50 eetfay ofyay empenhay operay appedstray otay ethay idesay ofyay ityay. Iplomat'sday  Ackpay (39 gpay). 
 Includesyay ayay estchay, 2 asescay orfay apsmay andyay ollsscray, ayay etsay ofyay inefay othesclay, ayay ottlebay ofyay inkyay, anyay inkyay enpay, ayay amplay, 2 asksflay ofyay oilyay, 5 eetsshay ofyay aperpay, ayay ialvay ofyay erfumepay, ealingsay waxyay, andyay oapsay. Ungeoneer’sday  Ackpay (12 gpay). 
 Includesyay ayay ackpackbay, ayay owbarcray, ayay ammerhay, 10 itonspay, 10 orchestay, ayay inderboxtay, 10 aysday ofyay ationsray, andyay ayay waterskinyay. 
 Ethay ackpay alsoyay ashay 50 eetfay ofyay empenhay operay appedstray otay ethay idesay ofyay ityay. Entertainer’syay  Ackpay (40 gpay). 
 Includesyay ayay ackpackbay, ayay edrollbay,2 ostumescay, 5 andlescay, 5 aysday ofyay ationsray, ayay waterskinyay, andyay ayay isguiseday itkay. Explorer’syay  Ackpay (10 gpay). 
 Includesyay ayay ackpackbay, ayay edrollbay, ayay essmay itkay, ayay inderboxtay, 10 orchestay, 10 aysday ofyay ationsray, andyay ayay waterskinyay. 
 Ethay ackpay alsoyay ashay 50 eetfay ofyay empenhay operay appedstray otay ethay idesay ofyay ityay. Iest’spray  Ackpay (19 gpay). 
 Includesyay ayay ackpackbay, ayay anketblay, 10 andlescay, ayay inderboxtay, anyay almsyay oxbay, 2 ocksblay ofyay incenseyay, ayay ensercay, estmentsvay, 2 aysday ofyay ationsray, andyay ayay waterskinyay. Olar’sschay  Ackpay (40 gpay). 
Ayay ericclay oryay aladinpay aymay eatecray olyhay wateryay ybay erformingpay ayay ecialspay itualray. 
 Ethay itualray akestay 1 ourhay otay erformpay, usesyay 25 gpay worthyay ofyay owderedpay ilversay, andyay equiresray ethay astercay otay expendyay ayay 1levelstlay ellspay otslay. Untinghay  Aptray. 
 Whenyay youyay useyay youryay actionyay otay etsay ityay, isthay aptray ormsfay ayay aw-toothedsay eelstay ingray atthay apssnay utshay whenyay ayay eaturecray epsstay onyay ayay essurepray ateplay inyay ethay entercay. 
 Ethay aptray isyay affixedyay ybay ayay eavyhay ainchay otay anyay immobileyay objectyay, uchsay asyay ayay eetray oryay ayay ikespay ivendray intoyay ethay oundgray. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay epsstay onyay ethay ateplay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 13  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay aketay 1day4 iercingpay amageday andyay opstay ovingmay. 
 Ereafterthay, untilyay ethay eaturecray eaksbray eefray ofyay ethay aptray, itsyay ovementmay isyay imitedlay ybay ethay engthlay ofyay ethay ainchay (ypicallytay 3 eetfay onglay). 
Ayay eaturecray ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay akemay ayay DCay 13  Engthstray eckchay, eeingfray itselfyay oryay anotheryay eaturecray withinyay itsyay eachray onyay ayay uccesssay. 
 Eachyay ailedfay eckchay ealsday 1 iercingpay amageday otay ethay appedtray eaturecray. Amplay. 
Ayay amplay astscay ightbray ightlay inyay ayay 15-ootfay adiusray andyay imday ightlay orfay anyay additionalyay 30 eetfay. 
 Onceyay itlay, ityay urnsbay orfay 6 ourshay onyay ayay askflay (1 intpay) ofyay oilyay. Anternlay,  Ullseyebay. 
Ayay ullseyebay anternlay astscay ightbray ightlay inyay ayay 60-ootfay onecay andyay imday ightlay orfay anyay additionalyay 60 eetfay. 
 Onceyay itlay, ityay urnsbay orfay 6 ourshay onyay ayay askflay (1 intpay) ofyay oilyay. Anternlay,  Oodedhay. 
Ayay oodedhay anternlay astscay ightbray ightlay inyay ayay 30-ootfay adiusray andyay imday ightlay orfay anyay additionalyay 30 eetfay. 
 Onceyay itlay, ityay urnsbay orfay 6 ourshay onyay ayay askflay (1 intpay) ofyay oilyay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay owerlay ethay oodhay, educingray ethay ightlay otay imday ightlay inyay ayay 5-ootfay adiusray. Ocklay. 
Ayay eykay isyay ovidedpray withyay ethay ocklay. 
 Withoutyay ethay eykay, ayay eaturecray oficientpray withyay ievesthay’ oolstay ancay ickpay isthay ocklay withyay ayay uccessfulsay DCay 15  Exterityday eckchay. Youryay DMay aymay ecideday atthay etterbay ockslay areyay availableyay orfay igherhay icespray. Agnifyingmay  Assglay. 
 Isthay enslay allowsyay ayay oserclay ooklay atyay allsmay objectsyay. 
 Ityay isyay alsoyay usefulyay asyay ayay ubstitutesay orfay intflay andyay eelstay whenyay artingstay iresfay. 
 Ightinglay ayay irefay withyay ayay agnifyingmay assglay equiresray ightlay asyay ightbray asyay unlightsay otay ocusfay, indertay otay igniteyay, andyay aboutyay 5 inutesmay orfay ethay irefay otay igniteyay. 
Ayay agnifyingmay assglay antsgray advantageyay onyay anyyay abilityyay eckchay ademay otay appraiseyay oryay inspectyay anyay itemyay atthay isyay allsmay oryay ighlyhay etailedday. Anaclesmay. 
 Esethay etalmay estraintsray ancay indbay ayay  Allsmay oryay  Ediummay eaturecray. 
 Escapingyay ethay anaclesmay equiresray ayay uccessfulsay DCay 20  Exterityday eckchay. 
 Eakingbray emthay equiresray ayay uccessfulsay DCay 20  Engthstray eckchay. 
 Eachyay etsay ofyay anaclesmay omescay withyay oneyay eykay. 
 Withoutyay ethay eykay, ayay eaturecray oficientpray withyay ievesthay’ oolstay ancay ickpay ethay anaclesmay’ ocklay withyay ayay uccessfulsay DCay 15  Exterityday eckchay. 
 Anaclesmay avehay 15 ithay ointspay. Essmay  Itkay. 
 Isthay intay oxbay ontainscay ayay upcay andyay implesay utlerycay. 
 Ethay oxbay ampsclay ogethertay, andyay oneyay idesay ancay ebay usedyay asyay ayay ookingcay anpay andyay ethay otheryay asyay ayay ateplay oryay allowshay owlbay. Oilyay. 
 Oilyay usuallyyay omescay inyay ayay ayclay askflay atthay oldshay 1 intpay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay ashsplay ethay oilyay inyay isthay askflay ontoyay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay oryay owthray ityay upyay otay 20 eetfay, atteringshay ityay onyay impactyay. 
 Akemay ayay angedray attackyay againstyay ayay argettay eaturecray oryay objectyay, eatingtray ethay oilyay asyay anyay improvisedyay weaponyay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay isyay overedcay inyay oilyay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay akestay anyyay irefay amageday eforebay ethay oilyay iesdray (afteryay 1 inutemay), ethay argettay akestay anyay additionalyay 5 irefay amageday omfray ethay urningbay oilyay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay ourpay ayay askflay ofyay oilyay onyay ethay oundgray otay overcay ayay 5-oot-squarefay areayay, ovidedpray atthay ethay urfacesay isyay evellay. 
 Ifyay itlay, ethay oilyay urnsbay orfay 2 oundsray andyay ealsday 5 irefay amageday otay anyyay eaturecray atthay entersyay ethay areayay oryay endsyay itsyay urntay inyay ethay areayay. 
 Yglassspay. 
 Objectsyay iewedvay oughthray ayay yglassspay areyay agnifiedmay otay wicetay eirthay izesay. Enttay. 
Ayay implesay andyay ortablepay anvascay eltershay, ayay enttay eepsslay wotay. Inderboxtay. 
 Isthay allsmay ontainercay oldshay intflay, irefay eelstay, andyay indertay (usuallyyay ydray othclay oakedsay inyay ightlay oilyay) usedyay otay indlekay ayay irefay. 
 Usingyay ityay otay ightlay ayay orch—ortay anythingyay elseyay withyay abundantyay, exposedyay uel—takesfay anyay actionyay. 
 Ightinglay anyyay otheryay irefay akestay 1 inutemay. Orchtay. 
Ayay orchtay urnsbay orfay 1 ourhay, ovidingpray ightbray ightlay inyay ayay 20-ootfay adiusray andyay imday ightlay orfay anyay additionalyay 20 eetfay. 
 Ifyay youyay akemay ayay eleemay attackyay withyay ayay urningbay orchtay andyay ithay, ityay ealsday 1 irefay amageday. Oisonpay,  Asicbay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay ethay oisonpay inyay isthay ialvay otay oatcay oneyay ashingslay oryay iercingpay weaponyay oryay upyay otay eethray iecespay ofyay ammunitionyay. 
 Applyingyay ethay oisonpay akestay anyay actionyay. 
Ayay eaturecray ithay ybay ethay oisonedpay weaponyay oryay ammunitionyay ustmay akemay ayay DCay 10  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray oryay aketay 1day4 oisonpay amageday. 
 Onceyay appliedyay, ethay oisonpay etainsray otencypay orfay 1 inutemay eforebay yingdray. Otionpay ofyay  Ealinghay. 
Ayay aracterchay whoyay inksdray ethay agicalmay edray uidflay inyay isthay ialvay egainsray 2day4 + 2 ithay ointspay. 
 Inkingdray oryay administeringyay ayay otionpay akestay anyay actionyay. Ouchpay. 
Ayay othclay oryay eatherlay ouchpay ancay oldhay upyay otay 20 ingslay ulletsbay oryay 50 owgunblay eedlesnay, amongyay otheryay ingsthay. 
Ayay ompartmentalizedcay ouchpay orfay oldinghay ellspay omponentscay isyay alledcay ayay omponentcay ouchpay (escribedday earlieryay inyay isthay ectionsay). Quiveryay. 
Ayay quiveryay ancay oldhay upyay otay 20 arrowsyay. Amray,  Ortablepay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay ayay ortablepay amray otay eakbray ownday oorsday. 
 Whenyay oingday osay, youyay aingay ayay +4 onusbay onyay ethay  Engthstray eckchay. 
 Oneyay otheryay aracterchay ancay elphay youyay useyay ethay amray, ivinggay youyay advantageyay onyay isthay eckchay. Ationsray. 
 Ationsray onsistcay ofyay ydray oodsfay uitablesay orfay extendedyay aveltray, includingyay erkyjay, ieddray uitfray, ardtackhay, andyay utsnay. Operay. 
 Operay, whetheryay ademay ofyay emphay oryay ilksay, ashay 2 ithay ointspay andyay ancay ebay urstbay withyay ayay DCay 17  Engthstray eckchay. Alescay,  Erchant’smay. 
Ayay alescay includesyay ayay allsmay alancebay, anspay, andyay ayay uitablesay assortmentyay ofyay weightsyay upyay otay 2 oundspay. 
 Withyay ityay, youyay ancay easuremay ethay exactyay weightyay ofyay allsmay objectsyay, uchsay asyay awray eciouspray etalsmay oryay adetray oodsgay, otay elphay etermineday eirthay worthyay. Ellbookspay. 
 Oolstay Ayay ooltay elpshay youyay otay oday omethingsay youyay ouldn'tcay otherwiseyay oday, uchsay asyay aftcray oryay epairray anyay itemyay, orgefay ayay ocumentday, oryay ickpay ayay ocklay. 
 Youryay aceray, assclay, ackgroundbay, oryay eatsfay ivegay youyay oficiencypray withyay ertaincay oolstay. 
 Oficiencypray withyay ayay ooltay allowsyay youyay otay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay anyyay abilityyay eckchay youyay akemay usingyay atthay ooltay. 
 Ooltay useyay isyay otnay iedtay otay ayay inglesay abilityyay, incesay oficiencypray withyay ayay ooltay epresentsray oaderbray owledgeknay ofyay itsyay useyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ethay DMay ightmay askyay youyay otay akemay ayay  Exterityday eckchay otay arvecay ayay inefay etailday withyay youryay woodcarver’syay oolstay, oryay ayay  Engthstray eckchay otay akemay omethingsay outyay ofyay articularlypay ardhay woodyay. Oolstay Itemyay Ostcay Weightyay Artisan’syay oolstay Alchemist’syay uppliessay50 gpay8 lbay. Ewer’sbray uppliessay20 gpay9 lbay. Alligrapher'scay uppliessay10 gpay5 lbay. Arpenter’scay oolstay8 gpay6 lbay. Artographer’scay oolstay15 gpay6 lbay. Obbler’scay oolstay5 gpay5 lbay. Ook’scay utensilsyay1 gpay8 lbay. Assblower’sglay oolstay30 gpay5 lbay. Eweler’sjay oolstay25 gpay2 lbay. Eatherworker’slay oolstay5 gpay5 lbay. Ason’smay oolstay10 gpay8 lbay. Ainter’spay uppliessay10 gpay5 lbay. Otter’spay oolstay10 gpay3 lbay. Ith’ssmay oolstay20 gpay8 lbay. Inker’stay oolstay50 gpay10 lbay. Weaver’syay oolstay1 gpay5 lbay. Woodcarver'syay oolstay1 gpay5 lbay. Isguiseday itkay25 gpay3 lbay. Orgeryfay itkay15 gpay5 lbay. Aminggay etsay Iceday etsay1 spay— Agonchessdray etsay1 gpay1/2 lbay. Ayingplay ardcay etsay5 spay— Eethray- Agondray  Anteyay etsay1 gpay— Erbalismhay itkay5 gpay3 lbay. Usicalmay instrumentyay Agpipesbay30 gpay6 lbay. Umdray6 gpay3 lbay. Ulcimerday25 gpay10 lbay. Uteflay2 gpay1 lbay. Utelay35 gpay2 lbay. Yrelay30 gpay2 lbay. Ornhay3 gpay2 lbay. Anpay uteflay12 gpay2 lbay. Awmshay2 gpay1 lbay. Iolvay30 gpay1 lbay. Avigator’snay oolstay25 gpay2 lbay. Oisoner’spay itkay50 gpay2 lbay. Ievesthay’ oolstay25 gpay1 lbay. Ehiclesvay (andlay oryay wateryay)***  Eesay ethay “ Ountsmay andyay  Ehiclesvay” ectionsay. Artisan’syay  Oolstay. 
 Esethay ecialspay oolstay includeyay ethay itemsyay eedednay otay ursuepay ayay aftcray oryay adetray. 
 Ethay abletay owsshay examplesyay ofyay ethay ostmay ommoncay ypestay ofyay oolstay, eachyay ovidingpray itemsyay elatedray otay ayay inglesay aftcray. 
 Oficiencypray withyay ayay etsay ofyay artisan’syay oolstay etslay youyay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay anyyay abilityyay eckschay youyay akemay usingyay ethay oolstay inyay youryay aftcray. 
 Eachyay ypetay ofyay artisan’syay oolstay equiresray ayay eparatesay oficiencypray. Isguiseday  Itkay. 
 Isthay ouchpay ofyay osmeticscay, airhay yeday, andyay allsmay opspray etslay youyay eatecray isguisesday atthay angechay youryay ysicalphay appearanceyay. 
 Oficiencypray withyay isthay itkay etslay youyay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay anyyay abilityyay eckschay youyay akemay otay eatecray ayay isualvay isguiseday. Orgeryfay  Itkay. 
 Isthay allsmay oxbay ontainscay ayay arietyvay ofyay aperspay andyay archmentspay, enspay andyay inksyay, ealssay andyay ealingsay waxyay, oldgay andyay ilversay eaflay, andyay otheryay uppliessay ecessarynay otay eatecray onvincingcay orgeriesfay ofyay ysicalphay ocumentsday. 
 Oficiencypray withyay isthay itkay etslay youyay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay anyyay abilityyay eckschay youyay akemay otay eatecray ayay ysicalphay orgeryfay ofyay ayay ocumentday. Aminggay  Etsay. 
 Isthay itemyay encompassesyay ayay wideyay angeray ofyay amegay iecespay, includingyay iceday andyay ecksday ofyay ardscay (orfay amesgay uchsay asyay  Eethray- Agondray  Anteyay). 
Ayay ewfay ommoncay examplesyay appearyay onyay ethay  Oolstay abletay, utbay otheryay indskay ofyay aminggay etssay existyay. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay oficientpray withyay ayay aminggay etsay, youyay ancay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay abilityyay eckschay youyay akemay otay ayplay ayay amegay withyay atthay etsay. 
 Eachyay ypetay ofyay aminggay etsay equiresray ayay eparatesay oficiencypray. Erbalismhay  Itkay. 
 Isthay itkay ontainscay ayay arietyvay ofyay instrumentsyay uchsay asyay ippersclay, ortarmay andyay estlepay, andyay ouchespay andyay ialsvay usedyay ybay erbalistshay otay eatecray emediesray andyay otionspay. 
 Oficiencypray withyay isthay itkay etslay youyay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay anyyay abilityyay eckschay youyay akemay otay identifyyay oryay applyyay erbshay. 
 Alsoyay, oficiencypray withyay isthay itkay isyay equiredray otay eatecray antitoxinyay andyay otionspay ofyay ealinghay. Usicalmay  Instrumentyay. 
 Everalsay ofyay ethay ostmay ommoncay ypestay ofyay usicalmay instrumentsyay areyay ownshay onyay ethay abletay asyay examplesyay. 
 Ifyay youyay avehay oficiencypray withyay ayay ivengay usicalmay instrumentyay, youyay ancay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay anyyay abilityyay eckschay youyay akemay otay ayplay usicmay withyay ethay instrumentyay. 
Ayay ardbay ancay useyay ayay usicalmay instrumentyay asyay ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay, asyay escribedday inyay apterchay 10. 
 Eachyay ypetay ofyay usicalmay instrumentyay equiresray ayay eparatesay oficiencypray. Avigator’snay  Oolstay. 
 Isthay etsay ofyay instrumentsyay isyay usedyay orfay avigationnay atyay easay. 
 Oficiencypray withyay avigator'snay oolstay etslay youyay artchay ayay ip'sshay oursecay andyay ollowfay avigationnay artschay. 
 Inyay additionyay, esethay oolstay allowyay youyay otay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay anyyay abilityyay eckchay youyay akemay otay avoidyay ettinggay ostlay atyay easay. Oisoner’spay  Itkay. 
Ayay oisoner’spay itkay includesyay ethay ialsvay, emicalschay, andyay otheryay equipmentyay ecessarynay orfay ethay eationcray ofyay oisonspay. 
 Oficiencypray withyay isthay itkay etslay youyay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay anyyay abilityyay eckschay youyay akemay otay aftcray oryay useyay oisonspay. Ievesthay’  Oolstay. 
 Isthay etsay ofyay oolstay includesyay ayay allsmay ilefay, ayay etsay ofyay ocklay ickspay, ayay allsmay irrormay ountedmay onyay ayay etalmay andlehay, ayay etsay ofyay arrow-bladednay issorsscay, andyay ayay airpay ofyay iersplay. 
 Ountsmay andyay  Ehiclesvay Ayay oodgay ountmay ancay elphay youyay ovemay oremay quicklyyay oughthray ethay wildernessyay, utbay itsyay imarypray urposepay isyay otay arrycay ethay eargay atthay wouldyay otherwiseyay owslay youyay ownday. 
 Ethay  Ountsmay andyay  Otheryay  Animalsyay abletay owsshay eachyay animal’syay eedspay andyay asebay arryingcay apacitycay.
