Anyay animalyay ullingpay ayay arriagecay, artcay, ariotchay, edslay, oryay wagonyay ancay ovemay weightyay upyay otay ivefay imestay itsyay asebay arryingcay apacitycay, includingyay ethay weightyay ofyay ethay ehiclevay. Ifyay ultiplemay animalsyay ullpay ethay amesay ehiclevay, eythay ancay addyay eirthay arryingcay apacitycay ogethertay. Ountsmay otheryay anthay osethay istedlay erehay areyay availableyay inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay, utbay eythay areyay areray andyay otnay ormallynay availableyay orfay urchasepay. 
 Esethay includeyay yingflay ountsmay (egasipay, iffonsgray, ippogriffshay, andyay imilarsay animalsyay) andyay evenyay aquaticyay ountsmay (iantgay easay orseshay, orfay exampleyay). 
 Acquiringyay uchsay ayay ountmay oftenyay eansmay ecuringsay anyay eggyay andyay aisingray ethay eaturecray yourselfyay, akingmay ayay argainbay withyay ayay owerfulpay entityyay, oryay egotiatingnay withyay ethay ountmay itselfyay. Ardingbay. 
 Ardingbay isyay armoryay esignedday otay otectpray anyay animal’syay eadhay, ecknay, estchay, andyay odybay. 
 Anyyay ypetay ofyay armoryay ownshay onyay ethay  Armoryay abletay inyay isthay apterchay ancay ebay urchasedpay asyay ardingbay. 
 Ethay ostcay isyay ourfay imestay ethay equivalentyay armoryay ademay orfay umanoidshay, andyay ityay weighsyay wicetay asyay uchmay. Addlessay. 
Ayay ilitarymay addlesay acesbray ethay iderray, elpinghay youyay eepkay youryay eatsay onyay anyay activeyay ountmay inyay attlebay. 
 Ityay ivesgay youyay advantageyay onyay anyyay eckchay youyay akemay otay emainray ountedmay. 
 Anyay exoticyay addlesay isyay equiredray orfay idingray anyyay aquaticyay oryay yingflay ountmay. Ehiclevay  Oficiencypray. 
 Ifyay youyay avehay oficiencypray withyay ayay ertaincay indkay ofyay ehiclevay (andlay oryay wateryay), youyay ancay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay anyyay eckchay youyay akemay otay ontrolcay atthay indkay ofyay ehiclevay inyay ifficultday ircumstancescay. Owedray  Esselsvay. 
 Eelboatskay andyay owboatsray areyay usedyay onyay akeslay andyay iversray. 
ethay ehiclevay. 
 Esethay ehiclesvay an’tcay ebay owedray againstyay anyyay ignificantsay urrentcay, utbay eythay ancay ebay ulledpay upstreamyay ybay aftdray animalsyay onyay ethay oresshay. 
Ayay owboatray weighsyay 100 oundspay, inyay asecay adventurersyay arrycay ityay overyay andlay. Ountsmay andyay  Otheryay  Animalsyay Itemyay Ostcay Eedspay Arryingcay Apacitycay Amelcay50 gpay50 ftay.480 lbay. Onkeyday oryay ulemay8 gpay40 ftay.420 lbay. Elephantyay200 gpay40 ftay.1,320 lbay. Orsehay, aftdray50 gpay40 ftay.540 lbay. Orsehay, idingray75 gpay60 ftay.480 lbay. Astiffmay25 gpay40 ftay.195 lbay. Onypay30 gpay40 ftay.225 lbay. Warhorseyay400 gpay60 ftay.540 lbay. Adetray  Oodsgay Ostmay wealthyay isyay otnay inyay oinscay. 
 Ityay isyay easuredmay inyay ivestocklay, aingray, andlay, ightsray otay ollectcay axestay, oryay ightsray otay esourcesray (uchsay asyay ayay inemay oryay ayay orestfay). Uildsgay, oblesnay, andyay oyaltyray egulateray adetray. 
 Arteredchay ompaniescay areyay antedgray ightsray otay onductcay adetray alongyay ertaincay outesray, otay endsay erchantmay ipsshay otay ariousvay ortspay, oryay otay uybay oryay ellsay ecificspay oodsgay. 
 Uildsgay etsay icespray orfay ethay oodsgay oryay ervicessay atthay eythay ontrolcay, andyay etermineday whoyay aymay oryay aymay otnay offeryay osethay oodsgay andyay ervicessay. 
 Erchantsmay ommonlycay exchangeyay adetray oodsgay withoutyay usingyay urrencycay. 
 Ethay  Adetray  Oodsgay abletay owsshay ethay aluevay ofyay ommonlycay exchangedyay oodsgay. Adetray  Oodsgay Ostcay Oodsgay1 cpay1 lbay. 
ofyay wheatyay2 cpay1 lbay. 
ofyay ourflay oryay oneyay ickenchay5 cpay1 lbay. 
ofyay altsay1 spay1 lbay. 
ofyay ironyay oryay 1 qsay. 
ydyay. 
ofyay anvascay5 spay1 lbay. 
ofyay oppercay oryay 1 qsay. 
ydyay. 
ofyay ottoncay othclay1 gpay1 lbay. 
ofyay ingergay oryay oneyay oatgay2 gpay1 lbay. 
ofyay innamoncay oryay epperpay, oryay oneyay eepshay3 gpay1 lbay. 
ofyay ovesclay oryay oneyay igpay5 gpay1 lbay. 
ofyay ilversay oryay 1 qsay. 
ydyay. 
ofyay inenlay10 gpay1 qsay. 
ydyay. 
ofyay ilksay oryay oneyay owcay15 gpay1 lbay. 
ofyay affronsay oryay oneyay oxyay50 gpay1 lbay. 
ofyay oldgay500 gpay1 lbay. 
ofyay atinumplay Expensesyay Whenyay otnay escendingday intoyay ethay epthsday ofyay ethay earthyay, exploringyay uinsray orfay ostlay easurestray, oryay wagingyay waryay againstyay ethay encroachingyay arknessday, adventurersyay acefay oremay undanemay ealitiesray. 
 Evenyay inyay ayay antasticalfay worldyay, eoplepay equireray asicbay ecessitiesnay uchsay asyay eltershay, ustenancesay, andyay othingclay. 
 Esethay ingsthay ostcay oneymay, althoughyay omesay ifestyleslay ostcay oremay anthay othersyay. Ifestylelay  Expensesyay Ifestylelay expensesyay ovidepray youyay withyay ayay implesay wayyay otay accountyay orfay ethay ostcay ofyay ivinglay inyay ayay antasyfay worldyay. 
 Eythay overcay youryay accommodationsyay, oodfay andyay inkdray, andyay allyay youryay otheryay ecessitiesnay. 
 Urthermorefay, expensesyay overcay ethay ostcay ofyay aintainingmay youryay equipmentyay osay youyay ancay ebay eadyray whenyay adventureyay extnay allscay. Atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay weekyay oryay onthmay (youryay oicechay), oosechay ayay ifestylelay omfray ethay  Expensesyay abletay andyay aypay ethay icepray otay ustainsay atthay ifestylelay. 
 Ethay icespray istedlay areyay erpay ayday, osay ifyay youyay wishyay otay alculatecay ethay ostcay ofyay youryay osenchay ifestylelay overyay ayay irty-daythay eriodpay, ultiplymay ethay istedlay icepray ybay 30. 
 Youryay ifestylelay ightmay angechay omfray oneyay eriodpay otay ethay extnay, asedbay onyay ethay undsfay youyay avehay atyay youryay isposalday, oryay youyay ightmay aintainmay ethay amesay ifestylelay oughoutthray youryay aracter’schay areercay. Youryay ifestylelay oicechay ancay avehay onsequencescay. 
 Aintainingmay ayay wealthyyay ifestylelay ightmay elphay youyay akemay ontactscay withyay ethay ichray andyay owerfulpay, oughthay youyay unray ethay iskray ofyay attractingyay ievesthay. 
 Wretchedyay. 
 Youyay ivelay inyay inhumaneyay onditionscay. 
 Withyay onay aceplay otay allcay omehay, youyay eltershay whereveryay youyay ancay, eakingsnay intoyay arnsbay, uddlinghay inyay oldyay atescray, andyay elyingray onyay ethay oodgay acesgray ofyay eoplepay etterbay offyay anthay youyay. 
Ayay wretchedyay ifestylelay esentspray abundantyay angersday. 
 Iolencevay, iseaseday, andyay ungerhay ollowfay youyay whereveryay youyay ogay. 
 Otheryay wretchedyay eoplepay ovetcay youryay armoryay, weaponsyay, andyay adventuringyay eargay, whichyay epresentray ayay ortunefay ybay eirthay andardsstay. 
 Youyay areyay eneathbay ethay oticenay ofyay ostmay eoplepay. Qualidsay. 
 Youyay ivelay inyay ayay eakylay ablestay, ayay ud-flooredmay uthay ustjay outsideyay owntay, oryay ayay ermin-infestedvay oardingbay ousehay inyay ethay worstyay artpay ofyay owntay. 
 Youyay avehay eltershay omfray ethay elementsyay, utbay youyay ivelay inyay ayay esperateday andyay oftenyay iolentvay environmentyay, inyay acesplay iferay withyay iseaseday, ungerhay, andyay isfortunemay. 
 Youyay areyay eneathbay ethay oticenay ofyay ostmay eoplepay, andyay youyay avehay ewfay egallay otectionspray. 
 Ostmay eoplepay atyay isthay ifestylelay evellay avehay ufferedsay omesay erribletay etbacksay. 
 Eythay ightmay ebay isturbedday, arkedmay asyay exilesyay, oryay uffersay omfray iseaseday. Oorpay. 
Ayay oorpay ifestylelay eansmay oinggay withoutyay ethay omfortscay availableyay inyay ayay ablestay ommunitycay. 
 Implesay oodfay andyay odgingslay, eadbarethray othingclay, andyay unpredictableyay onditionscay esultray inyay ayay ufficientsay, oughthay obablypray unpleasantyay, experienceyay. 
 Youryay accommodationsyay ightmay ebay ayay oomray inyay ayay ophouseflay oryay inyay ethay ommoncay oomray aboveyay ayay averntay. 
 Youyay enefitbay omfray omesay egallay otectionspray, utbay youyay illstay avehay otay ontendcay withyay iolencevay, imecray, andyay iseaseday. 
 Eoplepay atyay isthay ifestylelay evellay endtay otay ebay unskilledyay aborerslay, ostermongerscay, eddlerspay, ievesthay, ercenariesmay, andyay otheryay isreputableday ypestay. Odestmay. 
Ayay odestmay ifestylelay eepskay youyay outyay ofyay ethay umsslay andyay ensuresyay atthay youyay ancay aintainmay youryay equipmentyay. Youyay ivelay inyay anyay olderyay artpay ofyay owntay, entingray ayay oomray inyay ayay oardingbay ousehay, innyay, oryay empletay. 
 Youyay on'tday ogay ungryhay oryay irstythay, andyay youryay ivinglay onditionscay areyay eanclay, ifyay implesay. 
 Ordinaryyay eoplepay ivinglay odestmay ifestyleslay includeyay oldierssay withyay amiliesfay, aborerslay, udentsstay, iestspray, edgehay wizardsyay, andyay ethay ikelay. Omfortablecay. 
 Oosingchay ayay omfortablecay ifestylelay eansmay atthay youyay ancay affordyay icernay othingclay andyay ancay easilyyay aintainmay youryay equipmentyay. 
 Youyay ivelay inyay ayay allsmay ottagecay inyay ayay iddle-classmay eighborhoodnay oryay inyay ayay ivatepray oomray atyay ayay inefay innyay. 
 Youyay associateyay withyay erchantsmay, illedskay adespeopletray, andyay ilitarymay officersyay. Wealthyyay. 
 Oosingchay ayay wealthyyay ifestylelay eansmay ivinglay ayay ifelay ofyay uxurylay, oughthay youyay ightmay otnay avehay achievedyay ethay ocialsay atusstay associatedyay withyay ethay oldyay oneymay ofyay obilitynay oryay oyaltyray. 
 Youyay ivelay ayay ifestylelay omparablecay otay atthay ofyay ayay ighlyhay uccessfulsay erchantmay, ayay avoredfay ervantsay ofyay ethay oyaltyray, oryay ethay owneryay ofyay ayay ewfay allsmay usinessesbay. 
 Youyay avehay espectableray odgingslay, usuallyyay ayay aciousspay omehay inyay ayay oodgay artpay ofyay owntay oryay ayay omfortablecay uitesay atyay ayay inefay innyay. 
 Youyay ikelylay avehay ayay allsmay affstay ofyay ervantssay. Aristocraticyay. 
 Youyay ivelay ayay ifelay ofyay entyplay andyay omfortcay. 
 Youyay ovemay inyay irclescay opulatedpay ybay ethay ostmay owerfulpay eoplepay inyay ethay ommunitycay. 
 Youyay avehay excellentyay odgingslay, erhapspay ayay ownhousetay inyay ethay icestnay artpay ofyay owntay oryay oomsray inyay ethay inestfay innyay. 
 Youyay ineday atyay ethay estbay estaurantsray, etainray ethay ostmay illedskay andyay ashionablefay ailortay, andyay avehay ervantssay attendingyay otay youryay everyyay eednay. 
 Youyay eceiveray invitationsyay otay ethay ocialsay atheringsgay ofyay ethay ichray andyay owerfulpay, andyay endspay eveningsyay inyay ethay ompanycay ofyay oliticianspay, uildgay eaderslay, ighhay iestspray, andyay obilitynay. 
 Youyay ustmay alsoyay ontendcay withyay ethay ighesthay evelslay ofyay eceitday andyay eacherytray. 
 Ethay wealthieryay youyay areyay, ethay eatergray ethay ancechay youyay willyay ebay awndray intoyay oliticalpay intrigueyay asyay ayay awnpay oryay articipantpay. Oodfay,  Inkdray, andyay  Odginglay Ethay  Oodfay,  Inkdray, andyay  Odginglay abletay ivesgay icespray orfay individualyay oodfay itemsyay andyay ayay inglesay ight’snay odginglay. 
 Elfsay- Ufficiencysay Ethay expensesyay andyay ifestyleslay escribedday inyay isthay apterchay assumeyay atthay youyay areyay endingspay youryay imetay etweenbay adventuresyay inyay owntay, availingyay yourselfyay ofyay whateveryay ervicessay youyay ancay afford—payingyay orfay oodfay andyay eltershay, ayingpay ownspeopletay otay arpenshay youryay wordsay andyay epairray youryay armoryay, andyay osay onyay. 
 Omesay aracterschay, oughthay, ightmay eferpray otay endspay eirthay imetay awayyay omfray ivilizationcay, ustainingsay emselvesthay inyay ethay wildyay ybay untinghay, oragingfay, andyay epairingray eirthay ownyay eargay. Aintainingmay isthay indkay ofyay ifestylelay oesn’tday equireray youyay otay endspay anyyay oincay, utbay ityay isyay ime-consumingtay. 
 Ifyay youyay endspay youryay imetay etweenbay adventuresyay acticingpray ayay ofessionpray, asyay escribedday inyay apterchay 8, youyay ancay ekeyay outyay ethay equivalentyay ofyay ayay oorpay ifestylelay. 
 Oficiencypray inyay ethay  Urvivalsay illskay etslay youyay ivelay atyay ethay equivalentyay ofyay ayay omfortablecay ifestylelay. Ervicessay Adventurersyay ancay aypay onplayernay aracterschay otay assistyay emthay oryay actyay onyay eirthay ehalfbay inyay ayay arietyvay ofyay ircumstancescay. 
 Ostmay uchsay irelingshay avehay airlyfay ordinaryyay illsskay, whileyay othersyay areyay astersmay ofyay ayay aftcray oryay artyay, andyay ayay ewfay areyay expertsyay withyay ecializedspay adventuringyay illsskay. Omesay ofyay ethay ostmay asicbay ypestay ofyay irelingshay appearyay onyay ethay  Ervicessay abletay. 
 Otheryay ommoncay irelingshay includeyay anyyay ofyay ethay wideyay arietyvay ofyay eoplepay whoyay inhabityay ayay ypicaltay owntay oryay itycay, whenyay ethay adventurersyay aypay emthay otay erformpay ayay ecificspay asktay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay wizardyay ightmay aypay ayay arpentercay otay onstructcay anyay elaborateyay estchay (andyay itsyay iniaturemay eplicaray) orfay useyay inyay ethay  Eomund’slay ecretsay estchay ellspay. 
Ayay ighterfay ightmay ommissioncay ayay acksmithblay otay orgefay ayay ecialspay wordsay. 
Ayay ardbay ightmay aypay ayay ailortay otay akemay exquisiteyay othingclay orfay anyay upcomingyay erformancepay inyay ontfray ofyay ethay ukeday. Otheryay irelingshay ovidepray oremay expertyay oryay angerousday ervicessay. 
 Ercenarymay oldierssay aidpay otay elphay ethay adventurersyay aketay onyay ayay obgoblinhay armyyay areyay irelingshay, asyay areyay agessay iredhay otay esearchray ancientyay oryay esotericyay orelay. 
 Ifyay ayay igh-levelhay adventureryay establishesyay ayay ongholdstray ofyay omesay indkay, ehay oryay eshay ightmay irehay ayay wholeyay affstay ofyay ervantssay andyay agentsyay otay unray ethay aceplay, omfray ayay astellancay oryay ewardstay otay enialmay aborerslay otay eepkay ethay ablesstay eanclay. 
 Esethay irelingshay oftenyay enjoyyay ayay ong-termlay ontractcay atthay includesyay ayay aceplay otay ivelay withinyay ethay ongholdstray asyay artpay ofyay ethay offeredyay ompensationcay. Ervicessay Ervicesay Aypay Oachcay abcay Etweenbay ownstay3 cpay erpay ilemay Withinyay ayay itycay1 cpay Irelinghay Illedskay2 gpay erpay ayday Untrainedyay2 spay erpay ayday Essengermay2 cpay erpay ilemay Oadray oryay ategay olltay1 cpay Ip’sshay assagepay1 spay erpay ilemay Illedskay irelingshay includeyay anyoneyay iredhay otay erformpay ayay ervicesay atthay involvesyay ayay oficiencypray (includingyay weaponyay, ooltay, oryay illskay): ayay ercenarymay, artisanyay, ibescray, andyay osay onyay. 
 Ethay aypay ownshay isyay ayay inimummay; omesay expertyay irelingshay equireray oremay aypay. 
 Untrainedyay irelingshay areyay iredhay orfay enialmay workyay atthay equiresray onay articularpay illskay andyay ancay includeyay aborerslay, orterspay, aidsmay, andyay imilarsay workersyay. Ellcastingspay  Ervicessay  Eoplepay whoyay areyay ableyay otay astcay ellsspay on’tday allfay intoyay ethay ategorycay ofyay ordinaryyay irelingshay. 
 Ityay ightmay ebay ossiblepay otay indfay omeonesay willingyay otay astcay ayay ellspay inyay exchangeyay orfay oincay oryay avorsfay, utbay ityay isyay arelyray easyyay andyay onay establishedyay aypay atesray existyay. 
 Asyay ayay uleray, ethay igherhay ethay evellay ofyay ethay esiredday ellspay, ethay arderhay ityay isyay otay indfay omeonesay whoyay ancay astcay ityay andyay ethay oremay ityay ostscay. Iringhay omeonesay otay astcay ayay elativelyray ommoncay ellspay ofyay 1stay oryay 2nday evellay, uchsay asyay urecay woundsyay oryay identifyyay, isyay easyyay enoughyay inyay ayay itycay oryay owntay, andyay ightmay ostcay 10 otay 50 oldgay iecespay (usplay ethay ostcay ofyay anyyay expensiveyay aterialmay omponentscay). 
 Indingfay omeonesay ableyay andyay willingyay otay astcay ayay igher-levelhay ellspay ightmay involveyay avelingtray otay ayay argelay itycay, erhapspay oneyay withyay ayay universityyay oryay ominentpray empletay. 
 Onceyay oundfay, ethay ellcasterspay ightmay askyay orfay ayay ervicesay insteadyay ofyay ayment—thepay indkay ofyay ervicesay atthay onlyyay adventurersyay ancay ovidepray, uchsay asyay etrievingray ayay areray itemyay omfray ayay angerousday ocalelay oryay aversingtray ayay onstermay- infestedyay wildernessyay otay eliverday omethingsay importantyay otay ayay istantday ettlementsay. Inketstray Whenyay youyay akemay youryay aracterchay, youyay ancay ollray onceyay onyay ethay  Inketstray abletay otay aingay ayay inkettray, ayay implesay itemyay ightlylay ouchedtay ybay ysterymay. 
 Apterchay 6:  Ustomizationcay  Optionsyay ETHay OMBINATIONCay OFyay ABILITYyay ORESSCay, ACE,classray, andyay ackgroundbay efinesday youryay aracter’schay apabilitiescay inyay ethay amegay, andyay ethay ersonalpay etailsday youyay eatecray etsay youryay aracterchay apartyay omfray everyyay otheryay aracterchay. 
 Evenyay withinyay youryay assclay andyay aceray, youyay avehay optionsyay otay ine-tunefay whatyay youryay aracterchay ancay oday. 
 Utbay isthay apterchay isyay orfay ayersplay who—withyay ethay sdMsay ermission—wantpay otay ogay ayay epstay urtherfay. Isthay apterchay efinesday wotay optionalyay etssay ofyay ulesray orfay ustomizingcay youryay aracterchay: ulticlassingmay andyay eatsfay. 
 Ulticlassingmay etslay youyay ombinecay assesclay ogethertay, andyay eatsfay areyay ecialspay optionsyay youyay ancay oosechay insteadyay ofyay increasingyay youryay abilityyay oresscay asyay youyay aingay evelslay. Youryay DMay ecidesday whetheryay esethay optionsyay areyay availableyay inyay ayay ampaigncay. Ulticlassingmay Ulticlassingmay allowsyay youyay otay aingay evelslay inyay ultiplemay assesclay. 
 Oingday osay etslay youyay ixmay ethay abilitiesyay ofyay osethay assesclay otay ealizeray ayay aracterchay onceptcay atthay ightmay otnay ebay eflectedray inyay oneyay ofyay ethay andardstay assclay optionsyay. Withyay isthay uleray, youyay avehay ethay optionyay ofyay aininggay ayay evellay inyay ayay ewnay assclay wheneveryay youyay advanceyay inyay evellay, insteadyay ofyay aininggay ayay evellay inyay youryay urrentcay assclay. 
 Youryay evelslay inyay allyay youryay assesclay areyay addedyay ogethertay otay etermineday youryay aracterchay evellay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay avehay eethray evelslay inyay wizardyay andyay wotay inyay ighterfay, you’reyay ayay 5levelthlay aracterchay. Asyay youyay advanceyay inyay evelslay, youyay ightmay imarilypray emainray ayay embermay ofyay youryay originalyay assclay withyay ustjay ayay ewfay evelslay inyay anotheryay assclay, oryay youyay ightmay angechay oursecay entirelyyay, evernay ookinglay ackbay atyay ethay assclay youyay eftlay ehindbay. 
 Youyay ightmay evenyay artstay ogressingpray inyay ayay irdthay oryay ourthfay assclay. 
 Omparedcay otay ayay ingle-classsay aracterchay ofyay ethay amesay evellay, you’llyay acrificesay omesay ocusfay inyay exchangeyay orfay ersatilityvay. Ulticlassingmay  Exampleyay Arygay isyay ayingplay ayay 4levelthlay ighterfay. 
 Whenyay ishay aracterchay earnsyay enoughyay experienceyay ointspay otay eachray 5thay evellay,  Arygay ecidesday atthay ishay aracterchay willyay ulticlassmay insteadyay ofyay ontinuingcay otay ogresspray asyay ayay ighterfay. 
 Ary’sgay ighterfay ashay eenbay endingspay ayay otlay ofyay imetay withyay  Ave’sday ogueray, andyay ashay evenyay eenbay oingday omesay obsjay onyay ethay idesay orfay ethay ocallay ievesthay’ uildgay asyay ayay uiserbray. 
 Arygay ecidesday atthay ishay aracterchay willyay ulticlassmay intoyay ethay ogueray assclay, andyay usthay ishay aracterchay ecomesbay ayay 4levelthlay ighterfay andyay 1stay- evellay ogueray (writtenyay asyay ighterfay 4/ogueray 1). Whenyay  Ary’sgay aracterchay earnsyay enoughyay experienceyay otay eachray 6thay evellay, ehay ancay ecideday whetheryay otay addyay anotheryay ighterfay evellay (ecomingbay ayay ighterfay 5/ogueray 1), anotheryay ogueray evellay (ecomingbay ayay ighterfay 4/ogueray 2), oryay ayay evellay inyay ayay irdthay assclay, erhapspay abblingday inyay wizardryyay anksthay otay ethay ometay ofyay ysteriousmay orelay ehay acquiredyay (ecomingbay ayay ighterfay 4/ogueray 1/ wizardyay 1). Erequisitespray  Otay qualifyyay orfay ayay ewnay assclay, youyay ustmay eetmay ethay abilityyay orescay erequisitespray orfay othbay youryay urrentcay assclay andyay youryay ewnay oneyay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Ulticlassingmay  Erequisitespray abletay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay arbarianbay whoyay ecidesday otay ulticlassmay intoyay ethay uiddray assclay ustmay avehay othbay  Engthstray andyay  Wisdomyay oresscay ofyay 13 oryay igherhay. 
 Withoutyay ethay ullfay ainingtray atthay ayay eginningbay aracterchay eceivesray, youyay ustmay ebay ayay quickyay udystay inyay youryay ewnay assclay, avinghay ayay aturalnay aptitudeyay atthay isyay eflectedray ybay igher-than-averagehay abilityyay oresscay. Ulticlassingmay Erequisitespray Assclay Abilityyay  Orescay  Inimummay Arbarianbay Engthstray 13 Ardbay Arismachay 13 Ericclay Wisdomyay 13 Uiddray Wisdomyay 13 Ighterfay Engthstray 13 oryay  Exterityday 13 Onkmay Exterityday 13 andyay  Wisdomyay 13 Aladinpay Engthstray 13 andyay  Arismachay 13 Angerray Exterityday 13 andyay  Wisdomyay 13 Ogueray Exterityday 13 Orcerersay Arismachay 13 Warlockyay Arismachay 13 Wizardyay Intelligenceyay 13 Experienceyay  Ointspay Ethay experienceyay ointpay ostcay otay aingay ayay evellay isyay alwaysyay asedbay onyay youryay otaltay aracterchay evellay, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Aracterchay  Advancementyay abletay inyay apterchay 1, otnay youryay evellay inyay ayay articularpay assclay. 
 Osay, ifyay youyay areyay ayay ericclay 6/ighterfay 1, youyay ustmay aingay enoughyay XPay otay eachray 8thay evellay eforebay youyay ancay aketay youryay econdsay evellay asyay ayay ighterfay oryay youryay eventhsay evellay asyay ayay ericclay. Ithay  Ointspay andyay  Ithay  Iceday Youyay aingay ethay ithay ointspay omfray youryay ewnay assclay asyay escribedday orfay evelslay afteryay 1stay. 
 Youyay aingay ethay 1levelstlay ithay ointspay orfay ayay assclay onlyyay whenyay youyay areyay ayay 1levelstlay aracterchay. Youyay addyay ogethertay ethay  Ithay  Iceday antedgray ybay allyay youryay assesclay otay ormfay youryay oolpay ofyay  Ithay  Iceday. 
 Ifyay ethay  Ithay  Iceday areyay ethay amesay ieday ypetay, youyay ancay implysay oolpay emthay ogethertay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, othbay ethay ighterfay andyay ethay aladinpay avehay ayay day10, osay ifyay youyay areyay ayay aladinpay 5/ighterfay 5, youyay avehay entay day10  Ithay  Iceday. 
 Ifyay youryay assesclay ivegay youyay  Ithay  Iceday ofyay ifferentday ypestay, eepkay acktray ofyay emthay eparatelysay. 
 Oficienciespray Whenyay youyay aingay ayay evellay inyay ayay assclay otheryay anthay youryay irstfay, youyay aingay onlyyay omesay ofyay atthay ass’sclay artingstay oficienciespray, asyay ownshay inyay ethay  Ulticlassingmay  Oficienciespray abletay. Assclay  Eaturesfay Whenyay youyay aingay ayay ewnay evellay inyay ayay assclay, youyay etgay itsyay eaturesfay orfay atthay evellay. 
Ayay ewfay eaturesfay, oweverhay, avehay additionalyay ulesray whenyay you’reyay ulticlassingmay:  Annelchay  Ivinityday,  Extrayay  Attackyay,  Unarmoredyay  Efenseday, andyay  Ellcastingspay. Annelchay  Ivinityday Ifyay youyay alreadyyay avehay ethay  Annelchay  Ivinityday eaturefay andyay aingay ayay evellay inyay ayay assclay atthay alsoyay antsgray ethay eaturefay, youyay aingay ethay  Annelchay  Ivinityday effectsyay antedgray ybay atthay assclay, utbay ettinggay ethay eaturefay againyay oesn’tday ivegay youyay anyay additionalyay useyay ofyay ityay. 
 Youyay aingay additionalyay usesyay onlyyay whenyay youyay eachray ayay assclay evellay atthay explicitlyyay antsgray emthay otay youyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay areyay ayay ericclay 6/aladinpay 4, youyay ancay useyay  Annelchay  Ivinityday wicetay etweenbay estsray ecausebay youyay areyay ighhay enoughyay evellay inyay ethay ericclay assclay otay avehay oremay usesyay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay useyay ethay eaturefay, youyay ancay oosechay anyyay ofyay ethay  Annelchay  Ivinityday effectsyay availableyay otay youyay omfray youryay wotay assesclay. Extrayay  Attackyay Ifyay youyay aingay ethay  Extrayay  Attackyay assclay eaturefay omfray oremay anthay oneyay assclay, ethay eaturesfay on’tday addyay ogethertay. 
 Youyay an’tcay akemay oremay anthay wotay attacksyay withyay isthay eaturefay unlessyay ityay ayssay youyay oday (asyay ethay ighter’sfay ersionvay ofyay  Extrayay  Attackyay oesday). 
 Imilarlysay, ethay warlock’syay eldritchyay invocationyay  Irstingthay  Adeblay oesn’tday ivegay youyay additionalyay attacksyay ifyay youyay alsoyay avehay  Extrayay  Attackyay. Unarmoredyay  Efenseday Ifyay youyay alreadyyay avehay ethay  Unarmoredyay  Efenseday eaturefay, youyay an’tcay aingay ityay againyay omfray anotheryay assclay. Ellcastingspay Youryay apacitycay orfay ellcastingspay ependsday artlypay onyay youryay ombinedcay evelslay inyay allyay youryay ellcastingspay assesclay andyay artlypay onyay youryay individualyay evelslay inyay osethay assesclay. 
 Onceyay youyay avehay ethay  Ellcastingspay eaturefay omfray oremay anthay oneyay assclay, useyay ethay ulesray elowbay. 
 Ifyay youyay ulticlassmay utbay avehay ethay  Ellcastingspay eaturefay omfray onlyyay oneyay assclay, youyay ollowfay ethay ulesray asyay escribedday inyay atthay assclay. Ellsspay  Ownknay andyay  Eparedpray. 
 Youyay etermineday whatyay ellsspay youyay owknay andyay ancay eparepray orfay eachyay assclay individuallyyay, asyay ifyay youyay wereyay ayay ingle-classedsay embermay ofyay atthay assclay. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay ayay angerray 4/wizardyay 3, orfay exampleyay, youyay owknay eethray 1levelstlay angerray ellsspay asedbay onyay youryay evelslay inyay ethay angerray assclay. 
 Asyay 3levelrdlay wizardyay, youyay owknay eethray wizardyay antripscay, andyay youryay ellbookspay ontainscay entay wizardyay ellsspay, wotay ofyay whichyay (ethay wotay youyay ainedgay whenyay youyay eachedray 3rday evellay asyay ayay wizardyay) ancay ebay 2levelndlay ellsspay. 
 Ifyay youryay  Intelligenceyay isyay 16, youyay ancay eparepray ixsay wizardyay ellsspay omfray youryay ellbookspay. Eachyay ellspay youyay owknay andyay eparepray isyay associatedyay withyay oneyay ofyay youryay assesclay, andyay youyay useyay ethay ellcastingspay abilityyay ofyay atthay assclay whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay. 
 Imilarlysay, ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay, uchsay asyay ayay olyhay ymbolsay, ancay ebay usedyay onlyyay orfay ethay ellsspay omfray ethay assclay associatedyay withyay atthay ocusfay. Ellspay  Otsslay. 
 Youyay etermineday youryay availableyay ellspay otsslay ybay addingyay ogethertay allyay youryay evelslay inyay ethay ardbay, ericclay, uiddray, orcerersay, andyay wizardyay assesclay, alfhay youryay evelslay (oundedray ownday) inyay ethay aladinpay andyay angerray assesclay, andyay ayay irdthay ofyay youryay ighterfay oryay ogueray evelslay (oundedray ownday) ifyay youyay avehay ethay  Eldritchyay  Ightknay oryay ethay  Arcaneyay  Ickstertray eaturefay. 
 Useyay isthay otaltay otay etermineday youryay ellspay otsslay ybay onsultingcay ethay  Ulticlassmay  Ellcasterspay abletay. Ifyay youyay avehay oremay anthay oneyay ellcastingspay assclay, isthay abletay ightmay ivegay youyay ellspay otsslay ofyay ayay evellay atthay isyay igherhay anthay ethay ellsspay youyay owknay oryay ancay eparepray. 
 Youyay ancay useyay osethay otsslay, utbay onlyyay otay astcay youryay ower-levellay ellsspay. 
 Ifyay ayay owerlay- evellay ellspay atthay youyay astcay, ikelay urningbay andshay, ashay anyay enhancedyay effectyay whenyay astcay usingyay ayay igher-levelhay otslay, youyay ancay useyay ethay enhancedyay effectyay, evenyay oughthay youyay on’tday avehay anyyay ellsspay ofyay atthay igherhay evellay. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay areyay ethay aforementionedyay angerray 4/ wizardyay 3, youyay ountcay asyay ayay 5levelthlay aracterchay whenyay eterminingday youryay ellspay otsslay: youyay avehay ourfay 1levelstlay otsslay, eethray 2levelndlay otsslay, andyay wotay 3levelrdlay otsslay. 
 Oweverhay, youyay on’tday owknay anyyay 3levelrdlay ellsspay, ornay oday youyay owknay anyyay 2levelndlay angerray ellsspay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay ethay ellspay otsslay ofyay osethay evelslay otay astcay ethay ellsspay youyay oday ow—andknay otentiallypay enhanceyay eirthay effectsyay. Actpay  Agicmay. 
•  Imbingclay oesn’tday alvehay youryay eedspay.•  Youyay ancay akemay ayay unningray onglay umpjay oryay ayay unningray ighhay umpjay afteryay ovingmay onlyyay 5 eetfay onyay ootfay, atherray anthay10 eetfay. Actoryay Illedskay atyay imicrymay andyay amaticsdray, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Increaseyay youryay  Arismachay orescay ybay 1, otay ayay aximummay ofyay 20.•  Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay  Arismachay ( Eceptionday) andyay  Arismachay ( Erformancepay) eckschay whenyay yingtray otay asspay yourselfyay offyay asyay ayay ifferentday ersonpay.•  Youyay ancay imicmay ethay eechspay ofyay anotheryay ersonpay oryay ethay oundssay ademay ybay otheryay eaturescray. 
 Youyay ustmay avehay eardhay ethay ersonpay eakingspay, oryay eardhay ethay eaturecray akemay ethay oundsay, orfay atyay eastlay 1 inutemay. 
Ayay uccessfulsay  Wisdomyay ( Insightyay) eckchay ontestedcay ybay youryay  Arismachay ( Eceptionday) eckchay allowsyay ayay istenerlay otay etermineday atthay ethay effectyay isyay akedfay. Argerchay Whenyay youyay useyay youryay actionyay otay  Ashday, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay otay akemay oneyay eleemay weaponyay attackyay oryay otay oveshay ayay eaturecray. Ifyay youyay ovemay atyay eastlay 10 eetfay inyay ayay aightstray inelay immediatelyyay eforebay akingtay isthay onusbay actionyay, youyay eitheryay aingay ayay +5 onusbay otay ethay attack’syay amageday ollray (ifyay youyay osechay otay akemay ayay eleemay attackyay andyay ithay) oryay ushpay ethay argettay upyay otay 10 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay (ifyay youyay osechay otay oveshay andyay youyay ucceedsay). Ossbowcray  Expertyay Anksthay otay extensiveyay acticepray withyay ethay ossbowcray, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Youyay ignoreyay ethay oadinglay qualityyay ofyay ossbowscray withyay whichyay youyay areyay oficientpray.•  Eingbay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ayay ostilehay eaturecray oesn’tday imposeyay isadvantageday onyay youryay angedray attackyay ollsray.•  Whenyay youyay useyay ethay  Attackyay actionyay andyay attackyay withyay ayay oneyay- andedhay weaponyay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay otay attackyay withyay ayay oadedlay andhay ossbowcray youyay areyay oldinghay. Efensiveday  Uelistday Erequisitepray:  Exterityday 13 oryay igherhay Whenyay youyay areyay wieldingyay ayay inessefay weaponyay withyay whichyay youyay areyay oficientpray andyay anotheryay eaturecray itshay youyay withyay ayay eleemay attackyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay youryay ACyay orfay atthay attackyay, otentiallypay ausingcay ethay attackyay otay issmay youyay. Ualday  Wielderyay Youyay astermay ightingfay withyay wotay weaponsyay, aininggay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Youyay aingay ayay +1 onusbay otay ACyay whileyay youyay areyay wieldingyay ayay eparatesay eleemay weaponyay inyay eachyay andhay.•  Youyay ancay useyay wo-weapontay ightingfay evenyay whenyay ethay oneyay- andedhay eleemay weaponsyay youyay areyay wieldingyay aren’tyay ightlay.•  Youyay ancay awdray oryay owstay wotay one-handedyay weaponsyay whenyay youyay wouldyay ormallynay ebay ableyay otay awdray oryay owstay onlyyay oneyay. Eatsfay Ayay eatfay epresentsray ayay alenttay oryay anyay areayay ofyay expertiseyay atthay ivesgay ayay aracterchay ecialspay apabilitiescay. 
 Ityay embodiesyay ainingtray, experienceyay, andyay abilitiesyay eyondbay whatyay ayay assclay ovidespray. Atyay ertaincay evelslay, youryay assclay ivesgay youyay ethay  Abilityyay  Orescay  Improvementyay eaturefay. 
 Usingyay ethay optionalyay eatsfay uleray, youyay ancay orgofay akingtay atthay eaturefay otay aketay ayay eatfay ofyay youryay oicechay insteadyay. 
 Youyay ancay aketay eachyay eatfay onlyyay onceyay, unlessyay ethay eat’sfay escriptionday ayssay otherwiseyay. Youyay ustmay eetmay anyyay erequisitepray ecifiedspay inyay ayay eatfay otay aketay atthay eatfay. 
 Ifyay youyay everyay oselay ayay eat’sfay erequisitepray, youyay an’tcay useyay atthay eatfay untilyay youyay egainray ethay erequisitepray. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ethay  Applergray eatfay equiresray youyay otay avehay ayay  Engthstray ofyay 13 oryay igherhay. 
 Ungeonday  Elverday Alertyay otay ethay iddenhay apstray andyay ecretsay oorsday oundfay inyay anymay ungeonsday, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Whenyay youyay ollray ayay  Ithay  Ieday otay egainray ithay ointspay, ethay inimummay umbernay ofyay ithay ointspay youyay egainray omfray ethay ollray equalsyay wicetay youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay (inimummay ofyay 2).•  Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) andyay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckschay ademay otay etectday ethay esencepray ofyay ecretsay oorsday.•  Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray ademay otay avoidyay oryay esistray apstray.•  Youyay avehay esistanceray otay ethay amageday ealtday ybay apstray.•  Youyay ancay earchsay orfay apstray whileyay avelingtray atyay ayay ormalnay acepay, insteadyay ofyay onlyyay atyay ayay owslay acepay. Urableday Ardyhay andyay esilientray, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Increaseyay youryay  Onstitutioncay orescay ybay 1, otay ayay aximummay ofyay 20. Elementalyay  Adeptyay Erequisitepray:  Ethay abilityyay otay astcay atyay eastlay oneyay ellspay Whenyay youyay aingay isthay eatfay, oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay amageday ypestay: acidyay, oldcay, irefay, ightninglay, oryay underthay. Ellsspay youyay astcay ignoreyay esistanceray otay amageday ofyay ethay osenchay ypetay. 
 Inyay additionyay, whenyay youyay ollray amageday orfay ayay ellspay youyay astcay atthay ealsday amageday ofyay atthay ypetay, youyay ancay eattray anyyay 1 onyay ayay amageday ieday asyay ayay 2. Youyay ancay electsay isthay eatfay ultiplemay imestay. 
 Applergray Inspiringyay  Eaderlay Erequisitepray:  Engthstray 13 oryay igherhay You’veyay evelopedday ethay illsskay ecessarynay otay oldhay youryay ownyay inyay ose-quartersclay applinggray. 
 Youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay ayay eaturecray youyay areyay applinggray.•  Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ytray otay inpay ayay eaturecray apgray- edplay ybay youyay. 
 Otay oday osay, akemay anotheryay applegray eckchay. 
 Ifyay youyay ucceedsay, youyay andyay ethay eaturecray areyay othbay estrainedray untilyay ethay applegray endsyay.•  Eaturescray atthay areyay oneyay izesay argerlay anthay youyay on’tday autoyay- aticallymay ucceedsay onyay eckschay otay escapeyay youryay applegray. Eatgray  Weaponyay  Astermay You’veyay earnedlay otay utpay ethay weightyay ofyay ayay weaponyay otay youryay advantageyay, ettinglay itsyay omentummay empoweryay youryay ikesstray. 
 Youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Onyay youryay urntay, whenyay youyay orescay ayay iticalcray ithay withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay oryay educeray ayay eaturecray otay 0 ithay ointspay withyay oneyay, youyay ancay akemay oneyay eleemay weaponyay attackyay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay.•  Eforebay youyay akemay ayay eleemay attackyay withyay ayay eavyhay weaponyay atthay youyay areyay oficientpray withyay, youyay ancay oosechay otay aketay ayay -5 enaltypay otay ethay attackyay ollray. 
 Ifyay ethay attackyay itshay, youyay addyay +10 otay ethay attack’syay amageday. Ealerhay Youyay areyay anyay ableyay ysicianphay, allowingyay youyay otay endmay woundsyay quicklyyay andyay etgay youryay alliesyay ackbay inyay ethay ightfay. 
 Youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Whenyay youyay useyay ayay ealer’shay itkay otay abilizestay ayay yingday eacray- uretay, atthay eaturecray alsoyay egainsray 1 ithay ointpay.•  Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay endspay oneyay useyay ofyay ayay ealer’shay itkay otay endtay otay ayay eaturecray andyay estoreray 1day6 + 4 ithay ointspay otay ityay, usplay additionalyay ithay ointspay equalyay otay ethay eature’scray axmay- imumyay umbernay ofyay  Ithay  Iceday. 
 Ethay eaturecray an’tcay egainray ithay ointspay omfray isthay eatfay againyay untilyay ityay inishesfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Eavilyhay  Armoredyay Erequisitepray:  Oficiencypray withyay ediummay armoryay Youyay avehay ainedtray otay astermay ethay useyay ofyay eavyhay armoryay, aininggay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Increaseyay youryay  Engthstray orescay ybay 1, otay ayay aximummay ofyay 20.•  Youyay aingay oficiencypray withyay eavyhay armoryay. Eavyhay  Armoryay  Astermay Erequisitepray:  Oficiencypray withyay eavyhay armoryay Youyay ancay useyay youryay armoryay otay eflectday ikesstray atthay wouldyay illkay othersyay. 
 Youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Increaseyay youryay  Engthstray orescay ybay 1, otay ayay aximummay ofyay 20.•  Whileyay youyay areyay wearingyay eavyhay armoryay, udgeoningblay, iercingpay, andyay ashingslay amageday atthay youyay aketay omfray onnay agicalmay weaponsyay isyay educedray ybay 3. Erequisitepray:  Arismachay 13 oryay igherhay Youyay ancay endspay 10 inutesmay inspiringyay youryay ompanionscay, oringshay upyay eirthay esolveray otay ightfay. 
 Whenyay youyay oday osay, oosechay upyay otay ixsay iendlyfray eaturescray (whichyay ancay includeyay yourselfyay) withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay whoyay ancay eesay oryay earhay youyay andyay whoyay ancay understandyay youyay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray ancay aingay emporarytay ithay ointspay equalyay otay youryay evellay + youryay  Arismachay odifier.Amay eaturecray an’tcay aingay emporarytay ithay ointspay omfray isthay eatfay againyay untilyay ityay ashay inishedfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Eenkay  Indmay Youyay avehay ayay indmay atthay ancay acktray imetay, irectionday, andyay etailday withyay uncannyyay ecisionpray. 
 Youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay.•  Increaseyay youryay  Intelligenceyay orescay ybay 1, otay ayay aximummay ofyay 20.•  Youyay alwaysyay owknay whichyay wayyay isyay orthnay.•  Youyay alwaysyay owknay ethay umbernay ofyay ourshay eftlay eforebay ethay extnay unrisesay oryay unsetsay.•  Youyay ancay accuratelyyay ecallray anythingyay youyay avehay eensay oryay eardhay withinyay ethay astpay onthmay. Ightlylay  Armoredyay Youyay avehay ainedtray otay astermay ethay useyay ofyay ightlay armoryay, aininggay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Increaseyay youryay  Engthstray oryay  Exterityday orescay ybay 1, otay ayay aximummay ofyay 20.•  Youyay aingay oficiencypray withyay ightlay armoryay. Inguistlay Youyay avehay udiedstay anguageslay andyay odescay, aininggay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Increaseyay youryay  Intelligenceyay orescay ybay 1, otay ayay aximummay ofyay 20.•  Youyay earnlay eethray anguageslay ofyay youryay oicechay.•  Youyay ancay ablyyay eatecray writtenyay ipherscay. 
 Othersyay an’tcay eciday- erphay ayay odecay youyay eatecray unlessyay youyay eachtay emthay, eythay ucceedsay onyay anyay  Intelligenceyay eckchay (DCay equalyay otay youryay  Intelligenceyay orescay + youryay oficiencypray onusbay), oryay eythay useyay agicmay otay ecipherday ityay. Uckylay Youyay avehay inexplicableyay ucklay atthay eemssay otay ickkay inyay atyay ustjay ethay ightray omentmay. Youyay avehay 3 ucklay ointspay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay akemay anyay attackyay ollray, anyay abilityyay eckchay, oryay ayay avingsay owthray, youyay ancay endspay oneyay ucklay ointpay otay ollray anyay additionalyay day20. 
 Youyay ancay oosechay otay endspay oneyay ofyay youryay ucklay ointspay afteryay youyay ollray ethay ieday, utbay eforebay ethay outcomeyay isyay eterminedday. 
 Youyay oosechay whichyay ofyay ethay 0sdsay isyay usedyay orfay ethay attackyay ollray, abilityyay eckchay, oryay avingsay owthray. Youyay ancay alsoyay endspay oneyay ucklay ointpay whenyay anyay attackyay ollray isyay ademay againstyay youyay. 
 Agemay  Ayerslay Youyay avehay acticedpray echniquestay usefulyay inyay eleemay ombatcay againstyay ellcastersspay, aininggay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Whenyay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay astscay ayay ellspay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay akemay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay againstyay atthay eaturecray.•  Whenyay youyay amageday ayay eaturecray atthay isyay oncentratingcay onyay ayay ellspay, atthay eaturecray ashay isadvantageday onyay ethay avingsay owthray ityay akesmay otay aintainmay itsyay oncentrationcay.•  Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay ellsspay astcay ybay eaturescray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay. Agicmay  Initiateyay Oosechay ayay assclay: ardbay, ericclay, uiddray, orcerersay, warlockyay, oryay wizardyay. 
 Youyay earnlay wotay antripscay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray atthay ass’sclay ellspay istlay. Inyay additionyay, oosechay oneyay 1levelstlay ellspay omfray atthay amesay istlay. 
 Youyay earnlay atthay ellspay andyay ancay astcay ityay atyay itsyay owestlay evellay. 
 Onceyay youyay astcay ityay, youyay ustmay inishfay ayay onglay estray eforebay youyay ancay astcay ityay againyay. Youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay esethay ellsspay ependsday onyay ethay assclay youyay osechay:  Arismachay orfay ardbay, orcerersay, oryay warlockyay;  Wisdomyay orfay ericclay oryay uiddray: oryay  Intelligenceyay orfay wizardyay. Artialmay  Adeptyay Youyay avehay artialmay ainingtray atthay allowsyay youyay otay erformpay ecialspay ombatcay aneuversmay. 
 Youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Youyay earnlay wotay aneuversmay ofyay youryay oicechay omfray amongyay osethay availableyay otay ethay  Attlebay  Astermay archetypeyay inyay ethay ighterfay assclay. 
 Ifyay ayay aneuvermay youyay useyay equiresray youryay artay- etgay otay akemay ayay avingsay owthray otay esistray ethay aneuver’smay effectsyay, ethay avingsay owthray DCay equalsyay 8 + youryay ofipray- iencycay onusbay + youryay  Engthstray oryay  Exterityday odifiermay (youryay oicechay).•  Ifyay youyay alreadyyay avehay uperioritysay iceday, youyay aingay oneyay oremay; otherwiseyay, youyay avehay oneyay uperioritysay ieday, whichyay isyay ayay day6. 
 Isthay ieday isyay usedyay otay uelfay youryay aneuversmay. 
Ayay uperioritysay ieday isyay expendedyay whenyay youyay useyay ityay. 
 Youyay egainray youryay expendedyay uperioritysay iceday whenyay youyay inishfay ayay ortshay oryay onglay estray. Ediummay  Armoryay  Astermay Erequisitepray:  Oficiencypray withyay ediummay armoryay Youyay avehay acticedpray ovingmay inyay ediummay armoryay otay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Wearingyay ediummay armoryay oesn’tday imposeyay isadvantageday onyay youryay  Exterityday ( Ealthstay) eckschay.•  Whenyay youyay wearyay ediummay armoryay, youyay ancay addyay 3, atherray anthay 2, otay youryay ACyay ifyay youyay avehay ayay  Exterityday ofyay16 oryay igherhay. Obilemay Youyay areyay exceptionallyyay eedyspay andyay agileyay. 
 Youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Youryay eedspay increasesyay ybay 10 eetfay.•  Whenyay youyay useyay ethay  Ashday actionyay, ifficultday erraintay oesn’tday ostcay youyay extrayay ovementmay onyay atthay urntay.•  Whenyay youyay akemay ayay eleemay attackyay againstyay ayay eaturecray, youyay on’tday ovokepray opportunityyay attacksyay omfray atthay eaturecray orfay ethay estray ofyay ethay urntay, whetheryay youyay ithay oryay otnay. Oderatelymay  Armoredyay Erequisitepray:  Oficiencypray withyay ightlay armoryay Youyay avehay ainedtray otay astermay ethay useyay ofyay ediummay armoryay andyay ieldsshay, aininggay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Increaseyay youryay  Engthstray oryay  Exterityday orescay ybay 1, otay ayay aximummay ofyay 20.•  Youyay aingay oficiencypray withyay ediummay armoryay andyay ieldsshay. Ountedmay  Ombatantcay Youyay areyay ayay angerousday oefay otay acefay whileyay ountedmay. 
 Whileyay youyay areyay ountedmay andyay aren’tyay incapacitatedyay, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay eleemay attackyay ollsray againstyay anyyay unmountedyay eaturecray atthay isyay allersmay anthay youryay ountmay.•  Youyay ancay orcefay anyay attackyay argetedtay atyay youryay ountmay otay artay- etgay youyay insteadyay.•  Ifyay youryay ountmay isyay ubjectedsay otay anyay effectyay atthay allowsyay ityay otay  akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray otay aketay onlyyay alfhay amday- ageyay, ityay insteadyay akestay onay amageday ifyay ityay ucceedssay onyay ethay avingsay owthray, andyay onlyyay alfhay amageday ifyay ityay ailsfay. Observantyay Quickyay otay oticenay etailsday ofyay youryay environmentyay, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Increaseyay youryay  Intelligenceyay oryay  Wisdomyay orescay ybay 1, otay ayay aximummay ofyay 20.•  Ifyay youyay ancay eesay ayay eature’scray outhmay whileyay ityay isyay eakingspay ayay anguagelay youyay understandyay, youyay ancay interpretyay whatyay it’syay ayingsay ybay eadingray itsyay ipslay.•  Youyay avehay ayay +5 onusbay otay youryay assivepay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) andyay assivepay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) oresscay. Olearmpay  Astermay Youyay ancay eepkay youryay enemiesyay atyay aybay withyay eachray weaponsyay. Youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Whenyay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay andyay attackyay withyay onlyyay ayay aiveglay, alberdhay, oryay quarterstaffyay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay otay akemay ayay eleemay attackyay withyay ethay oppositeyay endyay ofyay ethay weaponyay. 
 Ethay weapon’syay amageday ieday orfay isthay attackyay isyay ayay day4, andyay ethay attackyay ealsday udgeoningblay amageday.•  Whileyay youyay areyay wieldingyay ayay aiveglay, alberdhay, ikepay, oryay quaryay- erstafftay, otheryay eaturescray ovokepray anyay opportunityyay attackyay omfray youyay whenyay eythay enteryay youryay eachray. Esilientray Oosechay oneyay abilityyay orescay. 
 Itualray  Astercay Erequisitepray:  Intelligenceyay oryay  Wisdomyay 13 oryay igherhay Youyay avehay earnedlay ayay umbernay ofyay ellsspay atthay youyay ancay astcay asyay itualsray. 
 Esethay ellsspay areyay writtenyay inyay ayay itualray ookbay, whichyay youyay ustmay avehay inyay andhay whileyay astingcay oneyay ofyay emthay. Whenyay youyay oosechay isthay eatfay, youyay acquireyay ayay itualray ookbay oldinghay wotay 1levelstlay ellsspay ofyay youryay oicechay. 
 Oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay assesclay: ardbay, ericclay, uiddray, orcerersay, warlockyay, oryay wizardyay. 
 Youyay ustmay oosechay youryay ellsspay omfray atthay ass’sclay ellspay istlay, andyay ethay ellsspay youyay oosechay ustmay avehay ethay itualray agtay. 
 Ethay assclay youyay oosechay alsoyay eterminesday youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay esethay ellsspay:  Arismachay orfay ardbay, orcerersay, oryay warlockyay;  Wisdomyay orfay ericclay oryay uiddray; oryay  Intelligenceyay orfay wizardyay. Ifyay youyay omecay acrossyay ayay ellspay inyay writtenyay ormfay, uchsay asyay ayay agicalmay ellspay ollscray oryay ayay wizard’syay ellbookspay, youyay ightmay ebay ableyay otay addyay ityay otay youryay itualray ookbay. 
 Ethay ellspay ustmay ebay onyay ethay ellspay istlay orfay ethay assclay youyay osechay, ethay ell’sspay evellay ancay ebay onay igherhay anthay alfhay youryay evellay (oundedray upyay), andityay ustmay avehay ethay itualray agtay. 
 Ethay ocesspray ofyay opyingcay ethay ellspay intoyay youryay itualray ookbay akestay 2 ourshay erpay evellay ofyay ethay ellspay, andyay ostscay 50 gpay erpay evellay. 
•  Eaturescray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay ovokepray opportunityyay attacksyay omfray youyay evenyay ifyay eythay aketay ethay  Isengageday actionyay eforebay eavinglay youryay eachray.•  Whenyay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay akesmay anyay attackyay againstyay ayay argettay otheryay anthay youyay (andyay atthay argettay oesn’tday avehay isthay eatfay), youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay akemay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay againstyay ethay attackingyay eaturecray. Arpshootershay Youyay avehay asteredmay angedray weaponsyay andyay ancay akemay otsshay atthay othersyay indfay impossibleyay. 
 Youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Attackingyay atyay onglay angeray oesn'tday imposeyay isadvantageday onyay youryay angedray weaponyay attackyay ollsray.•  Youryay angedray weaponyay attacksyay ignoreyay alfhay overcay andyay ee-quartersthray overcay.•  Eforebay youyay akemay anyay attackyay withyay ayay angedray weaponyay atthay youyay areyay oficientpray withyay, youyay ancay oosechay otay aketay ayay -5 enaltypay otay ethay attackyay ollray. 
 Ifyay ethay attackyay itshay, youyay addyay +10 otay ethay attack’syay amageday. Ieldshay  Astermay Youyay useyay ieldsshay otnay ustjay orfay otectionpray utbay alsoyay orfay offenseyay. 
 Youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay whileyay youyay areyay wieldingyay ayay ieldshay:•  Ifyay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay otay ytray otay oveshay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay withyay youryay ieldshay.•  Ifyay youyay aren’tyay incapacitatedyay, youyay ancay addyay youryay ield’sshay ACyay onusbay otay anyyay  Exterityday avingsay owthray youyay akemay againstyay ayay ellspay oryay otheryay armfulhay effectyay atthay argetstay onlyyay youyay.•  Ifyay youyay areyay ubjectedsay otay anyay effectyay atthay allowsyay youyay otay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray otay aketay onlyyay alfhay amday- ageyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay aketay onay amageday ifyay youyay ucceedsay onyay ethay avingsay owthray, interposingyay youryay ieldshay etweenbay yourselfyay andyay ethay ourcesay ofyay ethay effectyay. Illedskay Youyay aingay oficiencypray inyay anyyay ombinationcay ofyay eethray illsskay oryay oolstay ofyay youryay oicechay. Ulkerskay Erequisitepray:  Exterityday 13 oryay igherhay Youyay areyay expertyay atyay inkingslay oughthray adowsshay. 
 Youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Youyay ancay ytray otay idehay whenyay youyay areyay ightlylay obscuredyay omfray ethay eaturecray omfray whichyay youyay areyay idinghay.•  Whenyay youyay areyay iddenhay omfray ayay eaturecray andyay issmay ityay withyay ayay angedray weaponyay attackyay, akingmay ethay attackyay oesn'tday evealray youryay ositionpay.•  Imday ightlay oesn’tday imposeyay isadvantageday onyay youryay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay elyingray onyay ightsay. Ellspay  Ipersnay Erequisitepray:  Ethay abilityyay otay astcay atyay eastlay oneyay ellspay Youyay avehay earnedlay echniquestay otay enhanceyay youryay attacksyay withyay ertaincay indskay ofyay ellsspay, aininggay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Whenyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay atthay equiresray youyay otay akemay anyay attackyay ollray, ethay ell’sspay angeray isyay oubledday.•  Youryay angedray ellspay attacksyay ignoreyay alfhay overcay andyay ee-quartersthray overcay.•  Youyay earnlay oneyay antripcay atthay equiresray anyay attackyay ollray. 
 Oosechay ethay antripcay omfray ethay ardbay, ericclay, uiddray, orsay- erercay, warlockyay, oryay wizardyay ellspay istlay. 
 Youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay orfay isthay antripcay ependsday onyay ethay ellspay istlay youyay osechay omfray:  Arismachay orfay ardbay, orcerersay, oryay warlockyay;  Wisdomyay orfay ericclay oryay uiddray; oryay  Intelligenceyay orfay wizardyay. Averntay  Awlerbray Accustomedyay otay ough-and-tumbleray ightingfay usingyay whateveryay weaponsyay appenhay otay ebay atyay andhay, youyay aingay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Increaseyay youryay  Engthstray oryay  Onstitutioncay orescay ybay 1, otay ayay aximummay ofyay 20.•  Youyay areyay oficientpray withyay improvisedyay weaponsyay andyay unarmedyay ikesstray.•  Youryay unarmedyay ikestray usesyay ayay day4 orfay amageday.•  Whenyay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay anyay unarmedyay ikestray oryay anyay improvisedyay weaponyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay otay attemptyay otay applegray ethay argettay. Oughtay Youryay ithay ointpay aximummay increasesyay ybay anyay amountyay equalyay otay wicetay youryay evellay whenyay youyay aingay isthay eatfay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay aingay ayay evellay ereafterthay, youryay ithay ointpay aximummay increasesyay ybay anyay additionalyay 2 ithay ointspay. Waryay  Astercay Erequisitepray:  Ethay abilityyay otay astcay atyay eastlay oneyay ellspay Youyay avehay acticedpray astingcay ellsspay inyay ethay idstmay ofyay ombatcay, earninglay echniquestay atthay antgray youyay ethay ollowingfay enefitsbay:•  Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owsthray atthay youyay akemay otay aintainmay youryay oncentrationcay onyay ayay ellspay whenyay youyay aketay amageday.•  Youyay ancay erformpay ethay omaticsay omponentscay ofyay ellsspay evenyay whenyay youyay avehay weaponsyay oryay ayay ieldshay inyay oneyay oryay othbay andshay.•  Whenyay ayay ostilehay eature’scray ovementmay ovokespray anyay opportunityyay attackyay omfray youyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay eacray- iontay otay astcay ayay ellspay atyay ethay eaturecray, atherray anthay akingmay anyay opportunityyay attackyay. 
 Apterchay 7:  Usingyay  Abilityyay  Oresscay IXSay ABILITIESyay OVIDEPRay Ayay QUICKyay ESCRIPTIODay Ofnay everyyay eature’scray ysicalphay andyay entalmay aracteristicschay:•  Engthstray, easuringmay ysicalphay owerpay•  Exterityday, easuringmay agilityyay•  Onstitutioncay, easuringmay enduranceyay•  Intelligenceyay, easuringmay easoningray andyay emorymay•  Wisdomyay, easuringmay erceptionpay andyay insightyay•  Arismachay, easuringmay orcefay ofyay ersonalitypay Isyay ayay aracterchay uscle-boundmay andyay insightfulyay?  Illiantbray andyay armingchay?  Imblenay andyay ardyhay?  Abilityyay oresscay efineday esethay qualities—ayay eature’scray assetsyay asyay wellyay asyay weaknessesyay. Ethay eethray ainmay ollsray ofyay ethay ame—thegay abilityyay eckchay, ethay avingsay owthray, andyay ethay attackyay oll—relyray onyay ethay ixsay abilityyay oresscay. 
 Ethay ook’sbay introductionyay escribesday ethay asicbay uleray ehindbay esethay ollsray: ollray ayay day20, addyay anyay abilityyay odifiermay erivedday omfray oneyay ofyay ethay ixsay abilityyay oresscay, andyay omparecay ethay otaltay otay ayay argettay umbernay. Isthay apterchay ocusesfay onyay owhay otay useyay abilityyay eckschay andyay avingsay owsthray, overingcay ethay undamentalfay activitiesyay atthay eaturescray attemptyay inyay ethay amegay. 
 Ulesray orfay attackyay ollsray appearyay inyay apterchay 9. Abilityyay  Oresscay andyay  Odifiersmay Eachyay ofyay ayay eature’scray abilitiesyay ashay ayay orescay, ayay umbernay atthay efinesday ethay agnitudemay ofyay atthay abilityyay. 
 Anyay abilityyay orescay isyay otnay ustjay ayay easuremay ofyay innateyay apabilitiescay, utbay alsoyay encompassesyay ayay eature’scray ainingtray andyay ompetencecay inyay activitiesyay elatedray otay atthay ability.Ayay orescay ofyay 10 oryay 11 isyay ethay ormalnay umanhay averageyay, utbay adventurersyay andyay anymay onstersmay areyay ayay utcay aboveyay averageyay inyay ostmay abilitiesyay. 
Ayay orescay ofyay 18 isyay ethay ighesthay atthay ayay ersonpay usuallyyay eachesray. 
 Adventurersyay ancay avehay oresscay asyay ighhay asyay 20, andyay onstersmay andyay ivineday eingsbay ancay avehay oresscay asyay ighhay asyay 30. Eachyay abilityyay alsoyay ashay ayay odifiermay, erivedday omfray ethay orescay andyay angingray omfray 5 (orfay anyay abilityyay orescay ofyay 1) otay +10 (orfay ayay orescay ofyay 30). 
 Ethay  Abilityyay  Oresscay andyay  Odifiersmay abletay otesnay ethay abilityyay odifiersmay orfay ethay angeray ofyay ossiblepay abilityyay oresscay, omfray 1 otay 30. Abilityyay  Oresscay andyay  Odifiersmay Orescay Odifiermay Orescay Odifiermay1-516-17+32-3-418-19+44-5-320-21+56-7-222-23+68-9-124-25+710-11+026-27+812-13+128-29+914-15+230+10 Otay etermineday anyay abilityyay odifiermay withoutyay onsultingcay ethay abletay, ubtractsay 10 omfray ethay abilityyay orescay andyay enthay ivideday ethay otaltay ybay 2 (oundray ownday). Ecausebay abilityyay odifiersmay affectyay almostyay everyyay attackyay ollray, abilityyay eckchay, andyay avingsay owthray, abilityyay odifiersmay omecay upyay inyay ayplay oremay oftenyay anthay eirthay associatedyay oresscay. Advantageyay andyay  Isadvantageday Ometimessay ayay ecialspay abilityyay oryay ellspay ellstay youyay atthay youyay avehay advantageyay oryay isadvantageday onyay anyay abilityyay eckchay, ayay avingsay owthray, oryay anyay attackyay ollray. 
 Whenyay atthay appenshay, youyay ollray ayay econdsay day20 whenyay youyay akemay ethay ollray. 
 Useyay ethay igherhay ofyay ethay wotay ollsray ifyay youyay avehay advantageyay, andyay useyay ethay owerlay ollray ifyay youyay avehay isadvantageday. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay avehay isadvantageday andyay ollray ayay 17 andyay ayay 5, youyay useyay ethay 5. 
 Ifyay youyay insteadyay avehay advantageyay andyay ollray osethay umbersnay, youyay useyay ethay 17. Ifyay ultiplemay ituationssay affectyay ayay ollray andyay eachyay oneyay antsgray advantageyay oryay imposesyay isadvantageday onyay ityay, youyay on’tday ollray oremay anthay oneyay additionalyay day20. 
 Ifyay wotay avorablefay ituationssay antgray advantageyay, orfay exampleyay, youyay illstay ollray onlyyay oneyay additionalyay day20. Ifyay ircumstancescay ausecay ayay ollray otay avehay othbay advantageyay andyay isadvantageday, youyay areyay onsideredcay otay avehay eithernay ofyay emthay, andyay youyay ollray oneyay day20. 
 Isthay isyay uetray evenyay ifyay ultiplemay ircumstancescay imposeyay isadvantageday andyay onlyyay oneyay antsgray advantageyay oryay icevay ersavay. 
 Inyay uchsay ayay ituationsay, youyay avehay eithernay advantageyay ornay isadvantageday. Whenyay youyay avehay advantageyay oryay isadvantageday andyay omethingsay inyay ethay amegay, uchsay asyay ethay alfling’shay  Uckylay aittray, etslay youyay erollray ethay day20, youyay ancay erollray onlyyay oneyay ofyay ethay iceday. 
 Youyay oosechay whichyay oneyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay ayay alflinghay ashay advantageyay onyay anyay abilityyay eckchay andyay ollsray ayay 1 andyay ayay 13, ethay alflinghay ouldcay useyay ethay  Uckylay aittray otay erollray ethay 1. Youyay usuallyyay aingay advantageyay oryay isadvantageday oughthray ethay useyay ofyay ecialspay abilitiesyay, actionsyay, oryay ellsspay. 
 Inspirationyay (eesay apterchay 4) ancay alsoyay ivegay ayay aracterchay advantageyay onyay eckschay elatedray otay ethay aracter’schay ersonalitypay, idealsyay, oryay ondsbay. 
 Ethay DMay ancay alsoyay ecideday atthay ircumstancescay influenceyay ayay ollray inyay oneyay irectionday oryay ethay otheryay andyay antgray advantageyay oryay imposeyay isadvantageday asyay ayay esultray. Oficiencypray  Onusbay Aracterschay avehay ayay oficiencypray onusbay eterminedday ybay evellay, asyay etailedday inyay apterchay 1. 
 Onstersmay alsoyay avehay isthay onusbay, whichyay isyay incorporatedyay inyay eirthay atstay ocksblay. 
 Ethay onusbay isyay usedyay inyay ethay ulesray onyay abilityyay eckschay, avingsay owsthray, andyay attackyay ollsray. Youryay oficiencypray onusbay an’tcay ebay addedyay otay ayay inglesay ieday ollray oryay otheryay umbernay oremay anthay onceyay. 
eforebay youyay applyyay ityay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ethay ogue'sray  Expertiseyay eaturefay oublesday ethay oficiencypray onusbay orfay ertaincay abilityyay eckschay. 
 Ifyay ayay ircumstancecay uggestssay atthay youryay oficiencypray onusbay appliesyay oremay anthay onceyay otay ethay amesay ollray, youyay illstay addyay ityay onlyyay onceyay andyay ultiplymay oryay ivideday ityay onlyyay onceyay. Ybay ethay amesay okentay, ifyay ayay eaturefay oryay effectyay allowsyay youyay otay ultiplymay youryay oficiencypray onusbay whenyay akingmay anyay abilityyay eckchay atthay wouldn’tyay ormallynay enefitbay omfray youryay oficiencypray onusbay, youyay illstay on’tday addyay ethay onusbay otay ethay eckchay. 
 Orfay atthay eckchay youryay oficiencypray onusbay isyay 0, ivengay ethay actfay atthay ultiplyingmay 0 ybay anyyay umbernay isyay illstay 0. 
 Orfay instanceyay, ifyay youyay acklay oficiencypray inyay ethay  Istoryhay illskay, youyay aingay onay enefitbay omfray ayay eaturefay atthay etslay youyay oubleday youryay oficiencypray onusbay whenyay youyay akemay  Intelligenceyay ( Istoryhay) eckschay. Inyay eneralgay, youyay on’tday ultiplymay youryay oficiencypray onusbay orfay attackyay ollsray oryay avingsay owsthray. 
 Ifyay ayay eaturefay oryay effectyay allowsyay youyay otay oday osay, esethay amesay ulesray applyyay. Abilityyay  Eckschay Anyay abilityyay eckchay eststay ayay aracter’schay oryay onster’smay innateyay alenttay andyay ainingtray inyay anyay effortyay otay overcomeyay ayay allengechay. 
 Ethay DMay allscay orfay anyay abilityyay eckchay whenyay ayay aracterchay oryay onstermay attemptsyay anyay actionyay (otheryay anthay anyay attackyay) atthay ashay ayay ancechay ofyay ailurefay. 
 Whenyay ethay outcomeyay isyay uncertainyay, ethay iceday etermineday ethay esultsray. Orfay everyyay abilityyay eckchay, ethay DMay ecidesday whichyay ofyay ethay ixsay abilitiesyay isyay elevantray otay ethay asktay atyay andhay andyay ethay ifficultyday ofyay ethay asktay, epresentedray ybay ayay  Ifficultyday  Assclay. 
 Ethay oremay ifficultday ayay asktay, ethay igherhay itsyay DCay. 
 Ethay  Ypicaltay  Ifficultyday  Assesclay abletay owsshay ethay ostmay ommoncay Day csay. Ypicaltay  Ifficultyday  Assesclay Asktay  Ifficultyday DCay Eryvay easyyay5 Easyyay10 Ediummay15 Ardhay20 Eryvay ardhay25 Earlynay impossibleyay30 Otay akemay anyay abilityyay eckchay, ollray ayay day20 andyay addyay ethay elevantray abilityyay odifiermay. 
 Asyay withyay otheryay day20 ollsray, applyyay onusesbay andyay enaltiespay, andyay omparecay ethay otaltay otay ethay DCay. 
 Ifyay ethay otaltay equalsyay oryay exceedsyay ethay DCay, ethay abilityyay eckchay isyay ayay uccess—thesay eaturecray overcomesyay ethay allengechay atyay andhay. 
 Otherwiseyay, it’syay ayay ailurefay, whichyay eansmay ethay aracterchay oryay onstermay akesmay onay ogresspray owardtay ethay objectiveyay oryay akesmay ogresspray ombinedcay withyay ayay etbacksay eterminedday ybay ethay DMay. Ontestscay_______________________________ Ometimessay oneyay aracter’schay oryay onster’smay effortsyay areyay irectlyday opposedyay otay another’syay. 
 Isthay ancay occuryay whenyay othbay ofyay emthay areyay yingtray otay oday ethay amesay ingthay andyay onlyyay oneyay ancay ucceedsay, uchsay asyay attemptingyay otay atchsnay upyay ayay agicmay ingray atthay ashay allenfay onyay ethay oorflay. 
 Isthay ituationsay alsoyay appliesyay whenyay oneyay ofyay emthay isyay yingtray otay eventpray ethay otheryay oneyay omfray accomplishingyay ayay oal—forgay exampleyay, whenyay ayay onstermay iestray otay orcefay openyay ayay oorday atthay anyay adventurerisyay oldinghay osedclay. 
 Inyay ituationssay ikelay esethay, ethay outcomeyay isyay eterminedday ybay ayay ecialspay ormfay ofyay abilityyay eckchay, alledcay ayay ontestcay. Othbay articipantspay inyay ayay ontestcay akemay abilityyay eckschay appropriateyay otay eirthay effortsyay. 
 Eythay applyyay allyay appropriateyay onusesbay andyay enaltiespay, utbay insteadyay ofyay omparingcay ethay otaltay otay ayay DCay, eythay omparecay ethay otalstay ofyay eirthay wotay eckschay. 
 Ethay articipantpay withyay ethay igherhay eckchay otaltay winsyay ethay ontestcay. 
 Atthay aracterchay oryay onstermay eitheryay ucceedssay atyay ethay actionyay oryay eventspray ethay otheryay oneyay omfray ucceedingsay. Ifyay ethay ontestcay esultsray inyay ayay ietay, ethay ituationsay emainsray ethay amesay asyay ityay wasyay eforebay ethay ontestcay. 
 Usthay, oneyay ontestantcay ightmay winyay ethay ontestcay ybay efaultday. 
 Ifyay wotay aracterschay ietay inyay ayay ontestcay otay atchsnay ayay ingray offyay ethay oorflay, eithernay aracterchay absgray ityay. 
 Inyay ayay ontestcay etweenbay ayay onstermay yingtray otay openyay ayay oorday andyay anyay adventureryay yingtray otay eepkay ethay oorday osedclay, ayay ietay eansmay atthay ethay oorday emainsray utshay. Illsskay Eachyay abilityyay overscay ayay oadbray angeray ofyay apabilitiescay, includingyay illsskay atthay ayay aracterchay oryay ayay onstermay ancay ebay oficientpray inyay. 
Ayay illskay epresentsray ayay ecificspay aspectyay ofyay anyay abilityyay orescay, andyay anyay individual’syay oficiencypray inyay ayay illskay emonstratesday ayay ocusfay onyay atthay aspectyay. 
(Ayay aracter’schay artingstay illskay oficienciespray areyay eterminedday atyay aracterchay  eationcray, andyay ayay onster’smay illskay oficienciespray appearyay inyay ethay onster’smay atstay ockblay.) Orfay exampleyay, ayay  Exterityday eckchay ightmay eflectray ayay aracter’schay attemptyay otay ullpay offyay anyay acrobaticyay untstay, otay almpay anyay objectyay, oryay otay aystay iddenhay. 
 Eachyay ofyay esethay aspectsyay ofyay  Exterityday ashay anyay associatedyay illskay:  Acrobaticsyay,  Eightslay ofyay  Andhay, andyay  Ealthstay, espectivelyray. 
 Osay ayay aracterchay whoyay ashay oficiencypray inyay ethay  Ealthstay illskay isyay articularlypay oodgay atyay  Exterityday eckschay elatedray otay eakingsnay andyay idinghay. Ethay illsskay elatedray otay eachyay abilityyay orescay areyay ownshay inyay ethay ollowingfay istlay. 
( Onay illsskay areyay elatedray otay  Onstitutioncay.)  Eesay anyay ability’syay escriptionday inyay ethay aterlay ectionssay ofyay isthay apterchay orfay examplesyay ofyay owhay otay useyay ayay illskay associatedyay withyay anyay abilityyay. Ometimessay, ethay DMay ightmay askyay orfay anyay abilityyay eckchay usingyay ayay ecificspay ill—forskay exampleyay, “ Akemay ayay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckchay.”  Atyay otheryay imestay, ayay ayerplay ightmay askyay ethay DMay ifyay oficiencypray inyay ayay articularpay illskay appliesyay otay ayay eckchay. 
 Inyay eitheryay asecay, oficiencypray inyay ayay illskay eansmay anyay individualyay ancay addyay ishay oryay erhay oficiencypray onusbay otay abilityyay eckschay atthay involveyay atthay illskay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay ayay aracterchay attemptsyay otay imbclay upyay ayay angerousday iffclay, ethay  Ungeonday  Astermay ightmay askyay orfay ayay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay. 
 Ifyay ethay aracterchay isyay oficientpray inyay  Athleticsyay, ethay aracter’schay oficiencypray onusbay isyay addedyay otay ethay  Engthstray eckchay. 
 Ifyay ethay aracterchay ackslay atthay oficiencypray, ehay oryay eshay ustjay akesmay ayay  Engthstray eckchay. Ariantvay:  Illsskay withyay  Ifferentday  Abilitiesyay Ormallynay, youryay oficiencypray inyay ayay illskay appliesyay onlyyay otay ayay ecificspay indkay ofyay abilityyay eckchay. 
 Oficiencypray inyay  Athleticsyay, orfay exampleyay, usuallyyay appliesyay otay  Engthstray eckschay. 
 Inyay omesay ituationssay, oughthay, youryay oficiencypray ightmay easonablyray applyyay otay ayay ifferentday indkay ofyay eckchay. 
 Inyay uchsay asescay, ethay DMay ightmay askyay orfay ayay eckchay usingyay anyay unusualyay ombinationcay ofyay abilityyay andyay illskay, oryay youyay ightmay askyay youryay DMay ifyay youyay ancay applyyay ayay oficiencypray otay ayay ifferentday eckchay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay avehay otay wimsay omfray anyay offshoreyay islandyay otay ethay ainlandmay, youryay DMay ightmay allcay orfay ayay  Onstitutioncay eckchay otay eesay ifyay youyay avehay ethay aminastay otay akemay ityay atthay arfay. 
 Inyay isthay asecay, youryay DMay ightmay allowyay youyay otay applyyay youryay oficiencypray inyay  Athleticsyay andyay askyay orfay ayay  Onstitutioncay ( Athleticsyay) eckchay. 
 Osay ifyay you’reyay oficientpray inyay  Athleticsyay, youyay applyyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay ethay  Onstitutioncay eckchay ustjay asyay youyay wouldyay ormallynay oday orfay ayay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay. 
 Imilarlysay, whenyay youryay alf-orchay arbarianbay usesyay ayay isplayday ofyay awray engthstray otay intimidateyay anyay enemyyay, youryay DMay ightmay askyay orfay ayay  Engthstray ( Intimidationyay) eckchay, evenyay oughthay  Intimidationyay isyay ormallynay associatedyay withyay  Arismachay. Assivepay  Eckschay Ayay assivepay eckchay isyay ayay ecialspay indkay ofyay abilityyay eckchay atthay oesn’tday involveyay anyyay ieday ollsray. 
 Uchsay ayay eckchay ancay epresentray ethay averageyay esultray orfay ayay asktay oneday epeatedlyray, uchsay asyay earchingsay orfay ecretsay oorsday overyay andyay overyay againyay, oryay ancay ebay usedyay whenyay ethay DMay wantsyay otay ecretlysay etermineday whetheryay ethay aracterschay ucceedsay atyay omethingsay withoutyay ollingray iceday, uchsay asyay oticingnay ayay iddenhay onstermay. Ere’shay owhay otay etermineday ayay aracter’schay otaltay orfay ayay assivepay eckchay:10 + allyay odifiersmay atthay ormallynay applyyay otay ethay eckchay Ifyay ethay aracterchay ashay advantageyay onyay ethay eckchay, addyay 5. 
 Orfay isadvantageday, ubtractsay 5. 
 Ethay amegay efersray otay ayay assivepay eckchay otaltay asyay ayay orescay. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay ayay 1levelstlay aracterchay ashay ayay  Wisdomyay ofyay 15 andyay oficiencypray inyay  Erceptionpay, ehay oryay eshay ashay ayay assivepay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) orescay ofyay 14. Ethay ulesray onyay idinghay inyay ethay “ Exterityday” ectionsay elowbay elyray onyay assivepay eckschay, asyay oday ethay explorationyay ulesray inyay apterchay 8. Workingyay  Ogethertay Ometimessay wotay oryay oremay aracterschay eamtay upyay otay attemptyay ayay asktay. 
 Ethay aracterchay who’syay eadinglay ethay effort—oryay ethay oneyay withyay ethay ighesthay abilityyay odifier—canmay akemay anyay abilityyay eckchay withyay advantageyay, eflectingray ethay elphay ovidedpray ybay ethay otheryay aracterschay. 
 Inyay ombatcay, isthay equiresray ethay  Elphay actionyay (eesay apterchay 9).Ayay aracterchay ancay onlyyay ovidepray elphay ifyay ethay asktay isyay oneyay atthay ehay oryay eshay ouldcay attemptyay aloneyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, yingtray otay openyay ayay ocklay equiresray oficiencypray withyay ievesthay’ oolstay, osay acharacteryay whoyay ackslay atthay oficiencypray an’tcay elphay anotheryay aracterchay inyay atthay asktay. 
 Oreovermay, ayay aracterchay ancay elphay onlyyay whenyay wotay oryay oremay individualsyay workingyay ogethertay wouldyay actuallyyay ebay oductivepray. 
 Omesay askstay, uchsay asyay eadingthray ayay eedlenay, areyay onay easieryay withyay elphay. Oupgray  Eckschay Whenyay ayay umbernay ofyay individualsyay areyay yingtray otay accomplishyay omethingsay asyay ayay oupgray, ethay DMay ightmay askyay orfay ayay oupgray abilityyay eckchay. 
 Inyay uchsay ayay ituationsay, ethay aracterschay whoyay areyay illedskay atyay ayay articularpay asktay elphay overcay osethay whoyay aren'tyay. Otay akemay ayay oupgray abilityyay eckchay, everyoneyay inyay ethay oupgray akesmay ethay abilityyay eckchay. 
 Ifyay atyay eastlay alfhay ethay oupgray ucceedssay, ethay wholeyay oupgray ucceedssay. 
 Otherwiseyay, ethay oupgray ailsfay. Oupgray eckschay on’tday omecay upyay eryvay oftenyay, andyay ey’rethay ostmay usefulyay whenyay allyay ethay aracterschay ucceedsay oryay ailfay asyay ayay oupgray. 
 Orfay exampleyay, whenyay adventurersyay areyay avigatingnay ayay wampsay, ethay DMay ightmay allcay orfay ayay oupgray  Wisdomyay ( Urvivalsay) eckchay otay eesay ifyay ethay aracterschay ancay avoidyay ethay quicksandyay, inkholessay, andyay otheryay aturalnay azardshay ofyay ethay environmentyay. 
 Ifyay atyay eastlay alfhay ethay oupgray ucceedssay, ethay uccessfulsay aracterschay areyay ableyay otay uidegay eirthay ompanionscay outyay ofyay angerday. 
 Otherwiseyay, ethay oupgray umblesstay intoyay oneyay ofyay esethay azardshay. Usingyay  Eachyay  Abilityyay Everyyay asktay atthay ayay aracterchay oryay onstermay ightmay attemptyay inyay ethay amegay isyay overedcay ybay oneyay ofyay ethay ixsay abilitiesyay. 
 Isthay ectionsay explainsyay inyay oremay etailday whatyay osethay abilitiesyay eanmay andyay ethay waysyay eythay areyay usedyay inyay ethay amegay. Engthstray Engthstray easuresmay odilybay owerpay, athleticyay ainingtray, andyay ethay extentyay otay whichyay youyay ancay exertyay awray ysicalphay orcefay. Engthstray  Eckschay Ayay  Engthstray eckchay ancay odelmay anyyay attemptyay otay iftlay, ushpay, ullpay, oryay eakbray omethingsay, otay orcefay youryay odybay oughthray ayay acespay, oryay otay otherwiseyay applyyay utebray orcefay otay ayay ituationsay. 
 Ethay  Athleticsyay illskay eflectsray aptitudeyay inyay ertaincay indskay ofyay  Engthstray eckschay. Athleticsyay. 
 Youryay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay overscay ifficultday ituationssay youyay encounteryay whileyay imbingclay, umpingjay, oryay wimmingsay. 
 Examplesyay includeyay ethay ollowingfay activitiesyay:•  Youyay attemptyay otay imbclay ayay eershay oryay ipperyslay iffclay, avoidyay azardshay whileyay alingscay ayay wallyay, oryay ingclay otay ayay urfacesay whileyay omethingsay isyay yingtray otay ockknay youyay offyay.•  Youyay ytray otay umpjay anyay unusuallyyay onglay istanceday oryay ullpay offyay ayay untstay idjumpmay.•  Youyay ugglestray otay wimsay oryay aystay afloatyay inyay eacheroustray ur­rentscay, orm-tossedstay wavesyay, oryay areasyay ofyay ickthay eaweedsay. 
 Oryay anotheryay eaturecray iestray otay ushpay oryay ullpay youyay underwa­teryay oryay otherwiseyay interfereyay withyay youryay wimmingsay. Otheryay  Engthstray  Eckschay. 
•  Orcefay openyay ayay uckstay, ockedlay, oryay arredbay oorday•  Eakbray eefray ofyay ondsbay•  Ushpay oughthray ayay unneltay atthay isyay ootay allsmay•  Anghay onyay otay ayay wagonyay whileyay eingbay aggeddray ehindbay ityay•  Iptay overyay ayay atuestay•  Eepkay ayay oulderbay omfray ollingray Attackyay  Ollsray andyay  Amageday Youyay addyay youryay  Engthstray odifiermay otay youryay attackyay ollray andyay youryay amageday ollray whenyay attackingyay withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay uchsay asyay ayay acemay, ayay attleaxebay, oryay ayay avelinjay. 
 Youyay useyay eleemay weaponsyay otay akemay eleemay attacksyay inyay and-to-handhay ombatcay, andyay omesay ofyay emthay ancay ebay ownthray otay akemay ayay angedray attackyay. Iftinglay andyay  Arryingcay Youryay  Engthstray orescay eterminesday ethay amountyay ofyay weightyay youyay ancay earbay. 
 Ethay ollowingfay ermstay efineday whatyay youyay ancay iftlay oryay arrycay. Arryingcay  Apacitycay. 
 Youryay arryingcay apacitycay isyay youryay  Engthstray orescay ultipliedmay ybay 15. 
 Isthay isyay ethay weightyay (inyay oundspay) atthay youyay ancay arrycay, whichyay isyay ighhay enoughyay atthay ostmay aracterschay on’tday usuallyyay avehay otay worryyay aboutyay ityay. Ushpay,  Agdray, oryay  Iftlay. 
 Youyay ancay ushpay, agdray, oryay iftlay ayay weightyay inyay oundspay upyay otay wicetay youryay arryingcay apacitycay (oryay 30 imestay youryay  Engthstray orescay). 
 Whileyay ushingpay oryay aggingdray weightyay inyay excessyay ofyay youryay arryingcay apacitycay, youryay eedspay opsdray otay 5 eetfay. Izesay andyay  Engthstray. 
 Argerlay eaturescray ancay earbay oremay weightyay, whereasyay  Inytay eaturescray ancay arrycay esslay. 
 Orfay eachyay izesay ategorycay aboveyay  Ediummay, oubleday ethay eature’scray arryingcay apacitycay andyay ethay amountyay ityay ancay ushpay, agdray, oryay iftlay. 
 Orfay ayay  Inytay eaturecray, alvehay esethay weightsyay. Exterityday easuresmay agilityyay, eflexesray, andyay alancebay. 
 Exterityday  Eckschay Ayay  Exterityday eckchay ancay odelmay anyyay attemptyay otay ovemay imblynay, quicklyyay, oryay quietlyyay, oryay otay eepkay omfray allingfay onyay ickytray ootingfay. 
 Ethay  Acrobaticsyay,  Eightslay ofyay  Andhay, andyay  Ealthstay illsskay eflectray aptitudeyay inyay ertaincay indskay ofyay  Exterityday eckschay. Acrobaticsyay. 
 Youryay  Exterityday ( Acrobaticsyay) eckchay overscay youryay attemptyay otay aystay onyay youryay eetfay inyay ayay ickytray ituationsay, uchsay asyay whenyay you’reyay yingtray otay unray acrossyay ayay eetshay ofyay iceyay, alancebay onyay ayay ightropetay, oryay aystay uprightyay onyay ayay ockingray ip’sshay eckday. 
 Ethay DMay ightmay alsoyay allcay orfay ayay  Exterityday ( Acrobaticsyay) eckchay otay eesay ifyay youyay ancay erformpay acrobaticyay untsstay, includingyay ivesday, ollsray, omersaultssay, andyay ipsflay. Ariantvay:  Encumbranceyay  Ethay ulesray orfay iftinglay andyay arryingcay areyay intentionallyyay implesay. 
 Erehay isyay ayay ariantvay ifyay youyay areyay ookinglay orfay oremay etailedday ulesray orfay eterminingday owhay ayay aracterchay isyay inderedhay ybay ethay weightyay ofyay equipmentyay. 
 Eightslay ofyay  Andhay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay attemptyay anyay actyay ofyay egerdemainlay oryay anualmay ickerytray, uchsay asyay antingplay omethingsay onyay omeonesay elseyay oryay oncealingcay anyay objectyay onyay youryay ersonpay, akemay ayay  Exterityday ( Eightslay ofyay  Andhay) eckchay. 
 Ethay DMay ightmay alsoyay allcay orfay ayay  Exterityday ( Eightslay ofyay  Andhay) eckchay otay etermineday whetheryay youyay ancay iftlay ayay oincay ursepay offyay anotheryay ersonpay oryay ipslay omethingsay outyay ofyay anotheryay erson’spay ocketpay. Ealthstay. 
 Akemay ayay  Exterityday ( Ealthstay) eckchay whenyay youyay attemptyay otay oncealcay yourselfyay omfray enemiesyay, inkslay astpay uardsgay, ipslay awayyay withoutyay eingbay oticednay, oryay eaksnay upyay onyay omeonesay withoutyay eingbay eensay oryay eardhay. Otheryay  Exterityday  Eckschay. 
 Ethay DMay ightmay allcay orfay ayay  Exterityday eckchay whenyay youyay ytray otay accomplishyay askstay ikelay ethay ollowingfay:•  Ontrolcay ayay eavilyhay adenlay artcay onyay ayay eepstay escentday•  Eerstay ayay ariotchay aroundyay ayay ighttay urntay•  Ickpay ayay ocklay•  Isableday ayay aptray•  Ecurelysay ietay upyay ayay isonerpray•  Wriggleyay eefray ofyay ondsbay•  Ayplay ayay ingedstray instrumentyay•  Aftcray ayay allsmay oryay etailedday objectyay Attackyay  Ollsray andyay  Amageday Youyay addyay youryay  Exterityday odifiermay otay youryay attackyay ollray andyay youryay amageday ollray whenyay attackingyay withyay ayay angedray weaponyay, uchsay asyay ayay ingslay oryay ayay ongbowlay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay addyay youryay  Exterityday odifiermay otay youryay attackyay ollray andyay youryay amageday ollray whenyay attackingyay withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay atthay ashay ethay inessefay opertypray, uchsay asyay ayay aggerday oryay ayay apierray. Idinghay Whenyay youyay ytray otay idehay, akemay ayay  Exterityday ( Ealthstay) eckchay. 
 Untilyay youyay areyay iscoveredday oryay youyay opstay idinghay, atthay eck’schay otaltay isyay ontestedcay ybay ethay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckchay ofyay anyyay eaturecray atthay activelyyay earchessay orfay ignssay ofyay youryay esencepray.
