Youyay an’tcay idehay omfray ayay eaturecray atthay ancay eesay youyay, andyay ifyay youyay akemay oisenay (uchsay asyay outingshay ayay warningyay oryay ockingknay overyay ayay asevay), youyay ivegay awayyay youryay ositionpay. 
 Anyay invisibleyay eaturecray an’tcay ebay eensay, osay ityay ancay alwaysyay ytray otay idehay. 
 Ignssay ofyay itsyay assagepay ightmay illstay ebay oticednay, oweverhay, andyay ityay illstay ashay otay aystay quietyay. Inyay ombatcay, ostmay eaturescray aystay alertyay orfay ignssay ofyay angerday allyay aroundyay, osay ifyay youyay omecay outyay ofyay idinghay andyay approachyay ayay eaturecray, ityay usuallyyay eessay youyay. 
 Oweverhay, underyay ertaincay ircumstancescay, ethay  Ungeonday  Astermay ightmay allowyay youyay otay aystay iddenhay asyay youyay approachyay ayay eaturecray atthay isyay istractedday, allowingyay youyay otay aingay advantageyay onyay anyay attackyay eforebay youyay areyay eensay. Assivepay  Erceptionpay. 
 Whenyay youyay idehay, ere’sthay ayay ancechay omeonesay willyay oticenay youyay evenyay ifyay eythay aren'tyay earchingsay. 
 Otay etermineday whetheryay uchsay ayay eaturecray oticesnay youyay, ethay DMay omparescay youryay  Exterityday ( Ealthstay) eckchay withyay atthay eature’scray assivepay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) orescay, whichyay equalsyay 10 + ethay eature’scray  Wisdomyay odifiermay, asyay wellyay asyay anyyay otheryay onusesbay oryay enaltiespay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray ashay advantageyay, addyay 5. 
 Orfay isadvantageday, ubtractsay 5. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay ayay 1levelstlay aracterchay (withyay ayay oficiencypray onusbay ofyay +2) ashay ayay  Wisdomyay ofyay 15 (ayay +2 odifiermay) andyay oficiencypray inyay  Erceptionpay, ehay oryay eshay ashay ayay assivepay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) ofyay 14. Whatyay  Ancay  Youyay  Eesay?  Oneyay ofyay ethay ainmay actorsfay inyay eterminingday whetheryay youyay ancay indfay ayay iddenhay eaturecray oryay objectyay isyay owhay wellyay youyay ancay eesay inyay anyay areayay, whichyay ightmay ebay ightlylay oryay eavilyhay obscuredyay, asyay explainedyay inyay apterchay 8. Armoryay  Assglay Ependingday onyay ethay armoryay youyay wearyay, youyay ightmay addyay omesay oryay allyay ofyay youryay  Exterityday odifiermay otay youryay  Armoryay  Assclay, asyay escribedday inyay apterchay 5. Initiativeyay Atyay ethay eginningbay ofyay everyyay ombatcay, youyay ollray initiativeyay ybay akingmay ayay  Exterityday eckchay. 
 Initiativeyay eterminesday ethay orderyay ofyay eaturescray’ urnstay inyay ombatcay, asyay escribedday inyay apterchay 9. Onstitutioncay Onstitutioncay easuresmay ealthhay, aminastay, andyay italvay orcefay. Onstitutioncay  Eckschay Onstitutioncay eckschay areyay uncommonyay, andyay onay illsskay applyyay otay  Onstitutioncay eckschay, ecausebay ethay enduranceyay isthay abilityyay epresentsray isyay argelylay assivepay atherray anthay involvingyay ayay ecificspay effortyay onyay ethay artpay ofyay ayay aracterchay oryay onster.Amay  Onstitutioncay eckchay ancay odelmay youryay attemptyay otay ushpay eyondbay ormalnay imitslay, oweverhay. Ethay DMay ightmay allcay orfay ayay  Onstitutioncay eckchay whenyay youyay ytray otay accomplishyay askstay ikelay ethay ollowingfay:•  Oldhay youryay eathbray•  Archmay oryay aborlay orfay ourshay withoutyay estray•  Ogay withoutyay eepslay•  Urvivesay withoutyay oodfay oryay wateryay•  Quaffyay anyay entireyay einstay ofyay aleyay inyay oneyay ogay Ithay  Ointspay Youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay ontributescay otay youryay ithay ointspay. 
 Ypicallytay, youyay addyay youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay otay eachyay  Ithay  Ieday youyay ollray orfay youryay ithay ointspay. Ifyay youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay angeschay, youryay ithay ointpay aximummay angeschay asyay wellyay, asyay oughthay youyay adhay ethay ewnay odifiermay omfray 1stay evellay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay aiseray youryay  Onstitutioncay orescay whenyay youyay eachray 4thay evellay andyay youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay increasesyay omfray +1 otay +2, youyay adjustyay youryay ithay ointpay aximummay asyay oughthay ethay odifiermay adhay alwaysyay eenbay +2. 
 Osay youyay addyay 3 ithay ointspay orfay youryay irstfay eethray evelslay, andyay enthay ollray youryay ithay ointspay orfay 4thay evellay usingyay youryay ewnay odifiermay. 
 Oryay ifyay you’reyay 7thay evellay andyay omesay effectyay owerslay youryay  Onstitutioncay orescay osay asyay otay educeray youryay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay ybay 1, youryay ithay ointpay aximummay isyay educedray ybay 7. Intelligenceyay Intelligenceyay easuresmay entalmay acuityyay, accuracyyay ofyay ecallray, andyay ethay abilityyay otay easonray. Intelligenceyay  Eckschay Anyay  Intelligenceyay eckchay omescay intoyay ayplay whenyay youyay eednay otay awdray onyay ogiclay, educationyay, emorymay, oryay eductiveday easoningray. 
 Ethay  Arcanayay,  Istoryhay,  Investigationyay,  Aturenay, andyay  Eligionray illsskay eflectray aptitudeyay inyay ertaincay indskay ofyay  Intelligenceyay eckschay. Arcanayay. 
 Youryay  Intelligenceyay ( Arcanayay) eckchay easuresmay youryay abilityyay otay ecallray orelay aboutyay ellsspay, agicmay itemsyay, eldritchyay ymbolssay, agicalmay aditionstray, ethay anesplay ofyay existenceyay, andyay ethay inhabitantsyay ofyay osethay anesplay. Istoryhay. 
egendarylay eoplepay, ancientyay ingdomskay, astpay isputesday, ecentray warsyay, andyay ostlay ivilizationscay. Investigationyay. 
 Whenyay youyay ooklay aroundyay orfay uesclay andyay akemay eductionsday asedbay onyay osethay uesclay, youyay akemay anyay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay. 
 Youyay ightmay educeday ethay ocationlay ofyay ayay iddenhay objectyay, iscernday omfray ethay appearanceyay ofyay ayay woundyay whatyay indkay ofyay weaponyay ealtday ityay, oryay etermineday ethay weakestyay ointpay inyay ayay unneltay atthay ouldcay ausecay ityay otay ollapsecay. 
 Oringpay oughthray ancientyay ollsscray inyay earchsay ofyay ayay iddenhay agmentfray ofyay owledgeknay ightmay alsoyay allcay orfay anyay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay. Aturenay. 
 Youryay  Intelligenceyay ( Aturenay) eckchay easuresmay youryay abilityyay otay ecallray orelay aboutyay erraintay, antsplay andyay animalsyay, ethay weatheryay, andyay aturalnay yclescay. Eligionray. 
 Youryay  Intelligenceyay ( Eligionray) eckchay easuresmay youryay abilityyay otay ecallray orelay aboutyay eitiesday, itesray andyay ayerspray, eligiousray ierarchieshay, olyhay ymbolssay, andyay ethay acticespray ofyay ecretsay ultscay. Otheryay  Intelligenceyay  Eckschay. 
 Ethay DMay ightmay allcay orfay anyay  Intelligenceyay eckchay whenyay youyay ytray otay accomplishyay askstay ikelay ethay ollowingfay:•  Ommunicatecay withyay ayay eaturecray withoutyay usingyay wordsyay•  Estimateyay ethay aluevay ofyay ayay eciouspray itemyay•  Ullpay ogethertay ayay isguiseday otay asspay asyay ayay itycay uardgay•  Orgefay ayay ocumentday•  Ecallray orelay aboutyay ayay aftcray oryay adetray•  Winyay ayay amegay ofyay illskay Ellcastingspay  Abilityyay Wizardsyay useyay  Intelligenceyay asyay eirthay ellcastingspay abilityyay, whichyay elpshay etermineday ethay avingsay owthray Day csay ofyay ellsspay eythay astcay. Wisdomyay Wisdomyay eflectsray owhay attunedyay youyay areyay otay ethay worldyay aroundyay youyay andyay epresentsray erceptivenesspay andyay intuitionyay. Wisdomyay  Eckschay Ayay  Wisdomyay eckchay ightmay eflectray anyay effortyay otay eadray odybay anguagelay, understandyay omeone’ssay eelingsfay, oticenay ingsthay aboutyay ethay environmentyay, oryay arecay orfay anyay injuredyay ersonpay. 
 Ethay  Animalyay  Andlinghay,  Insightyay,  Edicinemay,  Erceptionpay, andyay  Urvivalsay illsskay eflectray aptitudeyay inyay ertaincay indskay ofyay  Wisdomyay eckschay. Animalyay  Andlinghay. 
 Whenyay erethay isyay anyyay questionyay whetheryay youyay ancay almcay ownday ayay omesticatedday animalyay, eepkay ayay ountmay omfray ettinggay ookedspay, oryay intuityay anyay animal’syay intentionsyay, ethay DMay ightmay allcay orfay ayay  Wisdomyay ( Animalyay  Andlinghay) eckchay. 
 Youyay alsoyay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay ( Animalyay  Andlinghay) eckchay otay ontrolcay youryay ountmay whenyay youyay attemptyay ayay iskyray aneuvermay. Insightyay. 
 Youryay  Wisdomyay ( Insightyay) eckchay ecidesday whetheryay youyay ancay etermineday ethay uetray intentionsyay ofyay ayay eaturecray, uchsay asyay whenyay earchingsay outyay ayay ielay oryay edictingpray omeone’ssay extnay ovemay. 
 Oingday osay involvesyay eaningglay uesclay omfray odybay anguagelay, eechspay abitshay, andyay angeschay inyay annerismsmay. Edicinemay. 
Ayay  Wisdomyay ( Edicinemay) eckchay etslay youyay ytray otay abilizestay ayay yingday ompanioncay oryay iagnoseday anyay illnessyay. Erceptionpay. 
 Youryay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckchay etslay youyay otspay, earhay, oryay otherwiseyay etectday ethay esencepray ofyay omethingsay. 
 Ityay easuresmay youryay eneralgay awarenessyay ofyay youryay urroundingssay andyay ethay eennesskay ofyay youryay ensessay. Indingfay ayay  Iddenhay  Objectyay Whenyay youryay aracterchay earchessay orfay ayay iddenhay objectyay uchsay asyay ayay ecretsay oorday oryay ayay aptray, ethay DMay ypicallytay asksyay youyay otay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckchay. 
 Uchsay ayay eckchay ancay ebay usedyay otay indfay iddenhay etailsday oryay otheryay informationyay andyay uesclay atthay youyay ightmay otherwiseyay overlookyay. Inyay ostmay asescay, youyay eednay otay escribeday whereyay youyay areyay ookinglay inyay orderyay orfay ethay DMay otay etermineday youryay ancechay ofyay uccesssay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay eykay isyay iddenhay eneathbay ayay etsay ofyay oldedfay othesclay inyay ethay optay awerdray ofyay ayay ureaubay. 
 Ifyay youyay elltay ethay DMay atthay youyay acepay aroundyay ethay oomray, ookinglay atyay ethay wallsyay andyay urniturefay orfay uesclay, youyay avehay onay ancechay ofyay indingfay ethay eykay, egardlessray ofyay youryay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckchay esultray. 
 Youyay wouldyay avehay otay ecifyspay atthay youyay wereyay openingyay ethay awersdray oryay earchingsay ethay ureaubay inyay orderyay otay avehay anyyay ancechay ofyay uccesssay. Orfay exampleyay, youyay ightmay ytray otay earhay ayay onversationcay oughthray ayay osedclay oorday, eavesdropyay underyay anyay openyay windowyay, oryay earhay onstersmay ovingmay ealthilystay inyay ethay orestfay. 
 Oryay youyay ightmay ytray otay otspay ingsthay atthay areyay obscuredyay oryay easyyay otay issmay, whetheryay eythay areyay orcsyay yinglay inyay ambushyay onyay ayay oadray, ugsthay idinghay inyay ethay adowsshay ofyay anyay alleyyay, oryay andlelightcay underyay ayay osedclay ecretsay oorday. Urvivalsay. 
 Ethay DMay ightmay askyay youyay otay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay ( Urvivalsay) eckchay otay ollowfay ackstray, unthay wildyay amegay, uidegay youryay oupgray oughthray ozenfray wastelandsyay, identifyyay ignssay atthay owlbearsyay ivelay earbynay, edictpray ethay weatheryay, oryay avoidyay quicksandyay andyay otheryay aturalnay azardshay. Otheryay  Wisdomyay  Eckschay. 
 Ethay DMay ightmay allcay orfay ayay  Wisdomyay eckchay whenyay youyay ytray otay accomplishyay askstay ikelay ethay ollowingfay:•  Etgay ayay utgay eelingfay aboutyay whatyay oursecay ofyay actionyay otay ollowfay•  Iscernday whetheryay ayay eeminglysay eadday oryay ivinglay eaturecray isyay undeadyay Ellcastingspay  Abilityyay Ericsclay, uidsdray, andyay angersray useyay  Wisdomyay asyay eirthay ellcastingspay abilityyay, whichyay elpshay etermineday ethay avingsay owthray Day csay ofyay ellsspay eythay astcay. Arismachay Arismachay easuresmay youryay abilityyay otay interactyay effectivelyyay withyay othersyay. 
 Ityay includesyay uchsay actorsfay asyay onfidencecay andyay eloquenceyay, andyay ityay ancay epresentray ayay armingchay oryay ommandingcay ersonalitypay. Arismachay  Eckschay Ayay  Arismachay eckchay ightmay ariseyay whenyay youyay ytray otay influenceyay oryay entertainyay othersyay, whenyay youyay ytray otay akemay anyay impressionyay oryay elltay ayay onvincingcay ielay, oryay whenyay youyay areyay avigatingnay ayay ickytray ocialsay ituationsay. 
 Ethay  Eceptionday,  Intimidationyay,  Erformancepay, andyay  Ersuasionpay illsskay eflectray aptitudeyay inyay ertaincay indskay ofyay  Arismachay eckschay. Eceptionday. 
 Youryay  Arismachay ( Eceptionday) eckchay eterminesday whetheryay youyay ancay onvincinglycay idehay ethay uthtray, eitheryay erballyvay oryay oughthray youryay actionsyay. 
 Isthay eceptionday ancay encompassyay everythingyay omfray isleadingmay othersyay oughthray ambiguityyay otay ellingtay outrightyay ieslay. 
 Intimidationyay. 
 Whenyay youyay attemptyay otay influenceyay omeonesay oughthray overtyay eatsthray, ostilehay actionsyay, andyay ysicalphay iolencevay, ethay DMay ightmay askyay youyay otay akemay ayay  Arismachay ( Intimidationyay) eckchay. 
 Examplesyay includeyay yingtray otay ypray informationyay outyay ofyay ayay isonerpray, onvincingcay eetstray ugsthay otay ackbay ownday omfray ayay onfrontationcay, oryay usingyay ethay edgeyay ofyay ayay okenbray ottlebay otay onvincecay ayay eeringsnay iziervay otay econsiderray ayay ecisionday. Erformancepay. 
 Youryay  Arismachay ( Erformancepay) eckchay eterminesday owhay wellyay youyay ancay elightday anyay audienceyay withyay usicmay, anceday, actingyay, orytellingstay, oryay omesay otheryay ormfay ofyay entertainmentyay. Ersuasionpay. 
 Whenyay youyay attemptyay otay influenceyay omeonesay oryay ayay oupgray ofyay eoplepay withyay acttay, ocialsay acesgray, oryay oodgay aturenay, ethay DMay ightmay askyay youyay otay akemay ayay  Arismachay ( Ersuasionpay) eckchay. 
 Ypicallytay, youyay useyay ersuasionpay whenyay actingyay inyay oodgay aithfay, otay osterfay iendshipsfray, akemay ordialcay equestsray, oryay exhibityay operpray etiquetteyay. 
 Examplesyay ofyay ersuadingpay othersyay includeyay onvincingcay ayay amberlainchay otay etlay youryay artypay eesay ethay ingkay, egotiatingnay eacepay etweenbay warringyay ibestray, oryay inspiringyay ayay owdcray ofyay ownsfolktay. Otheryay  Arismachay  Eckschay. 
 Ethay DMay ightmay allcay orfay ayay  Arismachay eckchay whenyay youyay ytray otay accomplishyay askstay ikelay ethay ollowingfay:•  Indfay ethay estbay ersonpay otay alktay otay orfay ewsnay, umorsray, andyay ossipgay•  Endblay intoyay ayay owdcray otay etgay ethay ensesay ofyay eykay opicstay ofyay onversationcay Ellcastingspay  Abilityyay Ardsbay, aladinspay, orcererssay, andyay warlocksyay useyay  Arismachay asyay eirthay ellcastingspay abilityyay, whichyay elpshay etermineday ethay avingsay owthray Day csay ofyay ellsspay eythay astcay. Avingsay  Owsthray Ayay avingsay ow—alsothray alledcay ayay ave—representssay anyay attemptyay otay esistray ayay ellspay, ayay aptray, ayay oisonpay, ayay iseaseday, oryay ayay imilarsay eatthray. 
 Youyay on’tday ormallynay ecideday otay akemay ayay avingsay owthray; youyay areyay orcedfay otay akemay oneyay ecausebay youryay aracterchay oryay onstermay isyay atyay iskray ofyay armhay. Otay akemay ayay avingsay owthray, ollray ayay day20 andyay addyay ethay appropriateyay abilityyay odifiermay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, youyay useyay youryay  Exterityday odifiermay orfay ayay  Exterityday avingsay ow.Athray avingsay owthray ancay ebay odifiedmay ybay ayay ituationalsay onusbay oryay enaltypay andyay ancay ebay affectedyay ybay advantageyay andyay isadvantageday, asyay eterminedday ybay ethay DMay. Eachyay assclay ivesgay oficiencypray inyay atyay eastlay wotay avingsay owsthray. 
 Ethay wizardyay, orfay exampleyay, isyay oficientpray inyay  Intelligenceyay avessay. 
 Asyay withyay illskay oficienciespray, oficiencypray inyay ayay avingsay owthray etslay ayay aracterchay addyay ishay oryay erhay oficiencypray onusbay otay avingsay owsthray ademay usingyay ayay articularpay abilityyay orescay. 
 Omesay onstersmay avehay avingsay owthray oficienciespray asyay wellyay. Ethay  Ifficultyday  Assclay orfay ayay avingsay owthray isyay eterminedday ybay ethay effectyay atthay ausescay ityay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ethay DCay orfay ayay avingsay owthray allowedyay ybay ayay ellspay isyay eterminedday ybay ethay aster’scay ellcastingspay abilityyay andyay oficiencypray onusbay. Ethay esultray ofyay ayay uccessfulsay oryay ailedfay avingsay owthray isyay alsoyay etailedday inyay ethay effectyay atthay allowsyay ethay avesay. 
 Apterchay 8:  Adventuringyay ELVINGDay INTOyay ETHay ANCIENTyay OMBTay OFyay ORRORS.slippinghay oughthray ethay ackbay alleysyay ofyay  Waterdeepyay, ackinghay ayay eshfray ailtray oughthray ethay ickthay unglesjay onyay ethay  Isleyay ofyay  Ead—thesedray areyay ethay ingsthay atthay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray adventuresyay areyay ademay ofyay. 
 Youryay aracterchay inyay ethay amegay ightmay exploreyay orgottenfay uinsray andyay unchartedyay andslay, uncoveryay arkday ecretssay andyay inistersay otsplay, andyay ayslay oulfay onstersmay. 
 Andyay ifyay allyay oesgay wellyay, youryay aracterchay willyay urvivesay otay aimclay ichray ewardsray eforebay embarkingyay onyay ayay ewnay adventureyay. Isthay apterchay overscay ethay asicsbay ofyay ethay adventuringyay ifelay, omfray ethay echanicsmay ofyay ovementmay otay ethay omplexitiescay ofyay ocialsay interactionyay. 
 Ethay ulesray orfay estingray areyay alsoyay inyay isthay apterchay, alongyay withyay ayay iscussionday ofyay ethay activitiesyay youryay aracterchay ightmay ursuepay etweenbay adventuresyay. Whetheryay adventurersyay areyay exploringyay ayay ustyday ungeonday oryay ethay omplexcay elationshipsray ofyay ayay oyalray ourtcay, ethay amegay ollowsfay ayay aturalnay ythmrhay, asyay outlinedyay inyay ethay ook’sbay introductionyay:1. 
 Ethay DMay escribesday ethay environmentyay.2. 
 Ethay ayersplay escribeday whatyay eythay wantyay otay oday.3. 
 Ethay DMay arratesnay ethay esultsray ofyay eirthay actionsyay. Ypicallytay, ethay DMay usesyay ayay apmay asyay anyay outlineyay ofyay ethay adventureyay, ackingtray ethay aracterschay’ ogresspray asyay eythay exploreyay ungeonday orridorscay oryay wildernessyay egionsray. Ethay sdMsay otesnay, includingyay ayay eykay otay ethay apmay, escribeday whatyay ethay adventurersyay indfay asyay eythay enteryay eachyay ewnay areayay. 
 Ometimessay, ethay assagepay ofyay imetay andyay ethay adventurersyay’ actionsyay etermineday whatyay appenshay, osay ethay DMay ightmay useyay ayay imelinetay oryay ayay owchartflay otay acktray eirthay ogresspray insteadyay ofyay ayay apmay. Imetay Inyay ituationssay whereyay eepingkay acktray ofyay ethay assagepay ofyay imetay isyay importantyay, ethay DMay eterminesday ethay imetay ayay asktay equiresray. 
 Ethay DMay ightmay useyay ayay ifferentday imetay alescay ependingday onyay ethay ontextcay ofyay ethay ituationsay atyay andhay. 
 Inyay ayay ungeonday environmentyay, ethay adventurersyay’ ovementmay appenshay onyay ayay alescay ofyay inutesmay. 
 Ityay akestay emthay aboutyay ayay inutemay otay eepcray ownday ayay onglay allwayhay, anotheryay inutemay otay eckchay orfay apstray onyay ethay oorday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay allhay, andyay ayay oodgay entay inutesmay otay earchsay ethay amberchay eyondbay orfay anythingyay interestingyay oryay aluablevay. Inyay ayay itycay oryay wildernessyay, ayay alescay ofyay ourshay isyay oftenyay oremay appropriateyay. 
 Adventurersyay eageryay otay eachray ethay onelylay owertay atyay ethay earthay ofyay ethay orestfay urryhay acrossyay osethay ifteenfay ilesmay inyay ustjay underyay ourfay ourshay’ imetay. Orfay onglay ourneysjay, ayay alescay ofyay aysday worksyay estbay. 
 Ollowingfay ethay oadray omfray  Aldur’sbay  Ategay otay  Waterdeepyay, ethay adventurersyay endspay ourfay uneventfulyay aysday eforebay ayay oblingay ambushyay interruptsyay eirthay ourneyjay. Inyay ombatcay andyay otheryay ast-pacedfay ituationssay, ethay amegay eliesray onyay oundsray, ayay 6-econdsay anspay ofyay imetay escribedday inyay apterchay 9. Ovementmay Wimmingsay acrossyay ayay ushingray iverray, eakingsnay ownday ayay ungeonday orridorcay, alingscay ayay eacheroustray ountainmay opeslay- allyay ortssay ofyay ovementmay ayplay ayay eykay oleray inyay DDDay adventuresyay. Ethay DMay ancay ummarizesay ethay adventurersyay’ ovementmay withoutyay alculatingcay exactyay istancesday oryay aveltray imestay: “ Youyay aveltray oughthray ethay orestfay andyay indfay ethay ungeonday entranceyay atelay inyay ethay eveningyay ofyay ethay irdthay ayday.”  Evenyay inyay ayay ungeonday, articularlypay ayay argelay ungeonday oryay ayay avecay etworknay, ethay DMay ancay ummarizesay ovementmay etweenbay encountersyay: “ Afteryay illingkay ethay uardiangay atyay ethay entranceyay otay ethay ancientyay warvenday ongholdstray, youyay onsultcay youryay apmay, whichyay eadslay youyay oughthray ilesmay ofyay echoingyay orridorscay otay ayay asmchay idgedbray ybay ayay arrownay onestay archyay.” Ometimessay it’syay importantyay, oughthay, otay owknay owhay onglay ityay akestay otay etgay omfray oneyay otspay otay anotheryay, whetheryay ethay answeryay isyay inyay aysday, ourshay, oryay inutesmay. 
 Ethay ulesray orfay eterminingday aveltray imetay ependday onyay wotay actorsfay: ethay eedspay andyay aveltray acepay ofyay ethay eaturescray ovingmay andyay ethay erraintay ey'rethay ovingmay overyay. Eedspay Everyyay aracterchay andyay onstermay ashay ayay eedspay, whichyay isyay ethay istanceday inyay eetfay atthay ethay aracterchay oryay onstermay ancay walkyay inyay 1 oundray. 
 Isthay umbernay assumesyay ortshay urstsbay ofyay energeticyay ovementmay inyay ethay idstmay ofyay ayay ifelay- eateningthray ituationsay. Ethay ollowingfay ulesray etermineday owhay arfay ayay aracterchay oryay onstermay ancay ovemay inyay ayay inutemay, anyay ourhay, oryay ayay ayday. Aveltray  Acepay Whileyay avelingtray, ayay oupgray ofyay adventurersyay ancay ovemay atyay ayay ormalnay, astfay, oryay owslay acepay, asyay ownshay onyay ethay  Aveltray  Acepay abletay. 
 Ethay abletay atesstay owhay arfay ethay artypay ancay ovemay inyay ayay eriodpay ofyay imetay andyay whetheryay ethay acepay ashay anyyay effectyay. 
Ayay astfay acepay akesmay aracterschay esslay erceptivepay, whileyay ayay owslay acepay akesmay ityay ossiblepay otay eaksnay aroundyay andyay otay earchsay anyay areayay oremay arefullycay (eesay ethay “ Activityyay  Whileyay  Avelingtray” ectionsay aterlay inyay isthay apterchay orfay oremay informationyay). Orcedfay  Archmay. 
 Ethay  Aveltray  Acepay abletay assumesyay atthay aracterschay aveltray orfay 8 ourshay inyay ayday. 
 Eythay ancay ushpay onyay eyondbay atthay imitlay, atyay ethay iskray ofyay exhaustionyay. Orfay eachyay additionalyay ourhay ofyay aveltray eyondbay 8 ourshay, ethay aracterschay overcay ethay istanceday ownshay inyay ethay  Ourhay olumncay orfay eirthay acepay, andyay eachyay aracterchay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay ourhay. 
 Ethay DCay isyay 10 + 1 orfay eachyay ourhay astpay 8 ourshay. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avingsay owthray, ayay aracterchay ufferssay oneyay evellay ofyay exhaustionyay (eesay appendixyay Ayay). Ountsmay andyay  Ehiclesvay. 
 Orfay ortshay ansspay ofyay imetay (upyay otay anyay ourhay), anymay animalsyay ovemay uchmay asterfay anthay umanoidshay. 
Ayay ountedmay aracterchay ancay ideray atyay ayay allopgay orfay aboutyay anyay ourhay, overingcay wicetay ethay usualyay istanceday orfay ayay astfay acepay. 
 Aracterschay inyay wagonsyay, arriagescay, oryay otheryay andlay ehiclesvay oosechay ayay acepay asyay ormalnay. 
 Aracterschay inyay ayay waterborneyay esselvay areyay imitedlay otay ethay eedspay ofyay ethay esselvay (eesay apterchay 5), andyay eythay on’tday uffersay enaltiespay orfay ayay astfay acepay oryay aingay enefitsbay omfray ayay owslay acepay. 
 Ependingday onyay ethay esselvay andyay ethay izesay ofyay ethay ewcray, ipsshay ightmay ebay ableyay otay aveltray orfay upyay otay 24 ourshay erpay ayday. Ertaincay ecialspay ountsmay, uchsay asyay ayay egasuspay oryay iffongray, oryay ecialspay ehiclesvay, uchsay asyay ayay arpetcay ofyay yingflay, allowyay youyay otay aveltray oremay wiftlysay. 
 Ethay  Ungeonday  Aster’smay  Uidegay ontainscay oremay informationyay onyay ecialspay ethodsmay ofyay aveltray. Ifficultday  Erraintay Ethay aveltray eedsspay ivengay inyay ethay  Aveltray  Acepay abletay assumeyay elativelyray implesay erraintay: oadsray, openyay ainsplay, oryay earclay ungeonday orridorscay. 
 Utbay adventurersyay oftenyay acefay enseday orestsfay, eepday wampssay, ubble-filledray uinsray, eepstay ountainsmay, andyay ice-coveredyay ound—allgray onsideredcay ifficultday erraintay. Youyay ovemay atyay alfhay eedspay inyay ifficultday errain—movingtay 1 ootfay inyay ifficultday erraintay ostscay 2 eetfay ofyay eed—sospay youyay ancay overcay onlyyay alfhay ethay ormalnay istanceday inyay ayay inutemay, anyay ourhay, oryay ayay ayday. Ecialspay  Ypestay ofyay  Ovementmay Ovementmay oughthray angerousday ungeonsday oryay wildernessyay areasyay oftenyay involvesyay oremay anthay implysay walkingyay. 
 Adventurersyay ightmay avehay otay imbclay, awlcray, wimsay, oryay umpjay otay etgay whereyay eythay eednay otay ogay. Imbingclay,  Wimmingsay, andyay  Awlingcray Whileyay imbingclay oryay wimmingsay, eachyay ootfay ofyay ovementmay ostscay 1 extrayay ootfay (2 extrayay eetfay inyay ifficultday erraintay), unlessyay ayay eaturecray ashay ayay imbingclay oryay wimmingsay eedspay. 
 Atyay ethay sdMsay optionyay, imbingclay ayay ipperyslay erticalvay urfacesay oryay oneyay withyay ewfay andholdshay equiresray ayay uccessfulsay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay. 
 Imilarlysay, aininggay anyyay istanceday inyay oughray wateryay ightmay equireray ayay uccessfulsay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay. Umpingjay Youryay  Engthstray eterminesday owhay arfay youyay ancay umpjay. Onglay  Umpjay. 
 Whenyay youyay akemay ayay onglay umpjay, youyay overcay ayay umbernay ofyay eetfay upyay otay youryay  Engthstray orescay ifyay youyay ovemay atyay eastlay 10 eetfay onyay ootfay immediatelyyay eforebay ethay umpjay. 
 Whenyay youyay akemay ayay andingstay onglay umpjay, youyay ancay eaplay onlyyay alfhay atthay istanceday. 
 Eitheryay wayyay, eachyay ootfay youyay earclay onyay ethay umpjay ostscay ayay ootfay ofyay ovementmay. Isthay uleray assumesyay atthay ethay eighthay ofyay youryay umpjay oesn’tday attermay, uchsay asyay ayay umpjay acrossyay ayay eamstray oryay asmchay. 
 Atyay youryay sdMsay optionyay, youyay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 10  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay otay earclay ayay owlay obstacleyay (onay allertay anthay ayay quarteryay ofyay ethay ump’sjay istanceday), uchsay asyay ayay edgehay oryay owlay wallyay. 
 Otherwiseyay, youyay ithay ityay. Whenyay youyay andlay inyay ifficultday erraintay, youyay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 10  Exterityday ( Acrobaticsyay) eckchay otay andlay onyay youryay eetfay. 
 Otherwiseyay, youyay andlay onepray. Ighhay  Umpjay. 
 Whenyay youyay akemay ayay ighhay umpjay, youyay eaplay intoyay ethay airyay ayay umbernay ofyay eetfay equalyay otay 3 + youryay  Engthstray odifiermay ifyay youyay ovemay atyay eastlay 10 eetfay onyay ootfay immediatelyyay eforebay ethay umpjay. 
 Whenyay youyay akemay ayay andingstay ighhay umpjay, youyay ancay umpjay onlyyay alfhay atthay istanceday. 
 Eitheryay wayyay, eachyay ootfay youyay earclay onyay ethay umpjay ostscay ayay ootfay ofyay ovementmay. 
 Inyay omesay ircumstancescay, youryay DMay ightmay allowyay youyay otay akemay ayay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay otay umpjay igherhay anthay youyay ormallynay ancay. Youyay ancay extendyay youryay armsyay alfhay youryay eighthay aboveyay yourselfyay uringday ethay umpjay. 
 Usthay, youyay ancay eachray aboveyay youyay ayay istanceday equalyay otay ethay eighthay ofyay ethay umpjay usplay 1 1/2 imestay youryay eighthay. Activityyay  Whileyay  Avelingtray Asyay adventurersyay aveltray oughthray ayay ungeonday oryay ethay wildernessyay, eythay eednay otay emainray alertyay orfay angerday, andyay omesay aracterschay ightmay erformpay otheryay askstay otay elphay ethay oup’sgray ourneyjay. Archingmay  Orderyay Ethay adventurersyay ouldshay establishyay ayay archingmay order.Ayay archingmay orderyay akesmay ityay easieryay otay etermineday whichyay aracterschay areyay affectedyay ybay apstray, whichyay onesyay ancay otspay iddenhay enemiesyay, andyay whichyay onesyay areyay ethay osestclay otay osethay enemiesyay whenyay ayay ightfay eaksbray out.Ayay aracterchay ightmay occupyyay ethay ontfray ankray, oneyay oryay oremay iddlemay anksray, oryay ethay ackbay ankray. 
 Aracterschay inyay ethay ontfray andyay ackbay anksray eednay enoughyay oomray otay aveltray idesay ybay idesay withyay othersyay inyay eirthay ankray. 
 Whenyay acespay isyay ootay ighttay, ethay archingmay orderyay ustmay angechay, usuallyyay ybay ovingmay aracterschay otay ayay iddlemay ankray. Ewerfay  Anthay  Eethray  Anksray. 
 Ifyay anyay adventuringyay artypay arrangesyay itsyay archingmay orderyay withyay onlyyay wotay anksray, eythay areyay ayay ontfray ankray andyay ayay ackbay ankray. 
 Ifyay ere’sthay onlyyay oneyay ankray, it’syay onsideredcay ayay ontfray ankray. Ealthstay Whileyay avelingtray atyay ayay owslay acepay, ethay aracterschay ancay ovemay ealthilystay. 
 Asyay onglay asyay ey’rethay otnay inyay ethay openyay, eythay ancay ytray otay urprisesay oryay eaksnay ybay otheryay eaturescray eythay encounteryay. 
 Eesay ethay ulesray orfay idinghay inyay apterchay 7. Oticingnay  Eatsthray Useyay ethay assivepay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) oresscay ofyay ethay aracterschay otay etermineday whetheryay anyoneyay inyay ethay oupgray oticesnay ayay iddenhay eatthray. 
 Ethay DMay ightmay ecideday atthay ayay eatthray ancay ebay oticednay onlyyay ybay aracterschay inyay ayay articularpay ankray. 
 Encounteringyay  Eaturescray. 
 Ifyay ethay DMay eterminesday atthay ethay adventurersyay encounteryay otheryay eaturescray whileyay ey’rethay avelingtray, it’syay upyay otay othbay oupsgray otay ecideday whatyay appenshay extnay. 
 Eitheryay oupgray ightmay ecideday otay attackyay, initiateyay ayay onversationcay, unray awayyay, oryay waityay otay eesay whatyay ethay otheryay oupgray oesday. Urprisingsay  Oesfay. 
 Ifyay ethay adventurersyay encounteryay ayay ostilehay eaturecray oryay oupgray, ethay DMay eterminesday whetheryay ethay adventurersyay oryay eirthay oesfay ightmay ebay urprisedsay whenyay ombatcay eruptsyay. 
 Eesay apterchay 9 orfay oremay aboutyay urprisesay. Otheryay  Activitiesyay Aracterschay whoyay urntay eirthay attentionyay otay otheryay askstay asyay ethay oupgray avelstray areyay otnay ocusedfay onyay watchingyay orfay angerday. 
 Esethay aracterschay on’tday ontributecay eirthay assivepay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) oresscay otay ethay oup’sgray ancechay ofyay oticingnay iddenhay eatsthray. 
 Oweverhay, ayay aracterchay otnay watchingyay orfay angerday ancay oday oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay activitiesyay insteadyay, oryay omesay otheryay activityyay withyay ethay sdMsay ermissionpay. Avigatenay. 
 Ethay aracterchay ancay ytray otay eventpray ethay oupgray omfray ecomingbay ostlay, akingmay ayay  Wisdomyay ( Urvivalsay) eckchay whenyay ethay DMay allscay orfay ityay. 
( Ethay  Ungeonday  Aster’smay  Uidegay ashay ulesray otay etermineday whetheryay ethay oupgray etsgay ostlay.) Awdray ayay  Apmay. 
 Ethay aracterchay ancay awdray ayay apmay atthay ecordsray ethay oup’sgray ogresspray andyay elpshay ethay aracterschay etgay ackbay onyay oursecay ifyay eythay etgay ostlay. 
 Onay abilityyay eckchay isyay equiredray. Acktray. 
Ayay aracterchay ancay ollowfay ethay ackstray ofyay anotheryay eaturecray, akingmay ayay  Wisdomyay ( Urvivalsay) eckchay whenyay ethay DMay allscay orfay ityay. 
( Ethay  Ungeonday  Aster’smay  Uidegay ashay ulesray orfay ackingtray.) Oragefay. 
 Ethay aracterchay ancay eepkay anyay eyeyay outyay orfay eadyray ourcessay ofyay oodfay andyay wateryay, akingmay ayay  Wisdomyay ( Urvivalsay) eckchay whenyay ethay DMay allscay orfay ityay. 
( Ethay  Ungeonday  Aster’smay  Uidegay ashay ulesray orfay oragingfay.) Ethay  Environmentyay Ybay itsyay aturenay, adventuringyay involvesyay elvingday intoyay acesplay atthay areyay arkday, angerousday, andyay ullfay ofyay ysteriesmay otay ebay exploredyay. 
 Ethay ulesray inyay isthay ectionsay overcay omesay ofyay ethay ostmay importantyay waysyay inyay whichyay adventurersyay interactyay withyay ethay environmentyay inyay uchsay acesplay. 
 Ethay  Ungeonday  Aster’smay  Uidegay ashay ulesray overingcay oremay unusualyay ituationssay. Allingfay Ayay allfay omfray ayay eatgray eighthay isyay oneyay ofyay ethay ostmay ommoncay azardshay acingfay anyay adventureryay. Atyay ethay endyay ofyay ayay allfay, ayay eaturecray akestay 1day6 udgeoningblay amageday orfay everyyay 10 eetfay ityay ellfay, otay ayay aximummay ofyay 20day6. 
 Ethay eaturecray andslay onepray, unlessyay ityay avoidsyay akingtay amageday omfray ethay allfay. Uffocatingsay Ayay eaturecray ancay oldhay itsyay eathbray orfay ayay umbernay ofyay inutesmay equalyay otay 1 + itsyay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay (inimummay ofyay 30 econdssay). Whenyay ayay eaturecray unsray outyay ofyay eathbray, ityay ancay urvivesay orfay ayay umbernay ofyay oundsray equalyay otay itsyay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay (inimummay 1 oundray). 
 Atyay ethay artstay ofyay itsyay extnay urntay, ityay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay andyay isyay yingday. Ittingsplay  Upyay ethay  Artypay Ometimessay, ityay akesmay ensesay otay itsplay anyay adventuringyay artypay, especiallyyay ifyay youyay wantyay oneyay oryay oremay aracterschay otay outscay aheadyay. 
 Youyay ancay ormfay ultiplemay artiespay, eachyay ovingmay atyay ayay ifferentday eedspay. 
 Eachyay oupgray ashay itsyay ownyay ontfray, iddlemay, andyay ackbay anksray. Ethay awbackdray otay isthay approachyay isyay atthay ethay artypay willyay ebay itsplay intoyay everalsay allersmay oupsgray inyay ethay eventyay ofyay anyay attackyay. 
 Ethay advantageyay isyay atthay ayay allsmay oupgray ofyay ealthystay aracterschay ovingmay owlyslay ightmay ebay ableyay otay eaksnay astpay enemiesyay atthay umsierclay aracterschay wouldyay alertyay. 
Ayay ogueray andyay ayay onkmay ovingmay atyay ayay owslay acepay areyay uchmay arderhay otay etectday whenyay eythay eavelay eirthay warfday aladinpay iendfray ehindbay. Orfay exampleyay, ayay eaturecray withyay ayay  Onstitutioncay ofyay 14 ancay oldhay itsyay eathbray orfay 3 inutesmay. 
 Ifyay ityay artsstay uffocatingsay, ityay ashay 2 oundsray otay eachray airyay eforebay ityay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay. Isionvay andyay  Ightlay Ethay ostmay undamentalfay askstay ofyay adventuring—noticingyay angerday, indingfay iddenhay objectsyay, ittinghay anyay enemyyay inyay ombatcay, andyay argetingtay ayay ellspay, otay amenay ustjay ayay ewfay— elyray eavilyhay onyay ayay aracter’schay abilityyay otay eesay. 
 Arknessday andyay otheryay effectsyay atthay obscureyay isionvay ancay ovepray ayay ignificantsay indrance.Ahay ivengay areayay ightmay ebay ightlylay oryay eavilyhay obscuredyay. 
 Inyay ayay ightlylay obscuredyay areayay, uchsay asyay imday ightlay, atchypay ogfay, oryay oderatemay oliagefay, eaturescray avehay isadvantageday onyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay atthay elyray onyay ight.Asay eavilyhay obscuredyay area—suchyay asyay arknessday, opaqueyay ogfay, oryay enseday oliage—blocksfay isionvay entirelyyay. 
Ayay eaturecray inyay ayay eavilyhay obscuredyay areayay effectivelyyay ufferssay omfray ethay indedblay onditioncay (eesay appendixyay Ayay). Ethay esencepray oryay absenceyay ofyay ightlay inyay anyay environmentyay eatescray eethray ategoriescay ofyay illuminationyay: ightbray ightlay, imday ightlay, andyay arknessday. Ightbray ightlay etslay ostmay eaturescray eesay ormallynay. 
 Evenyay oomyglay aysday ovidepray ightbray ightlay, asyay oday orchestay, anternslay, iresfay, andyay otheryay ourcessay ofyay illuminationyay withinyay ayay ecificspay adiusray. Imday ightlay, alsoyay alledcay adowsshay, eatescray ayay ightlylay obscuredyay areayay. 
 Anyay areayay ofyay imday ightlay isyay usuallyyay ayay oundarybay etweenbay ayay ourcesay ofyay ightbray ightlay, uchsay asyay ayay orchtay, andyay urroundingsay arknessday. 
 Ethay oftsay ightlay ofyay wilighttay andyay awnday alsoyay ountscay asyay imday ightlay. 
Ayay articularlypay illiantbray ullfay oonmay ightmay athebay ethay andlay inyay imday ightlay. Arknessday eatescray ayay eavilyhay obscuredyay areayay. 
 Aracterschay acefay arknessday outdoorsyay atyay ightnay (evenyay ostmay oonlitmay ightsnay), withinyay ethay onfinescay ofyay anyay unlityay ungeonday oryay ayay ubterraneansay aultvay, oryay inyay anyay areayay ofyay agicalmay arknessday. Indsightblay Ayay eaturecray withyay indsightblay ancay erceivepay itsyay urroundingssay withoutyay elyingray onyay ightsay, withinyay ayay ecificspay adiusray. 
 Eaturescray withoutyay eyesyay, uchsay asyay oozesyay, andyay eaturescray withyay echolocationyay oryay eightenedhay ensessay, uchsay asyay atsbay andyay uetray agonsdray, avehay isthay ensesay. Arkvisionday Anymay eaturescray inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay, especiallyyay osethay atthay wellday undergroundyay, avehay arkvisionday. 
arknessday asyay ifyay ethay arknessday wereyay imday ightlay, osay areasyay ofyay arknessday areyay onlyyay ightlylay obscuredyay asyay arfay asyay atthay eaturecray isyay oncernedcay. 
 Oweverhay, ethay eaturecray an’tcay iscernday olorcay inyay arknessday, onlyyay adesshay ofyay aygray. Uesighttray Ayay eaturecray withyay uesighttray ancay, outyay otay ayay ecificspay angeray, eesay inyay ormalnay andyay agicalmay arknessday, eesay invisibleyay eaturescray andyay objectsyay, automaticallyyay etectday isualvay illusionsyay andyay ucceedsay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay emthay, andyay erceivespay ethay originalyay ormfay ofyay ayay apechangershay oryay ayay eaturecray atthay isyay ansformedtray ybay agicmay. 
 Urthermorefay, ethay eaturecray ancay eesay intoyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay. Oodfay andyay  Wateryay Aracterschay whoyay on’tday eatyay oryay inkdray uffersay ethay effectsyay ofyay exhaustionyay (eesay appendixyay Ayay). 
 Exhaustionyay ausedcay ybay acklay ofyay oodfay oryay wateryay an’tcay ebay emovedray untilyay ethay aracterchay eatsyay andyay inksdray ethay ullfay equiredray amountyay. Oodfay Ayay aracterchay eedsnay oneyay oundpay ofyay oodfay erpay ayday andyay ancay akemay oodfay astlay ongerlay ybay ubsistingsay onyay alfhay ationsray. 
 Eatingyay alfhay ayay oundpay ofyay oodfay inyay ayay ayday ountscay asyay alfhay ayay ayday withoutyay ood.Afay aracterchay ancay ogay withoutyay oodfay orfay ayay umbernay ofyay aysday equalyay otay 3 + ishay oryay erhay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay (inimummay 1). 
 Atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ayday eyondbay atthay imitlay, ayay aracterchay automaticallyyay ufferssay oneyay evellay ofyay exhaustion.Ayay ormalnay ayday ofyay eatingyay esetsray ethay ountcay ofyay aysday withoutyay oodfay otay erozay. Wateryay Ayay aracterchay eedsnay oneyay allongay ofyay wateryay erpay ayday, oryay wotay allonsgay erpay ayday ifyay ethay weatheryay isyay othay. 
Ayay aracterchay whoyay inksdray onlyyay alfhay atthay uchmay wateryay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 15  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray oryay uffersay oneyay evellay ofyay exhaustionyay atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay ayday. 
Ayay aracterchay withyay accessyay otay evenyay esslay wateryay automaticallyyay ufferssay oneyay evellay ofyay exhaustionyay atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay ayday. Ifyay ethay aracterchay alreadyyay ashay oneyay oryay oremay evelslay ofyay exhaustionyay, ethay aracterchay akestay wotay evelslay inyay eitheryay asecay. Interactingyay withyay  Objectsyay Ayay aracter’schay interactionyay withyay objectsyay inyay anyay environmentyay isyay oftenyay implesay otay esolveray inyay ethay amegay. 
 Ethay ayerplay ellstay ethay DMay atthay ishay oryay erhay aracterchay isyay oingday omethingsay, uchsay ayay ovingmay ayay everlay, andyay ethay DMay escribesday whatyay, ifyay anythingyay appenshay. Orfay exampleyay, ayay aracterchay ightmay ecideday otay ullpay ayay everlay, whichyay ightmay, inyay urntay, aiseray ayay ortcullispay, ausecay ayay oomray otay oodflay withyay wateryay, oryay openyay ayay ecretsay oorday inyay ayay earbynay wallyay. 
 Ifyay ethay everlay isyay ustedray inyay ositionpay, oughthay, ayay aracterchay ightmay eednay otay orcefay ityay. 
 Inyay uchsay ayay ituationsay, ethay DMay ightmay allcay orfay ayay  Engthstray eckchay otay eesay whetheryay ethay aracterchay ancay wrenchyay ethay everlay intoyay aceplay. 
 Ethay DMay etssay ethay DCay orfay anyyay uchsay eckchay asedbay onyay ethay ifficultyday ofyay ethay asktay. Aracterschay ancay alsoyay amageday objectsyay withyay eirthay weaponsyay andyay ellsspay. 
 Objectsyay areyay immuneyay otay oisonpay andyay ychicpsay amageday, utbay otherwiseyay eythay ancay ebay affectedyay ybay ysicalphay andyay agicalmay attacksyay uchmay ikelay eaturescancray. 
 Ethay DMay eterminesday anyay object’syay  Armoryay  Assclay andyay ithay ointspay, andyay ightmay ecideday atthay ertaincay objectsyay avehay esistanceray oryay immunityyay otay ertaincay indskay ofyay attacksyay. 
( It’syay ardhay otay utcay ayay operay withyay ayay ubclay, orfay exampleyay.)  Objectsyay alwaysyay ailfay  Engthstray andyay  Exterityday avingsay owsthray, andyay eythay areyay immuneyay otay effectsyay atthay equireray otheryay avessay. 
 Whenyay anyay objectyay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, ityay eaks.Abray aracterchay ancay alsoyay attemptyay ayay  Engthstray eckchay otay eakbray anyay objectyay. 
 Ethay DMay etssay ethay DCay orfay anyyay uchsay eckchay. Ocialsay  Interactionyay Exploringyay ungeonsday, overcomingyay obstaclesyay, andyay ayingslay onstersmay areyay eykay artspay ofyay DDDay adventuresyay. 
 Onay esslay importantyay, oughthay, areyay ethay ocialsay interactionsyay atthay adventurersyay avehay withyay otheryay inhabitantsyay ofyay ethay worldyay. Interactionyay akestay onyay anymay ormsfay. 
 Youyay ightmay eednay otay onvincecay anyay unscrupulousyay iefthay otay onfesscay otay omesay alfeasancemay, oryay youyay ightmay ytray otay atterflay ayay agondray osay atthay ityay willyay arespay youryay ifelay. 
 Ethay DMay assumesyay ethay olesray ofyay anyyay aracterschay whoyay areyay articipatingpay inyay ethay interactionyay atthay on’tday elongbay otay anotheryay ayerplay atyay ethay abletay. 
 Anyyay uchsay aracterchay isyay alledcay ayay onplayernay aracterchay (NPCay). Inyay eneralgay ermstay, anyay snPCsay attitudeyay owardtay youyay isyay escribedday asyay iendlyfray, indifferentyay, oryay ostilehay. 
 Iendlyfray NPay csay areyay edisposedpray otay elphay youyay, andyay ostilehay onesyay areyay inclinedyay otay etgay inyay youryay wayyay. 
 It’syay easieryay otay etgay whatyay youyay wantyay omfray ayay iendlyfray NPCay, ofyay oursecay. Ocialsay interactionsyay avehay wotay imarypray aspectsyay: oleplayingray andyay abilityyay eckschay. Oleplayingray Oleplayingray isyay, iterallylay, ethay actyay ofyay ayingplay outyay ayay oleray. Inyay isthay asecay, it’syay youyay asyay ayay ayerplay eterminingday owhay youryay aracterchay inksthay, actsyay, andyay alkstay. Oleplayingray isyay ayay artpay ofyay everyyay aspectyay ofyay ethay amegay, andyay ityay omescay otay ethay orefay uringday ocialsay interactionsyay. Youryay aracter’schay quirksyay, annerismsmay, andyay ersonalitypay influenceyay owhay interactionsyay esolveray. Erethay areyay wotay ylesstay youyay ancay useyay whenyay oleplayingray youryay aracterchay: ethay escriptiveday approachyay andyay ethay activeyay approachyay. 
 Ostmay ayersplay useyay ayay ombinationcay ofyay ethay wotay ylesstay. 
 Useyay whicheveryay ixmay ofyay ethay wotay worksyay estbay orfay youyay. Escriptiveday  Approachyay otay  Oleplayingray  Withyay isthay approachyay, youyay escribeday youryay aracter’schay wordsyay andyay actionsyay otay ethay DMay andyay ethay otheryay ayersplay. 
 Awingdray onyay youryay entalmay imageyay ofyay youryay aracterchay, youyay elltay everyoneyay whatyay youryay aracterchay oesday andyay owhay ehay oryay eshay oesday ityay. Orfay instanceyay,  Ischray aysplay  Ordektay ethay warfday. 
 Ordektay ashay ayay quickyay empertay andyay amesblay ethay elvesyay ofyay ethay  Oakwoodclay orfay ishay amily’sfay isfortunemay. 
 Atyay ayay averntay, anyay obnoxiousyay elfyay instrelmay itssay atyay  Ordek’stay abletay andyay iestray otay ikestray upyay ayay onversationcay withyay ethay warfday. Ischray ayssay, “ Ordektay itsspay onyay ethay oorflay, owlsgray anyay insultyay atyay ethay ardbay, andyay ompsstay overyay otay ethay arbay. 
 Whenyay usingyay escriptiveday oleplayingray, eepkay ethay ollowingfay ingsthay inyay indmay:•  Escribeday youryay aracter’schay emotionsyay andyay attitudeyay.•  Ocusfay onyay youryay aracter’schay intentyay andyay owhay othersyay ightmay erceivepay ityay.•  Ovidepray asyay uchmay embellishmentyay asyay youyay eelfay omfortablecay withyay. On’tday worryyay aboutyay ettinggay ingsthay exactlyyay ightray. 
 Ustjay ocusfay onyay inkingthay aboutyay whatyay youryay aracterchay wouldyay oday andyay escribingday whatyay youyay eesay inyay youryay indmay. Activeyay  Approachyay otay  Oleplayingray Ifyay escriptiveday oleplayingray ellstay youryay DMay andyay youryay ellowfay ayersplay whatyay youryay aracterchay inksthay andyay oesday, activeyay oleplayingray owsshay emthay. Whenyay youyay useyay activeyay oleplayingray, youyay eakspay withyay youryay aracter’schay oicevay, ikelay anyay actoryay akingtay onyay ayay oleray. 
 Youyay ightmay evenyay echoyay youryay aracter’schay ovementsmay andyay odybay anguagelay. 
 Isthay approachyay isyay oremay immersiveyay anthay escriptiveday oleplayingray, oughthay youyay illstay eednay otay escribeday ingsthay atthay an’tcay ebay easonablyray actedyay outyay. Oinggay ackbay otay ethay exampleyay ofyay  Ischray oleplayingray  Ordektay aboveyay, ere’shay owhay ethay enescay ightmay ayplay outyay ifyay  Ischray usedyay activeyay oleplayingray: Eakingspay asyay  Ordektay,  Ischray ayssay inyay ayay uffgray, eepday oicevay, “Iyay wasyay wonderingyay whyyay ityay uddenlysay elledsmay awfulyay inyay erehay. 
 Ifyay Iyay wantedyay otay earhay anythingyay outyay ofyay youyay, I'dyay apsnay youryay armyay andyay enjoyyay youryay eamsscray.”  Inyay ishay ormalnay oicevay,  Ischray enthay addsyay, “Iyay etgay upyay, areglay atyay ethay elfyay, andyay eadhay otay ethay arbay.” Esultsray ofyay  Oleplayingray  Ethay DMay usesyay youryay aracter’schay actionsyay andyay attitudesyay otay etermineday owhay anyay NPCay eactsray. 
Ayay owardlycay NPCay ucklesbay underyay eatsthray ofyay iolencevay. 
Ayay ubbornstay warfday efusesray otay etlay anyoneyay adgerbay erhay. 
Ayay ainvay agondray apslay upyay atteryflay. Whenyay interactingyay withyay anyay NPCay, aypay oseclay attentionyay otay ethay sdMsay ortrayalpay ofyay ethay snPCsay oodmay, ialogueday, andyay ersonalitypay. 
 Youyay ightmay ebay ableyay otay etermineday anyay snPCsay ersonalitypay aitstray, idealsyay, awsflay, andyay ondsbay, enthay ayplay onyay emthay otay influenceyay ethay snPCsay attitudeyay. Interactionsyay inyay DDDay areyay uchmay ikelay interactionsyay inyay ealray ifelay. 
 Ifyay youyay ancay offeryay NPay csay omethingsay eythay wantyay, eatenthray emthay withyay omethingsay eythay earfay, oryay ayplay onyay eirthay ympathiessay andyay oalsgay, youyay ancay useyay wordsyay otay etgay almostyay anythingyay youyay wantyay. 
 Onyay ethay otheryay andhay, ifyay youyay insultyay ayay oudpray warrioryay oryay eakspay illyay ofyay ayay oble’snay alliesyay, youryay effortsyay otay onvincecay oryay eceiveday willyay allfay ortshay. Abilityyay  Eckschay Inyay additionyay otay oleplayingray, abilityyay eckschay areyay eykay inyay eterminingday ethay outcomeyay ofyay anyay interactionyay. Youryay oleplayingray effortsyay ancay alteryay anyay snPCsay attitudeyay, utbay erethay ightmay illstay ebay anyay elementyay ofyay ancechay inyay ethay ituationsay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, youryay DMay ancay allcay orfay ayay  Arismachay eckchay atyay anyyay ointpay uringday anyay interactionyay ifyay ehay oryay eshay wantsyay ethay iceday otay ayplay ayay oleray inyay eterminingday anyay snPCsay eactionsray. 
 Otheryay eckschay ightmay ebay appropriateyay inyay ertaincay ituationssay, atyay youryay sdMsay iscretionday. Aypay attentionyay otay youryay illskay oficienciespray whenyay inkingthay ofyay owhay youyay wantyay otay interactyay withyay anyay NPCay, andyay ackstay ethay eckday inyay youryay avorfay ybay usingyay anyay approachyay atthay eliesonray youryay estbay onusesbay andyay illsskay. 
 Ifyay ethay oupgray eedsnay otay icktray ayay uardgay intoyay ettinglay emthay intoyay ayay astlecay, ethay ogueray whoyay isyay oficientpray inyay  Eceptionday isyay ethay estbay etbay otay eadlay ethay iscussionday. 
 Whenyay egotiatingnay orfay ayay ostage’shay eleaseray, ethay ericclay withyay  Ersuasionpay ouldshay oday ostmay ofyay ethay alkingtay. Estingray Eroichay oughthay eythay ightmay ebay, adventurersyay an’tcay endspay everyyay ourhay ofyay ethay ayday inyay ethay ickthay ofyay explorationyay, ocialsay interactionyay, andyay ombatcay. 
 Eythay eednay est—timeray otay eepslay andyay eatyay, endtay eirthay woundsyay, efreshray eirthay indsmay andyay iritsspay orfay ellcastingspay, andyay acebray emselvesthay orfay urtherfay adventureyay. Adventurersyay ancay aketay ortshay estsray inyay ethay idstmay ofyay anyay adventuringyay ayday andyay ayay onglay estray otay endyay ethay ayday. Ortshay  Estray Ayay ortshay estray isyay ayay eriodpay ofyay owntimeday, atyay eastlay 1 ourhay onglay, uringday whichyay ayay aracterchay oesday othingnay oremay enuousstray anthay eatingyay, inkingdray, eadingray, andyay endingtay otay wounds.Ayay aracterchay ancay endspay oneyay oryay oremay  Ithay  Iceday atyay ethay endyay ofyay ayay ortshay estray, upyay otay ethay aracter’schay aximummay umbernay ofyay  Ithay  Iceday, whichyay isyay equalyay otay ethay aracter'schay evellay. 
 Orfay eachyay  Ithay  Ieday entspay inyay isthay wayyay, ethay ayerplay ollsray ethay ieday andyay addsyay ethay aracter’schay  Onstitutioncay odifiermay otay ityay. 
 Ethay aracterchay egainsray ithay ointspay equalyay otay ethay otaltay. 
 Ethay ayerplay ancay ecideday otay endspay anyay additionalyay  Ithay  Ieday afteryay eachyay ollray. 
Ayay aracterchay egainsray omesay entspay  Ithay  Iceday uponyay inishingfay ayay onglay estray, asyay explainedyay elowbay. Onglay  Estray Ayay onglay estray isyay ayay eriodpay ofyay extendedyay owntimeday, atyay eastlay 8 ourshay onglay, uringday whichyay ayay aracterchay eepsslay oryay erformspay ightlay activityyay: eadingray, alkingtay, eatingyay, oryay andingstay watchyay orfay onay oremay anthay 2 ourshay. 
 Ifyay ethay estray isyay interruptedyay ybay ayay eriodpay ofyay enuousstray activity—atyay eastlay 1 ourhay ofyay walkingyay, ightingfay, astingcay ellsspay, oryay imilarsay adventuringyay activityyay— ethay aracterschay ustmay eginbay ethay estray againyay otay aingay anyyay enefitbay omfray ityay. Atyay ethay endyay ofyay ayay onglay estray, ayay aracterchay egainsray allyay ostlay ithay ointspay. 
 Ethay aracterchay alsoyay egainsray entspay  Ithay  Iceday, upyay otay ayay umbernay ofyay iceday equalyay otay alfhay ofyay ethay aracter’schay otaltay umbernay ofyay emthay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay ayay aracterchay ashay eightyay  Ithay  Iceday, ehay oryay eshay ancay egainray ourfay entspay  Ithay  Iceday uponyay inishingfay ayay onglay est.Aray aracterchay an’tcay enefitbay omfray oremay anthay oneyay onglay estray inyay ayay 24-ourhay eriodpay, andyay ayay aracterchay ustmay avehay atyay eastlay 1 ithay ointpay atyay ethay artstay ofyay ethay estray otay aingay itsyay enefitsbay. Etweenbay  Adventuresyay Etweenbay ipstray otay ungeonsday andyay attlesbay againstyay ancientyay evilsyay, adventurersyay eednay imetay otay estray, ecuperateray, andyay eparepray orfay eirthay extnay adventureyay. 
 Anymay adventurersyay alsoyay useyay isthay imetay otay erformpay otheryay askstay, uchsay asyay aftingcray armsyay andyay armoryay, erformingpay esearchray, oryay endingspay eirthay ard-earnedhay oldgay. Inyay omesay asescay, ethay assagepay ofyay imetay isyay omethingsay atthay occursyay withyay ittlelay anfarefay oryay escriptionday. 
escribeday inyay eneralgay ermstay whatyay youryay aracterchay ashay eenbay oingday. 
 Atyay otheryay imestay, ethay DMay ightmay wantyay otay eepkay acktray ofyay ustjay owhay uchmay imetay isyay assingpay asyay eventsyay eyondbay youryay erceptionpay aystay inyay otionmay. Ifestylelay  Expensesyay Etweenbay adventuresyay, youyay oosechay ayay articularpay qualityyay ofyay ifelay andyay aypay ethay ostcay ofyay aintainingmay atthay ifestylelay, asyay escribedday inyay apterchay 5. Ivinglay ayay articularpay ifestylelay oesn’tday avehay ayay ugehay effectyay onyay youryay aracterchay, utbay youryay ifestylelay ancay affectyay ethay wayyay otheryay individualsyay andyay oupsgray eactray otay youyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, whenyay youyay eadlay anyay aristocraticyay ifestylelay, ityay ightmay ebay easieryay orfay youyay otay influenceyay ethay oblesnay ofyay ethay itycay anthay ifyay youyay ivelay inyay overtypay. Owntimeday  Activitiesyay Etweenbay adventuresyay, ethay DMay ightmay askyay youyay whatyay youryay aracterchay isyay oingday uringday ishay oryay erhay owntimeday. 
 Eriodspay ofyay owntimeday ancay aryvay inyay urationday, utbay eachyay owntimeday activityyay equiresray ayay ertaincay umbernay ofyay aysday otay ompletecay eforebay youyay aingay anyyay enefitbay, andyay atyay eastlay 8 ourshay ofyay eachyay ayday ustmay ebay entspay onyay ethay owntimeday activityyay orfay ethay ayday otay ountcay. 
 Ethay aysday oday otnay eednay otay ebay onsecutivecay. 
 Ifyay youyay avehay oremay anthay ethay inimummay amountyay ofyay aysday otay endspay, youyay ancay eepkay oingday ethay amesay ingthay orfay ayay ongerlay eriodpay ofyay imetay, oryay witchsay otay ayay ewnay owntimeday activityyay. Owntimeday activitiesyay otheryay anthay ethay onesyay esentedpray elowbay areyay ossiblepay. 
 Ifyay youyay wantyay youryay aracterchay otay endspay ishay oryay erhay owntimeday erformingpay anyay activityyay otnay overedcay erehay, iscussday ityay withyay youryay DMay. Aftingcray Youyay ancay aftcray onmagicalnay objectsyay, includingyay adventuringyay equipmentyay andyay worksyay ofyay artyay. 
 Youyay ustmay ebay oficientpray withyay oolstay elatedray otay ethay objectyay youyay areyay yingtray otay eatecray (ypicallytay artisan’syay oolstay). 
 Youyay ightmay alsoyay eednay accessyay otay ecialspay aterialsmay oryay ocationslay ecessarynay otay eatecray ityay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, omeonesay oficientpray withyay ith’ssmay oolstay eedsnay ayay orgefay inyay orderyay otay aftcray ayay wordsay oryay uitsay ofyay armoryay. Orfay everyyay ayday ofyay owntimeday youyay endspay aftingcray, youyay ancay aftcray oneyay oryay oremay itemsyay withyay ayay otaltay arketmay aluevay otnay exceedingyay 5 gpay, andyay youyay ustmay expendyay awray aterialsmay worthyay alfhay ethay otaltay arketmay aluevay. 
 Ifyay omethingsay youyay wantyay otay aftcray ashay ayay arketmay aluevay eatergray anthay 5 gpay, youyay akemay ogresspray everyyay ayday inyay 5-gpay incrementsyay untilyay youyay eachray ethay arketmay aluevay ofyay ethay itemyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay uitsay ofyay ateplay armoryay (arketmay aluevay 1,500 gpay) akestay 300 aysday otay aftcray ybay yourselfyay. Ultiplemay aracterschay ancay ombinecay eirthay effortsyay owardtay ethay aftingcray ofyay ayay inglesay itemyay, ovidedpray atthay ethay aracterschay allyay avehay oficiencypray withyay ethay equisiteray oolstay andyay areyay workingyay ogethertay inyay ethay amesay aceplay. 
 Eachyay aracterchay ontributescay 5 gpay worthyay ofyay effortyay orfay everyyay ayday entspay elpinghay otay aftcray ethay itemyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, eethray aracterschay withyay ethay equisiteray ooltay oficiencypray andyay ethay operpray acilitiesfay ancay aftcray ayay uitsay ofyay ateplay armoryay inyay 100 aysday, atyay ayay otaltay ostcay ofyay 750 gpay. Whileyay aftingcray, youyay ancay aintainmay ayay odestmay ifestylelay withoutyay avinghay otay aypay 1 gpay erpay ayday, oryay ayay omfortablecay ifestylelay atyay alfhay ethay ormalnay ostcay (eesay apterchay 5 orfay oremay informationyay onyay ifestylelay expensesyay). Acticingpray ayay  Ofessionpray Youyay ancay workyay etweenbay adventuresyay, allowingyay youyay otay aintainmay ayay odestmay ifestylelay withoutyay avinghay otay aypay 1 gpay erpay ayday (eesay apterchay 5 orfay oremay informationyay onyay ifestylelay expensesyay). 
 Isthay enefitbay astslay asyay onglay youyay ontinuecay otay acticepray youryay ofessionpray. Ifyay youyay areyay ayay embermay ofyay anyay organizationyay atthay ancay ovidepray ainfulgay employmentyay, uchsay asyay ayay empletay oryay ayay ievesthay’ uildgay, youyay earnyay enoughyay otay upportsay ayay omfortablecay ifestylelay insteadyay. Ifyay youyay avehay oficiencypray inyay ethay  Erformancepay illskay andyay utpay youryay erformancepay illskay otay useyay uringday youryay owntimeday, youyay earnyay enoughyay otay upportsay ayay wealthyyay ifestylelay insteadyay. Ecuperatingray Youyay ancay useyay owntimeday etweenbay adventuresyay otay ecoverray omfray ayay ebilitatingday injuryyay, iseaseday, oryay oisonpay. Afteryay eethray aysday ofyay owntimeday entspay ecuperatingray, youyay ancay akemay ayay DCay 15  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, youyay ancay oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay esultsray:•  Endyay oneyay effectyay onyay youyay atthay eventspray youyay omfray egain­ingray ithay ointspay.•  Orfay ethay extnay 24 ourshay, aingay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay oneyay iseaseday oryay oisonpay urrentlycay affectingyay youyay. Esearchingray Ethay imetay etweenbay adventuresyay isyay ayay eatgray ancechay otay erformpay esearchray, aininggay insightyay intoyay ysteriesmay atthay avehay unfurledyay overyay ethay oursecay ofyay ethay ampaigncay. 
 Esearchray ancay includeyay oringpay overyay ustyday omestay andyay umblingcray ollsscray inyay ayay ibrarylay oryay uyingbay inksdray orfay ethay ocalslay otay ypray umorsray andyay ossipgay omfray eirthay ipslay. Whenyay youyay eginbay youryay esearchray, ethay DMay eterminesday whetheryay ethay informationyay isyay availableyay, owhay anymay aysday ofyay owntimeday ityay willyay aketay otay indfay ityay, andyay whetheryay erethay areyay anyyay estrictionsray onyay youryay esearchray (uchsay asyay eedingnay otay eeksay outyay ayay ecificspay individualyay, ometay, oryay ocationlay). 
 Ethay DMay ightmay alsoyay equireray youyay otay akemay oneyay oryay oremay abilityyay eckschay, uchsay asyay anyay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay otay indfay uesclay ointingpay owardtay ethay informationyay youyay eeksay, oryay ayay  Arismachay ( Ersuasionpay) eckchay otay ecuresay omeone’ssay aidyay. 
 Onceyay osethay onditionscay areyay etmay, youyay earnlay ethay informationyay ifyay ityay isyay availableyay. Orfay eachyay ayday ofyay esearchray, youyay ustmay endspay 1 gpay otay overcay youryay expensesyay. 
 Isthay ostcay isyay inyay additionyay otay youryay ormalnay ifestylelay expensesyay (asyay iscussedday inyay apterchay 5). Ainingtray Youyay ancay endspay imetay etweenbay adventuresyay earninglay ayay ewnay anguagelay oryay ainingtray withyay ayay etsay ofyay oolstay. 
 Youryay DMay ightmay allowyay additionalyay ainingtray optionsyay. Irstfay, youyay ustmay indfay anyay instructoryay willingyay otay eachtay youyay. 
 Ethay DMay eterminesday owhay onglay ityay akestay, andyay whetheryay oneyay oryay oremay abilityyay eckschay areyay equiredray. Ethay ainingtray astslay orfay 250 aysday andyay ostscay 1 gpay erpay ayday. 
 Apterchay 9:  Ombatcay ETHay ATTERCLay OFyay Ayay WORDSay IKINGSTRay AGAINSyay Atay ieldshay. 
 Ethay erribletay endingray oundsay asyay onstrousmay awsclay eartay oughthray armoryay. 
Ayay illiantbray ashflay ofyay ightlay asyay ayay allbay ofyay ameflay ossomsblay omfray ayay wizard’syay ellspay. 
 Ethay arpshay angtay ofyay oodblay inyay ethay airyay, uttingcay oughthray ethay enchstay ofyay ilevay onstersmay. 
 Oarsray ofyay uryfay, outsshay ofyay iumphtray, iescray ofyay ainpay. 
 Ombatcay inyay DDDay ancay ebay aoticchay, eadlyday, andyay illingthray. Isthay apterchay ovidespray ethay ulesray youyay eednay orfay youryay aracterschay andyay onstersmay otay engageyay inyay ombatcay, whetheryay ityay isyay ayay iefbray irmishskay oryay anyay extendedyay onflictcay inyay ayay ungeonday oryay onyay ayay ieldfay ofyay attlebay. 
 Oughoutthray isthay apterchay, ethay ulesray addressyay youyay, ethay ayerplay oryay  Ungeonday  Astermay. 
 Ethay  Ungeonday  Astermay ontrolscay allyay ethay onstersmay andyay onplayernay aracterschay involvedyay inyay ombatcay, andyay eachyay otheryay ayerplay ontrolscay anyay adventureryay. 
“ Youyay” ancay alsoyay eanmay ethay aracterchay oryay onstermay atthay youyay ontrolcay. Ethay  Orderyay ofyay  Ombatcay Ayay ypicaltay ombatcay encounteryay isyay ayay ashclay etweenbay wotay idessay, ayay urryflay ofyay weaponyay wingssay, eintsfay, arriespay, ootworkfay, andyay ellcastingspay. 
 Ethay amegay organizesyay ethay aoschay ofyay ombatcay intoyay ayay yclecay ofyay oundsray andyay urnstay. 
Ayay oundray epresentsray aboutyay 6 econdssay inyay ethay amegay worldyay. 
 Uringday ayay oundray, eachyay articipantpay inyay ayay attlebay akestay ayay urntay. 
 Ethay orderyay ofyay urnstay isyay eterminedday atyay ethay eginningbay ofyay ayay ombatcay encounteryay, whenyay everyoneyay ollsray initiativeyay. 
 Onceyay everyoneyay ashay akentay ayay urntay, ethay ightfay ontinuescay otay ethay extnay oundray ifyay eithernay idesay ashay efeatedday ethay otheryay. Urprisesay Ayay andbay ofyay adventurersyay eakssnay upyay onyay ayay anditbay ampcay, ingingspray omfray ethay eestray otay attackyay emthay. 
Ayay elatinousgay ubecay idesglay ownday ayay ungeonday assagepay, unnoticedyay ybay ethay adventurersyay untilyay ethay ubecay engulfsyay oneyay ofyay emthay. 
 Inyay esethay ituationssay, oneyay idesay ofyay ethay attlebay ainsgay urprisesay overyay ethay otheryay. Ethay DMay eterminesday whoyay ightmay ebay urprisedsay. 
 Ifyay eithernay idesay iestray otay ebay ealthystay, eythay automaticallyyay oticenay eachyay otheryay. 
 Otherwiseyay, ethay DMay omparescay ethay  Exterityday ( Ealthstay) eckschay ofyay anyoneyay idinghay withyay ethay assivepay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) orescay ofyay eachyay eaturecray onyay ethay Ombatcay  Epstay ybay  Epstay1. 
 Etermineday urprisesay. 
 Ethay DMay eterminesday whetheryay anyoneyay involvedyay inyay ethay ombatcay encounteryay isyay urprisedsay.2. 
 Establishyay ositionspay. 
 Ethay DMay ecidesday whereyay allyay ethay aracterschay andyay onstersmay areyay ocatedlay. 
 Ivengay ethay adventurersyay’ archingmay orderyay oryay eirthay atedstay ositionspay inyay ethay oomray oryay otheryay ocationlay, ethay DMay iguresfay outyay whereyay ethay adversariesyay are—howyay arfay awayyay andyay inyay whatyay irectionday.3. 
 Ollray initiativeyay. 
 Everyoneyay involvedyay inyay ethay ombatcay encounteryay ollsray initiativeyay, eterminingday ethay orderyay ofyay ombatantscay’ urnstay.4. 
 Aketay urnstay. 
 Eachyay articipantpay inyay ethay attlebay akestay ayay urntay inyay initiativeyay orderyay.5. 
 Eginbay ethay extnay oundray. 
 Whenyay everyoneyay involvedyay inyay ethay ombatcay ashay adhay ayay urntay, ethay oundray endsyay. 
 Epeatray epstay 4 untilyay ethay ightingfay ops.opposingstay idesay. 
 Anyyay aracterchay oryay onstermay atthay oesn’tday oticenay ayay eatthray isyay urprisedsay atyay ethay artstay ofyay ethay encounteryay. Ifyay you’reyay urprisedsay, youyay an’tcay ovemay oryay aketay anyay actionyay onyay youryay irstfay urntay ofyay ethay ombatcay, andyay youyay an’tcay aketay ayay eactionray untilyay atthay urntay endsyay. 
Ayay embermay ofyay ayay oupgray ancay ebay urprisedsay evenyay ifyay ethay otheryay embersmay aren’tyay. Initiativeyay Initiativeyay eterminesday ethay orderyay ofyay urnstay uringday ombatcay. 
 Whenyay ombatcay artsstay, everyyay articipantpay akesmay ayay  Exterityday eckchay otay etermineday eirthay aceplay inyay ethay initiativeyay orderyay. 
 Ethay DMay akesmay oneyay ollray orfay anyay entireyay oupgray ofyay identicalyay eaturescray, osay eachyay embermay ofyay ethay oupgray actsyay atyay ethay amesay imetay. Ethay DMay anksray ethay ombatantscay inyay orderyay omfray ethay oneyay withyay ethay ighesthay  Exterityday eckchay otaltay otay ethay oneyay withyay ethay owestlay. 
 Isthay isyay ethay orderyay (alledcay ethay initiativeyay orderyay) inyay whichyay eythay actyay uringday eachyay oundray. 
 Ethay initiativeyay orderyay emainsray ethay amesay omfray oundray otay oundray. Ifyay ayay ietay occursyay, ethay DMay ecidesday ethay orderyay amongyay iedtay cOntrolleddMcay eaturescray, andyay ethay ayersplay ecideday ethay orderyay amongyay eirthay iedtay aracterschay. 
 Ethay DMay ancay ecideday ethay orderyay ifyay ethay ietay isyay etweenbay ayay onstermay andyay ayay ayerplay aracterchay. 
 Optionallyyay, ethay DMay ancay avehay ethay iedtay aracterschay andyay onstersmay eachyay ollray ayay day20 otay etermineday ethay orderyay, ighesthay ollray oinggay irstfay. Youryay  Urntay Onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay ovemay ayay istanceday upyay otay youryay eedspay andyay aketay oneyay actionyay. 
 Youyay ecideday whetheryay otay ovemay irstfay oryay aketay youryay actionyay irstfay. 
 Youryay eed—sometimesspay alledcay youryay walkingyay eed—isspay otednay onyay youryay aracterchay eetshay. Ethay ostmay ommoncay actionsyay youyay ancay aketay areyay escribedday inyay ethay “ Actionsyay inyay  Ombatcay” ectionsay aterlay inyay isthay apterchay. 
 Anymay assclay eaturesfay andyay otheryay abilitiesyay ovidepray additionalyay optionsyay orfay youryay actionyay. Ethay “ Ovementmay andyay  Ositionpay” ectionsay aterlay inyay isthay apterchay ivesgay ethay ulesray orfay youryay ovemay. Youyay ancay orgofay ovingmay, akingtay anyay actionyay, oryay oingday anythingyay atyay allyay onyay youryay urntay. 
 Ifyay youyay an’tcay ecideday whatyay otay oday onyay youryay urntay, onsidercay akingtay ethay  Odgeday oryay  Eadyray actionyay, asyay escribedday inyay “ Actionsyay inyay  Ombatcay.” Onusbay  Actionsyay Ariousvay assclay eaturesfay, ellsspay, andyay otheryay abilitiesyay etlay youyay aketay anyay additionalyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay alledcay ayay onusbay actionyay. 
 Ethay  Unningcay  Actionyay eaturefay, orfay exampleyay, allowsyay ayay ogueray otay aketay ayay onusbay actionyay. 
 Youyay ancay aketay ayay onusbay actionyay onlyyay whenyay ayay ecialspay abilityyay, ellspay, oryay otheryay eaturefay ofyay ethay amegay atesstay atthay youyay ancay oday omethingsay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay. 
 Otheryay  Activityyay onyay  Youryay  Urntay Youryay urntay ancay includeyay ayay arietyvay ofyay ourishesflay atthay equireray eithernay youryay actionyay ornay youryay ovemay. Youyay ancay ommunicatecay oweverhay youyay areyay ableyay, oughthray iefbray utterancesyay andyay esturesgay, asyay youyay aketay youryay urntay. Youyay ancay alsoyay interactyay withyay oneyay objectyay oryay eaturefay ofyay ethay environmentyay orfay eefray, uringday eitheryay youryay ovemay oryay youryay actionyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, youyay ouldcay openyay ayay oorday uringday youryay ovemay asyay youyay idestray owardtay ayay oefay, oryay youyay ouldcay awdray youryay weaponyay asyay artpay ofyay ethay amesay actionyay youyay useyay otay attackyay. Ifyay youyay wantyay otay interactyay withyay ayay econdsay objectyay, youyay eednay otay useyay youryay actionyay. 
 Omesay agicmay itemsyay andyay otheryay ecialspay objectsyay alwaysyay equireray anyay actionyay otay useyay, asyay atedstay inyay eirthay escriptionsday. Ethay DMay ightmay equireray youyay otay useyay anyay actionyay orfay anyyay ofyay esethay activitiesyay whenyay ityay eedsnay ecialspay arecay oryay whenyay ityay esentspray anyay unusualyay obstacleyay. 
 Orfay instanceyay, ethay DMay ouldcay easonablyray expectyay youyay otay useyay anyay actionyay otay openyay ayay uckstay oorday oryay urntay ayay ankcray otay owerlay ayay awbridgedray. Eactionsray Ertaincay ecialspay abilitiesyay, ellsspay, andyay ituationssay allowyay youyay otay aketay ayay ecialspay actionyay alledcay ayay eactionray. 
Ayay eactionray isyay anyay instantyay esponseray otay ayay iggertray ofyay omesay indkay, whichyay ancay occuryay onyay youryay urntay oryay onyay omeonesay else’syay. 
 Ethay opportunityyay attackyay, escribedday aterlay inyay isthay apterchay, isyay ethay ostmay ommoncay ypetay ofyay eactionray. Whenyay youyay aketay ayay eactionray, youyay an’tcay aketay anotheryay oneyay untilyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
 Ifyay ethay eactionray interruptsyay anotheryay eature’scray urntay, atthay eaturecray ancay ontinuecay itsyay urntay ightray afteryay ethay eactionray. Ovementmay andyay  Ositionpay Inyay ombatcay, aracterschay andyay onstersmay areyay inyay onstantcay otionmay, oftenyay usingyay ovementmay andyay ositionpay otay aingay ethay upperyay andhay. Interactingyay withyay  Objectsyay  Aroundyay  Youyay Erehay areyay ayay ewfay examplesyay ofyay ethay ortssay ofyay ingthay youyay ancay oday inyay andemtay withyay youryay ovementmay andyay actionyay:• awdray oryay eatheshay ayay wordsay• openyay oryay oseclay ayay oorday• withdrawyay ayay otionpay omfray youryay ackpackbay• ickpay upyay ayay oppeddray axeyay• aketay ayay aublebay omfray ayay abletay• emoveray ayay ingray omfray youryay ingerfay• uffstay omesay oodfay intoyay youryay outhmay• antplay ayay annerbay inyay ethay oundgray• ishfay ayay ewfay oinscay omfray youryay eltbay ouchpay• inkdray allyay ethay aleyay inyay ayay agonflay• owthray ayay everlay oryay ayay witchsay• ullpay ayay orchtay omfray ayay oncescay• aketay ayay ookbay omfray ayay elfshay youyay ancay eachray• extinguishyay ayay allsmay ameflay• onday ayay askmay• ullpay ethay oodhay ofyay youryay oakclay upyay andyay overyay youryay eadhay• utpay youryay earyay otay ayay oorday• ickkay ayay allsmay onestay• urntay ayay eykay inyay ayay ocklay• aptay ethay oorflay withyay ayay 10-ootfay olepay• andhay anyay itemyay otay anotheryay aracterchay Onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay ovemay ayay istanceday upyay otay youryay eedspay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay asyay uchmay oryay asyay ittlelay ofyay youryay eedspay asyay youyay ikelay onyay youryay urntay, ollowingfay ethay ulesray erehay. Youryay ovementmay ancay includeyay umpingjay, imbingclay, andyay wimmingsay. 
 Esethay ifferentday odesmay ofyay ovementmay ancay ebay ombinedcay withyay walkingyay, oryay eythay ancay onstitutecay youryay entireyay ovemay. 
 Oweverhay you’reyay ovingmay, youyay eductday ethay istanceday ofyay eachyay artpay ofyay youryay ovemay omfray youryay eedspay untilyay ityay isyay usedyay upyay oryay untilyay youyay areyay oneday ovingmay. Ethay “ Ecialspay  Ypestay ofyay  Ovementmay’’ ectionsay inyay apterchay 8 ivesgay ethay articularspay orfay umpingjay, imbingclay, andyay wimmingsay. Eakingbray  Upyay  Youryay  Ovemay Youyay ancay eakbray upyay youryay ovementmay onyay youryay urntay, usingyay omesay ofyay youryay eedspay eforebay andyay afteryay youryay actionyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay avehay ayay eedspay ofyay 30 eetfay, youyay ancay ovemay 10 eetfay, aketay youryay actionyay, andyay enthay ovemay 20 eetfay. Ovingmay etweenbay  Attacksyay Ifyay youyay aketay anyay actionyay atthay includesyay oremay anthay oneyay weaponyay attackyay, youyay ancay eakbray upyay youryay ovementmay evenyay urtherfay ybay ovingmay etweenbay osethay attacksyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay ighterfay whoyay ancay akemay wotay attacksyay withyay ethay  Extrayay  Attackyay eaturefay andyay whoyay ashay ayay eedspay ofyay 25 eetfay ouldcay ovemay 10 eetfay, akemay anyay attackyay, ovemay 15 eetfay, andyay enthay attackyay againyay. Usingyay  Ifferentday  Eedsspay Ifyay youyay avehay oremay anthay oneyay eedspay, uchsay asyay youryay walkingyay eedspay andyay ayay yingflay eedspay, youyay ancay witchsay ackbay andyay orthfay etweenbay youryay eedsspay uringday youryay ovemay. 
 Wheneveryay youyay witchsay, ubtractsay ethay istanceday you'veyay alreadyyay ovedmay omfray ethay ewnay eedspay. 
 Ethay esultray eterminesday owhay uchmay artherfay youyay ancay ovemay. 
 Ifyay ethay esultray isyay 0 oryay esslay, youyay an’tcay useyay ethay ewnay eedspay uringday ethay urrentcay ovemay. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay avehay ayay eedspay ofyay 30 andyay ayay yingflay eedspay ofyay 60 ecausebay ayay wizardyay astcay ethay yflay ellspay onyay youyay, youyay ouldcay yflay 20 eetfay, enthay walkyay 10 eetfay, andyay enthay eaplay intoyay ethay airyay otay yflay 30 eetfay oremay. Ifficultday  Erraintay Ombatcay arelyray akestay aceplay inyay arebay oomsray oryay onyay eaturelessfay ainsplay. 
 Oulder-strewnbay avernscay, iarbray- okedchay orestsfay, eacheroustray aircases—thestay ettingsay ofyay ayay ypicaltay ightfay ontainscay ifficultday erraintay. Everyyay ootfay ofyay ovementmay inyay ifficultday erraintay ostscay 1 extrayay ootfay. 
 Isthay uleray isyay uetray evenyay ifyay ultiplemay ingsthay inyay ayay acespay ountcay asyay ifficultday erraintay. Owlay urniturefay, ubbleray, undergrowthyay, eepstay airsstay, owsnay, andyay allowshay ogsbay areyay examplesyay ofyay ifficultday erraintay. 
 Ethay acespay ofyay anotheryay eaturecray, whetheryay ostilehay oryay otnay, alsoyay ountscay asyay ifficultday erraintay. Eingbay  Onepray Ombatantscay oftenyay indfay emselvesthay yinglay onyay ethay oundgray, eitheryay ecausebay eythay areyay ockedknay ownday oryay ecausebay eythay owthray emselvesthay ownday. 
 Inyay ethay amegay, eythay areyay onepray, ayay onditioncay escribedday inyay appendixyay Ayay. Youyay ancay opdray onepray withoutyay usingyay anyyay ofyay youryay eedspay. 
anyay amountyay ofyay ovementmay equalyay otay alfhay youryay eedspay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youryay eedspay isyay 30 eetfay, youyay ustmay endspay 15 eetfay ofyay ovementmay otay andstay upyay. 
 Youyay an’tcay andstay upyay ifyay youyay on’tday avehay enoughyay ovementmay eftlay oryay ifyay youryay eedspay isyay 0. Otay ovemay whileyay onepray, youyay ustmay awlcray oryay useyay agicmay uchsay asyay eleportationtay. 
 Everyyay ootfay ofyay ovementmay whileyay awlingcray ostscay 1 extrayay ootfay. 
 Awlingcray 1 ootfay inyay ifficultday erraintay, ereforethay, ostscay 3 eetfay ofyay ovementmay. Ovingmay  Aroundyay  Otheryay  Eaturescray  Youyay ancay ovemay oughthray ayay onhostilenay eature’scray acespay. Inyay ontrastcay, youyay ancay ovemay oughthray ayay ostilehay eature'scray acespay onlyyay ifyay ethay eaturecray isyay atyay eastlay wotay izessay argerlay oryay allersmay anthay youyay. 
 Ememberray atthay anotheryay eature’scray acespay isyay ifficultday erraintay orfay youyay. Whetheryay ayay eaturecray isyay ayay iendfray oryay anyay enemyyay, youyay an’tcay willinglyyay endyay youryay ovemay inyay itsyay acespay. Ifyay youyay eavelay ayay ostilehay eature’scray eachray uringday youryay ovemay, youyay ovokepray anyay opportunityyay attackyay, asyay explainedyay aterlay inyay ethay apterchay. Yingflay  Ovementmay Yingflay eaturescray enjoyyay anymay enefitsbay ofyay obilitymay, utbay eythay ustmay alsoyay ealday withyay ethay angerday ofyay allingfay. 
 Ifyay ayay yingflay eaturecray isyay ockedknay onepray, ashay itsyay eedspay educedray otay 0, oryay isyay otherwiseyay eprivedday ofyay ethay abilityyay otay ovemay, ethay eaturecray allsfay, unlessyay ityay ashay ethay abilityyay otay overhay oryay ityay isyay eingbay eldhay aloftyay ybay agicmay, uchsay asyay ybay ethay yflay ellspay. Eaturecray  Izesay Eachyay eaturecray akestay upyay ayay ifferentday amountyay ofyay acespay. Ethay  Izesay  Ategoriescay abletay owsshay owhay uchmay acespay ayay eaturecray ofyay ayay articularpay izesay ontrolscay inyay ombatcay. Objectsyay ometimessay useyay ethay amesay izesay ategoriescay. Izesay  Ategoriescay Izesay  Ategoriescay Izesay Acespay Inytay2 1/2 ybay 2 1/2 ftay Allsmay5 ybay 5 ftay. Ediummay5 ybay 5 ftay. Argelay10 ybay 10 ftay. Ugehay15 ybay 15 ftay. Argantuangay20 ybay 20 ftay. 
oryay argerlay Acespay Ayay eature'scray acespay isyay ethay areayay inyay eetfay atthay ityay effectivelyyay ontrolscay inyay ombatcay, otnay anyay expressionyay ofyay itsyay ysicalphay imensionsday. 
Ayay ypicaltay  Ediummay eaturecray isn'tyay 5 eetfay wideyay, orfay exampleyay, utbay ityay oesday ontrolcay ayay acespay atthay wideyay. 
 Ifyay ayay  Ediummay obgoblinhay andsstay inyay ayay 5-oot-widefay oorwayday, otheryay eaturescray an’tcay etgay oughthray unlessyay ethay obgoblinhay etslay em.Athay eature’scray acespay alsoyay eflectsray ethay areayay ityay eedsnay otay ightfay effectivelyyay. 
 Orfay atthay easonray, ere’sthay ayay imitlay otay ethay umbernay ofyay eaturescray atthay ancay urroundsay anotheryay eaturecray inyay ombatcay. 
 Assumingyay  Ediummay ombatantscay, eightyay eaturescray ancay itfay inyay ayay 5-ootfay adiusray aroundyay anotheryay oneyay. Ecausebay argerlay eaturescray aketay upyay oremay acespay, ewerfay ofyay emthay ancay urroundsay ayay eaturecray. 
 Ariantvay:  Ayingplay onyay ayay  Idgray Ifyay youyay ayplay outyay ayay ombatcay usingyay ayay quaresay idgray andyay iniaturesmay oryay otheryay okenstay, ollowfay esethay ulesray. Quaressay. 
 Eachyay quaresay onyay ethay idgray epresentsray 5 eetfay. Eedspay. 
 Atherray anthay ovingmay ootfay ybay ootfay, ovemay quaresay ybay quaresay onyay ethay idgray. 
 Isthay eansmay youyay useyay youryay eedspay inyay 5-ootfay egmentssay. 
 Isthay isyay articularlypay easyyay ifyay youyay anslatetray youryay eedspay intoyay quaressay ybay ividingday ethay eedspay ybay 5. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay eedspay ofyay 30 eetfay anslatestray intoyay ayay eedspay ofyay 6 quaressay. Ifyay youyay useyay ayay idgray oftenyay, onsidercay writingyay youryay eedspay inyay quaressay onyay youryay aracterchay eetshay. Enteringyay ayay  Quaresay. 
 Otay enteryay ayay quaresay, youyay ustmay avehay atyay eastlay 1 quaresay ofyay ovementmay eftlay, evenyay ifyay ethay quaresay isyay iagonallyday adjacentyay otay ethay quaresay you’reyay inyay. 
( Ethay uleray orfay iagonalday ovementmay acrificessay ealismray orfay ethay akesay ofyay oothsmay ayplay. 
 Ethay  Ungeonday  Aster’smay  Uidegay ovidespray uidancegay onyay usingyay ayay oremay ealisticray approachyay.) Ifyay ayay quaresay ostscay extrayay ovementmay, asyay ayay quaresay ofyay ifficultday erraintay oesday, youyay ustmay avehay enoughyay ovementmay eftlay otay aypay orfay enteringyay ityay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, youyay ustmay avehay atyay eastlay 2 quaressay ofyay ovementmay eftlay otay enteryay ayay quaresay ofyay ifficultday erraintay. Ornerscay. 
 Iagonalday ovementmay an’tcay osscray ethay ornercay ofyay ayay wallyay, argelay eetray, oryay otheryay erraintay eaturefay atthay illsfay itsyay acespay. Angesray. 
 Otay etermineday ethay angeray onyay ayay idgray etweenbay wotay ings—whetherthay eaturescray oryay objects—startyay ountingcay quaressay omfray ayay quaresay adjacentyay otay oneyay ofyay emthay andyay opstay ountingcay inyay ethay acespay ofyay ethay otheryay oneyay.
