 Ountcay ybay ethay ortestshay outeray. 
owdcray aroundyay ayay  Ediummay oryay allersmay oneyay, ere’sthay ittlelay oomray orfay anyoneyay elseyay. 
 Inyay ontrastcay, asyay anymay asyay wentytay  Ediummay eaturescray ancay urroundsay ayay  Argantuangay oneyay. Queezingsay intoyay ayay  Allersmay  Acespay Ayay eaturecray ancay queezesay oughthray ayay acespay atthay isyay argelay enoughyay orfay ayay eaturecray oneyay izesay allersmay anthay ityay. 
 Usthay, ayay  Argelay eaturecray ancay queezesay oughthray ayay assagepay at'sthay onlyyay 5 eetfay wideyay. 
 Whileyay queezingsay oughthray ayay acespay, ayay eaturecray ustmay endspay 1 extrayay ootfay orfay everyyay ootfay ityay ovesmay erethay, andyay ityay ashay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray andyay  Exterityday avingsay owsthray. 
 Attackyay ollsray againstyay ethay eaturecray avehay advantageyay whileyay it’syay inyay ethay allersmay acespay. Actionsyay inyay  Ombatcay Whenyay youyay aketay youryay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay aketay oneyay ofyay ethay actionsyay esentedpray erehay, anyay actionyay youyay ainedgay omfray youryay assclay oryay ayay ecialspay eaturefay, oryay anyay actionyay atthay youyay improviseyay. 
 Anymay onstersmay avehay actionyay optionsyay ofyay eirthay ownyay inyay eirthay atstay ocksblay. Whenyay youyay escribeday anyay actionyay otnay etailedday elsewhereyay inyay ethay ulesray, ethay DMay ellstay youyay whetheryay atthay actionyay isyay ossiblepay andyay whatyay indkay ofyay ollray youyay eednay otay akemay, ifyay anyyay, otay etermineday uccesssay oryay ailurefay. Attackyay Ethay ostmay ommoncay actionyay otay aketay inyay ombatcay isyay ethay  Attackyay actionyay, whetheryay youyay areyay wingingsay ayay wordsay, iringfay anyay arrowyay omfray ayay owbay, oryay awlingbray withyay youryay istsfay. Withyay isthay actionyay, youyay akemay oneyay eleemay oryay angedray attackyay. 
 Eesay ethay “ Akingmay anyay  Attackyay” ectionsay orfay ethay ulesray atthay overngay attacksyay. Ertaincay eaturesfay, uchsay asyay ethay  Extrayay  Attackyay eaturefay ofyay ethay ighterfay, allowyay youyay otay akemay oremay anthay oneyay attackyay withyay isthay actionyay. Astcay ayay  Ellspay Ellcastersspay uchsay asyay wizardsyay andyay ericsclay, asyay wellyay asyay anymay onstersmay, avehay accessyay otay ellsspay andyay ancay useyay emthay otay eatgray effectyay inyay ombatcay. 
 Eachyay ellspay ashay ayay astingcay imetay, whichyay ecifiesspay whetheryay ethay astercay ustmay useyay anyay actionyay, ayay eactionray, inutesmay, oryay evenyay ourshay otay astcay ethay ellspay. 
 Astingcay ayay ellspay isyay, ereforethay, otnay ecessarilynay anyay actionyay. 
 Ostmay ellsspay oday avehay ayay astingcay imetay ofyay 1 actionyay, osay ayay ellcasterspay oftenyay usesyay ishay oryay erhay actionyay inyay ombatcay otay astcay uchsay ayay ellspay. 
 Eesay apterchay 10 orfay ethay ulesray onyay ellcastingspay. Ashday Whenyay youyay aketay ethay  Ashday actionyay, youyay aingay extrayay ovementmay orfay ethay urrentcay urntay. 
 Ethay increaseyay equalsyay youryay eedspay, afteryay applyingyay anyyay odifiersmay. 
 Withyay ayay eedspay ofyay 30 eetfay, orfay exampleyay, youyay ancay ovemay upyay otay 60 eetfay onyay youryay urntay ifyay youyay ashday. Anyyay increaseyay oryay ecreaseday otay youryay eedspay angeschay isthay additionalyay ovementmay ybay ethay amesay amountyay. 
 Ifyay youryay eedspay ofyay 30 eetfay isyay educedray otay 15 eetfay, orfay instanceyay, youyay ancay ovemay upyay otay 30 eetfay isthay urntay ifyay youyay ashday. Isengageday Ifyay youyay aketay ethay  Isengageday actionyay, youryay ovementmay oesn’tday ovokepray opportunityyay attacksyay orfay ethay estray ofyay ethay urntay. Odgeday Whenyay youyay aketay ethay  Odgeday actionyay, youyay ocusfay entirelyyay onyay avoidingyay attacksyay. 
 Untilyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay, anyyay attackyay ollray ademay againstyay youyay ashay isadvantageday ifyay youyay ancay eesay ethay attackeryay, andyay youyay akemay  Exterityday avingsay owsthray withyay advantageyay. 
 Youyay oselay isthay enefitbay ifyay youyay areyay incapacitatedyay (asyay explainedyay inyay appendixyay Ayay) oryay ifyay youryay eedspay opsdray otay 0. Elphay Youyay ancay endlay youryay aidyay otay anotheryay eaturecray inyay ethay ompletioncay ofyay ayay asktay. 
 Whenyay youyay aketay ethay  Elphay actionyay, ethay eaturecray youyay aidyay ainsgay advantageyay onyay ethay extnay abilityyay eckchay ityay akesmay otay erformpay ethay asktay youyay areyay elpinghay withyay, ovidedpray atthay ityay akesmay ethay eckchay eforebay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Alternativelyyay, youyay ancay aidyay ayay iendlyfray eaturecray inyay attackingyay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Youyay eintfay, istractday ethay argettay, oryay inyay omesay otheryay wayyay eamtay upyay otay akemay youryay ally’syay attackyay oremay effectiveyay. 
 Ifyay youryay allyyay attacksyay ethay argettay eforebay youryay extnay urntay, ethay irstfay attackyay ollray isyay ademay withyay advantageyay. Idehay Whenyay youyay aketay ethay  Idehay actionyay, youyay akemay ayay  Exterityday ( Ealthstay) eckchay inyay anyay attemptyay otay idehay, ollowingfay ethay ulesray inyay apterchay 7 orfay idinghay. 
 Akingmay anyay  Attackyay Improvisingyay anyay  Actionyay Youryay aracterchay ancay oday ingsthay otnay overedcay ybay ethay actionsyay inyay isthay apterchay, uchsay asyay eakingbray ownday oorsday, intimidatingyay enemiesyay, ensingsay weaknessesyay inyay agicalmay efensesday, oryay allingcay orfay ayay arleypay withyay ayay oefay. 
 Ethay onlyyay imitslay otay ethay actionsyay youyay ancay attemptyay areyay youryay imaginationyay andyay youryay aracter’schay abilityyay oresscay. 
 Eesay ethay escriptionsday ofyay ethay abilityyay oresscay inyay apterchay 7 orfay inspirationyay asyay youyay improviseyay. Whenyay youyay escribeday anyay actionyay otnay etailedday elsewhereyay inyay ethay ulesray, ethay DMay ellstay youyay whetheryay atthay actionyay isyay ossiblepay andyay whatyay indkay ofyay ollray youyay eednay otay akemay, ifyay anyyay, otay etermineday uccesssay oryay ailurefay. Eadyray Earchsay Whenyay youyay aketay ethay  Earchsay actionyay, youyay evoteday youryay attentionyay otay indingfay omethingsay. 
 Ependingday onyay ethay aturenay ofyay youryay earchsay, ethay DMay ightmay avehay youyay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckchay oryay anyay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay. Useyay anyay  Objectyay Youyay ormallynay interactyay withyay anyay objectyay whileyay oingday omethingsay elseyay, uchsay asyay whenyay youyay awdray ayay wordsay asyay artpay ofyay anyay attackyay. 
 Whenyay anyay objectyay equiresray youryay actionyay orfay itsyay useyay, youyay aketay ethay  Useyay anyay  Objectyay actionyay. 
 Isthay actionyay isyay alsoyay usefulyay whenyay youyay wantyay otay interactyay withyay oremay anthay oneyay objectyay onyay youryay urntay. Whetheryay you’reyay ikingstray withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay, iringfay ayay weaponyay atyay angeray, oryay akingmay anyay attackyay ollray asyay artpay ofyay ayay ellspay, anyay attackyay ashay ayay implesay ucturestray. Ometimessay youyay wantyay otay etgay ethay umpjay onyay ayay oefay oryay waityay orfay ayay articularpay ircumstancecay eforebay youyay actyay. 
 Otay oday osay, youyay ancay aketay ethay  Eadyray actionyay onyay youryay urntay osay atthay youyay ancay actyay aterlay inyay ethay oundray usingyay youryay eactionray. Irstfay, youyay ecideday whatyay erceivablepay ircumstancecay willyay iggertray youryay eactionray. 
 Enthay, youyay oosechay ethay actionyay youyay willyay aketay inyay esponseray otay atthay iggertray, oryay youyay oosechay otay ovemay upyay otay youryay eedspay inyay esponseray otay ityay. 
 Examplesyay includeyay “ Ifyay ethay ultistcay epsstay onyay ethay apdoortray, I’llyay ullpay ethay everlay atthay opensyay ityay,” andyay “ Ifyay ethay oblingay epsstay extnay otay e,Imay ovemay awayyay.” Whenyay ethay iggertray occursyay, youyay ancay eitheryay aketay youryay eactionray ightray afteryay ethay iggertray inishesfay oryay ignoreyay ethay iggertray. 
 Ememberray atthay youyay ancay aketay onlyyay oneyay eactionray erpay oundray. Whenyay youyay eadyray ayay ellspay, youyay astcay ityay asyay ormalnay utbay oldhay itsyay energyyay, whichyay youyay eleaseray withyay youryay eactionray whenyay ethay iggertray occursyay. 
 Otay ebay eadiedray, ayay ellspay ustmay avehay ayay astingcay imetay ofyay 1 actionyay, andyay oldinghay ontoyay ethay ell’sspay agicmay equiresray oncentrationcay (explainedyay inyay apterchay 10). 
 Ifyay youryay oncentrationcay isyay okenbray, ethay ellspay issipatesday withoutyay akingtay effectyay. 
 Attackyay  Ollsray Whenyay youyay akemay anyay attackyay, youryay attackyay ollray eterminesday whetheryay ethay attackyay itshay oryay issesmay. 
 Otay akemay anyay attackyay ollray, ollray ayay day20 andyay addyay ethay appropriateyay odifiersmay. 
 Ifyay ethay otaltay ofyay ethay ollray usplay odifiersmay equalsyay oryay exceedsyay ethay arget’stay  Armoryay  Assclay (ACyay), ethay attackyay itshay. 
 Ethay ACyay ofyay ayay aracterchay isyay eterminedday atyay aracterchay eationcray, whereasyay ethay ACyay ofyay ayay onstermay isyay inyay itsyay atstay ockblay. Odifiersmay otay ethay  Ollray Whenyay ayay aracterchay akesmay anyay attackyay ollray, ethay wotay ostmay ommoncay odifiersmay otay ethay ollray areyay anyay abilityyay odifiermay andyay ethay aracter’schay oficiencypray onusbay. 
 Whenyay ayay onstermay akesmay anyay attackyay ollray, ityay usesyay whateveryay odifiermay isyay ovidedpray inyay itsyay atstay ockblay. Abilityyay  Odifiermay. 
 Ethay abilityyay odifiermay usedyay orfay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay isyay  Engthstray, andyay ethay abilityyay odifiermay usedyay orfay ayay angedray weaponyay attackyay isyay  Exterityday. 
 Weaponsyay atthay avehay ethay inessefay oryay ownthray opertypray eakbray isthay uleray. Omesay ellsspay alsoyay equireray anyay attackyay ollray. 
 Ethay abilityyay odifiermay usedyay orfay ayay ellspay attackyay ependsday onyay ethay ellcastingspay abilityyay ofyay ethay ellcasterspay, asyay explainedyay inyay apterchay 10. Oficiencypray  Onusbay. 
 Youyay addyay youryay oficiencypray onusbay otay youryay attackyay ollray whenyay youyay attackyay usingyay ayay weaponyay withyay whichyay youyay avehay oficiencypray, asyay wellyay asyay whenyay youyay attackyay withyay ayay ellspay. Ollingray 1 oryay 20 Ometimessay atefay essesblay oryay ursescay ayay ombatantcay, ausingcay ethay ovicenay otay ithay andyay ethay eteranvay otay issmay. Ifyay ethay day20 ollray orfay anyay attackyay isyay ayay 20, ethay attackyay itshay egardlessray ofyay anyyay odifiersmay oryay ethay arget’stay ACyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, ethay attackyay isyay ayay iticalcray ithay, asyay explainedyay aterlay inyay isthay apterchay. Ifyay ethay day20 ollray orfay anyay attackyay isyay ayay 1, ethay attackyay issesmay egardlessray ofyay anyyay odifiersmay oryay ethay arget’stay ACyay. Unseenyay  Attackersyay andyay  Argetstay1. 
 Oosechay ayay argettay. 
 Ickpay ayay argettay withinyay youryay attack’syay angeray: ayay eaturecray, anyay objectyay, oryay ayay ocationlay.2. 
 Etermineday odifiersmay. 
 Ethay DMay eterminesday whetheryay ethay argettay ashay overcay andyay whetheryay youyay avehay advantageyay oryay isadvantageday againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Inyay additionyay, ellsspay, ecialspay abilitiesyay, andyay otheryay effectsyay ancay applyyay enaltiespay oryay onusesbay otay youryay attackyay ollray.3. 
 Esolveray ethay attackyay. 
 Youyay akemay ethay attackyay ollray. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, youyay ollray amageday, unlessyay ethay articularpay attackyay ashay ulesray atthay ecifyspay otherwiseyay. 
 Omesay attacksyay ausecay ecialspay effectsyay inyay additionyay otay oryay insteadyay ofyay amageday. Ifyay ere’sthay everyay anyyay questionyay whetheryay omethingsay you’reyay oingday ountscay asyay anyay attackyay, ethay uleray isyay implesay: ifyay you’reyay akingmay anyay attackyay ollray, you’reyay akingmay anyay attackyay. Ombatantscay oftenyay ytray otay escapeyay eirthay oesfay’ oticenay ybay idinghay, astingcay ethay invisibilityyay ellspay, oryay urkinglay inyay arknessday. Whenyay youyay attackyay ayay argettay atthay youyay an’tcay eesay, youyay avehay isadvantageday onyay ethay attackyay ollray. 
 Isthay isyay uetray whetheryay you’reyay uessinggay ethay arget’stay ocationlay oryay you’reyay argetingtay ayay eaturecray youyay ancay earhay utbay otnay eesay. 
ethay ocationlay youyay argetedtay, youyay automaticallyyay issmay, utbay ethay DMay ypicallytay ustjay ayssay atthay ethay attackyay issedmay, otnay whetheryay youyay uessedgay ethay arget’stay ocationlay orrectlycay. Whenyay ayay eaturecray an’tcay eesay youyay, youyay avehay advantageyay onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay ityay. Ifyay youyay areyay idden—bothhay unseenyay andyay unheard—whenyay youyay akemay anyay attackyay, youyay ivegay awayyay youryay ocationlay whenyay ethay attackyay itshay oryay issesmay. Angedray  Attacksyay Whenyay youyay akemay ayay angedray attackyay, youyay irefay ayay owbay oryay ayay ossbowcray, urlhay ayay andaxehay, oryay otherwiseyay endsay ojectilespray otay ikestray ayay oefay atyay ayay istanceday. 
Ayay onstermay ightmay ootshay inesspay omfray itsyay ailtay. 
 Anymay ellsspay alsoyay involveyay akingmay ayay angedray attackyay. Angeray Youyay ancay akemay angedray attacksyay onlyyay againstyay argetstay withinyay ayay ecifiedspay angeray. Ifyay ayay angedray attackyay, uchsay asyay oneyay ademay withyay ayay ellspay, ashay ayay inglesay angeray, youyay an’tcay attackyay ayay argettay eyondbay isthay angeray. Omesay angedray attacksyay, uchsay asyay osethay ademay withyay ayay ongbowlay oryay ayay ortbowshay, avehay wotay angesray. 
 Ethay allersmay umbernay isyay ethay ormalnay angeray, andyay ethay argerlay umbernay isyay ethay onglay angeray. 
 Youryay attackyay ollray ashay isadvantageday whenyay youryay argettay isyay eyondbay ormalnay angeray, andyay youyay an’tcay attackyay ayay argettay eyondbay ethay onglay angeray. Angedray  Attacksyay inyay  Oseclay  Ombatcay Aimingyay ayay angedray attackyay isyay oremay ifficultday whenyay ayay oefay isyay extnay otay youyay. 
 Whenyay youyay akemay ayay angedray attackyay withyay ayay weaponyay, ayay ellspay, oryay omesay otheryay eansmay, youyay avehay isadvantageday onyay ethay attackyay ollray ifyay youyay areyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ayay ostilehay eaturecray whoyay ancay eesay youyay andyay whoyay isn’tyay incapacitatedyay. Eleemay  Attacksyay Usedyay inyay and-to-handhay ombatcay, ayay eleemay attackyay allowsyay youyay otay attackyay ayay oefay withinyay youryay eachray. 
Ayay eleemay attackyay ypicallytay usesyay ayay andheldhay weaponyay uchsay asyay ayay wordsay, ayay warhammeryay, oryay anyay axeyay. 
Ayay ypicaltay onstermay akesmay ayay eleemay attackyay whenyay ityay ikesstray withyay itsyay awsclay, ornshay, eethtay, entaclestay, oryay otheryay odybay artpay. 
Ayay ewfay ellsspay alsoyay involveyay akingmay ayay eleemay attackyay. Ostmay eaturescray avehay ayay 5-ootfay eachray andyay ancay usthay attackyay argetstay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay emthay whenyay akingmay ayay eleemay attackyay. 
 Ertaincay eaturescray (ypicallytay osethay argerlay anthay  Ediummay) avehay eleemay attacksyay withyay ayay eatergray eachray anthay 5 eetfay, asyay otednay inyay eirthay escriptionsday. Whenyay youyay areyay unarmedyay, youyay ancay ightfay inyay eleemay ybay akingmay anyay unarmedyay ikestray, asyay ownshay inyay ethay weaponyay abletay inyay apterchay 5. Opportunityyay  Attacksyay Inyay ayay ightfay, everyoneyay isyay onstantlycay watchingyay orfay enemiesyay otay opdray eirthay uardgay. 
 Youyay ancay arelyray ovemay eedlesslyhay astpay youryay oesfay withoutyay uttingpay yourselfyay inyay angerday; oingday osay ovokespray anyay opportunityyay attackyay. Youyay ancay akemay anyay opportunityyay attackyay whenyay ayay ostilehay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay ovesmay outyay ofyay youryay eachray. 
 Otay akemay ethay opportunityyay attackyay, youyay useyay youryay eactionray otay akemay oneyay eleemay attackyay againstyay ethay ovokingpray Ontestscay inyay  Ombatcay Attlebay oftenyay involvesyay ittingpay youryay owesspray againstyay atthay ofyay youryay oefay. 
 Uchsay ayay allengechay isyay epresentedray ybay ayay ontestcay. 
 Isthay ectionsay includesyay ethay ostmay ommoncay ontestscay atthay equireray anyay actionyay inyay ombatcay: applinggray andyay ovingshay ayay eaturecray. 
 Ethay DMay ancay useyay esethay ontestscay asyay odelsmay orfay improvisingyay others.creatureyay. 
 Ethay attackyay interruptsyay ethay ovokingpray eature’scray ovementmay, occurringyay ightray eforebay ethay eaturecray eaveslay youryay eachray. Youyay ancay avoidyay ovokingpray anyay opportunityyay attackyay ybay akingtay ethay  Isengageday actionyay. 
 Youyay alsoyay on’tday ovokepray anyay opportunityyay attackyay whenyay youyay eleporttay oryay whenyay omeonesay oryay omethingsay ovesmay youyay withoutyay usingyay youryay ovementmay, actionyay, oryay eactionray. 
 Orfay exampleyay, youyay on’tday ovokepray anyay opportunityyay attackyay ifyay anyay explosionyay urlshay youyay outyay ofyay ayay oe’sfay eachray oryay ifyay avitygray ausescay youyay otay allfay astpay anyay enemyyay. Wotay- Weaponyay  Ightingfay Whenyay youyay aketay ethay  Attackyay actionyay andyay attackyay withyay ayay ightlay eleemay weaponyay atthay you’reyay oldinghay inyay oneyay andhay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay otay attackyay withyay ayay ifferentday ightlay eleemay weaponyay atthay you’reyay oldinghay inyay ethay otheryay andhay. 
 Youyay on’tday addyay youryay abilityyay odifiermay otay ethay amageday ofyay ethay onusbay attackyay, unlessyay atthay odifiermay isyay egativenay. Ifyay eitheryay weaponyay ashay ethay ownthray opertypray, youyay ancay owthray ethay weaponyay, insteadyay ofyay akingmay ayay eleemay attackyay withyay ityay. Applinggray Whenyay youyay wantyay otay abgray ayay eaturecray oryay wrestleyay withyay ityay, youyay ancay useyay ethay  Attackyay actionyay otay akemay ayay ecialspay eleemay attackyay, ayay applegray. 
 Ifyay you’reyay ableyay otay akemay ultiplemay attacksyay withyay ethay  Attackyay actionyay, isthay attackyay eplacesray oneyay ofyay emthay. Ethay argettay ofyay youryay applegray ustmay ebay onay oremay anthay oneyay izesay argerlay anthay youyay, andyay ityay ustmay ebay withinyay youryay eachray. 
 Usingyay atyay eastlay oneyay eefray andhay, youyay ytray otay eizesay ethay argettay ybay akingmay ayay applegray eckchay, ayay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay ontestedcay ybay ethay arget’stay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) oryay  Exterityday ( Acrobaticsyay) eckchay (ethay argettay ooseschay ethay abilityyay otay useyay). 
 Ifyay youyay ucceedsay, youyay ubjectsay ethay argettay otay ethay appledgray onditioncay (eesay appendixyay Ayay). 
 Ethay onditioncay ecifiesspay ethay ingsthay atthay endyay ityay, andyay youyay ancay eleaseray ethay argettay wheneveryay youyay ikelay (onay actionyay equiredray). Escapingyay ayay  Applegray. 
Ayay appledgray eaturecray ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay escapeyay. 
 Otay oday osay, ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) oryay  Exterityday ( Acrobaticsyay) eckchay ontestedcay ybay youryay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay. Ovingmay ayay  Appledgray  Eaturecray. 
 Whenyay youyay ovemay, youyay ancay agdray oryay arrycay ethay appledgray eaturecray withyay youyay, utbay youryay eedspay isyay alvedhay, unlessyay ethay eaturecray isyay wotay oryay oremay izessay allersmay anthay youyay. Ovingshay ayay  Eaturecray Usingyay ethay  Attackyay actionyay, youyay ancay akemay ayay ecialspay eleemay attackyay otay oveshay ayay eaturecray, eitheryay otay ockknay ityay onepray oryay ushpay ityay awayyay omfray youyay. 
 Ifyay you’reyay ableyay otay akemay ultiplemay attacksyay withyay ethay  Attackyay actionyay, isthay attackyay eplacesray oneyay ofyay emthay. Ethay argettay ofyay youryay oveshay ustmay ebay onay oremay anthay oneyay izesay argerlay anthay youyay, andyay ityay ustmay ebay withinyay youryay eachray. 
eckchay (ethay argettay ooseschay ethay abilityyay otay useyay). 
 Ifyay youyay winyay ethay ontestcay, youyay eitheryay ockknay ethay argettay onepray oryay ushpay ityay 5 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay. Overcay Wallsyay, eestray, eaturescray, andyay otheryay obstaclesyay ancay ovidepray overcay uringday ombatcay, akingmay ayay argettay oremay ifficultday otay armhay. 
Ayay argettay ancay enefitbay omfray overcay onlyyay whenyay anyay attackyay oryay otheryay effectyay originatesyay onyay ethay oppositeyay idesay ofyay ethay overcay. Erethay areyay eethray egreesday ofyay overcay. 
 Ifyay ayay argettay isyay ehindbay ultiplemay ourcessay ofyay overcay, onlyyay ethay ostmay otectivepray egreeday ofyay overcay appliesyay; ethay egreesday aren'tyay addedyay ogethertay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay ayay argettay isyay ehindbay ayay eaturecray atthay ivesgay alfhay overcay andyay ayay eetray unktray atthay ivesgay eethray- quartersyay overcay, ethay argettay ashay ee-quartersthray over.Acay argettay withyay alfhay overcay ashay ayay +2 onusbay otay ACyay andyay  Exterityday avingsay owsthray. 
Ayay argettay ashay alfhay overcay ifyay anyay obstacleyay ocksblay atyay eastlay alfhay ofyay itsyay odybay. 
 Ethay obstacleyay ightmay ebay ayay owlay wallyay, ayay argelay iecepay ofyay urniturefay, ayay arrownay eetray unktray, oryay ayay eaturecray, whetheryay atthay eaturecray isyay anyay enemyyay oryay ayay iend.Afray argettay withyay ee-quartersthray overcay ashay ayay +5 onusbay otay ACyay andyay  Exterityday avingsay owsthray. 
Ayay argettay ashay eethray- quartersyay overcay ifyay aboutyay ee-quartersthray ofyay ityay isyay overedcay ybay anyay obstacleyay. 
 Ethay obstacleyay ightmay ebay ayay ortcullispay, anyay arrowyay itslay, oryay ayay ickthay eetray unk.Atray argettay withyay otaltay overcay an’tcay ebay argetedtay irectlyday ybay anyay attackyay oryay ayay ellspay, althoughyay omesay ellsspay ancay eachray uchsay ayay argettay ybay includingyay ityay inyay anyay areayay ofyay effectyay. 
Ayay argettay ashay otaltay overcay ifyay ityay isyay ompletelycay oncealedcay ybay anyay obstacleyay. Amageday andyay  Ealinghay Injuryyay andyay ethay iskray ofyay eathday areyay onstantcay ompanionscay ofyay osethay whoyay exploreyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay. 
 Ethay ustthray ofyay ayay wordsay, ayay well-placedyay arrowyay, oryay ayay astblay ofyay ameflay omfray ayay ireballfay ellspay allyay avehay ethay otentialpay otay amageday, oryay evenyay illkay, ethay ardiesthay ofyay eaturescray. Ithay  Ointspay Ithay ointspay epresentray ayay ombinationcay ofyay ysicalphay andyay entalmay urabilityday, ethay willyay otay ivelay, andyay ucklay. 
 Eaturescray withyay oremay ithay ointspay areyay oremay ifficultday otay illkay. 
 Osethay withyay ewerfay ithay ointspay areyay oremay agile.Afray eature’scray urrentcay ithay ointspay (usuallyyay ustjay alledcay ithay ointspay) ancay ebay anyyay umbernay omfray ethay eature’scray ithay ointpay aximummay ownday otay 0. 
 Isthay umbernay angeschay equentlyfray asyay ayay eaturecray akestay amageday oryay eceivesray ealinghay. Wheneveryay ayay eaturecray akestay amageday, atthay amageday isyay ubtractedsay omfray itsyay ithay ointspay. 
 Ethay osslay ofyay ithay ointspay ashay onay effectyay onyay ayay eature’scray apabilitiescay untilyay ethay eaturecray opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay. Amageday  Ollsray Eachyay weaponyay, ellspay, andyay armfulhay onstermay abilityyay ecifiesspay ethay amageday ityay ealsday. 
 Youyay ollray ethay amageday ieday oryay iceday, addyay anyyay odifiersmay, andyay applyyay ethay amageday otay youryay argettay. 
 Agicmay weaponsyay, ecialspay abilitiesyay, andyay otheryay actorsfay ancay antgray ayay onusbay otay amageday. Whenyay attackingyay withyay ayay weaponyay, youyay addyay youryay abilityyay odifier—themay amesay odifiermay usedyay orfay ethay attackyay ollray— otay ethay amageday. 
Ayay ellspay ellstay youyay whichyay iceday otay ollray orfay amageday andyay whetheryay otay addyay anyyay odifiersmay. Ifyay ayay ellspay oryay otheryay effectyay ealsday amageday otay oremay anthay oneyay argettay atyay ethay amesay imetay, ollray ethay amageday onceyay orfay allyay ofyay emthay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, whenyay ayay wizardyay astscay ireballfay oryay ayay ericclay astscay ameflay ikestray, ethay ell’sspay amageday isyay olledray onceyay orfay allyay eaturescray aughtcay inyay ethay astblay. Iticalcray  Itshay Whenyay youyay orescay ayay iticalcray ithay, youyay etgay otay ollray extrayay iceday orfay ethay attack’syay amageday againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Ollray allyay ofyay ethay attack’syay amageday iceday wicetay andyay addyay emthay ogethertay. 
 Enthay addyay anyyay elevantray odifiersmay asyay ormalnay. 
 Otay eedspay upyay ayplay, youyay ancay ollray allyay ethay amageday iceday atyay onceyay. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay orescay ayay iticalcray ithay withyay ayay aggerday, ollray 2day4 orfay ethay amageday, atherray anthay 1day4, andyay enthay addyay youryay elevantray abilityyay odifiermay. 
 Ifyay ethay attackyay involvesyay otheryay amageday iceday, uchsay asyay omfray ethay ogue’sray  Eaksnay  Attackyay eaturefay, youyay ollray osethay iceday wicetay asyay wellyay. Amageday  Ypestay Ifferentday attacksyay, amagingday ellsspay, andyay otheryay armfulhay effectsyay ealday ifferentday ypestay ofyay amageday. 
 Amageday ypestay avehay onay ulesray ofyay eirthay ownyay, utbay otheryay ulesray, uchsay asyay amageday esistanceray, elyray onyay ethay ypestay. Ethay amageday ypestay ollowfay, withyay examplesyay otay elphay ayay DMay assignyay ayay amageday ypetay otay ayay ewnay effectyay. Acidyay. 
 Ethay orrosivecay ayspray ofyay ayay ackblay agon’sdray eathbray andyay ethay issolvingday enzymesyay ecretedsay ybay ayay ackblay uddingpay ealday acidyay amageday. Udgeoningblay. 
 Untblay orcefay attacks—hammersyay, allingfay, onstrictioncay, andyay ethay ike—deallay udgeoningblay amageday. Oldcay. 
 Ethay infernalyay illchay adiatingray omfray anyay iceyay evil’sday earspay andyay ethay igidfray astblay ofyay ayay whiteyay agon’sdray eathbray ealday oldcay amageday. Irefay. 
 Edray agonsdray eathebray irefay, andyay anymay ellsspay onjurecay amesflay otay ealday irefay amageday. Orcefay. 
 Orcefay isyay urepay agicalmay energyyay ocusedfay intoyay ayay amagingday ormfay. 
 Ostmay effectsyay atthay ealday orcefay amageday areyay ellsspay, includingyay agicmay issilemay andyay iritualspay weaponyay. Ightninglay. 
Ayay ightninglay oltbay ellspay andyay ayay ueblay agon’sdray eathbray ealday ightninglay amageday. Ecroticnay. 
 Ecroticnay amageday, ealtday ybay ertaincay undeadyay andyay ayay ellspay uchsay asyay illchay ouchtay, withersyay attermay andyay evenyay ethay oulsay. Iercingpay. 
 Uncturingpay andyay impalingyay attacksyay, includingyay earsspay andyay onstersmay’ itesbay, ealday iercingpay amageday. Oisonpay. 
 Enomousvay ingsstay andyay ethay oxictay asgay ofyay ayay eengray agon’sdray eathbray ealday oisonpay amageday. Ychicpsay. 
 Entalmay abilitiesyay uchsay asyay ayay indmay ayer’sflay ionicpsay astblay ealday ychicpsay amageday. Adiantray. 
 Adiantray amageday, ealtday ybay ayay eric’sclay ameflay ikestray ellspay oryay anyay angel’syay itingsmay weaponyay, earssay ethay eshflay ikelay irefay andyay overloadsyay ethay iritspay withyay owerpay. Ashingslay. 
 Wordssay, axesyay, andyay onstersmay’ awsclay ealday ashingslay amageday. Underthay. 
 Amageday  Esistanceray andyay  Ulnerabilityvay Omesay eaturescray andyay objectsyay areyay exceedinglyyay ifficultday oryay unusuallyyay easyyay otay urthay withyay ertaincay ypestay ofyay amageday. Ifyay ayay eaturecray oryay anyay objectyay ashay esistanceray otay ayay amageday ypetay, amageday ofyay atthay ypetay isyay alvedhay againstyay ityay. 
 Ifyay ayay eaturecray oryay anyay objectyay ashay ulnerabilityvay otay ayay amageday ypetay, amageday ofyay atthay ypetay isyay oubledday againstyay ityay. Esistanceray andyay enthay ulnerabilityvay areyay appliedyay afteryay allyay otheryay odifiersmay otay amageday. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay eaturecray ashay esistanceray otay udgeoningblay amageday andyay isyay ithay ybay anyay attackyay atthay ealsday 25 udgeoningblay amageday. 
 Ethay eaturecray isyay alsoyay withinyay ayay agicalmay aurayay atthay educesray allyay amageday ybay5. 
 Ethay 25 amageday isyay irstfay educedray ybay 5 andyay enthay alvedhay, osay ethay eaturecray akestay 10 amageday. Ultiplemay instancesyay ofyay esistanceray oryay ulnerabilityvay atthay affectyay ethay amesay amageday ypetay ountcay asyay onlyyay oneyay instanceyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay ayay eaturecray ashay esistanceray otay irefay amageday asyay wellyay asyay esistanceray otay allyay onmagicalnay amageday, ethay amageday ofyay ayay onmagicalnay irefay isyay educedray ybay alfhay againstyay ethay eaturecray, otnay educedray ybay ee-quartersthray. Ealinghay Unlessyay ityay esultsray inyay eathday, amageday isn’tyay ermanentpay. 
 Evenyay eathday isyay eversibleray oughthray owerfulpay agicmay. 
 Estray ancay estoreray ayay eature'scray ithay ointspay (asyay explainedyay inyay apterchay 8), andyay agicalmay ethodsmay uchsay asyay ayay urecay woundsyay ellspay oryay ayay otionpay ofyay ealinghay ancay emoveray amageday inyay anyay instantyay. Whenyay ayay eaturecray eceivesray ealinghay ofyay anyyay indkay, ithay ointspay egainedray areyay addedyay otay itsyay urrentcay ithay ointspay. 
Ayay eature’scray ithay ointspay an’tcay exceedyay itsyay ithay ointpay aximummay, osay anyyay ithay ointspay egainedray inyay excessyay ofyay isthay umbernay areyay ostlay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay uiddray antsgray ayay angerray 8 ithay ointspay ofyay ealinghay. 
 Ifyay ethay angerray ashay 14 urrentcay ithay ointspay andyay ashay ayay ithay ointpay aximummay ofyay 20, ethay angerray egainsray 6 ithay ointspay omfray ethay uiddray, otnay 8.Ayay eaturecray atthay ashay iedday an’tcay egainray ithay ointspay untilyay agicmay uchsay asyay ethay evivifyray ellspay ashay estoredray ityay otay ifelay. Oppingdray otay 0  Ithay  Ointspay Whenyay youyay opdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, youyay eitheryay ieday outrightyay oryay allfay unconsciousyay, asyay explainedyay inyay ethay ollowingfay ectionssay. Instantyay  Eathday Assivemay amageday ancay illkay youyay instantlyyay. 
 Whenyay amageday educesray youyay otay 0 ithay ointspay andyay erethay isyay amageday emainingray, youyay ieday ifyay ethay emainingray amageday equalsyay oryay exceedsyay youryay ithay ointpay aximummay. Orfay exampleyay, ayay ericclay withyay ayay aximummay ofyay 12 ithay ointspay urrentlycay ashay 6 ithay ointspay. 
 Ifyay eshay akestay 18 amageday omfray anyay attackyay, eshay isyay educedray otay 0 ithay ointspay, utbay 12 amageday emainsray. 
 Ecausebay ethay emainingray amageday equalsyay erhay ithay ointpay aximummay, ethay ericclay iesday. Allingfay  Unconsciousyay Ifyay amageday educesray youyay otay 0 ithay ointspay andyay ailsfay otay illkay youyay, youyay allfay unconsciousyay (eesay appendixyay Ayay). 
 Isthay unconsciousnessyay endsyay ifyay youyay egainray anyyay ithay ointspay. Escribingday ethay  Effectsyay ofyay  Amageday Ungeonday  Astersmay escribeday ithay ointpay osslay inyay ifferentday waysyay. 
 Whenyay youryay urrentcay ithay ointpay otaltay isyay alfhay oryay oremay ofyay youryay ithay ointpay aximummay, youyay ypicallytay owshay onay ignssay ofyay injuryyay. 
 Whenyay youyay opdray elowbay alfhay youryay ithay ointpay aximummay, youyay owshay ignssay ofyay wearyay, uchsay asyay utscay andyay uisesbray. 
 Anyay attackyay atthay educesray youyay otay 0 ithay ointspay ikesstray youyay irectlyday, eavinglay ayay eedingblay injuryyay oryay otheryay aumatray, oryay ityay implysay ocksknay youyay unconsciousyay. Eathday  Avingsay  Owsthray Wheneveryay youyay artstay youryay urntay withyay 0 ithay ointspay, youyay ustmay akemay ayay ecialspay avingsay owthray, alledcay ayay eathday avingsay owthray, otay etermineday whetheryay youyay eepcray oserclay otay eathday oryay anghay ontoyay ifelay. 
 Unlikeyay otheryay avingsay owsthray, isthay oneyay isn’tyay iedtay otay anyyay abilityyay orescay. 
 Youyay areyay inyay ethay andshay ofyay atefay ownay, aidedyay onlyyay ybay ellsspay andyay eaturesfay atthay improveyay youryay anceschay ofyay ucceedingsay onyay ayay avingsay owthray. Ollray ayay day20. 
 Ifyay ethay ollray isyay 10 oryay igherhay, youyay ucceedsay. 
 Otherwiseyay, youyay ailfay. 
Ayay uccesssay oryay ailurefay ashay onay effectyay ybay itselfyay. 
 Onyay youryay irdthay uccesssay, youyay ecomebay ablestay (eesay elowbay). 
 Onyay youryay irdthay ailurefay, youyay ieday. 
 Ethay uccessessay andyay ailuresfay on'tday eednay otay ebay onsecutivecay; eepkay acktray ofyay othbay untilyay youyay ollectcay eethray ofyay ayay indkay. 
 Ethay umbernay ofyay othbay isyay esetray otay erozay whenyay youyay egainray anyyay ithay ointspay oryay ecomebay ablestay. Ollingray 1 oryay 20. 
 Whenyay youyay akemay ayay eathday avingsay owthray andyay ollray ayay 1 onyay ethay day20, ityay ountscay asyay wotay ailuresfay. 
 Ifyay youyay ollray ayay 20 onyay ethay day20, youyay egainray 1 ithay ointpay. Amageday atyay 0  Ithay  Ointspay. 
 Ifyay youyay aketay anyyay amageday whileyay youyay avehay 0 ithay ointspay, youyay uffersay ayay eathday avingsay owthray ailurefay. 
 Ifyay ethay amageday isyay omfray ayay iticalcray ithay, youyay uffersay wotay ailuresfay insteadyay. 
 Ifyay ethay amageday equalsyay oryay exceedsyay youryay ithay ointpay aximummay, youyay uffersay instantyay eathday. Abilizingstay ayay  Eaturecray Ethay estbay wayyay otay avesay ayay eaturecray withyay 0 ithay ointspay isyay otay ealhay ityay. 
 Ifyay ealinghay isyay unavailableyay, ethay eaturecray ancay atyay eastlay ebay abilizedstay osay atthay ityay isn’tyay illedkay ybay ayay ailedfay eathday avingsay owthray. Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay administeryay irstfay aidyay otay anyay unconsciousyay eaturecray andyay attemptyay otay abilizestay ityay, whichyay equiresray ayay uccessfulsay DCay 10  Wisdomyay ( Edicinemay) eck.Achay ablestay eaturecray oesn’tday akemay eathday avingsay owsthray, evenyay oughthay ityay ashay 0 ithay ointspay, utbay ityay oesday emainray unconsciousyay. 
artstay akingmay eathday avingsay owsthray againyay, ifyay ityay akestay anyyay amageday. 
Ayay ablestay eaturecray atthay isn’tyay ealedhay egainsray 1 ithay ointpay afteryay 1day4 ourshay. Onstersmay andyay  Eathday Ostmay Day msay avehay ayay onstermay ieday ethay instantyay ityay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, atherray anthay avinghay ityay allfay unconsciousyay andyay akemay eathday avingsay owsthray. Ightymay illainsvay andyay ecialspay onplayernay aracterschay areyay ommoncay exceptionsyay; ethay DMay ightmay avehay emthay allfay unconsciousyay andyay ollowfay ethay amesay ulesray asyay ayerplay aracterschay. Ockingknay ayay  Eaturecray  Outyay Ometimessay anyay attackeryay wantsyay otay incapacitateyay ayay oefay, atherray anthay ealday ayay illingkay owblay. 
 Whenyay anyay attackeryay educesray ayay eaturecray otay 0 ithay ointspay withyay ayay eleemay attackyay, ethay attackeryay ancay ockknay ethay eaturecray outyay. 
 Ethay attackeryay ancay akemay isthay oicechay ethay instantyay ethay amageday isyay ealtday. 
 Ethay eaturecray allsfay unconsciousyay andyay isyay ablestay. Emporarytay  Ithay  Ointspay Omesay ellsspay andyay ecialspay abilitiesyay onfercay emporarytay ithay ointspay otay ayay eaturecray. 
 Emporarytay ithay ointspay aren’tyay actualyay ithay ointspay; eythay areyay ayay ufferbay againstyay amageday, ayay oolpay ofyay ithay ointspay atthay otectpray youyay omfray injuryyay. Whenyay youyay avehay emporarytay ithay ointspay andyay aketay amageday, ethay emporarytay ithay ointspay areyay ostlay irstfay, andyay anyyay eftoverlay amageday arriescay overyay otay youryay ormalnay ithay ointspay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay avehay 5 emporarytay ithay ointspay andyay aketay 7 amageday, youyay oselay ethay emporarytay ithay ointspay andyay enthay aketay 2 amageday. Ecausebay emporarytay ithay ointspay areyay eparatesay omfray youryay actualyay ithay ointspay, eythay ancay exceedyay youryay ithay ointpay aximummay. 
Ayay aracterchay ancay, ereforethay, ebay atyay ullfay ithay ointspay andyay eceiveray emporarytay ithay ointspay. Ealinghay an’tcay estoreray emporarytay ithay ointspay, andyay eythay an’tcay ebay addedyay ogethertay. 
 Ifyay youyay avehay emporarytay ithay ointspay andyay eceiveray oremay ofyay emthay, youyay ecideday whetheryay otay eepkay ethay onesyay youyay avehay oryay otay aingay ethay ewnay onesyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay ayay ellspay antsgray youyay 12 emporarytay ithay ointspay whenyay youyay alreadyyay avehay 10, youyay ancay avehay 12 oryay 10, otnay 22. Ifyay youyay avehay 0 ithay ointspay, eceivingray emporarytay ithay ointspay oesn’tday estoreray youyay otay onsciousnesscay oryay abilizestay youyay. 
 Eythay ancay illstay absorbyay amageday irectedday atyay youyay whileyay you’reyay inyay atthay atestay, utbay onlyyay uetray ealinghay ancay avesay youyay. Unlessyay ayay eaturefay atthay antsgray youyay emporarytay ithay ointspay ashay ayay urationday, eythay astlay untilyay ey’rethay epletedday oryay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. Ountedmay  Ombatcay Ayay ightknay argingchay intoyay attlebay onyay ayay warhorseyay, ayay wizardyay astingcay ellsspay omfray ethay ackbay ofyay ayay iffongray, oryay ayay ericclay oaringsay oughthray ethay yskay onyay ayay egasuspay allyay enjoyyay ethay enefitsbay ofyay eedspay andyay obilitymay atthay ayay ountmay ancay ovide.Apray willingyay eaturecray atthay isyay atyay eastlay oneyay izesay argerlay anthay youyay andyay atthay ashay anyay appropriateyay anatomyyay ancay ervesay asyay ayay ountmay, usingyay ethay ollowingfay ulesray. Ountingmay andyay  Ismountingday Onceyay uringday youryay ovemay, youyay ancay ountmay ayay eaturecray atthay isyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay oryay ismountday. 
 Oingday osay ostscay anyay amountyay ofyay ovementmay equalyay otay alfhay youryay eedspay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youryay eedspay isyay 30 eetfay, youyay ustmay endspay 15 eetfay ofyay ovementmay otay ountmay ayay orsehay. 
 Ereforethay, youyay an’tcay ountmay ityay ifyay youyay on’tday avehay 15 eetfay ofyay ovementmay eftlay oryay ifyay youryay eedspay isyay 0. Ifyay anyay effectyay ovesmay youryay ountmay againstyay itsyay willyay whileyay you’reyay onyay ityay, youyay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 10  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay allfay offyay ethay ountmay, andinglay onepray inyay ayay acespay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ityay. 
 Ifyay you’reyay ockedknay onepray whileyay ountedmay, youyay ustmay akemay ethay amesay avingsay owthray. Ifyay youryay ountmay isyay ockedknay onepray, youyay ancay useyay youryay eactionray otay ismountday ityay asyay ityay allsfay andyay andlay onyay youryay eetfay. 
 Otherwiseyay, youyay areyay ismountedday andyay allfay onepray inyay ayay acespay withinyay 5 eetfay ityay. Ontrollingcay ayay  Ountmay Whileyay you'reyay ountedmay, youyay avehay wotay optionsyay. 
 Youyay ancay eitheryay ontrolcay ethay ountmay oryay allowyay ityay otay actyay independentlyyay. 
 Intelligentyay eaturescray, uchsay asyay agonsdray, actyay independentlyyay. Youyay ancay ontrolcay ayay ountmay onlyyay ifyay ityay ashay eenbay ainedtray otay acceptyay ayay iderray. 
 Omesticatedday orseshay, onkeysday, andyay imilarsay eaturescray areyay assumedyay otay avehay uchsay ainingtray. 
 Ethay initiativeyay ofyay ayay ontrolledcay ountmay angeschay otay atchmay yoursyay whenyay youyay ountmay ityay. 
 Ityay ovesmay asyay youyay irectday ityay, andyay ityay ashay onlyyay eethray actionyay optionsyay:  Ashday,  Isengageday, andyay  Odgeday. 
Ayay ontrolledcay ountmay ancay ovemay andyay actyay evenyay onyay ethay urntay atthay youyay ountmay ityay. Anyay independentyay ountmay etainsray itsyay aceplay inyay ethay initiativeyay orderyay. 
 Earingbay ayay iderray utspay onay estrictionsray onyay ethay actionsyay ethay ountmay ancay aketay, andyay ityay ovesmay andyay actsyay asyay ityay wishesyay. 
 Ityay ightmay eeflay omfray ombatcay, ushray otay attackyay andyay evourday ayay adlybay injuredyay oefay, oryay otherwiseyay actyay againstyay youryay wishesyay. Inyay eitheryay asecay, ifyay ethay ountmay ovokespray anyay opportunityyay attackyay whileyay you’reyay onyay ityay, ethay attackeryay ancay argettay youyay oryay ethay ountmay. Underwateryay  Ombatcay Whenyay adventurersyay ursuepay ahuaginsay ackbay otay eirthay underseayay omeshay, ightfay offyay arksshay inyay anyay ancientyay ipwreckshay, oryay indfay emselvesthay inyay ayay oodedflay ungeonday oomray, eythay ustmay ightfay inyay ayay allengingchay environmentyay. 
 Underwateryay ethay ollowingfay ulesray applyyay. Whenyay akingmay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay, ayay eaturecray atthay oesn’tday avehay ayay wimmingsay eedspay (eitheryay aturalnay oryay antedgray ybay agicmay) ashay isadvantageday onyay ethay attackyay ollray unlessyay ethay weaponyay isyay ayay aggerday, avelinjay, ortswordshay, earspay, oryay ident.Atray angedray weaponyay attackyay automaticallyyay issesmay ayay argettay eyondbay ethay weapon’syay ormalnay angeray. 
 Apterchay 10:  Ellcastingspay AGICMay ERMEATESPay ETHay WORLDSyay OFyay DDDay ANyay Ostdmay oftenyay appearsyay inyay ethay ormfay ofyay ayay ellspay. 
 Isthay apterchay ovidespray ethay ulesray orfay astingcay ellsspay. 
 Ifferentday aracterchay assesclay avehay istinctiveday waysyay ofyay earninglay andyay eparingpray eirthay ellsspay, andyay onstersmay useyay ellsspay inyay uniqueyay waysyay. 
 Egardlessray ofyay itsyay ourcesay, ayay ellspay ollowsfay ethay ulesray erehay. Whatyay  Isyay ayay  ell?ASpay ellspay isyay ayay iscreteday agicalmay effectyay, ayay inglesay apingshay ofyay ethay agicalmay energiesyay atthay uffusesay ethay ultiversemay intoyay ayay ecificspay, imitedlay expressionyay. 
 Inyay astingcay ayay ellspay, ayay aracterchay arefullycay ucksplay atyay ethay invisibleyay andsstray ofyay awray agicmay uffusingsay ethay worldyay, inspay emthay inyay aceplay inyay ayay articularpay atternpay, etssay emthay ibratingvay inyay ayay ecificspay wayyay, andyay enthay eleasesray emthay otay unleashyay ethay esiredday effect—inyay ostmay asescay, allyay inyay ethay anspay ofyay econdssay. Ellsspay ancay ebay ersatilevay oolstay, weaponsyay, oryay otectivepray wardsyay. 
 Eythay ancay ealday amageday oryay undoyay ityay, imposeyay oryay emoveray onditionscay (eesay appendixyay Ayay), aindray ifelay energyyay awayyay, andyay estoreray ifelay otay ethay eadday. Uncountedyay ousandsthay ofyay ellsspay avehay eenbay eatedcray overyay ethay oursecay ofyay ethay ultiverse’smay istoryhay, andyay anymay ofyay emthay areyay onglay orgottenfay. 
 Omesay ightmay yetyay ielay ecordedray inyay umblingcray ellbooksspay iddenhay inyay ancientyay uinsray oryay appedtray inyay ethay indsmay ofyay eadday odsgay. 
 Oryay eythay ightmay omedaysay ebay einventedray ybay ayay aracterchay whoyay ashay amassedyay enoughyay owerpay andyay wisdomyay otay oday osay. Ellspay  Evellay Everyyay ellspay ashay ayay evellay omfray 0 otay 9. 
Ayay ell’sspay evellay isyay ayay eneralgay indicatoryay ofyay owhay owerfulpay ityay isyay, withyay ethay owlylay (utbay illstay impressiveyay) agicmay issilemay atyay 1stay evellay andyay ethay earth-shakingyay wishyay atyay 9thay. 
 Antrips—simplecay utbay owerfulpay ellsspay atthay aracterschay ancay astcay almostyay ybay oteray— areyay evellay 0. 
 Ethay igherhay ayay ell’sspay evellay, ethay igherhay evellay ayay ellcasterspay ustmay ebay otay useyay atthay ellspay. Ellspay evellay andyay aracterchay evellay on’tday orrespondcay irectlyday. 
 Ypicallytay, ayay aracterchay ashay otay ebay atyay eastlay 17thay evellay, otnay 9thay evellay, otay astcay ayay 9levelthlay ellspay. Ownknay andyay  Eparedpray  Ellsspay Eforebay ayay ellcasterspay ancay useyay ayay ellspay, ehay oryay eshay ustmay avehay ethay ellspay irmlyfay ixedfay inyay indmay, oryay ustmay avehay accessyay otay ethay ellspay inyay ayay agicmay itemyay. 
 Embersmay ofyay ayay ewfay assesclay, includingyay ardsbay andyay orcererssay, avehay ayay imitedlay istlay ofyay ellsspay eythay owknay atthay areyay alwaysyay ixedfay inyay indmay. 
 Ethay amesay ingthay isyay uetray ofyay anymay agic-usingmay onstersmay. 
 Otheryay ellcastersspay, uchsay asyay ericsclay andyay wizardsyay, undergoyay ayay ocesspray ofyay eparingpray ellsspay. 
 Isthay ocesspray ariesvay orfay ifferentday assesclay, asyay etailedday inyay eirthay escriptionsday. Astingcay inyay  Armoryay Ecausebay ofyay ethay entalmay ocusfay andyay ecisepray esturesgay equiredray orfay ellcastingspay, youyay ustmay ebay oficientpray withyay ethay armoryay youyay areyay wearingyay otay astcay ayay ellspay. 
 Youyay areyay otherwiseyay ootay istractedday andyay ysicallyphay amperedhay ybay youryay armoryay orfay ellcastingspay. Inyay everyyay asecay, ethay umbernay ofyay ellsspay ayay astercay ancay avehay ixedfay inyay indmay atyay anyyay ivengay imetay ependsday onyay ethay aracter’schay evellay. Ellspay  Otsslay Egardlessray ofyay owhay anymay ellsspay ayay astercay owsknay oryay eparespray, ehay oryay eshay ancay astcay onlyyay ayay imitedlay umbernay ofyay ellsspay eforebay estingray. 
 Anipulatingmay ethay abricfay ofyay agicmay andyay annelingchay itsyay energyyay intoyay evenyay ayay implesay ellspay isyay ysicallyphay andyay entallymay axingtay, andyay igher-levelhay ellsspay areyay evenyay oremay osay. 
 Usthay, eachyay ellcastingspay ass’sclay escriptionday (exceptyay atthay ofyay ethay warlockyay) includesyay ayay abletay owingshay owhay anymay ellspay otsslay ofyay eachyay ellspay evellay ayay aracterchay ancay useyay atyay eachyay aracterchay evellay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ethay 3levelrdlay wizardyay  Umarayay ashay ourfay 1levelstlay ellspay otsslay andyay wotay 2levelndlay otsslay. Whenyay ayay aracterchay astscay ayay ellspay, ehay oryay eshay expendsyay ayay otslay ofyay atthay ell’sspay evellay oryay igherhay, effectivelyyay “illingfay” ayay otslay withyay ethay ellspay. 
 Youyay ancay inkthay ofyay ayay ellspay otslay asyay ayay oovegray ofyay ayay ertaincay ize—smallsay orfay ayay 1levelstlay otslay, argerlay orfay ayay ellspay ofyay igherhay evellay. 
Ayay 1levelstlay ellspay itsfay intoyay ayay otslay ofyay anyyay izesay, utbay ayay 9levelthlay ellspay itsfay onlyyay inyay ayay 9levelthlay otslay. 
 Osay whenyay  Umarayay astscay agicmay issilemay, ayay 1levelstlay ellspay, eshay endsspay oneyay ofyay erhay ourfay 1levelstlay otsslay andyay ashay eethray emainingray. Inishingfay ayay onglay estray estoresray anyyay expendedyay ellspay otsslay (eesay apterchay 8 orfay ethay ulesray onyay estingray). Omesay aracterschay andyay onstersmay avehay ecialspay abilitiesyay atthay etlay emthay astcay ellsspay withoutyay usingyay ellspay otsslay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay onkmay whoyay ollowsfay ethay  Wayyay ofyay ethay  Ourfay  Elementsyay, ayay warlockyay whoyay ooseschay ertaincay eldritchyay invocationsyay, andyay ayay itpay iendfay omfray ethay  Inenay  Ellshay ancay allyay astcay ellsspay inyay uchsay ayay wayyay. Astingcay ayay  Ellspay atyay ayay  Igherhay  Evellay  Whenyay ayay ellcasterspay astscay ayay ellspay usingyay ayay otslay atthay isyay ofyay ayay igherhay evellay anthay ethay ellspay, ethay ellspay assumesyay ethay igherhay evellay orfay atthay astingcay. 
 Orfay instanceyay, ifyay  Umarayay astscay agicmay issilemay usingyay oneyay ofyay erhay 2levelndlay otsslay, atthay agicmay issilemay isyay 2nday evellay. 
 Effectivelyyay, ethay ellspay expandsyay otay illfay ethay otslay ityay isyay utpay intoyay. Omesay ellsspay, uchsay asyay agicmay issilemay andyay urecay woundsyay, avehay oremay owerfulpay effectsyay whenyay astcay atyay ayay igherhay evellay, asyay etailedday inyay ayay ell’sspay escriptionday. Antripscay Ayay antripcay isyay ayay ellspay atthay ancay ebay astcay atyay willyay, withoutyay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay andyay withoutyay eingbay eparedpray inyay advanceyay. 
 Epeatedray acticepray ashay ixedfay ethay ellspay inyay ethay aster’scay indmay andyay infusedyay ethay astercay withyay ethay agicmay eedednay otay oducepray ethay effectyay overyay andyay overyay. 
Ayay antrip’scay ellspay evellay isyay 0. Itualsray Ertaincay ellsspay avehay ayay ecialspay agtay: itualray. 
 Uchsay ayay ellspay ancay ebay astcay ollowingfay ethay ormalnay ulesray orfay ellcastingspay, oryay ethay ellspay ancay ebay astcay asyay ayay itualray. 
 Ityay alsoyay oesn’tday expendyay ayay ellspay otslay, whichyay eansmay ethay itualray ersionvay ofyay ayay ellspay an’tcay ebay astcay atyay ayay igherhay evellay. Otay astcay ayay ellspay asyay ayay itualray, ayay ellcasterspay ustmay avehay ayay eaturefay atthay antsgray ethay abilityyay otay oday osay. 
 Ethay ericclay andyay ethay uiddray, orfay exampleyay, avehay uchsay ayay eaturefay. 
 Ethay astercay ustmay alsoyay avehay ethay ellspay eparedpray oryay onyay ishay oryay erhay istlay ofyay ellsspay ownknay, unlessyay ethay aracter’schay itualray eaturefay ecifiesspay otherwiseyay, asyay ethay wizard’syay oesday. Astingcay ayay  Ellspay Whenyay ayay aracterchay astscay anyyay ellspay, ethay amesay asicbay ulesray areyay ollowedfay, egardlessray ofyay ethay aracter’schay assclay oryay ethay ell’sspay effectsyay. Eachyay ellspay escriptionday inyay apterchay 11 eginsbay withyay ayay ockblay ofyay informationyay, includingyay ethay ell’sspay amenay, evellay, oolschay ofyay agicmay, astingcay imetay, angeray, omponentscay, andyay urationday. 
 Ethay estray ofyay ayay ellspay entryyay escribesday ethay ell’sspay effectyay. Astingcay  Imetay Ostmay ellsspay equireray ayay inglesay actionyay otay astcay, utbay omesay ellsspay equireray ayay onusbay actionyay, ayay eactionray, oryay uchmay oremay imetay otay astcay. Onusbay  Actionyay Ayay ellspay astcay withyay ayay onusbay actionyay isyay especiallyyay wiftsay. 
 Youyay ustmay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay otay astcay ethay ellspay, ovidedpray atthay youyay aven’thay alreadyyay akentay ayay onusbay actionyay isthay urntay. 
 Youyay an’tcay astcay anotheryay ellspay uringday ethay amesay urntay, exceptyay orfay ayay antripcay withyay ayay astingcay imetay ofyay 1 actionyay. Eactionsray Omesay ellsspay ancay ebay astcay asyay eactionsray. 
 Esethay ellsspay aketay ayay actionfray ofyay ayay econdsay otay ingbray aboutyay andyay areyay astcay inyay esponseray otay omesay eventyay. 
 Ifyay ayay ellspay ancay ebay astcay asyay ayay eactionray, ethay ellspay escriptionday ellstay youyay exactlyyay whenyay youyay ancay oday osay. Ongerlay  Astingcay  Imestay Ertaincay ellsspay (includingyay ellsspay astcay asyay itualsray) equireray oremay imetay otay astcay: inutesmay oryay evenyay ourshay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay withyay ayay astingcay imetay ongerlay anthay ayay inglesay actionyay oryay eactionray, youyay ustmay endspay youryay actionyay eachyay urntay astingcay ethay ellspay, andyay youyay ustmay aintainmay youryay oncentrationcay whileyay youyay oday osay (eesay “ Oncentrationcay” elowbay). 
 Ifyay youryay oncentrationcay isyay okenbray, ethay ellspay ailsfay, utbay youyay on’tday expendyay ayay ellspay otslay. 
 Ifyay youyay wantyay otay ytray astingcay ethay ellspay againyay, youyay ustmay artstay overyay. Angeray Ethay argettay ofyay ayay ellspay ustmay ebay withinyay ethay ell’sspay angeray. Orfay ayay ellspay ikelay agicmay issilemay, ethay argettay isyay ayay eaturecray. 
 Orfay ayay ellspay ikelay ireballfay, ethay argettay isyay ethay ointpay inyay acespay whereyay ethay allbay ofyay irefay eruptsyay. Ostmay ellsspay avehay angesray expressedyay inyay eetfay. 
 Omesay ellsspay ancay argettay onlyyay ayay eaturecray (includingyay youyay) atthay youyay ouchtay. 
 Otheryay ellsspay, uchsay asyay ethay ieldshay ellspay, affectyay onlyyay youyay. 
 Onceyay ayay ellspay isyay astcay, itsyay effectsyay aren’tyay imitedlay ybay itsyay angeray, unlessyay ethay ell’sspay escriptionday ayssay otherwiseyay. Omponentscay Ayay ell’sspay omponentscay areyay ethay ysicalphay equirementsray youyay ustmay eetmay inyay orderyay otay astcay ityay. 
 Eachyay ell’sspay escriptionday indicatesyay whetheryay ityay equiresray erbalvay (Vay), omaticsay (Say), oryay aterialmay (May) omponentscay. 
 Ifyay youyay an’tcay ovidepray oneyay oryay oremay ofyay ayay ell’sspay omponentscay, youyay areyay unableyay otay astcay ethay ellspay. Erbalvay (Vay) Ostmay ellsspay equireray ethay antingchay ofyay ysticmay wordsyay. 
 Ethay wordsyay emselvesthay aren’tyay ethay ourcesay ofyay ethay ell’sspay owerpay; atherray, ethay articularpay ombinationcay ofyay oundssay, withyay ecificspay itchpay andyay esonanceray, etssay ethay eadsthray ofyay agicmay inyay otionmay. 
 Usthay, ayay aracterchay whoyay isyay aggedgay oryay inyay anyay areayay ofyay ilencesay, uchsay asyay oneyay eatedcray ybay ethay ilencesay ellspay, an’tcay astcay ayay ellspay withyay ayay erbalvay omponentcay. Omaticsay (Say) Ellcastingspay esturesgay ightmay includeyay ayay orcefulfay esticulationgay oryay anyay intricateyay etsay ofyay esturesgay. 
 Ifyay ayay ellspay equiresray ayay omaticsay omponentcay, ethay astercay ustmay avehay eefray useyay ofyay atyay eastlay oneyay andhay otay erformpay esethay esturesgay. Aterialmay (May) Astingcay omesay ellsspay equiresray articularpay objectsyay, ecifiedspay inyay arenthesespay inyay ethay omponentcay entry.Ayay aracterchay ancay useyay ayay omponentcay ouchpay oryay ayay ellcastingspay ocusfay (oundfay inyay apterchay 5) inyay aceplay ofyay ethay omponentscay ecifiedspay orfay ayay ellspay. 
 Utbay ifyay ayay ostcay isyay indicatedyay orfay ayay omponentcay, ayay aracterchay ustmay avehay atthay ecificspay omponentcay eforebay ehay oryay eshay ancay astcay ethay ellspay. Ifyay ayay ellspay atesstay atthay ayay aterialmay omponentcay isyay onsumedcay ybay ethay ellspay, ethay astercay ustmay ovidepray isthay omponentcay orfay eachyay astingcay ofyay ethay ell.Aspay ellcasterspay ustmay avehay ayay andhay eefray otay accessyay esethay omponentscay, utbay ityay ancay ebay ethay amesay andhay atthay ehay oryay eshay usesyay otay erformpay omaticsay omponentscay. Urationday Ayay ell'sspay urationday isyay ethay engthlay ofyay imetay ethay ellspay ersistspay. 
Ayay urationday ancay ebay expressedyay inyay oundsray, inutesmay, ourshay, oryay evenyay yearsyay. 
 Omesay ellsspay ecifyspay atthay eirthay effectsyay astlay untilyay ethay ellsspay areyay ispelledday oryay estroyedday. Instantaneousyay Anymay ellsspay areyay instantaneousyay. 
 Ethay ellspay armshay, ealshay, eatescray, oryay altersyay ayay eaturecray oryay anyay objectyay inyay ayay wayyay atthay an’tcay ebay ispelledday, ecausebay itsyay agicmay existsyay onlyyay orfay anyay instantyay. Oncentrationcay Omesay ellsspay equireray youyay otay aintainmay oncentrationcay inyay orderyay otay eepkay eirthay agicmay activeyay. 
 Ifyay youyay oselay oncentrationcay, uchsay ayay ellspay endsyay. Ifyay ayay ellspay ustmay ebay aintainedmay withyay oncentrationcay, atthay actfay appearsyay inyay itsyay  Urationday entryyay, andyay ethay ellspay ecifiesspay owhay onglay youyay ancay oncentratecay onyay ityay. 
 Youyay ancay endyay oncentrationcay atyay anyyay imetay (onay actionyay equiredray). Ethay  Oolsschay ofyay  Agicmay Academiesyay ofyay agicmay oupgray ellsspay intoyay eightyay ategoriescay alledcay oolsschay ofyay agicmay. 
 Olarsschay, articularlypay wizardsyay, applyyay esethay ategoriescay otay allyay ellsspay, elievingbay atthay allyay agicmay unctionsfay inyay essentiallyyay ethay amesay wayyay, whetheryay ityay erivesday omfray igorousray udystay oryay isyay estowedbay ybay ayay eityday. Ethay oolsschay ofyay agicmay elphay escribeday ellsspay; eythay avehay onay ulesray ofyay eirthay ownyay, althoughyay omesay ulesray eferray otay ethay oolsschay. Abjurationyay ellsspay areyay otectivepray inyay aturenay, oughthay omesay ofyay emthay avehay aggressiveyay usesyay. 
 Eythay eatecray agicalmay arriersbay, egatenay armfulhay effectsyay, armhay espasserstray, oryay anishbay eaturescray otay otheryay anesplay ofyay existenceyay. Onjurationcay ellsspay involveyay ethay ansportationtray ofyay objectsyay andyay eaturescray omfray oneyay ocationlay otay anotheryay. 
 Omesay ellsspay ummonsay eaturescray oryay objectsyay otay ethay aster’scay idesay, whereasyay othersyay allowyay ethay astercay otay eleporttay otay anotheryay ocationlay. 
 Omesay onjurationscay eatecray objectsyay oryay effectsyay outyay ofyay othingnay. Ivinationday ellsspay evealray informationyay, whetheryay inyay ethay ormfay ofyay ecretssay onglay orgottenfay, impsesglay ofyay ethay uturefay, ethay ocationslay ofyay iddenhay ingsthay, ethay uthtray ehindbay illusionsyay, oryay isionsvay ofyay istantday eoplepay oryay acesplay. Enchantmentyay ellsspay affectyay ethay indsmay ofyay othersyay, influencingyay oryay ontrollingcay eirthay ehaviorbay. 
 Uchsay ellsspay ancay akemay enemiesyay eesay ethay astercay asyay ayay iendfray, orcefay eaturescray otay aketay ayay oursecay ofyay actionyay, oryay evenyay ontrolcay anotheryay eaturecray ikelay ayay uppetpay. Evocationyay ellsspay anipulatemay agicalmay energyyay otay oducepray ayay esiredday effectyay. 
 Omesay allcay upyay astsblay ofyay irefay oryay ightninglay. 
 Othersyay annelchay ositivepay energyyay otay ealhay woundsyay. Illusionyay ellsspay eceiveday ethay ensessay oryay indsmay ofyay othersyay. 
 Eythay ausecay eoplepay otay eesay ingsthay atthay areyay otnay erethay, otay issmay ingsthay atthay areyay erethay, otay earhay antomphay oisesnay, oryay otay ememberray ingsthay atthay evernay appenedhay. 
 Omesay illusionsyay eatecray antomphay imagesyay atthay anyyay eaturecray ancay eesay, utbay ethay ostmay insidiousyay illusionsyay antplay anyay imageyay irectlyday inyay ethay indmay ofyay ayay eaturecray. Ecromancynay ellsspay anipulatemay ethay energiesyay ofyay ifelay andyay eathday. 
 Uchsay ellsspay ancay antgray anyay extrayay eserveray ofyay ifelay orcefay, aindray ethay ifelay energyyay omfray anotheryay eaturecray, eatecray ethay undeadyay, oryay evenyay ingbray ethay eadday ackbay otay ifelay. Eatingcray ethay undeadyay oughthray ethay useyay ofyay ecromancynay ellsspay uchsay asyay animateyay eadday isyay otnay ayay oodgay actyay, andyay onlyyay evilyay asterscay useyay uchsay ellsspay equentlyfray. Ansmutationtray ellsspay angechay ethay opertiespray ofyay ayay eaturecray, objectyay, oryay environmentyay. 
 Eythay ightmay urntay anyay enemyyay intoyay ayay armlesshay eaturecray, olsterbay ethay engthstray ofyay anyay allyyay, akemay anyay objectyay ovemay atyay ethay aster’scay ommandcay, oryay enhanceyay ayay eature’scray innateyay ealinghay abilitiesyay otay apidlyray ecoverray omfray injuryyay. Ormalnay activityyay, uchsay asyay ovingmay andyay attackingyay, oesn’tday interfereyay withyay oncentrationcay. 
 Ethay ollowingfay actorsfay ancay eakbray oncentrationcay:•  Astingcay anotheryay ellspay atthay equiresray oncentrationcay. Youyay oselay oncentrationcay onyay ayay ellspay ifyay youyay astcay anotheryay ellspay atthay equiresray oncentrationcay. 
 Youyay an’tcay oncen­tratecay onyay wotay ellsspay atyay onceyay.•  Akingtay amageday. 
 Wheneveryay youyay aketay amageday whileyay youyay areyay oncentratingcay onyay ayay ellspay, youyay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray otay aintainmay youryay oncentra­tioncay. 
 Ethay DCay equalsyay 10 oryay alfhay ethay amageday youyay aketay, whicheveryay umbernay isyay igherhay. 
 Ifyay youyay aketay amageday omfray ultiplemay ourcessay, uchsay asyay anyay arrowyay andyay ayay agon’sdray eathbray, youyay akemay ayay eparatesay avingsay owthray orfay eachyay ourcesay ofyay amageday.•  Eingbay incapacitatedyay oryay illedkay. 
 Ethay DMay ightmay alsoyay ecideday atthay ertaincay environmentalyay enomenaphay, uchsay asyay ayay waveyay ashingcray overyay youyay whileyay you’reyay onyay ayay orm-tossedstay ipshay, equireray youyay otay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 10  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray otay aintainmay oncentrationcay onyay ayay ellspay. Argetstay Ayay ypicaltay ellspay equiresray youyay otay ickpay oneyay oryay oremay argetstay otay ebay affectedyay ybay ethay ell’sspay agicmay. 
Ayay ell'sspay escriptionday ellstay youyay whetheryay ethay ellspay argetstay eaturescray, objectsyay, oryay ayay ointpay ofyay originyay orfay anyay areayay ofyay effectyay (escribedday elowbay). Unlessyay ayay ellspay ashay ayay erceptiblepay effectyay, ayay eaturecray ightmay otnay owknay ityay wasyay argetedtay ybay ayay ellspay atyay allyay. 
 Anyay effectyay ikelay acklingcray ightninglay isyay obviousyay, utbay ayay oremay ubtlesay effectyay, uchsay asyay anyay attemptyay otay eadray ayay eature’scray oughtsthay, ypicallytay oesgay unnoticedyay, unlessyay ayay ellspay ayssay otherwise.Ayay  Earclay  Athpay otay ethay  Argettay Otay argettay omethingsay, youyay ustmay avehay ayay earclay athpay otay ityay, osay ityay an’tcay ebay ehindbay otaltay overcay. Ifyay youyay aceplay anyay areayay ofyay effectyay atyay ayay ointpay atthay youyay an’tcay eesay andyay anyay obstructionyay, uchsay asyay ayay wallyay, isyay etweenbay youyay andyay atthay ointpay, ethay ointpay ofyay originyay omescay intoyay eingbay onyay ethay earnay idesay ofyay atthay obstructionyay. Argetingtay  Yourselfyay Ifyay ayay ellspay argetstay ayay eaturecray ofyay youryay oicechay, youyay ancay oosechay yourselfyay, unlessyay ethay eaturecray ustmay ebay ostilehay oryay ecificallyspay ayay eaturecray otheryay anthay youyay. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay inyay ethay areayay ofyay effectyay ofyay ayay ellspay youyay astcay, youyay ancay argettay yourselfyay. Areasyay ofyay  Effectyay Ellsspay uchsay asyay urningbay andshay andyay onecay ofyay oldcay overcay anyay areayay, allowingyay emthay otay affectyay ultiplemay eaturescray atyay once.Ayay ell’sspay escriptionday ecifiesspay itsyay areayay ofyay effectyay, whichyay ypicallytay ashay oneyay ofyay ivefay ifferentday apesshay: onecay, ubecay, ylindercay, inelay, oryay eresphay. 
 Everyyay areayay ofyay effectyay ashay ayay ointpay ofyay originyay, ayay ocationlay omfray whichyay ethay ell’sspay energyyay eruptsyay. 
 Ethay ulesray orfay eachyay apeshay ecifyspay owhay youpositionyay itsyay ointpay ofyay originyay. 
 Ypicallytay, ayay ointpay ofyay originyay isyay ayay ointpay inyay acespay, utbay omesay ellsspay avehay anyay areayay whoseyay originyay isyay ayay eaturecray oryay anyay object.Ayay ell’sspay effectyay expandsyay inyay aightstray ineslay omfray ethay ointpay ofyay originyay. 
 Ifyay onay unblockedyay aightstray inelay extendsyay omfray ethay ointpay ofyay originyay otay ayay ocationlay withinyay ethay areayay ofyay effectyay, atthay ocationlay isn’tyay includedyay inyay ethay ell’sspay areayay. 
 Otay ockblay oneyay ofyay esethay imaginaryyay ineslay, anyay obstructionyay ustmay ovidepray otaltay overcay, asyay explainedyay inyay apterchay 9. Onecay Ayay onecay extendsyay inyay ayay irectionday youyay oosechay omfray itsyay ointpay ofyay originyay. 
Ayay one’scay widthyay atyay ayay ivengay ointpay alongyay itsyay engthlay isyay equalyay otay atthay oint’spay istanceday omfray ethay ointpay ofyay originyay. 
Ayay one’scay areayay ofyay effectyay ecifiesspay itsyay aximummay ength.Alay one’scay ointpay ofyay originyay isyay otnay includedyay inyay ethay one’scay areayay ofyay effectyay, unlessyay youyay ecideday otherwiseyay. Ubecay Youyay electsay ayay ube’scay ointpay ofyay originyay, whichyay ieslay anywhereyay onyay ayay acefay ofyay ethay ubiccay effectyay. 
 Ethay ube’scay izesay isyay expressedyay asyay ethay engthlay ofyay eachyay ide.Asay ube’scay ointpay ofyay originyay isyay otnay includedyay inyay ethay ube’scay areayay ofyay effectyay, unlessyay youyay ecideday otherwiseyay. Ylindercay Ayay ylinder’scay ointpay ofyay originyay isyay ethay entercay ofyay ayay irclecay ofyay ayay articularpay adiusray, asyay ivengay inyay ethay ellspay escriptionday. 
 Ethay irclecay ustmay eitheryay ebay onyay ethay oundgray oryay atyay ethay eighthay ofyay ethay ellspay effectyay. 
 Ethay energyyay inyay ayay ylindercay expandsyay inyay aightstray ineslay omfray ethay ointpay ofyay originyay otay ethay erimeterpay ofyay ethay irclecay, ormingfay ethay asebay ofyay ethay ylindercay. 
 Inelay Ayay inelay extendsyay omfray itsyay ointpay ofyay originyay inyay ayay aightstray athpay upyay otay itsyay engthlay andyay overscay anyay areayay efinedday ybay itsyay width.Ayay ine’slay ointpay ofyay originyay isyay otnay includedyay inyay ethay ine’slay areayay ofyay effectyay, unlessyay youyay ecideday otherwiseyay. Eresphay Youyay electsay ayay ere’ssphay ointpay ofyay originyay, andyay ethay eresphay extendsyay outwardyay omfray atthay ointpay. 
 Ethay ere’ssphay izesay isyay expressedyay asyay ayay adiusray inyay eetfay atthay extendsyay omfray ethay oint.Apay ere’ssphay ointpay ofyay originyay isyay includedyay inyay ethay ere’ssphay areayay ofyay effectyay. Avingsay  Owsthray Anymay ellsspay ecifyspay atthay ayay argettay ancay akemay ayay avingsay owthray otay avoidyay omesay oryay allyay ofyay ayay ell’sspay effectsyay. 
 Ethay ellspay ecifiesspay ethay abilityyay atthay ethay argettay usesyay orfay ethay avesay andyay whatyay appenshay onyay ayay uccesssay oryay ailurefay. Ethay DCay otay esistray oneyay ofyay youryay ellsspay equalsyay 8 + youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay odifiermay + youryay oficiencypray onusbay + anyyay ecialspay odifiersmay. Attackyay  Ollsray Omesay ellsspay equireray ethay astercay otay akemay anyay attackyay ollray otay etermineday whetheryay ethay ellspay effectyay itshay ethay intendedyay argettay. 
 Youryay attackyay onusbay withyay ayay ellspay attackyay equalsyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay odifiermay + youryay oficiencypray onusbay. Ostmay ellsspay atthay equireray attackyay ollsray involveyay angedray attacksyay. 
 Ememberray atthay youyay avehay isadvantageday onyay ayay angedray attackyay ollray ifyay youyay areyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ayay ostilehay eaturecray atthay ancay eesay youyay andyay atthay isn’tyay incapacitatedyay (eesay apterchay 9). Ombiningcay  Agicalmay  Effectsyay Ethay effectsyay ofyay ifferentday ellsspay addyay ogethertay whileyay ethay urationsday ofyay osethay ellsspay overlapyay. 
 Ethay effectsyay ofyay ethay amesay ellspay astcay ultiplemay imestay on'tday ombinecay, oweverhay. 
 Insteadyay, ethay ostmay otentpay effect—suchyay asyay ethay ighesthay onus—frombay osethay astingscay appliesyay whileyay eirthay urationsday overlapyay. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay wotay ericsclay astcay essblay onyay ethay amesay argettay, atthay aracterchay ainsgay ethay ell’sspay enefitbay onlyyay onceyay; ehay oryay eshay oesn’tday etgay otay ollray wotay onusbay iceday. Ethay  Weaveyay ofyay  Agicmay Ethay worldsyay withinyay ethay DDDay ultiversemay areyay agicalmay acesplay. Allyay existenceyay isyay uffusedsay withyay agicalmay owerpay, andyay otentialpay energyyay ieslay untappedyay inyay everyyay ockray, eamstray, andyay ivinglay eaturecray, andyay evenyay inyay ethay airyay itselfyay. 
 Awray agicmay isyay ethay uffstay ofyay eationcray, ethay utemay andyay indlessmay willyay ofyay existenceyay, ermeatingpay everyyay itbay ofyay attermay andyay esentpray inyay everyyay anifestationmay ofyay energyyay oughoutthray ethay ultiversemay. Ortalsmay an’tcay irectlyday apeshay isthay awray agicmay. 
 Insteadyay, eythay akemay useyay ofyay ayay abricfay ofyay agicmay, ayay indkay ofyay interfaceyay etweenbay ethay willyay ofyay ayay ellcasterspay andyay ethay uffstay ofyay awray agicmay. 
 Ethay ellcastersspay ofyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray allcay ityay ethay  Weaveyay andyay ecognizeray itsyay essenceyay asyay ethay oddessgay  Ystramay, utbay asterscay avehay ariedvay waysyay ofyay amingnay andyay isualizingvay isthay interfaceyay. 
 Ybay anyyay amenay, withoutyay ethay  Weaveyay, awray agicmay isyay ockedlay awayyay andyay inaccessible;theyay ostmay owerfulpay archmageyay an'tcay ightlay ayay andlecay withyay agicmay inyay anyay areayay whereyay ethay  Weaveyay ashay eenbay orntay. 
 Utbay urroundedsay ybay ethay  Weaveyay, ayay ellcasterspay ancay apeshay ightninglay otay astblay oesfay, ansporttray undredshay ofyay ilesmay inyay ethay inkblay ofyay anyay eyeyay, oryay evenyay everseray eathday itselfyay. Allyay agicmay ependsday onyay ethay  Weaveyay, oughthay ifferentday indskay ofyay agicmay accessyay ityay inyay ayay arietyvay ofyay waysyay. 
 Ethay ellsspay ofyay wizardsyay, warlocksyay, orcererssay, andyay ardsbay areyay ommonlycay alledcay arcaneyay agicmay. 
 Esethay ellsspay elyray onyay anyay understanding—learnedyay oryay intuitive—ofyay ethay workingsyay ofyay ethay  Weaveyay. 
 Ethay astercay ucksplay irectlyday atyay ethay andsstray ofyay ethay  Weaveyay otay eatecray ethay esiredday effectyay. 
 Eldritchyay ightsknay andyay arcaneyay icksterstray alsoyay useyay arcaneyay agicmay. 
 Ethay ellsspay ofyay ericsclay, uidsdray, aladinspay, andyay angersray areyay alledcay ivineday agicmay. 
 Esethay ellcastersspay’ accessyay otay ethay  Weaveyay isyay ediatedmay ybay ivineday ower—godspay, ethay ivineday orcesfay ofyay aturenay, oryay ethay acredsay weightyay ofyay ayay aladin’spay oathyay. Wheneveryay ayay agicmay effectyay isyay eatedcray, ethay eadsthray ofyay ethay  Weaveyay intertwineyay, wisttay, andyay oldfay otay akemay ethay effectyay ossiblepay. 
 Whenyay aracterschay useyay ivinationday ellsspay uchsay asyay etectday agicmay oryay identifyyay, eythay impseglay ethay  Weaveyay. 
Ayay ellspay uchsay asyay ispelday agicmay oothssmay ethay  Weaveyay. 
 Ellsspay uchsay asyay antimagicyay ieldfay earrangeray ethay  Weaveyay osay atthay agicmay owsflay aroundyay, atherray anthay oughthray, ethay areayay affectedyay ybay ethay ellspay. 
 Apterchay 11:  Ellsspay ISTHay APTERCHay ESCRIBESDay ETHay OSTMay OMMONCay ellsspay inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay UNGEONSDay &  Agonsdray. 
 Ethay apterchay eginsbay withyay ethay ellspay istslay ofyay ethay ellcastingspay assesclay. 
 Ocatelay  Eaturecray  Ordenkainen’smay  Aithfulfay  Oundhay  Ordenkainen’smay  Ivatepray  Anctumsay  Otiluke’syay  Esilientray  Eresphay  Antasmalphay  Illerkay  Olymorphpay  Onestay  Apeshay  Oneskinstay  Wallyay ofyay  Ire5thfay  Evellay Animateyay  Objectsyay  Igby’sbay  Andhay  Oudkilclay Iyay  Onecay ofyay  Oldcay  Onjurecay  Elementalyay  Ontactcay  Otheryay  Aneplay  Eationcray Ominateday  Ersonpay Eamdray Easgay Oldhay  Onstermay  Egendlay  Orelay  Isleadmay Odifymay  Emorymay Asswallpay Anarplay  Indingbay Ary’sray  Elepathictay  Ondbay Yingscray Eemingsay Elekinesistay Eleportationtay  Irclecay Wallyay ofyay  Orcefay Wallyay ofyay  One6thstay  Evellay Arcaneyay  Ategay  Ainchay  Ightninglay  Irclecay ofyay  Eathday  Ontingencycay  Eatecray  Undeadyay  Isintegrateday  Awmij’sdray  Instantyay  Ummonssay  Eyebiteyay Eshflay otay  Onestay  Obeglay ofyay  Invulnerabilityyay  Uardsgay andyay  Wardsyay  Agicmay  Arjay  Assmay  Uggestionsay  Ovemay  Earthyay Otiluke’syay  Eezingfray  Eresphay  Otto’syay  Irresistibleyay  Anceday  Ogrammedpray  Illusionyay Unbeamsay  Uetray  Eeingsay  Wallyay ofyay  Ice7thyay  Evellay Elayedday  Astblay  Ireballfay  Etherealnessyay  Ingerfay ofyay  Eathday  Orcecagefay  Iragemay  Arcaneyay  Ordenkainen'smay  Agnificentmay  Ansionmay  Ordenkainen’smay  Wordsay  Aneplay  Iftshay  Ismaticpray  Ayspray  Ojectpray  Imageyay  Everseray  Avitygray  Equestersay  Imulacrumsay  Ymbolsay  Eleport8thtay  Evellay Antimagicyay  Ieldfay Antipathyyay/ Ympathysay Oneclay Ontrolcay  Weatheryay  Emiplaneday  Ominateday  Onstermay  Eeblemindfay  Incendiaryyay  Oudclay  Azemay Indmay  Ankblay  Owerpay  Wordyay  Unstay  Unburstsay  Elepathytay  Aptray ethay  Oul9thsay  Evellay Astralyay  Ojectionpray Oresightfay Ategay Imprisonmentyay  Eteormay  Warmsay  Owerpay  Wordyay  Illkay  Ismaticpray  Wallyay  Apechangeshay  Imetay  Opstay  Uetray  Olymorphpay  Weirdyay  Wishyay Ellspay  Escriptionsday Ethay ellsspay areyay esentedpray inyay alphabeticalyay orderyay. Acidyay  Ashsplay  Onjurationcay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay urlhay ayay ubblebay ofyay acidyay. 
 Oosechay oneyay eaturecray withinyay angeray, oryay oosechay wotay eaturescray withinyay angeray atthay areyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay eachyay otheryay. 
Ayay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay aketay 1day6 acidyay amageday. Isthay ell’sspay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day6 whenyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay (2day6), 11thay evellay (3day6), andyay 17thay evellay (4day6). Aid2nd-levelyay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inytay ipstray ofyay whiteyay othclay)  Urationday: 8 ourshay Youryay ellspay olstersbay youryay alliesyay withyay oughnesstay andyay esolveray. 
 Oosechay upyay otay eethray eaturescray withinyay angeray. Eachyay arget’stay ithay ointpay aximummay andyay urrentcay ithay ointspay increaseyay ybay 5 orfay ethay urationday. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, ayay arget’stay ithay ointspay increaseyay ybay anyay additionalyay 5 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Alarm1st-levelyay abjurationyay (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inytay ellbay andyay ayay iecepay ofyay inefay ilversay wireyay) Urationday: 8 ourshay Youyay etsay anyay alarmyay againstyay unwantedyay intrusionyay. 
 Oosechay ayay oorday, ayay windowyay, oryay anyay areayay withinyay angeray atthay isyay onay argerlay anthay ayay 20-ootfay ubecay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, anyay alarmyay alertsyay youyay wheneveryay ayay  Inytay oryay argerlay eaturecray ouchestay oryay entersyay ethay wardedyay areayay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, youyay ancay esignateday eaturescray atthay won’tyay etsay offyay ethay alarmyay. 
 Youyay alsoyay oosechay whetheryay ethay alarmyay isyay entalmay oryay audible.Ayay entalmay alarmyay alertsyay youyay withyay ayay ingpay inyay youryay indmay ifyay youyay areyay withinyay 1 ilemay ofyay ethay wardedyay areayay. 
 Isthay ingpay awakensyay youyay ifyay youyay areyay eepingslay. Anyay audibleyay alarmyay oducespray ethay oundsay ofyay ayay andhay ellbay orfay 10 econdssay withinyay 60 eetfay. Alteryay  Elfsay 2levelndlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay assumeyay ayay ifferentday ormfay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay optionsyay, ethay effectsyay ofyay whichyay astlay orfay ethay urationday ofyay ethay ellspay. 
youyay ancay endyay oneyay optionyay asyay anyay actionyay otay aingay ethay enefitsbay ofyay ayay ifferentday oneyay. Aquaticyay  Adaptationyay. 
 Youyay adaptyay youryay odybay otay anyay aquaticyay environmentyay, outingspray illsgay andyay owinggray webbingyay etweenbay youryay ingersfay. 
 Youyay ancay eathebray underwateryay andyay aingay ayay wimmingsay eedspay equalyay otay youryay walkingyay eedspay. Angechay  Appearanceyay. 
 Youyay ansformtray youryay appearanceyay. 
 Youyay ecideday whatyay youyay ooklay ikelay, includingyay youryay eighthay, weightyay, acialfay eaturesfay, oundsay ofyay youryay oicevay, airhay engthlay, olorationcay, andyay istinguishingday aracteristicschay, ifyay anyyay. Youyay ancay akemay yourselfyay appearyay asyay ayay embermay ofyay anotheryay aceray, oughthay onenay ofyay youryay atisticsstay angechay. 
 Youyay alsoyay an’tcay appearyay asyay ayay eaturecray ofyay ayay ifferentday izesay anthay youyay, andyay youryay asicbay apeshay aysstay ethay amesay; ifyay you'reyay ipedalbay, youyay an’tcay useyay isthay ellspay otay ecomebay quadrupedalyay, orfay instanceyay. 
 Atyay anyyay imetay orfay ethay urationday ofyay ethay ellspay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay angechay youryay appearanceyay inyay isthay wayyay againyay. Aturalnay  Weaponsyay. 
 Youyay owgray awsclay, angsfay, inesspay, ornshay, oryay ayay ifferentday aturalnay weaponyay ofyay youryay oicechay. 
 Youryay unarmedyay ikesstray ealday 1day6 udgeoningblay, iercingpay, oryay ashingslay amageday, asyay appropriateyay otay ethay aturalnay weaponyay youyay osechay, andyay youyay areyay oficientpray withyay youryay unarmedyay ikesstray. 
 Inallyfay, ethay aturalnay weaponyay isyay agicmay andyay youyay avehay ayay +1 onusbay otay ethay attackyay andyay amageday ollsray youyay akemay usingyay ityay. Animalyay  Iendship1st-levelfray enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay orselmay ofyay oodfay) Urationday: 24 ourshay Isthay ellspay etslay youyay onvincecay ayay eastbay atthay youyay eanmay ityay onay armhay. 
 Oosechay ayay eastbay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. Ityay ustmay eesay andyay earhay youyay. 
 Ifyay ethay east’sbay  Intelligenceyay isyay4 oryay igherhay, ethay ellspay ailsfay. 
 Otherwiseyay, ethay eastbay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ebay armedchay ybay youyay orfay ethay ell’sspay urationday. 
 Ifyay youyay oryay oneyay ofyay youryay ompanionscay armshay ethay argettay, ethay ellsspay endsyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay affectyay oneyay additionalyay eastbay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Animalyay  Essengermay 2levelndlay enchantmentyay (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay orselmay ofyay oodfay) Urationday: 24 ourshay Ybay eansmay ofyay isthay ellspay, youyay useyay anyay animalyay otay eliverday ayay essagemay. 
 Oosechay ayay  Inytay eastbay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray, uchsay asyay ayay quirrelsay, ayay ueblay ayjay, oryay ayay atbay. 
 Youyay ecifyspay ayay ocationlay, whichyay youyay ustmay avehay isitedvay, andyay ayay ecipientray whoyay atchesmay ayay eneralgay escriptionday, uchsay asyay “ayay anmay oryay womanyay esseddray inyay ethay uniformyay ofyay ethay owntay uardgay” oryay “ayay ed-hairedray warfday wearingyay ayay ointedpay athay.”  Youyay alsoyay eakspay ayay essagemay ofyay upyay otay wenty-fivetay wordsyay. 
 Ethay argettay eastbay avelstray orfay ethay urationday ofyay ethay ellspay owardtay ethay ecifiedlocationspay, overingcay aboutyay 50 ilesmay erpay 24 ourshay orfay ayay yingflay essengermay, oryay 25 ilesmay orfay otheryay animalsyay. Whenyay ethay essengermay arrivesyay, ityay eliversday youryay essagemay otay ethay eaturecray atthay youyay escribedday, eplicatingray ethay oundsay ofyay youryay oicevay. 
 Ethay essengermay eaksspay onlyyay otay ayay eaturecray atchingmay ethay escriptionday youyay avegay. 
 Ifyay ethay essengermay oesn’tday eachray itsyay estinationday eforebay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay essagemay isyay ostlay, andyay ethay eastbay akesmay itsyay wayyay ackbay otay whereyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay.
