 Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay urationday ofyay ethay ellspay increasesyay ybay 48 ourshay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Animalyay  Apes8th-levelshay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 24 ourshay Youryay agicmay urnstay othersyay intoyay eastsbay. 
 Oosechay anyyay umbernay ofyay willingyay eaturescray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay ansformtray eachyay argettay intoyay ethay ormfay ofyay ayay  Argelay oryay allersmay eastbay withyay ayay allengechay atingray ofyay 4 oryay owerlay. 
 Onyay ubsequentsay urnstay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ansformtray affectedyay eaturescray intoyay ewnay ormsfay. Ethay ansformationtray astslay orfay ethay urationday orfay eachyay argettay, oryay untilyay ethay argettay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay oryay iesday. 
 Youyay ancay oosechay ayay ifferentday ormfay orfay eachyay argettay. 
Ayay arget’stay amegay atisticsstay areyay eplacedray ybay ethay atisticsstay ofyay ethay osenchay eastbay, oughthay ethay argettay etainsray itsyay alignmentyay andyay  Intelligenceyay,  Wisdomyay, andyay  Arismachay oresscay. 
 Ethay argettay assumesyay ethay ithay ointspay ofyay itsyay ewnay ormfay, andyay whenyay ityay evertsray otay itsyay ormalnay ormfay, ityay eturnsray otay ethay umbernay ofyay ithay ointspay ityay adhay eforebay ityay ansformedtray. 
 Ifyay ityay evertsray asyay ayay esultray ofyay oppingdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, anyyay excessyay amageday arriescay overyay otay itsyay ormalnay ormfay. 
 Asyay onglay asyay ethay excessyay amageday oesn’tday educeray ethay eature’scray ormalnay ormfay otay 0 ithay ointspay, ityay isn’tyay ockedknay unconsciousyay. 
 Ethay eaturecray isyay imitedlay inyay ethay actionsyay ityay ancay erformpay ybay ethay aturenay ofyay itsyay ewnay ormfay, andyay ityay an’tcay eakspay oryay astcay ellsspay. Ethay arget’stay eargay eldsmay intoyay ethay ewnay ormfay. 
 Ethay argettay an’tcay activateyay, wieldyay, oryay otherwiseyay enefitbay omfray anyyay ofyay itsyay equipmentyay. Animateyay  Eadday 3levelrdlay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 10 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay opdray ofyay oodblay, ayay iecepay ofyay eshflay, andyay ayay inchpay ofyay onebay ustday) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Isthay ellspay eatescray anyay undeadyay ervantsay. 
 Oosechay ayay ilepay ofyay onesbay oryay ayay orpsecay ofyay ayay  Ediummay oryay  Allsmay umanoidhay withinyay angeray. 
 Youryay ellspay imbuesyay ethay argettay withyay ayay oulfay imicrymay ofyay ifelay, aisingray ityay asyay anyay undeadyay eaturecray. 
ontrolcay ultiplemay eaturescray, youyay ancay ommandcay anyyay oryay allyay ofyay emthay atyay ethay amesay imetay, issuingyay ethay amesay ommandcay otay eachyay oneyay). 
 Youyay ecideday whatyay actionyay ethay eaturecray willyay aketay andyay whereyay ityay willyay ovemay uringday itsyay extnay urntay, oryay youyay ancay issueyay ayay eneralgay ommandcay, uchsay asyay otay uardgay ayay articularpay amberchay oryay orridorcay. 
 Ifyay youyay issueyay onay ommandscay, ethay eaturecray onlyyay efendsday itselfyay againstyay ostilehay eaturescray. 
 Onceyay ivengay anyay orderyay, ethay eaturecray ontinuescay otay ollowfay ityay untilyay itsyay asktay isyay ompletecay. Ethay eaturecray isyay underyay youryay ontrolcay orfay 24 ourshay, afteryay whichyay ityay opsstay obeyingyay anyyay ommandcay you’veyay ivengay ityay. 
 Otay aintainmay ontrolcay ofyay ethay eaturecray orfay anotheryay 24 ourshay, youyay ustmay astcay isthay ellspay onyay ethay eaturecray againyay eforebay ethay urrentcay 24-ourhay eriodpay endsyay. 
 Isthay useyay ofyay ethay ellspay eassertsray youryay ontrolcay overyay upyay otay ourfay eaturescray youyay avehay animatedyay withyay isthay ellspay, atherray anthay animatingyay ayay ewnay oneyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay animateyay oryay eassertray ontrolcay overyay wotay additionalyay undeadyay eaturescray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 3rday. 
 Eachyay ofyay ethay eaturescray ustmay omecay omfray ayay ifferentday orpsecay oryay ilepay ofyay onesbay. Animateyay  Objects5th-levelyay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Objectsyay omecay otay ifelay atyay youryay ommandcay. 
 Oosechay upyay otay entay onmagicalnay objectsyay withinyay angeray atthay areyay otnay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay. 
 Ediummay argetstay ountcay asyay wotay objectsyay,  Argelay argetstay ountcay asyay ourfay objectsyay,  Ugehay argetstay ountcay asyay eightyay objectsyay. 
 Youyay an’tcay animateyay anyyay objectyay argerlay anthay  Ugehay. 
 Eachyay argettay animatesyay andyay ecomesbay ayay eaturecray underyay youryay ontrolcay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay oryay untilyay educedray otay 0 ithay ointspay. Asyay ayay onusbay actionyay, youyay ancay entallymay ommandcay anyyay eaturecray youyay ademay withyay isthay ellspay ifyay ethay eaturecray isyay withinyay 500 eetfay ofyay youyay (ifyay youyay ontrolcay ultiplemay eaturescray, youyay ancay ommandcay anyyay oryay allyay ofyay emthay atyay ethay amesay imetay, issuingyay ethay amesay ommandcay otay eachyay oneyay). 
 Youyay ecideday whatyay actionyay ethay eaturecray willyay aketay andyay whereyay ityay willyay ovemay uringday itsyay extnay urntay, oryay youyay ancay issueyay ayay eneralgay ommandcay, uchsay asyay otay uardgay ayay articularpay amberchay oryay orridorcay. 
 Ifyay youyay issueyay onay ommandscay, ethay eaturecray onlyyay efendsday itselfyay againstyay ostilehay eaturescray. 
 Onceyay ivengay anyay orderyay, ethay eaturecray ontinuescay otay ollowfay ityay untilyay itsyay asktay isyay ompletecay. Animatedyay  Objectyay  Atisticsstay Izesay ACHPay Attackyay stray Exday Inytay2018+8 otay ithay, 1day4 + 4 amageday418 Allsmay2516+6 otay ithay, 1day8 + 2 amageday614 Ediummay4013+5 otay ithay, 2day6 + 1 amageday1012 Argelay5010+6 otay ithay, 2day10 + 2 amageday1410 Ugehay8010+8 otay ithay, 2day12 + 4 amageday186 Anyay animatedyay objectyay isyay ayay onstructcay withyay ACyay, ithay ointspay, attacksyay,  Engthstray, andyay  Exterityday eterminedday ybay itsyay izesay. 
 Itsyay  Onstitutioncay isyay 10 andyay itsyay  Intelligenceyay andyay  Wisdomareyay 3, andyay itsyay  Arismachay isyay 1. 
 Itsyay eedspay isyay 30 eetfay; ifyay ethay objectyay ackslay egslay oryay otheryay appendagesyay ityay ancay useyay orfay ocomotionlay, ityay insteadyay ashay ayay yingflay eedspay ofyay 30 eetfay andyay ancay overhay. 
 Ifyay ethay objectyay isyay ecurelysay attachedyay otay ayay urfacesay oryay ayay argerlay objectyay, uchsay asyay ayay ainchay oltedbay otay ayay wallyay, itsyay eedspay isyay 0. 
 Ityay ashay indsightblay withyay ayay adiusray ofyay 30 eetfay andyay isyay indblay eyondbay atthay istanceday. 
 Whenyay ethay animatedyay objectyay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, ityay evertsray otay itsyay originalyay objectyay ormfay, andyay anyyay emainingray amageday arriescay overyay otay itsyay originalyay objectyay ormfay. Ifyay youyay ommandcay anyay objectyay otay attackyay, ityay ancay akemay ayay inglesay eleemay attackyay againstyay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ityay. 
 Ityay akesmay ayay amslay attackyay withyay anyay attackyay onusbay andyay udgeoningblay amageday eterminedday ybay itsyay izesay. 
 Ethay DMay ightmay uleray atthay ayay ecificspay objectyay inflictsyay ashingslay oryay iercingpay amageday asedbay onyay itsyay ormfay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay animateyay wotay additionalyay objectsyay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 5thay. Antilifeyay  Ellshay 5levelthlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (10-ootfay adiusray) Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Ayay immeringshay arrierbay extendsyay outyay omfray youyay inyay ayay 10-ootfay adiusray andyay ovesmay withyay youyay, emainingray enteredcay onyay youyay andyay edginghay outyay eaturescray otheryay anthay undeadyay andyay onstructscay. 
 Ethay arrierbay astslay orfay ethay urationday. Ethay arrierbay eventspray anyay affectedyay eaturecray omfray assingpay oryay eachingray oughthray. 
 Anyay affectedyay eaturecray ancay astcay ellsspay oryay akemay attacksyay withyay angedray oryay eachray weaponsyay oughthray ethay arrierbay. Ifyay youyay ovemay osay atthay anyay affectedyay eaturecray isyay orcedfay otay asspay oughthray ethay arrierbay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Antimagicyay  Ield8th-levelfay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay Angeray:  Elfsay (10-oot-radiusfay eresphay) Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay owderedpay ironyay orironyay ilingsfay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Ayay 10-oot-radiusfay invisibleyay eresphay ofyay antimagicyay urroundssay youyay. 
 Isthay areayay isyay ivorcedday omfray ethay agicalmay energyyay atthay uffusessay ethay ultiversemay. 
 Withinyay ethay eresphay, ellsspay an’tcay ebay astcay, ummonedsay eaturescray isappearday, andyay evenyay agicmay itemsyay ecomebay undanemay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay eresphay ovesmay withyay youyay, enteredcay onyay youyay. Ellsspay andyay otheryay agicalmay effectsyay, exceptyay osethay eatedcray ybay anyay artifactyay oryay ayay eityday, areyay uppressedsay inyay ethay eresphay andyay an’tcay otrudepray intoyay ityay. 
Ayay otslay expendedyay otay astcay ayay uppressedsay ellspay isyay onsumedcay. 
 Whileyay anyay effectyay isyay uppressedsay, ityay oesn’tday unctionfay, utbay ethay imetay ityay endsspay uppressedsay ountscay againstyay itsyay urationday. Argetedtay  Effectsyay. 
 Areasyay ofyay  Agicmay. 
 Ethay areayay ofyay anotheryay ellspay oryay agicalmay effectyay, uchsay asyay ireballfay, an’tcay extendyay intoyay ethay eresphay. Ifyay ethay eresphay overlapsyay anyay areayay ofyay agicmay, ethay artpay ofyay ethay areayay atthay isyay overedcay ybay ethay eresphay isyay uppressedsay. Orfay exampleyay, ethay amesflay eatedcray ybay ayay wallyay ofyay irefay areyay uppressedsay withinyay ethay eresphay, eatingcray ayay apgay inyay ethay wallyay ifyay ethay overlapyay isyay argelay enoughyay. Ellsspay. 
 Anyyay activeyay ellspay oryay otheryay agicalmay effectyay onyay ayay eaturecray oryay anyay objectyay inyay ethay eresphay isyay uppressedsay whileyay ethay eaturecray oryay objectyay isyay inyay ityay. Agicmay  Itemsyay. 
 Ethay opertiespray andyay owerspay ofyay agicmay itemsyay areyay uppressedsay inyay ethay eresphay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay +1 ongswordlay inyay ethay eresphay unctionsfay asyay ayay onmagicalnay ongsword.Alay agicmay weapon’syay opertiespray andyay owerspay areyay uppressedsay ifyay ityay isyay usedyay againstyay ayay argettay inyay ethay eresphay oryay wieldedyay ybay anyay attackeryay inyay ethay eresphay. 
 Ifyay ayay agicmay weaponyay oryay ayay iecepay ofyay agicmay ammunitionyay ullyfay eaveslay ethay eresphay (orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay irefay ayay agicmay arrowyay oryay owthray ayay agicmay earspay atyay ayay argettay outsideyay ethay eresphay), ethay agicmay ofyay ethay itemyay easescay otay ebay uppressedsay asyay oonsay asyay ityay exitsyay. Agicalmay  Aveltray. 
 Eleportationtay andyay anarplay aveltray ailfay otay workyay inyay ethay eresphay, whetheryay ethay eresphay isyay ethay estinationday oryay ethay epartureday ointpay orfay uchsay agicalmay aveltray. 
Ayay ortalpay otay anotheryay ocationlay, worldyay, oryay aneplay ofyay existenceyay, asyay wellyay asyay anyay openingyay otay anyay extradimensionalyay acespay uchsay asyay atthay eatedcray ybay ethay operay icktray ellspay, emporarilytay osesclay whileyay inyay ethay eresphay. Eaturescray andyay  Objectsyay. 
Ayay eaturecray oryay objectyay ummonedsay oryay eatedcray ybay agicmay emporarilytay winksyay outyay ofyay existenceyay inyay ethay eresphay. 
 Uchsay ayay eaturecray instantlyyay eappearsray onceyay ethay acespay ethay eaturecray occupiedyay isyay onay ongerlay withinyay ethay eresphay. Ispelday  Agicmay. 
 Ellsspay andyay agicalmay effectsyay uchsay asyay ispelday agicmay avehay onay effectyay onyay ethay eresphay. 
 Ikewiselay, ethay eressphay eatedcray ybay ifferentday antimagicyay ieldfay ellsspay on’tday ullifynay eachyay otheryay. Antipathyyay/ Ympathysay 8levelthlay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 ourhay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (eitheryay ayay umplay ofyay alumyay oakedsay inyay inegarvay orfay ethay antipathyyay effectyay oryay ayay opdray ofyay oneyhay orfay ethay ympathysay effectyay) Urationday: 10 aysday Isthay ellspay attractsyay oryay epelsray eaturescray ofyay youryay oicechay. 
 Youyay argettay omethingsay withinyay angeray, eitheryay ayay  Ugehay oryay allersmay objectyay oryay eaturecray oryay anyay areayay atthay isyay onay argerlay anthay ayay 200-ootfay ubecay. 
 Enthay ecifyspay ayay indkay ofyay intelligentyay eaturecray, uchsay asyay edray agonsdray, oblinsgay, oryay ampiresvay. Youyay investyay ethay argettay withyay anyay aurayay atthay eitheryay attractsyay oryay epelsray ethay ecifiedspay eaturescray orfay ethay urationday. 
 Oosechay antipathyyay oryay ympathysay asyay ethay aura’syay effectyay. Antipathyyay. 
 Ethay enchantmentyay ausescay eaturescray ofyay ethay indkay youyay esignatedday otay eelfay anyay intenseyay urgeyay otay eavelay ethay areayay andyay avoidyay ethay argettay. 
 Whenyay uchsay ayay eaturecray ancay eesay ethay argettay oryay omescay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay ityay, ethay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ecomebay ightenedfray. 
 Ethay eaturecray emainsray ightenedfray whileyay ityay ancay eesay ethay argettay oryay isyay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay ityay. 
 Whileyay ightenedfray ybay ethay argettay, ethay eaturecray ustmay useyay itsyay ovementmay omovetay otay ethay earestnay afesay otspay omfray whichyay ityay an’tcay eesay ethay argettay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray ovesmay oremay anthay 60 eetfay omfray ethay argettay andyay an’tcay eesay ityay, ethay eaturecray isyay onay ongerlay ightenedfray, utbay ethay eaturecray ecomesbay ightenedfray againyay ifyay ityay egainsray ightsay ofyay ethay argettay oryay ovesmay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay ityay. Ympathysay. 
 Ethay enchantmentyay ausescay ethay ecifiedspay eaturescray otay eelfay anyay intenseyay urgeyay otay approachyay ethay argettay whileyay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay ityay oryay ableyay otay eesay ityay. 
 Whenyay uchsay ayay eaturecray ancay eesay ethay argettay oryay omescay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay ityay, ethay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay useyay itsyay ovementmay onyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay otay enteryay ethay areayay oryay ovemay withinyay eachray ofyay ethay argettay. 
 Whenyay ethay eaturecray ashay oneday osay, ityay an’tcay willinglyyay ovemay awayyay omfray ethay argettay. Ifyay ethay argettay amagesday oryay otherwiseyay armshay anyay affectedyay eaturecray, ethay affectedyay eaturecray ancay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray otay endyay ethay effectyay, asyay escribedday elowbay. Endingyay ethay  Effectyay. 
 Ifyay anyay affectedyay eaturecray endsyay itsyay urntay whileyay otnay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay ethay argettay oryay ableyay otay eesay ityay, ethay eaturecray akesmay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay eaturecray isyay onay ongerlay affectedyay ybay ethay argettay andyay ecognizesray ethay eelingfay ofyay epugnanceray oryay attractionyay asyay agicalmay. 
 Inyay additionyay, ayay eaturecray affectedyay ybay ethay ellspay isyay allowedyay anotheryay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray everyyay 24 ourshay whileyay ethay ellspay ersists.Apay eaturecray atthay uccessfullysay avessay againstyay isthay effectyay isyay immuneyay otay ityay orfay 1 inutemay, afteryay whichyay imetay ityay ancay ebay affectedyay againyay. Arcaneyay  Eye4th-levelyay ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay atbay urfay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay eatecray anyay invisibleyay, agicalmay eyeyay withinyay angeray atthay overshay inyay ethay airyay orfay ethay urationday. Youyay entallymay eceiveray isualvay informationyay omfray ethay eyeyay, whichyay ashay ormalnay isionvay andyay arkvisionday outyay otay 30 eetfay. 
 Ethay eyeyay ancay ooklay inyay everyyay irectionday. Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay ovemay ethay eyeyay upyay otay 30 eetfay inyay anyyay irectionday. 
 Erethay isyay onay imitlay otay owhay arfay awayyay omfray youyay ethay eyeyay ancay ovemay, utbay ityay an’tcay enteryay anotheryay aneplay ofyay existenceyay. 
Ayay olidsay arrierbay ocksblay ethay eye’syay ovementmay, utbay ethay eyeyay ancay asspay oughthray anyay openingyay asyay allsmay asyay 1 inchyay inyay iameterday. Arcaneyay  Ate6th-levelgay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 500 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay eatecray inkedlay eleportationtay ortalspay atthay emainray openyay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Oosechay wotay ointspay onyay ethay oundgray atthay youyay ancay eesay, oneyay ointpay withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay andyay oneyay ointpay withinyay 500 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
Ayay ircularcay ortalpay, 10 eetfay inyay iameterday, opensyay overyay eachyay ointpay. 
erpendicularpay otay ityay atyay ethay ointspay youyay oosechay. 
Ayay ingray isyay isiblevay onlyyay omfray oneyay idesay (youryay oicechay), whichyay isyay ethay idesay atthay unctionsfay asyay ayay ortalpay. Anyyay eaturecray oryay objectyay enteringyay ethay ortalpay exitsyay omfray ethay otheryay ortalpay asyay ifyay ethay wotay wereyay adjacentyay otay eachyay otheryay; assingpay oughthray ayay ortalpay omfray ethay onportalnay idesay ashay onay effectyay. 
 Ethay istmay atthay illsfay eachyay ortalpay isyay opaqueyay andyay ocksblay isionvay oughthray ityay. 
 Onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay otateray ethay ingsray asyay ayay onusbay actionyay osay atthay ethay activeyay idesay acesfay inyay ayay ifferentday irectionday. Arcaneyay  Ock2nd-levellay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (oldgay ustday worthyay atyay eastlay 25 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Untilyay ispelledday Youyay ouchtay ayay osedclay oorday, windowyay, ategay, estchay, oryay otheryay entrywayyay, andyay ityay ecomesbay ockedlay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Youyay andyay ethay eaturescray youyay esignateday whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay ancay openyay ethay objectyay ormallynay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay etsay ayay asswordpay atthay, whenyay okenspay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay objectyay, uppressessay isthay ellspay orfay 1 inutemay. 
 Otherwiseyay, ityay isyay impassableyay untilyay ityay isyay okenbray oryay ethay ellspay isyay ispelledday oryay uppressedsay. 
 Astingcay ockknay onyay ethay objectyay uppressessay arcaneyay ocklay orfay 10 inutesmay. Whileyay affectedyay ybay isthay ellspay, ethay objectyay isyay oremay ifficultday otay eakbray oryay orcefay openyay; ethay DCay otay eakbray ityay oryay ickpay anyyay ockslay onyay ityay increasesyay ybay 10. Armoryay ofyay  Agathys1st-levelyay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay upcay ofyay wateryay) Urationday: 1 ourhay Ayay otectivepray agicalmay orcefay urroundssay youyay, anifestingmay asyay ayay ectralspay ostfray atthay overscay youyay andyay youryay eargay. Youyay aingay 5 emporarytay ithay ointspay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ifyay ayay eaturecray itshay youyay withyay ayay eleemay attackyay whileyay youyay avehay esethay ithay ointspay, ethay eaturecray akestay 5 oldcay amageday. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, othbay ethay emporarytay ithay ointspay andyay ethay oldcay amageday increaseyay ybay 5 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Armsyay ofyay  Adar1st-levelhay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (10-ootfay adiusray) Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay invokeyay ethay owerpay ofyay  Adarhay, ethay  Arkday  Ungerhay. 
 Endrilstay ofyay arkday energyyay eruptyay omfray youyay andyay atterbay allyay eaturescray withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay atthay areayay ustmay akemay ayay  Engthstray avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ayay argettay akestay 2day6 ecroticnay amageday andyay an’tcay aketay eactionsray untilyay itsyay extnay urntay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay eaturecray akestay alfhay amageday, utbay ufferssay onay otheryay effectyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day6 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Astralyay  Ojectionpray 9levelthlay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 ourhay  Angeray: 10 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (orfay eachyay eaturecray youyay affectyay withyay isthay ellspay, youyay ustmay ovidepray oneyay acinthjay worthyay atyay eastlay1,000 gpay andyay oneyay ornatelyyay arvedcay arbay ofyay ilversay worthyay atyay eastlay 100 gpay, allyay ofyay whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay)  Urationday:  Ecialspay Youyay andyay upyay otay eightyay willingyay eaturescray withinyay angeray ojectpray youryay astralyay odiesbay intoyay ethay  Astralyay  Aneplay (ethay ellspay ailsfay andyay ethay astingcay isyay wastedyay ifyay youyay areyay alreadyyay onyay atthay aneplay). 
 Ethay aterialmay odybay youyay eavelay ehindbay isyay unconsciousyay andyay inyay ayay atestay ofyay uspendedsay animationyay; ityay oesn’tday eednay oodfay oryay airyay andyay oesn’tday ageyay. Youryay astralyay odybay esemblesray youryay ortalmay ormfay inyay almostyay everyyay wayyay, eplicatingray youryay amegay atisticsstay andyay ossessionspay. 
 Ethay incipalpray ifferenceday isyay ethay additionyay ofyay ayay ilverysay ordcay atthay extendsyay omfray etweenbay youryay ouldershay adesblay andyay ailstray ehindbay youyay, adingfay otay invisibilityyay afteryay1 ootfay. 
 Isthay ordcay isyay youryay ethertay otay youryay aterialmay odybay. 
 Asyay onglay asyay ethay ethertay emainsray intactyay, youyay ancay indfay youryay wayyay omehay. 
 Ifyay ethay ordcay isyay ut—somethingcay atthay ancay appenhay onlyyay whenyay anyay effectyay ecificallyspay atesstay atthay ityay oes—yourday oulsay andyay odybay areyay eparatedsay, illingkay youyay instantlyyay. Youryay astralyay ormfay ancay eelyfray aveltray oughthray ethay  Astralyay  Aneplay andyay ancay asspay oughthray ortalspay erethay eadinglay otay anyyay otheryay aneplay. 
 Ifyay youyay enteryay ayay ewnay aneplay oryay eturnray otay ethay aneplay youyay wereyay onyay whenyay astingcay isthay ellspay, youryay odybay andyay ossessionspay areyay ansportedtray alongyay ethay ilversay ordcay, allowingyay youyay otay e-enterray youryay odybay asyay youyay enteryay ethay ewnay aneplay. Youryay astralyay ormfay isyay ayay eparatesay incarnationyay. 
 Anyyay amageday oryay otheryay effectsyay atthay applyyay otay ityay avehay onay effectyay onyay youryay ysicalphay odybay, ornay oday eythay ersistpay whenyay youyay eturnray otay ityay. Ethay ellspay endsyay orfay youyay andyay youryay ompanionscay whenyay youyay useyay youryay actionyay otay ismissday ityay. 
 Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay affectedyay eaturecray eturnsray otay itsyay ysicalphay odybay, andyay ityay awakensyay. Ethay ellspay ightmay alsoyay endyay earlyyay orfay youyay oryay oneyay ofyay youryay ompanionscay. 
Ayay uccessfulsay ispelday agicmay ellspay usedyay againstyay anyay astralyay oryay ysicalphay odybay endsyay ethay ellspay orfay atthay eaturecray. 
 Ifyay ayay eature’scray originalyay odybay oryay itsyay astralyay ormfay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, ethay ellspay endsyay orfay atthay eaturecray. 
 Ybay astingcay em-inlaidgay icksstay, ollingray agondray onesbay, ayinglay outyay ornateyay ardscay, oryay employingyay omesay otheryay iviningday ooltay, youyay eceiveray anyay omenyay omfray anyay otherworldlyyay entityyay aboutyay ethay esultsray ofyay ayay ecificspay oursecay ofyay actionyay atthay youyay anplay otay aketay withinyay ethay extnay 30 inutesmay. 
 Ethay DMay ooseschay omfray ethay ollowingfay ossiblepay omensyay:•  Wealyay, orfay oodgay esultsray•  Woeyay, orfay adbay esultsray•  Wealyay andyay woeyay, orfay othbay oodgay andyay adbay esultsray•  Othingnay, orfay esultsray atthay aren’tyay especiallyyay oodgay oryay adbay Ethay ellspay oesn’tday aketay intoyay accountyay anyyay ossiblepay ircumstancescay atthay ightmay angechay ethay outcomeyay, uchsay asyay ethay astingcay ofyay additionalyay ellsspay oryay ethay osslay oryay aingay ofyay ayay ompanioncay. Ifyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay wotay oryay oremay imestay eforebay ompletingcay youryay extnay onglay estray, erethay isyay ayay umulativecay 25 ercentpay ancechay orfay eachyay astingcay afteryay ethay irstfay atthay youyay etgay ayay andomray eadingray. 
 Ethay DMay akesmay isthay ollray inyay ecretsay. Aurayay ofyay  Ife4th-levellay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (30-ootfay adiusray) Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Ife-preservinglay energyyay adiatesray omfray youyay inyay anyay aurayay withyay ayay 30-ootfay adiusray. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay aurayay ovesmay withyay youyay, enteredcay onyay youyay. 
 Eachyay onhostilenay eaturecray inyay ethay aurayay (includingyay youyay) ashay esistanceray otay ecroticnay amageday, andyay itsyay ithay ointpay aximummay an'tcay ebay educedray. 
 Inyay additionyay, ayay onhostilenay, ivinglay eaturecray egainsray 1 ithay ointpay whenyay ityay artsstay itsyay urntay inyay ethay aurayay withyay 0 ithay ointspay. Aurayay ofyay  Uritypay 4levelthlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (30-ootfay adiusray) Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Urifyingpay energyyay adiatesray omfray youyay inyay anyay aurayay withyay ayay 30-ootfay adiusray. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay aurayay ovesmay withyay youyay, enteredcay onyay youyay. 
 Eachyay onhostilenay eaturecray inyay ethay aurayay (includingyay youyay) an’tcay ecomebay iseasedday, ashay esistanceray otay oisonpay amageday, andyay ashay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay effectsyay atthay ausecay anyyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay onditionscay: indedblay, armedchay, eafenedday, ightenedfray, aralyzedpay, oisonedpay, andyay unnedstay. Aurayay ofyay  Italityvay 3levelrdlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (30-ootfay adiusray) Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ealinghay energyyay adiatesray omfray youyay inyay anyay aurayay withyay ayay 30-ootfay adiusray. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay aurayay ovesmay withyay youyay, enteredcay onyay youyay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay otay ausecay oneyay eaturecray inyay ethay aurayay (includingyay youyay) otay egainray 2day6 ithay ointspay. Awaken5th-levelyay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 8 ourshay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (anyay agateyay worthyay atyay eastlay 1,000 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Afteryay endingspay ethay astingcay imetay acingtray agicalmay athwayspay withinyay ayay eciouspray emstonegay, youyay ouchtay ayay  Ugehay oryay allersmay eastbay oryay antplay. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay avehay eitheryay onay  Intelligenceyay orescay oryay anyay  Intelligenceyay ofyay 3 oryay esslay. 
 Ethay argettay ainsgay anyay  Intelligenceyay ofyay 10. 
 Ethay argettay alsoyay ainsgay ethay abilityyay otay eakspay oneyay anguagelay youyay owknay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay ayay antplay, ityay ainsgay ethay abilityyay otay ovemay itsyay imbslay, ootsray, inesvay, eeperscray, andyay osay orthfay, andyay ityay ainsgay ensessay imilarsay otay ayay uman’shay. 
 Youryay DMay ooseschay atisticsstay appropriateyay orfay ethay awakenedyay antplay, uchsay asyay ethay atisticsstay orfay ethay awakenedyay ubshray oryay ethay awakenedyay eetray. Ethay awakenedyay eastbay oryay antplay isyay armedchay ybay youyay orfay 30 aysday oryay untilyay youyay oryay youryay ompanionscay oday anythingyay armfulhay otay ityay. 
 Whenyay ethay armedchay onditioncay endsyay, ethay awakenedyay eaturecray ooseschay whetheryay otay emainray iendlyfray otay youyay, asedbay onyay owhay youyay eatedtray ityay whileyay ityay wasyay armedchay. Ane1st-levelbay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay opdray ofyay oodblay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Upyay otay eethray eaturescray ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray ustmay akemay  Arismachay avingsay owsthray. 
 Wheneveryay ayay argettay atthay ailsfay isthay avingsay owthray akesmay anyay attackyay ollray oryay ayay avingsay owthray eforebay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argettay ustmay ollray ayay day4 andyay ubtractsay ethay umbernay olledray omfray ethay attackyay ollray oryay avingsay owthray. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay argettay oneyay additionalyay eaturecray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Anishingbay  Itesmay 5levelthlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ethay extnay imetay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay eforebay isthay ellspay endsyay, youryay weaponyay acklescray withyay orcefay, andyay ethay attackyay ealsday anyay extrayay 5day10 orcefay amageday otay ethay argettay. 
 Additionallyyay, ifyay isthay attackyay educesray ethay argettay otay 50 ithay ointspay oryay ewerfay, youyay anishbay ityay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay ativenay otay ayay ifferentday aneplay ofyay existenceyay anthay ethay oneyay you’reyay onyay, ethay argettay isappearsday, eturningray otay itsyay omehay aneplay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay ativenay otay ethay aneplay you’reyay onyay, ethay eaturecray anishesvay intoyay ayay armlesshay emiplaneday. 
 Whileyay erethay, ethay argettay isyay incapacitatedyay. 
 Anishmentbay 4levelthlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (anyay itemyay istastefulday otay ethay argettay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay attemptyay otay endsay oneyay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray otay anotheryay aneplay ofyay existenceyay. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray oryay ebay anishedbay. Ifyay ethay argettay isyay ativenay otay ethay aneplay ofyay existenceyay you’reyay onyay, youyay anishbay ethay argettay otay ayay armlesshay emiplaneday. Whileyay erethay, ethay argettay isyay incapacitatedyay. 
 Ethay argettay emainsray erethay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, atyay whichyay ointpay ethay argettay eappearsray inyay ethay acespay ityay eftlay oryay inyay ethay earestnay unoccupiedyay acespay ifyay atthay acespay isyay occupiedyay. Ifyay ethay argettay isyay ativenay otay ayay ifferentday aneplay ofyay existenceyay anthay ethay oneyay you’reyay onyay, ethay argettay isyay anishedbay withyay ayay aintfay oppingpay oisenay, eturningray otay itsyay omehay aneplay. Ifyay ethay ellspay endsyay eforebay 1 inutemay ashay assedpay, ethay argettay eappearsray inyay ethay acespay ityay eftlay oryay inyay ethay earestnay unoccupiedyay acespay ifyay atthay acespay isyay occupiedyay. 
 Otherwiseyay, ethay argettay oesn'tday eturnray. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 5thay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay argettay oneyay additionalyay eaturecray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 4thay. Arkskinbay 2levelndlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay andfulhay ofyay oakyay arkbay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay ouchtay ayay willingyay eaturecray. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay arget’stay inskay ashay ayay oughray, ark-likebay appearanceyay, andyay ethay arget’stay ACyay an’tcay ebay esslay anthay 16, egardlessray ofyay whatyay indkay ofyay armoryay ityay isyay wearingyay. Eaconbay ofyay  Ope3rd-levelhay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Isthay ellspay estowsbay opehay andyay italityvay. 
 Oosechay anyyay umbernay ofyay eaturescray withinyay angeray. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, eachyay argettay ashay advantageyay onyay  Wisdomyay avingsay owsthray andyay eathday avingsay owsthray, andyay egainsray ethay aximummay umbernay ofyay ithay ointspay ossiblepay omfray anyyay ealinghay. Eastbay  Ense2nd-levelsay ivinationday (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay ouchtay ayay willingyay eastbay. 
 Whileyay erceivingpay oughthray ethay east’sbay ensessay, youyay aingay ethay enefitsbay ofyay anyyay ecialspay ensessay ossessedpay ybay atthay eaturecray, oughthay youyay areyay indedblay andyay eafenedday otay youryay ownyay urroundingssay. Estowbay  Urse3rd-levelcay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay ouchtay ayay eaturecray, andyay atthay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ecomebay ursedcay orfay ethay urationday ofyay ethay ellspay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, oosechay ethay aturenay ofyay ethay ursecay omfray ethay ollowingfay optionsyay:•  Oosechay oneyay abilityyay orescay. 
 Whileyay ursedcay, ethay argettay ashay isadvantageday onyay abilityyay eckschay andyay avingsay owsthray ademay withyay atthay abilityyay orescay.•  Whileyay ursedcay, ethay argettay ashay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay youyay.•  Whileyay ursedcay, ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay av­ingsay owthray atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay, ityay wastesyay itsyay actionyay atthay urntay oingday othingnay.•  Whileyay ethay argettay isyay ursedcay, youryay attacksyay andyay ellsspay ealday anyay extrayay 1day8 ecroticnay amageday otay ethay arget.Atay emoveray ursecay ellspay endsyay isthay effectyay. 
 Atyay ethay sdMsay optionyay, youyay aymay oosechay anyay alternativeyay ursecay effectyay, utbay ityay ouldshay ebay onay oremay owerfulpay anthay osethay escribedday aboveyay. 
 Ethay DMay ashay inalfay aysay onyay uchsay ayay urse’scay effectyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay urationday isyay oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay. 
 Ifyay youyay useyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 5thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay urationday isyay 8 ourshay. 
 Ifyay youyay useyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 7thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay urationday isyay 24 ourshay. 
 Ifyay youyay useyay ayay 9thay evellay ellspay otslay, ethay ellspay astslay untilyay ityay isyay ispelledday. 
 Usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 5thay evellay oryay igherhay antsgray ayay urationday atthay oesn’tday equireray oncentrationcay. Igby’sbay  Andhay 5levelthlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (anyay eggshellyay andyay ayay akeskinsnay oveglay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay eatecray ayay  Argelay andhay ofyay immeringshay, anslucenttray orcefay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay andhay astslay orfay ethay ell’sspay urationday, andyay ityay ovesmay atyay youryay ommandcay, imickingmay ethay ovementsmay ofyay youryay ownyay andhay. Ethay andhay isyay anyay objectyay atthay ashay ACyay 20 andyay ithay ointspay equalyay otay youryay ithay ointpay aximummay. 
 Ifyay ityay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Ityay ashay ayay  Engthstray ofyay 26 (+8) andyay ayay  Exterityday ofyay 10 (+0). 
 Ethay andhay oesn’tday illfay itsyay acespay. Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay andyay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay ubsequentsay urnstay, youyay ancay ovemay ethay andhay upyay otay 60 eetfay andyay enthay ausecay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay effectsyay withyay ityay. Enchedclay  Istfay. 
 Ethay andhay ikesstray oneyay eaturecray oryay objectyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ityay. 
 Akemay ayay eleemay ellspay attackyay orthefay andhay usingyay youryay amegay atisticsstay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 4day8 orcefay amageday. Orcefulfay  Andhay. 
 Ethay andhay attemptsyay otay ushpay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ityay inyay ayay irectionday youyay oosechay. 
 Akemay ayay eckchay withyay ethay and’shay  Engthstray ontestedcay ybay ethay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay ofyay ethay argettay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay  Ediummay oryay allersmay, youyay avehay advantageyay onyay ethay eckchay. 
 Ifyay youyay ucceedsay, ethay andhay ushespay ethay argettay upyay otay 5 eetfay usplay ayay umbernay ofyay eetfay equalyay otay ivefay imestay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay odifiermay. 
 Ethay andhay ovesmay withyay ethay argettay otay emainray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ityay. Aspinggray  Andhay. 
 Ethay andhay attemptsyay otay applegray ayay  Ugehay oryay allersmay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ityay. 
 Youyay useyay ethay and’shay  Engthstray orescay otay esolveray ethay applegray. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay  Ediummay oryay allersmay, youyay avehay advantageyay onyay ethay eckchay. 
 Whileyay ethay andhay isyay applinggray ethay argettay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay otay avehay ethay andhay ushcray ityay. 
 Whenyay youyay oday osay, ethay argettay akestay udgeoningblay amageday equalyay otay 2day6 + youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay odifiermay. Interposingyay  Andhay. 
 Ethay andhay interposesyay itselfyay etweenbay youyay andyay ayay eaturecray youyay oosechay untilyay youyay ivegay ethay andhay ayay ifferentday ommandcay. 
 Ethay andhay ovesmay otay aystay etweenbay youyay andyay ethay argettay, ovidingpray youyay withyay alfhay overcay againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Ethay argettay an'tcay ovemay oughthray ethay and’shay acespay ifyay itsyay  Engthstray orescay isyay esslay anthay oryay equalyay otay ethay and’shay  Engthstray orescay. 
 Ifyay itsyay  Engthstray orescay isyay igherhay anthay ethay and’shay  Engthstray orescay, ethay argettay ancay ovemay owardtay youyay oughthray ethay and’shay acespay, utbay atthay acespay isyay ifficultday erraintay orfay ethay argettay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday omfray ethay enchedclay istfay optionyay increasesyay ybay 2day8 andyay ethay amageday omfray ethay aspinggray andhay increasesyay ybay 2day6 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 5thay. Adeblay  Arrier6th-levelbay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 90 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay eatecray ayay erticalvay wallyay ofyay whirlingyay, azor-sharpray adesblay ademay ofyay agicalmay energyyay. 
 Ethay wallyay appearsyay withinyay angeray andyay astslay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Youyay ancay akemay ayay aightstray wallyay upyay otay 100 eetfay onglay, 20 eetfay ighhay, andyay 5 eetfay ickthay, oryay ayay ingedray wallyay upyay otay 60 eetfay inyay iameterday, 20 eetfay ighhay, andyay5 eetfay ickthay. 
 Ethay wallyay ovidespray ee-quartersthray overcay otay eaturescray ehindbay ityay, andyay itsyay acespay isyay ifficultday erraintay. Whenyay ayay eaturecray entersyay ethay wall’syay areayay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay artsstay itsyay urntay erethay, ethay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray akestay 6day10 ashingslay amageday. 
 Youyay extendyay youryay andhay andyay acetray ayay igilsay ofyay wardingyay inyay ethay airyay. 
 Untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay, youyay avehay esistanceray againstyay udgeoningblay, iercingpay, andyay ashingslay amageday ealtday ybay weaponyay attacksyay. Ess1st-levelblay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inklingspray ofyay olyhay wateryay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay essblay upyay otay eethray eaturescray ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray. 
 Wheneveryay ayay argettay akesmay anyay attackyay ollray oryay ayay avingsay owthray eforebay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argettay ancay ollray ayay day4 andyay addyay ethay umbernay olledray otay ethay attackyay ollray oryay avingsay owthray. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay argettay oneyay additionalyay eaturecray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Ight4th-levelblay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ecromanticnay energyyay washesyay overyay ayay eaturecray ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray, ainingdray oisturemay andyay italityvay omfray ityay. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Ethay argettay akestay 8day8 ecroticnay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
 Isthay ellspay ashay onay effectyay onyay undeadyay oryay onstructscay. Ifyay youyay argettay ayay antplay eaturecray oryay ayay agicalmay antplay, ityay akesmay ethay avingsay owthray withyay isadvantageday, andyay ethay ellspay ealsday aximummay amageday otay ityay. Ifyay youyay argettay ayay onmagicalnay antplay atthay isn’tyay ayay eaturecray, uchsay asyay ayay eetray oryay ubshray, ityay oesn’tday akemay ayay avingsay owthray; ityay implysay withersyay andyay iesday. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 5thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 4thay. Indingblay  Itesmay 3levelrdlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ethay extnay imetay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay uringday isthay ell’sspay urationday, youryay weaponyay aresflay withyay ightbray ightlay, andyay ethay attackyay ealsday anyay extrayay 3day8 adiantray amageday otay ethay argettay. 
 Additionallyyay, ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray oryay ebay indedblay untilyay ethay ellspay ends.Ayay eaturecray indedblay ybay isthay ellspay akesmay anotheryay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ityay isyay onay ongerlay indedblay. Indnessblay/ Eafness2nd-levelday ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday: 1 inutemay Youyay ancay indblay oryay eafenday ayay oefay. 
 Oosechay oneyay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray otay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay, ethay argettay isyay eitheryay indedblay oryay eafenedday (youryay oicechay) orfay ethay urationday. 
 Atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay, ethay argettay ancay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay argettay oneyay additionalyay eaturecray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Ink3rd-levelblay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 inutemay Ollray ayay day20 atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay orfay ethay urationday ofyay ethay ellspay. 
 Onyay ayay ollray ofyay 11 oryay igherhay, youyay anishvay omfray youryay urrentcay aneplay ofyay existenceyay andyay appearyay inyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay (ethay ellspay ailsfay andyay ethay astingcay isyay wastedyay ifyay youyay wereyay alreadyyay onyay atthay aneplay). 
 Atyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay, andyay whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay youyay areyay onyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay, youyay eturnray otay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay ethay acespay youyay anishedvay omfray. 
 Ifyay onay unoccupiedyay acespay isyay availableyay withinyay atthay angeray, youyay appearyay inyay ethay earestnay unoccupiedyay acespay (osenchay atyay andomray ifyay oremay anthay oneyay acespay isyay equallyyay earnay). 
 Youyay ancay ismissday isthay ellspay asyay anyay actionyay. Whileyay onyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay, youyay ancay eesay andyay earhay ethay aneplay youyay originatedyay omfray, whichyay isyay astcay inyay adesshay ofyay aygray, andyay youyay an’tcay eesay anythingyay erethay oremay anthay 60 eetfay awayyay. 
 Youyay ancay onlyyay affectyay andyay ebay affectedyay ybay otheryay eaturescray onyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay. 
 Eaturescray atthay aren’tyay erethay an’tcay erceivepay youyay oryay interactyay withyay youyay, unlessyay eythay avehay ethay abilityyay otay oday osay. Ur2nd-levelblay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youryay odybay ecomesbay urredblay, iftingshay andyay waveringyay otay allyay whoyay ancay eesay youyay. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, anyyay eaturecray ashay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay youyay. 
 Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ethay extnay imetay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay eforebay isthay ellspay endsyay, ethay weaponyay eamsglay withyay astralyay adianceray asyay youyay ikestray. 
 Ethay attackyay ealsday anyay extrayay 2day6 adiantray amageday otay ethay argettay, whichyay ecomesbay isiblevay ifyay it’syay invisibleyay, andyay ethay argettay edsshay imday ightlay inyay ayay 5-ootfay adiusray andyay an’tcay ecomebay invisibleyay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay extrayay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day6 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Urningbay  Ands1st-levelhay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (15-ootfay onecay) Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Asyay youyay oldhay youryay andshay withyay umbsthay ouchingtay andyay ingersfay eadspray, ayay inthay eetshay ofyay amesflay ootsshay orthfay omfray youryay outstretchedyay ingertipsfay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 15-ootfay onecay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 3day6 irefay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Ethay irefay ignitesyay anyyay ammableflay objectsyay inyay ethay areayay atthay aren’tyay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day6 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Allcay  Ightning3rd-levellay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Ayay ormstay oudclay appearsyay inyay ethay apeshay ofyay ayay ylindercay atthay isyay 10 eetfay alltay withyay ayay 60-ootfay adiusray, enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay youyay ancay eesay 100 eetfay irectlyday aboveyay youyay. 
 Ethay ellspay ailsfay ifyay youyay an’tcay eesay ayay ointpay inyay ethay airyay whereyay ethay ormstay oudclay ouldcay appearyay (orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay areyay inyay ayay oomray atthay an’tcay accommodateyay ethay oudclay). Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, oosechay ayay ointpay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
Ayay oltbay ofyay ightninglay ashesflay ownday omfray ethay oudclay otay atthay ointpay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay atthay ointpay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 3day10 ightninglay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
 Onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay allcay ownday ightninglay inyay isthay wayyay againyay, argetingtay ethay amesay ointpay oryay ayay ifferentday oneyay. Ifyay youyay areyay outdoorsyay inyay ormystay onditionscay whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, ethay ellspay ivesgay youyay ontrolcay overyay ethay existingyay ormstay insteadyay ofyay eatingcray ayay ewnay oneyay. 
 Underyay uchsay onditionscay, ethay ell’sspay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day10. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Almcay  Emotions2nd-levelyay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay attemptyay otay uppresssay ongstray emotionsyay inyay ayay oupgray ofyay eoplepay. 
 Eachyay umanoidhay inyay ayay 20-oot-radiusfay eresphay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray ustmay akemay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray; ayay eaturecray ancay oosechay otay ailfay isthay avingsay owthray ifyay ityay wishesyay. 
 Ifyay ayay eaturecray ailsfay itsyay avingsay owthray, oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay wotay effectsyay. Youyay ancay uppresssay anyyay effectyay ausingcay ayay argettay otay ebay armedchay oryay ightenedfray. 
 Whenyay isthay ellspay endsyay, anyyay uppressedsay effectyay esumesray, ovidedpray atthay itsyay urationday ashay otnay expiredyay inyay ethay eantimemay. Alternativelyyay, youyay ancay akemay ayay argettay indifferentyay aboutyay eaturescray ofyay youryay oicechay atthay ityay isyay ostilehay owardtay. 
 Isthay indifferenceyay endsyay ifyay ethay argettay isyay attackedyay oryay armedhay ybay ayay ellspay oryay ifyay ityay witnessesyay anyyay ofyay itsyay iendsfray eingbay armedhay. 
 Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay eaturecray ecomesbay ostilehay againyay, unlessyay ethay DMay ulesray otherwiseyay. Ainchay  Ightning6th-levellay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 150 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay urfay; ayay iecepay ofyay amberyay, assglay, oryay ayay ystalcray odray; andyay eethray ilversay inspay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay eatecray ayay oltbay ofyay ightninglay atthay arcsyay owardtay ayay argettay ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Eethray oltsbay enthay eaplay omfray atthay argettay otay asyay anymay asyay eethray otheryay argetstay, eachyay ofyay whichyay ustmay ebay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay ethay irstfay argettay. 
Ayay argettay ancay ebay ayay eaturecray oryay anyay objectyay andyay ancay ebay argetedtay ybay onlyyay oneyay ofyay ethay olts.Abay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Ethay argettay akestay 10day8 ightninglay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 7thay evellay oryay igherhay, oneyay additionalyay oltbay eapslay omfray ethay irstfay argettay otay anotheryay argettay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 6thay. Armchay  Erson1st-levelpay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 ourhay Youyay attemptyay otay armchay ayay umanoidhay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray, andyay oesday osay withyay advantageyay ifyay youyay oryay youryay ompanionscay areyay ightingfay ityay. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay ethay avingsay owthray, ityay isyay armedchay ybay youyay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay oryay untilyay youyay oryay youryay ompanionscay oday anythingyay armfulhay otay ityay. 
 Ethay armedchay eaturecray egardsray youyay asyay ayay iendlyfray acquaintanceyay. 
 Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay eaturecray owsknay ityay wasyay armedchay ybay youyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay argettay oneadditionalyay eaturecray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. 
 Ethay eaturescray ustmay ebay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay eachyay otheryay whenyay youyay argettay emthay. Illchay  Ouchtay  Ecromancynay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 oundray Youyay eatecray ayay ostlyghay, eletalskay andhay inyay ethay acespay ofyay ayay eaturecray withinyay angeray. 
 Akemay ayay angedray ellspay attackyay againstyay ethay eaturecray otay assailyay ityay withyay ethay illchay ofyay ethay avegray. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 1day8 ecroticnay amageday, andyay ityay an’tcay egainray ithay ointspay untilyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
 Untilyay enthay, ethay andhay ingsclay otay ethay argettay. Ifyay youyay ithay anyay undeadyay argettay, ityay alsoyay ashay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay youyay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Isthay ell’sspay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 whenyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay (2day8), 11thay evellay (3day8), andyay 17thay evellay (4day8). Omaticchray  Orb1st-levelyay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 90 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iamondday worthyay atyay eastlay 50 gpay)  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay urlhay ayay 4-inch-diameteryay eresphay ofyay energyyay atyay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay oosechay acidyay, oldcay, irefay, ightninglay, oisonpay, oryay underthay orfay ethay ypetay ofyay orbyay youyay eatecray, andyay enthay akemay ayay angedray ellspay attackyay againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Ifyay ethay attackyay itshay, ethay eaturecray akestay 3day8 amageday ofyay ethay ypetay youyay osechay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Irclecay ofyay  Eathday 6levelthlay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 150 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ethay owderpay ofyay ayay ushedcray ackblay earlpay worthyay atyay eastlay 500 gpay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay eresphay ofyay egativenay energyyay ipplesray outyay inyay ayay 60-ootfay- adiusray eresphay omfray ayay ointpay withinyay angeray. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay atthay areayay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
Ayay argettay akestay 8day6 ecroticnay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Ivineday energyyay adiatesray omfray youyay, istortingday andyay iffusingday agicalmay energyyay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay eresphay ovesmay withyay youyay, enteredcay onyay youyay. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, eachyay iendlyfray eaturecray inyay ethay areayay (includingyay youyay) ashay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay ellsspay andyay otheryay agicalmay effectsyay. 
 Additionallyyay, whenyay anyay affectedyay eaturecray ucceedssay onyay ayay avingsay owthray ademay againstyay ayay ellspay oryay agicalmay effectyay atthay allowsyay ityay otay akemay ayay avingsay owthray otay aketay onlyyay alfhay amageday, ityay insteadyay akestay onay amageday ifyay ityay ucceedssay onyay ethay avingsay owthray. Airvoyanceclay 3levelrdlay ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray: 1 ilemay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay ocusfay worthyay atyay eastlay 100 gpay, eitheryay ayay eweledjay ornhay orfay earinghay oryay ayay assglay eyeyay orfay eeingsay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay eatecray anyay invisibleyay ensorsay withinyay angeray inyay ayay ocationlay amiliarfay otay youyay (ayay aceplay youyay avehay isitedvay oryay eensay eforebay) oryay inyay anyay obviousyay ocationlay atthay isyay unfamiliaryay otay youyay (uchsay asyay ehindbay ayay oorday, aroundyay ayay ornercay, oryay inyay ayay ovegray ofyay eestray). 
 Ethay ensorsay emainsray inyay aceplay orfay ethay urationday, andyay ityay an’tcay ebay attackedyay oryay otherwiseyay interactedyay withyay. Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, youyay oosechay eeingsay oryay earinghay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay ethay osenchay ensesay oughthray ethay ensorsay asyay ifyay youyay wereyay inyay itsyay acespay. 
 Asyay youryay actionyay, youyay ancay witchsay etweenbay eeingsay andyay earing.Ahay eaturecray atthay ancay eesay ethay ensorsay (uchsay asyay ayay eaturecray enefitingbay omfray eesay invisibilityyay oryay uesighttray) eessay ayay uminouslay, intangibleyay orbyay aboutyay ethay izesay ofyay youryay istfay. One8th-levelclay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 ourhay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iamondday worthyay atyay eastlay 1,000 gpay andyay atyay eastlay 1 ubiccay inchyay ofyay eshflay ofyay ethay eaturecray atthay isyay otay ebay onedclay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay, andyay ayay esselvay worthyay atyay eastlay 2,000 gpay atthay ashay ayay ealablesay idlay andyay isyay argelay enoughyay otay oldhay ayay  Ediummay eaturecray, uchsay asyay ayay ugehay urnyay, offincay, ud-filledmay ystcay inyay ethay oundgray, oryay ystalcray ontainercay illedfay withyay altsay wateryay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Isthay ellspay owsgray anyay inertyay uplicateday ofyay ayay ivinglay eaturecray asyay ayay afeguardsay againstyay eathday. 
 Isthay oneclay ormsfay insideyay ayay ealedsay esselvay andyay owsgray otay ullfay izesay andyay aturitymay afteryay 120 aysday; youyay ancay alsoyay oosechay otay avehay ethay oneclay ebay ayay youngeryay ersionvay ofyay ethay amesay eaturecray. 
 Ityay emainsray inertyay andyay enduresyay indefinitelyyay, asyay onglay asyay itsyay esselvay emainsray undisturbedyay. Atyay anyyay imetay afteryay ethay oneclay aturesmay, ifyay ethay originalyay eaturecray iesday, itsyay oulsay ansferstray otay ethay oneclay, ovidedpray atthay ethay oulsay isyay eefray andyay willingyay otay eturnray. 
 Ethay oneclay isyay ysicallyphay identicalyay otay ethay originalyay andyay ashay ethay amesay ersonalitypay, emoriesmay, andyay abilitiesyay, utbay onenay ofyay ethay original’syay equipmentyay. 
 Ethay originalyay eature’scray ysicalphay emainsray, ifyay eythay illstay existyay, ecomebay inertyay andyay an’tcay ereafterthay ebay estoredray otay ifelay, incesay ethay eature’scray oulsay isyay elsewhereyay. Oudclay ofyay  Aggers2nd-levelday onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iverslay ofyay assglay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay illfay ethay airyay withyay inningspay aggersday inyay ayay ubecay 5 eetfay onyay eachyay idesay, enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 4day4 ashingslay amageday whenyay ityay entersyay ethay ell’sspay areayay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay artsstay itsyay urntay erethay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 2day4 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Oudkillclay 5levelthlay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay eatecray ayay 20-oot-radiusfay eresphay ofyay oisonouspay, yellowyay- eengray ogfay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay ogfay eadsspray aroundyay ornerscay. 
 Ityay astslay orfay ethay urationday oryay untilyay ongstray windyay ispersesday ethay ogfay, endingyay ethay ellspay. 
 Itsyay areayay isyay eavilyhay obscuredyay. Whenyay ayay eaturecray entersyay ethay ell’sspay areayay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay artsstay itsyay urntay erethay, atthay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Ethay eaturecray akestay 5day8 oisonpay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
 Eaturescray areyay affectedyay evenyay ifyay eythay oldhay eirthay eathbray oryay on’tday eednay otay eathebray. Ethay ogfay ovesmay 10 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay, ollingray alongyay ethay urfacesay ofyay ethay oundgray. 
 Ethay aporsvay, eingbay eavierhay anthay airyay, inksay otay ethay owestlay evellay ofyay ethay andlay, evenyay ouringpay ownday openingsyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 5thay. Olorcay  Ay1st-levelspray illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (15-ootfay onecay) Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay owderpay oryay andsay atthay isyay oloredcay edray, yellowyay, andyay ueblay) Urationday: 1 oundray Ayay azzlingday arrayyay ofyay ashingflay, oloredcay ightlay ingsspray omfray youryay andhay. 
 Ollray 6day10; ethay otaltay isyay owhay anymay ithay ointspay ofyay eaturescray isthay ellspay ancay effectyay. 
 Eaturescray inyay ayay 15-ootfay onecay originatingyay omfray youyay areyay affectedyay inyay ascendingyay orderyay ofyay eirthay urrentcay ithay ointspay (ignoringyay unconsciousyay eaturescray andyay eaturescray atthay an’tcay eesay). Artingstay withyay ethay eaturecray atthay ashay ethay owestlay urrentcay ithay ointspay, eachyay eaturecray affectedyay ybay isthay ellspay isyay indedblay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Ubtractsay eachyay eature’scray ithay ointspay omfray ethay otaltay eforebay ovingmay onyay otay ethay eaturecray withyay ethay extnay owestlay ithay ointspay. 
 Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ollray anyay additionalyay 2day10 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Ommandcay 1levelstlay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday: 1 oundray Youyay eakspay ayay one-wordyay ommandcay otay ayay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ollowfay ethay ommandcay onyay itsyay extnay urntay. 
 Ethay ellspay ashay onay effectyay ifyay ethay argettay isyay undeadyay, ifyay ityay oesn’tday understandyay youryay anguagelay, oryay ifyay youryay ommandcay isyay irectlyday armfulhay otay ityay. Omesay ypicaltay ommandscay andyay eirthay effectsyay ollowfay. 
 Youyay ightmay issueyay ayay ommandcay otheryay anthay oneyay escribedday erehay. 
 Ifyay youyay oday osay, ethay DMay eterminesday owhay ethay argettay ehavesbay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay an’tcay ollowfay youryay ommandcay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Approachyay. 
 Ethay argettay ovesmay owardtay youyay ybay ethay ortestshay andyay ostmay irectday outeray, endingyay itsyay urntay ifyay ityay ovesmay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay. Opdray. 
 Ethay argettay opsdray whateveryay ityay isyay oldinghay andyay enthay endsyay itsyay urntay. Eeflay. 
 Ethay argettay endsspay itsyay urntay ovingmay awayyay omfray youyay ybay ethay astestfay availableyay eansmay. Ovelgray. 
 Ethay argettay allsfay onepray andyay enthay endsyay itsyay urntay. 
 Althay. 
 Ethay argettay oesn’tday ovemay andyay akestay onay actions.Ayay yingflay eaturecray aysstay aloftyay, ovidedpray atthay ityay isyay ableyay otay oday osay. 
 Ifyay ityay ustmay ovemay otay aystay aloftyay, ityay iesflay ethay inimummay istanceday eedednay otay emainray inyay ethay airyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay affectyay oneyay additionalyay eaturecray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. 
 Ethay eaturescray ustmay ebay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay eachyay otheryay whenyay youyay argettay emthay. Ommune5th-levelcay ivinationday (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (incenseyay andyay ayay ialvay ofyay olyhay oryay unholyyay wateryay) Urationday: 1 inutemay Youyay ontactcay youryay eityday oryay ayay ivineday oxypray andyay askyay upyay otay eethray questionsyay atthay ancay ebay answeredyay withyay ayay yesyay oryay onay. 
 Youyay ustmay askyay youryay questionsyay eforebay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Youyay eceiveray ayay orrectcay answeryay orfay eachyay questionyay. Ivineday eingsbay aren’tyay ecessarilynay omniscientyay, osay youyay ightmay eceiveray “unclearyay” asyay anyay answeryay ifyay ayay questionyay ertainspay otay informationyay atthay ieslay eyondbay ethay eity’sday owledgeknay. 
 Inyay ayay asecay whereyay ayay one-wordyay answeryay ouldcay ebay isleadingmay oryay ontrarycay otay ethay eity’sday interestsyay, ethay DMay ightmay offeryay ayay ortshay asephray asyay anyay answeryay insteadyay. Ifyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay wotay oryay oremay imestay eforebay inishingfay youryay extnay onglay estray, erethay isyay ayay umulativecay 25 ercentpay ancechay orfay eachyay astingcay afteryay ethay irstfay atthay youyay etgay onay answeryay. 
 Ommunecay withyay  Aturenay 5levelthlay ivinationday (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ieflybray ecomebay oneyay withyay aturenay andyay aingay owledgeknay ofyay ethay urroundingsay erritorytay. 
 Inyay ethay outdoorsyay, ethay ellspay ivesgay youyay owledgeknay ofyay ethay andlay withinyay 3 ilesmay ofyay youyay. Inyay avescay andyay otheryay aturalnay undergroundyay ettingssay, ethay adiusray isyay imitedlay otay 300 eetfay. 
 Ethay ellspay oesn’tday unctionfay whereyay aturenay ashay eenbay eplacedray ybay onstructioncay, uchsay asyay inyay ungeonsday andyay ownstay. Youyay instantlyyay aingay owledgeknay ofyay upyay otay eethray actsfay ofyay youryay oicechay aboutyay anyyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay ubjectssay asyay eythay elateray otay ethay areayay:• erraintay andyay odiesbay ofyay wateryay• evalentpray antsplay, ineralsmay, animalsyay, oryay eoplespay• owerfulpay elestialscay, eyfay, iendsfay, elementalsyay, oryay undeadyay• influenceyay omfray otheryay anesplay ofyay existenceyay• uildingsbay Orfay exampleyay, youyay ouldcay etermineday ethay ocationlay ofyay owerfulpay undeadyay inyay ethay areayay, ethay ocationlay ofyay ajormay ourcessay ofyay afesay inkingdray wateryay, andyay ethay ocationlay ofyay anyyay earbynay ownstay. Ompelledcay  Uel1st-levelday enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay attemptyay otay ompelcay ayay eaturecray intoyay ayay uelday. 
 Oneyay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray isyay awndray otay youyay, ompelledcay ybay youryay ivineday emandday. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, ityay ashay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay eaturescray otheryay anthay youyay, andyay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray eachyay imetay ityay attemptsyay otay ovemay otay ayay acespay atthay isyay oremay anthay 30 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay; ifyay ityay ucceedssay onyay isthay avingsay owthray, isthay ellspay oesn’tday estrictray ethay arget’stay ovementmay orfay atthay urntay. Ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay youyay attackyay anyyay otheryay eaturecray, ifyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay atthay argetstay ayay ostilehay eaturecray otheryay anthay ethay argettay, ifyay ayay eaturecray iendlyfray otay youyay amagesday ethay argettay oryay astscay ayay armfulhay ellspay onyay ityay, oryay ifyay youyay endyay youryay urntay oremay anthay 30 eetfay awayyay omfray ethay argettay. Omprehendcay  Anguages1st-levellay ivinationday (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay ootsay andyay altsay)  Urationday: 1 ourhay Orfay ethay urationday, youyay understandyay ethay iterallay eaningmay ofyay anyyay okenspay anguagelay atthay youyay earhay. 
 Youyay alsoyay understandyay anyyay writtenyay anguagelay atthay youyay eesay, utbay youyay ustmay ebay ouchingtay ethay urfacesay onyay whichyay ethay wordsyay areyay writtenyay. 
 Ityay akestay aboutyay 1 inutemay otay eadray oneyay agepay ofyay exttay. Isthay ellspay oesn’tday ecodeday ecretsay essagesmay inyay ayay exttay oryay ayay yphglay, uchsay asyay anyay arcaneyay igilsay, atthay isn’tyay artpay ofyay ayay writtenyay anguagelay. Ompulsion4th-levelcay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Eaturescray ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray andyay atthay ancay earhay youyay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
Ayay argettay automaticallyyay ucceedssay onyay isthay avingsay owthray ifyay ityay an’tcay ebay armedchay. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ayay argettay isyay affectedyay ybay isthay ellspay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay otay esignateday ayay irectionday atthay isyay orizontalhay otay youyay. 
 Eachyay affectedyay argettay ustmay useyay asyay uchmay ofyay itsyay ovementmay asyay ossiblepay otay ovemay inyay atthay irectionday onyay itsyay extnay urntay. 
 Ityay ancay aketay itsyay actionyay eforebay ityay ovesmay. 
 Afteryay ovingmay inyay isthay wayyay, ityay ancay akemay anotheryay  Wisdomyay avingsay otay ytray otay endyay ethay effect.Ayay argettay isn’tyay ompelledcay otay ovemay intoyay anyay obviouslyyay eadlyday azardhay, uchsay asyay ayay irefay oryay itpay, utbay ityay willyay ovokepray opportunityyay attacksyay otay ovemay inyay ethay esignatedday irectionday. Onecay ofyay  Old5th-levelcay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (60-ootfay onecay) Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay ystalcray oryay assglay onecay)  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay astblay ofyay oldcay airyay eruptsyay omfray youryay andshay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 60-ootfay onecay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 8day8 oldcay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay one.Ayay eaturecray illedkay ybay isthay ellspay ecomesbay ayay ozenfray atuestay untilyay ityay awsthay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 5thay. Onfusion4th-levelcay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 90 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (eethray utnay ellsshay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Isthay ellspay assaultsyay andyay wiststay eaturescray' indsmay, awningspay elusionsday andyay ovokingpray uncontrolledyay actionyay. 
 Atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay, anyay affectedyay argettay ancay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay ityay ucceedssay, isthay effectyay endsyay orfay atthay argettay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 5thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay adiusray ofyay ethay eresphay increasesyay ybay 5 eetfay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 4thay. Onjurecay  Animals3rd-levelyay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay ummonsay eyfay iritsspay atthay aketay ethay ormfay ofyay eastsbay andyay appearyay inyay unoccupiedyay acesspay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay optionsyay orfay whatyay appearsyay:•  Oneyay eastbay ofyay allengechay atingray 2 oryay owerlay•  Wotay eastsbay ofyay allengechay atingray 1 oryay owerlay•  Ourfay eastsbay ofyay allengechay atingray 1/2 oryay owerlay•  Eightyay eastsbay ofyay allengechay atingray 1/4 oryay owerlay Eachyay eastbay isyay alsoyay onsideredcay eyfay, andyay ityay isappearsday whenyay ityay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay oryay whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Ethay ummonedsay eaturescray areyay iendlyfray otay youyay andyay youryay ompanionscay. 
 Ollray initiativeyay orfay ethay ummonedsay eaturescray asyay ayay oupgray, whichyay ashay itsyay ownyay urnstay. 
 Eythay obeyyay anyyay erbalvay ommandscay atthay youyay issueyay otay emthay (onay actionyay equiredray ybay youyay). 
 Ifyay youyay on’tday issueyay anyyay ommandscay otay emthay, eythay efendday emselvesthay omfray ostilehay eaturescray, utbay otherwiseyay aketay onay actionsyay. Ethay DMay ashay ethay eaturescray’ atisticsstay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ertaincay igher-levelhay ellspay otsslay, youyay oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ummoningsay optionsyay aboveyay, andyay oremay eaturescray appearyay: wicetay asyay anymay withyay ayay 5levelthlay otslay, eethray imestay asyay anymay withyay ayay 7levelthlay otslay, andyay ourfay imestay asyay anymay withyay ayay 9levelthlay otslay. Onjurecay  Arrage3rd-levelbay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (60-ootfay onecay) Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (oneyay iecepay ofyay ammunitionyay oryay ayay ownthray weaponyay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay owthray ayay onmagicalnay weaponyay oryay irefay ayay iecepay ofyay onmagicalnay ammunitionyay intoyay ethay airyay otay eatecray ayay oneofcay identicalyay weaponsyay atthay ootshay orwardfay andyay enthay isappearday. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 60-ootfay onecay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 3day8 amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
 Ethay amageday ypetay isyay ethay amesay asyay atthay ofyay ethay weaponyay oryay ammunitionyay usedyay asyay ayay omponentcay. Onjurecay  Elestial7th-levelcay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 90 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay ummonsay ayay elestialcay ofyay allengechay atingray 4 oryay owerlay, whichyay appearsyay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay elestialcay isappearsday whenyay ityay opsdray otay0 ithay ointspay oryay whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Ethay elestialcay isyay iendlyfray otay youyay andyay youryay ompanionscay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ollray initiativeyay orfay ethay elestialcay, whichyay ashay itsyay ownyay urnstay. 
 Ityay obeysyay anyyay erbalvay ommandscay atthay youyay issueyay otay ityay (onay actionyay equiredray ybay youyay), asyay onglay asyay eythay on’tday iolatevay itsyay alignmentyay. 
 Ifyay youyay on’tday issueyay anyyay ommandscay otay ethay elestialcay, ityay efendsday itselfyay omfray ostilehay eaturescray utbay otherwiseyay akestay onay actionsyay. Ethay DMay ashay ethay elestial’scay atisticsstay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay 9levelthlay ellspay otslay, youyay ummonsay ayay elestialcay ofyay allengechay atingray 5 oryay owerlay. Onjurecay  Elemental5th-levelyay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 90 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (urningbay incenseyay orfay airyay, oftsay ayclay orfay earthyay, ulfursay andyay osphorusphay orfay irefay, oryay wateryay andyay andsay orfay wateryay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay allcay orthfay anyay elementalyay ervantsay. 
 Oosechay anyay areayay ofyay airyay, earthyay, irefay, oryay wateryay atthay illsfay ayay 10-ootfay ubecay withinyay angeray. 
 Anyay elementalyay ofyay allengechay atingray 5 oryay owerlay appropriateyay otay ethay areayay youyay osechay appearsyay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay ityay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay irefay elementalyay emergesyay omfray ayay onfirebay, andyay anyay earthyay elementalyay isesray upyay omfray ethay oundgray. 
 Ethay elementalyay isappearsday whenyay ityay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay oryay whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Ethay elementalyay isyay iendlyfray otay youyay andyay youryay ompanionscay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ollray initiativeyay orfay ethay elementalyay, whichyay ashay itsyay ownyay urnstay. 
 Ityay obeysyay anyyay erbalvay ommandscay atthay youyay issueyay otay ityay (onay actionyay equiredray ybay youyay). 
 Ifyay youyay on’tday issueyay anyyay ommandscay otay ethay elementalyay, ityay efendsday itselfyay omfray ostilehay eaturescray utbay otherwiseyay akestay onay actionsyay. Ifyay youryay oncentrationcay isyay okenbray, ethay elementalyay oesn’tday isappearday. 
 Insteadyay, youyay oselay ontrolcay ofyay ethay elementalyay, ityay ecomesbay ostilehay owardtay youyay andyay youryay ompanionscay, andyay ityay ightmay attackyay. 
 Anyay uncontrolledyay elementalyay an’tcay ebay ismissedday ybay youyay, andyay ityay isappearsday 1 ourhay afteryay youyay ummonedsay ityay. Ethay DMay ashay ethay elemental’syay atisticsstay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay allengechay atingray increasesyay ybay 1 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 5dthday10 Ehaviorbay1 Ethay eaturecray usesyay allyay itsyay ovementmay otay ovemay inyay ayay andomray irectionday. 
 Otay etermineday ethay irectionday, ollray ayay day8 andyay assignyay ayay irectionday otay eachyay ieday acefay. 
 Ethay eaturecray oesn’tday aketay anyay actionyay isthay urntay.2-6 Ethay eaturecray oesn’tday ovemay oryay aketay actionsyay isthay urntay.7-8 Ethay eaturecray usesyay itsyay actionyay otay akemay ayay eleemay attackyay againstyay ayay andomlyray eterminedday eaturecray withinyay itsyay eachray.
