 Onjurecay  Ey6th-levelfay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 90 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay ummonsay ayay eyfay eaturecray ofyay allengechay atingray 6 oryay owerlay, oryay ayay eyfay iritspay atthay akestay ethay ormfay ofyay ayay eastbay ofyay allengechay atingray 6 oryay owerlay. 
 Ityay appearsyay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay eyfay eaturecray isappearsday whenyay ityay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay oryay whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Ethay eyfay eaturecray isyay iendlyfray otay youyay andyay youryay ompanionscay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ollray initiativeyay orfay ethay eaturecray, whichyay ashay itsyay ownyay urnstay. 
 Ityay obeysyay anyyay erbalvay ommandscay atthay youyay issueyay otay ityay (onay actionyay equiredray ybay youyay), asyay onglay asyay eythay on'tday iolatevay itsyay alignmentyay. 
 Ifyay youyay on’tday issueyay anyyay ommandscay otay ethay eyfay eaturecray, ityay efendsday itselfyay omfray ostilehay eaturescray utbay otherwiseyay akestay onay actionsyay. Ifyay youryay oncentrationcay isyay okenbray, ethay eyfay eaturecray oesn’tday isappearday. 
 Insteadyay, youyay oselay ontrolcay ofyay ethay eyfay eaturecray, ityay ecomesbay ostilehay owardtay youyay andyay youryay ompanionscay, andyay ityay ightmay attackyay. 
 Anyay uncontrolledyay eyfay eaturecray an'tcay ebay ismissedday ybay youyay, andyay ityay isappearsday 1 ourhay afteryay youyay ummonedsay ityay. Ethay DMay ashay ethay eyfay eature’scray atisticsstay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 7thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay allengechay atingray increasesyay ybay 1 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 6thay. Onjurecay  Inormay  Elementals4th-levelyay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 90 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay ummonsay elementalsyay atthay appearyay inyay unoccupiedyay acesspay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay oosechay oneyay ethay ollowingfay optionsyay orfay whatyay appearsyay:•  Oneyay elementalyay ofyay allengechay atingray 2 oryay owerlay•  Wotay elementalsyay ofyay allengechay atingray 1 oryay owerlay•  Ourfay elementalsyay ofyay allengechay atingray 1/2 oryay owerlay•  Eightyay elementalsyay ofyay allengechay atingray 1/4 oryay owerlay. Anyay elementalyay ummonedsay ybay isthay ellspay isappearsday whenyay ityay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay oryay whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Ethay ummonedsay eaturescray areyay iendlyfray otay youyay andyay youryay ompanionscay. 
 Ollray initiativeyay orfay ethay ummonedsay eaturescray asyay ayay oupgray, whichyay ashay itsyay ownyay urnstay. 
 Eythay obeyyay anyyay erbalvay ommandscay atthay youyay issueyay otay emthay (onay actionyay equiredray ybay youyay). 
 Ifyay youyay on’tday issueyay anyyay ommandscay otay emthay, eythay efendday emselvesthay omfray ostilehay eaturescray, utbay otherwiseyay aketay onay actionsyay. Ethay DMay ashay ethay eaturescray' atisticsstay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ertaincay igher-levelhay ellspay otsslay, youyay oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ummoningsay optionsyay aboveyay, andyay oremay eaturescray appearyay: wicetay asyay anymay withyay ayay 6levelthlay otslay andyay eethray imestay asyay anymay withyay anyay 8levelthlay otslay. Onjurecay  Olley5th-levelvay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 150 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (oneyay iecepay ofyay ammunitionyay oryay oneyay ownthray weaponyay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay irefay ayay iecepay ofyay onmagicalnay ammunitionyay omfray ayay angedray weaponyay oryay owthray ayay onmagicalnay weaponyay intoyay ethay airyay andyay oosechay ayay ointpay withinyay angeray. 
 Undredshay ofyay uplicatesday ofyay ethay ammunitionyay oryay weaponyay allfay inyay ayay olleyvay omfray aboveyay andyay enthay isappearday. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 40-oot-radiusfay. 
20-oot-highfay ylindercay enteredcay onyay atthay ointpay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 8day8 amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
 Ethay amageday ypetay isyay ethay amesay asyay atthay ofyay ethay ammunitionyay oryay weaponyay. Onjurecay  Woodlandyay  Eings4th-levelbay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (oneyay ollyhay errybay erpay eaturecray ummonedsay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay ummonsay eyfay eaturescray atthay appearyay inyay unoccupiedyay acesspay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay optionsyay orfay whatyay appearsyay:•  Oneyay eyfay eaturecray ofyay allengechay atingray 2 oryay owerlay•  Wotay eyfay eaturescray ofyay allengechay atingray 1 oryay owerlay•  Ourfay eyfay eaturescray ofyay allengechay atingray 1/2 oryay owerlay•  Eightyay eyfay eaturescray ofyay allengechay atingray 1/4 oryay owerlay Ayay ummonedsay eaturecray isappearsday whenyay ityay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay oryay whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Ethay ummonedsay eaturescray areyay iendlyfray otay youyay andyay youryay ompanionscay. 
 Ollray initiativeyay orfay ethay ummonedsay eaturescray asyay ayay oupgray, whichyay avehay eirthay ownyay urnstay. 
 Eythay obeyyay anyyay erbalvay ommandscay atthay youyay issueyay otay emthay (onay actionyay equiredray ybay youyay). 
 Ifyay youyay on'tday issueyay anyyay ommandscay otay emthay, eythay efendday emselvesthay omfray ostilehay eaturescray, utbay otherwiseyay aketay onay actionsyay. Ethay DMay ashay ethay eaturescray’ atisticsstay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ertaincay igher-levelhay ellspay otsslay, youyay oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ummoningsay optionsyay aboveyay, andyay oremay eaturescray appearyay: wicetay asyay anymay withyay ayay 6levelthlay otslay andyay eethray imestay asyay anymay withyay anyay 8levelthlay otslay. Ontactcay  Otheryay  Aneplay 5levelthlay ivinationday (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday: 1 inutemay Youyay entallymay ontactcay ayay emigodday, ethay iritspay ofyay ayay ong-deadlay agesay, oryay omesay otheryay ysteriousmay entityyay omfray anotheryay aneplay. 
 Ontactingcay isthay extraplanaryay intelligenceyay ancay ainstray oryay evenyay eakbray youryay indmay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, akemay ayay DCay 15  Intelligenceyay avingsay owthray. 
ailurefay, youyay aketay 6day6 ychicpsay amageday andyay areyay insaneyay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray. 
 Whileyay insaneyay, youyay an’tcay aketay actionsyay, an’tcay understandyay whatyay otheryay eaturescray aysay, an’tcay eadray, andyay eakspay onlyyay inyay ibberishgay. 
Ayay eatergray estorationray ellspay astcay onyay youyay endsyay isthay effectyay. Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, youyay ancay askyay ethay entityyay upyay otay ivefay questionsyay. 
 Youyay ustmay askyay youryay questionsyay eforebay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Ethay DMay answersyay eachyay questionyay withyay oneyay wordyay, uchsay asyay “yesyay,” “onay,” “aybemay,” “evernay,” “irrelevantyay,” oryay “unclearyay” (ifyay ethay entityyay oesn’tday owknay ethay answeryay otay ethay questionyay). 
 Ifyay ayay one-wordyay answeryay wouldyay ebay isleadingmay, ethay DMay ightmay insteadyay offeryay ayay ortshay asephray asyay anyay answeryay. Ontagion5th-levelcay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentcay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 7 aysday Youryay ouchtay inflictsyay iseaseday. 
 Akemay ayay eleemay ellspay attackyay againstyay ayay eaturecray withinyay youryay eachray. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, youyay afflictyay ethay eaturecray withyay ayay iseaseday ofyay youryay oicechay omfray anyyay ofyay ethay onesyay escribedday elowbay. Atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay ethay arget’stay urnstay, ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Afteryay ailingfay eethray ofyay esethay avingsay owsthray, ethay isease’sday effectsyay astlay orfay ethay urationday, andyay ethay eaturecray opsstay akingmay esethay avessay. 
 Afteryay ucceedingsay onyay eethray ofyay esethay avingsay owsthray, ethay eaturecray ecoversray omfray ethay iseaseday, andyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Incesay isthay ellspay inducesyay ayay aturalnay iseaseday inyay itsyay argettay, anyyay effectyay atthay emovesray ayay iseaseday oryay otherwiseyay amelioratesyay ayay isease’sday effectsyay applyyay otay ityay. Indingblay  Icknesssay. 
 Ainpay ipsgray ethay eature’scray indmay, andyay itsyay eyesyay urntay ilkymay whiteyay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ashay isadvantageday onyay  Wisdomyay eckschay andyay  Wisdomyay avingsay owsthray andyay isyay indedblay. Ilthfay  Everfay. 
Ayay agingray everfay weepssay oughthray ethay eature’scray odybay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ashay isadvantageday onyay  Engthstray eckschay,  Engthstray avingsay owsthray, andyay attackyay ollsray atthay useyay  Engthstray. Eshflay  Otray. 
 Ethay eature’scray eshflay ecaysday. 
 Ethay eaturecray ashay isadvantageday onyay  Arismachay eckschay andyay ulnerabilityvay otay allyay amageday. Indfiremay. 
 Ethay eature’scray indmay ecomesbay everishfay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ashay isadvantageday onyay  Intelligenceyay eckschay andyay  Intelligenceyay avingsay owsthray, andyay ethay eaturecray ehavesbay asyay ifyay underyay ethay effectsyay ofyay ethay onfusioncay ellspay uringday ombatcay. Eizuresay. 
 Ethay eaturecray isyay overcomeyay withyay akingshay. Ethay eaturecray ashay isadvantageday onyay  Exterityday eckschay,  Exterityday avingsay owsthray, andyay attackyay ollsray atthay useyay  Exterityday. Imyslay  Oomday. 
 Ethay eaturecray eginsbay otay eedblay uncontrollablyyay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ashay isadvantageday onyay  Onstitutioncay eckschay andyay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owsthray. Inyay additionyay, wheneveryay ethay eaturecray akestay amageday, ityay isyay unnedstay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay itsyay extnay urntay. Ontingency6th-levelcay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay atuettestay ofyay yourselfyay arvedcay omfray ivoryyay andyay ecoratedday withyay emsgay worthyay atyay eastlay 1,500 gpay) Urationday: 10 aysday Oosechay ayay ellspay ofyay 5thay evellay oryay owerlay atthay youyay ancay astcay, atthay ashay ayay astingcay imetay ofyay 1 actionyay, andyay atthay ancay argettay youyay. 
 Youyay astcay atthay ell—calledspay ethay ontingentcay ell—asspay artpay ofyay astingcay ontingencycay, expendingyay ellspay otsslay orfay othbay, utbay ethay ontingentcay ellspay oesn'tday omecay intoyay effectyay. 
 Insteadyay, ityay akestay effectyay whenyay ayay ertaincay ircumstancecay occursyay. 
 Youyay escribeday atthay ircumstancecay whenyay youyay astcay ethay wotay ellsspay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay ontingencycay astcay withyay wateryay eathingbray ightmay ipulatestay atthay wateryay eathingbray omescay intoyay effectyay whenyay youyay areyay engulfedyay inyay wateryay oryay ayay imilarsay iquidlay. Ethay ontingentcay ellspay akestay effectyay immediatelyyay afteryay ethay ircumstancecay isyay etmay orfay ethay irstfay imetay, whetheryay oryay otnay youyay wantyay ityay otay. 
andyay enthay ontingencycay endsyay. Ethay ontingentcay ellspay akestay effectyay onlyyay onyay youyay, evenyay ifyay ityay ancay ormallynay argettay othersyay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay onlyyay oneyay ontingencycay ellspay atyay ayay imetay. 
 Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay againyay, ethay effectyay ofyay anotheryay ontingencycay ellspay onyay youyay endsyay. 
 Alsoyay, ontingencycay endsyay onyay youyay ifyay itsyay aterialmay omponentcay isyay everyay otnay onyay youryay ersonpay. Ontinualcay  Ameflay 2levelndlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ubyray ustday worthyay 50 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Untilyay ispelledday Ayay ameflay, equivalentyay inyay ightnessbray otay ayay orchtay, ingsspray orthfay omfray anyay objectyay atthay youyay ouchtay. 
 Ethay effectyay ookslay ikelay ayay egularray ameflay, utbay ityay eatescray onay eathay andyay oesn’tday useyay oxygenyay. 
Ayay ontinualcay ameflay ancay ebay overedcay oryay iddenhay utbay otnay otheredsmay oryay quenchedyay. Ontrolcay  Water4th-levelyay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 300 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay opdray ofyay wateryay andyay ayay inchpay ofyay ustday) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ontrolcay anyyay eestandingfray wateryay insideyay anyay areayay youyay oosechay atthay isyay ayay ubecay upyay otay 100 eetfay onyay ayay idesay. 
 Youyay ancay oosechay omfray anyyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay effectsyay whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay epeatray ethay amesay effectyay oryay oosechay ayay ifferentday oneyay. Oodflay. 
 Youyay ausecay ethay wateryay evellay ofyay allyay andingstay wateryay inyay ethay areayay otay iseray ybay asyay uchmay asyay 20 eetfay. 
 Ifyay ethay areayay includesyay ayay oreshay, ethay oodingflay wateryay illsspay overyay ontoyay ydray andlay. Ifyay youyay oosechay anyay areayay inyay ayay argelay odybay ofyay wateryay, youyay insteadyay eatecray ayay 20-ootfay alltay waveyay atthay avelstray omfray oneyay idesay ofyay ethay areayay otay ethay otheryay andyay enthay ashescray ownday. 
 Anyyay  Ugehay oryay allersmay ehiclesvay inyay ethay wave’syay athpay areyay arriedcay withyay ityay otay ethay otheryay idesay. 
 Anyyay  Ugehay oryay allersmay ehiclesvay uckstray ybay ethay waveyay avehay ayay 25 ercentpay ancechay ofyay apsizingcay. Ethay wateryay evellay emainsray elevatedyay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay oryay youyay oosechay ayay ifferentday effectyay. 
ayay waveyay, ethay waveyay epeatsray onyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay whileyay ethay oodflay effectyay astslay. Artpay  Wateryay. 
 Youyay ausecay wateryay inyay ethay areayay otay ovemay apartyay andyay eatecray ayay enchtray. 
 Ethay enchtray extendsyay acrossyay ethay ell’sspay areayay, andyay ethay eparatedsay wateryay ormsfay ayay wallyay otay eitheryay idesay. 
 Ethay enchtray emainsray untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay oryay youyay oosechay ayay ifferentday effectyay. 
 Ethay wateryay enthay owlyslay illsfay inyay ethay enchtray overyay ethay oursecay ofyay ethay extnay oundray untilyay ethay ormalnay wateryay evellay isyay estoredray. Edirectray  Owflay. 
 Youyay ausecay owingflay wateryay inyay ethay areayay otay ovemay inyay ayay irectionday youyay oosechay, evenyay ifyay ethay wateryay ashay otay owflay overyay obstaclesyay, upyay wallsyay, oryay inyay otheryay unlikelyyay irectionsday. 
 Ethay wateryay inyay ethay areayay ovesmay asyay youyay irectday ityay, utbay onceyay ityay ovesmay eyondbay ethay ell’sspay areayay, ityay esumesray itsyay owflay asedbay onyay ethay erraintay onditionscay. 
 Ethay wateryay ontinuescay otay ovemay inyay ethay irectionday youyay osechay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay oryay youyay oosechay ayay ifferentday effectyay. Whirlpoolyay. 
 Isthay effectyay equiresray ayay odybay ofyay wateryay atyay eastlay 50 eetfay quaresay andyay 25 eetfay eepday. 
 Youyay ausecay ayay whirlpoolyay otay ormfay inyay ethay entercay ofyay ethay areayay. 
 Ethay whirlpoolyay ormsfay ayay ortexvay atthay isyay 5 eetfay wideyay atyay ethay asebay, upyay otay 50 eetfay wideyay atyay ethay optay, andyay 25 eetfay alltay. 
 Anyyay eaturecray oryay objectyay inyay ethay wateryay andyay withinyay 25 eetfay ofyay ethay ortexvay isyay ulledpay 10 eetfay owardtay ityay. 
Ayay eaturecray ancay wimsay awayyay omfray ethay ortexvay ybay akingmay ayay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. Whenyay ayay eaturecray entersyay ethay ortexvay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay artsstay itsyay urntay erethay, ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Engthstray avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray akestay 2day8 udgeoningblay amageday andyay isyay aughtcay inyay ethay ortexvay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay eaturecray akestay alfhay amageday, andyay isn’tyay aughtcay inyay ethay ortexvay. 
Ayay eaturecray aughtcay inyay ethay ortexvay ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay ytray otay wimsay awayyay omfray ethay ortexvay asyay escribedday aboveyay, utbay ashay isadvantageday onyay ethay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay otay oday osay. Ethay irstfay imetay eachyay urntay atthay anyay objectyay entersyay ethay ortexvay, ethay objectyay akestay 2day8 udgeoningblay amageday; isthay amageday occursyay eachyay oundray ityay emainsray inyay ethay ortexvay. Ontrolcay  Weather8thyay- Ievelyay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray:  Elfsay (5-ilemay adiusray) Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (urningbay incenseyay andyay itsbay ofyay earthandyay woodyay ixedmay inyay wateryay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 8 ourshay Youyay aketay ontrolcay ofyay ethay weatheryay withinyay 5 ilesmay ofyay youyay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Youyay ustmay ebay outdoorsyay otay astcay isthay ellspay. 
 Ovingmay otay ayay aceplay whereyay youyay on’tday avehay ayay earclay athpay otay ethay yskay endsyay ethay ellspay earlyyay. Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, youyay angechay ethay urrentcay weatheryay onditionscay, whichyay areyay eterminedday ybay ethay DMay asedbay onyay ethay imateclay andyay easonsay. 
 Youyay ancay angechay ecipitationpray, emperaturetay, andyay windyay. 
 Ityay akestay 1day4 xay 10 inutesmay orfay ethay ewnay onditionscay otay aketay effectyay. 
 Onceyay eythay oday osay, youyay ancay angechay ethay onditionscay againyay. 
 Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay weatheryay aduallygray eturnsray otay ormalnay. Whenyay youyay angechay ethay weatheryay onditionscay, indfay ayay urrentcay onditioncay onyay ethay ollowingfay ablestay andyay angechay itsyay agestay ybay oneyay, upyay oryay ownday. 
 Whenyay angingchay ethay windyay, youyay ancay angechay itsyay irectionday. Ordoncay ofyay  Arrows2nd-levelyay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 5 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ourfay oryay oremay arrowsyay oryay oltsbay)  Urationday: 8 ourshay Youyay antplay ourfay iecespay ofyay onmagicalnay ammunitionyay— arrowsyay oryay ossbowcray olts—inbay ethay oundgray withinyay angeray andyay aylay agicmay uponyay emthay otay otectpray anyay areayay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, wheneveryay ayay eaturecray otheryay anthay youyay omescay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay ethay ammunitionyay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay endsyay itsyay urntay erethay, oneyay iecepay ofyay ammunitionyay iesflay upyay otay ikestray ityay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay aketay 1day6 iercingpay amageday. 
 Ethay iecepay ofyay ammunitionyay isyay enthay estroyedday. 
 Ethay ellspay endsyay whenyay onay ammunitionyay emainsray. Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay ancay esignateday anyyay eaturescray youyay oosechay, andyay ethay ellspay ignoresyay emthay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amountyay ofyay ammunitionyay atthay ancay ebay affectedyay increasesyay ybay wotay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Ounterspell3rd-levelcay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 eactionray, whichyay youyay aketay whenyay youyay eesay ayay eaturecray withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay astingcay ayay ellspay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay attemptyay otay interruptyay ayay eaturecray inyay ethay ocesspray ofyay astingcay ayay ellspay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray isyay astingcay ayay ellspay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay owerlay, itsyay ellspay ailsfay andyay ashay onay effectyay. 
 Ifyay ityay isyay astingcay ayay ellspay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, akemay anyay abilityyay eckchay usingyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay. 
 Ethay DCay equalsyay 10 + ethay ell’sspay evellay. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ethay eature’scray ellspay ailsfay andyay ashay onay effectyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Eatecray  Oodfay andyay  Water3rd-levelyay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay eatecray 45 oundspay ofyay oodfay andyay 30 allonsgay ofyay wateryay onyay ethay oundgray oryay inyay ontainerscay withinyay angeray, enoughyay otay ustainsay upyay otay ifteenfay umanoidshay oryay ivefay eedsstay orfay 24 ourshay. 
 Ethay oodfay isyay andblay utbay ourishingnay, andyay oilsspay ifyay uneatenyay afteryay 24 ourshay. 
 Ethay wateryay isyay eanclay andyay oesn’tday ogay adbay. Eatecray oryay  Estroyday  Water1st-levelyay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay opdray ofyay wateryay ifyay eatingcray wateryay oryay ayay ewfay ainsgray ofyay andsay ifyay estroyingday ityay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay eitheryay eatecray oryay estroyday wateryay. Eatecray  Wateryay. 
 Youyay eatecray upyay otay 10 allonsgay ofyay eanclay wateryay withinyay angeray inyay anyay openyay ontainercay. 
 Alternativelyyay, ethay wateryay allsfay asyay ainray inyay ayay 30-ootfay ubecay withinyay angeray, extinguishingyay exposedyay amesflay inyay ethay areayay. Estroyday  Wateryay. 
 Youyay estroyday upyay otay 10 allonsgay ofyay wateryay inyay anyay openyay ontainercay withinyay angeray. 
 Alternativelyyay, youyay estroyday ogfay inyay ayay 30-ootfay ubecay withinyay angeray. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay eatecray oryay estroyday 10 additionalyay allonsgay ofyay wateryay, oryay ethay izesay ofyay ethay ubecay increasesyay ybay 5 eetfay, orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Eatecray  Undead6th-levelyay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 10 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (oneyay ayclay otpay illedfay withyay avegray irtday, oneyay ayclay otpay illedfay withyay ackishbray wateryay, andyay oneyay 150 gpay ackblay onyxyay onestay orfay eachyay orpsecay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ancay astcay isthay ellspay onlyyay atyay ightnay. 
 Oosechay upyay otay eethray orpsescay ofyay  Ediummay oryay  Allsmay umanoidshay withinyay angeray. 
 Eachyay orpsecay ecomesbay ayay oulghay underyay youryay ontrolcay. 
( Ethay DMay ashay amegay atisticsstay orfay esethay eaturescray.) Asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay, youyay ancay entallymay ommandcay anyyay eaturecray youyay animatedyay withyay isthay ellspay ifyay ethay eaturecray isyay withinyay 120 eetfay ofyay youyay (ifyay youyay ontrolcay ultiplemay eaturescray, youyay ancay ommandcay anyyay oryay allyay ofyay emthay atyay ethay amesay imetay, issuingyay ethay amesay ommandcay otay eachyay oneyay). 
 Youyay ecideday whatyay actionyay ethay eaturecray willyay aketay andyay whereyay ityay willyay ovemay uringday itsyay extnay urntay, oryay youyay ancay issueyay ayay eneralgay ommandcay, uchsay asyay otay uardgay ayay articularpay amberchay oryay orridorcay. 
 Ifyay youyay issueyay onay ommandscay, ethay eaturecray onlyyay efendsday itselfyay againstyay ostilehay eaturescray. 
 Onceyay ivengay anyay orderyay, ethay eaturecray ontinuescay otay ollowfay ityay untilyay itsyay asktay isyay ompletecay. Ethay eaturecray isyay underyay youryay ontrolcay orfay 24 ourshay, afteryay whichyay ityay opsstay obeyingyay anyyay ommandcay youyay avehay ivengay ityay. 
 Otay aintainmay ontrolcay ofyay ethay eaturecray orfay anotheryay24 ourshay, youyay ustmay astcay isthay ellspay onyay ethay eaturecray eforebay ethay urrentcay 24-ourhay eriodpay endsyay. 
 Isthay useyay ofyay ethay ellspay eassertsray youryay ontrolcay overyay upyay otay eethray eaturescray youyay avehay animatedyay withyay isthay ellspay, atherray anthay animatingyay ewnay onesyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay 7levelthlay ellspay otslay, youyay ancay animateyay oryay eassertray ontrolcay overyay ourfay oulsghay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay anyay 8levelthlay ellspay otslay, youyay ancay animateyay oryay eassertray ontrolcay overyay ivefay oulsghay oryay wotay astsghay oryay wightsyay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay 9levelthlay ellspay otslay, youyay ancay animateyay oryay eassertray ontrolcay overyay ixsay oulsghay, eethray astsghay oryay wightsyay, oryay wotay ummiesmay. Eation5th-levelcray illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inytay iecepay ofyay attermay ofyay ethay amesay ypetay ofyay ethay itemyay youyay anplay otay eatecray) Urationday:  Ecialspay Youyay ullpay wispsyay ofyay adowshay aterialmay omfray ethay  Adowfellshay otay eatecray ayay onlivingnay objectyay ofyay egetablevay attermay withinyay angeray: oftsay oodsgay, operay, woodyay, oryay omethingsay imilarsay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay useyay isthay ellspay otay eatecray ineralmay objectsyay uchsay asyay onestay, ystalcray, oryay etalmay. 
 Ethay objectyay eatedcray ustmay ebay onay argerlay anthay ayay 5-ootfay ubecay, andyay ethay objectyay ustmay ebay ofyay ayay ormfay andyay aterialmay atthay youyay avehay eensay eforebay. Ethay urationday ependsday onyay ethay object’syay aterialmay. 
 Ifyay ethay objectyay isyay omposedcay ofyay ultiplemay aterialsmay, useyay ethay ortestshay urationday. Usingyay anyyay aterialmay eatedcray ybay isthay ellspay asyay anotheryay ell’sspay aterialmay omponentcay ausescay atthay ellspay otay ailfay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay ubecay increasesyay ybay 5 eetfay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 5thay. Owncray ofyay  Adness2nd-levelmay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Oneyay umanoidhay ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ecomebay armedchay ybay youyay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ethay argettay ancay actyay ormallynay onyay itsyay urntay ifyay youyay oosechay onay eaturecray oryay ifyay onenay areyay withinyay itsyay eachray. Onyay youryay ubsequentsay urnstay, youyay ustmay useyay youryay actionyay otay aintainmay ontrolcay overyay ethay argettay, oryay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Alsoyay, ethay argettay ancay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Usader’scray  Antle3rd-levelmay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Olyhay owerpay adiatesray omfray youyay inyay anyay aurayay withyay ayay 30-ootfay adiusray, awakeningyay oldnessbay inyay iendlyfray eaturescray. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay aurayay ovesmay withyay youyay, enteredcay onyay youyay. 
 Whileyay inyay ethay aurayay, eachyay onhostilenay eaturecray inyay ethay aurayay (includingyay youyay) ealsday anyay extrayay 1day4 adiantray amageday whenyay ityay itshay withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay. Urecay  Wounds1st-levelyay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay eaturecray youyay ouchtay egainsray ayay umbernay ofyay ithay ointspay equalyay otay 1day8 + youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay odifiermay. 
 Isthay ellspay ashay onay effectyay onyay undeadyay oryay onstructscay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay ealinghay increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Ancingday  Ightslay Evocationyay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay osphorusphay oryay wychwoodyay, oryay ayay owwormglay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay eatecray upyay otay ourfay orch-sizedtay ightslay withinyay angeray, akingmay emthay appearyay asyay orchestay, anternslay, oryay owingglay orbsyay atthay overhay inyay ethay airyay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay ombinecay ethay ourfay ightslay intoyay oneyay owingglay aguelyvay umanoidhay ormfay ofyay  Ediummay izesay. 
 Whicheveryay ormfay youyay oosechay, eachyay ightlay edsshay imday ightlay inyay ayay 10-ootfay adiusray. Asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay ovemay ethay ightslay upyay otay 60 eetfay otay ayay ewnay otspay withinyay angeray. 
Ayay ightlay ustmay ebay withinyay 20 eetfay ofyay anotheryay ightlay eatedcray ybay isthay ellspay, andyay ayay ightlay winksyay outyay ifyay ityay exceedsyay ethay ell’sspay angeray. Arkness2nd-levelday evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, May (atbay urfay andyay ayay opdray ofyay itchpay oryay iecepay ofyay oalcay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Agicalmay arknessday eadsspray omfray ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray otay illfay ayay 15-oot-radiusfay eresphay orfay edurationthay. 
 Ethay arknessday eadsspray aroundyay orners.Acay eaturecray withyay arkvisionday an’tcay eesay oughthray isthay arknessday, andyay onmagicalnay ightlay an’tcay illuminateyay ityay. Ifyay ethay ointpay youyay oosechay isyay onyay anyay objectyay youyay areyay oldinghay oryay oneyay atthay isn’tyay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay, ethay arknessday emanatesyay omfray ethay objectyay andyay ovesmay withyay ityay. 
 Ompletelycay overingcay ethay ourcesay ofyay ethay arknessday withyay anyay opaqueyay objectyay, uchsay asyay ayay owlbay oryay ayay elmhay, ocksblay ethay arknessday. Ifyay anyyay ofyay isthay ell’sspay areayay overlapsyay withyay anyay areayay ofyay ightlay eatedcray ybay ayay ellspay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay owerlay, ethay ellspay atthay eatedcray ethay ightlay isyay ispelledday. Arkvision2nd-levelday ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (eitheryay ayay inchpay ofyay ieddray arrotcay oryay anyay agateyay) Urationday: 8 ourshay Youyay ouchtay ayay willingyay eaturecray otay antgray ityay ethay abilityyay otay eesay inyay ethay arkday. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, atthay eaturecray ashay arkvisionday outyay otay ayay angeray ofyay 60 eetfay. Aylight3rd-levelday evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 ourhay Ayay 60-oot-radiusfay eresphay ofyay ightlay eadsspray outyay omfray ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay eresphay isyay ightbray ightlay andyay edsshay imday ightlay orfay anyay additionalyay 60 eetfay. Ifyay youyay osechay ayay ointpay onyay anyay objectyay youyay areyay oldinghay oryay oneyay atthay isn’tyay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay, ethay ightlay inesshay omfray ethay objectyay andyay ovesmay withyay ityay. 
 Angeray: 150 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inytay allbay ofyay atbay uanogay andyay ulfursay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ayay eambay ofyay yellowyay ightlay ashesflay omfray youryay ointingpay ingerfay, enthay ondensescay otay ingerlay atyay ayay osenchay ointpay withinyay angeray asyay ayay owingglay eadbay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, eitheryay ecausebay youryay oncentrationcay isyay okenbray oryay ecausebay youyay ecideday otay endyay ityay, ethay eadbay ossomsblay withyay ayay owlay oarray intoyay anyay explosionyay ofyay ameflay atthay eadsspray aroundyay ornerscay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 20-oot-radiusfay eresphay enteredcay onyay atthay ointpay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay irefay amageday equalyay otay ethay otaltay accumulatedyay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Ethay ell’sspay asebay amageday isyay 12day6. 
 Ifyay atyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay urntay ethay eadbay ashay otnay yetyay etonatedday, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day6. Ifyay ethay owingglay eadbay isyay ouchedtay eforebay ethay intervalyay ashay expiredyay, ethay eaturecray ouchingtay ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay ellspay endsyay immediatelyyay, ausingcay ethay eadbay otay eruptyay inyay ameflay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay eaturecray ancay owthray ethay eadbay upyay otay 40 eetfay. 
 Whenyay ityay ikesstray ayay eaturecray oryay ayay olidsay objectyay, ethay ellspay endsyay, andyay ethay eadbay explodesyay. Ethay irefay amagesday objectsyay inyay ethay areayay andyay ignitesyay ammableflay objectsyay atthay aren’tyay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 8thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay asebay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day6 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 7thay. Emiplane8th-levelday onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Say  Urationday: 1 ourhay Youyay eatecray ayay adowyshay oorday onyay ayay atflay olidsay urfacesay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay oorday isyay argelay enoughyay otay allowyay  Ediummay eaturescray otay asspay oughthray unhinderedyay. 
 Whenyay openedyay, ethay oorday eadslay otay ayay emiplaneday atthay appearsyay otay ebay anyay emptyyay oomray 30 eetfay inyay eachyay imensionday, ademay ofyay woodyay oryay onestay. 
 Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay oorday isappearsday, andyay anyyay eaturescray oryay objectsyay insideyay ethay emiplaneday emainray appedtray erethay, asyay ethay oorday alsoyay isappearsday omfray ethay otheryay idesay. Eachyay imetay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay ancay eatecray ayay ewnay emiplaneday, oryay avehay ethay adowyshay oorday onnectcay otay ayay emiplaneday youyay eatedcray withyay ayay eviouspray astingcay ofyay isthay ellspay. 
 Additionallyyay, ifyay youyay owknay ethay aturenay andyay ontentscay ofyay ayay emiplaneday eatedcray ybay ayay astingcay ofyay isthay ellspay ybay anotheryay eaturecray, youyay ancay avehay ethay adowyshay oorday onnectcay otay itsyay emiplaneday insteadyay. Estructiveday  Wave5th-levelyay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (30-ootfay adiusray) Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ikestray ethay oundgray, eatingcray ayay urstbay ofyay ivineday energyyay atthay ipplesray outwardyay omfray youyay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray youyay oosechay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray oryay aketay 5day6 underthay amageday, asyay wellyay asyay 5day6 adiantray oryay ecroticnay amageday (youryay oicechay), andyay ebay ockedknay onepray. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay ucceedssay onyay itsyay avingsay owthray akestay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday andyay isn’tyay ockedknay onepray. Etectday  Evilyay andyay  Ood1st-levelgay ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Orfay ethay urationday, youyay owknay ifyay erethay isyay anyay aberrationyay, elestialcay, elementalyay, eyfay, iendfay, oryay undeadyay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay, asyay wellyay asyay whereyay ethay eaturecray isyay ocatedlay. 
 Imilarlysay, youyay owknay ifyay erethay isyay ayay aceplay oryay objectyay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay atthay ashay eenbay agicallymay onsecratedcay oryay esecratedday. Ethay ellspay ancay enetratepay ostmay arriersbay, utbay ityay isyay ockedblay ybay 1 ootfay ofyay onestay, 1 inchyay ofyay ommoncay etalmay, ayay inthay eetshay ofyay eadlay, oryay 3 eetfay ofyay woodyay oryay irtday. Etectday  Agic1st-levelmay ivinationday (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Orfay ethay urationday, youyay ensesay ethay esencepray ofyay agicmay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Ifyay youyay ensesay agicmay inyay isthay wayyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay eesay ayay aintfay aurayay aroundyay anyyay isiblevay eaturecray oryay objectyay inyay ethay areayay atthay earsbay agicmay, andyay youyay earnlay itsyay oolschay ofyay agicmay, ifyay anyyay. Ethay ellspay ancay enetratepay ostmay arriersbay, utbay ityay isyay ockedblay ybay 1 ootfay ofyay onestay, 1 inchyay ofyay ommoncay etalmay, ayay inthay eetshay ofyay eadlay, oryay 3 eetfay ofyay woodyay oryay irtday. Etectday  Oisonpay andyay  Isease1st-levelday ivinationday (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay yewyay eaflay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Orfay ethay urationday, youyay ancay ensesay ethay esencepray andyay ocationlay ofyay oisonspay, oisonouspay eaturescray, andyay iseasesday withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, youyay ancay eadray ethay oughtsthay ofyay ertaincay eaturescray. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay andyay asyay youryay actionyay onyay eachyay urntay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay ocusfay youryay indmay onyay anyyay oneyay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray youyay oosechay ashay anyay  Intelligenceyay ofyay3 oryay owerlay oryay oesn’tday eakspay anyyay anguagelay, ethay eaturecray isyay unaffectedyay. Youyay initiallyyay earnlay ethay urfacesay oughtsthay ofyay ethay eature—whatcray isyay ostmay onyay itsyay indmay inyay atthay omentmay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay eitheryay iftshay youryay attentionyay otay anotheryay eature’scray oughtsthay oryay attemptyay otay obepray eeperday intoyay ethay amesay eature’scray indmay. 
 Ifyay youyay obepray eeperday, ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay, youyay aingay insightyay intoyay itsyay easoningray (ifyay anyyay), itsyay emotionalyay atestay, andyay omethingsay atthay oomslay argelay inyay itsyay indmay (uchsay asyay omethingsay ityay worriesyay overyay, oveslay, oryay ateshay). 
 Ifyay ityay ucceedssay, ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Eitheryay wayyay, ethay argettay owsknay atthay youyay areyay obingpray intoyay itsyay indmay, andyay unlessyay youyay iftshay youryay attentionyay otay anotheryay eature’scray oughtsthay, ethay eaturecray ancay useyay itsyay actionyay onyay itsyay urntay otay akemay anyay  Intelligenceyay eckchay ontestedcay ybay youryay  Intelligenceyay eckchay; ifyay ityay ucceedssay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Questionsyay erballyvay irectedday atyay ethay argettay eaturecray aturallynay apeshay ethay oursecay ofyay itsyay oughtsthay, osay isthay ellspay isyay articularlypay effectiveyay asyay artpay ofyay anyay interrogationyay. Youyay ancay alsoyay useyay isthay ellspay otay etectday ethay esencepray ofyay inkingthay eaturescray youyay an’tcay eesay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay oryay asyay youryay actionyay uringday ethay urationday, youyay ancay earchsay orfay oughtsthay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Ethay ellspay ancay enetratepay arriersbay, utbay 2 eetfay ofyay ockray, 2 inchesyay ofyay anyyay etalmay otheryay anthay eadlay, oryay ayay inthay eetshay ofyay eadlay ocksblay youyay. 
 Youyay an’tcay etectday ayay eaturecray withyay anyay  Intelligenceyay ofyay 3 oryay owerlay oryay oneyay atthay oesn’tday eakspay anyyay anguagelay. Onceyay youyay etectday ethay esencepray ofyay ayay eaturecray inyay isthay wayyay, youyay ancay eadray itsyay oughtsthay orfay ethay estray ofyay ethay urationday asyay escribedday aboveyay, evenyay ifyay youyay an’tcay eesay ityay, utbay ityay ustmay illstay ebay withinyay angeray. Imensionday  Oor4th-levelday onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 500 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay eleporttay yourselfyay omfray youryay urrentcay ocationlay otay anyyay otheryay otspay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay arriveyay atyay exactlyyay ethay otspay esiredday. 
 Ityay ancay ebay ayay aceplay youyay ancay eesay, oneyay youyay ancay isualizevay, oryay oneyay youyay ancay escribeday ybay atingstay istanceday andyay irectionday, uchsay asyay “200 eetfay aightstray ownwardday” oryay “upwardyay otay ethay orthwestnay atyay ayay 45-egreeday angleyay, 300 eetfay.” Youyay ancay ingbray alongyay objectsyay asyay onglay asyay eirthay weightyay oesn’tday exceedyay whatyay youyay ancay arrycay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay ingbray oneyay willingyay eaturecray ofyay youryay izesay oryay allersmay whoyay isyay arryingcay eargay upyay otay itsyay arryingcay apacitycay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ustmay ebay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay. Ifyay youyay wouldyay arriveyay inyay ayay aceplay alreadyyay occupiedyay ybay anyay objectyay oryay ayay eaturecray, youyay andyay anyyay eaturecray avelingtray withyay youyay eachyay aketay 4day6 orcefay amageday, andyay ethay ellspay ailsfay otay eleporttay youyay. Isguiseday  Elf1st-levelsay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 ourhay Youyay akemay yourself—includingyay youryay othingclay, armoryay, weaponsyay, andyay otheryay elongingsbay onyay youryay erson—lookpay ifferentday untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay oryay untilyay youyay useyay youryay actionyay otay ismissday ityay. 
 Youyay ancay eemsay 1 ootfay ortershay oryay allertay andyay ancay appearyay inthay, atfay, oryay inyay etweenbay. 
 Youyay an’tcay angechay youryay odybay ypetay, osay youyay ustmay adoptyay ayay ormfay atthay ashay ethay amesay asicbay arrangementyay ofyay imbslay. 
 Otherwiseyay, ethay extentyay ofyay ethay illusionyay isyay upyay otay youyay. Ethay angeschay wroughtyay ybay isthay ellspay ailfay otay oldhay upyay otay ysicalphay inspectionyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay useyay isthay ellspay otay addyay ayay athay otay youryay outfityay, objectsyay asspay oughthray ethay athay, andyay anyoneyay whoyay ouchestay ityay wouldyay eelfay othingnay oryay wouldyay eelfay youryay eadhay andyay airhay. 
 Ifyay youyay useyay isthay ellspay otay appearyay innerthay anthay youyay areyay, ethay andhay ofyay omeonesay whoyay eachesray outyay otay ouchtay youyay wouldyay umpbay intoyay youyay whileyay ityay wasyay eeminglysay illstay inyay idairmay. Otay iscernday atthay youyay areyay isguisedday, ayay eaturecray ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay inspectyay youryay appearanceyay andyay ustmay ucceedsay onyay anyay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. Isintegrate6th-levelday ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay odestonelay andyay ayay inchpay ofyay ustday)  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay inthay eengray ayray ingsspray omfray youryay ointingpay ingerfay otay ayay argettay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay argettay ancay ebay ayay eaturecray, anyay objectyay, oryay ayay eationcray ofyay agicalmay orcefay, uchsay asyay ethay wallyay eatedcray ybay wallyay ofyay orce.Afay eaturecray argetedtay ybay isthay ellspay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay argettay akestay 10day6 + 40 orcefay amageday. 
 Ifyay isthay amageday educesray ethay argettay otay 0 ithay ointspay, ityay isyay isintegrated.Aday isintegratedday eaturecray andyay everythingyay ityay isyay wearingyay andyay arryingcay, exceptyay agicmay itemsyay, areyay educedray otay ayay ilepay ofyay inefay aygray ustday. 
 Ethay eaturecray ancay ebay estoredray otay ifelay onlyyay ybay eansmay ofyay ayay uetray esurrectionray oryay ayay wishyay ellspay. Isthay ellspay automaticallyyay isintegratesday ayay  Argelay oryay allersmay onmagicalnay objectyay oryay ayay eationcray ofyay agicalmay orcefay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay ayay  Ugehay oryay argerlay objectyay oryay eationcray ofyay orcefay, isthay ellspay isintegratesday ayay 10-oot-cubefay ortionpay ofyay ityay. 
Ayay agicmay itemyay isyay unaffectedyay ybay isthay ellspay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (olyhay wateryay oryay owderedpay ilversay andyay ironyay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Immeringshay energyyay urroundssay andyay otectspray youyay omfray eyfay, undeadyay, andyay eaturescray originatingyay omfray eyondbay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, elestialscay, elementalsyay, eyfay, iendsfay, andyay undeadyay avehay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay youyay. Youyay ancay endyay ethay ellspay earlyyay ybay usingyay eitheryay ofyay ethay ollowingfay ecialspay unctionsfay. Eakbray  Enchantmentyay. 
 Asyay youryay actionyay, youyay ouchtay ayay eaturecray youyay ancay eachray atthay isyay armedchay, ightenedfray, oryay ossessedpay ybay ayay elestialcay, anyay elementalyay, ayay eyfay, ayay iendfay, oryay anyay undeadyay. 
 Ethay eaturecray youyay ouchtay isyay onay ongerlay armedchay, ightenedfray, oryay ossessedpay ybay uchsay eaturescray. Ismissalday. 
 Asyay youryay actionyay, akemay ayay eleemay ellspay attackyay againstyay ayay elestialcay, anyay elementalyay, ayay eyfay, ayay iendfay, oryay anyay undeadyay youyay ancay eachray. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, youyay attemptyay otay ivedray ethay eaturecray ackbay otay itsyay omehay aneplay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray oryay ebay entsay ackbay otay itsyay omehay aneplay (ifyay ityay isn'tyay erethay alreadyyay). 
 Ifyay eythay aren’tyay onyay eirthay omehay aneplay, undeadyay areyay entsay otay ethay  Adowfellshay, andyay eyfay areyay entsay otay ethay  Eywildfay. Ispelday  Agic3rd-levelmay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Oosechay oneyay eaturecray, objectyay, oryay agicalmay effectyay withinyay angeray. 
 Anyyay ellspay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay owerlay onyay ethay argettay endsyay. 
 Orfay eachyay ellspay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay onyay ethay argettay, akemay anyay abilityyay eckchay usingyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay. 
 Ethay DCay equalsyay 10 + ethay ell’sspay evellay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay eckchay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay automaticallyyay endyay ethay effectsyay ofyay ayay ellspay onyay ethay argettay ifyay ethay ell’sspay evellay isyay equalyay otay oryay esslay anthay ethay evellay ofyay ethay ellspay otslay youyay usedyay. Issonantday  Whispers1st-levelyay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay whisperyay ayay iscordantday elodymay atthay onlyyay oneyay eaturecray ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray ancay earhay, wrackingyay ityay withyay erribletay ainpay. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ityay akestay 3day6 ychicpsay amageday andyay ustmay immediatelyyay useyay itsyay eactionray, ifyay availableyay, otay ovemay asyay arfay asyay itsyay eedspay allowsyay awayyay omfray youyay. 
 Ethay eaturecray oesn’tday ovemay intoyay obviouslyyay angerousday oundgray, uchsay asyay ayay irefay oryay ayay itpay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay argettay akestay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday andyay oesn’tday avehay otay ovemay awayyay. 
Ayay eafenedday eaturecray automaticallyyay ucceedssay onyay ethay avesay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day6 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Ivination4th-levelday ivinationday (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (incenseyay andyay ayay acrificialsay offeringyay appropriateyay otay youryay eligionray, ogethertay worthyay atyay eastlay 25 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youryay agicmay andyay anyay offeringyay utpay youyay inyay ontactcay withyay ayay odgay oryay ayay od’sgay ervantssay. 
 Youyay askyay ayay inglesay questionyay oncerningcay ayay ecificspay oalgay, eventyay, oryay activityyay otay occuryay withinyay 7 aysday. 
 Ethay DMay offersyay ayay uthfultray eplyray. 
 Ethay eplyray ightmay ebay ayay ortshay asephray, ayay ypticcray ymerhay, oryay anyay omenyay. Ethay ellspay oesn’tday aketay intoyay accountyay anyyay ossiblepay ircumstancescay atthay ightmay angechay ethay outcomeyay, uchsay asyay ethay astingcay ofyay additionalyay ellsspay oryay ethay osslay oryay aingay ofyay ayay ompanioncay. Ifyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay wotay oryay oremay imestay eforebay inishingfay youryay extnay onglay estray, erethay isyay ayay umulativecay 25 ercentpay ancechay orfay eachyay astingcay afteryay ethay irstfay atthay youyay etgay ayay andomray eadingray. 
 Ethay DMay akesmay isthay ollray inyay ecretsay. Ivineday  Avor1st-levelfay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youryay ayerpray empowersyay youyay withyay ivineday adianceray. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youryay weaponyay attacksyay ealday anyay extrayay 1day4 adiantray amageday onyay ayay ithay. Ivineday  Word7th-levelyay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay utteryay ayay ivineday wordyay, imbuedyay withyay ethay owerpay atthay apedshay ethay worldyay atyay ethay awnday ofyay eationcray. 
 Oosechay anyyay umbernay ofyay eaturescray youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Eachyay eaturecray atthay ancay earhay youyay ustmay akemay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray. 
 Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay attemptyay otay eguilebay ayay eastbay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ebay armedchay ybay youyay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ifyay youyay oryay eaturescray atthay areyay iendlyfray otay youyay areyay ightingfay ityay, ityay ashay advantageyay onyay ethay avingsay owthray. Whileyay ethay eastbay isyay armedchay, youyay avehay ayay elepathictay inklay withyay ityay asyay onglay asyay ethay wotay ofyay youyay areyay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay isthay elepathictay inklay otay issueyay ommandscay otay ethay eaturecray whileyay youyay areyay onsciouscay (onay actionyay equiredray), whichyay ityay oesday itsyay estbay otay obeyyay. 
 Youyay ancay ecifyspay ayay implesay andyay eneralgay oursecay ofyay actionyay, uchsay asyay “ Attackyay atthay eaturecray,” “ Unray overyay erethay,” oryay “ Etchfay atthay objectyay.”  Ifyay ethay eaturecray ompletescay ethay orderyay andyay oesn’tday eceiveray urtherfay irectionday omfray youyay, ityay efendsday andyay eservespray itselfyay otay ethay estbay ofyay itsyay abilityyay. Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay aketay otaltay andyay ecisepray ontrolcay ofyay ethay argettay. 
 Untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay, ethay eaturecray akestay onlyyay ethay actionsyay youyay oosechay, andyay oesn’tday oday anythingyay atthay youyay on’tday allowyay ityay otay oday. 
 Uringday isthay imetay, youyay ancay alsoyay ausecay ethay eaturecray otay useyay ayay eactionray, utbay isthay equiresray youyay otay useyay youryay ownyay eactionray asyay wellyay. Eachyay imetay ethay argettay akestay amageday, ityay akesmay ayay ewnay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray againstyay ethay ellspay. 
 Ifyay ethay avingsay owthray ucceedssay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay withyay ayay 5levelthlay ellspay otslay, ethay urationday isyay oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay. 
 Whenyay youyay useyay ayay 6levelthlay ellspay otslay, ethay urationday isyay oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay. 
 Whenyay youyay useyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 7thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay urationday isyay oncentrationcay, upyay otay 8 ourshay. Ominateday  Onster8th-levelmay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay attemptyay otay eguilebay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ebay armedchay ybay youyay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ifyay youyay oryay eaturescray atthay areyay iendlyfray otay youyay areyay ightingfay ityay, ityay ashay advantageyay onyay ethay avingsay owthray. Whileyay ethay eaturecray isyay armedchay, youyay avehay ayay elepathictay inklay withyay ityay asyay onglay asyay ethay wotay ofyay youyay areyay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay isthay elepathictay inklay otay issueyay ommandscay otay ethay eaturecray whileyay youyay areyay onsciouscay (onay actionyay equiredray), whichyay ityay oesday itsyay estbay otay obeyyay. 
 Youyay ancay ecifyspay ayay implesay andyay eneralgay oursecay ofyay actionyay, uchsay asyay “ Attackyay atthay eaturecray,” “ Unray overyay erethay,” oryay “ Etchfay atthay objectyay.”  Ifyay ethay eaturecray ompletescay ethay orderyay andyay oesn’tday eceiveray urtherfay irectionday omfray youyay, ityay efendsday andyay eservespray itselfyay otay ethay estbay ofyay itsyay abilityyay. Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay aketay otaltay andyay ecisepray ontrolcay ofyay ethay argettay. 
 Untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay, ethay eaturecray akestay onlyyay ethay actionsyay youyay oosechay, andyay oesn’tday oday anythingyay atthay youyay on’tday allowyay ityay otay oday. 
 Uringday isthay imetay, youyay ancay alsoyay ausecay ethay eaturecray otay useyay ayay eactionray, utbay isthay equiresray youyay otay useyay youryay ownyay eactionray asyay wellyay. Eachyay imetay ethay argettay akestay amageday, ityay akesmay ayay ewnay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray againstyay ethay ellspay. 
 Ifyay ethay avingsay owthray ucceedssay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay withyay ayay 9levelthlay ellspay otslay, ethay urationday isyay oncentrationcay, upyay otay 8 ourshay. Ominateday  Erson5th-levelpay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay attemptyay otay eguilebay ayay umanoidhay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ebay armedchay ybay youyay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ifyay youyay oryay eaturescray atthay areyay iendlyfray otay youyay areyay ightingfay ityay, ityay ashay advantageyay onyay ethay avingsay owthray. Whileyay ethay argettay isyay armedchay, youyay avehay ayay elepathictay inklay withyay ityay asyay onglay asyay ethay wotay ofyay youyay areyay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay isthay elepathictay inklay otay issueyay ommandscay otay ethay eaturecray whileyay youyay areyay onsciouscay (onay actionyay equiredray), whichyay ityay oesday itsyay estbay otay obeyyay. 
 Youyay ancay ecifyspay ayay implesay andyay eneralgay oursecay ofyay actionyay, uchsay asyay “ Attackyay atthay eaturecray,” “ Unray overyay erethay,” oryay “ Etchfay atthay objectyay.”  Ifyay ethay eaturecray ompletescay ethay orderyay andyay oesn’tday eceiveray urtherfay irectionday omfray youyay, ityay efendsday andyay eservespray itselfyay otay ethay estbay ofyay itsyay abilityyay. Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay aketay otaltay andyay ecisepray ontrolcay ofyay ethay argettay. 
 Untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay, ethay eaturecray akestay onlyyay ethay actionsyay youyay oosechay, andyay oesn’tday oday anythingyay atthay youyay on’tday allowyay ityay otay oday. 
 Uringday isthay imetay youyay ancay alsoyay ausecay ethay eaturecray otay useyay ayay eactionray, utbay isthay equiresray youyay otay useyay youryay ownyay eactionray asyay wellyay. Eachyay imetay ethay argettay akestay amageday, ityay akesmay ayay ewnay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray againstyay ethay ellspay. 
 Ifyay ethay avingsay owthray ucceedssay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay 6levelthlay ellspay otslay, ethay urationday isyay oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay. 
 Whenyay youyay useyay ayay 7levelthlay ellspay otslay, ethay urationday isyay oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay. 
 Whenyay youyay useyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 8thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay urationday isyay oncentrationcay, upyay otay 8 ourshay. Awmij’sdray  Instantyay  Ummons6th-levelsay onjurationcay (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay apphiresay worthyay 1,000 gpay)  Urationday:  Untilyay ispelledday Youyay ouchtay anyay objectyay weighingyay 10 oundspay oryay esslay whoseyay ongestlay imensionday isyay 6 eetfay oryay esslay. 
 Ethay ellspay eaveslay anyay invisibleyay arkmay onyay itsyay urfacesay andyay invisiblyyay inscribesyay ethay amenay ofyay ethay itemyay onyay ethay apphiresay youyay useyay asyay ethay aterialmay omponentcay. 
 Eachyay imetay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay ustmay useyay ayay ifferentday apphiresay. Atyay anyyay imetay ereafterthay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay eakspay ethay item’syay amenay andyay ushcray ethay apphiresay. 
 Ifyay anotheryay eaturecray isyay oldinghay oryay arryingcay ethay itemyay, ushingcray ethay apphiresay oesn’tday ansporttray ethay itemyay otay youyay, utbay insteadyay youyay earnlay whoyay ethay eaturecray ossessingpay ethay objectyay isyay andyay oughlyray whereyay atthay eaturecray isyay ocatedlay atyay atthay omentmay. Ispelday agicmay oryay ayay imilarsay effectyay uccessfullysay appliedyay otay ethay apphiresay endsyay isthay ell’sspay effectyay. Eam5th-leveldray illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Ecialspay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay andfulhay ofyay andsay, ayay abday ofyay inkyay, andyay ayay writingyay quillyay uckedplay omfray ayay eepingslay irdbay)  Urationday: 8 ourshay Isthay ellspay apesshay ayay eature’scray eamsdray. 
 Oosechay ayay eaturecray ownknay otay youyay asyay ethay argettay ofyay isthay ellspay. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay ebay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay asyay youyay. 
 Eaturescray atthay on’tday eepslay, uchsay asyay elvesyay, an’tcay ebay ontactedcay ybay isthay ellspay. 
 Youyay, oryay ayay willingyay eaturecray youyay ouchtay, entersyay ayay ancetray atestay, actingyay asyay ayay essengermay. 
 Whileyay inyay ethay ancetray, ethay essengermay isyay awareyay ofyay ishay oryay erhay urroundingssay, utbay an’tcay aketay actionsyay oryay ovemay. Ifyay ethay argettay isyay asleepyay, ethay essengermay appearsyay inyay ethay arget’stay eamsdray andyay ancay onversecay withyay ethay argettay asyay onglay asyay ityay emainsray asleepyay, oughthray ethay urationday ofyay ethay ellspay. 
 Ethay essengermay ancay alsoyay apeshay ethay environmentyay ofyay ethay eamdray, eatingcray andscapeslay, objectsyay, andyay otheryay imagesyay. 
 Ethay essengermay ancay emergeyay omfray ethay ancetray atyay anyyay imetay, endingyay ethay effectyay ofyay ethay ellspay earlyyay. 
 Ethay argettay ecallsray ethay eamdray erfectlypay uponyay wakingyay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay awakeyay whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, ethay essengermay owsknay ityay, andyay ancay eitheryay endyay ethay ancetray (andyay ethay ellspay) oryay waityay orfay ethay argettay otay allfay asleepyay, atyay whichyay ointpay ethay essengermay appearsyay inyay ethay arget’stay eamsdray. Youyay ancay akemay ethay essengermay appearyay onstrousmay andyay errifyingtay otay ethay argettay. 
 Ifyay youyay oday, ethay essengermay ancay eliverday ayay essagemay ofyay onay oremay anthay entay wordsyay andyay enthay ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, echoesyay ofyay ethay antasmalphay onstrositymay awnspay ayay ightmarenay atthay astslay ethay urationday ofyay ethay arget’stay eepslay andyay eventspray ethay argettay omfray aininggay anyyay enefitbay omfray atthay estray. 
 Inyay additionyay, whenyay ethay argettay wakesyay upyay, ityay akestay 3day6 ychicpsay amageday. Ifyay youyay avehay ayay odybay artpay, ocklay ofyay airhay, ippingclay omfray ayay ailnay, oryay imilarsay ortionpay ofyay ethay arget’stay odybay, ethay argettay akesmay itsyay avingsay owthray withyay isadvantageday. Uidcraftdray Ansmutationtray antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Whisperingyay otay ethay iritsspay ofyay aturenay, youyay eatecray oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay effectsyay withinyay angeray:•  Youyay eatecray ayay inytay, armlesshay ensorysay effectyay atthay edictspray whatyay ethay weatheryay willyay ebay atyay youryay ocationlay orfay ethay extnay 24 ourshay. 
 Ethay effectyay ightmay anifestmay asyay ayay oldengay orbforyay earclay iesskay, ayay oudclay orfay ainray, allingfay owflakessnay orfay owsnay, andyay osay onyay. 
 Isthay effectyay ersistspay orfay 1 oundray.•  Youyay instantlyyay akemay ayay owerflay ossomblay, ayay eedsay odpay openyay, oryay ayay eaflay udbay oomblay.•  Youyay eatecray anyay instantaneousyay, armlesshay ensorysay effectyay, uchsay asyay allingfay eaveslay, ayay uffpay ofyay windyay, ethay oundsay ofyay ayay allsmay animalyay, oryay ethay aintfay odoryay ofyay unkskay. 
 Ethay effectyay ustmay itfay inyay ayay 5-ootfay ubecay.•  Youyay instantlyyay ightlay oryay uffsnay outyay ayay andlecay, ayay orchtay, oryay ayay allsmay ampfirecay. Earthquake8th-levelyay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 500 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay irtday, ayay iecepay ofyay ockray, andyay ayay umplay ofyay ayclay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay eatecray ayay eismicsay isturbanceday atyay ayay ointpay onyay ethay oundgray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, anyay intenseyay emortray ipsray oughthray ethay oundgray inyay ayay 100-oot-radiusfay irclecay enteredcay onyay atthay ointpay andyay akesshay eaturescray andyay ucturesstray inyay ontactcay withyay ethay oundgray inyay atthay areayay. Ethay oundgray inyay ethay areayay ecomesbay ifficultday erraintay. Eachyay eaturecray onyay ethay oundgray atthay isyay oncentratingcay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eature’scray oncentrationcay isyay okenbray. Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay andyay atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay urntay youyay endspay oncentratingcay onyay ityay, eachyay eaturecray onyay ethay oundgray inyay ethay areayay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray isyay ockedknay onepray. Isthay ellspay ancay avehay additionalyay effectsyay ependingday onyay ethay erraintay inyay ethay areayay, asyay eterminedday ybay ethay DMay. Issuresfay. 
 Issuresfay openyay oughoutthray ethay ell’sspay areayay atyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay afteryay youyay astcay ethay ellspay. 
Ayay otaltay ofyay 1day6 uchsay issuresfay openyay inyay ocationslay osenchay ybay ethay DMay. 
 Eachyay isyay 1day10 xay 10 eetfay eepday, 10 eetfay wideyay, andyay extendsyay omfray oneyay edgeyay ofyay ethay ell’sspay areayay otay ethay oppositeyay ide.Asay eaturecray andingstay onyay ayay otspay whereyay ayay issurefay opensyay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay allfay inyay. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay uccessfullysay avessay ovesmay withyay ethay issure’sfay edgeyay asyay ityay opens.Ayay issurefay atthay opensyay eneathbay ayay ucturestray ausescay ityay otay automaticallyyay ollapsecay (eesay elowbay). Ucturesstray. 
 Ethay emortray ealsday 50 udgeoningblay amageday otay anyyay ucturestray inyay ontactcay withyay ethay oundgray inyay ethay areayay whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay andyay atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Ifyay ayay ucturestray opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, ityay ollapsescay andyay otentiallypay amagesday earbynay eaturescray. 
Ayay eaturecray withinyay alfhay ethay istanceday ofyay ayay ucture’sstray eighthay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray akestay 5day6 udgeoningblay amageday, isyay ockedknay onepray, andyay isyay uriedbay inyay ethay ubbleray, equiringray ayay DCay 20  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay asyay anyay actionyay otay escapeyay. 
 Ethay DMay ancay adjustyay ethay DCay igherhay oryay owerlay, ependingday onyay ethay aturenay ofyay ethay ubbleray. 
 Eldritchyay  Astblay Evocationyay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay eambay ofyay acklingcray energyyay eaksstray owardtay ayay eaturecray withinyay angeray. 
 Akemay ayay angedray ellspay attackyay againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 1dlay Oyay orcefay amageday. Ethay ellspay eatescray oremay anthay oneyay eambay whenyay youyay eachray igherhay evelslay: wotay eamsbay atyay 5thay evellay, eethray eamsbay atyay 11thay evellay, andyay ourfay eamsbay atyay 17thay evellay. 
 Youyay ancay irectday ethay eamsbay atyay ethay amesay argettay oryay atyay ifferentday onesyay. 
 Akemay ayay eparatesay attackyay ollray orfay eachyay eambay. Elementalyay  Weapon3rd-levelyay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Ayay onmagicalnay weaponyay youyay ouchtay ecomesbay ayay agicmay weaponyay. 
 Oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay amageday ypestay: acidyay, oldcay, irefay, ightninglay, oryay underthay. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, ethay weaponyay ashay ayay +1 onusbay otay attackyay ollsray andyay ealsday anyay extrayay 1day4 amageday ofyay ethay osenchay ypetay whenyay ityay itshay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 5thay oryay 6thay evellay, ethay onusbay otay attackyay ollsray increasesyay otay +2 andyay ethay extrayay amageday increasesyay otay 2day4. 
 Whenyay youyay useyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 7thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay onusbay increasesyay otay +3 andyay ethay extrayay amageday increasesyay otay 3day4. Enhanceyay  Ability2nd-levelyay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (urfay oryay ayay eatherfay omfray ayay eastbay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay. Youyay ouchtay ayay eaturecray andyay estowbay uponyay ityay ayay agicalmay enhancementyay. 
 Oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay effectsyay; ethay argettay ainsgay atthay effectyay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Ear’sbay  Enduranceyay. 
 Ethay argettay ashay advantageyay onyay  Onstitutioncay eckschay. 
 Ityay alsoyay ainsgay 2day6 emporarytay ithay ointspay, whichyay areyay ostlay whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Ull’sbay  Engthstray. 
 Ethay argettay ashay advantageyay onyay  Engthstray eckschay, andyay ishay oryay erhay arryingcay apacitycay oublesday. At’scay  Acegray. 
 Ethay argettay ashay advantageyay onyay  Exterityday eckschay. 
 Ityay alsoyay oesn’tday aketay amageday omfray allingfay 20 eetfay oryay esslay ifyay ityay isn’tyay incapacitatedyay. Eagle’syay  Endorsplay. 
 Ethay argettay ashay advantageyay onyay  Arismachay eckschay. Ox’sfay  Unningcay. 
 Ethay argettay ashay advantageyay onyay  Intelligenceyay eckschay. Owl’syay  Wisdomyay. 
 Ethay argettay ashay advantageyay onyay  Wisdomyay eckschay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay argettay oneyay additionalyay eaturecray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Enlargeyay/ Educe2nd-levelray ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay owderedpay ironyay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay ausecay ayay eaturecray oryay anyay objectyay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray otay owgray argerlay oryay allersmay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Oosechay eitheryay ayay eaturecray oryay anyay objectyay atthay isyay eithernay wornyay ornay arriedcay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay unwillingyay, ityay ancay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ethay ellspay ashay onay effectyay. Ifyay ethay argettay isyay ayay eaturecray, everythingyay ityay isyay wearingyay andyay arryingcay angeschay izesay withyay ityay. 
 Anyyay itemyay oppeddray ybay anyay affectedyay eaturecray eturnsray otay ormalnay izesay atyay onceyay. Enlargeyay. 
 Ethay arget’stay izesay oublesday inyay allyay imensionsday, andyay itsyay weightyay isyay ultipliedmay ybay eightyay. 
 Isthay owthgray increasesyay itsyay izesay ybay oneyay ategory—fromcay  Ediummay otay  Argelay, orfay exampleyay. 
 Ifyay erethay isn’tyay enoughyay oomray orfay ethay argettay otay oubleday itsyay izesay, ethay eaturecray oryay objectyay attainsyay ethay aximummay ossiblepay izesay inyay ethay acespay availableyay. Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argettay alsoyay ashay advantageyay onyay  Engthstray eckschay andyay  Engthstray avingsay owsthray. 
 Ethay arget’stay weaponsyay alsoyay owgray otay atchmay itsyay ewnay izesay. 
 Whileyay esethay weaponsyay areyay enlargedyay, ethay arget’stay attacksyay withyay emthay ealday 1day4 extrayay amageday. Educeray. 
 Ethay arget’stay izesay isyay alvedhay inyay allyay imensionsday, andyay itsyay weightyay isyay educedray otay one-eighthyay ofyay ormalnay. 
 Isthay eductionray ecreasesday itsyay izesay ybay oneyay ategory—fromcay  Ediummay otay  Allsmay, orfay exampleyay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argettay alsoyay ashay isadvantageday onyay  Engthstray eckschay andyay  Engthstray avingsay owsthray. 
 Ethay arget’stay weaponsyay alsoyay inkshray otay atchmay itsyay ewnay izesay. 
 Whileyay esethay weaponsyay areyay educedray, ethay arget’stay attacksyay withyay emthay ealday 1day4 esslay amageday (isthay an’tcay educeray ethay amageday elowbay 1). Ensnaringyay  Ike1st-levelstray onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ethay extnay imetay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay eforebay isthay ellspay endsyay, ayay writhingyay assmay ofyay ornythay inesvay appearsyay atyay ethay ointpay ofyay impactyay, andyay ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Engthstray avingsay owthray oryay ebay estrainedray ybay ethay agicalmay inesvay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
Ayay  Argelay oryay argerlay eaturecray ashay advantageyay onyay isthay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay ucceedssay onyay ethay avesay, ethay inesvay ivelshray awayyay. Whileyay estrainedray ybay isthay ellspay, ethay argettay akestay 1day6 iercingpay amageday atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay. 
Ayay eaturecray estrainedray ybay ethay inesvay oryay oneyay atthay ancay ouchtay ethay eaturecray ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay akemay ayay  Engthstray eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ethay argettay isyay eedfray. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Entangle1st-levelyay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 90 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Aspinggray weedsyay andyay inesvay outspray omfray ethay oundgray inyay ayay 20-ootfay quaresay artingstay omfray ayay ointpay withinyay angeray. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, esethay antsplay urntay ethay oundgray inyay ethay areayay intoyay ifficultday errain.Atay eaturecray inyay ethay areayay whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Engthstray avingsay owthray oryay ebay estrainedray ybay ethay entanglingyay antsplay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
Ayay eaturecray estrainedray ybay ethay antsplay ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay akemay ayay  Engthstray eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ityay eesfray itselfyay. Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay onjuredcay antsplay wiltyay awayyay. Enthrall2nd-levelyay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 inutemay Youyay weaveyay ayay istractingday ingstray ofyay wordsyay, ausingcay eaturescray ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray andyay atthay ancay earhay youyay otay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Anyyay eaturecray atthay an’tcay ebay armedchay ucceedssay onyay isthay avingsay owthray automaticallyyay, andyay ifyay youyay oryay youryay ompanionscay areyay ightingfay ayay eaturecray, ityay ashay advantageyay onyay ethay avesay. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay argettay ashay isadvantageday onyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay ademay otay erceivepay anyyay eaturecray otheryay anthay youyay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay oryay untilyay ethay argettay ancay onay ongerlay earhay youyay. 
 Ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay youyay areyay incapacitatedyay oryay ancay onay ongerlay eakspay. Etherealness7th-levelyay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Upyay otay 8 ourshay Youyay epstay intoyay ethay orderbay egionsray ofyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay, inyay ethay areayay whereyay ityay overlapsyay withyay youryay urrentcay aneplay. 
 Youyay emainray inyay ethay  Orderbay  Etherealyay orfay ethay urationday oryay untilyay youyay useyay youryay actionyay otay ismissday ethay ellspay. 
 Uringday isthay imetay, youyay ancay ovemay inyay anyyay irectionday. 
 Ifyay youyay ovemay upyay oryay ownday, everyyay ootfay ofyay ovementmay ostscay anyay extrayay ootfay. 
 Youyay ancay eesay andyay earhay ethay aneplay youyay originatedyay omfray, utbay everythingyay erethay ookslay aygray, andyay youyay an’tcay eesay anythingyay oremay anthay 60 eetfay awayyay. Whileyay onyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay, youyay ancay onlyyay affectyay andyay ebay affectedyay ybay otheryay eaturescray onyay atthay aneplay. 
 Eaturescray atthay aren'tyay onyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay an’tcay erceivepay youyay andyay an’tcay interactyay withyay youyay, unlessyay ayay ecialspay abilityyay oryay agicmay ashay ivengay emthay ethay abilityyay otay oday osay. Youyay ignoreyay allyay objectsyay andyay effectsyay atthay aren’tyay onyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay, allowingyay youyay otay ovemay oughthray objectsyay youyay erceivepay onyay ethay aneplay youyay originatedyay omfray. Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay immediatelyyay eturnray otay ethay aneplay youyay originatedyay omfray inyay ethay otspay youyay urrentlycay occupyyay. 
 Ifyay youyay occupyyay ethay amesay otspay asyay ayay olidsay objectyay oryay eaturecray whenyay isthay appenshay, youyay areyay immediatelyyay untedshay otay ethay earestnay unoccupiedyay acespay atthay youyay ancay occupyyay andyay aketay orcefay amageday equalyay otay wicetay ethay umbernay ofyay eetfay youyay areyay ovedmay. Isthay ellspay ashay onay effectyay ifyay youyay astcay ityay whileyay youyay areyay onyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay oryay ayay aneplay atthay oesn’tday orderbay ityay, uchsay asyay oneyay ofyay ethay  Outeryay  Anesplay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 8thay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay argettay upyay otay eethray willingyay eaturescray (includingyay youyay) orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 7thay. 
 Ethay eaturescray ustmay ebay withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay. Evard’syay  Ackblay  Entacles4th-leveltay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 90 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iecepay ofyay entacletay omfray ayay iantgay octopusyay oryay ayay iantgay quidsay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Quirmingsay, ebonyyay entaclestay illfay ayay 20-ootfay quaresay onyay oundgray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, esethay entaclestay urntay ethay oundgray inyay ethay areayay intoyay ifficultday erraintay. Whenyay ayay eaturecray entersyay ethay affectedyay areayay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay artsstay itsyay urntay erethay, ethay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay aketay 3day6 udgeoningblay amageday andyay ebay estrainedray ybay ethay entaclestay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay artsstay itsyay urntay inyay ethay areayay andyay isyay alreadyyay estrainedray ybay ethay entaclestay akestay 3day6 udgeoningblay amage.Aday eaturecray estrainedray ybay ethay entaclestay ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay akemay ayay  Engthstray oryay  Exterityday eckchay (itsyay oicechay) againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ityay eesfray itselfyay. Expeditiousyay  Etreat1st-levelray ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Isthay ellspay allowsyay youyay otay ovemay atyay anyay incredibleyay acepay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, andyay enthay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay aketay ethay  Ashday actionyay. Eyebite6th-levelyay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Orfay ethay ell’sspay urationday, youryay eyesyay ecomebay anyay inkyyay oidvay imbuedyay withyay eaddray owerpay. 
 Oneyay eaturecray ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay atthay youyay ancay eesay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ebay affectedyay ybay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay effectsyay ofyay youryay oicechay orfay ethay urationday. 
eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay argettay anotheryay eaturecray utbay an’tcay argettay ayay eaturecray againyay ifyay ityay ashay ucceededsay onyay ayay avingsay owthray againstyay isthay astingcay ofyay eyebiteyay. Asleepyay. 
 Ethay argettay allsfay unconsciousyay. 
 Ityay wakesyay upyay ifyay ityay akestay anyyay amageday oryay ifyay anotheryay eaturecray usesyay itsyay actionyay otay akeshay ethay eeperslay awakeyay. Anickedpay. 
 Ethay argettay isyay ightenedfray ofyay youyay. 
 Onyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay, ethay ightenedfray eaturecray ustmay aketay ethay  Ashday actionyay andyay ovemay awayyay omfray youyay ybay ethay afestsay andyay ortestshay availableyay outeray, unlessyay erethay isyay owherenay otay ovemay.
