 Ifyay ethay argettay ovesmay otay ayay aceplay atyay eastlay 60 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay whereyay ityay ancay onay ongerlay eesay youyay, isthay effectyay endsyay. Ickenedsay. 
 Ethay argettay ashay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray andyay abilityyay eckschay. 
 Atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay, ityay ancay akemay anotheryay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay ityay ucceedssay, ethay effectyay endsyay. Abricatefay 4levelthlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay onvertcay awray aterialsmay intoyay oductspray ofyay ethay amesay aterialmay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, youyay ancay abricatefay ayay woodenyay idgebray omfray ayay umpclay ofyay eestray, ayay operay omfray ayay atchpay ofyay emphay, andyay othesclay omfray axflay oryay woolyay. Oosechay awray aterialsmay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay ancay abricatefay ayay  Argelay oryay allersmay objectyay (ontainedcay withinyay ayay 10-ootfay ubecay, oryay eightyay onnectedcay 5-ootfay ubescay), ivengay ayay ufficientsay quantityyay ofyay awray aterialmay. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay workingyay withyay etalmay, onestay, oryay anotheryay ineralmay ubstancesay, oweverhay, ethay abricatedfay objectyay ancay ebay onay argerlay anthay  Ediummay (ontainedcay withinyay ayay inglesay 5-ootfay ubecay). 
 Ethay qualityyay ofyay objectsyay ademay ybay ethay ellspay isyay ommensuratecay withyay ethay qualityyay ofyay ethay awray aterialsmay. Eaturescray oryay agicmay itemsyay an’tcay ebay eatedcray oryay ansmutedtray ybay isthay ellspay. 
 Youyay alsoyay an’tcay useyay ityay otay eatecray itemsyay atthay ordinarilyyay equireray ayay ighhay egreeday ofyay aftsmanshipcray, uchsay asyay ewelryjay, weaponsyay, assglay, oryay armoryay, unlessyay youyay avehay oficiencypray withyay ethay ypetay ofyay artisan’syay oolstay usedyay otay aftcray uchsay objectsyay. Aeriefay  Ire1st-levelfay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Eachyay objectyay inyay ayay 20-ootfay ubecay withinyay angeray isyay outlinedyay inyay ueblay, eengray, oryay ioletvay ightlay (youryay oicechay). 
 Anyyay eaturecray inyay ethay areayay whenyay ethay ellspay isyay astcay isyay alsoyay outlinedyay inyay ightlay ifyay ityay ailsfay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, objectsyay andyay affectedyay eaturescray edshay imday ightlay inyay ayay 10-ootfay adiusray. Anyyay attackyay ollray againstyay anyay affectedyay eaturecray oryay objectyay ashay advantageyay ifyay ethay attackeryay ancay eesay ityay, andyay ethay affectedyay eaturecray oryay objectyay an’tcay enefitbay omfray eingbay invisibleyay. Alsefay  Ife1st-levellay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay amountyay ofyay alcoholyay oryay istilledday iritsspay) Urationday: 1 ourhay Olsteringbay yourselfyay withyay ayay ecromanticnay acsimilefay ofyay ifelay, youyay aingay 1day4 + 4 emporarytay ithay ointspay orfay ethay urationday. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay aingay 5 additionalyay emporarytay ithay ointspay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Ear3rd-levelfay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (30-ootfay onecay) Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay whiteyay eatherfay oryay ethay earthay ofyay ayay enhay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay ojectpray ayay antasmalphay imageyay ofyay ayay eature’scray worstyay earsfay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 30-ootfay onecay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay opdray whateveryay ityay isyay oldinghay andyay ecomebay ightenedfray orfay ethay urationday. Whileyay ightenedfray ybay isthay ellspay, ayay eaturecray ustmay aketay ethay  Ashday actionyay andyay ovemay awayyay omfray youyay ybay ethay afestsay availableyay outeray onyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay, unlessyay erethay isyay owherenay otay ovemay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray endsyay itsyay urntay inyay ayay ocationlay whereyay ityay oesn’tday avehay inelay ofyay ightsay otay youyay, ethay eaturecray ancay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay ellspay endsyay orfay atthay eaturecray. Eatherfay  All1st-levelfay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 eactionray, whichyay youyay aketay whenyay youyay oryay ayay eaturecray withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay allsfay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, May (ayay allsmay eatherfay oryay iecepay ofyay ownday)  Urationday: 1 inutemay Oosechay upyay otay ivefay allingfay eaturescray withinyay angeray. 
Ayay allingfay eature'scray ateray ofyay escentday owsslay otay 60 eetfay erpay oundray untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray andslay eforebay ethay ellspay endsyay, ityay akestay onay allingfay amageday andyay ancay andlay onyay itsyay eetfay, andyay ethay ellspay endsyay orfay atthay eaturecray. Eeblemind8th-levelfay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 150 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay andfulhay ofyay ayclay, ystalcray, assglay, oryay ineralmay eressphay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay astblay ethay indmay ofyay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray, attemptingyay otay attershay itsyay intellectyay andyay ersonalitypay. 
 Ethay argettay akestay 4day6 ychicpsay amageday andyay ustmay akemay anyay  Intelligenceyay avingsay owthray. Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eature’scray  Intelligenceyay andyay  Arismachay oresscay ecomebay 1. 
ommunicatecay inyay anyyay intelligibleyay wayyay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ancay, oweverhay, identifyyay itsyay iendsfray, ollowfay emthay, andyay evenyay otectpray emthay. Atyay ethay endyay ofyay everyyay 30 aysday, ethay eaturecray ancay epeatray itsyay avingsay owthray againstyay isthay ellspay. 
 Ifyay ityay ucceedssay onyay itsyay avingsay owthray, ethay ellspay endsyay. Ethay ellspay ancay alsoyay ebay endedyay ybay eatergray estorationray, ealhay, oryay wishyay. Eignfay  Eath3rd-levelday ecromancynay (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay aveyardgray irtday)  Urationday: 1 ourhay Youyay ouchtay ayay willingyay eaturecray andyay utpay ityay intoyay ayay atalepticcay atestay atthay isyay indistinguishableyay omfray eathday. Orfay ethay ell’sspay urationday, oryay untilyay youyay useyay anyay actionyay otay ouchtay ethay argettay andyay ismissday ethay ellspay, ethay argettay appearsyay eadday otay allyay outwardyay inspectionyay andyay otay ellsspay usedyay otay etermineday ethay arget’stay atusstay. 
 Ethay argettay isyay indedblay andyay incapacitatedyay, andyay itsyay eedspay opsdray otay 0. Ethay argettay ashay esistanceray otay allyay amageday exceptyay ychicpsay amageday. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay iseasedday oryay oisonedpay whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, oryay ecomesbay iseasedday oryay oisonedpay whileyay underyay ethay ell’sspay effectyay, ethay iseaseday andyay oisonpay avehay onay effectyay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Indfay  Amiliar1st-levelfay onjurationcay (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 ourhay  Angeray: 10 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (10 gpay worthyay ofyay arcoalchay, incenseyay, andyay erbshay atthay ustmay ebay onsumedcay ybay irefay inyay ayay assbray azierbray) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay aingay ethay ervicesay ofyay ayay amiliarfay, ayay iritspay atthay akestay anyay animalyay ormfay youyay oosechay: atbay, atcay, abcray, ogfray (oadtay), awkhay, izardlay, octopusyay, owlyay, oisonouspay akesnay, ishfay (quipperyay), atray, avenray, easay orsehay, iderspay, oryay weaselyay. 
 Appearingyay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay withinyay angeray, ethay amiliarfay ashay ethay atisticsstay ofyay ethay osenchay ormfay, oughthay ityay isyay ayay elestialcay, eyfay, oryay iendfay (youryay oicechay) insteadyay ofyay ayay eastbay. Youryay amiliarfay actsyay independentlyyay ofyay youyay, utbay ityay alwaysyay obeysyay youryay ommandscay. 
 Inyay ombatcay, ityay ollsray itsyay ownyay initiativeyay andyay actsyay onyay itsyay ownyay urntay. 
Ayay amiliarfay an’tcay attackyay, utbay ityay ancay aketay otheryay actionsyay asyay ormalnay. Whenyay ethay amiliarfay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, ityay isappearsday, eavinglay ehindbay onay ysicalphay ormfay. 
 Ityay eappearsray afteryay youyay astcay isthay ellspay againyay  Whileyay youryay amiliarfay isyay withinyay 100 eetfay ofyay youyay, youyay ancay ommunicatecay withyay ityay elepathicallytay. 
 Additionallyyay, asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay eesay oughthray youryay amiliar’sfay eyesyay andyay earhay whatyay ityay earshay untilyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay, aininggay ethay enefitsbay ofyay anyyay ecialspay ensessay atthay ethay amiliarfay ashay. 
 Uringday isthay imetay, youyay areyay eafday andyay indblay withyay egardray otay youryay ownyay ensessay. Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay emporarilytay ismissday youryay amiliarfay. 
 Ityay isappearsday intoyay ayay ocketpay imensionday whereyay ityay awaitsyay youryay ummonssay. 
 Alternativelyyay, youyay ancay ismissday ityay oreverfay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay whileyay ityay isyay emporarilytay ismissed,youday ancay ausecay ityay otay eappearray inyay anyyay unoccupiedyay acespay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. Youyay an’tcay avehay oremay anthay oneyay amiliarfay atyay ayay imetay. 
 Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay whileyay youyay alreadyyay avehay ayay amiliarfay, youyay insteadyay ausecay ityay otay adoptyay ayay ewnay ormfay. 
 Oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ormsfay omfray ethay aboveyay istlay. 
 Youryay amiliarfay ansformstray intoyay ethay osenchay eaturecray. Inallyfay, whenyay youyay astcay ayay ellspay withyay ayay angeray ofyay ouchtay, youryay amiliarfay ancay eliverday ethay ellspay asyay ifyay ityay adhay astcay ethay ellspay. 
 Youryay amiliarfay ustmay ebay withinyay 100 eetfay ofyay youyay, andyay ityay ustmay useyay itsyay eactionray otay eliverday ethay ellspay whenyay youyay astcay ityay. 
 Ifyay ethay ellspay equiresray anyay attackyay ollray, youyay useyay youryay attackyay odifiermay orfay ethay ollray. Indfay  Eed2nd-levelstay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ummonsay ayay iritspay atthay assumesyay ethay ormfay ofyay anyay unusuallyyay intelligentyay, ongstray, andyay oyallay eedstay, eatingcray ayay ong-lastinglay ondbay withyay ityay. 
 Appearingyay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay withinyay angeray, ethay eedstay akestay onyay ayay ormfay atthay youyay oosechay, uchsay asyay ayay warhorseyay, ayay onypay, ayay amelcay, anyay elkyay, oryay ayay astiffmay. 
( Youryay DMay ightmay allowyay otheryay animalsyay otay ebay ummonedsay asyay eedsstay.)  Ethay eedstay ashay ethay atisticsstay ofyay ethay osenchay ormfay, oughthay ityay isyay ayay elestialcay, eyfay, oryay iendfay (youryay oicechay) insteadyay ofyay itsyay ormalnay ypetay. 
 Additionallyyay, ifyay youryay eedstay ashay anyay  Intelligenceyay ofyay 5 oryay esslay, itsyay  Intelligenceyay ecomesbay 6, andyay ityay ainsgay ethay abilityyay otay understandyay oneyay anguagelay ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay eakspay. Youryay eedstay ervessay youyay asyay ayay ountmay, othbay inyay ombatcay andyay outyay, andyay youyay avehay anyay instinctiveyay ondbay withyay ityay atthay allowsyay youyay otay ightfay asyay ayay eamlesssay unityay. 
 Whileyay ountedmay onyay youryay eedstay, youyay ancay akemay anyyay ellspay youyay astcay atthay argetstay onlyyay youyay alsoyay argettay youryay eedstay. Whenyay ethay eedstay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, ityay isappearsday, eavinglay ehindbay onay ysicalphay ormfay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay ismissday youryay eedstay atyay anyyay imetay asyay anyay actionyay, ausingcay ityay otay isappearday. 
 Inyay eitheryay asecay, astingcay isthay ellspay againyay ummonssay ethay amesay eedstay, estoredray otay itsyay ithay ointpay aximummay. Whileyay youryay eedstay isyay withinyay 1 ilemay ofyay youyay, youyay ancay ommunicatecay withyay ityay elepathicallytay. Youyay an’tcay avehay oremay anthay oneyay eedstay ondedbay ybay isthay ellspay atyay ayay imetay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, youyay ancay eleaseray ethay eedstay omfray itsyay ondbay atyay anyyay imetay, ausingcay ityay otay isappearday. Indfay ethay  Ath6th-levelpay ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay etsay ofyay ivinatoryday ools—suchtay asyay onesbay, ivoryyay icksstay, ardscay, eethtay, oryay arvedcay unesray— worthyay 100 gpay andyay anyay objectyay omfray ethay ocationlay youyay wishyay otay indfay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ayday Isthay ellspay allowsyay youyay otay indfay ethay ortestshay, ostmay irectday ysicalphay outeray otay ayay ecificspay ixedfay ocationlay atthay youyay areyay amiliarfay withyay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay. 
amenay ayay estinationday onyay anotheryay aneplay ofyay existenceyay, ayay estinationday atthay ovesmay (uchsay asyay ayay obilemay ortressfay), oryay ayay estinationday atthay isn’tyay ecificspay (uchsay asyay “ayay eengray agon’sdray airlay”), ethay ellspay ailsfay. Orfay ethay urationday, asyay onglay asyay youyay areyay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay asyay ethay estinationday, youyay owknay owhay arfay ityay isyay andyay inyay whatyay irectionday ityay ieslay. 
 Whileyay youyay areyay avelingtray erethay, wheneveryay youyay areyay esentedpray withyay ayay oicechay ofyay athspay alongyay ethay wayyay, youyay automaticallyyay etermineday whichyay athpay isyay ethay ortestshay andyay ostmay irectday outeray (utbay otnay ecessarilynay ethay afestsay outeray) otay ethay estinationday. Indfay  Aps2nd-leveltray ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ensesay ethay esencepray ofyay anyyay aptray withinyay angeray atthay isyay withinyay inelay ofyay ightsay. 
Ayay aptray, orfay ethay urposepay ofyay isthay ellspay, includesyay anythingyay atthay wouldyay inflictyay ayay uddensay oryay unexpectedyay effectyay youyay onsidercay armfulhay oryay undesirableyay, whichyay wasyay ecificallyspay intendedyay asyay uchsay ybay itsyay eatorcray. 
 Usthay, ethay ellspay wouldyay ensesay anyay areayay affectedyay ybay ethay alarmyay ellspay, ayay yphglay ofyay wardingyay, oryay ayay echanicalmay itpay aptray, utbay ityay wouldyay otnay evealray ayay aturalnay weaknessyay inyay ethay oorflay, anyay unstableyay eilingcay, oryay ayay iddenhay inkholesay. Isthay ellspay erelymay evealsray atthay ayay aptray isyay esentpray. 
 Youyay on’tday earnlay ethay ocationlay ofyay eachyay aptray, utbay youyay oday earnlay ethay eneralgay aturenay ofyay ethay angerday osedpay ybay ayay aptray youyay ensesay. Ingerfay ofyay  Eathday 7levelthlay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay endsay egativenay energyyay oursingcay oughthray ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray, ausingcay ityay earingsay ainpay. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Ityay akestay 7day8 + 30 ecroticnay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay one.Ayay umanoidhay illedkay ybay isthay ellspay isesray atyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay asyay ayay ombiezay atthay isyay ermanentlypay underyay youryay ommandcay, ollowingfay youryay erbalvay ordersyay otay ethay estbay ofyay itsyay abilityyay. Ireballfay 3levelrdlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 150 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inytay allbay ofyay atbay uanogay andyay ulfursay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay ightbray eakstray ashesflay omfray youryay ointingpay ingerfay otay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray andyay enthay ossomsblay withyay ayay owlay oarray intoyay anyay explosionyay ofyay ameflay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 20-oot-radiusfay eresphay enteredcay onyay atthay ointpay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Ethay irefay eadsspray aroundyay ornerscay. 
 Ityay ignitesyay ammableflay objectsyay inyay ethay areayay atthay aren'tyay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day6 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 3rday. Irefay  Oltbay Evocationyay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay urlhay ayay otemay ofyay irefay atyay ayay eaturecray oryay objectyay withinyay angeray. 
 Akemay ayay angedray ellspay attackyay againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 1day10 irefay amageday. 
Ayay ammableflay objectyay ithay ybay isthay ellspay ignitesyay ifyay ityay isn'tyay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay. Isthay ell’sspay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day10 whenyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay (2day10), 11thay evellay (3day10), andyay 17thay evellay (4day10). Irefay  Ieldshay 4levelthlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay osphorusphay oryay ayay ireflyfay)  Urationday: 10 inutesmay Inthay andyay wispyyay amesflay wreatheyay youryay odybay orfay ethay urationday, eddingshay ightbray ightlay inyay ayay 10-ootfay adiusray andyay imday ightlay orfay anyay additionalyay 10 eetfay. 
 Youyay ancay endyay ethay ellspay earlyyay ybay usingyay anyay actionyay otay ismissday ityay. Ethay amesflay ovidepray youyay withyay ayay warmyay ieldshay oryay ayay illchay ieldshay, asyay youyay oosechay. 
 Ethay warmyay ieldshay antsgray youyay esistanceray otay oldcay amageday, andyay ethay illchay ieldshay antsgray youyay esistanceray otay irefay amageday. Inyay additionyay, wheneveryay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay itshay youyay withyay ayay eleemay attackyay, ethay ieldshay eruptsyay withyay ameflay. 
 Ethay attackeryay akestay 2day8 irefay amageday omfray ayay warmyay ieldshay, oryay 2day8 oldcay amageday omfray ayay oldcay ieldshay. Irefay  Orm7th-levelstay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 150 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay ormstay ademay upyay ofyay eetsshay ofyay oaringray ameflay appearsyay inyay ayay ocationlay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay areayay ofyay ethay ormstay onsistscay ofyay upyay otay entay 10-ootfay ubescay, whichyay youyay ancay arrangeyay asyay youyay wishyay. 
 Eachyay ubecay ustmay avehay atyay eastlay oneyay acefay adjacentyay otay ethay acefay ofyay anotheryay ubecay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ethay areayay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Ityay akestay 7day10 irefay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Ethay irefay amagesday objectsyay inyay ethay areayay andyay ignitesyay ammableflay objectsyay atthay aren'tyay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay. Ifyay youyay oosechay, antplay ifelay inyay ethay areayay isyay unaffectedyay ybay isthay ellspay. Ameflay  Ade2nd-levelblay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (eaflay ofyay umacsay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay evokeyay ayay ieryfay adeblay inyay youryay eefray andhay. 
 Ethay adeblay isyay imilarsay inyay izesay andyay apeshay otay ayay imitarscay, andyay ityay astslay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ifyay youyay etlay ogay ofyay ethay adeblay, ityay isappearsday, utbay youyay ancay evokeyay ethay adeblay againyay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay. Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay akemay ayay eleemay ellspay attackyay withyay ethay ieryfay adeblay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 3day6 irefay amageday. Ethay amingflay adeblay edsshay ightbray ightlay inyay ayay 10-ootfay adiusray andyay imday ightlay orfay anyay additionalyay 10 eetfay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day6 orfay everyyay wotay otslay evelslay aboveyay 2nday. Ameflay  Ikestray 5levelthlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (inchpay ofyay ulfursay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay erticalvay olumncay ofyay ivineday irefay oarsray ownday omfray ethay eavenshay inyay ayay ocationlay youyay ecifyspay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 10-oot-radiusfay, 40-oot-highfay ylindercay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay withinyay angeray ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 4day6 irefay amageday andyay 4day6 adiantray amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay irefay amageday oryay ethay adiantray amageday (youryay oicechay) increasesyay ybay 1day6 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 5thay. Amingflay  Ere2nd-levelsphay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay allowtay, ayay inchpay ofyay imstonebray, andyay ayay ustingday ofyay owderedpay ironyay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ayay 5-oot-diameterfay eresphay ofyay irefay appearsyay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray andyay astslay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Anyyay eaturecray atthay endsyay itsyay urntay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay eresphay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Ethay eaturecray akestay 2day6 irefay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Asyay ayay onusbay actionyay, youyay ancay ovemay ethay eresphay upyay otay 30 eetfay. 
 Ifyay youyay amray ethay eresphay intoyay ayay eaturecray, atthay eaturecray ustmay akemay ethay avingsay owthray againstyay ethay ere’ssphay amageday, andyay ethay eresphay opsstay ovingmay isthay urntay. Whenyay youyay ovemay ethay eresphay, youyay ancay irectday ityay overyay arriersbay upyay otay 5 eetfay alltay andyay umpjay ityay acrossyay itspay upyay otay 10 eetfay wideyay. 
 Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day6 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Eshflay otay  One6th-levelstay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay imelay, wateryay, andyay earthyay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay attemptyay otay urntay oneyay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray intoyay onestay. 
 Ifyay ethay arget’stay odybay isyay ademay ofyay eshflay, ethay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ityay isyay estrainedray asyay itsyay eshflay eginsbay otay ardenhay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay eaturecray isn’tyay affected.Ayay eaturecray estrainedray ybay isthay ellspay ustmay akemay anotheryay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay. 
 Ifyay ityay uccessfullysay avessay againstyay isthay ellspay eethray imestay, ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay itsyay avessay eethray imestay, ityay isyay urnedtay otay onestay andyay ubjectedsay otay ethay etrifiedpay onditioncay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ethay uccessessay andyay ailuresfay on’tday eednay otay ebay onsecutivecay; eepkay acktray ofyay othbay untilyay ethay argettay ollectscay eethray ofyay ayay indkay. Ifyay ethay eaturecray isyay ysicallyphay okenbray whileyay etrifiedpay, ityay ufferssay omfray imilarsay eformitiesday ifyay ityay evertsray otay itsyay originalyay atestay. Ifyay youyay aintainmay youryay oncentrationcay onyay isthay ellspay orfay ethay entireyay ossiblepay urationday, ethay eaturecray isyay urnedtay otay onestay untilyay ethay effectyay isyay emovedray. Y3rd-levelflay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay wingyay eatherfay omfray anyyay irdbay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay ouchtay ayay willingyay eaturecray. 
 Ethay argettay ainsgay ayay yingflay eedspay ofyay 60 eetfay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argettay allsfay ifyay ityay isyay illstay aloftyay, unlessyay ityay ancay opstay ethay allfay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay argettay oneyay additionalyay eaturecray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 3rday. Ogfay  Oud1st-levelclay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay eatecray ayay 20-oot-radiusfay eresphay ofyay ogfay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay eresphay eadsspray aroundyay ornerscay, andyay itsyay areayay isyay eavilyhay obscuredyay. 
 Ityay astslay orfay ethay urationday oryay untilyay ayay windyay ofyay oderatemay oryay eatergray eedspay (atyay eastlay 10 ilesmay erpay ourhay) ispersesday ityay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay adiusray ofyay ethay ogfay increasesyay ybay 20 eetfay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Orbiddancefay 6levelthlay abjurationyay (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inklingspray ofyay olyhay wateryay, areray incenseyay, andyay owderedpay ubyray worthyay atyay eastlay 1,000 gpay)  Urationday: 1 ayday Youyay eatecray ayay wardyay againstyay agicalmay aveltray atthay otectspray upyay otay 40,000 quaresay eetfay ofyay oorflay acespay otay ayay eighthay ofyay 30 eetfay aboveyay ethay oorflay. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, eaturescray an’tcay eleporttay intoyay ethay areayay oryay useyay ortalspay, uchsay asyay osethay eatedcray ybay ethay ategay ellspay, otay enteryay ethay areayay. 
 Ethay ellspay oofspray ethay areayay againstyay anarplay aveltray, andyay ereforethay eventspray eaturescray omfray accessingyay ethay areayay ybay wayyay ofyay ethay  Astralyay  Aneplay,  Etherealyay  Aneplay,  Eywildfay,  Adowfellshay, oryay ethay aneplay iftshay ellspay. Inyay additionyay, ethay ellspay amagesday ypestay ofyay eaturescray atthay youyay oosechay whenyay youyay astcay ityay. 
 Oosechay oneyay oryay oremay ofyay ethay ollowingfay: elestialscay, elementalsyay, eyfay, iendsfay, andyay undeadyay. 
 Whenyay ayay osenchay eaturecray entersyay ethay ell’sspay areayay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay artsstay itsyay urntay erethay, ethay eaturecray akestay 5day10 adiantray oryay ecroticnay amageday (youryay oicechay whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay). Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay ancay esignateday ayay asswordpay. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay eaksspay ethay asswordpay asyay ityay entersyay ethay areayay akestay onay amageday omfray ethay ellspay. Ethay ell’sspay areayay an'tcay overlapyay withyay ethay areayay ofyay anotheryay orbiddancefay ellspay. 
 Ifyay youyay astcay orbiddancefay everyyay ayday orfay 30 aysday inyay ethay amesay ocationlay, ethay ellspay astslay untilyay ityay isyay ispelledday, andyay ethay aterialmay omponentscay areyay onsumedcay onyay ethay astlay astingcay. Orcecage7th-levelfay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 100 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ubyray ustday worthyay 1,500 gpay)  Urationday: 1 ourhay Anyay immobileyay, invisibleyay, ube-shapedcay isonpray omposedcay ofyay agicalmay orcefay ingsspray intoyay existenceyay aroundyay anyay areayay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay isonpray ancay ebay ayay agecay oryay ayay olidsay oxbay, asyay youyay oose.Achay isonpray inyay ethay apeshay ofyay ayay agecay ancay ebay upyay otay 20 eetfay onyay ayay idesay andyay isyay ademay omfray 1/2-inchyay iameterday arsbay acedspay 1/2 inchyay apart.Ayay isonpray inyay ethay apeshay ofyay ayay oxbay ancay ebay upyay otay 10 eetfay onyay ayay idesay, eatingcray ayay olidsay arrierbay atthay eventspray anyyay attermay omfray assingpay oughthray ityay andyay ockingblay anyyay ellsspay astcay intoyay oryay outyay omfray ethay areayay. Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, anyyay eaturecray atthay isyay ompletelycay insideyay ethay age'scay areayay isyay appedtray. 
 Eaturescray onlyyay artiallypay withinyay ethay areayay, oryay osethay ootay argelay otay itfay insideyay ethay areayay, areyay ushedpay awayyay omfray ethay entercay ofyay ethay areayay untilyay eythay areyay ompletelycay outsideyay ethay area.Ayay eaturecray insideyay ethay agecay an’tcay eavelay ityay ybay onmagicalnay eansmay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray iestray otay useyay eleportationtay oryay interplanaryay aveltray otay eavelay ethay agecay, ityay ustmay irstfay akemay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray. 
useyay atthay agicmay otay exityay ethay agecay. 
 Onyay ayay ailurefay, ethay eaturecray an'tcay exityay ethay agecay andyay wastesyay ethay useyay ofyay ethay ellspay oryay effectyay. 
 Ethay agecay alsoyay extendsyay intoyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay, ockingblay etherealyay aveltray. Isthay ellspay an’tcay ebay ispelledday ybay ispelday agicmay. Oresightfay 9levelthlay ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay ummingbirdhay eatherfay)  Urationday: 8 ourshay Youyay ouchtay ayay willingyay eaturecray andyay estowbay ayay imitedlay abilityyay otay eesay intoyay ethay immediateyay uturefay. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, ethay argettay an’tcay ebay urprisedsay andyay ashay advantageyay onyay attackyay ollsray, abilityyay eckschay, andyay avingsay owsthray. 
 Additionallyyay, otheryay eaturescray avehay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay ethay argettay orfay ethay urationday. Isthay ellspay immediatelyyay endsyay ifyay youyay astcay ityay againyay eforebay itsyay urationday endsyay. Eedomfray ofyay  Ovementmay 4levelthlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay eatherlay apstray, oundbay aroundyay ethay armyay oryay ayay imilarsay appendageyay) Urationday: 1 ourhay Youyay ouchtay ayay willingyay eaturecray. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, ethay arget’stay ovementmay isyay unaffectedyay ybay ifficultday erraintay, andyay ellsspay andyay otheryay agicalmay effectsyay ancay eithernay educeray ethay arget’stay eedspay ornay ausecay ethay argettay otay ebay aralyzedpay oryay estrainedray. Ethay argettay ancay alsoyay endspay 5 eetfay ofyay ovementmay otay automaticallyyay escapeyay omfray onmagicalnay estraintsray, uchsay asyay anaclesmay oryay ayay eaturecray atthay ashay ityay appledgray. 
 Inallyfay, eingbay underwateryay imposesyay onay enaltiespay onyay ethay arget'stay ovementmay oryay attacksyay. Iendsfray Enchantmentyay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Say, May (ayay allsmay amountyay ofyay akeupmay appliedyay otay ethay acefay asyay isthay ellspay isyay astcay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Orfay ethay urationday, youyay avehay advantageyay onyay allyay  Arismachay eckschay irectedday atyay oneyay eaturecray ofyay youryay oicechay atthay isn’tyay ostilehay owardtay youyay. 
 Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay eaturecray ealizesray atthay youyay usedyay agicmay otay influenceyay itsyay oodmay andyay ecomesbay ostilehay owardtay youyay. 
Ayay eaturecray onepray otay iolencevay ightmay attackyay youyay. 
 Anotheryay eaturecray ightmay eeksay etributionray inyay otheryay waysyay (atyay ethay sdMsay iscretionday), ependingday onyay ethay aturenay ofyay youryay interactionyay withyay ityay. Aseousgay  Orm3rd-levelfay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay auzegay andyay ayay wispyay ofyay okesmay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay ansformtray ayay willingyay eaturecray youyay ouchtay, alongyay withyay everythingyay it’syay wearingyay andyay arryingcay, intoyay ayay istymay oudclay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay ethay eaturecray opsdray otay0 ithay ointspay. 
 Anyay incorporealyay eaturecray isn’tyay affectedyay. Whileyay inyay isthay ormfay, ethay arget’stay onlyyay ethodmay ofyay ovementmay isyay ayay yingflay eedspay ofyay 10 eetfay. 
 Ethay argettay ancay enteryay andyay occupyyay ethay acespay ofyay anotheryay eaturecray. 
 Ethay argettay ashay esistanceray otay onmagicalnay amageday, andyay ityay ashay advantageyay onyay  Engthstray,  Exterityday, andyay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owsthray. 
 Ethay argettay ancay asspay oughthray allsmay oleshay, arrownay openingsyay, andyay evenyay eremay ackscray, oughthay ityay eatstray iquidslay asyay oughthay eythay wereyay olidsay urfacessay. 
 Ethay argettay an'tcay allfay andyay emainsray overinghay inyay ethay airyay evenyay whenyay unnedstay oryay otherwiseyay incapacitatedyay. Whileyay inyay ethay ormfay ofyay ayay istymay oudclay, ethay argettay an’tcay alktay oryay anipulatemay objectsyay, andyay anyyay objectsyay ityay wasyay arryingcay oryay oldinghay an’tcay ebay oppeddray, usedyay, oryay otherwiseyay interactedyay withyay. 
 Ethay argettay an’tcay attackyay oryay astcay ellsspay. Ate9th-levelgay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iamondday worthyay atyay eastlay 5,000 gpay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay onjurecay ayay ortalpay inkinglay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray otay ayay ecisepray ocationlay onyay ayay ifferentday aneplay ofyay existenceyay. 
 Ethay ortalpay isyay ayay ircularcay openingyay, whichyay youyay ancay akemay 5 otay 20 eetfay inyay iameterday. 
 Youyay ancay orientyay ethay ortalpay inyay anyyay irectionday youyay oosechay. 
 Ethay ortalpay astslay orfay ethay urationday. Ethay ortalpay ashay ayay ontfray andyay ayay ackbay onyay eachyay aneplay whereyay ityay appearsyay. 
 Aveltray oughthray ethay ortalpay isyay ossiblepay onlyyay ybay ovingmay oughthray itsyay ontfray. 
 Anythingyay atthay oesday osay isyay instantlyyay ansportedtray otay ethay otheryay aneplay, appearingyay inyay ethay unoccupiedyay acespay earestnay otay ethay ortalpay. Eitiesday andyay otheryay anarplay ulersray ancay eventpray ortalspay eatedcray ybay isthay ellspay omfray openingyay inyay eirthay esencepray oryay anywhereyay withinyay eirthay omainsday. Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay ancay eakspay ethay amenay ofyay ayay ecificspay eaturecray (ayay eudonympsay, itletay, oryay icknamenay oesn’tday workyay). 
 Ifyay atthay eaturecray isyay onyay ayay aneplay otheryay anthay ethay oneyay youyay areyay onyay, ethay ortalpay opensyay inyay ethay amednay eature’scray immediateyay icinityvay andyay awsdray ethay eaturecray oughthray ityay otay ethay earestnay unoccupiedyay acespay onyay youryay idesay ofyay ethay ortalpay. 
 Youyay aingay onay ecialspay owerpay overyay ethay eaturecray, andyay ityay isyay eefray otay actyay asyay ethay DMay eemsday appropriateyay. 
ervicesay oryay efrainray omfray omesay actionyay oryay oursecay ofyay activityyay asyay youyay ecideday. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray ancay understandyay youyay, ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ecomebay armedchay ybay youyay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Whileyay ethay eaturecray isyay armedchay ybay youyay, ityay akestay 5day10 ychicpsay amageday eachyay imetay ityay actsyay inyay ayay annermay irectlyday ountercay otay youryay instructionsyay, utbay onay oremay anthay onceyay eachyay ayday. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay an'tcay understandyay youyay isyay unaffectedyay ybay ethay ellspay. Youyay ancay issueyay anyyay ommandcay youyay oosechay, ortshay ofyay anyay activityyay atthay wouldyay esultray inyay ertaincay eathday. 
 Ouldshay youyay issueyay ayay uicidalsay ommandcay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Youyay ancay endyay ethay ellspay earlyyay ybay usingyay anyay actionyay otay ismissday ityay. 
Ayay emoveray ursecay, eatergray estorationray, oryay wishyay ellspay alsoyay endsyay ityay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 7thay oryay 8thay evellay, ethay urationday isyay 1 yearyay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 9thay evellay, ethay ellspay astslay untilyay ityay isyay endedyay ybay oneyay ofyay ethay ellsspay entionedmay aboveyay. Entlegay  Eposeray 2levelndlay ecromancynay (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay altsay andyay oneyay oppercay iecepay acedplay onyay eachyay ofyay ethay orpse’scay eyesyay, whichyay ustmay emainray erethay orfay ethay urationday) Urationday: 10 aysday Youyay ouchtay ayay orpsecay oryay otheryay emainsray. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, ethay argettay isyay otectedpray omfray ecayday andyay an’tcay ecomebay undeadyay. Ethay ellspay alsoyay effectivelyyay extendsyay ethay imetay imitlay onyay aisingray ethay argettay omfray ethay eadday, incesay aysday entspay underyay ethay influenceyay ofyay isthay ellspay on’tday ountcay againstyay ethay imetay imitlay ofyay ellsspay uchsay asyay aiseray eadday. Iantgay  Insect4th-levelyay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay ansformtray upyay otay entay entipedescay, eethray idersspay, ivefay waspsyay, oryay oneyay orpionscay withinyay angeray intoyay iantgay ersionsvay ofyay eirthay aturalnay ormsfay orfay ethay urationday. 
Ayay entipedecay ecomesbay ayay iantgay entipedecay, ayay iderspay ecomesbay ayay iantgay iderspay, ayay waspyay ecomesbay ayay iantgay waspyay, andyay ayay orpionscay ecomesbay ayay iantgay orpionscay. Eachyay eaturecray obeysyay youryay erbalvay ommandscay, andyay inyay ombatcay, eythay actyay onyay youryay urntay eachyay oundray. 
 Ethay DMay ashay ethay atisticsstay orfay esethay eaturescray andyay esolvesray eirthay actionsyay andyay ovement.Amay eaturecray emainsray inyay itsyay iantgay izesay orfay ethay urationday, untilyay ityay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, oryay untilyay youyay useyay anyay actionyay otay ismissday ethay effectyay onyay ityay. Ethay DMay ightmay allowyay youyay otay oosechay ifferentday argetstay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay ansformtray ayay eebay, itsyay iantgay ersionvay ightmay avehay ethay amesay atisticsstay asyay ayay iantgay waspyay. Ibness8th-levelglay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday: 1 ourhay Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, whenyay youyay akemay ayay  Arismachay eckchay, youyay ancay eplaceray ethay umbernay youyay ollray withyay ayay 15. 
 Additionallyyay, onay attermay whatyay youyay aysay, agicmay atthay wouldyay etermineday ifyay youyay areyay ellingtay ethay uthtray indicatesyay atthay youyay areyay eingbay uthfultray. Obeglay ofyay  Invulnerability6th-levelyay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (10-ootfay adiusray) Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay assglay oryay ystalcray eadbay atthay attersshay whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Anyay immobileyay, aintlyfay immeringshay arrierbay ingsspray intoyay existenceyay inyay ayay 10-ootfay adiusray aroundyay youyay andyay emainsray orfay ethay urationday. Anyyay ellspay ofyay 5thay evellay oryay owerlay astcay omfray outsideyay ethay arrierbay an'tcay affectyay eaturescray oryay objectsyay withinyay ityay, evenyay ifyay ethay ellspay isyay astcay usingyay ayay igherhay evellay ellspay otslay. 
 Uchsay ayay ellspay ancay argettay eaturescray andyay objectsyay withinyay ethay arrierbay, utbay ethay ellspay ashay onay effectyay onyay emthay. 
 Imilarlysay, ethay areayay withinyay ethay arrierbay isyay excludedyay omfray ethay areasyay affectedyay ybay uchsay ellsspay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 7thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay arrierbay ocksblay ellsspay ofyay oneyay evellay igherhay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 6thay. Yphglay ofyay  Warding3rd-levelyay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 ourhay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (incenseyay andyay owderedpay iamondday worthyay atyay eastlay 200 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay)  Urationday:  Untilyay ispelledday oryay iggeredtray Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay inscribeyay ayay yphglay atthay armshay otheryay eaturescray, eitheryay uponyay ayay urfacesay (uchsay asyay ayay abletay oryay ayay ectionsay ofyay oorflay oryay wallyay) oryay withinyay anyay objectyay atthay ancay ebay osedclay (uchsay asyay ayay ookbay, ayay ollscray, oryay ayay easuretray estchay) otay oncealcay ethay yphglay. 
 Ifyay youyay oosechay ayay urfacesay, ethay yphglay ancay overcay anyay areayay ofyay ethay urfacesay onay argerlay anthay 10 eetfay inyay iameterday. 
 Ifyay youyay oosechay anyay objectyay, atthay objectyay ustmay emainray inyay itsyay aceplay; ifyay ethay objectyay isyay ovedmay oremay anthay 10 eetfay omfray whereyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, ethay yphglay isyay okenbray, andyay ethay ellspay endsyay withoutyay eingbay iggeredtray. Ethay yphglay isyay earlynay invisibleyay andyay equiresray ayay uccessfulsay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay otay ebay oundfay. Youyay ecideday whatyay iggerstray ethay yphglay whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay. 
 Orfay yphsglay inscribedyay onyay ayay urfacesay, ethay ostmay ypicaltay iggerstray includeyay ouchingtay oryay andingstay onyay ethay yphglay, emovingray anotheryay objectyay overingcay ethay yphglay, approachingyay withinyay ayay ertaincay istanceday ofyay ethay yphglay, oryay anipulatingmay ethay objectyay onyay whichyay ethay yphglay isyay inscribedyay. 
iggerstray includeyay openingyay atthay objectyay, approachingyay withinyay ayay ertaincay istanceday ofyay ethay objectyay, oryay eeingsay oryay eadingray ethay yphglay. 
 Onceyay ayay yphglay isyay iggeredtray, isthay ellspay endsyay. Youyay ancay urtherfay efineray ethay iggertray osay ethay ellspay activatesyay onlyyay underyay ertaincay ircumstancescay oryay accordingyay otay ysicalphay aracteristicschay (uchsay asyay eighthay oryay weightyay), eaturecray indkay (orfay exampleyay, ethay wardyay ouldcay ebay etsay otay affectyay aberrationsyay oryay owdray), oryay alignmentyay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay etsay onditionscay orfay eaturescray atthay on’tday iggertray ethay yphglay, uchsay asyay osethay whoyay aysay ayay ertaincay asswordpay. Whenyay youyay inscribeyay ethay yphglay, oosechay explosiveyay unesray oryay ayay ellspay yphglay. Explosiveyay  Unesray. 
 Whenyay iggeredtray, ethay yphglay eruptsyay withyay agicalmay energyyay inyay ayay 20-oot-radiusfay eresphay enteredcay onyay ethay yphglay. 
 Ethay eresphay eadsspray aroundyay ornerscay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ethay areayay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 5day8 acidyay, oldcay, irefay, ightninglay, oryay underthay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avingsay owthray (youryay oicechay whenyay youyay eatecray ethay yphglay), oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Ellspay  Yphglay. 
 Youyay ancay orestay ayay eparedpray ellspay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay owerlay inyay ethay yphglay ybay astingcay ityay asyay artpay ofyay eatingcray ethay yphglay. 
 Ethay ellspay ustmay argettay ayay inglesay eaturecray oryay anyay areayay. 
 Ethay ellspay eingbay oredstay ashay onay immediateyay effectyay whenyay astcay inyay isthay wayyay. 
 Whenyay ethay yphglay isyay iggeredtray, ethay oredstay ellspay isyay astcay. 
 Ifyay ethay ellspay ashay ayay argettay, ityay argetstay ethay eaturecray atthay iggeredtray ethay yphglay. Ifyay ethay ellspay affectsyay anyay areayay, ethay areayay isyay enteredcay onyay atthay eaturecray. 
 Ifyay ethay ellspay ummonssay ostilehay eaturescray oryay eatescray armfulhay objectsyay oryay apstray, eythay appearyay asyay oseclay asyay ossiblepay otay ethay intruderyay andyay attackyay ityay. 
 Ifyay ethay ellspay equiresray oncentrationcay, ityay astslay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay itsyay ullfay urationday. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday ofyay anyay explosiveyay unesray yphglay increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 3rday. 
 Ifyay youyay eatecray ayay ellspay yphglay, youyay ancay orestay anyyay ellspay ofyay upyay otay ethay amesay evellay asyay ethay otslay youyay useyay orfay ethay yphglay ofyay wardingyay. Oodberry1st-levelgay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay igspray ofyay istletoemay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Upyay otay entay erriesbay appearyay inyay youryay andhay andyay areyay infusedyay withyay agicmay orfay ethay urationday. 
Ayay eaturecray ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay eatyay oneyay errybay. 
 Eatingyay ayay errybay estoresray 1 ithay ointpay, andyay ethay errybay ovidespray enoughyay ourishmentnay otay ustainsay ayay eaturecray orfay oneyay ayday. Ethay erriesbay oselay eirthay otencypay ifyay eythay avehay otnay eenbay onsumedcay withinyay 24 ourshay ofyay ethay astingcay ofyay isthay ellspay. Aspinggray  Inevay 4levelthlay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay onjurecay ayay inevay atthay outsspray omfray ethay oundgray inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay ancay irectday ethay inevay otay ashlay outyay atyay ayay eaturecray withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay ityay atthay youyay ancay eesay. 
 Atthay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay ebay ulledpay 20 eetfay irectlyday owardtay ethay inevay. Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay irectday ethay inevay otay ashlay outyay atyay ethay amesay eaturecray oryay anotheryay oneyay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay. Ease1st-levelgray onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay orkpay indray oryay utterbay)  Urationday: 1 inutemay Ickslay easegray overscay ethay oundgray inyay ayay 10-ootfay quaresay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay withinyay angeray andyay urnstay ityay intoyay ifficultday erraintay orfay ethay urationday. Whenyay ethay easegray appearsyay, eachyay eaturecray andingstay inyay itsyay areayay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay allfay onepray. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay entersyay ethay areayay oryay endsyay itsyay urntay erethay ustmay alsoyay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay allfay onepray. Eatergray  Invisibilityyay 4levelthlay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay oryay ayay eaturecray youyay ouchtay ecomesbay invisibleyay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Anythingyay ethay argettay isyay wearingyay oryay arryingcay isyay invisibleyay asyay onglay asyay ityay isyay onyay ethay arget’stay ersonpay. Eatergray  Estorationray 5levelthlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (iamondday ustday worthyay atyay eastlay 100 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay imbueyay ayay eaturecray youyay ouchtay withyay ositivepay energyyay otay undoyay ayay ebilitatingday effectyay. 
ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay uardiangay occupiesyay atthay acespay andyay isyay indistinctyay exceptyay orfay ayay eamingglay wordsay andyay ieldshay emblazonedyay withyay ethay ymbolsay ofyay youryay eityday. Anyyay eaturecray ostilehay otay youyay atthay ovesmay otay ayay acespay withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay ethay uardiangay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Ethay eaturecray akestay 20 adiantray amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
 Ethay uardiangay anishesvay whenyay ityay ashay ealtday ayay otaltay ofyay 60 amageday. Uardsgay andyay  Wards6th-levelyay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (urningbay incenseyay, ayay allsmay easuremay ofyay imstonebray andyay oilyay, ayay ottedknay ingstray, ayay allsmay amountyay ofyay umberyay ulkhay oodblay, andyay ayay allsmay ilversay odray worthyay atyay eastlay 10 gpay) Urationday: 24 ourshay Youyay eatecray ayay wardyay atthay otectspray upyay otay 2,500 quaresay eetfay ofyay oorflay acespay (anyay areayay 50 eetfay quaresay, oryay oneyay undredhay 5-ootfay quaressay oryay wenty-fivetay 10-ootfay quaressay). 
 Ethay wardedyay areayay ancay ebay upyay otay 20 eetfay alltay, andyay apedshay asyay youyay esireday. 
 Youyay ancay wardyay everalsay oriesstay ofyay ayay ongholdstray ybay ividingday ethay areayay amongyay emthay, asyay onglay asyay youyay ancay walkyay intoyay eachyay ontiguouscay areayay whileyay youyay areyay astingcay ethay ellspay. Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay ancay ecifyspay individualsyay atthay areyay unaffectedyay ybay anyyay oryay allyay ofyay ethay effectsyay atthay youyay oosechay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay ecifyspay ayay asswordpay atthay, whenyay okenspay aloudyay, akesmay ethay eakerspay immuneyay otay esethay effectsyay. Uardsgay andyay wardsyay eatescray ethay ollowingfay effectsyay withinyay ethay wardedyay areayay. Orridorscay. 
 Ogfay illsfay allyay ethay wardedyay orridorscay, akingmay emthay eavilyhay obscuredyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, atyay eachyay intersectionyay oryay anchingbray assagepay offeringyay ayay oicechay ofyay irectionday, erethay isyay ayay 50 ercentpay ancechay atthay ayay eaturecray otheryay anthay youyay willyay elievebay ityay isyay oinggay inyay ethay oppositeyay irectionday omfray ethay oneyay ityay ooseschay. Oorsday. 
 Allyay oorsday inyay ethay wardedyay areayay areyay agicallymay ockedlay, asyay ifyay ealedsay ybay anyay arcaneyay ocklay ellspay. 
 Inyay additionyay, youyay ancay overcay upyay otay entay oorsday withyay anyay illusionyay (equivalentyay otay ethay illusoryyay objectyay unctionfay ofyay ethay inormay illusionyay ellspay) otay akemay emthay appearyay asyay ainplay ectionssay ofyay wallyay. Airsstay. 
 Websyay illfay allyay airsstay inyay ethay wardedyay areayay omfray optay otay ottombay, asyay ethay webyay ellspay. 
 Esethay andsstray egrowray inyay 10 inutesmay ifyay eythay areyay urnedbay oryay orntay awayyay whileyay uardsgay andyay wardsyay astslay. Otheryay  Ellspay  Effectyay. 
 Youyay ancay aceplay youryay oicechay ofyay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay agicalmay effectsyay withinyay ethay wardedyay areayay ofyay ethay ongholdstray.•  Aceplay ancingday ightslay inyay ourfay orridorscay. 
 Youyay ancay esig­nateday ayay implesay ogrampray atthay ethay ightslay epeatray asyay onglay asyay uardsgay andyay wardsyay astslay.•  Aceplay agicmay outhmay inyay wotay ocationslay.•  Aceplay inkingstay oudclay inyay wotay ocationslay. 
 Ethay aporsvay appearyay inyay ethay acesplay youyay esignateday; eythay eturnray withinyay 10 inutesmay ifyay ispersedday ybay windyay whileyay uardsgay andyay wardsyay astslay.•  Aceplay ayay onstantcay ustgay ofyay windyay inyay oneyay orridorcay oryay oomray.•  Aceplay ayay uggestionsay inyay oneyay ocationlay. 
 Youyay electsay anyay areayay ofyay upyay otay 5 eetfay quaresay, andyay anyyay eaturecray atthay entersyay oryay assespay oughthray ethay areayay eceivesray ethay uggestionsay entallymay. Ethay wholeyay wardedyay areayay adiatesray agicmay. 
Ayay ispelday agicmay astcay onyay ayay ecificspay effectyay, ifyay uccessfulsay, emovesray onlyyay atthay effectyay. Youyay ancay eatecray ayay ermanentlypay uardedgay andyay wardedyay ucturestray ybay astingcay isthay ellspay erethay everyyay ayday orfay oneyay yearyay. Uidancegay  Ivinationday antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay ouchtay oneyay willingyay eaturecray. 
 Onceyay eforebay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argettay ancay ollray ayay day4 andyay addyay ethay umbernay olledray otay oneyay abilityyay eckchay ofyay itsyay oicechay. 
 Ityay ancay ollray ethay ieday eforebay oryay afteryay akingmay ethay abilityyay eckchay. 
 Ethay ellspay enthay endsyay. Uidinggay  Oltbay 1levelstlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 oundray Ayay ashflay ofyay ightlay eaksstray owardtay ayay eaturecray ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray. 
 Akemay ayay angedray ellspay attackyay againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 4day6 adiantray amageday, andyay ethay extnay attackyay ollray ademay againstyay isthay argettay eforebay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay ashay advantageyay, anksthay otay ethay ysticalmay imday ightlay itteringglay onyay ethay argettay untilyay enthay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day6 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Ustgay ofyay  Wind2nd-levelyay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (60-ootfay inelay) Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay egumelay eedsay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ayay inelay ofyay ongstray windyay 60 eetfay onglay andyay 10 eetfay wideyay astsblay omfray youyay inyay ayay irectionday youyay oosechay orfay ethay ell’sspay urationday. 
 Eachyay eaturecray atthay artsstay itsyay urntay inyay ethay inelay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Engthstray avingsay owthray oryay ebay ushedpay 15 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay inyay ayay irectionday ollowingfay ethay inelay. Anyyay eaturecray inyay ethay inelay ustmay endspay 2 eetfay ofyay ovementmay orfay everyyay 1 ootfay ityay ovesmay whenyay ovingmay oserclay otay youyay. Ethay ustgay ispersesday asgay oryay aporvay, andyay ityay extinguishesyay andlescay, orchestay, andyay imilarsay unprotectedyay amesflay inyay ethay areayay. 
 Ailhay ofyay  Orns1st-levelthay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ethay extnay imetay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay angedray weaponyay attackyay eforebay ethay ellspay endsyay, isthay ellspay eatescray ayay ainray ofyay ornsthay atthay outsspray omfray youryay angedray weaponyay oryay ammunitionyay. 
 Inyay additionyay otay ethay ormalnay effectyay ofyay ethay attackyay, ethay argettay ofyay ethay attackyay andyay eachyay eaturecray withinyay5 eetfay ofyay ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 1dlay Oyay iercingpay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day10 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay (otay ayay aximummay ofyay 6day10). Allow5th-levelhay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 24 ourshay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (erbshay, oilsyay, andyay incenseyay worthyay atyay eastlay 1,000 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Untilyay ispelledday Youyay ouchtay ayay ointpay andyay infuseyay anyay areayay aroundyay ityay withyay olyhay (oryay unholyyay) owerpay. 
 Ethay areayay ancay avehay ayay adiusray upyay otay 60 eetfay, andyay ethay ellspay ailsfay ifyay ethay adiusray includesyay anyay areayay alreadyyay underyay ethay effectyay ayay allowhay ellspay. 
 Ethay affectedyay areayay isyay ubjectsay otay ethay ollowingfay effectsyay. Irstfay, elestialscay, elementalsyay, eyfay, iendsfay, andyay undeadyay an’tcay enteryay ethay areayay, ornay ancay uchsay eaturescray armchay, ightenfray, oryay ossesspay eaturescray withinyay ityay. 
 Anyyay eaturecray armedchay, ightenedfray, oryay ossessedpay ybay uchsay ayay eaturecray isyay onay ongerlay armedchay, ightenedfray, oryay ossessedpay uponyay enteringyay ethay areayay. 
 Youyay ancay excludeyay oneyay oryay oremay ofyay osethay ypestay ofyay eaturescray omfray isthay effectyay. Econdsay, youyay ancay indbay anyay extrayay effectyay otay ethay areayay. 
 Oosechay ethay effectyay omfray ethay ollowingfay istlay, oryay oosechay anyay effectyay offeredyay ybay ethay DMay. 
 Omesay ofyay esethay effectsyay applyyay otay eaturescray inyay ethay areayay; youyay ancay esignateday whetheryay ethay effectyay appliesyay otay allyay eaturescray, eaturescray atthay ollowfay ayay ecificspay eityday oryay eaderlay, oryay eaturescray ofyay ayay ecificspay ortsay, uchsay asyay oresyay oryay ollstray. 
 Whenyay ayay eaturecray atthay wouldyay ebay affectedyay entersyay ethay ell’sspay areayay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay artsstay itsyay urntay erethay, ityay ancay akemay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ethay eaturecray ignoresyay ethay extrayay effectyay untilyay ityay eaveslay ethay areayay. Ouragecay. 
 Affectedyay eaturescray an’tcay ebay ightenedfray whileyay inyay ethay areayay. Arknessday. 
 Arknessday illsfay ethay areayay. 
 Ormalnay ightlay, asyay wellyay asyay agicalmay ightlay eatedcray ybay ellsspay ofyay ayay owerlay evellay anthay ethay otslay youyay usedyay otay astcay isthay ellspay, an’tcay illuminateyay ethay areayay. Aylightday. 
 Ightbray ightlay illsfay ethay areayay. 
 Agicalmay arknessday eatedcray ybay ellsspay ofyay ayay owerlay evellay anthay ethay otslay youyay usedyay otay astcay isthay ellspay an’tcay extinguishyay ethay ightlay. Energyyay  Otectionpray. 
 Affectedyay eaturescray inyay ethay areayay avehay esistanceray otay oneyay amageday ypetay ofyay youryay oicechay, exceptyay orfay udgeoningblay, iercingpay, oryay ashingslay. Energyyay  Ulnerabilityvay. 
 Affectedyay eaturescray inyay ethay areayay avehay ulnerabilityvay otay oneyay amageday ypetay ofyay youryay oicechay, exceptyay orfay udgeoningblay, iercingpay, oryay ashingslay. Everlastingyay  Estray. 
 Eadday odiesbay interredyay inyay ethay areayay an’tcay ebay urnedtay intoyay undeadyay. Extradimensionalyay  Interferenceyay. 
 Affectedyay eaturescray an’tcay ovemay oryay aveltray usingyay eleportationtay oryay ybay extradimensionalyay oryay interplanaryay eansmay. Earfay. 
 Affectedyay eaturescray areyay ightenedfray whileyay inyay ethay areayay. Ilencesay. 
 Onay oundsay ancay emanateyay omfray withinyay ethay areayay, andyay onay oundsay ancay eachray intoyay ityay. Onguestay. 
 Affectedyay eaturescray ancay ommunicatecay withyay anyyay otheryay eaturecray inyay ethay areayay, evenyay ifyay eythay on’tday areshay ayay ommoncay anguagelay. Allucinatoryhay  Erraintay 4levelthlay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray: 300 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay onestay, ayay wigtay, andyay ayay itbay ofyay eengray antplay) Urationday: 24 ourshay Youyay akemay aturalnay erraintay inyay ayay 150-ootfay ubecay inyay angeray ooklay, oundsay, andyay ellsmay ikelay omesay otheryay ortsay ofyay aturalnay erraintay. 
 Usthay, openyay ieldsfay oryay ayay oadray ancay ebay ademay otay esembleray ayay wampsay, illhay, evassecray, oryay omesay otheryay ifficultday oryay impassableyay erraintay. 
Ayay ondpay ancay ebay ademay otay eemsay ikelay ayay assygray eadowmay, ayay ecipicepray ikelay ayay entlegay opeslay, oryay ayay ock-strewnray ullygay ikelay ayay wideyay andyay oothsmay oadray. 
 Anufacturedmay ucturesstray, equipmentyay, andyay eaturescray withinyay ethay areayay aren’tyay angedchay inyay appearanceyay. Ethay actiletay aracteristicschay ofyay ethay erraintay areyay unchangedyay, osay eaturescray enteringyay ethay areayay areyay ikelylay otay eesay oughthray ethay illusionyay. 
 Ifyay ethay ifferenceday isn’tyay obviousyay ybay ouchtay, ayay eaturecray arefullycay examiningyay ethay illusionyay ancay attemptyay anyay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay otay isbelieveday ityay. 
Ayay eaturecray whoyay iscernsday ethay illusionyay orfay whatyay ityay isyay, eessay ityay asyay ayay aguevay imageyay uperimposedsay onyay ethay erraintay. Arm6th-levelhay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay unleashyay ayay irulentvay iseaseday onyay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ityay akestay 14day6 ecroticnay amageday, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay. 
 Ethay amageday an’tcay educeray ethay arget’stay ithay ointspay elowbay 1. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay ailsfay ethay avingsay owthray, itsyay ithay ointpay aximummay isyay educedray orfay 1 ourhay ybay anyay amountyay equalyay otay ethay ecroticnay amageday ityay ooktay. 
 Aste3rd-levelhay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay avingshay ofyay icoricelay ootray)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Oosechay ayay willingyay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay arget’stay eedspay isyay oubledday, ityay ainsgay ayay +2 onusbay otay ACyay, ityay ashay advantageyay onyay  Exterityday avingsay owsthray, andyay ityay ainsgay anyay additionalyay actionyay onyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay. 
 Atthay actionyay ancay ebay usedyay onlyyay otay aketay ethay  Attackyay (oneyay weaponyay attackyay onlyyay),  Ashday,  Isengageday,  Idehay, oryay  Useyay anyay  Objectyay actionyay. Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argettay an’tcay ovemay oryay aketay actionsyay untilyay afteryay itsyay extnay urntay, asyay ayay waveyay ofyay ethargylay weepssay overyay ityay. Eal6th-levelhay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Oosechay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
Ayay urgesay ofyay ositivepay energyyay washesyay oughthray ethay eaturecray, ausingcay ityay otay egainray 70 ithay ointspay. 
 Isthay ellspay alsoyay endsyay indnessblay, eafnessday, andyay anyyay iseasesday affectingyay ethay argettay. 
 Isthay ellspay ashay onay effectyay onyay onstructscay oryay undeadyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 7thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amountyay ofyay ealinghay increasesyay ybay 10 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 6thay. Ealinghay  Word1st-levelyay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay eaturecray ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray egainsray ithay ointspay equalyay otay 1day4 + youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay odifiermay. 
 Isthay ellspay ashay onay effectyay onyay undeadyay oryay onstructscay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay ealinghay increasesyay ybay 1day4 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Eathay  Etal2nd-levelmay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iecepay ofyay ironyay andyay ayay ameflay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Oosechay ayay anufacturedmay etalmay objectyay, uchsay asyay ayay etalmay weaponyay oryay ayay uitsay ofyay eavyhay oryay ediummay etalmay armoryay, atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay ausecay ethay objectyay otay owglay ed-hotray. 
 Anyyay eaturecray inyay ysicalphay ontactcay withyay ethay objectyay akestay 2day8 irefay amageday whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay ubsequentsay urnstay otay ausecay isthay amageday againyay. Ifyay ayay eaturecray isyay oldinghay oryay wearingyay ethay objectyay andyay akestay ethay amageday omfray ityay, ethay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray oryay opdray ethay objectyay ifyay ityay ancay. 
 Ifyay ityay oesn’tday opdray ethay objectyay, ityay ashay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray andyay abilityyay eckschay untilyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Ellishhay  Ebuke1st-levelray evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 eactionray, whichyay youyay aketay inyay esponseray otay eingbay amagedday ybay ayay eaturecray withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay atthay youyay ancay eesay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ointpay youryay ingerfay, andyay ethay eaturecray atthay amagedday youyay isyay omentarilymay urroundedsay ybay ellishhay amesflay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Ityay akestay 2day10 irefay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1dlay Oyay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Eroeshay’  East6th-levelfay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay em-encrustedgay owlbay worthyay atyay eastlay 1,000 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ingbray orthfay ayay eatgray eastfay, includingyay agnificentmay oodfay andyay inkdray. 
 Ethay eastfay akestay 1 ourhay otay onsumecay andyay isappearsday atyay ethay endyay ofyay atthay imetay, andyay ethay eneficialbay effectsyay on’tday etsay inyay untilyay isthay ourhay isyay overyay. 
 Upyay otay welvetay otheryay eaturescray ancay artakepay ofyay ethay east.Afay eaturecray atthay artakespay ofyay ethay eastfay ainsgay everalsay enefitsbay. 
 Ethay eaturecray isyay uredcay ofyay allyay iseasesday andyay oisonpay, ecomesbay immuneyay otay oisonpay andyay eingbay ightenedfray, andyay akesmay allyay  Wisdomyay avingsay owsthray withyay advantageyay. 
 Itsyay ithay ointpay aximummay alsoyay increasesyay ybay 2day10, andyay ityay ainsgay ethay amesay umbernay ofyay ithay ointspay. 
 Esethay enefitsbay astlay orfay 24 ourshay. Eroism1st-levelhay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ayay willingyay eaturecray youyay ouchtay isyay imbuedyay withyay averybray. Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay eaturecray isyay immuneyay otay eingbay ightenedfray andyay ainsgay emporarytay ithay ointspay equalyay otay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay odifiermay atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay. 
 Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay argettay oneyay additionalyay eaturecray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Ex1st-levelhay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray: 90 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ethay etrifiedpay eyeyay ofyay ayay ewtnay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay aceplay ayay ursecay onyay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ealday anyay extrayay 1day6 ecroticnay amageday otay ethay argettay wheneveryay youyay ithay ityay withyay anyay attackyay. 
 Alsoyay, oosechay oneyay abilityyay whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay. 
 Ethay argettay ashay isadvantageday onyay abilityyay eckschay ademay withyay ethay osenchay abilityyay. Ifyay ethay argettay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay eforebay isthay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay ayay ubsequentsay urntay ofyay yoursyay otay ursecay ayay ewnay eature.Acray emoveray ursecay astcay onyay ethay argettay endsyay isthay ellspay earlyyay. 
 Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday oryay 4thay evellay, youyay ancay aintainmay youryay oncentrationcay onyay ethay ellspay orfay upyay otay 8 ourshay. 
 Whenyay youyay useyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 5thay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay aintainmay youryay oncentrationcay onyay ethay ellspay orfay upyay otay 24 ourshay. Oldhay  Onstermay 5levelthlay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 90 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay, aightstray iecepay ofyay ironyay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Oosechay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ebay aralyzedpay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Isthay ellspay ashay onay effectyay onyay undeadyay. 
 Atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay, ethay argettay ancay akemay anotheryay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ethay ellspay endsyay onyay ethay argettay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay argettay oneyay additionalyay eaturecray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 5thay. 
 Ethay eaturescray ustmay ebay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay eachyay otheryay whenyay youyay argettay emthay. Oldhay  Erson2nd-levelpay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay, aightstray iecepay ofyay ironyay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Oosechay ayay umanoidhay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. Ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ebay aralyzedpay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay, ethay argettay ancay akemay anotheryay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ethay ellspay endsyay onyay ethay argettay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay argettay oneyay additionalyay umanoidhay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. 
 Ethay umanoidshay ustmay ebay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay eachyay otheryay whenyay youyay argettay emthay. Olyhay  Aura8th-levelyay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inytay eliquaryray worthyay atyay eastlay1,000 gpay ontainingcay ayay acredsay elicray, uchsay asyay ayay apscray ofyay othclay omfray ayay aint’ssay oberay oryay ayay iecepay ofyay archmentpay omfray ayay eligiousray exttay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ivineday ightlay washesyay outyay omfray youyay andyay oalescescay inyay ayay oftsay adianceray inyay ayay 30-ootfay adiusray aroundyay youyay. 
 Eaturescray ofyay youryay oicechay inyay atthay adiusray whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay edshay imday ightlay inyay ayay 5-ootfay adiusray andyay avehay advantageyay onyay allyay avingsay owsthray, andyay otheryay eaturescray avehay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay emthay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, whenyay ayay iendfay oryay anyay undeadyay itshay anyay affectedyay eaturecray withyay ayay eleemay attackyay, ethay aurayay ashesflay withyay illiantbray ightlay. 
 Ethay attackeryay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray oryay ebay indedblay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Ungerhay ofyay  Adar3rd-levelhay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 150 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay ickledpay octopusyay entacletay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay openyay ayay atewaygay otay ethay arkday etweenbay ethay arsstay, ayay egionray infestedyay withyay unknownyay orrorshay. 
Ayay 20-oot-radiusfay eresphay ofyay acknessblay andyay itterbay oldcay appearsyay, enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay withyay angeray andyay astinglay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Isthay oidvay isyay illedfay withyay ayay acophonycay ofyay oftsay whispersyay andyay urpingslay oisesnay atthay ancay ebay eardhay upyay otay 30 eetfay awayyay. 
 Onay ightlay, agicalmay oryay otherwiseyay, ancay illuminateyay ethay areayay, andyay eaturescray ullyfay withinyay ethay areayay areyay indedblay. Ethay oidvay eatescray ayay warpyay inyay ethay abricfay ofyay acespay, andyay ethay areayay isyay ifficultday erraintay. 
 Anyyay eaturecray atthay artsstay itsyay urntay inyay ethay areayay akestay 2day6 oldcay amageday. 
 Anyyay eaturecray atthay endsyay itsyay urntay inyay ethay areayay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay aketay 2day6 acidyay amageday asyay ilkymay, otherworldlyyay entaclestay ubray againstyay ityay. Unter’shay  Ark1st-levelmay ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray: 90 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay oosechay ayay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray andyay ysticallymay arkmay ityay asyay youryay quarryyay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ealday anyay extrayay 1day6 amageday otay ethay argettay wheneveryay youyay ithay ityay withyay ayay weaponyay attackyay, andyay youyay avehay advantageyay onyay anyyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) oryay  Wisdomyay ( Urvivalsay) eckchay youyay akemay otay indfay ityay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay eforebay isthay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay ayay ubsequentsay urntay ofyay yoursyay otay arkmay ayay ewnay eaturecray. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday oryay 4thay evellay, youyay ancay aintainmay youryay oncentrationcay onyay ethay ellspay orfay upyay otay 8 ourshay. 
 Ypnotichay  Atternpay 3levelrdlay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Say, May (ayay owingglay ickstay ofyay incenseyay oryay ayay ystalcray ialvay illedfay withyay osphorescentphay aterialmay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay eatecray ayay wistingtay atternpay ofyay olorscay atthay weavesyay oughthray ethay airyay insideyay ayay 30-ootfay ubecay withinyay angeray. Ethay atternpay appearsyay orfay ayay omentmay andyay anishesvay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ethay areayay whoyay eessay ethay atternpay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray ecomesbay armedchay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Whileyay armedchay ybay isthay ellspay, ethay eaturecray isyay incapacitatedyay andyay ashay ayay eedspay ofyay 0. Ethay ellspay endsyay orfay anyay affectedyay eaturecray ifyay ityay akestay anyyay amageday oryay ifyay omeonesay elseyay usesyay anyay actionyay otay akeshay ethay eaturecray outyay ofyay itsyay uporstay. Iceyay  Orm4th-levelstay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 300 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay ustday andyay ayay ewfay opsdray ofyay wateryay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay ailhay ofyay ock-hardray iceyay oundspay otay ethay oundgray inyay ayay 20-oot-radiusfay, 40-oot-highfay ylindercay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay withinyay angeray. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ethay ylindercay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 2day8 udgeoningblay amageday andyay 4day6 oldcay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Ailstoneshay urntay ethay orm'sstay areayay ofyay effectyay intoyay ifficultday erraintay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 5thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay udgeoningblay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 4thay. Identify1st-levelyay ivinationday (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay earlpay worthyay atyay eastlay 100 gpay andyay anyay owlyay eatherfay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay oosechay oneyay objectyay atthay youyay ustmay ouchtay oughoutthray ethay astingcay ofyay ethay ellspay. 
 Ifyay ityay isyay ayay agicmay itemyay oryay omesay otheryay agic-imbuedmay objectyay, youyay earnlay itsyay opertiespray andyay owhay otay useyay emthay, whetheryay ityay equiresray attunementyay otay useyay, andyay owhay anymay argeschay ityay ashay, ifyay anyyay. 
 Youyay earnlay whetheryay anyyay ellsspay areyay affectingyay ethay itemyay andyay whatyay eythay areyay. 
 Ifyay ethay itemyay wasyay eatedcray ybay ayay ellspay, youyay earnlay whichyay ellspay eatedcray ityay. Ifyay youyay insteadyay ouchtay ayay eaturecray oughoutthray ethay astingcay, youyay earnlay whatyay ellsspay, ifyay anyyay, areyay urrentlycay affectingyay ityay. Illusoryyay  Iptscray 1levelstlay illusionyay (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Say, May (ayay ead-basedlay inkyay worthyay atyay eastlay 10 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday: 10 aysday Youyay writeyay onyay archmentpay, aperpay, oryay omesay otheryay uitablesay writingyay aterialmay andyay imbueyay ityay withyay ayay otentpay illusionyay atthay astslay orfay ethay urationday. Otay youyay andyay anyyay eaturescray youyay esignateday whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, ethay writingyay appearsyay ormalnay, writtenyay inyay youryay andhay, andyay onveyscay whateveryay eaningmay youyay intendedyay whenyay youyay wroteyay ethay exttay. 
 Otay allyay othersyay, ethay writingyay appearsyay asyay ifyay ityay wereyay writtenyay inyay anyay unknownyay oryay agicalmay iptscray atthay isyay unintelligibleyay. 
 Alternativelyyay, youyay ancay ausecay ethay writingyay otay appearyay otay ebay anyay entirelyyay ifferentday essagemay, writtenyay inyay ayay ifferentday andhay andyay anguagelay, oughthay ethay anguagelay ustmay ebay oneyay youyay owknay. Ouldshay ethay ellspay ebay ispelledday, ethay originalyay iptscray andyay ethay illusionyay othbay isappear.Aday eaturecray withyay uesighttray ancay eadray ethay iddenhay essagemay.
