Imprisonmentyay 9levelthlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay ellumvay epictionday oryay ayay arvedcay atuettestay inyay ethay ikenesslay ofyay ethay argettay, andyay ayay ecialspay omponentcay atthay ariesvay accordingyay otay ethay ersionvay ofyay ethay ellspay youyay oosechay, worthyay atyay eastlay 500 gpay erpay  Ithay  Ieday ofyay ethay argettay) Urationday:  Untilyay ispelledday Youyay eatecray ayay agicalmay estraintray otay oldhay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ebay oundbay ybay ethay ellspay; ifyay ityay ucceedssay, ityay isyay immuneyay otay isthay ellspay ifyay youyay astcay ityay againyay. 
 Whileyay affectedyay ybay isthay ellspay, ethay eaturecray oesn'tday eednay otay eathebray, eatyay, oryay inkdray, andyay ityay oesn’tday ageyay. 
 Ivinationday ellsspay an’tcay ocatelay oryay erceivepay ethay argettay. Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, youyay oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay ormsfay ofyay imprisonmentyay. Urialbay. 
 Ethay argettay isyay entombedyay arfay eneathbay ethay earthyay inyay ayay eresphay ofyay agicalmay orcefay atthay isyay ustjay argelay enoughyay otay ontaincay ethay argettay. 
 Othingnay ancay asspay oughthray ethay eresphay, ornay ancay anyyay eaturecray eleporttay oryay useyay anarplay aveltray otay etgay intoyay oryay outyay ofyay ityay. Ethay ecialspay omponentcay orfay isthay ersionvay ofyay ethay ellspay isyay ayay allsmay ithralmay orbyay. Ainingchay. 
 Eavyhay ainschay, irmlyfay ootedray inyay ethay oundgray, oldhay ethay argettay inyay aceplay. 
 Ethay argettay isyay estrainedray untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, andyay ityay an’tcay ovemay oryay ebay ovedmay ybay anyyay eansmay untilyay enthay. Ethay ecialspay omponentcay orfay isthay ersionvay ofyay ethay ellspay isyay ayay inefay ainchay ofyay eciouspray etalmay. Edgedhay  Isonpray. 
 Ethay ellspay ansportstray ethay argettay intoyay ayay inytay emiplaneday atthay isyay wardedyay againstyay eleportationtay andyay anarplay aveltray. 
 Ethay emiplaneday ancay ebay ayay abyrinthlay, ayay agecay, ayay owertay, oryay anyyay imilarsay onfinedcay ucturestray oryay areayay ofyay youryay oicechay. Ethay ecialspay omponentcay orfay isthay ersionvay ofyay ethay ellspay isyay ayay iniaturemay epresentationray ofyay ethay isonpray ademay omfray adejay. Inimusmay  Ontainmentcay. 
objectyay. 
 Ightlay ancay asspay oughthray ethay emstonegay ormallynay (allowingyay ethay argettay otay eesay outyay andyay otheryay eaturescray otay eesay inyay), utbay othingnay elseyay ancay asspay oughthray, evenyay ybay eansmay ofyay eleportationtay oryay anarplay aveltray. 
 Ethay emstonegay an’tcay ebay utcay oryay okenbray whileyay ethay ellspay emainsray inyay effectyay. Ethay ecialspay omponentcay orfay isthay ersionvay ofyay ethay ellspay isyay ayay argelay, ansparenttray emstonegay, uchsay asyay ayay orundumcay, iamondday, oryay ubyray. Umberslay. 
 Ethay argettay allsfay asleepyay andyay an’tcay ebay awokenyay. 
 Ethay ecialspay omponentcay orfay isthay ersionvay ofyay ethay ellspay onsistscay ofyay areray oporificsay erbshay. Endingyay ethay  Ellspay. 
 Uringday ethay astingcay ofyay ethay ellspay, inyay anyyay ofyay itsyay ersionsvay, youyay ancay ecifyspay ayay onditioncay atthay willyay ausecay ethay ellspay otay endyay andyay eleaseray ethay argettay. 
 Ethay onditioncay ancay ebay asyay ecificspay oryay asyay elaborateyay asyay youyay oosechay, utbay ethay DMay ustmay agreeyay atthay ethay onditioncay isyay easonableray andyay ashay ayay ikelihoodlay ofyay omingcay otay asspay. 
 Ethay onditionscay ancay ebay asedbay onyay ayay eature’scray amenay, identityyay, oryay eityday utbay otherwiseyay ustmay ebay asedbay onyay observableyay actionsyay oryay qualitiesyay andyay otnay asedbay onyay intangiblesyay uchsay asyay evellay, assclay, oryay ithay oints.Apay ispelday agicmay ellspay ancay endyay ethay ellspay onlyyay ifyay ityay isyay astcay asyay ayay 9levelthlay ellspay, argetingtay eitheryay ethay isonpray oryay ethay ecialspay omponentcay usedyay otay eatecray ityay. Youyay ancay useyay ayay articularpay ecialspay omponentcay otay eatecray onlyyay oneyay isonpray atyay ayay imetay. 
 Ifyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay againyay usingyay ethay amesay omponentcay, ethay argettay ofyay ethay irstfay astingcay isyay immediatelyyay eedfray omfray itsyay indingbay. Incendiaryyay  Oudclay 8levelthlay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 150 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ayay wirlingsay oudclay ofyay okesmay otshay oughthray withyay white-hotyay embersyay appearsyay inyay ayay 20-oot-radiusfay eresphay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay oudclay eadsspray aroundyay ornerscay andyay isyay eavilyhay obscuredyay. 
 Ityay astslay orfay ethay urationday oryay untilyay ayay windyay ofyay oderatemay oryay eatergray eedspay (atyay eastlay 10 ilesmay erpay ourhay) ispersesday ityay. Whenyay ethay oudclay appearsyay, eachyay eaturecray inyay ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 10day8 irefay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
Ayay eaturecray ustmay alsoyay akemay isthay avingsay owthray whenyay ityay entersyay ethay ell’sspay areayay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay endsyay itsyay urntay erethay. Ethay oudclay ovesmay 10 eetfay irectlyday awayyay omfray youyay inyay ayay irectionday atthay youyay oosechay atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay. Inflictyay  Wounds1st-levelyay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Akemay ayay eleemay ellspay attackyay againstyay ayay eaturecray youyay ancay eachray. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 3day10 ecroticnay amageday. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Insectyay  Agueplay 5levelthlay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 300 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay ewfay ainsgray ofyay ugarsay, omesay ernelskay ofyay aingray, andyay ayay earsmay ofyay atfay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Warmingsay, itingbay ocustslay illfay ayay 20-oot-radiusfay eresphay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay eresphay eadsspray aroundyay ornerscay. 
 Ethay eresphay emainsray orfay ethay urationday, andyay itsyay areayay isyay ightlylay obscuredyay. 
 Ethay ere’ssphay areayay isyay ifficultday erraintay. Whenyay ethay areayay appearsyay, eachyay eaturecray inyay ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 4day10 iercingpay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
Ayay eaturecray ustmay alsoyay akemay isthay avingsay owthray whenyay ityay entersyay ethay ell’sspay areayay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay endsyay itsyay urntay erethay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day10 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 5thay. Invisibilityyay 2levelndlay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (anyay eyelashyay encasedyay inyay umgay arabicyay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Ayay eaturecray youyay ouchtay ecomesbay invisibleyay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Anythingyay ethay argettay isyay wearingyay oryay arryingcay isyay invisibleyay asyay onglay asyay ityay isyay onyay ethay arget’stay ersonpay. 
 Ethay ellspay endsyay orfay ayay argettay atthay attacksyay oryay astscay ayay ellspay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay argettay oneyay additionalyay eaturecray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Ump1st-leveljay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay asshopper’sgray indhay eglay)  Urationday: 1 inutemay Youyay ouchtay ayay eaturecray. 
 Ethay eature’scray umpjay istanceday isyay ipledtray untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Ock2nd-levelknay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Oosechay anyay objectyay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay objectyay ancay ebay ayay oorday, ayay oxbay, ayay estchay, ayay etsay ofyay anaclesmay, ayay adlockpay, oryay anotheryay objectyay atthay ontainscay ayay undanemay oryay agicalmay eansmay atthay eventspray access.Ayay argettay atthay isyay eldhay utshay ybay ayay undanemay ocklay oryay atthay isyay uckstay oryay arredbay ecomesbay unlockedyay, unstuckyay, orunbarredyay. 
 Ifyay ethay objectyay ashay ultiplemay ockslay, onlyyay oneyay ofyay emthay isyay unlockedyay. Ifyay youyay oosechay ayay argettay atthay isyay eldhay utshay withyay arcaneyay ocklay, atthay ellspay isyay uppressedsay orfay 10 inutesmay, uringday whichyay imetay ethay argettay ancay ebay openedyay andyay utshay ormallynay. Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, ayay oudlay ockknay, audibleyay omfray asyay arfay awayyay asyay 300 eetfay, emanatesyay omfray ethay argettay objectyay. Egendlay  Orelay 5levelthlay ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (incenseyay worthyay atyay eastlay 250 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay, andyay ourfay ivoryyay ipsstray worthyay atyay eastlay 50 gpay eachyay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Amenay oryay escribeday ayay ersonpay, aceplay, oryay objectyay. 
 Ethay ellspay ingsbray otay youryay indmay ayay iefbray ummarysay ofyay ethay ignificantsay orelay aboutyay ethay ingthay youyay amednay. 
 Ethay orelay ightmay onsistcay ofyay urrentcay alestay, orgottenfay oriesstay, oryay evenyay ecretsay orelay atthay ashay evernay eenbay widelyyay ownknay. 
 Ifyay ethay ingthay youyay amednay isn’tyay ofyay egendarylay importanceyay, youyay aingay onay informationyay. 
 Ethay oremay informationyay youyay alreadyyay avehay aboutyay ethay ingthay, ethay oremay ecisepray andyay etailedday ethay informationyay youyay eceiveray isyay. Ethay informationyay youyay earnlay isyay accurateyay utbay ightmay ebay ouchedcay inyay igurativefay anguagelay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay avehay ayay ysteriousmay agicmay axeyay onyay andhay, ethay ellspay ightmay yieldyay isthay informationyay: “ Woeyay otay ethay evildoeryay whoseyay andhay ouchestay ethay axeyay, orfay evenyay ethay afthay icesslay ethay andhay ofyay ethay evilyay onesyay. 
 Onlyyay ayay uetray  Ildchay ofyay  Onestay, overlay andyay elovedbay ofyay  Oradinmay, aymay awakenyay ethay uetray owerspay ofyay ethay axeyay, andyay onlyyay withyay ethay acredsay wordyay  Udnoggray onyay ethay ipslay.” Eomund’slay  Ecretsay  Est4th-levelchay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (anyay exquisiteyay estchay, 3 eetfay ybay 2 eetfay ybay 2 eetfay, onstructedcay omfray areray aterialsmay worthyay atyay eastlay 5,000 gpay, andyay ayay  Inytay eplicaray ademay omfray ethay amesay aterialsmay worthyay atyay eastlay 50 gpay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay idehay ayay estchay, andyay allyay itsyay ontentscay, onyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay. 
 Youyay ustmay ouchtay ethay estchay andyay ethay iniaturemay eplicaray atthay ervessay asyay ayay aterialmay omponentcay orfay ethay ellspay. 
 Ethay estchay ancay ontaincay upyay otay 12 ubiccay eetfay ofyay onlivingnay aterialmay (3 eetfay ybay 2 eetfay ybay 2 eetfay). Whileyay ethay estchay emainsray onyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay, youyay ancay useyay anyay actionyay andyay ouchtay ethay eplicaray otay ecallray ethay estchay. 
 Ityay appearsyay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay onyay ethay oundgray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Youyay ancay endsay ethay estchay ackbay otay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay ybay usingyay anyay actionyay andyay ouchingtay othbay ethay estchay andyay ethay eplicaray. Afteryay 60 aysday, erethay isyay ayay umulativecay 5 ercentpay ancechay erpay ayday atthay ethay ell'sspay effectyay endsyay. 
 Isthay effectyay endsyay ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay againyay, ifyay ethay allersmay eplicaray estchay isyay estroyedday, oryay ifyay youyay oosechay otay endyay ethay ellspay asyay anyay actionyay. 
 Eomund’slay  Inytay  Uthay 3levelrdlay evocationyay (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay Angeray:  Elfsay (10-oot-radiusfay emispherehay) Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay ystalcray eadbay) Urationday: 8 ourshay Ayay 10-oot-radiusfay immobileyay omeday ofyay orcefay ingsspray intoyay existenceyay aroundyay andyay aboveyay youyay andyay emainsray ationarystay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay youyay eavelay itsyay areayay. Inenay eaturescray ofyay  Ediummay izesay oryay allersmay ancay itfay insideyay ethay omeday withyay youyay. 
 Ethay ellspay ailsfay ifyay itsyay areayay includesyay ayay argerlay eaturecray oryay oremay anthay inenay eaturescray. 
 Eaturescray andyay objectsyay withinyay ethay omeday whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay ancay ovemay oughthray ityay eelyfray. 
 Allyay otheryay eaturescray andyay objectsyay areyay arredbay omfray assingpay oughthray ityay. 
 Ellsspay andyay otheryay agicalmay effectsyay an’tcay extendyay oughthray ethay omeday oryay ebay astcay oughthray ityay. 
 Ethay atmosphereyay insideyay ethay acespay isyay omfortablecay andyay ydray, egardlessray ofyay ethay weatheryay outsideyay. Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay ommandcay ethay interioryay otay ecomebay imlyday itlay oryay arkday. 
 Ethay omeday isyay opaqueyay omfray ethay outsideyay, ofyay anyyay olorcay youyay oosechay, utbay ityay isyay ansparenttray omfray ethay insideyay. Esserlay  Estoration2nd-levelray abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ouchtay ayay eaturecray andyay ancay endyay eitheryay oneyay iseaseday oryay oneyay onditioncay afflictingyay ityay. 
 Ethay onditioncay ancay ebay indedblay, eafenedday, aralyzedpay, oryay oisonedpay. Evitate2nd-levellay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (eitheryay ayay allsmay eatherlay ooplay oryay ayay iecepay ofyay oldengay wireyay entbay intoyay ayay upcay apeshay withyay ayay onglay ankshay onyay oneyay endyay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Oneyay eaturecray oryay objectyay ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray isesray erticallyvay, upyay otay 20 eetfay, andyay emainsray uspendedsay erethay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ethay ellspay ancay evitatelay ayay argettay atthay weighsyay upyay otay 500 oundspay. 
 Anyay unwillingyay eaturecray atthay ucceedssay onyay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray isyay unaffectedyay. Ethay argettay ancay ovemay onlyyay ybay ushingpay oryay ullingpay againstyay ayay ixedfay objectyay oryay urfacesay withinyay eachray (uchsay asyay ayay wallyay oryay ayay eilingcay), whichyay allowsyay ityay otay ovemay asyay ifyay ityay wereyay imbingclay. 
 Youyay ancay angechay ethay arget’stay altitudeyay ybay upyay otay 20 eetfay inyay eitheryay irectionday onyay youryay urntay. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay ethay argettay, youyay ancay ovemay upyay oryay ownday asyay artpay ofyay youryay ovemay. 
 Otherwiseyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ovemay ethay argettay, whichyay ustmay emainray withinyay ethay ell’sspay angeray. Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argettay oatsflay entlygay otay ethay oundgray ifyay ityay isyay illstay aloftyay. Ightlay Evocationyay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, May (ayay ireflyfay oryay osphorescentphay ossmay)  Urationday: 1 ourhay Youyay ouchtay oneyay objectyay atthay isyay onay argerlay anthay 10 eetfay inyay anyyay imensionday. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay objectyay edsshay ightbray ightlay inyay ayay 20-ootfay adiusray andyay imday ightlay orfay anyay additionalyay 20 eetfay. 
 Ethay ightlay ancay ebay oloredcay asyay youyay ikelay. 
 Ompletelycay overingcay ethay objectyay withyay omethingsay opaqueyay ocksblay ethay ightlay. 
 Ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay youyay astcay ityay againyay oryay ismissday ityay asyay anyay actionyay. Ifyay youyay argettay anyay objectyay eldhay oryay wornyay ybay ayay ostilehay eaturecray, atthay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray otay avoidyay ethay ellspay. Ightninglay  Arrow3rd-levelyay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ethay extnay imetay youyay akemay ayay angedray weaponyay attackyay uringday ethay ell’sspay urationday, ethay weapon’syay ammunitionyay, oryay ethay weaponyay itselfyay ifyay it’syay ayay ownthray weaponyay, ansformstray intoyay ayay oltbay ofyay ightninglay. 
 Akemay ethay attackyay ollray asyay ormalnay. 
 Ethay argettay akestay 4day8 ightninglay amageday onyay ayay ithay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay issmay, insteadyay ofyay ethay weapon’syay ormalnay amageday. Whetheryay youyay ithay oryay issmay, eachyay eaturecray withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Eachyay ofyay esethay eaturescray akestay 2day8 ightninglay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Ethay iecepay ofyay ammunitionyay oryay weaponyay enthay eturnsray otay itsyay ormalnay ormfay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday orfay othbay effectsyay ofyay ethay ellspay increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 3rday. Ightninglay  Oltbay 3levelrdlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (100-ootfay inelay) Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay urfay andyay ayay odray ofyay amberyay, ystalcray, oryay assglay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay okestray ofyay ightninglay ormingfay ayay inelay 100 eetfay onglay andyay 5 eetfay wideyay astsblay outyay omfray youyay inyay ayay irectionday youyay oosechay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ethay inelay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 8day6 ightninglay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Ethay ightninglay ignitesyay ammableflay objectsyay inyay ethay areayay atthay aren’tyay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Ocatelay  Animalsyay oryay  Ants2nd-levelplay ivinationday (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay urfay omfray ayay oodhoundblay)  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Escribeday oryay amenay ayay ecificspay indkay ofyay eastbay oryay antplay. 
 Oncentratingcay onyay ethay oicevay ofyay aturenay inyay youryay urroundingssay, youyay earnlay ethay irectionday andyay istanceday otay ethay osestclay eaturecray oryay antplay ofyay atthay indkay withinyay 5 ilesmay, ifyay anyyay areyay esentpray. Ocatelay  Eaturecray 4levelthlay ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay urfay omfray ayay oodhoundblay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Escribeday oryay amenay ayay eaturecray atthay isyay amiliarfay otay youyay. 
 Youyay ensesay ethay irectionday otay ethay eature’scray ocationlay, asyay onglay asyay atthay eaturecray isyay withinyay 1,000 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray isyay ovingmay, youyay owknay ethay irectionday ofyay itsyay ovementmay. Ethay ellspay ancay ocatelay ayay ecificspay eaturecray ownknay otay youyay, oryay ethay earestnay eaturecray ofyay ayay ecificspay indkay (uchsay asyay ayay umanhay oryay ayay unicornyay), osay onglay asyay youyay avehay eensay uchsay ayay eaturecray upyay ose—withinclay 30 eet—atfay eastlay onceyay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray youyay escribedday oryay amednay isyay inyay ayay ifferentday ormfay, uchsay asyay eingbay underyay ethay effectsyay ofyay ayay olymorphpay ellspay, isthay ellspay oesn’tday ocatelay ethay eaturecray. Isthay ellspay an’tcay ocatelay ayay eaturecray ifyay unningray wateryay atyay eastlay 10 eetfay wideyay ocksblay ayay irectday athpay etweenbay youyay andyay ethay eaturecray. Ocatelay  Object2nd-levelyay ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay orkedfay wigtay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Escribeday oryay amenay anyay objectyay atthay isyay amiliarfay otay youyay. 
 Youyay ensesay ethay irectionday otay ethay object’syay ocationlay, asyay onglay asyay atthay objectyay isyay withinyay 1,000 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Ifyay ethay objectyay isyay inyay otionmay, youyay owknay ethay irectionday ofyay itsyay ovementmay. Ethay ellspay ancay ocatelay ayay ecificspay objectyay ownknay otay youyay, asyay onglay asyay youyay avehay eensay ityay upyay ose—withinclay 30 eet—atfay eastlay onceyay. 
 Alternativelyyay, ethay ellspay ancay ocatelay ethay earestnay objectyay ofyay ayay articularpay indkay, uchsay asyay ayay ertaincay indkay ofyay apparelyay, ewelryjay, urniturefay, ooltay, oryay weaponyay. Isthay ellspay an’tcay ocatelay anyay objectyay ifyay anyyay icknessthay ofyay eadlay, evenyay ayay inthay eetshay, ocksblay ayay irectday athpay etweenbay youyay andyay ethay objectyay. Ongstrider1st-levellay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay irtday) Urationday: 1 ourhay Youyay ouchtay ayay eaturecray. 
 Ethay arget’stay eedspay increasesyay ybay 10 eetfay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay argettay oneyay additionalyay eaturecray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Agemay  Armoryay 1levelstlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iecepay ofyay uredcay eatherlay)  Urationday: 8 ourshay Youyay ouchtay ayay willingyay eaturecray whoyay isn’tyay wearingyay armoryay, andyay ayay otectivepray agicalmay orcefay urroundssay ityay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Ethay arget’stay asebay ACyay ecomesbay 13 + itsyay  Exterityday odifiermay. 
 Ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay ethay argettay onsday armoryay oryay ifyay youyay ismissday ethay ellspay asyay anyay actionyay. Agemay  Andhay Onjurationcay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 inutemay Ayay ectralspay, oatingflay andhay appearsyay atyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay andhay astslay orfay ethay urationday oryay untilyay youyay ismissday ityay asyay anyay actionyay. 
 Ethay andhay anishesvay ifyay ityay isyay everyay oremay anthay 30 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay oryay ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay againyay. Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ontrolcay ethay andhay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay ethay andhay otay anipulatemay anyay objectyay, openyay anyay unlockedyay oorday oryay ontainercay, owstay oryay etrieveray anyay itemyay omfray anyay openyay ontainercay, oryay ourpay ethay ontentscay outyay ofyay ayay ialvay. 
 Youyay ancay ovemay ethay andhay upyay otay 30 eetfay eachyay imetay youyay useyay ityay. Ethay andhay an’tcay attackyay, activateyay agicmay itemsyay, oryay arrycay oremay anthay 10 oundspay. Agicmay  Ircle3rd-levelcay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 10 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (olyhay wateryay oryay owderedpay ilversay andyay ironyay worthyay atyay eastlay 100 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday: 1 ourhay Youyay eatecray ayay 10-oot-radiusfay, 20-oot-tallfay ylindercay ofyay agicalmay energyyay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay onyay ethay oundgray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Owingglay unesray appearyay whereveryay ethay ylindercay intersectsyay withyay ethay oorflay oryay otheryay urfacesay. Oosechay oneyay oryay oremay ofyay ethay ollowingfay ypestay ofyay eaturescray: elestialscay, elementalsyay, eyfay, iendsfay, oryay undeadyay. 
 Ethay irclecay affectsyay ayay eaturecray ofyay ethay osenchay ypetay inyay ethay ollowingfay waysyay:•  Ethay eaturecray an’tcay willinglyyay enteryay ethay ylindercay ybay onmagicalnay eansmay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay ancay electyay otay ausecay itsyay agicmay otay operateyay inyay ethay everseray irectionday, eventingpray ayay eaturecray ofyay ethay ecifiedspay ypetay omfray eavinglay ethay ylindercay andyay otectingpray argetstay outsideyay ityay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay urationday increasesyay ybay1 ourhay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 3rday. Agicmay  Arjay 6levelthlay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay emgay, ystalcray, eliquaryray, oryay omeothersay ornamentalyay ontainercay worthyay atyay eastlay 500 gpay)  Urationday:  Untilyay ispelledday Youryay odybay allsfay intoyay ayay atatoniccay atestay asyay youryay oulsay eaveslay ityay andyay entersyay ethay ontainercay youyay usedyay orfay ethay ell’sspay aterialmay omponentcay. 
 Whileyay youryay oulsay inhabitsyay ethay ontainercay, youyay areyay awareyay ofyay youryay urroundingssay asyay ifyay youyay wereyay inyay ethay ontainer’scay acespay. 
 Youyay an’tcay ovemay oryay useyay eactionsray. 
 Ethay onlyyay actionyay youyay ancay aketay isyay otay ojectpray youryay oulsay upyay otay 100 eetfay outyay ofyay ethay ontainercay, eitheryay eturningray otay youryay ivinglay odybay (andyay endingyay ethay ellspay) oryay attemptingyay otay ossesspay ayay umanoidshay odybay. Youyay ancay attemptyay otay ossesspay anyyay umanoidhay withinyay 100 eetfay ofyay youyay atthay youyay ancay eesay (eaturescray wardedyay ybay ayay otectionpray omfray evilyay andyay oodgay oryay agicmay irclecay ellspay an’tcay ebay ossessedpay). 
 Ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailurefay, youryay oulsay ovesmay intoyay ethay arget’stay odybay, andyay ethay arget’stay oulsay ecomesbay appedtray inyay ethay ontainercay. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ethay argettay esistsray youryay effortsyay otay ossesspay ityay, andyay youyay an’tcay attemptyay otay ossesspay ityay againyay orfay 24 ourshay. Onceyay youyay ossesspay ayay eature’scray odybay, youyay ontrolcay ityay. 
 Youryay amegay atisticsstay areyay eplacedray ybay ethay atisticsstay ofyay ethay eaturecray, oughthay youyay etainray youryay alignmentyay andyay youryay  Intelligenceyay,  Wisdomyay, andyay  Arismachay oresscay. 
 Youyay etainray ethay enefitbay ofyay youryay ownyay assclay eaturesfay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay ashay anyyay assclay evelslay, youyay an’tcay useyay anyyay ofyay itsyay assclay eaturesfay. Eanwhilemay, ethay ossessedpay eature’scray oulsay ancay erceivepay omfray ethay ontainercay usingyay itsyay ownyay ensessay, utbay ityay an’tcay ovemay oryay aketay actionsyay atyay allyay. Whileyay ossessingpay ayay odybay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay eturnray omfray ethay osthay odybay otay ethay ontainercay ifyay ityay isyay withinyay 100 eetfay ofyay youyay, eturningray ethay osthay eature’scray oulsay otay itsyay odybay. 
 Ifyay ethay osthay odybay iesday whileyay you’reyay inyay ityay, ethay eaturecray iesday, andyay youyay ustmay akemay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray againstyay youryay ownyay ellcastingspay DCay. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, youyay eturnray otay ethay ontainercay ifyay ityay isyay withinyay 100 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Otherwiseyay, youyay ieday. Ifyay ethay ontainercay isyay estroyedday oryay ethay ellspay endsyay, youryay oulsay immediatelyyay eturnsray otay youryay odybay. 
 Ifyay youryay odybay isyay oremay anthay 100 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay oryay ifyay youryay odybay isyay eadday whenyay youyay attemptyay otay eturnray otay ityay, youyay ieday. 
 Ifyay anotheryay eature’scray oulsay isyay inyay ethay ontainercay whenyay ityay isyay estroyedday, ethay eature’scray oulsay eturnsray otay itsyay odybay ifyay ethay odybay isyay aliveyay andyay withinyay 100 eetfay. 
 Otherwiseyay, atthay eaturecray iesday. Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay ontainercay isyay estroyedday. Agicmay  Issile1st-levelmay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay eatecray eethray owingglay artsday ofyay agicalmay orcefay. 
 Eachyay artday itshay ayay eaturecray ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
Ayay artday ealsday 1day4 + 1 orcefay amageday otay itsyay argettay. 
 Ethay artsday allyay ikestray imultaneouslysay, andyay youyay ancay irectday emthay otay ithay oneyay eaturecray oryay everalsay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay ellspay eatescray oneyay oremay artday orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Agicmay  Outh2nd-levelmay illusionyay (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay itbay ofyay oneycombhay andyay adejay ustday worthyay atyay eastlay 10 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Untilyay ispelledday Youyay implantyay ayay essagemay withinyay anyay objectyay inyay angeray, ayay essagemay atthay isyay utteredyay whenyay ayay iggertray onditioncay isyay etmay. 
 Oosechay anyay objectyay atthay youyay ancay eesay andyay atthay isn’tyay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay ybay anotheryay eaturecray. 
 Enthay eakspay ethay essagemay, whichyay ustmay ebay 25 wordsyay oryay esslay, oughthay ityay ancay ebay eliveredday overyay asyay onglay asyay 10 inutesmay. 
 Inallyfay, etermineday ethay ircumstancecay atthay willyay iggertray ethay ellspay otay eliverday youryay essagemay. Whenyay atthay ircumstancecay occursyay, ayay agicalmay outhmay appearsyay onyay ethay objectyay andyay ecitesray ethay essagemay inyay youryay oicevay andyay atyay ethay amesay olumevay youyay okespay. 
 Ifyay ethay objectyay youyay osechay ashay ayay outhmay oryay omethingsay atthay ookslay ikelay ayay outhmay (orfay exampleyay, ethay outhmay ofyay ayay atuestay), ethay agicalmay outhmay appearsyay erethay osay atthay ethay wordsyay appearyay otay omecay omfray ethay object’syay outhmay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay ancay avehay ethay ellspay endyay afteryay ityay eliversday itsyay essagemay, oryay ityay ancay emainray andyay epeatray itsyay essagemay wheneveryay ethay iggertray occursyay. Ethay iggeringtray ircumstancecay ancay ebay asyay eneralgay oryay asyay etailedday asyay youyay ikelay, oughthay ityay ustmay ebay asedbay onyay isualvay oryay audibleyay onditionscay atthay occuryay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay ethay objectyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, youyay ouldcay instructyay ethay outhmay otay eakspay whenyay anyyay eaturecray ovesmay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay ethay objectyay oryay whenyay ayay ilversay ellbay ingsray withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay ityay. Agicmay  Weapon2nd-levelyay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay ouchtay ayay onmagicalnay weaponyay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, atthay weaponyay ecomesbay ayay agicmay weaponyay withyay ayay +1 onusbay otay attackyay ollsray andyay amageday ollsray. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay onusbay increasesyay otay +2. 
 Ajormay  Imageyay 3levelrdlay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay eeceflay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay eatecray ethay imageyay ofyay anyay objectyay, ayay eaturecray, oryay omesay otheryay isiblevay enomenonphay atthay isyay onay argerlay anthay ayay 20-ootfay ubecay. 
 Ethay imageyay appearsyay atyay ayay otspay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray andyay astslay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ityay eemssay ompletelycay ealray, includingyay oundssay, ellssmay, andyay emperaturetay appropriateyay otay ethay ingthay epictedday. 
 Youyay an’tcay eatecray ufficientsay eathay oryay oldcay otay ausecay amageday, ayay oundsay oudlay enoughyay otay ealday underthay amageday oryay eafenday ayay eaturecray, oryay ayay ellsmay atthay ightmay ickensay ayay eaturecray (ikelay ayay oglodyte’stray enchstay). Asyay onglay asyay youyay areyay withinyay angeray ofyay ethay illusionyay, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ausecay ethay imageyay otay ovemay otay anyyay otheryay otspay withinyay angeray. 
 Asyay ethay imageyay angeschay ocationlay, youyay ancay alteryay itsyay appearanceyay osay atthay itsyay ovementsmay appearyay aturalnay orfay ethay imageyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay eatecray anyay imageyay ofyay ayay eaturecray andyay ovemay ityay, youyay ancay alteryay ethay imageyay osay atthay ityay appearsyay otay ebay walkingyay. 
 Imilarlysay, youyay ancay ausecay ethay illusionyay otay akemay ifferentday oundssay atyay ifferentday imestay, evenyay akingmay ityay arrycay onyay ayay onversationcay, orfay exampleyay. Ysicalphay interactionyay withyay ethay imageyay evealsray ityay otay ebay anyay illusionyay, ecausebay ingsthay ancay asspay oughthray ityay. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay usesyay itsyay actionyay otay examineyay ethay imageyay ancay etermineday atthay ityay isyay anyay illusionyay withyay ayay uccessfulsay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Ifyay ayay eaturecray iscernsday ethay illusionyay orfay whatyay ityay isyay, ethay eaturecray ancay eesay oughthray ethay imageyay, andyay itsyay otheryay ensorysay qualitiesyay ecomebay aintfay otay ethay eaturecray. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay ellspay astslay untilyay ispelledday, withoutyay equiringray youryay oncentrationcay. Assmay  Urecay  Wounds5th-levelyay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay waveyay ofyay ealinghay energyyay washesyay outyay omfray ayay ointpay ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray. 
 Oosechay upyay otay ixsay eaturescray inyay ayay 30-oot-radiusfay eresphay enteredcay onyay atthay ointpay. 
 Eachyay argettay egainsray ithay ointspay equalyay otay 3day8 + youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay odifiermay. 
 Isthay ellspay ashay onay effectyay onyay undeadyay oryay onstructscay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay ealinghay increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 5thay. Assmay  Eal9th-levelhay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay oodflay ofyay ealinghay energyyay owsflay omfray youyay intoyay injuredyay eaturescray aroundyay youyay. 
 Youyay estoreray upyay otay 700 ithay ointspay, ividedday asyay youyay oosechay amongyay anyyay umbernay ofyay eaturescray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Eaturescray ealedhay ybay isthay ellspay areyay alsoyay uredcay ofyay allyay iseasesday andyay anyyay effectyay akingmay emthay indedblay oryay eafenedday. 
 Isthay ellspay ashay onay effectyay onyay undeadyay oryay onstructscay. Assmay  Ealinghay  Wordyay 3levelrdlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Asyay youyay allcay outyay wordsyay ofyay estorationray, upyay otay ixsay eaturescray ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray egainray ithay ointspay equalyay otay 1day4 + youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay odifiermay. 
 Isthay ellspay ashay onay effectyay onyay undeadyay oryay onstructscay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay ealinghay increasesyay ybay 1day4 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 3rday. Assmay  Uggestion6th-levelsay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, May (ayay ake’ssnay onguetay andyay eitheryay ayay itbay ofyay oneycombhay oryay ayay opdray ofyay weetsay oilyay) Urationday: 24 ourshay Youyay uggestsay ayay oursecay ofyay activityyay (imitedlay otay ayay entencesay oryay wotay) andyay agicallymay influenceyay upyay otay welvetay eaturescray ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray andyay atthay ancay earhay andyay understandyay youyay. 
 Eaturescray atthay an’tcay ebay armedchay areyay immuneyay otay isthay effectyay. 
 Ethay uggestionsay ustmay ebay wordedyay inyay uchsay ayay annermay asyay otay akemay ethay oursecay ofyay actionyay oundsay easonableray. 
 Askingyay ethay eaturecray otay abstay itselfyay, owthray itselfyay ontoyay ayay earspay, immolateyay itselfyay, oryay oday omesay otheryay obviouslyyay armfulhay actyay automaticallyyay egatesnay ethay effectyay ofyay ethay ellspay. Eachyay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ityay ursuespay ethay oursecay ofyay actionyay youyay escribedday otay ethay estbay ofyay itsyay abilityyay. 
 Ethay uggestedsay oursecay ofyay actionyay ancay ontinuecay orfay ethay entireyay urationday. 
 Ifyay ethay uggestedsay activityyay ancay ebay ompletedcay inyay ayay ortershay imetay, ethay ellspay endsyay whenyay ethay ubjectsay inishesfay whatyay ityay wasyay askedyay otay oday. Youyay ancay alsoyay ecifyspay onditionscay atthay willyay iggertray ayay ecialspay activityyay uringday ethay urationday. 
 Orfay exampleyay, youyay ightmay uggestsay atthay ayay oupgray ofyay oldierssay ivegay allyay eirthay oneymay otay ethay irstfay eggarbay eythay eetmay. 
 Ifyay ethay onditioncay isn’tyay etmay eforebay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay activityyay isn’tyay erformedpay. Ifyay youyay oryay anyyay ofyay youryay ompanionscay amageday ayay eaturecray affectedyay ybay isthay ellspay, ethay ellspay endsyay orfay atthay eaturecray. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay 7levelthlay ellspay otslay, ethay urationday isyay 10 aysday. 
 Whenyay youyay useyay anyay 8levelthlay ellspay otslay, ethay urationday isyay 30 aysday. 
 Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay anishbay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray intoyay ayay abyrinthinelay emiplaneday. 
 Ethay argettay emainsray erethay orfay ethay urationday oryay untilyay ityay escapesyay ethay azemay. Ethay argettay ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay attemptyay otay escapeyay. 
 Whenyay ityay oesday osay, ityay akesmay ayay DCay 20  Intelligenceyay eckchay. 
 Ifyay ityay ucceedssay, ityay escapesyay, andyay ethay ellspay endsyay (ayay inotaurmay oryay oristrogay emonday automaticallyyay ucceedssay). Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argettay eappearsray inyay ethay acespay ityay eftlay oryay, ifyay atthay acespay isyay occupiedyay, inyay ethay earestnay unoccupiedyay acespay. Eldmay intoyay  Onestay 3levelrdlay ansmutationtray (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 8 ourshay Youyay epstay intoyay ayay onestay objectyay oryay urfacesay argelay enoughyay otay ullyfay ontaincay youryay odybay, eldingmay yourselfyay andyay allyay ethay equipmentyay youyay arrycay withyay ethay onestay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Usingyay youryay ovementmay, youyay epstay intoyay ethay onestay atyay ayay ointpay youyay ancay ouchtay. 
 Othingnay ofyay youryay esencepray emainsray isiblevay oryay otherwiseyay etectableday ybay onmagicalnay ensessay. Whileyay ergedmay withyay ethay onestay, youyay an’tcay eesay whatyay occursyay outsideyay ityay, andyay anyyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay youyay akemay otay earhay oundssay outsideyay ityay areyay ademay withyay isadvantageday. 
 Youyay emainray awareyay ofyay ethay assagepay ofyay imetay andyay ancay astcay ellsspay onyay yourselfyay whileyay ergedmay inyay ethay onestay. 
 Youyay ancay useyay youryay ovementmay otay eavelay ethay onestay whereyay youyay enteredyay ityay, whichyay endsyay ethay ellspay. 
 Youyay otherwiseyay an’tcay ovemay. Inormay ysicalphay amageday otay ethay onestay oesn’tday armhay youyay, utbay itsyay artialpay estructionday oryay ayay angechay inyay itsyay apeshay (otay ethay extentyay atthay youyay onay ongerlay itfay withinyay ityay) expelsyay youyay andyay ealsday 6day6 udgeoningblay amageday otay youyay. 
 Ethay one’sstay ompletecay estructionday (oryay ansmutationtray intoyay ayay ifferentday ubstancesay) expelsyay youyay andyay ealsday 50 udgeoningblay amageday otay youyay. 
 Ifyay expelledyay, youyay allfay onepray inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay osestclay otay whereyay youyay irstfay enteredyay. Elf’smay  Acidyay  Arrow2nd-levelyay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 90 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (owderedpay ubarbrhay eaflay andyay anyay adder’syay omachstay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay immeringshay eengray arrowyay eaksstray owardtay ayay argettay withinyay angeray andyay urstsbay inyay ayay ayspray ofyay acidyay. 
 Akemay ayay angedray ellspay attackyay againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 4day4 acidyay amageday immediatelyyay andyay 2day4 acidyay amageday atyay ethay endyay ofyay itsyay extnay urntay. 
 Onyay ayay issmay, ethay arrowyay ashessplay ethay argettay withyay acidyay orfay alfhay asyay uchmay ofyay ethay initialyay amageday andyay onay amageday atyay ethay endyay ofyay itsyay extnay urntay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday (othbay initialyay andyay aterlay) increasesyay ybay 1day4 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Endingmay Ansmutationtray antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (wotay odestoneslay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Isthay ellspay epairsray ayay inglesay eakbray oryay eartay inyay anyay objectyay youyay ouchtay, uchsay asyay ayay okenbray ainchay inklay, wotay alveshay ofyay ayay okenbray eykay, ayay orntay oakclay, oryay ayay eakinglay wineskinyay. 
 Asyay onglay asyay ethay eakbray oryay eartay isyay onay argerlay anthay 1 ootfay inyay anyyay imensionday, youyay endmay ityay. 
eavinglay onay acetray ofyay ethay ormerfay amageday. Isthay ellspay ancay ysicallyphay epairray ayay agicmay itemyay oryay onstructcay, utbay ethay ellspay an’tcay estoreray agicmay otay uchsay anyay objectyay. Essagemay Ansmutationtray antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay ortshay iecepay ofyay oppercay wireyay)  Urationday: 1 oundray Youyay ointpay youryay ingerfay owardtay ayay eaturecray withinyay angeray andyay whisperyay ayay essagemay. 
 Ethay argettay (andyay onlyyay ethay argettay) earshay ethay essagemay andyay ancay eplyray inyay ayay whisperyay atthay onlyyay youyay ancay earhay. Youyay ancay astcay isthay ellspay oughthray olidsay objectsyay ifyay youyay areyay amiliarfay withyay ethay argettay andyay owknay ityay isyay eyondbay ethay arrierbay. 
 Agicalmay ilencesay. 
1 ootfay ofyay onestay, 1 inchyay ofyay ommoncay etalmay, ayay inthay eetshay ofyay eadlay, oryay 3 eetfay ofyay woodyay ocksblay ethay ellspay. 
 Ethay ellspay oesn’tday avehay otay ollowfay ayay aightstray inelay andyay ancay aveltray eelyfray aroundyay ornerscay oryay oughthray openingsyay. Eteormay  Warm9th-levelsay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 1 ilemay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Azingblay orbsyay ofyay irefay ummetplay otay ethay oundgray atyay ourfay ifferentday ointspay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 40-oot-radiusfay eresphay enteredcay onyay eachyay ointpay youyay oosechay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Ethay eresphay eadsspray aroundyay ornerscay. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 20day6 irefay amageday andyay 20day6 udgeoningblay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
itsyay emotionsyay oryay eadray itsyay oughtsthay, ivinationday ellsspay, andyay ethay armedchay onditioncay. 
 Ethay ellspay evenyay oilsfay wishyay ellsspay andyay ellsspay oryay effectsyay ofyay imilarsay owerpay usedyay otay affectyay ethay arget’stay indmay oryay otay aingay informationyay aboutyay ethay argettay. Inormay  Illusionyay Illusionyay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay eeceflay) Urationday: 1 inutemay Youyay eatecray ayay oundsay oryay anyay imageyay ofyay anyay objectyay withinyay angeray atthay astslay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ethay illusionyay alsoyay endsyay ifyay youyay ismissday ityay asyay anyay actionyay oryay astcay isthay ellspay againyay. Ifyay youyay eatecray ayay oundsay, itsyay olumevay ancay angeray omfray ayay whisperyay otay ayay eamscray. 
 Ityay ancay ebay youryay oicevay, omeonesay else’syay oicevay, ayay ion’slay oarray, ayay eatingbay ofyay umsdray, oryay anyyay otheryay oundsay youyay oosechay. 
 Ethay oundsay ontinuescay unabatedyay oughoutthray ethay urationday, oryay youyay ancay akemay iscreteday oundssay atyay ifferentday imestay eforebay ethay ellspay endsyay. Ifyay youyay eatecray anyay imageyay ofyay anyay object—suchyay asyay ayay airchay, uddymay ootprintsfay, oryay ayay allsmay est—itchay ustmay ebay onay argerlay anthay ayay 5-ootfay ubecay. 
 Ethay imageyay an’tcay eatecray oundsay, ightlay, ellsmay, oryay anyyay otheryay ensorysay effectyay. 
 Ysicalphay interactionyay withyay ethay imageyay evealsray ityay otay ebay anyay illusionyay, ecausebay ingsthay ancay asspay oughthray ityay. Ifyay ayay eaturecray usesyay itsyay actionyay otay examineyay ethay oundsay oryay imageyay, ethay eaturecray ancay etermineday atthay ityay isyay anyay illusionyay withyay ayay uccessfulsay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Ifyay ayay eaturecray iscernsday ethay illusionyay orfay whatyay ityay isyay, ethay illusionyay ecomesbay aintfay otay ethay eaturecray. Iragemay  Arcaneyay 7levelthlay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray:  Ightsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 10 aysday Youyay akemay erraintay inyay anyay areayay upyay otay 1 ilemay quaresay ooklay, oundsay, ellsmay, andyay evenyay eelfay ikelay omesay otheryay ortsay ofyay erraintay. 
 Ethay errain’stay eneralgay apeshay emainsray ethay amesay, oweverhay. 
 Openyay ieldsfay oryay ayay oadray ouldcay ebay ademay otay esembleray ayay wampsay, illhay, evassecray, oryay omesay otheryay ifficultday oryay impassableyay erraintay. 
Ayay ondpay ancay ebay ademay otay eemsay ikelay ayay assygray eadowmay, ayay ecipicepray ikelay ayay entlegay opeslay, oryay ayay ock-strewnray ullygay ikelay ayay wideyay andyay oothsmay oadray. Imilarlysay, youyay ancay alteryay ethay appearanceyay ofyay ucturesstray, oryay addyay emthay whereyay onenay areyay esentpray. 
 Ethay ellspay oesn’tday isguiseday, oncealcay, oryay addyay eaturescray. Ethay illusionyay includesyay audibleyay, isualvay, actiletay, andyay olfactoryyay elementsyay, osay ityay ancay urntay earclay oundgray intoyay ifficultday erraintay (oryay icevay ersavay) oryay otherwiseyay impedeyay ovementmay oughthray ethay areayay. 
 Anyyay iecepay ofyay ethay illusoryyay erraintay (uchsay asyay ayay ockray oryay ickstay) atthay isyay emovedray omfray ethay ell’sspay areayay isappearsday immediatelyyay. Eaturescray withyay uesighttray ancay eesay oughthray ethay illusionyay otay ethay errain’stay uetray ormfay; oweverhay, allyay otheryay elementsyay ofyay ethay illusionyay emainray, osay whileyay ethay eaturecray isyay awareyay oftheyay illusion’syay esencepray, ethay eaturecray ancay illstay ysicallyphay interactyay withyay ethay illusionyay. Irrormay  Image2nd-levelyay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 inutemay Eethray illusoryyay uplicatesday ofyay yourselfyay appearyay inyay youryay acespay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay uplicatesday ovemay withyay youyay andyay imicmay youryay actionsyay, iftingshay ositionpay osay it’syay impossibleyay otay acktray whichyay imageyay isyay ealray. 
 Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ismissday ethay illusoryyay uplicatesday. Eachyay imetay ayay eaturecray argetstay youyay withyay anyay attackyay uringday ethay ell’sspay urationday, ollray ayay day20 otay etermineday whetheryay ethay attackyay insteadyay argetstay oneyay ofyay youryay uplicatesday. Ifyay youyay avehay eethray uplicatesday, youyay ustmay ollray ayay 6 oryay igherhay otay angechay ethay attack’syay argettay otay ayay uplicateday. 
 Withyay wotay uplicatesday, youyay ustmay ollray anyay 8 oryay igherhay. 
 Withyay oneyay uplicateday, youyay ustmay ollray anyay 11 oryay igher.Ahay uplicate’sday ACyay equalsyay 10 + youryay  Exterityday odifiermay. Ifyay anyay attackyay itshay ayay uplicateday, ethay uplicateday isyay estroyedday. 
Ayay uplicateday ancay ebay estroyedday onlyyay ybay anyay attackyay atthay itshay ityay. Ityay ignoresyay allyay otheryay amageday andyay effectsyay. 
 Ethay ellspay endsyay whenyay allyay eethray uplicatesday areyay estroyed.Aday eaturecray isyay unaffectedyay ybay isthay ellspay ifyay ityay an’tcay eesay, ifyay ityay eliesray onyay ensessay otheryay anthay ightsay, uchsay asyay indsightblay, oryay ifyay ityay ancay erceivepay illusionsyay asyay alsefay, asyay withyay uesighttray. Islead5th-levelmay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay ecomebay invisibleyay atyay ethay amesay imetay atthay anyay illusoryyay oubleday ofyay youyay appearsyay whereyay youyay areyay andingstay. 
 Ethay oubleday astslay orfay ethay urationday, utbay ethay invisibilityyay endsyay ifyay youyay attackyay oryay astcay ayay ellspay. Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ovemay youryay illusoryyay oubleday upyay otay wicetay youryay eedspay andyay akemay ityay esturegay, eakspay, andyay ehavebay inyay whateveryay wayyay youyay oosechay. Youyay ancay eesay oughthray itsyay eyesyay andyay earhay oughthray itsyay earsyay asyay ifyay youyay wereyay ocatedlay whereyay ityay isyay. 
 Onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay, youyay ancay witchsay omfray usingyay itsyay ensessay otay usingyay youryay ownyay, oryay ackbay againyay. 
 Odifymay  Emorymay 5levelthlay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay attemptyay otay eshaperay anotheryay eature’scray emoriesmay. 
 Oneyay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay ightingfay ethay eaturecray, ityay ashay advantageyay onyay ethay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay argettay ecomesbay armedchay ybay youyay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ethay armedchay argettay isyay incapacitatedyay andyay unawareyay ofyay itsyay urroundingssay, oughthay ityay ancay illstay earhay youyay. 
 Ifyay ityay akestay anyyay amageday oryay isyay argetedtay ybay anotheryay ellspay, isthay ellspay endsyay, andyay onenay ofyay ethay arget’stay emoriesmay areyay odifiedmay. Whileyay isthay armchay astslay, youyay ancay affectyay ethay arget’stay emorymay ofyay anyay eventyay atthay ityay experiencedyay withinyay ethay astlay 24 ourshay andyay atthay astedlay onay oremay anthay 10 inutesmay. 
 Youyay ancay ermanentlypay eliminateyay allyay emorymay ofyay ethay eventyay, allowyay ethay argettay otay ecallray ethay eventyay withyay erfectpay arityclay andyay exactingyay etailday, angechay itsyay emorymay ofyay ethay etailsday ofyay ethay eventyay, oryay eatecray ayay emorymay ofyay omesay otheryay eventyay. Youyay ustmay eakspay otay ethay argettay otay escribeday owhay itsyay emoriesmay areyay affectedyay, andyay ityay ustmay ebay ableyay otay understandyay youryay anguagelay orfay ethay odifiedmay emoriesmay otay aketay ootray. 
 Itsyay indmay illsfay inyay anyyay apsgay inyay ethay etailsday ofyay youryay escriptionday. 
 Ifyay ethay ellspay endsyay eforebay youyay avehay inishedfay escribingday ethay odifiedmay emoriesmay, ethay eature’scray emorymay isn’tyay alteredyay. 
 Otherwiseyay, ethay odifiedmay emoriesmay aketay oldhay whenyay ethay ellspay ends.Ayay odifiedmay emorymay oesn’tday ecessarilynay affectyay owhay ayay eaturecray ehavesbay, articularlypay ifyay ethay emorymay ontradictscay ethay eature’scray aturalnay inclinationsyay, alignmentyay, oryay eliefsbay. 
 Anyay illogicalyay odifiedmay emorymay, uchsay asyay implantingyay ayay emorymay ofyay owhay uchmay ethay eaturecray enjoyedyay ousingday itselfyay inyay acidyay, isyay ismissedday, erhapspay asyay ayay adbay eamdray. 
 Ethay DMay ightmay eemday ayay odifiedmay emorymay ootay onsensicalnay otay affectyay ayay eaturecray inyay ayay ignificantsay anner.Amay emoveray ursecay oryay eatergray estorationray ellspay astcay onyay ethay argettay estoresray ethay eature’scray uetray emorymay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 6thay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay alteryay ethay arget’stay emoriesmay ofyay anyay eventyay atthay ooktay aceplay upyay otay 7 aysday agoyay (6thay evellay), 30 aysday agoyay (7thay evellay), 1 yearyay agoyay (8thay evellay), oryay anyyay imetay inyay ethay eature’scray astpay (9thay evellay). Oonbeam2nd-levelmay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (everalsay eedssay ofyay anyyay oonseedmay antplay andyay ayay iecepay ofyay opalescentyay eldsparfay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ayay ilverysay eambay ofyay alepay ightlay inesshay ownday inyay ayay 5-ootfay- adiusray, 40-oot-highfay ylindercay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay withinyay angeray. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, imday ightlay illsfay ethay ylindercay. Whenyay ayay eaturecray entersyay ethay ell’sspay areayay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay artsstay itsyay urntay erethay, ityay isyay engulfedyay inyay ostlyghay amesflay atthay ausecay earingsay ainpay, andyay ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Ityay akestay 2day10 adiantdamageray onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay one.Ayay apechangershay akesmay itsyay avingsay owthray withyay isadvantageday. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay, ityay alsoyay instantlyyay evertsray otay itsyay originalyay ormfay andyay an’tcay assumeyay ayay ifferentday ormfay untilyay ityay eaveslay ethay ell’sspay ightlay. Onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay afteryay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay ancay useyay anyay actionyay otay ovemay ethay eambay 60 eetfay inyay anyyay irectionday. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1dlay Oyay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Ordenkainen’smay  Aithfulfay  Ound4th-levelhay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inytay ilversay whistleyay, ayay iecepay ofyay onebay, andyay ayay eadthray) Urationday: 8 ourshay Youyay onjurecay ayay antomphay watchdogyay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray, whereyay ityay emainsray orfay ethay urationday, untilyay youyay ismissday ityay asyay anyay actionyay, oryay untilyay youyay ovemay oremay anthay 100 eetfay awayyay omfray ityay. Ethay oundhay isyay invisibleyay otay allyay eaturescray exceptyay youyay andyay an'tcay ebay armedhay. 
 Whenyay ayay  Allsmay oryay argerlay eaturecray omescay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay ityay withoutyay irstfay eakingspay ethay asswordpay atthay youyay ecifyspay whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, ethay oundhay artsstay arkingbay oudlylay. 
 Ethay oundhay eessay invisibleyay eaturescray andyay ancay eesay intoyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay. 
 Ityay ignoresyay illusionsyay. Atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay, ethay oundhay attemptsyay otay itebay oneyay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ityay atthay isyay ostilehay otay youyay. 
 Ethay ound’shay attackyay onusbay isyay equalyay otay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay odifiermay + youryay oficiencypray onusbay. Onyay ayay ithay, ityay ealsday 4day8 iercingpay amageday. Ordenkainen’smay  Agnificentmay  Ansion7th-levelmay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 300 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iniaturemay ortalpay arvedcay omfray ivoryyay, ayay allsmay iecepay ofyay olishedpay arblemay, andyay ayay inytay ilversay oonspay, eachyay itemyay worthyay atyay eastlay 5 gpay) Urationday: 24 ourshay Youyay onjurecay anyay extradimensionalyay wellingday inyay angeray atthay astslay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Youyay oosechay whereyay itsyay oneyay entranceyay isyay ocatedlay. 
 Ethay entranceyay immersshay aintlyfay andyay isyay 5 eetfay wideyay andyay 10 eetfay alltay. 
 Youyay andyay anyyay eaturecray youyay esignateday whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay ancay enteryay ethay extradimensionalyay wellingday asyay onglay asyay ethay ortalpay emainsray openyay. 
 Youyay ancay openyay oryay oseclay ethay ortalpay ifyay youyay areyay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay ityay. 
 Whileyay osedclay, ethay ortalpay isyay invisibleyay. Eyondbay ethay ortalpay isyay ayay agnificentmay oyerfay withyay umerousnay amberschay eyondbay. 
 Ethay atmosphereyay isyay eanclay, eshfray, andyay warmyay. Youyay ancay eatecray anyyay oorflay anplay youyay ikelay, utbay ethay acespay an’tcay exceedyay 50 ubescay, eachyay ubecay eingbay 10 eetfay onyay eachyay idesay. 
 Ethay aceplay isyay urnishedfay andyay ecoratedday asyay youyay oosechay. 
 Ityay ontainscay ufficientsay oodfay otay ervesay ayay inenay- oursecay anquetbay orfay upyay otay 100 eoplepay. 
Ayay affstay ofyay 100 ear-transparentnay ervantssay attendsyay allyay whoyay enteryay. 
 Ordenkainen’smay  Ivatepray  Anctum4th-levelsay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inthay eetshay ofyay eadlay, ayay iecepay ofyay opaqueyay assglay, ayay wadyay ofyay ottoncay oryay othclay, andyay owderedpay ysolitechray) Urationday: 24 ourshay Youyay akemay anyay areayay withinyay angeray agicallymay ecuresay. 
 Ethay areayay isyay ayay ubecay atthay ancay ebay asyay allsmay asyay 5 eetfay otay asyay argelay asyay 100 eetfay onyay eachyay idesay. 
 Ethay ellspay astslay orfay ethay urationday oryay untilyay youyay useyay anyay actionyay otay ismissday ityay. Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, youyay ecideday whatyay ortsay ofyay ecuritysay ethay ellspay ovidespray, oosingchay anyyay oryay allyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay opertiespray:•  Oundsay an'tcay asspay oughthray ethay arrierbay atyay ethay edgeyay ofyay ethay wardedyay areayay.•  Ethay arrierbay ofyay ethay wardedyay areayay appearsyay arkday andyay oggyfay, eventingpray isionvay (includingyay arkvisionday) oughthray ityay.•  Ensorssay eatedcray ybay ivinationday ellsspay an’tcay appearyay insideyay ethay otectedpray areayay oryay asspay oughthray ethay arrierbay atyay itsyay erimeterpay.•  Eaturescray inyay ethay areayay an’tcay ebay argetedtay ybay ivinationday ellsspay.•  Othingnay ancay eleporttay intoyay oryay outyay ofyay ethay wardedyay areayay.•  Anarplay aveltray isyay ockedblay withinyay ethay wardedyay areayay. Astingcay isthay ellspay onyay ethay amesay otspay everyyay ayday orfay ayay yearyay akesmay isthay effectyay ermanentpay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 5thay evellay oryay igherhay, youyay ancay increaseyay ethay izesay ofyay ethay ubecay ybay 100 eetfay orfay eachyay otslay evellay eyondbay 4thay. 
 Usthay youyay ouldcay otectpray ayay ubecay atthay ancay ebay upyay otay 200 eetfay onyay oneyay idesay ybay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 5thay evellay. Ordenkainen’smay  Word7th-levelsay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iniaturemay atinumplay wordsay withyay ayay ipgray andyay ommelpay ofyay oppercay andyay inczay, worthyay 250 gpay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay eatecray ayay word-shapedsay aneplay ofyay orcefay atthay overshay withinyay angeray. 
 Ityay astslay orfay ethay urationday. Whenyay ethay wordsay appearsyay, youyay akemay ayay eleemay ellspay attackyay againstyay ayay argettay ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay wordsay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay. 
ethay argettay akestay 3day10 orcefay amage.decideday ethay isualvay appearanceyay ofyay esethay ervantssay andyay eirthay attireyay. 
 Eythay areyay ompletelycay obedientyay otay youryay ordersyay. Eachyay ervantsay ancay erformpay anyyay asktay ayay ormalnay umanhay ervantsay ouldcay erformpay, utbay eythay an’tcay attackyay oryay aketay anyyay actionyay atthay wouldyay irectlyday armhay anotheryay eaturecray. 
 Usthay ethay ervantssay ancay etchfay ingsthay, eanclay, endmay, oldfay othesclay, ightlay iresfay, ervesay oodfay, ourpay wineyay, andyay osay onyay. Ethay ervantssay ancay ogay anywhereyay inyay ethay ansionmay utbay an’tcay eavelay ityay. 
 Urnishingsfay andyay otheryay objectsyay eatedcray ybay isthay ellspay issipateday intoyay okesmay ifyay emovedray omfray ethay ansionmay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay otay ovemay ethay wordsay upyay otay 20 eetfay otay ayay otspay youyay ancay eesay andyay epeatray isthay attackyay againstyay ethay amesay argettay oryay ayay ifferentday oneyay. Ovemay  Earthyay 6levelthlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (anyay ironyay adeblay andyay ayay allsmay agbay ontainingcay ayay ixturemay ofyay oils—claysay, oamlay, andyay andsay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 2 ourshay Oosechay anyay areayay ofyay erraintay onay argerlay anthay 40 eetfay onyay ayay idesay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay ancay eshaperay irtday, andsay, oryay ayclay inyay ethay areayay inyay anyyay annermay youyay oosechay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Youyay ancay aiseray oryay owerlay ethay area’syay elevationyay, eatecray oryay illfay inyay ayay enchtray, erectyay oryay attenflay ayay wallyay, oryay ormfay ayay illarpay. 
 Ethay extentyay ofyay anyyay uchsay angeschay an’tcay exceedyay alfhay ethay area’syay argestlay imensionday. 
 Osay, ifyay youyay affectyay ayay 40-ootfay quaresay, youyay ancay eatecray ayay illarpay upyay otay 20 eetfay ighhay, aiseray oryay owerlay ethay quare’ssay elevationyay ybay upyay otay 20 eetfay, igday ayay enchtray upyay otay 20 eetfay eepday, andyay osay onyay. 
 Ityay akestay 10 inutesmay orfay esethay angeschay otay ompletecay. Atyay ethay endyay ofyay everyyay 10 inutesmay youyay endspay oncentratingcay onyay ethay ellspay, youyay ancay oosechay ayay ewnay areayay ofyay erraintay otay affectyay. Ecausebay ethay errain’stay ansformationtray occursyay owlyslay, eaturescray inyay ethay areayay an’tcay usuallyyay ebay appedtray oryay injuredyay ybay ethay ound’sgray ovementmay. Isthay ellspay an’tcay anipulatemay aturalnay onestay oryay onestay onstructioncay. 
 Ocksray andyay ucturesstray iftshay otay accommodateyay ethay ewnay erraintay. 
 Ifyay ethay wayyay youyay apeshay ethay erraintay wouldyay akemay ayay ucturestray unstableyay, ityay ightmay ollapsecay. Imilarlysay, isthay ellspay oesn’tday irectlyday affectyay antplay owthgray. 
 Ethay ovedmay earthyay arriescay anyyay antsplay alongyay withyay ityay. Ondetectionnay 3levelrdlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay iamondday ustday worthyay 25 gpay inkledspray overyay ethay argettay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday: 8 ourshay Orfay ethay urationday, youyay idehay ayay argettay atthay youyay ouchtay omfray ivinationday agicmay. 
 Ethay argettay ancay ebay ayay willingyay eaturecray oryay ayay aceplay oryay anyay objectyay onay argerlay anthay 10 eetfay inyay anyyay imensionday. 
 Ethay argettay an’tcay ebay argetedtay ybay anyyay ivinationday agicmay oryay erceivedpay oughthray agicalmay yingscray ensorssay. Ystul’snay  Agicmay  Aura2nd-levelyay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay quaresay ofyay ilksay) Urationday: 24 ourshay Youyay aceplay anyay illusionyay onyay ayay eaturecray oryay anyay objectyay youyay ouchtay osay atthay ivinationday ellsspay evealray alsefay informationyay aboutyay ityay. 
 Ethay argettay ancay ebay ayay willingyay eaturecray oryay anyay objectyay atthay isn’tyay eingbay arriedcay oryay wornyay ybay anotheryay eaturecray. Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, oosechay oneyay oryay othbay ofyay ethay ollowingfay effectsyay. 
 Ethay effectyay astslay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay onyay ethay amesay eaturecray oryay objectyay everyyay ayday orfay 30 aysday, acingplay ethay amesay effectyay onyay ityay eachyay imetay, ethay illusionyay astslay untilyay ityay isyay ispelledday. Alsefay  Aurayay. 
 Youyay angechay ethay wayyay ethay argettay appearsyay otay ellsspay andyay agicalmay effectsyay, uchsay asyay etectday agicmay, atthay etectday agicalmay aurasyay. 
 Youyay ancay akemay ayay onmagicalnay objectyay appearyay agicalmay, ayay agicalmay objectyay appearyay onmagicalnay, oryay angechay ethay object’syay agicalmay aurayay osay atthay ityay appearsyay otay elongbay otay ayay ecificspay oolschay ofyay agicmay atthay youyay oosechay. 
 Whenyay youyay useyay isthay effectyay onyay anyay objectyay, youyay ancay akemay ethay alsefay agicmay apparentyay otay anyyay eaturecray atthay andleshay ethay itemyay. Askmay. 
 Youyay angechay ethay wayyay ethay argettay appearsyay otay ellsspay andyay agicalmay effectsyay atthay etectday eaturecray ypestay, uchsay asyay ayay aladin’spay  Ivineday  Ensesay oryay ethay iggertray ofyay ayay ymbolsay ellspay. 
 Youyay oosechay ayay eaturecray ypetay andyay otheryay ellsspay andyay agicalmay effectsyay eattray ethay argettay asyay ifyay ityay wereyay ayay eaturecray ofyay atthay ypetay oryay ofyay atthay alignmentyay. Otiluke’syay  Eezingfray  Ere6th-levelsphay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 300 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay ystalcray eresphay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay igidfray obeglay ofyay oldcay energyyay eaksstray omfray youryay ingertipsfay otay ayay ointpay ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray, whereyay ityay explodesyay inyay ayay 60-oot-radiusfay eresphay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray withinyay ethay areayay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ayay eaturecray akestay 10day6 oldcay amageday. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ityay akestay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday. Ifyay ethay obeglay ikesstray ayay odybay ofyay wateryay oryay ayay iquidlay atthay isyay incipallypray wateryay (otnay includingyay water-basedyay eaturescray), ityay eezesfray ethay iquidlay otay ayay epthday ofyay 6 inchesyay overyay anyay areayay 30 eetfay quaresay. 
 Isthay iceyay astslay orfay 1 inutemay. 
 Eaturescray atthay wereyay wimmingsay onyay ethay urfacesay ofyay ozenfray wateryay areyay appedtray inyay ethay iceyay. 
Ayay appedtray eaturecray ancay useyay anyay actionyay otay akemay ayay  Engthstray eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay otay eakbray eefray. Youyay ancay efrainray omfray iringfay ethay obeglay afteryay ompletingcay ethay ellspay, ifyay youyay wishyay. 
Ayay allsmay obeglay aboutyay ethay izesay ofyay ayay ingslay onestay, oolcay otay ethay ouchtay, appearsyay inyay youryay andhay. Atyay anyyay imetay, youyay oryay ayay eaturecray youyay ivegay ethay obeglay otay ancay owthray ethay obeglay (otay ayay angeray ofyay 40 eetfay) oryay urlhay ityay withyay ayay ingslay (otay ethay ing’sslay ormalnay angeray). 
 Ityay attersshay onyay impactyay, withyay ethay amesay effectyay asyay ethay ormalnay astingcay ofyay ethay ellspay. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay etsay ethay obeglay ownday withoutyay atteringshay ityay. 
 Afteryay 1 inutemay, ifyay ethay obeglay asn’thay alreadyyay atteredshay, ityay explodesyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Otiluke’syay  Esilientray  Ere4th-levelsphay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay emisphericalhay iecepay ofyay earclay ystalcray andyay ayay atchingmay emisphericalhay iecepay ofyay umgay arabicyay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ayay eresphay ofyay immeringshay orcefay enclosesyay ayay eaturecray oryay objectyay ofyay  Argelay izesay oryay allersmay withinyay angeray. 
 Anyay unwillingyay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray isyay enclosedyay orfay ethay urationday. Othing—notnay ysicalphay objectsyay, energyyay, oryay otheryay ellspay effects—canyay asspay oughthray ethay arrierbay, inyay oryay outyay, oughthay ayay eaturecray inyay ethay eresphay ancay eathebray erethay. 
 Ethay eresphay isyay immuneyay otay allyay amageday, andyay ayay eaturecray oryay objectyay insideyay an’tcay ebay amagedday ybay attacksyay oryay effectsyay originatingyay omfray outsideyay, ornay ancay ayay eaturecray insideyay ethay eresphay amageday anythingyay outsideyay ityay. Ethay eresphay isyay weightlessyay andyay ustjay argelay enoughyay otay ontaincay ethay eaturecray oryay objectyay insideyay. 
 Anyay enclosedyay eaturecray ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay ushpay againstyay ethay ere’ssphay wallsyay andyay usthay ollray ethay eresphay atyay upyay otay alfhay ethay eature’scray eedspay. 
 Imilarlysay, ethay obeglay ancay ebay ickedpay upyay andyay ovedmay ybay otheryay eatures.Acray isintegrateday ellspay argetingtay ethay obeglay estroysday ityay withoutyay arminghay anythingyay insideyay ityay. Otto’syay  Irresistibleyay  Ance6th-levelday enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Oosechay oneyay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay argettay eginsbay ayay omiccay anceday inyay aceplay: ufflingshay, appingtay itsyay eetfay, andyay aperingcay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Eaturescray atthay an’tcay ebay armedchay areyay immuneyay otay isthay ell.Aspay ancingday eaturecray ustmay useyay allyay itsyay ovementmay otay anceday withoutyay eavinglay itsyay acespay andyay ashay isadvantageday onyay  Exterityday avingsay owsthray andyay attackyay ollsray. 
 Whileyay ethay argettay isyay affectedyay ybay isthay ellspay, otheryay eaturescray avehay advantageyay onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay ityay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, ayay ancingday eaturecray akesmay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray otay egainray ontrolcay ofyay itselfyay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Asspay withoutyay  Ace2nd-leveltray abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ashesyay omfray ayay urnedbay eaflay ofyay istletoemay andyay ayay igspray ofyay ucespray) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Ayay eilvay ofyay adowsshay andyay ilencesay adiatesray omfray youyay, askingmay youyay andyay youryay ompanionscay omfray etectionday. Orfay ethay urationday, eachyay eaturecray youyay oosechay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay (includingyay youyay) ashay ayay +10 onusbay otay  Exterityday( Ealthstay) eckschay andyay an’tcay ebay ackedtray exceptyay ybay agicalmay eansmay. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay eceivesray isthay onusbay eaveslay ehindbay onay ackstray oryay otheryay acestray ofyay itsyay assagepay. Asswallpay 5levelthlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay esamesay eedssay)  Urationday: 1 ourhay Ayay assagepay appearsyay atyay ayay ointpay ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay onyay ayay woodenyay, asterplay, oryay onestay urfacesay (uchsay asyay ayay wallyay, ayay eilingcay, oryay ayay oorflay) withinyay angeray, andyay astslay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Youyay oosechay ethay opening’syay imensionsday: upyay otay 5 eetfay wideyay, 8 eetfay alltay, andyay 20 eetfay eepday. 
 Ethay assagepay eatescray onay instabilityyay inyay ayay ucturestray urroundingsay ityay. Whenyay ethay openingyay isappearsday, anyyay eaturescray oryay objectsyay illstay inyay ethay assagepay eatedcray ybay ethay ellspay areyay afelysay ejectedyay otay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay earestnay otay ethay urfacesay onyay whichyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay. Antasmalphay  Orcefay 2levelndlay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay eeceflay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay aftcray anyay illusionyay atthay akestay ootray inyay ethay indmay ofyay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay akemay anyay  Intelligenceyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, youyay eatecray ayay antasmalphay objectyay, eaturecray, oryay otheryay isiblevay enomenonphay ofyay youryay oicechay atthay isyay onay argerlay anthay ayay 10-ootfay ubecay andyay atthay isyay erceivablepay onlyyay otay ethay argettay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Isthay ellspay ashay onay effectyay onyay undeadyay oryay onstructscay. Ethay antasmphay includesyay oundsay, emperaturetay, andyay otheryay imulistay, alsoyay evidentyay onlyyay otay ethay eaturecray. Ethay argettay ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay examineyay ethay antasmphay withyay anyay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Ifyay ethay eckchay ucceedssay, ethay argettay ealizesray atthay ethay antasmphay isyay anyay illusionyay, andyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Whileyay ayay argettay isyay affectedyay ybay ethay ellspay, ethay argettay eatstray ethay antasmphay asyay ifyay ityay wereyay ealray. 
 Ethay argettay ationalizesray anyyay illogicalyay outcomesyay omfray interactingyay withyay ethay antasmphay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay argettay attemptingyay otay walkyay acrossyay ayay antasmalphay idgebray atthay ansspay ayay asmchay allsfay onceyay ityay epsstay ontoyay ethay idgebray. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay urvivessay ethay allfay, ityay illstay elievesbay atthay ethay idgebray existsyay andyay omescay upyay withyay omesay otheryay explanationyay orfay itsyay all—itfay wasyay ushedpay, ityay ippedslay, oryay ayay ongstray windyay ightmay avehay ockedknay ityay offyay. Anyay affectedyay argettay isyay osay onvincedcay ofyay ethay antasm’sphay ealityray atthay ityay ancay evenyay aketay amageday omfray ethay illusionyay. 
Ayay antasmphay eatedcray otay appearyay asyay ayay eaturecray ancay attackyay ethay argettay. 
 Imilarlysay, ayay antasmphay eatedcray otay appearyay asyay irefay, ayay oolpay ofyay acidyay, oryay avalay ancay urnbay ethay argettay. 
 Eachyay oundray onyay youryay urntay, ethay antasmphay ancay ealday 1day6 ychicpsay amageday otay ethay argettay ifyay ityay isyay inyay ethay antasm’sphay areayay oryay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay antasmphay, ovidedpray atthay ethay illusionyay isyay ofyay ayay eaturecray oryay azardhay atthay ouldcay ogicallylay ealday amageday, uchsay asyay ybay attackingyay. 
 Antasmalphay  Illerkay 4levelthlay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay aptay intoyay ethay ightmaresnay ofyay ayay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray andyay eatecray anyay illusoryyay anifestationmay ofyay itsyay eepestday earsfay, isiblevay onlyyay otay atthay eaturecray. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay argettay ecomesbay ightenedfray orfay ethay urationday. 
 Atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay ethay arget’stay urnstay eforebay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay aketay 4day10 ychicpsay amageday. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 5thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1dlay Oyay orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 4thay. Antomphay  Eed3rd-levelstay illusionyay (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 ourhay Ayay  Argelay quasi-realyay, orselikehay eaturecray appearsyay onyay ethay oundgray inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay ecideday ethay eature’scray appearanceyay, utbay ityay isyay equippedyay withyay ayay addlesay, itbay, andyay idlebray. 
 Anyyay ofyay ethay equipmentyay eatedcray ybay ethay ellspay anishesvay inyay ayay uffpay ofyay okesmay ifyay ityay isyay arriedcay oremay anthay 10 eetfay awayyay omfray ethay eedstay. Orfay ethay urationday, youyay oryay ayay eaturecray youyay oosechay ancay ideray ethay eedstay. 
 Ethay eaturecray usesyay ethay atisticsstay orfay ayay idingray orsehay, exceptyay ityay ashay ayay eedspay ofyay 100 eetfay andyay ancay aveltray 10 ilesmay inyay anyay ourhay, oryay 13 ilesmay atyay ayay astfay acepay. 
 Whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay eedstay aduallygray adesfay, ivinggay ethay iderray 1 inutemay otay ismountday. 
 Ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay youyay useyay anyay actionyay otay ismissday ityay oryay ifyay ethay eedstay akestay anyyay amageday. Anarplay  Ally6th-levelyay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay eseechbay anyay otherworldlyyay entityyay orfay aidyay. 
 Ethay eingbay ustmay ebay ownknay otay youyay: ayay odgay, ayay imordialpray, ayay emonday incepray, oryay omesay otheryay eingbay ofyay osmiccay owerpay. 
 Atthay entityyay endssay ayay elestialcay, anyay elementalyay, oryay ayay iendfay oyallay otay ityay otay aidyay youyay, akingmay ethay eaturecray appearyay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay withinyay angeray. 
 Ifyay youyay owknay ayay ecificspay eature’scray amenay, youyay ancay eakspay atthay amenay whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay otay equestray atthay eaturecray, oughthay youyay ightmay etgay ayay ifferentday eaturecray anywayyay (sdMsay oicechay). Whenyay ethay eaturecray appearsyay, ityay isyay underyay onay ompulsioncay otay ehavebay inyay anyyay articularpay wayyay. 
 Youyay ancay askyay ethay eaturecray otay erformpay ayay ervicesay inyay exchangeyay orfay aymentpay, utbay ityay isn’tyay obligedyay otay oday osay.
