 Ethay equestedray asktay ouldcay angeray omfray implesay (yflay usyay acrossyay ethay asmchay, oryay elphay usyay ightfay ayay attlebay) otay omplexcay (yspay onyay ouryay enemiesyay, oryay otectuspray uringday ouryay orayfay intoyay ethay ungeonday). 
 Youyay ustmay ebay ableyay otay ommunicatecay withyay ethay eaturecray otay argainbay orfay itsyay ervicessay. Aymentpay ancay aketay ayay arietyvay ofyay ormsfay. 
Ayay elestialcay ightmay equireray ayay izablesay onationday ofyay oldgay oryay agicmay itemsyay otay anyay alliedyay empletay, whileyay ayay iendfay ightmay emandday ayay ivinglay acrificesay oryay ayay iftgay ofyay easuretray. 
 Omesay eaturescray ightmay exchangeyay eirthay ervicesay orfay ayay questyay undertakenyay ybay youyay. Asyay ayay uleray ofyay umbthay, ayay asktay atthay ancay ebay easuredmay inyay inutesmay equiresray ayay aymentpay worthyay 100 gpay erpay inutemay. 
Ayay asktay easuredmay inyay ourshay equiresray 1,000 gpay erpay ourhay. 
 Andyay ayay asktay easuredmay inyay aysday (upyay otay 10 aysday) equiresray 10,000 gpay erpay ayday. 
 Ethay DMay ancay adjustyay esethay aymentspay asedbay onyay ethay ircumstancescay underyay whichyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay. 
 Ifyay ethay asktay isyay alignedyay withyay ethay eature’scray ethosyay, ethay aymentpay ightmay ebay alvedhay oryay evenyay waivedyay. 
 Onhazardousnay askstay ypicallytay equireray onlyyay alfhay ethay uggestedsay aymentpay, whileyay especiallyyay angerousday askstay ightmay equireray ayay eatergray iftgay. 
 Eaturescray arelyray acceptyay askstay atthay eemsay uicidalsay. Afteryay ethay eaturecray ompletescay ethay asktay, oryay whenyay ethay agreed-uponyay urationday ofyay ervicesay expiresyay, ethay eaturecray eturnsray otay itsyay omehay aneplay afteryay eportingray ackbay otay youyay, ifyay appropriateyay otay ethay asktay andyay ifyay ossiblepay. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay unableyay otay agreeyay onyay ayay icepray orfay ethay eature’scray ervicesay, ethay eaturecray immediatelyyay eturnsray otay itsyay omehay ane.Aplay eaturecray enlistedyay otay oinjay youryay oupgray ountscay asyay ayay embermay ofyay ityay, eceivingray ayay ullfay areshay ofyay experienceyay ointspay awardedyay. Anarplay  Inding5th-levelbay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 ourhay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay eweljay worthyay atyay eastlay 1,000 ,whichgpay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday: 24 ourshay Withyay isthay ellspay, youyay attemptyay otay indbay ayay elestialcay, anyay elementalyay, ayay eyfay, oryay ayay iendfay otay youryay ervicesay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ustmay ebay withinyay angeray orfay ethay entireyay astingcay ofyay ethay ellspay. 
( Ypicallytay, ethay eaturecray isyay irstfay ummonedsay intoyay ethay entercay ofyay anyay invertedyay agicmay irclecay inyay orderyay otay eepkay ityay appedtray whileyay isthay ellspay isyay astcay.)  Atyay ethay ompletioncay ofyay ethay astingcay, ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ityay isyay oundbay otay ervesay youyay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray wasyay ummonedsay oryay eatedcray ybay anotheryay ellspay, atthay ell’sspay urationday isyay extendedyay otay atchmay ethay urationday ofyay isthay ell.Aspay oundbay eaturecray ustmay ollowfay youryay instructionsyay otay ethay estbay ofyay itsyay abilityyay. 
 Youyay ightmay ommandcay ethay eaturecray otay accompanyyay youyay onyay anyay adventureyay, otay uardgay ayay ocationlay, oryay otay eliverday ayay essagemay. 
 Ethay eaturecray obeysyay ethay etterlay ofyay youryay instructionsyay, utbay ifyay ethay eaturecray isyay ostilehay otay youyay, ityay ivesstray otay wisttay youryay wordsyay otay achieveyay itsyay ownyay objectivesyay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray arriescay outyay youryay instructionsyay ompletelycay eforebay ethay ellspay endsyay, ityay avelstray otay youyay otay eportray isthay actfay ifyay youyay areyay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay onyay ayay ifferentday aneplay ofyay existenceyay, ityay eturnsray otay ethay aceplay whereyay youyay oundbay ityay andyay emainsray erethay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Aneplay  Iftshay 7levelthlay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay orkedfay, etalmay odray worthyay atyay eastlay 250 gpay, attunedyay otay ayay articularpay aneplay ofyay existenceyay)  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay andyay upyay otay eightyay willingyay eaturescray whoyay inklay andshay inyay ayay irclecay areyay ansportedtray otay ayay ifferentday aneplay ofyay existenceyay. 
 Youyay ancay ecifyspay ayay argettay estinationday inyay eneralgay ermstay, uchsay asyay ethay  Itycay ofyay  Assbray onyay ethay  Elementalyay  Aneplay ofyay  Irefay oryay ethay alacepay ofyay  Ispaterday onyay ethay econdsay evellay ofyay ethay  Inenay  Ellshay, andyay youyay appearyay inyay oryay earnay atthay estinationday. Ifyay youyay areyay yingtray otay eachray ethay  Itycay ofyay  Assbray, orfay exampleyay, youyay ightmay arriveyay inyay itsyay  Eetstray ofyay  Eelstay, eforebay itsyay  Ategay ofyay  Ashesyay, oryay ookinglay atyay ethay itycay omfray acrossyay ethay  Easay ofyay  Irefay, atyay ethay sdMsay iscretionday. Alternativelyyay, ifyay youyay owknay ethay igilsay equencesay ofyay ayay eleportationtay irclecay onyay anotheryay aneplay ofyay existenceyay, isthay ellspay ancay aketay youyay otay atthay irclecay. 
 Ifyay ethay eleportationtay irclecay isyay ootay allsmay otay oldhay allyay ethay eaturescray youyay ansportedtray, eythay appearyay inyay ethay osestclay unoccupiedyay acesspay extnay otay ethay irclecay. Youyay ancay useyay isthay ellspay otay anishbay anyay unwillingyay eaturecray otay anotheryay aneplay. 
 Oosechay ayay eaturecray withinyay youryay eachray andyay akemay ayay eleemay ellspay attackyay againstyay ityay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray ailsfay isthay avesay, ityay isyay ansportedtray otay ayay andomray ocationlay onyay ethay aneplay ofyay existenceyay youyay ecifyspay. 
Ayay eaturecray osay ansportedtray ustmay indfay itsyay ownyay wayyay ackbay otay youryay urrentcay aneplay ofyay existenceyay. Antplay  Owthgray 3levelrdlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay oryay 8 ourshay  Angeray: 150 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Isthay ellspay annelschay italityvay intoyay antsplay withinyay ayay ecificspay areayay. 
 Erethay areyay wotay ossiblepay usesyay orfay ethay ellspay, antinggray eitheryay immediateyay oryay ong-termlay enefitsbay. Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay 1 actionyay, oosechay ayay ointpay withinyay angeray. 
 Allyay ormalnay antsplay inyay ayay 100-ootfay adiusray enteredcay onyay atthay ointpay ecomebay ickthay andyay overgrownyay. 
Ayay eaturecray ovingmay oughthray ethay areayay ustmay endspay 4 eetfay ofyay ovementmay orfay everyyay 1 ootfay ityay ovesmay. Youyay ancay excludeyay oneyay oryay oremay areasyay ofyay anyyay izesay withinyay ethay ell’sspay areayay omfray eingbay affectedyay. Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay overyay 8 ourshay, youyay enrichyay ethay andlay. 
 Allyay antsplay inyay ayay alf-milehay adiusray enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay withinyay angeray ecomebay enrichedyay orfay 1 yearyay. 
 Ethay antsplay yieldyay wicetay ethay ormalnay amountyay ofyay oodfay whenyay arvestedhay. Oisonpay  Ayspray Onjurationcay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay Angeray: 10 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay extendyay youryay andhay owardtay ayay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray andyay ojectpray ayay uffpay ofyay oxiousnay asgay omfray youryay almpay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray oryay aketay 1day12 oisonpay amageday. Isthay ell’sspay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day12 whenyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay (2day12), 11thay evellay (3day12), andyay 17thay evellay (4day12). Olymorph4th-levelpay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay aterpillarcay ocooncay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Isthay ellspay ansformstray ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray intoyay ayay ewnay ormfay. 
 Anyay unwillingyay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray otay avoidyay ethay effectyay. 
Ayay apechangershay automaticallyyay ucceedssay onyay isthay avingsay owthray. Ethay ansformationtray astslay orfay ethay urationday, oryay untilyay ethay argettay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay oryay iesday. 
 Ethay ewnay ormfay ancay ebay anyyay eastbay whoseyay allengechay atingray isyay equalyay otay oryay esslay anthay ethay arget’stay (oryay ethay arget’stay evellay, ifyay ityay oesn'tday avehay ayay allengechay atingray). 
 Ethay arget’stay amegay atisticsstay, includingyay entalmay abilityyay oresscay, areyay eplacedray ybay ethay atisticsstay ofyay ethay osenchay eastbay. 
 Ityay etainsray itsyay alignmentyay andyay ersonalitypay. Ethay argettay assumesyay ethay ithay ointspay ofyay itsyay ewnay ormfay. 
 Whenyay ityay evertsray otay itsyay ormalnay ormfay, ethay eaturecray eturnsray otay ethay umbernay ofyay ithay ointspay ityay adhay eforebay ityay ansformedtray. 
 Ifyay ityay evertsray asyay ayay esultray ofyay oppingdray otay0 ithay ointspay, anyyay excessyay amageday arriescay overyay otay itsyay ormalnay ormfay. 
 Asyay onglay asyay ethay excessyay amageday oesn’tday educeray ethay eature’scray ormalnay ormfay otay 0 ithay ointspay, ityay isn’tyay ockedknay unconsciousyay. Ethay eaturecray isyay imitedlay inyay ethay actionsyay ityay ancay erformpay ybay ethay aturenay ofyay itsyay ewnay ormfay, andyay ityay an’tcay eakspay, astcay ellsspay, oryay aketay anyyay otheryay actionyay atthay equiresray andshay oryay eechspay. Ethay arget’stay eargay eldsmay intoyay ethay ewnay ormfay. 
 Ethay eaturecray an’tcay activateyay, useyay, wieldyay, oryay otherwiseyay enefitbay omfray anyyay ofyay itsyay equipmentyay. Owerpay  Wordyay  Eal9th-levelhay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay waveyay ofyay ealinghay energyyay washesyay overyay ethay eaturecray youyay ouchtay. 
 Ethay argettay egainsray allyay itsyay ithay ointspay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray isyay armedchay, ightenedfray, aralyzedpay, oryay unnedstay, ethay onditioncay endsyay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray isyay onepray, ityay ancay useyay itsyay eactionray otay andstay upyay. 
 Youyay utteryay ayay wordyay ofyay owerpay atthay ancay ompelcay oneyay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray otay ieday instantlyyay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray youyay oosechay ashay 100 ithay ointspay oryay ewerfay, ityay iesday. 
 Otherwiseyay, ethay ellspay ashay onay effectyay. Owerpay  Wordyay  Unstay 8levelthlay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay eakspay ayay wordyay ofyay owerpay atthay ancay overwhelmyay ethay indmay ofyay oneyay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray, eavinglay ityay umbfoundedday. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay ashay 150 ithay ointspay oryay ewerfay, ityay isyay unnedstay. 
 Otherwiseyay, ethay ellspay ashay onay effectyay. Ethay unnedstay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, isthay unningstay effectyay endsyay. Ayerpray ofyay  Ealing2nd-levelhay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Upyay otay ixsay eaturescray ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray eachyay egainray ithay ointspay equalyay otay 2day8 + youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay odifiermay. 
 Isthay ellspay ashay onay effectyay onyay undeadyay oryay onstructscay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay ealinghay increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Estidigitationpray Ansmutationtray antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 10 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Upyay otay 1 ourhay Isthay ellspay isyay ayay inormay agicalmay icktray atthay ovicenay ellcastersspay useyay orfay acticepray. 
 Youyay eatecray oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay agicalmay effectsyay withinyay angeray:•  Youyay eatecray anyay instantaneousyay, armlesshay ensorysay effectyay, uchsay asyay ayay owershay ofyay arksspay, ayay uffpay ofyay windyay, aintfay usi­calmay otesnay, oryay anyay oddyay odoryay.•  Youyay instantaneouslyyay ightlay oryay uffsnay outyay ayay andlecay, ayay orchtay, oryay ayay allsmay ampfirecay.•  Youyay instantaneouslyyay eanclay oryay oilsay anyay objectyay onay argerlay anthay 1 ubiccay ootfay.•  Youyay illchay, warmyay, oryay avorflay upyay otay 1 ubiccay ootfay ofyay onliv­ingnay aterialmay orfay 1 ourhay.•  Youyay akemay ayay olorcay, ayay allsmay arkmay, oryay ayay ymbolsay appearyay onyay anyay objectyay oryay ayay urfacesay orfay 1 ourhay.•  Youyay eatecray ayay onmagicalnay inkettray oryay anyay illusoryyay imageyay atthay ancay itfay inyay youryay andhay andyay atthay astslay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay ultiplemay imestay, youyay ancay avehay upyay otay eethray ofyay itsyay on-instantaneousnay effectsyay activeyay atyay ayay imetay, andyay youyay ancay ismissday uchsay anyay effectyay asyay anyay actionyay. Ismaticpray  Ayspray 7levelthlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (60-ootfay onecay) Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Eightyay ulticoloredmay aysray ofyay ightlay ashflay omfray youryay andhay. 
 Eachyay ayray isyay ayay ifferentday olorcay andyay ashay ayay ifferentday owerpay andyay urposepay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 60-ootfay onecay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Orfay eachyay argettay, ollray ayay day8 otay etermineday whichyay olorcay ayray affectsyay ityay.1. 
 Edray. 
 Ethay argettay akestay 10day6 irefay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay.2. 
 Orangeyay. 
 Ethay argettay akestay 10day6 acidyay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay.3. 
 Yellowyay. 
 Ethay argettay akestay 10day6 ightninglay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay.4. 
 Eengray. 
 Ethay argettay akestay 10day6 oisonpay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay.5. 
 Ueblay. 
 Ethay argettay akestay 10day6 oldcay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay.6. 
 Indigoyay. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay argettay isyay estrainedray. Ityay ustmay enthay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay. 
 Ifyay ityay uccessfullysay avessay eethray imestay, ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay itsyay avesay eethray imes,ittay ermanentlypay urnstay otay onestay andyay isyay ubjectedsay otay ethay etrifiedpay onditioncay. 
 Ethay uccessessay andyay ailuresfay on’tday eednay otay ebay onsecutivecay; eepkay acktray ofyay othbay untilyay ethay argettay ollectscay eethray ofyay ayay indkay.7. 
 Ioletvay. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay argettay isyay indedblay. 
 Ityay ustmay enthay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray atyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
Ayay uccessfulsay avesay endsyay ethay indnessblay. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay atthay avesay, ethay eaturecray isyay ansportedtray otay anotheryay aneplay ofyay existenceyay ofyay ethay sdMsay oosingchay andyay isyay onay ongerlay indedblay. 
( Ypicallytay, ayay eaturecray atthay isyay onyay ayay aneplay atthay isn’tyay itsyay omehay aneplay isyay anishedbay omehay, whileyay otheryay eaturescray areyay usuallyyay astcay intoyay ethay  Astralyay oryay  Etherealyay anesplay.)8. 
 Ecialspay. 
 Ethay argettay isyay uckstray ybay wotay aysray. 
 Ollray wicetay oremay, erollingray anyyay 8. Ismaticpray  Wallyay 9levelthlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 10 inutesmay Ayay immeringshay, ulticoloredmay aneplay ofyay ightlay ormsfay ayay erticalvay opaqueyay wall—upyay otay 90 eetfay onglay, 30 eetfay ighhay, andyay 1 inchyay ick—centeredthay onyay ayay ointpay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Alternativelyyay, youyay ancay apeshay ethay wallyay intoyay ayay eresphay upyay otay 30 eetfay inyay iameterday enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay wallyay emainsray inyay aceplay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ifyay youyay ositionpay ethay wallyay osay atthay ityay assespay oughthray ayay acespay occupiedyay ybay ayay eaturecray, ethay ellspay ailsfay, andyay youryay actionyay andyay ethay ellspay otslay areyay wastedyay. Ethay wallyay edsshay ightbray ightlay outyay otay ayay angeray ofyay 100 eetfay andyay imday ightlay orfay anyay additionalyay 100 eetfay. 
 Youyay andyay eaturescray youyay esignateday atyay ethay imetay youyay astcay ethay ellspay ancay asspay oughthray andyay emainray earnay ethay wallyay withoutyay armhay. 
ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray oryay ecomebay indedblay orfay 1 inutemay. Ethay wallyay onsistscay ofyay evensay ayerslay, eachyay withyay ayay ifferentday olorcay. 
 Whenyay ayay eaturecray attemptsyay otay eachray intoyay oryay asspay oughthray ethay wallyay, ityay oesday osay oneyay ayerlay atyay ayay imetay oughthray allyay ethay wall’syay ayerslay. 
 Asyay ityay assespay oryay eachesray oughthray eachyay ayerlay, ethay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay ebay affectedyay ybay atthay ayer’slay opertiespray asyay escribedday elowbay. Ethay wallyay ancay ebay estroyedday, alsoyay oneyay ayerlay atyay ayay imetay, inyay orderyay omfray edray otay ioletvay, ybay eansmay ecificspay otay eachyay ayerlay. 
 Onceyay ayay ayerlay isyay estroyedday, ityay emainsray osay orfay ethay urationday ofyay ethay ellspay. 
Ayay odray ofyay ancellationcay estroysday ayay ismaticpray wallyay, utbay anyay antimagicyay ieldfay ashay onay effectyay onyay ityay.1. 
 Edray. 
 Ethay eaturecray akestay 10day6 irefay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
 Whileyay isthay ayerlay isyay inyay aceplay, onmagicalnay angedray attacksyay an’tcay asspay oughthray ethay wallyay. 
 Ethay ayerlay ancay ebay estroyedday ybay ealingday atyay eastlay 25 oldcay amageday otay ityay.2. 
 Orangeyay. 
 Ethay eaturecray akestay 10day6 acidyay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
 Whileyay isthay ayerlay isyay inyay aceplay, agicalmay angedray attacksyay an’tcay asspay oughthray ethay wallyay. 
 Ethay ayerlay isyay estroyedday yabay ongstray windyay.3. 
 Yellowyay. 
 Ethay eaturecray akestay 10day6 ightninglay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
 Isthay ayerlay ancay ebay estroyedday ybay ealingday atyay eastlay 60 orcefay amageday otay ityay.4. 
 Eengray. 
 Ethay eaturecray akestay 10day6 oisonpay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
Ayay asswallpay ellspay, oryay anotheryay ellspay ofyay equalyay oryay eatergray evellay atthay ancay openyay ayay ortalpay onyay ayay olidsay urfacesay, estroysday isthay ayerlay.5. 
 Ueblay. 
 Ethay eaturecray akestay 10day6 oldcay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
 Isthay ayerlay ancay ebay estroyedday ybay ealingday atyay eastlay 25 irefay amageday otay ityay.6. 
 Indigoyay. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray isyay estrainedray. 
 Ityay ustmay enthay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay. 
 Ifyay ityay uccessfullysay avessay eethray imestay, ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay itsyay avesay eethray imes,ittay ermanentlypay urnstay otay onestay andyay isyay ubjectedsay otay ethay etrifiedpay onditioncay. 
 Ethay uccessessay andyay ailuresfay on’tday eednay otay ebay onsecutivecay; eepkay acktray ofyay othbay untilyay ethay eaturecray ollectscay eethray ofyay ayay indkay. Whileyay isthay ayerlay isyay inyay aceplay, ellsspay an’tcay ebay astcay oughthray ethay wallyay. 
 Ethay ayerlay isyay estroyedday ybay ightbray ightlay edshay ybay ayay aylightday ellspay oryay ayay imilarsay ellspay ofyay equalyay oryay igherhay evellay.7. 
 Ioletvay. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray isyay indedblay. 
 Ityay ustmay enthay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray atyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
Ayay uccessfulsay avesay endsyay ethay indnessblay. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay atthay avesay, ethay eaturecray isyay ansportedtray otay anotheryay aneplay ofyay ethay sdMsay oosingchay andyay isyay onay ongerlay indedblay. 
( Ypicallytay, ayay eaturecray atthay isyay onyay ayay aneplay atthay isn’tyay itsyay omehay aneplay isyay anishedbay omehay, whileyay otheryay eaturescray areyay usuallyyay astcay intoyay ethay  Astralyay oryay  Etherealyay anesplay.)  Isthay ayerlay isyay estroyedday ybay ayay ispelday agicmay ellspay oryay ayay imilarsay ellspay ofyay equalyay oryay igherhay evellay atthay ancay endyay ellsspay andyay agicalmay effectsyay. Oducepray  Ameflay Onjurationcay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 10 inutesmay Ayay ickeringflay ameflay appearsyay inyay youryay andhay. 
 Ethay ameflay emainsray erethay orfay ethay urationday andyay armshay eithernay youyay ornay youryay equipmentyay. 
 Ethay ameflay edsshay ightbray ightlay inyay ayay 10-ootfay adiusray andyay imday ightlay orfay anyay additionalyay 10 eetfay. 
 Ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay youyay ismissday ityay asyay anyay actionyay oryay ifyay youyay astcay ityay againyay. Youyay ancay alsoyay attackyay withyay ethay ameflay, althoughyay oingday osay endsyay ethay ellspay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, oryay asyay anyay actionyay onyay ayay aterlay urntay, youyay ancay urlhay ethay ameflay atyay ayay eaturecray withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Akemay ayay angedray ellspay attackyay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 1day8 irefay amageday. Isthay ell’sspay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 whenyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay (2day8), 11thay evellay (3day8), andyay 17thay evellay (4day8). Ogrammedpray  Illusionyay 6levelthlay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay eeceflay andyay adejay ustday worthyay atyay eastlay 25 gpay) Urationday:  Untilyay ispelledday Youyay eatecray anyay illusionyay ofyay anyay objectyay, ayay eaturecray, oryay omesay otheryay isiblevay enomenonphay withinyay angeray atthay activatesyay whenyay ayay ecificspay onditioncay occursyay. 
 Ethay illusionyay isyay imperceptibleyay untilyay enthay. 
 Ityay ustmay ebay onay argerlay anthay ayay 30-ootfay ubecay, andyay youyay ecideday whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay owhay ethay illusionyay ehavesbay andyay whatyay oundssay ityay akesmay. 
 Isthay iptedscray erformancepay ancay astlay upyay otay 5 inutesmay. Whenyay ethay onditioncay youyay ecifyspay occursyay, ethay illusionyay ingsspray intoyay existenceyay andyay erformspay inyay ethay annermay youyay escribedday. 
 Onceyay ethay illusionyay inishesfay erformingpay, ityay isappearsday andyay emainsray ormantday orfay 10 inutesmay. 
 Afteryay isthay imetay, ethay illusionyay ancay ebay activatedyay againyay. Ethay iggeringtray onditioncay ancay ebay asyay eneralgay oryay asyay etailedday asyay youyay ikelay, oughthay ityay ustmay ebay asedbay onyay isualvay oryay audibleyay onditionscay atthay occuryay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay ethay areayay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, youyay ouldcay eatecray anyay illusionyay ofyay yourselfyay otay appearyay andyay warnyay offyay othersyay whoyay attemptyay otay openyay ayay appedtray oorday, oryay youyay ouldcay etsay ethay illusionyay otay iggertray onlyyay whenyay ayay eaturecray ayssay ethay orrectcay wordyay oryay asephray. Ysicalphay interactionyay withyay ethay imageyay evealsray ityay otay ebay anyay illusionyay, ecausebay ingsthay ancay asspay oughthray ityay. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay usesyay itsyay actionyay otay examineyay ethay imageyay ancay etermineday atthay ityay isyay anyay illusionyay withyay ayay uccessfulsay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Ojectpray  Imageyay 7levelthlay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 500 ilesmay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay eplicaray ofyay youyay ademay omfray aterialsmay worthyay atyay eastlay 5 gpay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ayday Youyay eatecray anyay illusoryyay opycay ofyay yourselfyay atthay astslay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ethay opycay ancay appearyay atyay anyyay ocationlay withinyay angeray atthay youyay avehay eensay eforebay, egardlessray ofyay interveningyay obstaclesyay. 
 Ethay illusionyay ookslay andyay oundssay ikelay youyay utbay isyay intangibleyay. 
 Ifyay ethay illusionyay akestay anyyay amageday, ityay isappearsday, andyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ovemay isthay illusionyay upyay otay wicetay youryay eedspay, andyay akemay ityay esturegay, eakspay, andyay ehavebay inyay whateveryay wayyay youyay oosechay. 
 Ityay imicsmay youryay annerismsmay erfectlypay. Youyay ancay eesay oughthray itsyay eyesyay andyay earhay oughthray itsyay earsyay asyay ifyay youyay wereyay inyay itsyay acespay. 
 Onyay youryay urntay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay, youyay ancay witchsay omfray usingyay itsyay ensessay otay usingyay youryay ownyay, oryay ackbay againyay. 
 Whileyay youyay areyay usingyay itsyay ensessay, youyay areyay indedblay andyay eafenedday inyay egardray otay youryay ownyay urroundingssay. Ysicalphay interactionyay withyay ethay imageyay evealsray ityay otay ebay anyay illusionyay, ecausebay ingsthay ancay asspay oughthray ityay. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay usesyay itsyay actionyay otay examineyay ethay imageyay ancay etermineday atthay ityay isyay anyay illusionyay withyay ayay uccessfulsay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Ifyay ayay eaturecray iscernsday ethay illusionyay orfay whatyay ityay isyay, ethay eaturecray ancay eesay oughthray ethay imageyay, andyay anyyay oisenay ityay akesmay oundssay ollowhay otay ethay eaturecray. Otectionpray omfray  Energy3rd-levelyay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Orfay ethay urationday, ethay willingyay eaturecray youyay ouchtay ashay esistanceray otay oneyay amageday ypetay ofyay youryay oicechay: acidyay, oldcay, irefay, ightninglay, oryay underthay. Otectionpray omfray  Evilyay andyay  Oodgay 1levelstlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (olyhay wateryay oryay owderedpay ilversay andyay ironyay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay upyay otay 10 inutesmay Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, oneyay willingyay eaturecray youyay ouchtay isyay otectedpray againstyay ertaincay ypestay ofyay eaturescray: aberrationsyay, elestialscay, elementalsyay, eyfay, iendsfay, andyay undeadyay. Ethay otectionpray antsgray everalsay enefitsbay. 
 Eaturescray ofyay osethay ypestay avehay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Ethay argettay alsoyay an’tcay ebay armedchay, ightenedfray, oryay ossessedpay ybay emthay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay alreadyyay armedchay, ightenedfray, oryay ossessedpay ybay uchsay ayay eaturecray, ethay argettay ashay advantageyay onyay anyyay ewnay avingsay owthray againstyay ethay elevantray effectyay. Otectionpray omfray  Oison2nd-levelpay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 ourhay Youyay ouchtay ayay eaturecray. 
 Ifyay ityay isyay oisonedpay, youyay eutralizenay ethay oisonpay. 
 Ifyay oremay anthay oneyay oisonpay afflictsyay ethay argettay, youyay eutralizenay oneyay oisonpay atthay youyay owknay isyay esentpray, oryay youyay eutralizenay oneyay atyay andomray. Orfay ethay urationday, ethay argettay ashay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay eingbay oisonedpay, andyay ityay ashay esistanceray otay oisonpay amageday. Urifypay  Oodfay andyay  Ink1st-leveldray ansmutationtray (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 10 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Allyay onmagicalnay oodfay andyay inkdray withinyay ayay 5-oot-radiusfay eresphay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray isyay urifiedpay andyay enderedray eefray ofyay oisonpay andyay iseaseday. Aiseray  Ead5th-levelday ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 ourhay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iamondday worthyay atyay eastlay 500 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay eturnray ayay eadday eaturecray youyay ouchtay otay ifelay, ovidedpray atthay ityay ashay eenbay eadday onay ongerlay anthay 10 aysday. 
 Ifyay ethay eature’scray oulsay isyay othbay willingyay andyay atyay ibertylay otay ejoinray ethay odybay, ethay eaturecray eturnsray otay ifelay withyay 1 ithay ointpay. Isthay ellspay alsoyay eutralizesnay anyyay oisonspay andyay urescay onmagicalnay iseasesday atthay affectedyay ethay eaturecray atyay ethay imetay ityay iedday. 
 Isthay ellspay oesn’tday, oweverhay, emoveray agicalmay iseasesday, ursescay, oryay imilarsay effectsyay; ifyay esethay aren’tyay irstfay emovedray iorpray otay astingcay ethay ellspay, eythay aketay effectyay whenyay ethay eaturecray eturnsray otay ifelay. 
 Ethay ellspay an’tcay eturnray anyay undeadyay eaturecray otay ifelay. Isthay ellspay osesclay allyay ortalmay woundsyay, utbay ityay oesn’tday estoreray issingmay odybay artspay. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray isyay ackinglay odybay artspay oryay organsyay integralyay orfay itsyay urvival—itssay eadhay, orfay instance—theyay ellspay automaticallyyay ailsfay. Omingcay ackbay omfray ethay eadday isyay anyay ordealyay. 
 Ethay argettay akestay ayay -4 enaltypay otay allyay attackyay ollsray, avingsay owsthray, andyay abilityyay eckschay. 
inkinglay eachyay eaturecray otay allyay ethay othersyay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Eaturescray withyay  Intelligenceyay oresscay ofyay 2 oryay esslay aren’tyay affectedyay ybay isthay ellspay. Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argetstay ancay ommunicatecay elepathicallytay oughthray ethay ondbay whetheryay oryay otnay eythay avehay ayay ommoncay anguagelay. 
 Ethay ommunicationcay isyay ossiblepay overyay anyyay istanceday, oughthay ityay an’tcay extendyay otay otheryay anesplay ofyay existenceyay. Ayray ofyay  Enfeeblement2nd-levelyay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ayay ackblay eambay ofyay enervatingyay energyyay ingsspray omfray youryay ingerfay owardtay ayay eaturecray withinyay angeray. 
 Akemay ayay angedray ellspay attackyay againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay ealsday onlyyay alfhay amageday withyay weaponyay attacksyay atthay useyay  Engthstray untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay ethay arget’stay urnstay, ityay ancay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray againstyay ethay ellspay. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Ayray ofyay  Ostfray Evocationyay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay igidfray eambay ofyay ue-whiteblay ightlay eaksstray owardtay ayay eaturecray withinyay angeray. 
 Akemay ayay angedray ellspay attackyay againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ityay akestay 1day8 oldcay amageday, andyay itsyay eedspay isyay educedray ybay 10 eetfay untilyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Ethay ell’sspay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 whenyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay (2day8), 11thay evellay (3day8), andyay 17thay evellay (4day8). Ayray ofyay  Icknesssay 1levelstlay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay ayray ofyay ickeningsay eenishgray energyyay asheslay outyay owardtay ayay eaturecray withinyay angeray. 
 Akemay ayay angedray ellspay attackyay againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 2day8 oisonpay amageday andyay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ityay isyay alsoyay oisonedpay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Egenerateray 7levelthlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay ayerpray wheelyay andyay olyhay wateryay)  Urationday: 1 ourhay Youyay ouchtay ayay eaturecray andyay imulatestay itsyay aturalnay ealinghay abilityyay. 
 Ethay argettay egainsray 4day8 + 15 ithay ointspay. 
 Orfay ethay urationday ofyay ethay ellspay, ethay argettay egainsray 1 ithay ointpay atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay (10 ithay ointspay eachyay inutemay). Ethay arget’stay everedsay odybay embersmay (ingersfay, egslay, ailstay, andyay osay onyay), ifyay anyyay, areyay estoredray afteryay 2 inutesmay. Ifyay youyay avehay ethay everedsay artpay andyay oldhay ityay otay ethay umpstay, ethay ellspay instantaneouslyyay ausescay ethay imblay otay itknay otay ethay umpstay. Eincarnateray 5levelthlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 ourhay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (areray oilsyay andyay unguentsyay worthyay atyay eastlay 1,000 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ouchtay ayay eadday umanoidhay oryay ayay iecepay ofyay ayay eadday umanoidhay. 
 Ovidedpray atthay ethay eaturecray ashay eenbay eadday onay ongerlay anthay 10 aysday, ethay ellspay ormsfay ayay ewnay adultyay odybay orfay ityay andyay enthay allscay ethay oulsay otay enteryay atthay odybay. 
 Ifyay ethay arget’stay oulsay isn’tyay eefray oryay willingyay otay oday osay, ethay ellspay ailsfay. Ethay agicmay ashionsfay ayay ewnay odybay orfay ethay eaturecray otay inhabityay, whichyay ikelylay ausescay ethay eature’scray aceray otay angechay. 
 Ethay DMay ollsray ayay day100 andyay onsultscay ethay ollowingfay abletay otay etermineday whatyay ormfay ethay eaturecray akestay whenyay estoredray otay ifelay, oryay ethay DMay ooseschay ayay orm.dfay100 Aceray01-04 Agonborndray05-13 Warfday, illhay14-21 Warfday, ountainmay22-25 Elfyay, arkday26-34 Elfyay, ighhay35-42 Elfyay, woodyay43-46 Omegnay, orestfay47-52 Omegnay, ockray53-56 Alf-elfhay57-60 Alf-orchay61-68 Alflinghay, ightfootlay69-76 Alflinghay, outstay77-96 Umanhay97-00 Ieflingtay Ethay eincarnatedray eaturecray ecallsray itsyay ormerfay ifelay andyay experiencesyay. 
 Ityay etainsray ethay apabilitiescay ityay adhay inyay itsyay originalyay ormfay, exceptyay ityay exchangesyay itsyay originalyay aceray orfay ethay ewnay oneyay andyay angeschay itsyay acialray aitstray accordinglyyay. Emoveray  Ursecay 3levelrdlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Atyay youryay ouchtay, allyay ursescay affectingyay oneyay eaturecray oryay objectyay endyay. 
 Esistanceray Abjurationyay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iniaturemay oakclay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay ouchtay oneyay willingyay eaturecray. 
 Onceyay eforebay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argettay ancay ollray ayay day4 andyay addyay ethay umbernay olledray otay oneyay avingsay owthray ofyay itsyay oicechay. 
 Ityay ancay ollray ethay ieday eforebay oryay afteryay akingmay ethay avingsay owthray. 
 Ethay ellspay enthay endsyay. Esurrectionray 7levelthlay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 ourhay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iamondday worthyay atyay eastlay 1,000 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ouchtay ayay eadday eaturecray atthay ashay eenbay eadday orfay onay oremay anthay ayay enturycay, atthay idn’tday ieday ofyay oldyay ageyay, andyay atthay isn’tyay undeadyay. 
 Ifyay itsyay oulsay isyay eefray andyay willingyay, ethay argettay eturnsray otay ifelay withyay allyay itsyay ithay ointspay. Isthay ellspay eutralizesnay anyyay oisonspay andyay urescay ormalnay iseasesday afflictingyay ethay eaturecray whenyay ityay iedday. 
 Ityay oesn’tday, oweverhay, emoveray agicalmay iseasesday, ursescay, andyay ethay ikelay; ifyay uchsay effectsyay aren'tyay emovedray iorpray otay astingcay ethay ellspay, eythay afflictyay ethay argettay onyay itsyay eturnray otay ifelay. Isthay ellspay osesclay allyay ortalmay woundsyay andyay estoresray anyyay issingmay odybay artspay. Omingcay ackbay omfray ethay eadday isyay anyay ordealyay. 
 Ethay argettay akestay ayay -4 enaltypay otay allyay attackyay ollsray, avingsay owsthray, andyay abilityyay eckschay. 
 Everyyay imetay ethay argettay inishesfay ayay onglay estray, ethay enaltypay isyay educedray ybay 1 untilyay ityay isappearsday. Astingcay isthay ellspay otay estoreray ifelay otay ayay eaturecray atthay ashay eenbay eadday orfay oneyay yearyay oryay ongerlay axestay youyay eatlygray. 
 Untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray, youyay an’tcay astcay ellsspay againyay, andyay youyay avehay isadvantageday onyay allyay attackyay ollsray, abilityyay eckschay, andyay avingsay owsthray. Everseray  Avitygray 7levelthlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 100 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay odestonelay andyay ironyay ilingsfay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Isthay ellspay eversesray avitygray inyay ayay 50-oot-radiusfay, 100- ootfay ighhay ylindercay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay withinyay angeray. 
 Allyay eaturescray andyay objectsyay atthay aren’tyay omehowsay anchoredyay otay ethay oundgray inyay ethay areayay allfay upwardyay andyay eachray ethay optay ofyay ethay areayay whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay. 
Ayay eaturecray ancay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray otay abgray ontoyay ayay ixedfay objectyay ityay ancay eachray, usthay avoidingyay ethay allfay. Ifyay omesay olidsay objectyay (uchsay asyay ayay eilingcay) isyay encounteredyay inyay isthay allfay, allingfay objectsyay andyay eaturescray ikestray ityay ustjay asyay eythay wouldyay uringday ayay ormalnay ownwardday allfay. 
 Ifyay anyay objectyay oryay eaturecray eachesray ethay optay ofyay ethay areayay withoutyay ikingstray anythingyay, ityay emainsray erethay, oscillatingyay ightlyslay, orfay ethay urationday. Atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay urationday, affectedyay objectsyay andyay eaturescray allfay ackbay ownday. Evivifyray 3levelrdlay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (iamondsday worthyay 300 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ouchtay ayay eaturecray atthay ashay iedday withinyay ethay astlay inutemay. 
 Atthay eaturecray eturnsray otay ifelay withyay 1 ithay ointpay. 
 Isthay ellspay an’tcay eturnray otay ifelay ayay eaturecray atthay ashay iedday ofyay oldyay ageyay, ornay ancay ityay estoreray anyyay issingmay odybay artspay. Operay  Icktray 2levelndlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (owderedpay orncay extractyay andyay ayay wistedtay ooplay ofyay archmentpay) Urationday: 1 ourhay Youyay ouchtay ayay engthlay ofyay operay atthay isyay upyay otay 60 eetfay onglay. Oneyay endyay ofyay ethay operay enthay isesray intoyay ethay airyay untilyay ethay wholeyay operay angshay erpendicularpay otay ethay oundgray. 
 Atyay ethay upperyay endyay ofyay ethay operay, anyay invisibleyay entranceyay opensyay otay anyay extradimensionalyay acespay atthay astslay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Ethay extradimensionalyay acespay ancay ebay eachedray ybay imbingclay otay ethay optay ofyay ethay operay. 
 Ethay acespay ancay oldhay asyay anymay asyay eightyay  Ediummay oryay allersmay eaturescray. 
 Ethay operay ancay ebay ulledpay intoyay ethay acespay, akingmay ethay operay isappearday omfray iewvay outsideyay ethay acespay. Attacksyay andyay ellsspay an’tcay osscray oughthray ethay entranceyay intoyay oryay outyay ofyay ethay extradimensionalyay acespay, utbay osethay insideyay ancay eesay outyay ofyay ityay asyay ifyay oughthray ayay 3-oot-by-5-footfay windowyay enteredcay onyay ethay operay. Anythingyay insideyay ethay extradimensionalyay acespay opsdray outyay whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Acredsay  Ameflay  Evocationyay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ame-likeflay adianceray escendsday onyay ayay eaturecray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray oryay aketay 1day8 adiantray amageday. 
 Ethay argettay ainsgay onay enefitbay omfray overcay orfay isthay avingsay owthray. Ethay ell’sspay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 whenyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay (2day8), 11thay evellay (3day8), andyay 17thay evellay (4day8). Anctuarysay 1levelstlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay ilversay irrormay) Urationday: 1 inutemay Youyay wardyay ayay eaturecray withinyay angeray againstyay attackyay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, anyyay eaturecray whoyay argetstay ethay wardedyay eaturecray withyay anyay attackyay oryay ayay armfulhay ellspay ustmay irstfay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
oryay ellspay. 
 Isthay ellspay oesn’tday otectpray ethay wardedyay eaturecray omfray areayay effectsyay, uchsay asyay ethay explosionyay ofyay ayay ireballfay. Ifyay ethay wardedyay eaturecray akesmay anyay attackyay oryay astscay ayay ellspay atthay affectsyay anyay enemyyay eaturecray, isthay ellspay endsyay. Orchingscay  Ay2nd-levelray evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay eatecray eethray aysray ofyay irefay andyay urlhay emthay atyay argetstay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay ancay urlhay emthay atyay oneyay argettay oryay everalsay. Akemay ayay angedray ellspay attackyay orfay eachyay ayray. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 2day6 irefay amageday. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, youyay eatecray oneyay additionalyay ayray orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Ying5th-levelscray ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 10 inutesmay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay ocusfay worthyay atyay eastlay 1,000 gpay, uchsay asyay ayay ystalcray allbay, ayay ilversay irrormay, oryay ayay ontfay illedfay withyay olyhay wateryay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay ancay eesay andyay earhay ayay articularpay eaturecray youyay oosechay atthay isyay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay asyay youyay. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray, whichyay isyay odifiedmay ybay owhay wellyay youyay owknay ethay argettay andyay ethay ortsay ofyay ysicalphay onnectioncay youyay avehay otay ityay. 
 Ifyay ayay argettay owsknay you'reyay astingcay isthay ellspay, ityay ancay ailfay ethay avingsay owthray oluntarilyvay ifyay ityay wantsyay otay ebay observedyay. Owledgeknay Avesay  Odifiermay Econdhandsay (youyay avehay eardhay ofyay ethay argettay)+5 Irsthandfay (youyay avehay etmay ethay argettay)+0 Amiliarfay (youyay owknay ethay argettay wellyay)-5 Onnectioncay Avesay  Odifiermay Ikenesslay oryay icturepay-2 Ossessionpay oryay armentgay-4 Odybay artpay, ocklay ofyay airhay, itbay ofyay ailnay, oryay ethay ikelay-10 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay argettay isn’tyay affectedyay, andyay youyay an’tcay useyay isthay ellspay againstyay ityay againyay orfay 24 ourshay. Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay ellspay eatescray anyay invisibleyay ensorsay withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay ethay argettay. 
 Youyay ancay eesay andyay earhay oughthray ethay ensorsay asyay ifyay youyay wereyay erethay. 
 Ethay ensorsay ovesmay withyay ethay argettay, emainingray withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay ityay orfay ethay urationday. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay ancay eesay invisibleyay objectsyay eessay ethay ensorsay asyay ayay uminouslay orbyay aboutyay ethay izesay ofyay youryay istfay. Insteadyay ofyay argetingtay ayay eaturecray, youyay ancay oosechay ayay ocationlay youyay avehay eensay eforebay asyay ethay argettay ofyay isthay ellspay. 
 Earingsay  Ite1st-levelsmay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ethay extnay imetay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay uringday ethay ell’sspay urationday, youryay weaponyay aresflay withyay white-hotyay intensityyay, andyay ethay attackyay ealsday anyay extrayay 1day6 irefay amageday otay ethay argettay andyay ausescay ethay argettay otay igniteyay inyay amesflay. 
 Atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ityay akestay 1day6 irefay amageday. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay oryay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ityay usesyay anyay actionyay otay utpay outyay ethay amesflay, oryay ifyay omesay otheryay effectyay ousesday ethay amesflay (uchsay asyay ethay argettay eingbay ubmergedsay inyay wateryay), ethay ellspay endsyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay initialyay extrayay amageday ealtday ybay ethay attackyay increasesyay ybay 1day6 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Eesay  Invisibility2nd-levelyay ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay alctay andyay ayay allsmay inklingspray ofyay owderedpay ilversay) Urationday: 1 ourhay Orfay ethay urationday, youyay eesay invisibleyay eaturescray andyay objectsyay asyay ifyay eythay wereyay isiblevay, andyay youyay ancay eesay intoyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay. 
 Etherealyay eaturescray andyay objectsyay appearyay ostlyghay andyay anslucenttray. Eeming5th-levelsay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 8 ourshay Isthay ellspay allowsyay youyay otay angechay ethay appearanceyay ofyay anyyay umbernay ofyay eaturescray atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay ivegay eachyay argettay youyay oosechay ayay ewnay, illusoryyay appearanceyay. 
 Anyay unwillingyay argettay ancay akemay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray, andyay ifyay ityay ucceedssay, ityay isyay unaffectedyay ybay isthay ellspay. Ethay ellspay isguisesday ysicalphay appearanceyay asyay wellyay asyay othingclay, armoryay, weaponsyay, andyay equipmentyay. 
 Youyay ancay akemay eachyay eaturecray eemsay 1 ootfay ortershay oryay allertay andyay appearyay inthay, atfay, oryay inyay etweenbay. 
 Youyay an’tcay angechay ayay arget’stay odybay ypetay, osay youyay ustmay oosechay ayay ormfay atthay ashay ethay amesay asicbay arrangementyay ofyay imbslay. 
 Otherwiseyay, ethay extentyay ofyay ethay illusionyay isyay upyay otay youyay. 
 Ethay ellspay astslay orfay ethay urationday, unlessyay youyay useyay youryay actionyay otay ismissday ityay oonersay. Ethay angeschay wroughtyay ybay isthay ellspay ailfay otay oldhay upyay otay ysicalphay inspectionyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay useyay isthay ellspay otay addyay ayay athay otay ayay eature’scray outfityay, objectsyay asspay oughthray ethay athay, andyay anyoneyay whoyay ouchestay ityay wouldyay eelfay othingnay oryay wouldyay eelfay ethay eature’scray eadhay andyay airhay. 
 Ifyay youyay useyay isthay ellspay otay appearyay innerthay anthay youyay areyay, ethay andhay ofsomeoneyay whoyay eachesray outyay otay ouchtay youyay wouldyay umpbay intoyay youyay whileyay ityay wasyay eeminglysay illstay inyay idair.Amay eaturecray ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay inspectyay ayay argettay andyay akemay anyay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Ifyay ityay ucceedssay, ityay ecomesbay awareyay atthay ethay argettay isyay isguisedday. Endingsay 3levelrdlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Unlimitedyay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay ortshay iecepay ofyay inefay oppercay wireyay)  Urationday: 1 oundray Youyay endsay ayay ortshay essagemay ofyay wenty-fivetay wordsyay oryay esslay otay ayay eaturecray withyay whichyay youyay areyay amiliarfay. 
 Ethay eaturecray earshay ethay essagemay inyay itsyay indmay, ecognizesray youyay asyay ethay endersay ifyay ityay owsknay youyay, andyay ancay answeryay inyay ayay ikelay annermay immediatelyyay. 
 Ethay ellspay enablesyay eaturescray withyay  Intelligenceyay oresscay ofyay atyay eastlay 1 otay understandyay ethay eaningmay ofyay youryay essagemay. Youyay ancay endsay ethay essagemay acrossyay anyyay istanceday andyay evenyay otay otheryay anesplay ofyay existenceyay, utbay ifyay ethay argettay isyay onyay ayay ifferentday aneplay anthay youyay, erethay isyay ayay 5 ercentpay ancechay atthay ethay essagemay oesn’tday arriveyay. Equestersay 7levelthlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay owderpay omposedcay ofyay iamondday, emeraldyay, ubyray, andyay apphiresay ustday worthyay atyay eastlay 5,000 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Untilyay ispelledday Ybay eansmay ofyay isthay ellspay, ayay willingyay eaturecray oryay anyay objectyay ancay ebay iddenhay awayyay, afesay omfray etectionday orfay ethay urationday. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay andyay ouchtay ethay argettay, ityay ecomesbay invisibleyay andyay an’tcay ebay argetedtay ybay ivinationday ellsspay oryay erceivedpay oughthray yingscray ensorssay eatedcray ybay ivinationday ellsspay. Ifyay ethay argettay isyay ayay eaturecray, ityay allsfay intoyay ayay atestay ofyay uspendedsay animationyay. 
 Imetay easescay otay owflay orfay ityay, andyay ityay oesn’tday owgray olderyay. Youyay ancay etsay ayay onditioncay orfay ethay ellspay otay endyay earlyyay. Ethay onditioncay ancay ebay anythingyay youyay oosechay, utbay ityay ustmay occuryay oryay ebay isiblevay withinyay 1 ilemay ofyay ethay argettay. 
 Examplesyay includeyay “afteryay 1,000 yearsyay” oryay “whenyay ethay arrasquetay awakensyay.”  Isthay ellspay alsoyay endsyay ifyay ethay argettay akestay anyyay amageday. Apechange9th-levelshay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay adejay ircletcay worthyay atyay eastlay 1,500 gpay, whichyay youyay ustmay aceplay onyay youryay eadhay eforebay youyay astcay ethay ellspay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Youyay assumeyay ethay ormfay ofyay ayay ifferentday eaturecray orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ethay ewnay ormfay ancay ebay ofyay anyyay eaturecray withyay ayay allengechay atingray equalyay otay youryay evellay oryay owerlay. 
eaturecray an’tcay ebay ayay onstructcay oryay anyay undeadyay, andyay youyay ustmay avehay eensay ethay ortsay ofyay eaturecray atyay eastlay onceyay. 
 Youyay ansformtray intoyay anyay averageyay exampleyay ofyay atthay eaturecray, oneyay withoutyay anyyay assclay evelslay oryay ethay  Ellcastingspay aittray. Youryay amegay atisticsstay areyay eplacedray ybay ethay atisticsstay ofyay ethay osenchay eaturecray, oughthay youyay etainray youryay alignmentyay andyay  Intelligenceyay,  Wisdomyay, andyay  Arismachay oresscay. 
 Youyay alsoyay etainray allyay ofyay youryay illskay andyay avingsay owthray oficienciespray, inyay additionyay otay aininggay osethay ofyay ethay eaturecray. 
 Ifyay ethay eaturecray ashay ethay amesay oficiencypray asyay youyay andyay ethay onusbay istedlay inyay itsyay atisticsstay isyay igherhay anthay yoursyay, useyay ethay eature’scray onusbay inyay aceplay ofyay yoursyay. 
 Youyay an’tcay useyay anyyay egendarylay actionsyay oryay airlay actionsyay ofyay ethay ewnay ormfay. Youyay assumeyay ethay ithay ointspay andyay  Ithay  Iceday ofyay ethay ewnay ormfay. 
 Whenyay youyay evertray otay youryay ormalnay ormfay, youyay eturnray otay ethay umbernay ofyay ithay ointspay youyay adhay eforebay youyay ansformedtray. 
 Ifyay youyay evertray asyay ayay esultray ofyay oppingdray otay0 ithay ointspay, anyyay excessyay amageday arriescay overyay otay youryay ormalnay ormfay. 
 Asyay onglay asyay ethay excessyay amageday oesn’tday educeray youryay ormalnay ormfay otay 0 ithay ointspay, youyay aren’tyay ockedknay unconsciousyay. Youyay etainray ethay enefitbay ofyay anyyay eaturesfay omfray youryay assclay, aceray, oryay otheryay ourcesay andyay ancay useyay emthay, ovidedpray atthay youryay ewnay ormfay isyay ysicallyphay apablecay ofyay oingday osay. 
 Youyay an’tcay useyay anyyay ecialspay ensessay youyay avehay (orfay exampleyay, arkvisionday) unlessyay youryay ewnay ormfay alsoyay ashay atthay ensesay. 
 Youyay ancay onlyyay eakspay ifyay ethay eaturecray ancay ormallynay eakspay. Whenyay youyay ansformtray, youyay oosechay whetheryay youryay equipmentyay allsfay otay ethay oundgray, ergesmay intoyay ethay ewnay ormfay, oryay isyay wornyay ybay ityay. 
 Wornyay equipmentyay unctionsfay asyay ormalnay. 
 Ethay DMay eterminesday whetheryay ityay isyay acticalpray orfay ethay ewnay ormfay otay wearyay ayay iecepay ofyay equipmentyay, asedbay onyay ethay eature’scray apeshay andyay izesay. 
 Youryay equipmentyay oesn’tday angechay apeshay oryay izesay otay atchmay ethay ewnay ormfay, andyay anyyay equipmentyay atthay ethay ewnay ormfay an’tcay wearyay ustmay eitheryay allfay otay ethay oundgray oryay ergemay intoyay youryay ewnay ormfay. 
 Equipmentyay atthay ergesmay ashay onay effectyay inyay atthay atestay. Uringday isthay ell’sspay urationday, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay assumeyay ayay ifferentday ormfay ollowingfay ethay amesay estrictionsray andyay ulesray orfay ethay originalyay ormfay, withyay oneyay exceptionyay: ifyay youryay ewnay ormfay ashay oremay ithay ointspay anthay youryay urrentcay oneyay, youryay ithay ointspay emainray atyay eirthay urrentcay aluevay. Atter2nd-levelshay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay ipchay ofyay icamay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay uddensay oudlay ingingray oisenay, ainfullypay intenseyay, eruptsyay omfray ayay ointpay ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 10-oot-radiusfay eresphay enteredcay onyay atthay ointpay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 3day8 underthay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
Ayay eaturecray ademay ofyay inorganicyay aterialmay uchsay asyay onestay, ystalcray, oryay etalmay ashay isadvantageday onyay isthay avingsay ow.Athray onmagicalnay objectyay atthay isn’tyay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay alsoyay akestay ethay amageday ifyay it’syay inyay ethay ell'sspay areayay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 2nday. Ield1st-levelshay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 eactionray, whichyay youyay aketay whenyay youyay areyay ithay ybay anyay attackyay oryay argetedtay ybay ethay agicmay issilemay ellspay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 oundray Anyay invisibleyay arrierbay ofyay agicalmay orcefay appearsyay andyay otectspray youyay. 
 Untilyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay, youyay avehay ayay +5 onusbay otay ACyay, includingyay againstyay ethay iggeringtray attackyay, andyay youyay aketay onay amageday omfray agicmay issilemay. Ieldshay ofyay  Aithfay 1levelstlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay archmentpay withyay ayay itbay ofyay olyhay exttay writtenyay onyay ityay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Ayay immeringshay ieldfay appearsyay andyay urroundssay ayay eaturecray ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray, antinggray ityay ayay +2 onusbay otay ACyay orfay ethay urationday. Illelaghshay Ansmutationtray antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (istletoemay, ayay amrockshay eaflay, andyay ayay ubclay oryay quarterstaffyay) Urationday: 1 inutemay Ethay woodyay ofyay ayay ubclay oryay quarterstaffyay youyay areyay oldinghay isyay imbuedyay withyay ature’snay owerpay. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, youyay ancay useyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay insteadyay ofyay  Engthstray orfay ethay attackyay andyay amageday ollsray ofyay eleemay attacksyay usingyay atthay weaponyay, andyay ethay weapon'syay amageday ieday ecomesbay ayay day8. 
 Ethay weaponyay alsoyay ecomesbay agicalmay, ifyay ityay isn’tyay alreadyyay. 
 Ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay youyay astcay ityay againyay oryay ifyay youyay etlay ogay ofyay ethay weaponyay. Ockingshay  Aspgray Evocationyay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ightninglay ingsspray omfray youryay andhay otay eliverday ayay ockshay otay ayay eaturecray youyay ytray otay ouchtay. 
 Akemay ayay eleemay ellspay attackyay againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Youyay avehay advantageyay onyay ethay attackyay ollray ifyay ethay argettay isyay wearingyay armoryay ademay ofyay etalmay. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, onay oundsay ancay ebay eatedcray withinyay oryay asspay oughthray ayay 20-oot-radiusfay eresphay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Anyyay eaturecray oryay objectyay entirelyyay insideyay ethay eresphay isyay immuneyay otay underthay amageday, andyay eaturescray areyay eafenedday whileyay entirelyyay insideyay ityay. 
 Astingcay ayay ellspay atthay includesyay ayay erbalvay omponentcay isyay impossibleyay erethay. Ilentsay  Imageyay 1levelstlay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay itbay ofyay eeceflay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay eatecray ethay imageyay ofyay anyay objectyay, ayay eaturecray, oryay omesay otheryay isiblevay enomenonphay atthay isyay onay argerlay anthay ayay 15-ootfay ubecay. 
 Ethay imageyay appearsyay atyay ayay otspay withinyay angeray andyay astslay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ethay imageyay isyay urelypay isualvay; ityay isn'tyay accompaniedyay ybay oundsay, ellsmay, oryay otheryay ensorysay effectsyay. Youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ausecay ethay imageyay otay ovemay otay anyyay otspay withinyay angeray. 
 Asyay ethay imageyay angeschay ocationlay, youyay ancay alteryay itsyay appearanceyay osay atthay itsyay ovementsmay appearyay aturalnay orfay ethay imageyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay eatecray anyay imageyay ofyay ayay eaturecray andyay ovemay ityay, youyay ancay alteryay ethay imageyay osay atthay ityay appearsyay otay ebay walkingyay. Ysicalphay interactionyay withyay ethay imageyay evealsray ityay otay ebay anyay illusionyay, ecausebay ingsthay ancay asspay oughthray ityay. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay usesyay itsyay actionyay otay examineyay ethay imageyay ancay etermineday atthay ityay isyay anyay illusionyay withyay ayay uccessfulsay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Ifyay ayay eaturecray iscernsday ethay illusionyay orfay whatyay ityay isyay, ethay eaturecray ancay eesay oughthray ethay imageyay. Imulacrumsay 7levelthlay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 12 ourshay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (owsnay oryay iceyay inyay quantitiesyay ufficientsay otay ademay ayay ife-sizelay opycay ofyay ethay uplicatedday eaturecray; omesay airhay, ingernailfay ippingsclay, oryay otheryay iecepay ofyay atthay eature’scray odybay acedplay insideyay ethay owsnay oryay iceyay; andyay owderedpay ubyray worthyay 1,500 gpay, inkledspray overyay ethay uplicateday andyay onsumedcay ybay ethay ellspay)  Urationday:  Untilyay ispelledday Youyay apeshay anyay illusoryyay uplicateday ofyay oneyay eastbay oryay umanoidhay atthay isyay withinyay angeray orfay ethay entireyay astingcay imetay ofyay ethay ellspay. 
 Ethay uplicateday isyay ayay eaturecray, artiallypay ealray andyay ormedfay omfray iceyay oryay owsnay, andyay ityay ancay aketay actionsyay andyay otherwiseyay ebay affectedyay asyay ayay ormalnay eaturecray. Ityay appearsyay otay ebay ethay amesay asyay ethay originalyay, utbay ityay ashay alfhay ethay eature’scray ithay ointpay aximummay andyay isyay ormedfay withoutyay anyyay equipmentyay. 
 Otherwiseyay, ethay illusionyay usesyay allyay ethay atisticsstay ofyay ethay eaturecray ityay uplicatesday. Ethay imulacrumsay isyay iendlyfray otay youyay andyay eaturescray youyay esignateday. 
 Ityay obeysyay youryay okenspay ommandscay, ovingmay andyay actingyay inyay accordanceyay withyay youryay wishesyay andyay actingyay onyay youryay urntay inyay ombatcay. 
 Ethay imulacrumsay ackslay ethay abilityyay otay earnlay oryay ecomebay oremay owerfulpay, osay ityay evernay increasesyay itsyay evellay oryay otheryay abilitiesyay, ornay ancay ityay egainray expendedyay ellspay otsslay. Ifyay ethay imulacrumsay isyay amagedday, youyay ancay epairray ityay inyay anyay alchemicalyay aboratorylay, usingyay areray erbshay andyay ineralsmay worthyay 100 gpay erpay ithay ointpay ityay egainsray. 
 Ethay imulacrumsay astslay untilyay ityay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, atyay whichyay ointpay ityay evertsray otay owsnay andyay eltsmay instantlyyay. Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay againyay, anyyay urrentlycay activeyay uplicatesday youyay eatedcray withyay isthay ellspay areyay instantlyyay estroyedday. Eep1st-levelslay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 90 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay inefay andsay, oseray etalspay, oryay ayay icketcray) Urationday: 1 inutemay Isthay ellspay endssay eaturescray intoyay ayay agicalmay umberslay. Ollray 5day8; ethay otaltay isyay owhay anymay ithay ointspay ofyay eaturescray isthay ellspay ancay affectyay. 
 Eaturescray withinyay 20 eetfay ofyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray areyay affectedyay inyay ascendingyay orderyay ofyay eirthay urrentcay ithay ointspay (ignoringyay unconsciousyay eaturescray). Artingstay withyay ethay eaturecray atthay ashay ethay owestlay urrentcay ithay ointspay, eachyay eaturecray affectedyay ybay isthay ellspay allsfay unconsciousyay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay eeperslay akestay amageday, oryay omeonesay usesyay anyay actionyay otay akeshay oryay apslay ethay eeperslay awakeyay. 
 Ubtractsay eachyay eature’scray ithay ointspay omfray ethay otaltay eforebay ovingmay onyay otay ethay eaturecray withyay ethay extnay owestlay ithay ointspay. 
Ayay eature’scray ithay ointspay ustmay ebay equalyay otay oryay esslay anthay ethay emainingray otaltay orfay atthay eaturecray otay ebay affectedyay. Undeadyay andyay eaturescray immuneyay otay eingbay armedchay aren’tyay affectedyay ybay isthay ellspay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ollray anyay additionalyay 2day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Eetslay  Ormstay 3levelrdlay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 150 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay ustday andyay ayay ewfay opsdray ofyay wateryay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, eezingfray ainray andyay eetslay allfay inyay ayay 20-oot-tallfay ylindercay withyay ayay 40-ootfay adiusray enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay areayay isyay eavilyhay obscuredyay, andyay exposedyay amesflay inyay ethay areayay areyay ousedday. Ethay oundgray inyay ethay areayay isyay overedcay withyay ickslay iceyay, akingmay ityay ifficultday erraintay. 
 Whenyay ayay eaturecray entersyay ethay ell’sspay areayay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay artsstay itsyay urntay erethay, ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Ow3rd-levelslay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay opdray ofyay olassesmay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay alteryay imetay aroundyay upyay otay ixsay eaturescray ofyay youryay oicechay inyay ayay 40-ootfay ubecay withinyay angeray. 
 Eachyay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ebay affectedyay ybay isthay ellspay orfay ethay urationday. Anyay affectedyay arget’stay eedspay isyay alvedhay, ityay akestay ayay -2 enaltypay otay ACyay andyay  Exterityday avingsay owsthray, andyay ityay an’tcay useyay eactionsray. 
 Onyay itsyay urntay, ityay ancay useyay eitheryay anyay actionyay oryay ayay onusbay actionyay, otnay othbay. 
 Egardlessray ofyay ethay eature’scray abilitiesyay oryay agicmay itemsyay, ityay an’tcay akemay oremay anthay oneyay eleemay oryay angedray attackyay uringday itsyay urntay. Ifyay ethay eaturecray attemptsyay otay astcay ayay ellspay withyay ayay astingcay imetay ofyay 1 actionyay, ollray ayay day20. 
 Onyay anyay 11 oryay igherhay, ethay ellspay oesn’tday aketay effectyay untilyay ethay eature’scray extnay urntay, andyay ethay eaturecray ustmay useyay itsyay actionyay onyay atthay urntay otay ompletecay ethay ellspay. 
 Ifyay ityay an’tcay, ethay ellspay isyay wasted.Ayay eaturecray affectedyay ybay isthay ellspay akesmay anotheryay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray atyay ethay endyay ofyay itsyay urntay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay effectyay endsyay orfay ityay. Arespay ethay  Yingday  Ecromancynay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ouchtay ayay ivinglay eaturecray atthay ashay 0 ithay ointspay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ecomesbay ablestay. 
 Isthay ellspay ashay onay effectyay onyay undeadyay oryay onstructscay. Eakspay withyay  Animalsyay 1levelstlay ivinationday (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 10 inutesmay Youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay omprehendcay andyay erballyvay ommunicatecay withyay eastsbay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ethay owledgeknay andyay awarenessyay ofyay anymay eastsbay isyay imitedlay ybay eirthay intelligenceyay, utbay atyay inimummay, eastsbay ancay ivegay youyay informationyay aboutyay earbynay ocationslay andyay onstersmay, includingyay whateveryay eythay ancay erceivepay oryay avehay erceivedpay withinyay ethay astpay ayday. 
 Youyay ightmay ebay ableyay otay ersuadepay ayay eastbay otay erformpay ayay allsmay avorfay orfay youyay, atyay ethay sdMsay iscretionday. Eakspay withyay  Eadday 3levelrdlay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 10 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (urningbay incenseyay) Urationday: 10 inutesmay Youyay antgray ethay emblancesay ofyay ifelay andyay intelligenceyay otay ayay orpsecay ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray, allowingyay ityay otay answeryay ethay questionsyay youyay osepay. 
 Ethay orpsecay ustmay illstay avehay amouthyay andyay an’tcay ebay undeadyay. 
 Ethay ellspay ailsfay ifyay ethay orpsecay wasyay ethay argettay ofyay isthay ellspay withinyay ethay astlay 10 aysday. Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay askyay ethay orpsecay upyay otay ivefay questionsyay. 
 Ethay orpsecay owsknay onlyyay whatyay ityay ewknay inyay ifelay, includingyay ethay anguageslay ityay ewknay. 
 Answersyay areyay usuallyyay iefbray, ypticcray, oryay epetitiveray, andyay ethay orpsecay isyay underyay onay ompulsioncay otay offeryay ayay uthfultray answeryay ifyay youyay areyay ostilehay otay ityay oryay ityay ecognizesray youyay asyay anyay enemyyay. 
 Isthay ellspay oesn’tday eturnray ethay eature’scray oulsay otay itsyay odybay, onlyyay itsyay animatingyay iritspay. 
 Usthay, ethay orpsecay an’tcay earnlay ewnay informationyay, oesn’tday omprehendcay anythingyay atthay ashay appenedhay incesay ityay iedday, andyay an’tcay eculatespay aboutyay uturefay eventsyay. Eakspay withyay  Antsplay 3levelrdlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (30-ootfay adiusray) Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 10 inutesmay Youyay imbueyay antsplay withinyay 30 eetfay ofyay youyay withyay imitedlay entiencesay andyay animationyay, ivinggay emthay ethay abilityyay otay ommunicatecay withyay youyay andyay ollowfay youryay implesay ommandscay. 
 Youyay ancay questionyay antsplay aboutyay eventsyay inyay ethay ell’sspay areayay withinyay ethay astpay ayday, aininggay informationyay aboutyay eaturescray atthay avehay assedpay, weatheryay, andyay otheryay ircumstancescay. Youyay ancay alsoyay urntay ifficultday erraintay ausedcay ybay antplay owthgray (uchsay asyay icketsthay andyay undergrowthyay) intoyay ordinaryyay erraintay atthay astslay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Oryay youyay ancay urntay ordinaryyay erraintay whereyay antsplay areyay esentpray intoyay ifficultday erraintay atthay astslay orfay ethay urationday, ausingcay inesvay andyay anchesbray otay inderhay ursuerspay, orfay exampleyay. Antsplay ightmay ebay ableyay otay erformpay otheryay askstay onyay youryay ehalfbay, atyay ethay sdMsay iscretionday. 
 Ethay ellspay oesn’tday enableyay antsplay otay uprootyay emselvesthay andyay ovemay aboutyay, utbay eythay ancay eelyfray ovemay anchesbray, endrilstay, andyay alksstay. Ifyay ayay antplay eaturecray isyay inyay ethay areayay, youyay ancay ommunicatecay withyay ityay asyay ifyay youyay aredshay ayay ommoncay anguagelay, utbay youyay aingay onay agicalmay abilityyay otay influenceyay ityay. Isthay ellspay ancay ausecay ethay antsplay eatedcray ybay ethay entangleyay ellspay otay eleaseray ayay estrainedray eaturecray. Iderspay  Imbclay 2levelndlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay opdray ofyay itumenbay andyay ayay iderspay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, oneyay willingyay eaturecray youyay ouchtay ainsgay ethay abilityyay otay ovemay upyay, ownday, andyay acrossyay erticalvay urfacessay andyay upsideyay ownday alongyay eilingscay, whileyay eavinglay itsyay andshay eefray. 
 Ethay oundgray inyay ayay 20-ootfay adiusray enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay withinyay angeray wiststay andyay outsspray ardhay ikesspay andyay ornsthay. 
 Ethay areayay ecomesbay ifficultday erraintay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Whenyay ayay eaturecray ovesmay intoyay oryay withinyay ethay areayay, ityay akestay 2day4 iercingpay amageday orfay everyyay 5 eetfay ityay avelstray. Ethay ansformationtray ofyay ethay oundgray isyay amouflagedcay otay ooklay aturalnay. 
 Anyyay eaturecray atthay an’tcay eesay ethay areayay atyay ethay imetay ethay ellspay isyay astcay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay otay ecognizeray ethay erraintay asyay azardoushay eforebay enteringyay ityay. Iritspay  Uardians3rd-levelgay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (15-ootfay adiusray) Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay olyhay ymbolsay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay allcay orthfay iritsspay otay otectpray youyay. 
 Eythay itflay aroundyay youyay otay ayay istanceday ofyay 15 eetfay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay oodgay oryay eutralnay, eirthay ectralspay ormfay appearsyay angelicyay oryay eyfay (youryay oicechay). 
 Ifyay youyay areyay evilyay, eythay appearyay iendishfay. Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay ancay esignateday anyyay umbernay ofyay eaturescray youyay ancay eesay otay ebay unaffectedyay ybay ityay. 
 Anyay affectedyay eature’scray eedspay isyay alvedhay inyay ethay areayay, andyay whenyay ethay eaturecray entersyay ethay areayay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay artsstay itsyay urntay erethay, ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray akestay 3day8 adiantray amageday (ifyay youyay areyay oodgay oryay eutralnay) oryay 3day8 ecroticnay amageday (ifyay youyay areyay evilyay). 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay eaturecray akestay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 3rday. Iritualspay  Weaponyay 2levelndlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 inutemay Youyay eatecray ayay oatingflay, ectralspay weaponyay withinyay angeray atthay astslay orfay ethay urationday oryay untilyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay againyay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, youyay ancay akemay ayay eleemay ellspay attackyay againstyay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay weaponyay. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay orcefay amageday equalyay otay 1day8 + youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay odifiermay. Asyay ayay onusbay actionyay onyay youryay urntay, youyay ancay ovemay ethay weaponyay upyay otay 20 eetfay andyay epeatray ethay attackyay againstyay ayay eaturecray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ityay. Ethay weaponyay ancay aketay whateveryay ormfay youyay oosechay. 
 Ericsclay ofyay eitiesday whoyay areyay associatedyay withyay ayay articularpay weaponyay (asyay  stay. 
 Uthbertcay isyay ownknay orfay ishay acemay andyay  Orthay orfay ishay ammerhay) akemay isthay ell’sspay effectyay esembleray atthay weaponyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 3rday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay everyyay wotay otslay evelslay aboveyay ethay 2nday. Aggeringstay  Ite4th-levelsmay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ethay extnay imetay youyay ithay ayay eaturecray withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay uringday isthay ell’sspay urationday, youryay weaponyay iercespay othbay odybay andyay indmay, andyay ethay attackyay ealsday anyay extrayay 4day6 ychicpsay amageday otay ethay argettay. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ityay ashay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray andyay abilityyay eckschay, andyay an'tcay aketay eactionsray, untilyay ethay endyay ofyay itsyay extnay urntay. Inkingstay  Oudclay 3levelrdlay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay Angeray: 90 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay ottenray eggyay oryay everalsay unkskay abbagecay eaveslay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay eatecray ayay 20-oot-radiusfay eresphay ofyay yellowyay, auseatingnay asgay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay oudclay eadsspray aroundyay ornerscay, andyay itsyay areayay isyay eavilyhay obscuredyay. 
 Ethay oudclay ingerslay inyay ethay airyay orfay ethay urationday. Eachyay eaturecray atthay isyay ompletelycay withinyay ethay oudclay atyay ethay artstay ofyay itsyay urntay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray againstyay oisonpay. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray endsspay itsyay actionyay atthay urntay etchingray andyay eelingray. 
 Eaturescray atthay on’tday eednay otay eathebray oryay areyay immuneyay otay oisonpay automaticallyyay ucceedsay onyay isthay avingsay ow.Athray oderatemay windyay (atyay eastlay 10 ilesmay erpay ourhay) ispersesday ethay oudclay afteryay 4 oundsray. 
Ayay ongstray windyay (atyay eastlay 20 ilesmay erpay ourhay) ispersesday ityay afteryay 1 oundray. Onestay  Apeshay 4levelthlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (oftsay ayclay, whichyay ustmay ebay workedyay intoyay oughlyray ethay esiredday apeshay ofyay ethay onestay objectyay)  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ouchtay ayay onestay objectyay ofyay  Ediummay izesay oryay allersmay oryay ayay ectionsay ofyay onestay onay oremay anthay 5 eetfay inyay anyyay imensionday andyay ormfay ityay intoyay anyyay apeshay atthay uitssay youryay urposepay. 
 Osay, orfay exampleyay, youyay ouldcay apeshay ayay argelay ockray intoyay ayay weaponyay, idolyay, oryay offercay, oryay akemay ayay allsmay assagepay oughthray ayay wallyay, asyay onglay asyay ethay wallyay isyay esslay anthay 5 eetfay ickthay. 
 Youyay ouldcay alsoyay apeshay ayay onestay oorday oryay itsyay amefray otay ealsay ethay oorday utshay. 
 Isthay ellspay urnstay ethay eshflay ofyay ayay willingyay eaturecray youyay ouchtay asyay ardhay asyay onestay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ethay argettay ashay esistanceray otay onmagicalnay udgeoningblay, iercingpay, andyay ashingslay amageday. Ormstay ofyay  Engeance9th-levelvay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ightsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ayay urningchay ormstay oudclay ormsfay, enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay youyay ancay eesay andyay eadingspray otay ayay adiusray ofyay 360 eetfay. 
 Ightninglay ashesflay inyay ethay areayay, underthay oomsbay, andyay ongstray windsyay oarray. 
 Eachyay eaturecray underyay ethay oudclay (onay oremay anthay 5,000 eetfay eneathbay ethay oudclay) whenyay ityay appearsyay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ayay eaturecray akestay 2day6 underthay amageday andyay ecomesbay eafenedday orfay 5 inutesmay. Eachyay oundray youyay aintainmay oncentrationcay onyay isthay ellspay, ethay ormstay oducespray additionalyay effectsyay onyay youryay urntay. Oundray 2. 
 Acidicyay ainray allsfay omfray ethay oudclay. Eachyay eaturecray andyay objectyay underyay ethay oudclay akestay 1day6 acidyay amageday. Oundray 3. 
 Youyay allcay ixsay oltsbay ofyay ightninglay omfray ethay oudclay otay ikestray ixsay eaturescray oryay objectsyay ofyay youryay oicechay eneathbay ethay oudclay. 
Ayay ivengay eaturecray oryay objectyay an’tcay ebay uckstray ybay oremay anthay oneyay oltbay. 
Ayay uckstray eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray.
