 Ethay eaturecray akestay 10day6 ightninglay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Oundray 4. 
 Ailstoneshay ainray ownday omfray ethay oudclay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray underyay ethay oudclay akestay 2day6 udgeoningblay amageday. Oundray 5-10. 
 Ustsgay andyay eezingfray ainray assailyay ethay areayay underyay ethay oudclay. 
 Ethay areayay ecomesbay ifficultday erraintay andyay isyay eavilyhay obscuredyay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray erethay akestay 1day6 oldcay amageday. 
 Angedray weaponyay attacksyay inyay ethay areayay areyay impossibleyay. 
 Ethay windyay andyay ainray ountcay asyay ayay everesay istractionday orfay ethay urposespay ofyay aintainingmay oncentrationcay onyay ellsspay. 
 Inallyfay, ustsgay ofyay ongstray windyay (angingray omfray 20 otay 50 ilesmay erpay ourhay) automaticallyyay isperseday ogfay, istsmay, andyay imilarsay enomenaphay inyay ethay areayay, whetheryay undanemay oryay agicalmay. Uggestion2nd-levelsay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, May (ayay ake’ssnay onguetay andyay eitheryay ayay itbay ofyay oneycombhay oryay ayay opdray ofyay weetsay oilyay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 8 ourshay Youyay uggestsay ayay oursecay ofyay activityyay (imitedlay otay ayay entencesay oryay wotay) andyay agicallymay influenceyay ayay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray atthay ancay earhay andyay understandyay youyay. 
 Eaturescray atthay an’tcay ebay armedchay areyay immuneyay otay isthay effectyay. 
 Ethay uggestionsay ustmay ebay wordedyay inyay uchsay ayay annermay asyay otay akemay ethay oursecay ofyay actionyay oundsay easonableray. 
 Askingyay ethay eaturecray otay abstay itselfyay, owthray itselfyay ontoyay ayay earspay, immolateyay itselfyay, oryay oday omesay otheryay obviouslyyay armfulhay actyay endsyay ethay ellspay. Ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ityay ursuespay ethay oursecay ofyay actionyay youyay escribedday otay ethay estbay ofyay itsyay abilityyay. 
 Ethay uggestedsay oursecay ofyay actionyay ancay ontinuecay orfay ethay entireyay urationday. 
 Ifyay ethay uggestedsay activityyay ancay ebay ompletedcay inyay ayay ortershay imetay, ethay ellspay endsyay whenyay ethay ubjectsay inishesfay whatyay ityay wasyay askedyay otay oday. Youyay ancay alsoyay ecifyspay onditionscay atthay willyay iggertray ayay ecialspay activityyay uringday ethay urationday. 
 Orfay exampleyay, youyay ightmay uggestsay atthay ayay ightknay ivegay erhay warhorseyay otay ethay irstfay eggarbay eshay eetsmay. 
 Ifyay ethay onditioncay isn’tyay etmay eforebay ethay ellspay expiresyay, ethay activityyay isn’tyay erformedpay. Ifyay youyay oryay anyyay ofyay youryay ompanionscay amageday ethay argettay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Unbeam6th-levelsay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay (60-ootfay inelay) Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay agnifyingmay assglay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ayay eambay ofyay illiantbray ightlay ashesflay outyay omfray youryay andhay inyay ayay 5-oot-widefay, 60-oot-longfay inelay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ethay inelay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ayay eaturecray akestay 6day8 adiantray amageday andyay isyay indedblay untilyay youryay extnay urntay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ityay akestay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday andyay isn’tyay indedblay ybay isthay ellspay. 
 Undeadyay andyay oozesyay avehay isadvantageday onyay isthay avingsay owthray. Youyay ancay eatecray ayay ewnay inelay ofyay adianceray asyay youryay actionyay onyay anyyay urntay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Orfay ethay urationday, ayay otemay ofyay illiantbray adianceray inesshay inyay youryay andhay. 
 Ityay edsshay ightbray ightlay inyay ayay 30-ootfay adiusray andyay imday ightlay orfay anyay additionalyay 30 eetfay. 
 Isthay ightlay isyay unlightsay. Unburstsay 8levelthlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 150 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (irefay andyay ayay iecepay ofyay unstonesay)  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Illiantbray unlightsay ashesflay inyay ayay 60-ootfay adiusray enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay atthay ightlay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ayay eaturecray akestay 12day6 adiantray amageday andyay isyay indedblay orfay 1 inutemay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ityay akestay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday andyay isn’tyay indedblay ybay isthay ellspay. 
 Undeadyay andyay oozesyay avehay isadvantageday onyay isthay avingsay ow.Athray eaturecray indedblay ybay isthay ellspay akesmay anotheryay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay. 
 Youyay ansmutetray youryay quiveryay osay ityay oducespray anyay endlessyay upplysay ofyay onmagicalnay ammunitionyay, whichyay eemssay otay eaplay intoyay youryay andhay whenyay youyay eachray orfay ityay. Onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay useyay ayay onusbay actionyay otay akemay wotay attacksyay withyay ayay weaponyay atthay usesyay ammunitionyay omfray ethay quiveryay. 
 Eachyay imetay youyay akemay uchsay ayay angedray attackyay, youryay quiveryay agicallymay eplacesray ethay iecepay ofyay ammunitionyay youyay usedyay withyay ayay imilarsay iecepay ofyay onmagicalnay ammunitionyay. 
 Anyyay iecespay ofyay ammunitionyay eatedcray ybay isthay ellspay isintegrateday whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Ifyay ethay quiveryay eaveslay youryay ossessionpay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Ymbolsay 7levelthlay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ercurymay, osphorusphay, andyay owderedpay iamondday andyay opalyay withyay ayay otaltay aluevay ofyay atyay eastlay 1,000 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Untilyay ispelledday oryay iggeredtray Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay inscribeyay ayay armfulhay yphglay eitheryay onyay ayay urfacesay (uchsay asyay ayay ectionsay ofyay oorflay, ayay wallyay, oryay ayay abletay) oryay withinyay anyay objectyay atthay ancay ebay osedclay otay oncealcay ethay yphglay (uchsay asyay ayay ookbay, ayay ollscray, oryay ayay easuretray estchay). Ifyay youyay oosechay ayay urfacesay, ethay yphglay ancay overcay anyay areayay ofyay ethay urfacesay onay argerlay anthay 10 eetfay inyay iameterday. 
 Ifyay youyay oosechay anyay objectyay, atthay objectyay ustmay emainray inyay itsyay aceplay; ifyay ethay objectyay isyay ovedmay oremay anthay 10 eetfay omfray whereyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, ethay yphglay isyay okenbray, andyay ethay ellspay endsyay withoutyay eingbay iggeredtray. Ethay yphglay isyay earlynay invisibleyay, equiringray anyay  Intelligenceyay ( Investigationyay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay otay indfay ityay. Youyay ecideday whatyay iggerstray ethay yphglay whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay. 
 Orfay yphsglay inscribedyay onyay ayay urfacesay, ethay ostmay ypicaltay iggerstray includeyay ouchingtay oryay eppingstay onyay ethay yphglay, emovingray anotheryay objectyay overingcay ityay, approachingyay withinyay ayay ertaincay istanceday ofyay ityay, oryay anipulatingmay ethay objectyay atthay oldshay ityay. 
 Orfay yphsglay inscribedyay withinyay anyay objectyay, ethay ostmay ommoncay iggerstray areyay openingyay ethay objectyay, approachingyay withinyay ayay ertaincay istanceday ofyay ityay, oryay eeingsay oryay eadingray ethay yphglay. Youyay ancay urtherfay efineray ethay iggertray osay ethay ellspay isyay activatedyay onlyyay underyay ertaincay ircumstancescay oryay accordingyay otay ayay eature’scray ysicalphay aracteristicschay (uchsay asyay eighthay oryay weightyay), oryay ysicalphay indkay (orfay exampleyay, ethay wardyay ouldcay ebay etsay otay affectyay agshay oryay apechangersshay). 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay ecifyspay eaturescray atthay on’tday iggertray ethay yphglay, uchsay asyay osethay whoyay aysay ayay ertaincay asswordpay. Whenyay youyay inscribeyay ethay yphglay, oosechay oneyay ofyay ethay optionsyay elowbay orfay itsyay effectyay. 
 Onceyay iggeredtray, ethay yphglay owsglay, illingfay ayay 60-oot-radiusfay eresphay withyay imday ightlay orfay 10 inutesmay, afteryay whichyay imetay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ethay eresphay whenyay ethay yphglay activatesyay isyay argetedtay ybay itsyay effectyay, asyay isyay ayay eaturecray atthay entersyay ethay eresphay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay endsyay itsyay urntay erethay. Eathday. 
 Eachyay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray, akingtay 10day10 ecroticnay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay. Iscordday. 
 Eachyay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ayay argettay ickersbay andyay arguesyay withyay otheryay eaturescray orfay 1 inutemay. 
 Uringday isthay ime,ittay isyay incapableyay ofyay eaningfulmay ommunicationcay andyay ashay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray andyay abilityyay eckschay. Earfay. 
 Eachyay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray andyay ecomesbay ightenedfray orfay 1 inutemay onyay ayay ailedfay avesay. 
 Whileyay ightenedfray, ethay argettay opsdray whateveryay ityay isyay oldinghay andyay ustmay ovemay atyay eastlay 30 eetfay awayyay omfray ethay yphglay onyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay, ifyay ableyay. Opelessnesshay. 
 Eachyay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay argettay isyay overwhelmedyay withyay espairday orfay 1 inutemay. 
 Uringday isthay imetay, ityay an’tcay attackyay oryay argettay anyyay eaturecray withyay armfulhay abilitiesyay, ellsspay, oryay otheryay agicalmay effectsyay. Insanityyay. 
 Eachyay argettay ustmay akemay anyay  Intelligenceyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay argettay isyay ivendray insaneyay orfay1 inutemay. 
 Anyay insaneyay eaturecray an’tcay aketay actionsyay, an'tcay understandyay whatyay otheryay eaturescray aysay, an’tcay eadray, andyay eaksspay onlyyay inyay ibberishgay. 
 Ethay DMay ontrolscay itsyay ovementmay, whichyay isyay erraticyay. Ainpay. 
 Eachyay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray andyay ecomesbay incapacitatedyay withyay excruciatingyay ainpay orfay 1 inutemay onyay ayay ailedfay avesay. Eepslay. 
 Eachyay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray andyay allsfay unconsciousyay orfay 10 inutesmay onyay ayay ailedfay avesay. 
Ayay eaturecray awakensyay ifyay ityay akestay amageday oryay ifyay omeonesay usesyay anyay actionyay otay akeshay oryay apslay ityay awakeyay. Unningstay. 
 Eachyay argettay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray andyay ecomesbay unnedstay orfay 1 inutemay onyay ayay ailedfay avesay. Asha’stay  Ideoushay  Aughter1st-levellay enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (inytay artstay andyay ayay eatherfay atthay isyay wavedyay inyay ethay airyay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ayay eaturecray ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray erceivespay everythingyay asyay ilariouslyhay unnyfay andyay allsfay intoyay itsfay ofyay aughterlay ifyay isthay ellspay affectsyay ityay. 
 Ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay allfay onepray, ecomingbay incapacitatedyay andyay unableyay otay andstay upyay orfay ethay urationday. 
Ayay eaturecray withyay anyay  Intelligenceyay orescay ofyay 4 oryay esslay isn’tyay affectedyay. Atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay, andyay eachyay imetay ityay akestay amageday, ethay argettay ancay akemay anotheryay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Ethay argettay ashay advantageyay onyay ethay avingsay owthray ifyay it’syay iggeredtray ybay amageday. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Elekinesis5th-leveltay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay ovemay oryay anipulatemay eaturescray oryay objectsyay ybay oughtthay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, andyay asyay youryay actionyay eachyay oundray orfay ethay urationday, youyay ancay exertyay youryay willyay onyay oneyay eaturecray oryay objectyay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray, ausingcay ethay appropriateyay effectyay elowbay. 
 Youyay ancay affectyay ethay amesay argettay oundray afteryay oundray, oryay oosechay ayay ewnay oneyay atyay anyyay imetay. 
 Eaturecray. 
 Youyay ancay ytray otay ovemay ayay  Ugehay oryay allersmay eaturecray. 
 Akemay anyay abilityyay eckchay withyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay ontestedcay ybay ethay eature’scray  Engthstray eckchay. 
 Ifyay youyay winyay ethay ontestcay, youyay ovemay ethay eaturecray upyay otay 30 eetfay inyay anyyay irectionday, includingyay upwardyay utbay otnay eyondbay ethay angeray ofyay isthay ellspay. 
 Untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay, ethay eaturecray isyay estrainedray inyay youryay elekinetictay ipgray. 
Ayay eaturecray iftedlay upwardyay isyay uspendedsay inyay id-airmay. Onyay ubsequentsay oundsray, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay attemptyay otay aintainmay youryay elekinetictay ipgray onyay ethay eaturecray ybay epeatingray ethay ontestcay. Objectyay. 
 Youyay ancay ytray otay ovemay anyay objectyay atthay weighsyay upyay otay 1,000 oundspay. 
 Ifyay ethay objectyay isn’tyay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay, youyay automaticallyyay ovemay ityay upyay otay 30 eetfay inyay anyyay irectionday, utbay otnay eyondbay ethay angeray ofyay isthay ellspay. Ifyay ethay objectyay isyay wornyay oryay arriedcay ybay ayay eaturecray, youyay ustmay akemay anyay abilityyay eckchay withyay youryay ellcastingspay abilityyay ontestedcay ybay atthay eature’scray  Engthstray eckchay. 
 Ifyay youyay ucceedsay, youyay ullpay ethay objectyay awayyay omfray atthay eaturecray andyay ancay ovemay ityay upyay otay 30 eetfay inyay anyyay irectionday utbay otnay eyondbay ethay angeray ofyay isthay ellspay. Youyay ancay exertyay inefay ontrolcay onyay objectsyay withyay youryay elekinetictay ipgray, uchsay asyay anipulatingmay ayay implesay ooltay, openingyay ayay oorday oryay ayay ontainercay, owingstay oryay etrievingray anyay itemyay omfray anyay openyay ontainercay, oryay ouringpay ethay ontentscay omfray ayay ialvay. Elepathy8th-leveltay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Unlimitedyay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay airpay ofyay inkedlay ilversay ingsray)  Urationday: 24 ourshay Youyay eatecray ayay elepathictay inklay etweenbay yourselfyay andyay ayay willingyay eaturecray withyay whichyay youyay areyay amiliarfay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ancay ebay anywhereyay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay asyay youyay. 
 Ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay youyay oryay ethay argettay areyay onay ongerlay onyay ethay amesay aneplay. Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay andyay ethay argettay ancay instantaneouslyyay areshay wordsyay, imagesyay, oundssay, andyay otheryay ensorysay essagesmay withyay oneyay anotheryay oughthray ethay inklay, andyay ethay argettay ecognizesray youyay asyay ethay eaturecray ityay isyay ommunicatingcay withyay. 
 Ethay ellspay enablesyay ayay eaturecray withyay anyay  Intelligenceyay orescay ofyay atyay eastlay 1 otay understandyay ethay eaningmay ofyay youryay wordsyay andyay aketay inyay ethay opescay ofyay anyyay ensorysay essagesmay youyay endsay otay ityay. Eleport7th-leveltay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 10 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Isthay ellspay instantlyyay ansportstray youyay andyay upyay otay eightyay willingyay eaturescray ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray, oryay ayay inglesay objectyay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray, otay ayay estinationday youyay electsay. 
 Ifyay youyay argettay anyay objectyay, ityay ustmay ebay ableyay otay itfay entirelyyay insideyay ayay 10-ootfay ubecay, andyay ityay an’tcay ebay eldhay oryay arriedcay ybay anyay unwillingyay eaturecray. Ethay estinationday youyay oosechay ustmay ebay ownknay otay youyay, andyay ityay ustmay ebay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay asyouyay. 
 Youryay amiliarityfay withyay ethay estinationday eterminesday whetheryay youyay arriveyay erethay uccessfullysay. 
 Ethay DMay ollsray day100 andyay onsultscay ethay abletay. Amiliarityfay Ishapmay Imilarsay Areayay Offyay Argettay Onyay Argettay Ermanentpay irclecay———01-100 Associatedyay objectyay———01-100 Eryvay amiliarfay01-0506-1314-2425-100 Eensay asuallycay01-3334-4344-5354-100 Iewedvay onceyay01-4344-5354-7374-100 Escriptionday01-4344-5354-7374-100 Alsefay estinationday01-5051-100—— Amiliarityfay. 
“ Ermanentpay irclecay” eansmay ayay ermanentpay eleportationtay irclecay whoseyay igilsay equencesay youyay owknay. 
“ Associatedyay objectyay” eansmay atthay youyay ossesspay anyay objectyay akentay omfray ethay esiredday estinationday withinyay ethay astlay ixsay onthsmay, uchsay asyay ayay ookbay omfray ayay wizard’syay ibrarylay, edbay inenlay omfray ayay oyalray uitesay, oryay ayay unkchay ofyay arblemay omfray ayay ich’slay ecretsay ombtay.“ Eryvay amiliarfay” isyay ayay aceplay youyay avehay eenbay eryvay oftenyay, ayay aceplay youyay avehay arefullycay udiedstay, oryay ayay aceplay youyay ancay eesay whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay. 
“ Eensay asuallycay” isyay omeplacesay youyay avehay eensay oremay anthay onceyay utbay withyay whichyay youyay aren’tyay eryvay amiliarfay. 
“ Iewedvay onceyay” isyay ayay aceplay youyay avehay eensay onceyay, ossiblypay usingyay agicmay. 
“ Escriptionday” isyay ayay aceplay whoseyay ocationlay andyay appearanceyay youyay owknay oughthray omeonesay else’syay escriptionday, erhapspay omfray ayay apmay.“ Alsefay estinationday” isyay ayay aceplay atthay oesn’tday existyay. 
 Erhapspay youyay iedtray otay yscray anyay enemy’syay anctumsay utbay insteadyay iewedvay anyay illusionyay, oryay youyay areyay attemptingyay otay eleporttay otay ayay amiliarfay ocationlay atthay onay ongerlay existsyay. Onyay  Argettay. 
 Youyay andyay youryay oupgray (oryay ethay argettay objectyay) appearyay whereyay youyay wantyay otay. Offyay  Argettay. 
 Youyay andyay youryay oupgray (oryay ethay argettay objectyay) appearyay ayay andomray istanceday awayyay omfray ethay estinationday inyay ayay andomray irectionday. 
 Istanceday offyay argettay isyay 1day10 xay 1day10 ercentpay ofyay ethay istanceday atthay wasyay otay ebay aveledtray. Orfay exampleyay, ifyay youyay iedtray otay aveltray 120 ilesmay, andedlay offyay argettay, andyay olledray ayay 5 andyay 3 onyay ethay wotay 0sdsay, enthay youyay wouldyay ebay offyay argettay ybay 15 ercentpay, oryay 18 ilesmay. 
 Ethay DMay eterminesday ethay irectionday offyay argettay andomlyray ybay ollingray ayay day8 andyay esignatingday 1 asyay orthnay, 2 asyay ortheastnay, 3 asyay eastyay, andyay osay onyay aroundyay ethay ointspay ofyay ethay ompasscay. 
 Ifyay youyay wereyay eleportingtay otay ayay oastalcay itycay andyay woundyay upyay 18 ilesmay outyay atyay easay, youyay ouldcay ebay inyay oubletray. Imilarsay  Areayay. 
 Youyay andyay youryay oupgray (oryay ethay argettay objectyay) windyay upyay inyay ayay ifferentday areayay at’sthay isuallyvay oryay ematicallythay imilarsay otay ethay argettay areayay. 
 Ifyay youyay areyay eadinghay orfay youryay omehay aboratorylay, orfay exampleyay, youyay ightmay windyay upyay inyay anotheryay wizard’syay aboratorylay oryay inyay anyay alchemicalyay upplysay opshay atthay ashay anymay ofyay ethay amesay oolstay andyay implementsyay asyay youryay aboratorylay. 
 Enerallygay, youyay appearyay inyay ethay osestclay imilarsay aceplay, utbay incesay ethay ellspay ashay onay angeray imitlay, youyay ouldcay onceivablycay windyay upyay anywhereyay onyay ethay aneplay. Ishapmay. 
 Ethay ell’sspay unpredictableyay agicmay esultsray inyay ayay ifficultday ourneyjay. 
ethay abletay otay eesay whereyay youyay windyay upyay (ultiplemay ishapsmay ancay occuryay, ealingday amageday eachyay imetay). Eleportationtay  Ircle5th-levelcay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 10 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, May (areray alkschay andyay inksyay infusedyay withyay eciouspray emsgay withyay 50 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay)  Urationday: 1 oundray Asyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay, youyay awdray ayay 10-oot-diameterfay irclecay onyay ethay oundgray inscribedyay withyay igilssay atthay inklay youryay ocationlay otay ayay ermanentpay eleportationtay irclecay ofyay youryay oicechay whoseyay igilsay equencesay youyay owknay andyay atthay isyay onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay asyay youyay. 
Ayay immeringshay ortalpay opensyay withinyay ethay irclecay youyay ewdray andyay emainsray openyay untilyay ethay endyay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
 Anyyay eaturecray atthay entersyay ethay ortalpay instantlyyay appearsyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay estinationday irclecay oryay inyay ethay earestnay unoccupiedyay acespay ifyay atthay acespay isyay occupiedyay. Anymay ajormay emplestay, uildsgay, andyay otheryay importantyay acesplay avehay ermanentpay eleportationtay irclescay inscribedyay omewheresay withinyay eirthay onfinescay. 
 Eachyay uchsay irclecay includesyay ayay uniqueyay igilsay equence—asay ingstray ofyay agicalmay unesray arrangedyay inyay ayay articularpay atternpay. 
 Whenyay youyay irstfay aingay ethay abilityyay otay astcay isthay ellspay, youyay earnlay ethay igilsay equencessay orfay wotay estinationsday onyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay, eterminedday ybay ethay DMay. 
 Youyay ancay earnlay additionalyay igilsay equencessay uringday youryay adventuresyay. 
 Youyay ancay ommitcay ayay ewnay igilsay equencesay otay emorymay afteryay udyingstay ityay orfay 1 inutemay. Youyay ancay eatecray ayay ermanentpay eleportationtay irclecay ybay astingcay isthay ellspay inyay ethay amesay ocationlay everyyay ayday orfay oneyay yearyay. 
 Youyay eednay otnay useyay ethay irclecay otay eleporttay whenyay youyay astcay ethay ellspay inyay isthay wayyay. Enser’stay  Oatingflay  Isk1st-levelday onjurationcay (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay opdray ofyay ercurymay) Urationday: 1 ourhay Isthay ellspay eatescray ayay ircularcay, orizontalhay aneplay ofyay orcefay,3 eetfay inyay iameterday andyay 1 inchyay ickthay, atthay oatsflay 3 eetfay aboveyay ethay oundgray inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay ofyay youryay oicechay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay iskday emainsray orfay ethay urationday, andyay ancay oldhay upyay otay 500 oundspay. 
 Ifyay oremay weightyay isyay acedplay onyay ityay, ethay ellspay endsyay, andyay everythingyay onyay ethay iskday allsfay otay ethay oundgray. Ethay iskday isyay immobileyay whileyay youyay areyay withinyay 20 eetfay ofyay ityay. 
 Ifyay youyay ovemay oremay anthay 20 eetfay awayyay omfray ityay, ethay iskday ollowsfay youyay osay atthay ityay emainsray withinyay 20 eetfay ofyay youyay. 
 Ityay ancay ovemay acrossyay unevenyay erraintay, upyay oryay ownday airsstay, opesslay andyay ethay ikelay, utbay ityay an’tcay osscray anyay elevationyay angechay ofyay 10 eetfay oryay oremay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ethay iskday an’tcay ovemay acrossyay ayay 10-oot-deepfay itpay, ornay ouldcay ityay eavelay uchsay ayay itpay ifyay ityay wasyay eatedcray atyay ethay ottombay. Ifyay youyay ovemay oremay anthay 100 eetfay omfray ethay iskday (ypicallytay ecausebay ityay an’tcay ovemay aroundyay anyay obstacleyay otay ollowfay youyay), ethay ellspay endsyay. Aumaturgythay Ansmutationtray antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay anifestmay ayay inormay wonderyay, ayay ignsay ofyay upernaturalsay owerpay, withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay eatecray oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay agicalmay effectsyay withinyay angeray:•  Youryay oicevay oomsbay upyay otay eethray imestay asyay oudlay asyay ormalnay orfay 1 inutemay.•  Youyay ausecay amesflay otay ickerflay, ightenbray, imday, oryay angechay olorcay orfay 1 inutemay.•  Youyay ausecay armlesshay emorstray inyay ethay oundgray orfay 1 inutemay.•  Youyay eatecray anyay instantaneousyay oundsay atthay originatesyay omfray ayay ointpay ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray, uchsay asyay ayay umbleray ofyay underthay, ethay ycray ofyay ayay avenray, oryay ominousyay whispersyay.•  Youyay instantaneouslyyay ausecay anyay unlockedyay oorday oryay win­dowyay otay yflay openyay oryay amslay utshay.•  Youyay alteryay ethay appearanceyay ofyay youryay eyesyay orfay 1 inutemay. Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay ultiplemay imestay, youyay ancay avehay upyay otay eethray ofyay itsyay 1-inutemay effectsyay activeyay atyay ayay imetay, andyay youyay ancay ismissday uchsay anyay effectyay asyay anyay actionyay. Ornthay  Whipyay  Ansmutationtray antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ethay emstay ofyay ayay antplay withyay ornsthay)  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay eatecray ayay onglay, ine-likevay whipyay overedcay inyay ornsthay atthay asheslay outyay atyay youryay ommandcay owardtay ayay eaturecray inyay angeray. 
 Akemay ayay eleemay ellspay attackyay againstyay ethay argettay. 
 Ifyay ethay attackyay itshay, ethay eaturecray akestay 1day6 iercingpay amageday, andyay ifyay ethay eaturecray isyay  Argelay oryay allersmay, youyay ullpay ethay eaturecray upyay otay 10 eetfay oserclay otay youyay. Isthay ell’sspay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day6 whenyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay (2day6), 11thay evellay (3day6), andyay 17thay evellay (4day6). Underousthay  Ite1st-levelsmay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ethay irstfay imetay youyay ithay withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay uringday isthay ell’sspay urationday, youryay weaponyay ingsray withyay underthay atthay isyay audibleyay withinyay 300 eetfay ofyay youyay, andyay ethay attackyay ealsday anyay extrayay 2day6 underthay amageday otay ethay argettay. 
 Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Ayay waveyay ofyay underousthay orcefay weepssay outyay omfray youyay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 15-ootfay ubecay originatingyay omfray youyay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ayay eaturecray akestay 2day8 underthay amageday andyay isyay ushedpay 10 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay eaturecray akestay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday andyay isn’tyay ushedpay. Inyay additionyay, unsecuredyay objectsyay atthay areyay ompletelycay withinyay ethay areayay ofyay effectyay areyay automaticallyyay ushedpay 10 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay ybay ethay ell’sspay effectyay, andyay ethay ellspay emitsyay ayay underousthay oombay audibleyay outyay otay 300 eetfay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Imetay  Op9th-levelstay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ieflybray opstay ethay owflay ofyay imetay orfay everyoneyay utbay yourselfyay. 
 Onay imetay assespay orfay otheryay eaturescray, whileyay youyay aketay 1day4 + 1 urnstay inyay ayay owray, uringday whichyay youyay ancay useyay actionsyay andyay ovemay asyay ormalnay. Isthay ellspay endsyay ifyay oneyay ofyay ethay actionsyay youyay useyay uringday isthay eriodpay, oryay anyyay effectsyay atthay youyay eatecray uringday isthay eriodpay, affectsyay ayay eaturecray otheryay anthay youyay oryay anyay objectyay eingbay wornyay oryay arriedcay ybay omeonesay otheryay anthay youyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay youyay ovemay otay ayay aceplay oremay anthay1,000 eetfay omfray ethay ocationlay whereyay youyay astcay ityay. Onguestay 3levelrdlay ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, May (ayay allsmay ayclay odelmay ofyay ayay igguratzay)  Urationday: 1 ourhay Isthay ellspay antsgray ethay eaturecray youyay ouchtay ethay abilityyay otay understandyay anyyay okenspay anguagelay ityay earshay. 
 Oreovermay, whenyay ethay argettay eaksspay, anyyay eaturecray atthay owsknay atyay eastlay oneyay anguagelay andyay ancay earhay ethay argettay understandsyay whatyay ityay ayssay. Ansporttray iavay  Ants6th-levelplay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 10 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 1 oundray Isthay ellspay eatescray ayay agicalmay inklay etweenbay ayay  Argelay oryay argerlay inanimateyay antplay withinyay angeray andyay anotheryay antplay, atyay anyyay istanceday, onyay ethay amesay aneplay ofyay existenceyay. 
 Youyay ustmay avehay eensay oryay ouchedtay ethay estinationday antplay atyay eastlay onceyay eforebay. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, anyyay eaturecray ancay epstay intoyay ethay argettay antplay andyay exityay omfray ethay estinationday antplay ybay usingyay 5 eetfay ofyay ovementmay. Eetray  Idestray 5levelthlay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay aingay ethay abilityyay otay enteryay ayay eetray andyay ovemay omfray insideyay ityay otay insideyay anotheryay eetray ofyay ethay amesay indkay withinyay 500 eetfay. 
 Othbay eestray ustmay ebay ivinglay andyay atyay eastlay ethay amesay izesay asyay youyay. 
 Youyay ustmay useyay 5 eetfay ofyay ovementmay otay enteryay ayay eetray. 
 Youyay instantlyyay owknay ethay ocationlay ofyay allyay otheryay eestray ofyay ethay amesay indkay withinyay 500 eetfay andyay, asyay artpay ofyay ethay ovemay usedyay otay enteryay ethay eetray, ancay eitheryay asspay intoyay oneyay ofyay osethay eestray oryay epstay outyay ofyay ethay eetray you’reyay inyay. 
 Youyay appearyay inyay ayay otspay ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay estinationday eetray, usingyay anotheryay 5 eetfay ofyay ovementmay. 
 Ifyay youyay avehay onay ovementmay eftlay, youyay appearyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay eetray youyay enteredyay. Youyay ancay useyay isthay ansportationtray abilityyay onceyay erpay oundray orfay ethay urationday. 
 Youyay ustmay endyay eachyay urntay outsideyay ayay eetray. Uetray  Olymorphpay 9levelthlay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay opdray ofyay ercurymay, ayay ollopday ofgumyay arabicyay, andyay ayay wispyay ofyay okesmay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 ourhay Oosechay oneyay eaturecray oryay onmagicalnay objectyay atthay youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay ansformtray ethay eaturecray intoyay ayay ifferentday eaturecray, ethay eaturecray intoyay anyay objectyay, oryay ethay objectyay intoyay ayay eaturecray (ethay objectyay ustmay ebay eithernay wornyay ornay arriedcay ybay anotheryay eaturecray). 
 Ethay ansformationtray astslay orfay ethay urationday, oryay untilyay ethay argettay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay oryay iesday. 
 Ifyay youyay oncentratecay onyay isthay ellspay orfay ethay ullfay urationday, ethay ansformationtray ecomesbay ermanentpay. Apechangersshay aren’tyay affectedyay ybay isthay ellspay. 
 Anyay unwillingyay eaturecray ancay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray, andyay ifyay ityay ucceedssay, ityay isn’tyay affectedyay ybay isthay ellspay. Eaturecray intoyay  Eaturecray. 
 Ifyay youyay urntay ayay eaturecray intoyay anotheryay indkay ofyay eaturecray, ethay ewnay ormfay ancay ebay anyyay indkay youyay oosechay whoseyay allengechay atingray isyay equalyay otay oryay esslay anthay ethay arget’stay (oryay itsyay evellay, ifyay ethay argettay oesn’tday avehay ayay allengechay atingray). 
 Ethay arget’stay amegay atisticsstay, includingyay entalmay abilityyay oresscay, areyay eplacedray ybay ethay atisticsstay ofyay ethay ewnay ormfay. 
 Ityay etainsray itsyay alignmentyay andyay ersonalitypay. Ethay argettay assumesyay ethay ithay ointspay ofyay itsyay ewnay ormfay, andyay whenyay ityay evertsray otay itsyay ormalnay ormfay, ethay eaturecray eturnsray otay ethay umbernay ofyay ithay ointspay ityay adhay eforebay ityay ansformedtray. 
 Ifyay ityay evertsray asyay ayay esultray ofyay oppingdray otay0 ithay ointspay, anyyay excessyay amageday arriescay overyay otay itsyay ormalnay ormfay. 
 Asyay onglay asyay ethay excessyay amageday oesn’tday educeray ethay eature’scray ormalnay ormfay otay 0 ithay ointspay, ityay isn’tyay ockedknay unconsciousyay. Ethay eaturecray isyay imitedlay inyay ethay actionsyay ityay ancay erformpay ybay ethay aturenay ofyay itsyay ewnay ormfay, andyay ityay an’tcay eakspay, astcay ellsspay, oryay aketay anyyay otheryay actionyay atthay equiresray andshay oryay eechspay unlessyay itsyay ewnay ormfay isyay apablecay ofyay uchsay actionsyay. Ethay arget’stay eargay eldsmay intoyay ethay ewnay ormfay. 
 Objectyay intoyay  Eaturecray. 
 Youyay ancay urntay anyay objectyay intoyay anyyay indkay ofyay eaturecray, asyay onglay asyay ethay eature’scray izesay isyay onay argerlay anthay ethay object’syay izesay andyay ethay eature’scray allengechay atingray isyay 9 oryay owerlay. 
 Ethay eaturecray isyay iendlyfray otay youyay andyay youryay ompanionscay. 
 Ityay actsyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay. 
 Youyay ecideday whatyay actionyay ityay akestay andyay owhay ityay ovesmay. 
 Ethay DMay ashay ethay eature’scray atisticsstay andyay esolvesray allyay ofyay itsyay actionsyay andyay ovementmay. Ifyay ethay ellspay ecomesbay ermanentpay, youyay onay ongerlay ontrolcay ethay eaturecray. 
 Ityay ightmay emainray iendlyfray otay youyay, ependingday onyay owhay youyay avehay eatedtray ityay. Eaturecray intoyay  Objectyay. 
 Ifyay youyay urntay ayay eaturecray intoyay anyay objectyay, ityay ansformstray alongyay withyay whateveryay ityay isyay wearingyay andyay arryingcay intoyay atthay ormfay. 
 Ethay eature’scray atisticsstay ecomebay osethay ofyay ethay objectyay, andyay ethay eaturecray ashay onay emorymay ofyay imetay entspay inyay isthay ormfay, afteryay ethay ellspay endsyay andyay ityay eturnsray otay itsyay ormalnay ormfay. Uetray  Esurrectionray 9levelthlay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 ourhay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inklespray ofyay olyhay wateryay andyay iamondsday worthyay atyay eastlay 25,000 gpay, whichyay ethay ellspay onsumescay) Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay ouchtay ayay eaturecray atthay ashay eenbay eadday orfay onay ongerlay anthay 200 yearsyay andyay atthay iedday orfay anyyay easonray exceptyay oldyay ageyay. 
 Ifyay ethay eature’scray oulsay isyay eefray andyay willingyay, ethay eaturecray isyay estoredray otay ifelay withyay allyay itsyay ithay ointspay. Isthay ellspay osesclay allyay woundsyay, eutralizesnay anyyay oisonpay, urescay allyay iseasesday, andyay iftslay anyyay ursescay affectingyay ethay eaturecray whenyay ityay iedday. 
 Ethay ellspay eplacesray amagedday oryay issingmay organsyay andyay imbslay. Ethay ellspay ancay evenyay ovidepray ayay ewnay odybay ifyay ethay originalyay onay ongerlay existsyay, inyay whichyay asecay youyay ustmay eakspay ethay eature’scray amenay. 
 Ethay eaturecray enthay appearsyay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay youyay oosechay withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay youyay. Uetray  Eeing6th-levelsay ivinationday Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (anyay ointmentyay orfay ethay eyesyay atthay ostscay 25 gpay; isyay ademay omfray ushroommay owderpay, affronsay, andyay atfay; andyay isyay onsumedcay ybay ethay ellspay) Urationday: 1 ourhay Isthay ellspay ivesgay ethay willingyay eaturecray youyay ouchtay ethay abilityyay otay eesay ingsthay asyay eythay actuallyyay areyay. 
 Orfay ethay urationday, ethay eaturecray ashay uesighttray, oticesnay ecretsay oorsday iddenhay ybay agicmay, andyay ancay eesay intoyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay, allyay outyay otay ayay angeray ofyay 120 eetfay. Uetray  Ikestray Ivinationday antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay  Omponentscay: Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 oundray Youyay extendyay youryay andhay andyay ointpay ayay ingerfay atyay ayay argettay inyay angeray. 
 Youryay agicmay antsgray youyay ayay iefbray insightyay intoyay etarget’sthay efensesday. 
 Onyay youryay extnay urntay, youyay aingay advantageyay onyay youryay irstfay attackyay ollray againstyay ethay argettay, ovidedpray atthay isthay ellspay asn’thay endedyay. Unami8th-leveltsay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray:  Ightsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 6 oundsray Ayay wallyay ofyay wateryay ingsspray intoyay existenceyay atyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay ancay akemay ethay wallyay upyay otay 300 eetfay onglay, 300 eetfay ighhay, andyay 50 eetfay ickthay. 
 Ethay wallyay astslay orfay ethay urationday. Whenyay ethay wallyay appearsyay, eachyay eaturecray withinyay itsyay areayay ustmay akemay ayay  Engthstray avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ayay eaturecray akestay 6day10 udgeoningblay amageday, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay. Atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay afteryay ethay wallyay appearsyay, ethay wallyay, alongyay withyay anyyay eaturescray inyay ityay, ovesmay 50 eetfay awayyay omfray youyay. 
 Anyyay  Ugehay oryay allersmay eaturecray insideyay ethay wallyay oryay whoseyay acespay ethay wallyay entersyay whenyay ityay ovesmay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Engthstray avingsay owthray oryay aketay 5day10 udgeoningblay amageday. 
Ayay eaturecray ancay aketay isthay amageday onlyyay onceyay erpay oundray. 
 Atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay urntay, ethay wall’syay eighthay isyay educedray ybay 50 eetfay, andyay ethay amageday eaturescray aketay omfray ethay ellspay onyay ubsequentsay oundsray isyay educedray ybay 1day10. 
 Whenyay ethay wallyay eachesray 0 eetfay inyay eighthay, ethay ellspay ends.Ayay eaturecray aughtcay inyay ethay wallyay ancay ovemay ybay wimmingsay. 
 Ecausebay ofyay ethay orcefay ofyay ethay waveyay, oughthay, ethay eaturecray ustmay akemay ayay uccessfulsay  Engthstray ( Athleticsyay) eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay inyay orderyay otay ovemay atyay allyay. 
 Ifyay ityay ailsfay ethay eckchay, ityay an’tcay ovemay. 
Ayay eaturecray atthay ovesmay outyay ofyay ethay areayay allsfay otay ethay oundgray. Unseenyay  Ervantsay 1levelstlay onjurationcay (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iecepay ofyay ingstray andyay ayay itbay ofyay woodyay) Urationday: 1 ourhay Isthay ellspay eatescray anyay invisibleyay, indlessmay, apelessshay orcefay atthay erformspay implesay askstay atyay youryay ommandcay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Ethay ervantsay ingsspray intoyay existenceyay inyay anyay unoccupiedyay acespay onyay ethay oundgray withinyay angeray. 
 Ityay ashay ACyay 10, 1 ithay ointpay, andyay ayay  Engthstray ofyay 2, andyay ityay an’tcay attackyay. 
 Ifyay ityay opsdray otay 0 ithay ointspay, ethay ellspay endsyay. Onceyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay asyay ayay onusbay actionyay, youyay ancay entallymay ommandcay ethay ervantsay otay ovemay upyay otay 15 eetfay andyay interactyay withyay anyay objectyay. 
 Ethay ervantsay ancay erformpay implesay askstay atthay ayay umanhay ervantsay ouldcay oday, uchsay asyay etchingfay ingsthay, eaningclay, endingmay, oldingfay othesclay, ightinglay iresfay, ervingsay oodfay, andyay ouringpay wineyay. 
 Ampiricvay  Ouchtay 3levelrdlay ecromancynay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ethay ouchtay ofyay youryay adow-wreathedshay andhay ancay iphonsay ifelay orcefay omfray othersyay otay ealhay youryay woundsyay. 
 Akemay ayay eleemay ellspay attackyay againstyay ayay eaturecray withinyay youryay eachray. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 3day6 ecroticnay amageday, andyay youyay egainray ithay ointspay equalyay otay alfhay ethay amountyay ofyay ecroticnay amageday ealtday. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, youyay ancay akemay ethay attackyay againyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay asyay anyay actionyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 4thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day6 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 3rday. Iciousvay  Ockerymay Enchantmentyay antripcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay unleashyay ayay ingstray ofyay insultsyay acedlay withyay ubtlesay enchantmentsyay atyay ayay eaturecray youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay ancay earhay youyay (oughthay ityay eednay otnay understandyay youyay), ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay aketay 1day4 ychicpsay amageday andyay avehay isadvantageday onyay ethay extnay attackyay ollray ityay akesmay eforebay ethay endyay ofyay itsyay extnay urntay. Isthay ell’sspay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day4 whenyay youyay eachray 5thay evellay (2day4), 11thay evellay (3day4), andyay 17thay evellay (4day4). Wallyay ofyay  Irefay 4levelthlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay iecepay ofyay osphorusphay)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Youyay eatecray ayay wallyay ofyay irefay onyay ayay olidsay urfacesay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay ancay akemay ethay wallyay upyay otay 60 eetfay onglay, 20 eetfay ighhay, andyay 1 ootfay ickthay, oryay ayay ingedray wallyay upyay otay 20 eetfay inyay iameterday, 20 eetfay ighhay, andyay 1 ootfay ickthay. 
 Ethay wallyay isyay opaqueyay andyay astslay orfay ethay urationday. Whenyay ethay wallyay appearsyay, eachyay eaturecray withinyay itsyay areayay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ayay eaturecray akestay 5day8 irefay amageday, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay. Oneyay idesay ofyay ethay wallyay, electedsay ybay youyay whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay, ealsday 5day8 irefay amageday otay eachyay eaturecray atthay endsyay itsyay urntay withinyay 10 eetfay ofyay atthay idesay oryay insideyay ethay wallyay. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay ethay amesay amageday whenyay ityay entersyay ethay wallyay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay endsyay itsyay urntay erethay. 
 Ethay otheryay idesay ofyay ethay wallyay ealsday onay amageday. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 5thay evellay oryay igherhay, ethay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 4thay. Wallyay ofyay  Orcefay 5levelthlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inchpay ofyay owderpay ademay ybay ushingcray ayay earclay emstonegay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Anyay invisibleyay wallyay ofyay orcefay ingsspray intoyay existenceyay atyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay wallyay appearsyay inyay anyyay orientationyay youyay oosechay, asyay ayay orizontalhay oryay erticalvay arrierbay oryay atyay anyay angleyay. 
 Ityay ancay ebay eefray oatingflay oryay estingray onyay ayay olidsay urfacesay. 
 Youyay ancay ormfay ityay intoyay ayay emisphericalhay omeday oryay ayay eresphay withyay ayay adiusray ofyay upyay otay 10 eetfay, oryay youyay ancay apeshay ayay atflay urfacesay ademay upyay ofyay entay 10-oot-byfay- 10-ootfay anelspay. 
 Eachyay anelpay ustmay ebay ontiguouscay withyay anotheryay anelpay. 
 Inyay anyyay ormfay, ethay wallyay isyay 1/4 inchyay ickthay. Ityay astslay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ifyay ethay wallyay utscay oughthray ayay eature’scray acespay whenyay ityay appearsyay, ethay eaturecray isyay ushedpay otay oneyay idesay ofyay ethay wallyay (youryay oicechay whichyay idesay). Othingnay ancay ysicallyphay asspay oughthray ethay wallyay. 
 Ityay isyay immuneyay otay allyay amageday andyay an’tcay ebay ispelledday ybay ispelday agicmay. 
Ayay isintegrateday ellspay estroysday ethay wallyay instantlyyay, oweverhay. 
 Ethay wallyay alsoyay extendsyay intoyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay, ockingblay etherealyay aveltray oughthray ethay wallyay. Wallyay ofyay  Ice6th-levelyay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay iecepay ofyay quartzyay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay eatecray ayay wallyay ofyay iceyay onyay ayay olidsay urfacesay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay ancay ormfay ityay intoyay ayay emisphericalhay omeday oryay ayay eresphay withyay ayay adiusray ofyay upyay otay 10 eetfay, oryay youyay ancay apeshay ayay atflay urfacesay ademay upyay ofyay entay 10-oot-squarefay anelspay. 
 Eachyay anelpay ustmay ebay ontiguouscay withyay anotheryay anelpay. 
 Inyay anyyay ormfay, ethay wallyay isyay 1 ootfay ickthay andyay astslay orfay ethay urationday. Ifyay ethay wallyay utscay oughthray ayay eature’scray acespay whenyay ityay appearsyay, ethay eaturecray withinyay itsyay areayay isyay ushedpay otay oneyay idesay ofyay ethay wallyay andyay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray akestay 10day6 oldcay amageday, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay. Ethay wallyay isyay anyay objectyay atthay ancay ebay amagedday andyay usthay eachedbray. 
 Ityay ashay ACyay 12 andyay 30 ithay ointspay erpay 10-ootfay ectionsay, andyay ityay isyay ulnerablevay otay irefay amageday. 
 Educingray ayay 10-ootfay ectionsay ofyay wallyay otay 0 ithay ointspay estroysday ityay andyay eaveslay ehindbay ayay eetshay ofyay igidfray airyay inyay ethay acespay ethay wallyay occupiedyay. 
Ayay eaturecray ovingmay oughthray ethay eetshay ofyay igidfray airyay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray. 
 Atthay eaturecray akestay 5day6 oldcay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Wallyay ofyay  Onestay 5levelthlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay allsmay ockblay ofyay anitegray)  Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Ayay onmagicalnay wallyay ofyay olidsay onestay ingsspray intoyay existenceyay atyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay wallyay isyay 6 inchesyay ickthay andyay isyay omposedcay ofyay entay 10-oot-by-10-footfay anelspay. 
 Eachyay anelpay ustmay ebay ontiguouscay withyay atyay eastlay oneyay otheryay anelpay. 
 Alternativelyyay, youyay ancay eatecray 10-oot-by-20-footfay anelspay atthay areyay onlyyay 3 inchesyay ickthay. Ifyay ethay wallyay utscay oughthray ayay eature’scray acespay whenyay ityay appearsyay, ethay eaturecray isyay ushedpay otay oneyay idesay ofyay ethay wallyay (youryay oicechay). 
 Ifyay ayay eaturecray wouldyay ebay urroundedsay onyay allyay idessay ybay ethay wallyay (oryay ethay wallyay andyay anotheryay olidsay urfacesay), atthay eaturecray ancay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ityay ancay useyay itsyay eactionray otay ovemay upyay otay itsyay eedspay osay atthay ityay isyay onay ongerlay enclosedyay ybay ethay wallyay. Ethay wallyay ancay avehay anyyay apeshay youyay esireday, oughthay ityay an’tcay occupyyay ethay amesay acespay asyay ayay eaturecray oryay objectyay. Ethay wallyay oesn’tday eednay otay ebay erticalvay oryay estray onyay anyyay irmfay oundationfay. 
 Ityay ustmay, oweverhay, ergemay withyay andyay ebay olidlysay upportedsay ybay existingyay onestay. 
 Usthay, youyay ancay useyay isthay ellspay otay idgebray ayay asmchay oryay eatecray ayay ampray. Ifyay youyay eatecray ayay anspay eatergray anthay 20 eetfay inyay engthlay, youyay ustmay alvehay ethay izesay ofyay eachyay anelpay otay eatecray upportssay. Youyay ancay udelycray apeshay ethay wallyay otay eatecray enellationscray, attlementsbay, andyay osay onyay. Ethay wallyay isyay anyay objectyay ademay ofyay onestay atthay ancay ebay amagedday andyay usthay eachedbray. 
 Eachyay anelpay ashay ACyay 15 andyay 30 ithay ointspay erpay inchyay ofyay icknessthay. 
 Educingray ayay anelpay otay 0 ithay ointspay estroysday ityay andyay ightmay ausecay onnectedcay anelspay otay ollapsecay atyay ethay sdMsay iscretionday. Ifyay youyay aintainmay youryay oncentrationcay onyay isthay ellspay orfay itsyay wholeyay urationday, ethay wallyay ecomesbay ermanentpay andyay an’tcay ebay ispelledday. 
 Otherwiseyay, ethay wallyay isappearsday whenyay ethay ellspay endsyay. Wallyay ofyay  Orns6th-levelthay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay andfulhay ofyay ornsthay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 10 inutesmay Youyay eatecray ayay wallyay ofyay oughtay, iableplay, angledtay ushbray istlingbray withyay eedle-sharpnay ornsthay. 
 Ethay wallyay appearsyay withinyay angeray onyay ayay olidsay urfacesay andyay astslay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Youyay oosechay otay akemay ethay wallyay upyay otay 60 eetfay onglay, 10 eetfay ighhay, andyay 5 eetfay ickthay oryay ayay irclecay atthay ashay ayay 20-ootfay iameterday andyay isyay upyay otay 20 eetfay ighhay andyay 5 eetfay ickthay. 
 Ethay wallyay ocksblay inelay ofyay ightsay. Whenyay ethay wallyay appearsyay, eachyay eaturecray withinyay itsyay areayay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ayay eaturecray akestay 7day8 iercingpay amageday, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay ave.Asay eaturecray ancay ovemay oughthray ethay wallyay, albeityay owlyslay andyay ainfullypay. 
 Orfay everyyay 1 ootfay ayay eaturecray ovesmay oughthray ethay wallyay, ityay ustmay endspay 4 eetfay ofyay ovementmay. 
 Urthermorefay, ethay irstfay imetay ayay eaturecray entersyay ethay wallyay onyay ayay urntay oryay endsyay itsyay urntay erethay, ethay eaturecray ustmakemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Ityay akestay 7day8 ashingslay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 7thay evellay oryay igherhay, othbay ypestay ofyay amageday increaseyay ybay 1day8 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 6thay. Wardingyay  Ond2nd-levelbay abjurationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Ouchtay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay airpay ofyay atinumplay ingsray worthyay atyay eastlay 50 gpay eachyay, whichyay youyay andyay ethay argettay ustmay wearyay orfay ethay urationday) Urationday: 1 ourhay Isthay ellspay wardsyay ayay willingyay eaturecray youyay ouchtay andyay eatescray ayay ysticmay onnectioncay etweenbay youyay andyay ethay argettay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Whileyay ethay argettay isyay withinyay 60 eetfay ofyay youyay, ityay ainsgay ayay +1 onusbay otay ACyay andyay avingsay owsthray, andyay ityay ashay esistanceray otay allyay amageday. 
 Alsoyay, eachyay imetay ityay akestay amageday, youyay aketay ethay amesay amountyay ofyay amageday. Ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay youyay opdray otay 0 ithay ointspay oryay ifyay youyay andyay ethay argettay ecomebay eparatedsay ybay oremay anthay 60 eetfay. 
 Ityay alsoyay endsyay ifyay ethay ellspay isyay astcay againyay onyay eitheryay ofyay ethay onnectedcay eaturescray. 
 Youyay ancay alsoyay ismissday ethay ellspay asyay anyay actionyay. Wateryay  Eathing3rd-levelbray ansmutationtray (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay ortshay eedray oryay iecepay ofyay awstray)  Urationday: 24 ourshay Isthay ellspay antsgray upyay otay entay willingyay eaturescray youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray ethay abilityyay otay eathebray underwateryay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Affectedyay eaturescray alsoyay etainray eirthay ormalnay odemay ofyay espirationray. Wateryay  Walk3rd-levelyay ansmutationtray (itualray) Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay iecepay ofyay orkcay) Urationday: 1 ourhay Isthay ellspay antsgray ethay abilityyay otay ovemay acrossyay anyyay iquidlay urface—suchsay asyay wateryay, acidyay, udmay, owsnay, quicksandyay, oryay ava—aslay ifyay ityay wereyay armlesshay olidsay oundgray (eaturescray ossingcray oltenmay avalay ancay illstay aketay amageday omfray ethay eathay). 
 Youyay onjurecay ayay assmay ofyay ickthay, ickystay webbingyay atyay ayay ointpay ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray. 
 Ethay websyay illfay ayay 20-ootfay ubecay omfray atthay ointpay orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ethay websyay areyay ifficultday erraintay andyay ightlylay obscureyay eirthay areayay. Ifyay ethay websyay aren’tyay anchoredyay etweenbay wotay olidsay assesmay (uchsay asyay wallsyay oryay eestray) oryay ayeredlay acrossyay ayay oorflay, wallyay, oryay eilingcay, ethay onjuredcay webyay ollapsescay onyay itselfyay, andyay ethay ellspay endsyay atyay ethay artstay ofyay youryay extnay urntay. 
 Websyay ayeredlay overyay ayay atflay urfacesay avehay ayay epthday ofyay 5 eetfay. Eachyay eaturecray atthay artsstay itsyay urntay inyay ethay websyay oryay atthay entersyay emthay uringday itsyay urntay ustmay akemay ayay  Exterityday avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ethay eaturecray isyay estrainedray asyay onglay asyay ityay emainsray inyay ethay websyay oryay untilyay ityay eaksbray ee.Afray eaturecray estrainedray ybay ethay websyay ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay akemay ayay  Engthstray eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay. 
 Ifyay ityay ucceedssay, ityay isyay onay ongerlay estrainedray. Ethay websyay areyay ammableflay. 
 Anyyay 5-ootfay ubecay ofyay websyay exposedyay otay irefay urnsbay awayyay inyay 1 oundray, ealingday 2day4 irefay amageday otay anyyay eaturecray atthay artsstay itsyay urntay inyay ethay irefay. Weird9th-levelyay illusionyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay oneyay inutemay Awingdray onyay ethay eepestday earsfay ofyay ayay oupgray ofyay eaturescray, youyay eatecray illusoryyay eaturescray inyay eirthay indsmay, isiblevay onlyyay otay emthay. 
 Eachyay eaturecray inyay ayay 30-oot-radiusfay eresphay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ayay eaturecray ecomesbay ightenedfray orfay ethay urationday. 
 Ethay illusionyay allscay onyay ethay eature’scray eepestday earsfay, anifestingmay itsyay worstyay ightmaresnay asyay anyay implacableyay eatthray. 
 Atyay ethay artstay ofyay eachyay ofyay ethay ightenedfray eature’scray urnstay, ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay aketay 4day10 ychicpsay amageday. 
 Onyay ayay uccessfulsay avesay, ethay ellspay endsyay orfay atthay eaturecray. Windyay  Walk6th-levelyay ansmutationtray Astingcay  Imetay: 1 inutemay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (irefay andyay olyhay wateryay) Urationday: 8 ourshay Youyay andyay upyay otay entay willingyay eaturescray youyay ancay eesay withinyay angeray assumeyay ayay aseousgay ormfay orfay ethay urationday, appearingyay asyay wispsyay ofyay oudclay. 
 Whileyay inyay isthay oudclay ormfay, ayay eaturecray ashay ayay yingflay eedspay ofyay 300 eetfay andyay ashay esistanceray otay amageday omfray onmagicalnay weaponsyay. 
 Ethay onlyyay actionsyay ayay eaturecray ancay aketay inyay isthay ormfay areyay ethay  Ashday actionyay oryay otay evertray otay itsyay ormalnay ormfay. 
 Evertingray akestay 1 inutemay, uringday whichyay imetay ayay eaturecray isyay incapacitatedyay andyay an’tcay ovemay. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ayay eaturecray ancay evertray otay oudclay ormfay, whichyay alsoyay equiresray ethay 1-inutemay ansformationtray. Ifyay ayay eaturecray isyay inyay oudclay ormfay andyay yingflay whenyay ethay effectyay endsyay, ethay eaturecray escendsday 60 eetfay erpay oundray orfay 1 inutemay untilyay ityay andslay, whichyay ityay oesday afelysay. 
 Ifyay ityay an’tcay andlay afteryay 1 inutemay, ethay eaturecray allsfay ethay emainingray istanceday. Windyay  Wallyay 3levelrdlay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 120 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay inytay anfay andyay ayay eatherfay ofyay exoticyay originyay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ayay wallyay ofyay ongstray windyay isesray omfray ethay oundgray atyay ayay ointpay youyay oosechay withinyay angeray. 
 Youyay ancay akemay ethay wallyay upyay otay 50 eetfay onglay, 15 eetfay ighhay, andyay 1 ootfay ickthay. 
 Youyay ancay apeshay ethay wallyay inyay anyyay wayyay youyay oosechay osay onglay asyay ityay akesmay oneyay ontinuouscay athpay alongyay ethay oundgray. 
 Ethay wallyay astslay orfay ethay urationday. Whenyay ethay wallyay appearsyay, eachyay eaturecray withinyay itsyay areayay ustmay akemay ayay  Engthstray avingsay owthray. 
Ayay eaturecray akestay 3day8 udgeoningblay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Ethay ongstray windyay eepskay ogfay, okesmay, andyay otheryay asesgay atyay aybay. 
 Allsmay oryay allersmay yingflay eaturescray oryay objectsyay an’tcay asspay oughthray ethay wallyay. 
 Ooselay, ightweightlay aterialsmay oughtbray intoyay ethay wallyay yflay upwardyay. 
 Arrowsyay, oltsbay, andyay otheryay ordinaryyay ojectilespray aunchedlay atyay argetstay ehindbay ethay wallyay areyay eflectedday upwardyay andyay automaticallyyay issmay. 
( Ouldersbay urledhay ybay iantsgay oryay iegesay enginesyay, andyay imilarsay ojectilespray, areyay unaffectedyay.)  Eaturescray inyay aseousgay ormfay an’tcay asspay oughthray ityay. Wish9th-levelyay onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Wishyay isyay ethay ightiestmay ellspay ayay ortalmay eaturecray ancay astcay. 
 Ybay implysay eakingspay aloudyay, youyay ancay alteryay ethay eryvay oundationsfay ofyay ealityray inyay accordyay withyay youryay esiresday. Ethay asicbay useyay ofyay isthay ellspay isyay otay uplicateday anyyay otheryay ellspay ofyay 8thay evellay oryay owerlay. 
 Youyay on’tday eednay otay eetmay anyyay equirementsray inyay atthay ellspay, includingyay ostlycay omponentscay. 
 Ethay ellspay implysay akestay effectyay. Alternativelyyay, youyay ancay eatecray oneyay ofyay ethay ollowingfay effectsyay ofyay youryay oicechay:•  Youyay eatecray oneyay objectyay ofyay upyay otay 25,000 gpay inyay aluevay atthay isn’tyay ayay agicmay itemyay. 
300 eetfay inyay anyyay imensionday, andyay ityay appearsyay inyay anyay unoc­cupiedyay acespay youyay ancay eesay onyay ethay oundgray.•  Youyay allowyay upyay otay wentytay eaturescray atthay youyay ancay eesay otay egainray allyay ithay ointspay, andyay youyay endyay allyay effectsyay onyay emthay escribedday inyay ethay eatergray estorationray ellspay.•  Youyay antgray upyay otay entay eaturescray atthay youyay ancay eesay esis­tanceray otay ayay amageday ypetay youyay oosechay.•  Youyay antgray upyay otay entay eaturescray youyay ancay eesay immunityyay otay ayay inglesay ellspay oryay otheryay agicalmay effectyay orfay 8 ourshay. 
 Orfay instanceyay, youyay ouldcay akemay yourselfyay andyay allyay youryay om­panionscay immuneyay otay ayay ich’slay ifelay aindray attackyay.•  Youyay undoyay ayay inglesay ecentray eventyay ybay orcingfay ayay erollray ofyay anyyay ollray ademay withinyay ethay astlay oundray (includingyay youryay astlay urntay). 
 Ealityray eshapesray itselfyay otay accommodateyay ethay ewnay esultray. 
 Orfay exampleyay, ayay wishyay ellspay ouldcay undoyay anyay opponent’syay uccessfulsay avesay, ayay oe’sfay iticalcray ithay, oryay ayay iend’sfray ailedfay avesay. 
 Youyay ancay orcefay ethay erollray otay ebay ademay withyay advantageyay oryay isadvantageday, andyay youyay ancay oosechay whetheryay otay useyay ethay erollray oryay ethay originalyay ollray. Youyay ightmay ebay ableyay otay achieveyay omethingsay eyondbay ethay opescay ofyay ethay aboveyay examplesyay. 
 Atestay youryay wishyay otay ethay DMay asyay eciselypray asyay ossiblepay. 
 Ethay DMay ashay eatgray atitudelay inyay ulingray whatyay occursyay inyay uchsay anyay instanceyay; ethay eatergray ethay wishyay, ethay eatergray ethay ikelihoodlay atthay omethingsay oesgay wrongyay. 
 Isthay ellspay ightmay implysay ailfay, ethay effectyay youyay esireday ightmay onlyyay ebay artlypay achievedyay, oryay youyay ightmay uffersay omesay unforeseenyay onsequencecay asyay ayay esultray ofyay owhay youyay wordedyay ethay wishyay. 
 Orfay exampleyay, wishingyay atthay ayay illainvay wereyay eadday ightmay opelpray youyay orwardfay inyay imetay otay ayay eriodpay whenyay atthay illainvay isyay onay ongerlay aliveyay, effectivelyyay emovingray youyay omfray ethay amegay. 
 Imilarlysay, wishingyay orfay ayay egendarylay agicmay itemyay oryay artifactyay ightmay instantlyyay ansporttray youyay otay ethay esencepray ofyay ethay item’syay urrentcay owneryay. Ethay essstray ofyay astingcay isthay ellspay otay oducepray anyyay effectyay otheryay anthay uplicatingday anotheryay ellspay weakensyay youyay. 
 Afteryay enduringyay atthay essstray, eachyay imetay youyay astcay ayay ellspay untilyay youyay inishfay ayay onglay estray, youyay aketay 1day10 ecroticnay amageday erpay evellay ofyay atthay ellspay. 
 Isthay amageday an’tcay ebay educedray oryay eventedpray inyay anyyay wayyay. 
 Inyay additionyay, youryay  Engthstray opsdray otay 3, ifyay ityay isn’tyay 3 oryay owerlay alreadyyay, orfay 2day4 aysday. 
 Orfay eachyay ofyay osethay aysday atthay youyay endspay estingray andyay oingday othingnay oremay anthay ightlay activityyay, youryay emainingray ecoveryray imetay ecreasesday ybay 2 aysday. 
 Inallyfay, erethay isyay ayay 33 ercentpay ancechay atthay youyay areyay unableyay otay astcay wishyay everyay againyay ifyay youyay uffersay isthay essstray. Witchyay  Olt1st-levelbay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 30 eetfay Omponentscay: Vay, Say, May (ayay wigtay omfray ayay eetray atthay ashay eenbay uckstray ybay ightninglay) Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ayay eambay ofyay acklingcray, ueblay energyyay anceslay outyay owardtay ayay eaturecray withinyay angeray, ormingfay ayay ustainedsay arcyay ofyay ightninglay etweenbay youyay andyay ethay argettay. 
 Akemay ayay angedray ellspay attackyay againstyay atthay eaturecray. 
 Onyay ayay ithay, ethay argettay akestay 1day12 ightninglay amageday, andyay onyay eachyay ofyay youryay urnstay orfay ethay urationday, youyay ancay useyay youryay actionyay otay ealday 1day12 ightninglay amageday otay ethay argettay automaticallyyay. 
 Ethay ellspay endsyay ifyay youyay useyay youryay actionyay otay oday anythingyay elseyay. 
 Ethay ellalsospay endsyay ifyay ethay argettay isyay everyay outsideyay ethay ell’sspay angeray oryay ifyay ityay ashay otaltay overcay omfray youyay. Atyay  Igherhay  Evelslay. 
 Whenyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay usingyay ayay ellspay otslay ofyay 2nday evellay oryay igherhay, ethay initialyay amageday increasesyay ybay 1day12 orfay eachyay otslay evellay aboveyay 1stay. Wordyay ofyay  Ecall6th-levelray onjurationcay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 5 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay  Urationday:  Instantaneousyay Youyay andyay upyay otay ivefay willingyay eaturescray withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay youyay instantlyyay eleporttay otay ayay eviouslypray esignatedday anctuarysay. 
 Youyay andyay anyyay eaturescray atthay eleporttay withyay youyay appearyay inyay ethay earestnay unoccupiedyay acespay otay ethay otspay youyay esignatedday whenyay youyay eparedpray youryay anctuarysay (eesay elowbay). 
 Ifyay youyay astcay isthay ellspay withoutyay irstfay eparingpray ayay anctuarysay, ethay ellspay ashay onay effectyay. Youyay ustmay esignateday ayay anctuarysay ybay astingcay isthay ellspay withinyay ayay ocationlay, uchsay asyay ayay empletay, edicatedday otay oryay onglystray inkedlay otay youryay eityday. 
 Ifyay youyay attemptyay otay astcay ethay ellspay inyay isthay annermay inyay anyay areayay atthay isn’tyay edicatedday otay youryay eityday, ethay ellspay ashay onay effectyay. Wrathfulyay  Ite1st-levelsmay evocationyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 onusbay actionyay  Angeray:  Elfsay  Omponentscay: Vay Urationday:  Oncentrationcay, upyay otay 1 inutemay Ethay extnay imetay youyay ithay withyay ayay eleemay weaponyay attackyay uringday isthay ell’sspay urationday, youryay attackyay ealsday anyay extrayay 1day6 ychicpsay amageday. 
 Additionallyyay, ifyay ethay argettay isyay ayay eaturecray, ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ebay ightenedfray ofyay youyay untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, ethay eaturecray ancay akemay ayay  Wisdomyay eckchay againstyay youryay ellspay avesay DCay otay eelstay itsyay esolveray andyay endyay isthay ellspay. Onezay ofyay  Uth2nd-leveltray enchantmentyay Astingcay  Imetay: 1 actionyay  Angeray: 60 eetfay  Omponentscay: Vay, Say  Urationday: 10 inutesmay Youyay eatecray ayay agicalmay onezay atthay uardsgay againstyay eceptionday inyay ayay 15-oot-radiusfay eresphay enteredcay onyay ayay ointpay ofyay youryay oicechay withinyay angeray. 
 Untilyay ethay ellspay endsyay, ayay eaturecray atthay entersyay ethay ell’sspay areayay orfay ethay irstfay imetay onyay ayay urntay oryay artsstay itsyay urntay erethay ustmay akemay ayay  Arismachay avingsay owthray. 
 Onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, ayay eaturecray an’tcay eakspay ayay eliberateday ielay whileyay inyay ethay adiusray. 
 Youyay owknay whetheryay eachyay eaturecray ucceedssay oryay ailsfay onyay itsyay avingsay owthray. Anyay affectedyay eaturecray isyay awareyay ofyay ethay ellspay andyay ancay usthay avoidyay answeringyay questionsyay otay whichyay ityay wouldyay ormallynay espondray withyay ayay ielay. 
 Appendixyay Ayay:  Onditionscay•  Ethay armerchay ashay advantageyay onyay anyyay abilityyay eckchay otay interactyay ociallysay withyay ethay eaturecray. Eafenedday• Ayay eafenedday eaturecray an’tcay earhay andyay automaticallyyay ailsfay anyyay abilityyay eckchay atthay equiresray earing.CONDITIONShay ALTERyay Ayay EATURE’SCRay APABILITIESCay Iyay Anay arietyvay ofyay waysyay andyay ancay ariseyay asyay ayay esultray ofyay ayay ellspay, ayay assclay eaturefay, ayay onster’smay attackyay, oryay otheryay effectyay. 
 Invisibleyay•  Anyay invisibleyay eaturecray isyay impossibleyay otay eesay withoutyay ethay aidyay ofyay agicmay oryay ayay ecialspay ensesay. 
 Orfay ethay urposepay ofyay idinghay, ethay eaturecray isyay eavilyhay obscuredyay. 
 Ethay ea­ture’scray ocationlay ancay ebay etectedday ybay anyyay oisenay ityay akesmay oryay anyyay ackstray ityay eaveslay.•  Attackyay ollsray againstyay ethay eaturecray avehay isadvantageday, andyay ethay eature’scray attackyay ollsray avehay advantageyay. Aralyzedpay• Ayay aralyzedpay eaturecray isyay incapacitatedyay (eesay ethay ondi­tioncay) andyay an’tcay ovemay oryay eakspay.•  Ethay eaturecray automaticallyyay ailsfay  Engthstray andyay  Exterityday avingsay owsthray.•  Attackyay ollsray againstyay ethay eaturecray avehay advantageyay.•  Anyyay attackyay atthay itshay ethay eaturecray isyay ayay iticalcray ithay ifyay ethay attackeryay isyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay eaturecray. Etrifiedpay• Ayay etrifiedpay eaturecray isyay ansformedtray, alongyay withyay anyyay onmagicalnay objectyay ityay isyay wearingyay oryay arryingcay, intoyay ayay olidsay inanimateyay ubstancesay (usuallyyay onestay). 
 Itsyay weightyay increasesyay ybay ayay actorfay ofyay entay, andyay ityay easescay agingyay.•  Ethay eaturecray isyay incapacitatedyay (eesay ethay onditioncay), an’tcay ovemay oryay eakspay, andyay isyay unawareyay ofyay itsyay urroundingssay.•  Attackyay ollsray againstyay ethay eaturecray avehay advantageyay.•  Ethay eaturecray automaticallyyay ailsfay  Engthstray andyay  Exterityday avingsay owsthray.•  Ethay eaturecray ashay esistanceray otay allyay amageday.•  Ethay eaturecray isyay immuneyay otay oisonpay andyay iseaseday, althoughyay ayay oisonpay oryay iseaseday alreadyyay inyay itsyay ystemsay isyay uspendedsay, otnay eutralizednay. Exhaustionyay Omesay ecialspay abilitiesyay andyay environmentalyay azardshay, uchsay asyay arvationstay andyay ethay ong-termlay effectsyay ofyay eezingfray oryay orchingscay emperaturestay, ancay eadlay otay ayay ecialspay onditioncay alledcay exhaustionyay. 
 Exhaustionyay isyay easuredmay inyay ixsay evelslay. 
 Anyay effectyay ancay ivegay ayay eaturecray oneyay oryay oremay evelslay ofyay exhaustionyay, asyay ecifiedspay inyay ethay effect’syay escriptionday. Evellay Effectyay1 Isadvantageday onyay abilityyay eckschay2 Eedspay alvedhay3 Isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray andyay avingsay owsthray4 Ithay ointpay aximummay alvedhay5 Eedspay educedray otay 06 Eathday Ifyay anyay alreadyyay exhaustedyay eaturecray ufferssay anotheryay effectyay atthay ausescay exhaustionyay, itsyay urrentcay evellay ofyay exhaustionyay increasesyay ybay ethay amountyay ecifiedspay inyay ethay effect’syay escription.Aday eaturecray ufferssay ethay effectyay ofyay itsyay urrentcay evellay ofyay exhaustionyay asyay wellyay asyay allyay owerlay evelslay. 
 Oisonedpay• Ayay oisonedpay eaturecray ashay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray andyay abilityyay eckschay. Onepray• Ayay onepray eature’scray onlyyay ovementmay optionyay isyay otay awlcray, unlessyay ityay andsstay upyay andyay erebythay endsyay ethay onditioncay.•  Ethay eaturecray ashay isadvantageday onyay attackyay ollsray.•  Anyay attackyay ollray againstyay ethay eaturecray ashay advantageyay ifyay ethay attackeryay isyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay eaturecray. 
 Appendixyay Bay:  Odsgay ofyay ethay  Ultiversemay ELIGIONRay ISyay ANyay IMPORTANTyay ARTPay OFyay IFELay Iyay Enthay worldsyay ofyay ethay DDDay ultiversemay. 
 Whenyay odsgay walkyay ethay worldyay, ericsclay annelchay ivineday owerpay, evilyay ultscay erformpay arkday acrificessay inyay ubterraneansay airslay, andyay iningshay aladinspay andstay ikelay eaconsbay againstyay ethay arknessday, it’syay ardhay otay ebay ambivalentyay aboutyay ethay eitiesday andyay enyday eirthay existenceyay. Anymay eoplepay inyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay worshipyay ifferentday odsgay atyay ifferentday imestay andyay ircumstancescay. 
 Eoplepay inyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray, orfay exampleyay, ightmay aypray otay  Unesay orfay ucklay inyay ovelay, akemay anyay offeringyay otay  Waukeenyay eforebay eadinghay otay ethay arketmay, andyay aypray otay appeaseyay  Alostay whenyay ayay everesay ormstay owsblay in—allyay inyay ethay amesay ayday. 
 Anymay eoplepay avehay ayay avoritefay amongyay ethay odsgay, oneyay whoseyay idealsyay andyay eachingstay eythay akemay eirthay ownyay. 
 Andyay ayay ewfay eoplepay edicateday emselvesthay entirelyyay otay ayay inglesay odgay, usuallyyay ervingsay asyay ayay iestpray oryay ampionchay ofyay atthay od’sgay idealsyay. Youryay DMay eterminesday whichyay odsgay, ifyay anyyay, areyay worshipedyay inyay ishay oryay erhay ampaigncay. 
 Omfray amongyay ethay odsgay availableyay, youyay ancay oosechay ayay inglesay eityday orfay youryay aracterchay otay ervesay, worshipyay, oryay aypay iplay ervicesay otay. 
 Oryay youyay ancay ickpay ayay ewfay atthay youryay aracterchay ayspray otay ostmay oftenyay. 
 Oryay ustjay akemay ayay entalmay otenay ofyay ethay odsgay whoyay areyay everedray inyay youryay sdMsay ampaigncay osay youyay ancay invokeyay eirthay amesnay whenyay appropriateyay. 
 Ifyay you’reyay ayingplay ayay ericclay oryay ayay aracterchay withyay ethay  Acolyteyay ackgroundbay, ecideday whichyay odgay youryay eityday ervessay oryay ervedsay, andyay onsidercay ethay eity’sday uggestedsay omainsday whenyay electingsay youryay aracter’schay omain.D&Dday  Antheonspay Eachyay worldyay inyay ethay DDDay ultiversemay ashay itsyay ownyay antheonspay ofyay eitiesday, angingray inyay izesay omfray ethay eemingtay antheonspay ofyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray andyay  Eyhawkgray otay ethay oremay ocusedfay eligionsray ofyay  Eberronyay andyay  Agonlancedray. 
 Anymay ofyay ethay onhumannay acesray worshipyay ethay amesay odsgay onyay ifferentday worldsyay— Oradinmay, orfay exampleyay, isyay everedray ybay warvesday ofyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray,  Eyhawkgray, andyay anymay otheryay worldsyay. Ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray Ozensday ofyay eitiesday areyay everedray, worshipedyay, andyay earedfay oughoutthray ethay worldyay ofyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray. 
 Atyay eastlay irtythay eitiesday areyay widelyyay ownknay acrossyay ethay  Ealmsray, andyay anymay oremay areyay worshipedyay ocallylay, ybay individualyay ibestray, allsmay ultscay, oryay ertaincay ectssay ofyay argerlay eligiousray emplestay. Ethay  Ifelay andyay  Eathday  Omainsday Anymay eitiesday inyay isthay ectionsay uggestsay ethay  Ifelay omainday, articularlypay ifyay eythay areyay oselyclay associatedyay withyay ealinghay, otectionpray, ildbirthchay, urturingnay, oryay ertilityfay. 
 Asyay escribedday inyay ethay apterchay 3, oughthay, ethay  Ifelay omainday isyay incrediblyyay oadbray, andyay ayay ericclay ofyay anyyay on-evilnay eityday ancay oosechay it.Ayay umbernay ofyay otheryay eitiesday, ostlymay evilyay onesyay, uggestsay ethay  Eathday omainday, whichyay isyay etailedday inyay ethay  Ungeonday  Aster’smay  Uidegay. 
 Ostmay ericsclay whoyay oosechay isthay omainday areyay evilyay NPay csay, utbay ifyay youyay wantyay otay worshipyay ayay odgay ofyay eathday, onsultcay youryay  Ungeonday  Astermay. Eyhawkgray Ethay odsgay ofyay  Eyhawkgray omecay omfray atyay eastlay ourfay ifferentday antheonspay, epresentingray ethay aithsfay ofyay ethay ariousvay ethnicyay oupsgray atthay opulatedpay ethay ontinentcay ofyay  Oerikyay overyay ethay agesyay. 
 Asyay ayay esultray, ere’sthay ayay eatgray ealday ofyay overlapyay inyay eirthay ortfoliospay:  Elorpay isyay ethay  Anflay odgay ofyay ethay unsay andyay  Oltusphay isyay ethay  Oeridianyay unsay odgay, orfay exampleyay. Agonlancedray Ethay odsgay ofyay ethay worldyay ofyay  Ynnkray areyay eethray amiliesfay: evensay odsgay ofyay oodgay eadedhay ybay  Aladinepay andyay  Ishakalmay, evensay ofyay eutralitynay eadedhay ybay  Ileangay, andyay evensay ofyay evilyay eadedhay ybay  Akhisistay andyay  Argonnassay. 
 Esethay eitiesday avehay eenbay alledcay ybay anymay ifferentday amesnay andyay eldhay inyay aryingvay evelslay ofyay esteemyay ybay ifferentday eoplespay andyay ulturescay oughthray ethay world’syay istoryhay, utbay eythay areyay ethay onlyyay odsgay ofyay isthay worldyay— eirthay aceplay ixedfay inyay ethay arsstay asyay onstellationscay. Eberronyay Ethay worldyay ofyay  Eberronyay ashay anymay ifferentday eligionsray, utbay ethay ostmay importantyay evolvesray aroundyay ayay antheonpay alledcay ethay  Overeignsay  Osthay andyay eirthay alignmay adowshay, ethay  Arkday  Ixsay. 
 Ethay odsgay ofyay ethay  Overeignsay  Osthay areyay oughtthay otay avehay ominionday overyay everyyay aspectyay ofyay existenceyay, andyay otay eakspay withyay ayay unifiedyay oicevay. 
 Utbay ethay  Arkday  Ixsay areyay ethay imitivepray, oodyblay, andyay uelcray odsgay whoyay offeryay ayay issentingday oicevay. Eberron’syay otheryay eligionsray areyay eryvay ifferentday omfray ethay aditionaltray DDDay antheonspay. 
 Ethay onotheisticmay  Urchchay ofyay ethay  Ilversay  Ameflay isyay evotedday otay ightingfay againstyay evilyay inyay ethay worldyay, utbay aguedplay ybay orruptioncay inyay itsyay ownyay anksray. 
 Ethay ilosophyphay ofyay ethay  Oodblay ofyay  Olvay eachestay atthay ivinityday ieslay withinyay allyay ortalmay eingsbay andyay everesray ethay undeadyay whoyay avehay ecuredsay atthay immortalityyay. 
 Ariousvay admay ultscay areyay evotedday otay ethay emonsday andyay orrorshay imprisonedyay inyay  Eberron'syay  Underdarkyay (alledcay  Yberkhay, ethay  Agondray  Elowbay). 
 Ethay ollowersfay ofyay ethay  Athpay ofyay  Ightlay elievebay atthay ethay worldyay isyay eadinghay owardtay ayay oriousglay uturefay whereyay ethay adowsshay atthay oudclay isthay worldyay willyay ebay ansformedtray intoyay ightlay. 
 Andyay wotay elatedray ationsnay ofyay elvesyay evereray eirthay ancestralyay iritsspay: ethay  Undyingyay  Ourtcay, eservedpray asyay iritsspay oryay evenyay undeadyay ormsfay, andyay ethay orifiedglay  Iritsspay ofyay ethay  Astpay, ethay eatgray eroeshay ofyay ancientyay warsyay. Onhumannay  Eitiesday Ertaincay odsgay oselyclay associatedyay withyay onhumannay acesray areyay everedray onyay anymay ifferentday worldsyay, oughthay otnay alwaysyay inyay ethay amesay wayyay. 
 Ethay onhumannay acesray ofyay ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray andyay  Eyhawkgray areshay esethay eitiesday. Onhumannay acesray oftenyay avehay wholeyay antheonspay ofyay eirthay ownyay. 
 Esidesbay  Oradinmay, orfay exampleyay, ethay warfday odsgay includeyay  Oradin’smay wifeyay,  Erronarbay  Uesilvertray, andyay ayay umbernay ofyay otheryay odsgay oughtthay otay ebay eirthay ildrenchay andyay andchildrengray:  Abbathoryay,  Angeddinclay  Ilverbeardsay,  Ugmarenday  Ightmantlebray,  Umathoinday,  Ormgay  Ulthyngay,  Aelahay  Ightaxebray,  Arthammormay  Uinday,  Arindlarshay,  Ardthay  Arrhay, andyay  Ergadainvay.
