 Eitiesday ofyay  Eyhawkgray Eityday Alignmentyay Uggestedsay  Omainsday Ymbolsay Eorybay, oddessgay ofyay aturenay Nay Aturenay Eengray iskday Occobbay, odgay ofyay agicmay Nay Owledgeknay Eyeyay withinyay ayay entagrampay Elestiancay, odgay ofyay arsstay andyay wanderersyay Nay Owledgeknay Arcyay ofyay evensay arsstay insideyay ayay irclecay Ehlonnayay, oddessgay ofyay woodlandsyay NGay Ifelay,  Aturenay Unicornyay ornhay Erythnulyay, odgay ofyay envyyay andyay aughterslay ECay Waryay Oodblay opdray Arlanghnfhay, odgay ofyay orizonshay andyay aveltray NGay Owledgeknay,  Ickerytray Irclecay ossedcray ybay ayay urvedcay orizonhay inelay Eironeoushay, odgay ofyay ivalrychay andyay alorvay LGay Waryay Ightninglay oltbay Extorhay, odgay ofyay waryay andyay iscordday ELay Waryay Ixsay arrowsyay acingfay ownwardday inyay ayay anfay Ordkay, odgay ofyay athleticsyay andyay ortspay CGay Empesttay,  Waryay Ourfay earsspay andyay ourfay acesmay adiatingray outyay omfray ayay entralcay ointpay Incabulosyay, odgay ofyay agueplay andyay aminefay ENay Eathday Eptilianray eyeyay withyay ayay orizontalhay iamondday Istusyay, oddessgay ofyay atefay andyay estinyday Nay Owledgeknay Weaver'syay indlespay withyay eethray andsluzstray, odgay ofyay ainpay andyay oppressionyay ECay Eathday Inninggray umanhay ullskay Erullnay, odgay ofyay eathday ENay Eathday Ullskay withyay eitheryay ayay icklesay oryay ayay ythescay Obadyay- Aihay, odgay ofyay aturenay Nay Aturenay Oakyay eaflay andyay acornyay Olidammarayay, odgay ofyay evelryray CNay Ickerytray Aughinglay askmay Elorpay, odgay ofyay ethay unsay andyay ealinghay NGay Ifelay,  Ightlay Unsay Oltusphay, odgay ofyay ightlay andyay awlay LGay Ightlay Ilversay unsay oryay ullfay oonmay artiallypay eclipsedyay ybay ayay allersmay escentcray oonmay Alishazray, odgay ofyay illyay ucklay andyay insanityyay CNay Ickerytray Eethray onebay ate-castingfay icksstay Aoray, odgay ofyay eacepay andyay easonray LGay Owledgeknay Whiteyay earthay stay. 
 Ethay  Elticcay,  Egyptianyay,  Eekgray, andyay  Orsenay antheonspay areyay antasyfay interpretationsyay ofyay istoricalhay eligionsray omfray ouryay world’syay ancientyay imestay. 
 Eythay includeyay eitiesday atthay areyay ostmay appropriateyay orfay useyay inyay ayay DDDay amegay, ivorcedday omfray eirthay istoricalhay ontextcay inyay ethay ealray worldyay andyay unitedyay intoyay antheonspay atthay ervesay ethay eedsnay ofyay ethay amegay. Ethay  Elticcay  Antheonpay It’syay aidsay atthay omethingsay wildyay urkslay inyay ethay earthay ofyay everyyay oulsay, ayay acespay atthay illsthray otay ethay oundsay ofyay eesegay allingcay atyay ightnay, otay ethay whisperingyay windyay oughthray ethay inespay, otay ethay unexpectedyay edray ofyay istletoemay onyay anyay oak—andyay ityay isyay inyay isthay acespay atthay ethay  Elticcay odsgay wellday. 
 Eythay angspray omfray ethay ookbray andyay eamstray, eirthay ightmay eightenedhay ybay ethay engthstray ofyay ethay oakyay andyay ethay eautybay ofyay ethay woodlandsyay andyay openyay oormay. 
 Whenyay ethay irstfay oresterfay aredday utpay ayay amenay otay ethay acefay eensay inyay ethay olebay ofyay ayay eetray oryay ethay oicevay abblingbay inyay ayay ookbray, esethay odsgay orcedfay emselvesthay intoyay eingbay. Ethay  Elticcay odsgay areyay asyay oftenyay ervedsay ybay uidsdray asyay ybay ericsclay, orfay eythay areyay oselyclay alignedyay withyay ethay orcesfay ofyay aturenay atthay uidsdray evereray. Ethay  Eekgray  Antheonpay Ethay odsgay ofyay  Olympusyay akemay emselvesthay ownknay withyay ethay entlegay aplay ofyay wavesyay againstyay ethay oresshay andyay ethay ashcray ofyay ethay underthay amongyay ethay oud-enshroudedclay eakspay. 
 Ethay ickthay oar-infestedbay woodsyay andyay ethay eresay, olive-coveredyay illsideshay oldhay evidenceyay ofyay eirthay assingpay. 
 Everyyay aspectyay ofyay aturenay echoesyay withyay eirthay esencepray, andyay ey’vethay ademay ayay aceplay orfay emselvesthay insideyay ethay umanhay earthay, ootay. Ethay  Egyptianyay  Antheonpay Esethay odsgay areyay ayay youngyay ynastyday ofyay anyay ancientyay ivineday amilyfay, eirshay otay ethay ulershipray ofyay ethay osmoscay andyay ethay aintenancemay ofyay ethay ivineday inciplepray ofyay  A’at—themay undamentalfay orderyay ofyay uthtray, usticejay, awlay, andyay orderyay atthay utspay odsgay, ortalmay araohsphay, andyay ordinaryyay enmay andyay womenyay inyay eirthay ogicallay andyay ightfulray aceplay inyay ethay universeyay. Ethay  Egyptianyay antheonpay isyay unusualyay inyay avinghay eethray odsgay withyay ethay  Eathday omainday ofyay ifferentday alignmentsyay. 
udgesjay ethay oulssay ofyay ethay eadday. 
 Etsay isyay ayay aoticchay evilyay odgay ofyay urdermay, erhapspay estbay ownknay orfay illingkay ishay otherbray  Osirisyay. 
 Andyay  Ephthysnay isyay ayay aoticchay oodgay oddessgay ofyay ourningmay. 
 Usthay, althoughyay ostmay ericsclay ofyay ethay  Eathday omainday (oundfay inyay ethay  Ungeonday  Aster'smay  Uidegay) areyay illainousvay aracterschay, ericsclay whoyay ervesay  Anubisyay oryay  Ephthysnay eednay otnay ebay. Ethay  Orsenay  Antheonpay Whereyay ethay andlay ummetsplay omfray ethay owysnay illshay intoyay ethay icyyay ordsfjay elowbay, whereyay ethay ongboatslay awdray upyay onyay otay ethay eachbay, whereyay ethay aciersglay owflay orwardfay andyay etreatray withyay everyyay allfay andyay ing—thisspray isyay ethay andlay ofyay ethay  Ikingsvay, ethay omehay ofyay ethay  Orsenay antheonpay. 
 It’syay ayay utalbray imeclay, andyay oneyay atthay allscay orfay utalbray ivinglay. 
 Ethay warriorsyay ofyay ethay andlay avehay adhay otay adaptyay otay ethay arshhay onditionscay inyay orderyay otay urvivesay, utbay eythay aven’thay eenbay ootay wistedtay ythebay eedsnay ofyay eirthay environmentyay. 
 Ivengay ethay ecessitynay ofyay aidingray orfay oodfay andyay wealthyay, it’syay urprisingsay ethay ortalsmay urnedtay outyay asyay wellyay asyay eythay idday. 
 Eirthay owerspay eflectray ethay eednay esethay warriorsyay adhay orfay ongstray eadershiplay andyay ecisiveday actionyay. 
 Usthay, eythay eesay eirthay eitiesday inyay everyyay endbay ofyay ayay iverray, earhay emthay inyay ethay ashcray ofyay ethay underthay andyay ethay oomingbay ofyay ethay aciersglay, andyay ellsmay emthay inyay ethay okesmay ofyay ayay urningbay onghouselay. Ethay  Orsenay antheonpay includesyay wotay ainmay amiliesfay, ethay  Aesiryay (eitiesday ofyay waryay andyay estinyday) andyay ethay  Anirvay (odsgay ofyay ertilityfay andyay osperitypray). 
 Onceyay enemiesyay, esethay wotay amiliesfay areyay ownay oselyclay alliedyay againstyay eirthay ommoncay enemiesyay, ethay iantsgay (includingyay ethay odsgay  Urtursay andyay  Ymthray). 
 Appendixyay Cay:  Ethay  Anesplay ofyay  Existenceyay INCREDIBLYyay ASTVay ISyay ETHay OSMOSCay OFyay ETHay Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray amegay, whichyay eemstay withyay ayay ultitudemay ofyay worldsyay asyay wellyay asyay yriadmay alternateyay imensionsday ofyay ealityray, alledcay ethay anesplay ofyay existenceyay. 
 Ityay encompassesyay everyyay worldyay whereyay  Ungeonday  Astersmay unray eirthay adventuresyay, allyay withinyay ethay elativelyray undanemay ealmray ofyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay. 
 Eyondbay atthay aneplay areyay omainsday ofyay awray elementalyay attermay andyay energyyay, ealmsray ofyay urepay oughtthay andyay ethosyay, ethay omeshay ofyay emonsday andyay angelsyay, andyay ethay ominionsday ofyay ethay odsgay. Anymay ellsspay andyay agicmay itemsyay ancay awdray energyyay omfray esethay anesplay, ummonsay ethay eaturescray atthay wellday erethay, ommunicatecay withyay eirthay enizensday, andyay allowyay adventurersyay otay aveltray erethay. 
 Asyay youryay aracterchay achievesyay eatergray owerpay andyay igherhay evelslay, youyay ightmay undertakeyay ayay questyay otay escueray ayay iendfray omfray ethay orrifichay epthsday ofyay ethay  Abyssyay, oryay indfay yourselfyay oistinghay ayay ankardtay withyay ethay iendlyfray iantsgay ofyay  Ysgardyay. 
 Youyay ightmay walkyay onyay eetsstray ademay ofyay olidsay irefay oryay esttay youryay ettlemay onyay ayay attlefieldbay whereyay ethay allenfay areyay esurrectedray withyay eachyay awnday. Ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay Ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay isyay ethay exusnay whereyay ethay ilosophicalphay andyay elementalyay orcesfay atthay efineday ethay otheryay anesplay ollidecay inyay ethay umbledjay existenceyay ofyay ortalmay ifelay andyay undanemay attermay. 
 Allyay ethay worldsyay ofyay DDDay existyay withinyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay, akingmay ityay ethay artingstay ointpay orfay ostmay ampaignscay andyay adventuresyay. 
 Ethay estray ofyay ethay ultiversemay isyay efinedday inyay elationray otay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay. Ethay worldsyay ofyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay areyay infinitelyyay iverseday, orfay eythay eflectray ethay eativecray imaginationyay ofyay ethay Day msay whoyay etsay eirthay amesgay erethay, asyay wellyay asyay ethay ayersplay whoseyay eroeshay adventureyay erethay. 
 Eythay includeyay agic-wastedmay esertday anetsplay andyay island-dottedyay wateryay worldsyay, worldsyay whereyay agicmay ombinescay withyay advancedyay echnologytay andyay othersyay appedtray inyay anyay endlessyay  Onestay  Ageyay, worldsyay whereyay ethay odsgay walkyay andyay acesplay eythay avehay abandonedyay. Ethay est-knownbay worldsyay inyay ethay ultiversemay areyay ethay onesyay atthay avehay eenbay ublishedpay asyay officialyay ampaigncay ettingssay orfay ethay DDDay amegay overyay ethay yearsyay— Eyhawkgray,  Ackmoorblay,  Agonlancedray, ethay  Orgottenfay  Ealmsray,  Ystaramay,  Irthrightbay,  Arkday  Unsay, andyay  Eberronyay, amongyay othersyay. 
 Eachyay ofyay esethay worldsyay oastsbay itsyay ownyay astcay ofyay eroichay adventurersyay andyay emingschay illainsvay, itsyay ownyay ancientyay uinsray andyay orgottenfay artifactsyay, itsyay ownyay ungeonsday andyay itsyay ownyay agonsdray. 
 Utbay ifyay youryay ampaigncay akestay aceplay onyay oneyay ofyay esethay worldsyay, ityay elongsbay otay youryay —YoudMay ightmay imagineyay ityay asyay oneyay ofyay ousandsthay ofyay arallelpay ersionsvay ofyay ethay worldyay, whichyay ightmay ivergeday wildlyyay omfray ethay ublishedpay ersionvay. Aterialmay  Echoesyay Ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay isyay ayay ichlyray agicalmay aceplay, andyay itsyay agicalmay aturenay isyay eflectedray inyay ethay wotay anesplay atthay areshay itsyay entralcay aceplay inyay ethay ultiversemay. 
 Ethay  Eywildfay andyay ethay  Adowfellshay areyay arallelpay imensionsday occupyingyay ethay amesay osmologicalcay acespay, osay eythay areyay oftenyay alledcay echoyay anesplay oryay irrormay anesplay otay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay. 
 Ethay worldsyay andyay andscapeslay ofyay esethay anesplay irrormay ethay aturalnay worldyay ofyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay utbay eflectray osethay eaturesfay intoyay ifferentday orms—morefay arvelousmay andyay agicalmay inyay ethay  Eywildfay, istortedday andyay olorlesscay inyay ethay  Adowfellshay. 
 Whereyay ayay olcanovay andsstay inyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay, ayay ountainmay oppedtay withyay yscraper-sizedskay ystalscray atthay owglay withyay internalyay irefay owerstay inyay ethay  Eywildfay, andyay ayay aggedjay ockray outcroppingyay esemblingray ayay ullskay arksmay ethay otspay onyay ethay  Adowfellshay. Ethay  Eywildfay, alsoyay alledcay ethay  Aneplay ofyay  Aeriefay, isyay ayay andlay ofyay oftsay ightslay andyay wonderyay, ayay ountrycay ofyay ittlelay eoplepay withyay eatgray esiresday, ayay aceplay ofyay usicmay andyay eathday. 
 Ityay isyay ayay ealmray ofyay eternalyay wilighttay, withyay owslay anternslay obbingbay inyay ethay entlegay eezebray andyay ugehay irefliesfay uzzingbay oughthray ovesgray andyay ieldsfay. 
 Ethay yskay isyay alightyay withyay ethay adedfay olorscay ofyay ethay ettingsay, oryay erhapspay isingray, unsay. 
 Utbay, inyay actfay, ethay unsay evernay ulytray etssay oryay isesray; ityay emainsray ationarystay, uskyday andyay owlay inyay ethay yskay. 
 Awayyay omfray ethay ettledsay areasyay uledray ybay ethay  Eeliesay  Ourtcay, ethay andlay isyay ayay angletay ofyay arp-toothedshay amblesbray andyay yrupysay ens—perfectfay erritorytay orfay ethay  Unseelieyay otay unthay eirthay eypray. 
 Eyfay eaturescray, uchsay asyay osethay oughtbray otay ethay worldyay ybay onjurecay woodlandyay eingsbay andyay imilarsay ellsspay, wellday inyay ethay  Eywildfay. Ethay  Adowfellshay, alsoyay alledcay ethay  Aneplay ofyay  Adowshay, isyay ayay arklyday ightedlay imensionday, ayay worldyay ofyay ackblay andyay whiteyay whereyay olorcay ashay eenbay eachedlay omfray everythingyay. 
 Ityay isyay ayay aceplay ofyay oxictay arknessday atthay ateshay ethay ightlay, whereyay ethay yskay isyay ayay ackblay aultvay withyay eithernay unsay ornay arsstay. Ositivepay andyay  Egativenay  Anesplay Ikelay ayay omeday aboveyay ethay otheryay anesplay, ethay  Ositivepay  Aneplay isyay ethay ourcesay ofyay adiantray energyyay andyay ethay awray ifelay orcefay atthay uffusessay allyay ivinglay eingsbay, omfray ethay unypay otay ethay ublimesay. 
 Eyondbay ethay  Aterialmay Eyondbay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay, ethay ariousvay anesplay ofyay existenceyay areyay ealmsray ofyay ythmay andyay ysterymay. 
 Ey’rethay otnay implysay otheryay worldsyay, utbay ifferentday qualitiesyay ofyay eingbay, ormedfay andyay overnedgay ybay iritualspay andyay elementalyay inciplespray abstractedyay omfray ethay ordinaryyay worldyay. Anarplay  Aveltray Whenyay adventurersyay aveltray intoyay otheryay anesplay ofyay existenceyay, eythay areyay undertakingyay ayay egendarylay ourneyjay acrossyay ethay esholdsthray ofyay existenceyay otay ayay ythicmay estinationday whereyay eythay ivestray otay ompletecay eirthay questyay. 
 Uchsay ayay ourneyjay isyay ethay uffstay ofyay egendlay. 
 Avingbray ethay ealmsray ofyay ethay eadday, eekingsay outyay ethay elestialcay ervantssay ofyay ayay eityday, oryay argainingbay withyay anyay efreetiyay inyay itsyay omehay itycay willyay ebay ethay ubjectsay ofyay ongsay andyay orystay orfay yearsyay otay omecay. Aveltray otay ethay anesplay eyondbay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay ancay ebay accomplishedyay inyay wotay waysyay: ybay astingcay ayay ellspay oryay ybay usingyay ayay anarplay ortalpay. Ellsspay. 
Ayay umbernay ofyay ellsspay allowyay irectday oryay indirectyay accessyay otay otheryay anesplay ofyay existenceyay. 
 Aneplay iftshay andyay ategay ancay ansporttray adventurersyay irectlyday otay anyyay otheryay aneplay ofyay existenceyay, withyay ifferentday egreesday ofyay ecisionpray. 
 Etherealnessyay allowsyay adventurersyay otay enteryay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay andyay aveltray omfray erethay otay anyyay ofyay ethay anesplay ityay ouches—thetay  Adowfellshay, ethay  Eywildfay, oryay ethay  Elementalyay  Anesplay. 
 Andyay ethay astralyay ojectionpray ellspay etslay adventurersyay ojectpray emselvesthay intoyay ethay  Astralyay  Aneplay andyay aveltray otay ethay  Outeryay  Anesplay. Ortalspay. 
Ayay ortalpay isyay ayay eneralgay ermtay orfay ayay ationarystay interplanaryay onnectioncay atthay inkslay ayay ecificspay ocationlay onyay oneyay aneplay otay ayay ecificspay ocationlay onyay anotheryay. 
 Omesay ortalspay areyay ikelay oorwaysday, ayay earclay windowyay, oryay ayay ogfay- oudedshray assagepay, andyay implysay eppingstay oughthray ityay effectsyay ethay interplanaryay aveltray. 
 Othersyay areyay ocationslay— irclescay ofyay andingstay onesstay, oaringsay owerstay, ailingsay ipsshay, oryay evenyay wholeyay owns—thattay existyay inyay ultiplemay anesplay atyay onceyay oryay ickerflay omfray oneyay aneplay otay anotheryay inyay urntay. 
 Omesay areyay orticesvay, ypicallytay oiningjay anyay  Elementalyay  Aneplay withyay ayay eryvay imilarsay ocationlay onyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay, uchsay asyay ethay earthay ofyay ayay olcanovay (eadinglay otay ethay  Aneplay ofyay  Irefay) oryay ethay epthsday ofyay ethay oceanyay (otay ethay  Aneplay ofyay  Wateryay). Ansitivetray  Anesplay Ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay andyay ethay  Astralyay  Aneplay areyay alledcay ethay  Ansitivetray  Anesplay. 
 Eythay areyay ostlymay eaturelessfay ealmsray atthay ervesay imarilypray asyay waysyay otay aveltray omfray oneyay aneplay otay anotheryay. 
 Ellsspay uchsay asyay etherealnessyay andyay astralyay ojectionpray allowyay aracterschay otay enteryay esethay anesplay andyay aversetray emthay otay eachray ethay anesplay eyondbay. Ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay isyay ayay istymay, og-boundfay imensionday atthay isyay ometimessay escribedday asyay ayay eatgray oceanyay. 
 Itsyay oresshay, alledcay ethay  Orderbay  Etherealyay, overlapyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay andyay ethay  Inneryay  Anesplay, osay atthay everyyay ocationlay onyay osethay anesplay ashay ayay orrespondingcay ocationlay onyay ethay  Etherealyay  Aneplay. 
 Ertaincay eaturescray ancay eesay intoyay ethay  Orderbay  Etherealyay, andyay ethay eesay invisibilityyay andyay uetray eeingsay ellspay antgray atthay abilityyay. 
 Omesay agicalmay effectsyay alsoyay extendyay omfray ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay intoyay ethay  Orderbay  Etherealyay, articularlypay effectsyay atthay useyay orcefay energyyay uchsay asyay orcecagefay andyay wallofyay orcefay. 
 Ethay epthsday ofyay ethay aneplay, ethay  Eepday  Etherealyay, areyay ayay egionray ofyay wirlingsay istsmay andyay olorfulcay ogsfay. Ethay  Astralyay  Aneplay isyay ethay ealmray ofyay oughtthay andyay eamdray, whereyay isitorsvay aveltray asyay isembodiedday oulssay otay eachray ethay anesplay ofyay ethay ivineday andyay emonicday. 
 Ityay isyay ayay eatgray, ilverysay easay, ethay amesay aboveyay andyay elowbay, withyay wirlingsay wispsyay ofyay whiteyay andyay aygray eakingstray amongyay otesmay ofyay ightlay esemblingray istantday arsstay. 
 Erraticyay whirlpoolsyay ofyay olorcay ickerflay inyay idairmay ikelay inningspay oinscay. 
 Occasionalyay itsbay ofyay olidsay attermay ancay ebay oundfay erehay, utbay ostmay ofyay ethay  Astralyay  Aneplay isyay anyay endlessyay, openyay omainday. Inneryay  Anesplay Ethay  Inneryay  Anesplay urroundsay andyay enfoldyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay andyay itsyay echoesyay, ovidingpray ethay awray elementalyay ubstancesay omfray whichyay allyay ethay worldsyay wereyay ademay. 
 Ethay ourfay  Elementalyay  Anesplay— Airyay,  Earthyay,  Irefay, andyay  Wateryay— ormfay ayay ingray aroundyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay, uspendedsay withinyay ethay urningchay  Elementalyay  Aoschay. Atyay eirthay innermostyay edgesyay, whereyay eythay areyay osestclay otay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay (inyay ayay onceptualcay ifyay otnay ayay iterallay eographicalgay ensesay), ethay ourfay  Elementalyay  Anesplay esembleray ayay worldyay inyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay. 
 Ethay ourfay elementsyay inglemay ogethertay asyay eythay oday inyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay, ormingfay andlay, easay, andyay yskay. 
 Artherfay omfray ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay, oughthay, ethay  Elementalyay  Anesplay areyay othbay alienyay andyay ostilehay. 
 Erehay, ethay elementsyay existyay inyay eirthay urestpay orm—greatfay expansesyay ofyay olidsay earthyay, azingblay irefay, ystal-clearcray wateryay, andyay unsulliedyay airyay. 
 Esethay egionsray areyay ittle-knownlay, osay whenyay iscussingday ethay  Aneplay ofyay  Irefay, orfay exampleyay, ayay eakerspay usuallyyay eansmay ustjay ethay orderbay egionray. 
 Atyay ethay arthestfay extentsyay ofyay ethay  Inneryay  Anesplay, ethay urepay elementsyay issolveday andyay eedblay ogethertay intoyay anyay unendingyay umulttay ofyay ashingclay energiesyay andyay ollidingcay ubstancesay, ethay  Elementalyay  Aoschay. Outeryay  Anesplay Ifyay ethay  Inneryay  Anesplay areyay ethay awray attermay andyay energyyay atthay akesmay upyay ethay ultiversemay, ethay  Outeryay  Anesplay areyay ethay irectionday, oughtthay andyay urposepay orfay uchsay onstructioncay. 
 Accordinglyyay, anymay agessay eferray otay ethay  Outeryay  Anesplay asyay ivineday anesplay, iritualspay anesplay, oryay odlygay anesplay, orfay ethay  Outeryay  Anesplay areyay estbay ownknay asyay ethay omeshay ofyay eitiesday. Whenyay iscussingday anythingyay otay oday withyay eitiesday, ethay anguagelay usedyay ustmay ebay ighlyhay etaphoricalmay. 
 Eirthay actualyay omeshay areyay otnay iterallylay “acesplay” atyay allyay, utbay exemplifyyay ethay ideayay atthay ethay  Outeryay  Anesplay areyay ealmsray ofyay oughtthay andyay iritspay. 
 Asyay withyay ethay  Elementalyay  Anesplay, oneyay ancay imagineyay ethay erceptiblepay artpay ofyay ethay  Outeryay  Anesplay asyay ayay ortsay ofyay orderbay egionray, whileyay extensiveyay iritualspay egionsray ielay eyondbay ordinaryyay ensorysay experienceyay. Evenyay inyay osethay erceptiblepay egionsray, appearancesyay ancay ebay eceptiveday. 
 Initiallyyay, anymay ofyay ethay  Outeryay  Anesplay appearyay ospitablehay andyay amiliarfay otay ativesnay ofyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay. 
 Utbay ethay andscapelay ancay angechay atyay ethay whimsyay ofyay ethay owerfulpay orcesfay atthay ivelay onyay ethay  Outeryay  Anesplay. 
 Istanceday isyay ayay irtuallyvay eaninglessmay onceptcay onyay ethay  Outeryay  Anesplay. 
 Ethay erceptiblepay egionsray ofyay ethay anesplay oftenyay eemsay quiteyay allsmay, utbay eythay ancay alsoyay etchstray onyay otay whatyay eemssay ikelay infinityyay. 
 Ityay ightmay ebay ossiblepay otay aketay ayay uidedgay ourtay ofyay ethay  Inenay  Ellshay, omfray ethay irstfay ayerlay otay ethay inthnay, inyay ayay inglesay ay—ifday ethay owerspay ofyay ethay  Ellshay esireday ityay. 
 Oryay ityay ouldcay aketay weeksyay orfay avelerstray otay akemay ayay uelinggray ektray acrossyay ayay inglesay ayerlay. Ethay ostmay well-knownyay  Outeryay  Anesplay areyay ayay oupgray ofyay ixteensay anesplay atthay orrespondcay otay ethay eightyay alignmentsyay (excludingyay eutralitynay) andyay ethay adesshay ofyay istinctionday etweenbay emthay. Outeryay  Anesplay Outeryay  Aneplay Alignmentyay Ountmay  Elestiacay, ethay  Evensay  Eavenshay ofyay LGay Ytopiabay, ethay  Wintay  Aradisespay ofyay NGay, LGay Elysiumyay, ethay  Essedblay  Ieldsfay ofyay NGay Ethay  Eastlandsbay, ethay  Wildernessyay ofyay NGay, CGay Arboreayay, ethay  Olympianyay  Adesglay ofyay CGay Ysgardyay, ethay  Eroichay  Omainsday ofyay CNay, CGay Imbolay, ethay  Everyay- Angingchay  Aoschay ofyay CNay Andemoniumpay, ethay  Windsweptyay  Epthsday ofyay CNay, ECay Ethay  Abyssyay, ethay  Infiniteyay  Ayerslay ofyay ECay Arcericay, ethay  Arteriantay  Epthsday ofyay ENay, ECay Adeshay, ethay  Aygray  Wasteyay ofyay ENay Ehennagay, ethay  Eakblay  Eternityyay ofyay ENay, ELay Ethay  Inenay  Ellshay (ofyay  aator)LEBay Acheronyay, ethay  Infiniteyay  Attlefieldbay ofyay LNay, ELay Echanusmay, ethay  Ockworkclay  Irvananay ofyay LNay Arcadiayay, ethay  Eaceablepay  Ingdomskay ofyay LNay, LGay Ethay anesplay withyay omesay elementyay ofyay oodgay inyay eirthay aturenay areyay alledcay ethay  Upperyay  Anesplay. 
 Elestialcay eaturescray uchsay asyay angelsyay andyay egasipay wellday inyay ethay  Upperyay  Anesplay. 
 Anesplay withyay omesay elementyay ofyay evilyay areyay ethay  Owerlay  Anesplay. 
 Iendsfay uchsay asyay emonsday, evilsday, andyay yugolothsyay wellday inyay ethay  Owerlay  Anesplay. 
Ayay ane’splay alignmentyay isyay itsyay essenceyay, andyay ayay aracterchay whoseyay alignmentyay oesn’tday atchmay ethay ane’splay experiencesyay ayay ofoundpray ensesay ofyay issonanceday erethay. Whenyay ayay oodgay eaturecray isitsvay  Elysiumyay, orfay exampleyay, ityay eelsfay inyay unetay withyay ethay aneplay, utbay anyay evilyay eaturecray eelsfay outyay ofyay unetay andyay oremay anthay ayay ittlelay uncomfortableyay. Otheryay  Anesplay Existingyay omehowsay etweenbay oryay eyondbay ethay ownknay anesplay ofyay existenceyay areyay ayay arietyvay ofyay otheryay ealmsray. Igilsay andyay ethay  Outlandsyay Ethay  Outlandsyay isyay ethay aneplay etweenbay ethay  Outeryay  Anesplay, ayay aneplay ofyay eutralitynay, utbay otnay ethay eutralitynay ofyay othingnessnay. 
 Insteadyay ityay incorporatesyay ayay ittlelay ofyay everythingyay, eepingkay ityay allyay inyay ayay aradoxicalpay alance—simultaneouslybay oncordantcay andyay inyay oppositionyay. 
 Ityay isyay ayay oadbray egionray ofyay ariedvay erraintay, withyay openyay airiespray, oweringtay ountainsmay, andyay wistingtay, allowshay iversray, onglystray esemblingray anyay ordinaryyay worldyay ofyay ethay  Aterialmay  Aneplay. Ethay  Outlandsyay isyay ircularcay, ikelay ayay eatgray wheel—inyay actfay, osethay whoyay envisionyay ethay  Outeryay  Anesplay asyay ayay wheelyay ointpay otay ethay  Outlandsyay asyay oofpray, allingcay ityay ayay icrocosmmay ofyay eplanesthay. 
 Atthay argumentyay ightmay ebay ircularcay, oweverhay, orfay ityay isyay ossiblepay atthay ethay arrangementyay ofyay ethay  Outlandsyay inspiredyay ethay ideayay ofyay ethay  Eatgray  Wheelyay inyay ethay irstfay aceplay. Aroundyay ethay outsideyay edgeyay ofyay ethay irclecay, evenlyyay acedspay, areyay ethay ate-townsgay: ixteensay ettlementssay, eachyay uiltbay aroundyay ayay ortalpay eadinglay otay oneyay ofyay ethay  Outeryay  Anesplay. 
 Eachyay owntay aresshay anymay ofyay ethay aracteristicschay ofyay ethay aneplay whereyay itsyay ategay eadslay. Atyay ethay entercay ofyay ethay  Outlandsyay, ikelay ethay axleyay ofyay ethay anarplay wheelyay, ethay  Irespay ootsshay impossiblyyay ighhay intoyay ethay yskay. 
 Aboveyay isthay inthay eakpay oatsflay ethay ing-shapedray itycay ofyay  Igilsay, ethay  Itycay ofyay  Oorsday. 
 Isthay ustlingbay anarplay etropolismay oldshay ountlesscay ortalspay otay otheryay anesplay andyay worldsyay. Igilsay isyay ayay ader’stray itycay. 
 Oodsgay, erchandisemay, andyay informationyay omecay otay ityay omfray acrossyay ethay anesplay. 
 Erethay isyay ayay iskbray adetray inyay informationyay aboutyay ethay anesplay, inyay articularpay inyay ethay ommandcay wordsyay oryay itemsyay equiredray orfay ethay operationyay ofyay articularpay ortalspay. 
 Esethay ortalpay eyskay areyay ighlyhay oughtsay afteryay, andyay anymay avelerstray withinyay ethay itycay areyay ookinglay orfay ayay articularpay ortalpay oryay ayay ortalpay eykay otay allowyay emthay otay ontinuecay onyay eirthay wayyay. Emiplanesday Emiplanesday areyay allsmay extradimensionalyay acesspay withyay eirthay ownyay uniqueyay ulesray. 
 Eythay areyay iecespay ofyay ealityray atthay on’tday eemsay otay itfay anywhereyay elseyay. 
 Emiplanesday omecay intoyay eingbay ybay ayay arietyvay ofyay eansmay. 
 Omesay areyay eatedcray ybay ellsspay, uchsay asyay emiplaneday, oryay eneratedgay atyay ethay esireday ofyay ayay owerfulpay eityday oryay otheryay orcefay. 
 Eythay aymay existyay aturallynay, asyay ayay oldfay ofyay existingyay ealityray atthay ashay eenbay inchedpay offyay omfray ethay estray ofyay ethay ultiversemay, oryay asyay ayay abybay universeyay owinggray inyay owerpay. 
Ayay ivengay emiplaneday ancay ebay enteredyay oughthray ayay inglesay ointpay whereyay ityay ouchestay anotheryay aneplay. 
 Eoreticallythay, ayay aneplay iftshay ellspay ancay alsoyay arrycay avelerstray otay ayay emiplaneday, utbay ethay operpray equencyfray equiredray orfay ethay uningtay orkfay isyay extremelyyay ardhay otay acquireyay. 
 Ethay ategay ellspay isyay oremay eliableray, assumingyay ethay astercay owsknay ofyay ethay emiplaneday. Ethay  Arfay  Ealmray Ethay  Arfay  Ealmray isyay eyondbay ethay ownknay ultiversemay. 
 Inyay actfay, ityay ightmay ebay anyay entirelyyay eparatesay ultiversemay withyay itsyay ownyay ysicalphay andyay agicalmay awslay. 
 Whereyay aystray energiesyay omfray ethay  Arfay  Ealmray eaklay ontoyay anotheryay aneplay, ifelay andyay attermay areyay warpedyay andyay wistedtay intoyay alienyay apesshay atthay efyday ordinaryyay eometrygay andyay iologybay. Ethay entitiesyay atthay abideyay inyay ethay  Arfay  Ealmray areyay ootay alienyay orfay ayay ormalnay indmay otay acceptyay withoutyay amageday. 
 Itanictay eaturescray wimsay oughthray othingnessnay, eoccupiedpray withyay adnessmay. 
 Unspeakableyay ingsthay whisperyay awfulyay uthstray otay osethay whoyay areday istenlay. 
 Orfay ortalsmay, owledgeknay ofyay ethay  Arfay  Ealmray isyay ayay iumphtray ofyay indmay overyay ethay uderay oundariesbay ofyay attermay, acespay, andyay eventuallyyay anitysay. Erethay areyay onay ownknay ortalspay otay ethay  Arfay  Ealmray, oryay atyay eastlay onenay atthay areyay illstay iablevay. 
 Ancientyay elvesyay onceyay iercedpay ethay oundarybay ofyay eonsyay withyay ayay astvay ortalpay otay ethay  Arfay  Ealmray withinyay ayay ountainmay alledcay  Irestormfay  Eakpay, utbay eirthay ivilizationcay implodedyay inyay oodyblay errortay andyay ethay ortal’spay ocation—evenlay itsyay omehay world—isyay onglay- orgottenfay. 
 Appendixyay Day:  Eaturecray  Atisticsstay ELLSSPay ANDyay ASSCLay EATURESFay ALLOWyay ARACTERCHay Ostay ansformtray intoyay animalsyay, ummonsay eaturescray otay ervesay asyay amiliarsfay, andyay eatecray undeadyay. 
 Atisticsstay orfay uchsay eaturescray areyay oupedgray inyay isthay appendixyay orfay youryay onveniencecay. 
 Orfay informationyay onyay owhay otay eadray ayay atstay ockblay, eesay ethay  Onstermay  Anualmay. Atbay Inytay eastbay, unalignedyay Armoryay  Assclay 12  Ithay  Ointspay 1 (1day4-1) Eedspay 5 ftay., yflay 30 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay2 (-4) 15 (+2) 8 (-1)  2  (-4)  12  (+1) 4 (-3) Ensessay indsightblay 60 ftay., assivepay  Erceptionpay 11  Anguageslay — Allengechay 0 (10 XPay) Echolocationyay. 
 Whileyay ityay an’tcay earhay, ethay atbay ashay onay indsightblay. Eenkay  Earinghay. 
 Ethay atbay ashay advantageyay onyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay atthay elyray onyay earinghay. Actionsyay________________________________________________ Itebay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +0 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay eaturecray. 
 Ithay: 1 iercingpay amageday.  Ethay earbay ashay advantageyay onyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay atthay elyray onyay ellsmay. Actionsyay________________________________________________ Ultiattackmay. 
 Ethay earbay akesmay wotay attacksyay, oneyay withyay itsyay itebay andyay oneyay withyay itsyay awsclay. Itebay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +3 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. Ithay: 5 (1day6 + 2) iercingpay amageday. Awsclay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +3 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. 
 Ithay: 1 (2day4 + 2) ashingslay amageday. Oarbay Ediummay eastbay, unalignedyay Armoryay  Assclay 11 (aturalnay armoryay) Ithay  Ointspay 11 (2day8 + 2) Eedspay 40 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay13 (+1) 11 (+0) 12 (+1)   2 (-4)  9 (-1) 5 (-3) Ensessay assivepay  Erceptionpay 9  Anguageslay — Allengechay 1/4 (50 XPay) Argechay. 
 Ifyay ethay oarbay ovesmay atyay eastlay 20 eetfay aightstray owardtay ayay eaturecray ightray eforebay ittinghay ityay withyay ayay usktay attackyay, ethay argettay akestay anyay extrayay 3 (1day6) ashingslay amageday andyay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 11  Engthstray avingsay owthray oryay ebay ockedknay onepray. Elentlessray ( Echargesray afteryay ethay  Oarbay  Inishesfay ayay  Ortshay oryay  Onglay  Estray). 
 Ifyay ethay oarbay akestay amageday atthay educesray ityay otay 0 ithay ointspay, unlessyay ethay amageday isyay 7 oryay oremay oryay omfray ayay iticalcray ithay, ityay opsdray otay 1 ithay ointpay insteadyay. Actionsyay________________________________________________ Usktay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +3 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. Ithay: 4 (1day6 + 1) ashingslay amageday. Onstrictorcay  Akesnay Argelay eastbay, unalignedyay Armoryay  Assclay 12 Ithay  Ointspay 13 (2day10 + 2) Eedspay 30 ftay., wimsay 30 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay15 (+2) 14 (+2) 12 (+1)    1  (-5)   10  (+0) 3 (-4) Ensessay indsightblay 10 ftay., assivepay  Erceptionpay 10  Anguageslay — Allengechay 1/4 (50 XPay) Actionsyay_______________________________________ Itebay.

 Ithay: 5 (1day6 + 2) iercingpay amageday. Onstrictcay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +4 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay eaturecray. 
 Ithay: 6 (1day8 + 2) udgeoningblay amageday, andyay ethay argettay isyay appledgray. 
 Untilyay isthay applegray endsyay, ethay eaturecray isyay estrainedray, andyay ethay akesnay an’tcay onstrictcay anotheryay argettay. Ocodilecray Argelay eastbay, unalignedyay Armoryay  Assclay 12 (aturalnay armoryay) Ithay  Ointspay 19 (3day10 + 3) Eedspay 20 ftay., wimsay 30 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay15 (+2) 10 (+0) 13 (+1)   2  (-4)    10  (+0) 5 (-3) Illsskay  Ealthstay +2 Ensessay assivepay  Erceptionpay 10 Anguageslay — Allengechay 1/2 (100 XPay) Oldhay  Eathbray. 
 Ethay ocodilecray ancay oldhay itsyay eathbray orfay 15 inutesmay. Actionsyay______________________________________ Itebay.

 Untilyay isthay applegray endsyay, ethay argettay isyay estrainedray, andyay ethay ocodilecray an’tcay itebay anotheryay argettay. Ireday  Wolfyay Argelay eastbay, unalignedyay Armoryay  Assclay 14 (aturalnay armoryay) Ithay  Ointspay 37 (5day10 + 10) Eedspay 50 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay17 (+3)  15  (+2)  15  (+2) 3 (-4)  12  (+1)  7  (-2) Illsskay  Erceptionpay +3,  Ealthstay +4  Ensessay assivepay  Erceptionpay 13  Anguageslay — Allengechay 1 (200 XPay) Eenkay  Earinghay andyay  Ellsmay. 
 Ethay wolfyay ashay advantageyay onyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay atthay elyray onyay earinghay oryay ellsmay. Ackpay  Acticstay. 
 Ethay wolfyay ashay advantageyay onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay ayay eaturecray ifyay atyay eastlay oneyay ofyay ethay wolf'syay alliesyay isyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay eaturecray andyay isn’tyay incapacitatedyay. Actionsyay_______________________________________ Itebay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +5 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. Ithay: 10 (2day6 + 3) iercingpay amageday. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay ayay eaturecray, ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 13  Engthstray avingsay owthray oryay ebay ockedknay onepray. Ogfray Inytay eastbay, unalignedyay Armoryay  Assclay 11  Ithay  Ointspay 1 (1day4 - 1) Eedspay 20 ftay., wimsay 20 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay1 (-5) 13  (+1)  8  (-1) 1 (-5)   8  (-1) 3 (-4) Illsskay  Erceptionpay +1,  Ealthstay +3 Ensessay arkvisionday 30 ftay., assivepay  Erceptionpay 11 Anguageslay — Allengechay 0 (0 XPay) Amphibiousyay. 
 Ethay ogfray ancay eathebray airyay andyay wateryay. Andingstay  Eaplay. 
 Iantgay  Eagleyay Argelay eastbay, eutralnay oodgay Armoryay  Assclay 13 Ithay  Ointspay 26 (4day10 + 4) Eedspay 10 ftay., yflay 80 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay16 (+3) 17 (+3)  13  (+1) 8 (-1) 14 (+2) 10 (+0) Illsskay  Erceptionpay +4  Ensessay assivepay  Erceptionpay 14 Anguageslay  Iantgay  Eagleyay, understandsyay  Ommoncay utbay oesn'tday eakspay ityay  Allengechay 1 (200 XPay) Eenkay  Ightsay.

 Ethay eagleyay akesmay wotay attacksyay, oneyay withyay itsyay eakbay andyay oneyay withyay itsyay alonstay. Eakbay.

 Ithay: 6 (1day6 + 3) iercingpay amageday. Alonstay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +5 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. 
 Ithay: 10 (2day6 + 3) ashingslay amageday. Iantgay  Iderspay Argelay eastbay, unalignedyay Armoryay  Assclay 14 (aturalnay armoryay) Ithay  Ointspay 26 (4day10 + 4) Eedspay 30 ftay., imbclay 30 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay14 (+2) 16 (+3)  12 (+1) 2 (-4) 11 (+0) 4 (-3) Illsskay  Ealthstay +7 Ensessay indsightblay 10 ftay., arkvisionday 60 ftay., assivepay  Erceptionpay 10  Anguageslay — Allengechay 1 (200 XPay) Iderspay  Imbclay. 
 Ethay iderspay ancay imbclay ifficultday urfacessay, includingyay upsideyay ownday onyay eilingscay, withoutyay eedingnay otay akemay anyay abilityyay eckchay. Webyay  Ensesay. 
 Whileyay inyay ontactcay withyay ayay webyay, ethay iderspay owsknay ethay exactyay ocationlay ofyay anyyay otheryay eaturecray inyay ontactcay withyay ethay amesay webyay. Webyay  Walkeryay. 
 Ethay iderspay ignoresyay ovementmay estrictionsray ausedcay ybay webbingyay. Actionsyay_______________________________________ Itebay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +5 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay eaturecray. 
 Ithay: 7 (1day8 + 3) iercingpay amageday, andyay ethay argettay ustmay akemay ayay DCay 11  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray, akingtay 9 (2day8) oisonpay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. 
 Ifyay ethay oisonpay amageday educesray ethay argettay otay 0 ithay ointspay, ethay argettay isyay ablestay utbay oisonedpay orfay 1 ourhay, andyay aralyzedpay whileyay oisonedpay inyay isthay wayyay. Webyay ( Echargeray 5-6). 
 Angedray  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +5 otay ithay, angeray 30 ftay./60 ftay., oneyay eaturecray. 
 Ithay:  Ethay argettay isyay estrainedray ybay webbingyay. 
 Asyay anyay actionyay, ethay estrainedray argettay ancay akemay ayay DCay 12  Engthstray eckchay, urstingbay ethay webbingyay onyay ayay uccesssay. 
 Ethay webbingyay ancay alsoyay ebay attackedyay andyay estroyedday (ACyay 10; hpay 5; ulnerabilityvay otay irefay amageday; immunityyay otay udgeoningblay, oisonpay, andyay ychicpsay amageday). Awkhay ( Alconfay) Inytay eastbay, unalignedyay Armoryay  Assclay 13  Ithay  Ointspay 1 (1day4 - 1) Eedspay 10 ftay., yflay 60 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay5 (-3)   16  (+3)   8  (-1) 2 (-4)   14  (+2) 6 (-2) Illsskay  Erceptionpay +4  Ensessay assivepay  Erceptionpay 14  Anguageslay — Allengechay 0 (10 XPay) Eenkay  Ightsay. 
 Ethay awkhay ashay advantageyay onyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay atthay elyray onyay ightsay. Actionsyay_______________________________________ Alonstay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +5 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. 
 Ithay: 1 ashingslay amageday. Impyay Inytay iendfay (evilday, apechangershay), awfullay evilyay Armoryay  Assclay 13  Ithay  Ointspay 10 (3day4 + 3) Eedspay 20 ftay., yflay 40 ftay. 
(20 ftay. 
inyay atray ormfay; 20 ftay., yflay 60 ftay. 
inyay avenray ormfay; 20 ftay., imbclay 20 ftay. 
inyay iderspay orm)STRfay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay6 (-2)  17  (+3)  13  (+1) 11 (+0)  12  (+1) 14 (+2) Illsskay  Eceptionday +4,  Insightyay +3,  Ersuasionpay +4,  Ealthstay +5  Amageday  Esistancesray oldcay; udgeoningblay, iercingpay, andyay ashingslay omfray onmagicalnay weaponsyay atthay aren’tyay ilveredsay  Amageday  Immunitiesyay irefay, oisonpay  Onditioncay  Immunitiesyay oisonedpay  Ensessay arkvisionday 120 ftay., assivepay  Erceptionpay 11  Anguageslay  Infernalyay,  Ommoncay  Allengechay 1 (200 XPay) Apechangershay. 
 Ethay impyay ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay olymorphpay intoyay ethay eastbay ormfay ofyay ayay atray, ayay avenray, oryay ayay iderspay, oryay intoyay itsyay evilday ormfay. 
 Itsyay atisticsstay areyay ethay amesay inyay eachyay ormfay, althoughyay itsyay attackyay isyay ifferentday inyay omesay ofyay emthay. 
 Anyyay equipmentyay ityay arriescay isyay otnay ansformedtray. 
 Ifyay ainslay, ethay impyay evertsray otay itsyay evilday ormfay. Evil’sday  Ightsay. 
 Agicalmay arknessday oesn’tday impedeyay ethay imp’syay arkvisionday. Agicmay  Esistanceray. 
 Actionsyay_______________________________________ Ingstay ( Itebay inyay  Eastbay  Ormfay). 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +5 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay eaturecray. 
 Ithay: 5 (1day4 + 3) iercingpay amageday, andyay ethay argettay ustmay akemay onyay ayay DCay 11  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray, akingtay 10 (3day6) oisonpay amageday onyay ayay ailedfay avesay, oryay alfhay asyay uchmay amageday onyay ayay uccessfulsay oneyay. Invisibilityyay. 
 Ethay impyay urnstay invisibleyay untilyay ityay attacksyay oryay untilyay itsyay oncentrationcay endsyay. 
 Anythingyay ethay invisibleyay impyay isyay arryingcay oryay wearingyay isyay invisibleyay asyay onglay asyay ityay emainsray inyay ontactcay withyay ethay impyay. Ionlay Argelay eastbay, unalignedyay Armoryay  Assclay 12 Ithay  Ointspay 26 (4day10 + 4) Eedspay 50 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay17 (+3)  15  (+2)   13  (+1) 3 (-3)   12  (+1)    8  (-1) Illsskay  Erceptionpay +3,  Ealthstay +6  Ensessay assivepay  Erceptionpay 13  Anguageslay — Allengechay 1 (200 XPay) Eenkay  Ellsmay. 
 Ethay ionlay ashay advantageyay onyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay atthay elyray onyay ellsmay. Ockpay  Acticstay. 
 Ethay ionlay ashay advantageyay onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay ayay eaturecray ifyay atyay eastlay oneyay ofyay ethay ion’slay alliesyay isyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay eaturecray andyay isn’tyay incapacitatedyay. Ouncepay. 
 Ifyay ethay ionlay ovesmay atyay eastlay 20 eetfay aightstray owardtay ayay argettay ightray eforebay ittinghay ityay withyay ayay awclay attackyay, ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 13  Engthstray avingsay owthray oryay ebay ockedknay onepray. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay onepray, ethay ionlay ancay aketay ayay onusbay actionyay otay akemay oneyay itebay attackyay againstyay ityay. Unningray  Eaplay. 
 Asyay artpay ofyay itsyay ovementmay andyay afteryay ayay 10-ootfay unningray artstay, ethay ionlay ancay onglay umpjay upyay otay 25 eetfay. Actionsyay_______________________________________ Itebay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +5 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. Ithay: 7 (1day8 + 3) iercingpay amageday. Awclay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +5 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. Ithay: 6 (1day6 + 3) ashingslay amageday. Astiffmay Ediummay eastbay, unalignedyay Armoryay  Assclay 12  Ithay  Ointspay 5 (1day8 + 1) Eedspay 40 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay13 (+1)   14 (+2)    12  (+1)    3  (-4) 12 (+1)   7  (-2) Illsskay  Erceptionpay +3  Ensessay assivepay  Erceptionpay 13  Anguageslay — Allengechay 1/8 (25 XPay) Eenkay  Earinghay andyay  Ellsmay.

Ulemay Ediummay eastbay, unalignedyay Armoryay  Assclay 10  Ithay  Ointspay 11 (2day8 + 2) Eedspay 40 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay14 (+2)  10 (+0)  13  (+1)  2  (-4) 10 (+0)  5  (-3) Ensessay assivepay  Erceptionpay 10  Anguageslay — Allengechay 1/8 (25 XPay) Eastbay ofyay  Urdenbay. 
 Ethay ulemay isyay onsideredcay otay ebay ayay  Argelay animalyay orfay ethay urposepay ofyay eterminingday itsyay arryingcay apacitycay. Uresay- Ootedfay. 
 Wheneveryay ethay ulemay wouldyay ebay ockedknay onepray, ityay aysstay onyay itsyay eetfay ifyay ityay ucceedssay onyay ayay DCay 10  Exterityday avingsay owthray. Actionsyay_______________________________________ Ooveshay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +2 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. 
 Owlyay Inytay eastbay, unalignedyay Armoryay  Assclay 11  Ithay  Ointspay 1 (1day4 - 1) Eedspay 5 ftay., yflay 60 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay3 (-4) 13 (+1)  8  (-1) 2 (-4)  12  (+1)  7  (-2) Illsskay  Erceptionpay +3,  Ealthstay +3 Ensessay arkvisionday 120 ftay., assivepay  Erceptionpay 13 Anguageslay — Allengechay 0 (10 XPay) Ybyflay. 
 Ethay owlyay ovokespray onay opportunityyay attacksyay whenyay ityay iesflay outyay ofyay anyay enemy’syay eachray. Eenkay  Ightsay. 
 Ethay owlyay ashay advantageyay onyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay atthay elyray onyay ightsay. Actionsyay____________________________________________ Alonstay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +3 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. 
 Ithay: 1 ashingslay amageday. Antherpay Ediummay eastbay, unalignedyay Armoryay  Assclay 12  Ithay  Ointspay 13 (3day8) Eedspay 50 ftay., imbclay 40 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay14 (+2) 15 (+2)  10  (+0) 3 (-4)  14  (+2) 7 (-2) Illsskay  Erceptionpay +4,  Ealthstay +6  Ensessay assivepay  Erceptionpay 14  Anguageslay — Allengechay 1/4 (50 XPay) Eenkay  Ellsmay. 
 Ethay antherpay ashay advantageyay onyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay atthay elyray onyay ellsmay. Ouncepay. 
 Ifyay ethay antherpay ovesmay atyay eastlay 20 eetfay aightstray owardtay ayay eaturecray ightray eforebay ittinghay ityay withyay ayay awclay attackyay, ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 12  Engthstray avingsay owthray oryay ebay ockedknay onepray. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay onepray, ethay antherpay ancay aketay ayay onusbay actionyay otay akemay oneyay itebay attackyay againstyay ityay. Actionsyay____________________________________________ Itebay.

Eudodragonpsay Inytay agondray, eutralnay oodgay Armoryay  Assclay 13 (aturalnay armoryay) Ithay  Ointspay 7 (2day4 + 2) Eedspay 15 ftay., yflay 60 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay6 (-2) 15 (+2) 13 (+1)  10 (+0)  12  (+1)  10  (+0) Illsskay  Erceptionpay +3,  Ealthstay +4 Ensessay indsightblay 10 ftay., arkvisionday 60 ftay., assivepay  Erceptionpay 13  Anguageslay understandsyay  Ommoncay andyay  Aconicdray utbay oesn’tday eakspay  Allengechay 1/4 (50 XPay) Eenkay  Ensessay. 
 Ethay eudodragonpsay ashay advantageyay onyay  Wisdomyay ( Erceptionpay) eckschay atthay elyray onyay ightsay, earinghay, oryay ellsmay. Agicmay  Esistanceray. 
 Ethay eudodragonpsay ashay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay ellsspay andyay otheryay agicalmay effectsyay. Imitedlay  Elepathytay. 
 Ethay eudodragonpsay ancay ommunicatecay implesay ideasyay, emotionsyay, andyay imagesyay elepathicallytay withyay anyyay eaturecray withinyay 100 eetfay ofyay ityay atthay ancay understandyay ayay anguagelay. Actionsyay____________________________________________ Itebay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +4 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. Ithay: 4 (1day4 + 2) iercingpay amageday. Ingstay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +4 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay eaturecray. 
 Ithay: 4 (1day4 + 2) iercingpay amageday, andyay ethay argettay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 11  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray oryay ecomebay oisonedpay orfay 1 ourhay. 
 Quasityay Inytay endfay (emonday, apechangershay), aoticchay evilyay Armoryay  Assclay 13  Ithay  Ointspay 7 (3day4) Eedspay 40 ftay. 
(10 ftay., yflay 40 ftay. 
inyay atbay ormfay; 40 ftay., imbclay 40 ftay. 
inyay entipedecay ormfay; 40 ftay., wimsay 40 ftay. 
inyay oadtay orm)STRfay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay5 (-3) 17  (+3) 10  (+0)  7  (-2)  10 (+0)  10  (+0) Illsskay  Ealthstay +5 Amageday  Esistancesray oldcay, irefay, ightninglay; udgeoningblay, iercingpay, andyay ashingslay omfray onmagicalnay weaponsyay  Amageday  Immunitiesyay oisonpay  Onditioncay  Immunitiesyay oisonedpay  Ensessay arkvisionday 120 ftay., assivepay  Erceptionpay 10  Anguageslay  Abyssalyay,  Ommoncay  Allengechay 1 (200 XPay) Apechangershay. 
 Ethay quasityay ancay useyay itsyay actionyay otay olymorphpay intoyay ethay eastbay ormfay ofyay ayay atbay, entipedecay, oryay oadtay, oryay intoyay itsyay emonday ormfay. 
 Itsyay atisticsstay areyay ethay amesay inyay eachyay ormfay, althoughyay itsyay attackyay isyay ifferentday inyay omesay ofyay emthay. 
 Anyyay equipmentyay ityay arriescay isyay otnay ansformedtray. 
 Ifyay ainslay, ethay quasityay evertsray otay itsyay emonday ormfay. Agicmay  Esistanceray. 
 Ethay quasityay ashay advantageyay onyay avingsay owsthray againstyay ellsspay andyay otheryay agicalmay effectsyay. Actionsyay______________________________________ Awsclay ( Itebay inyay  Eastbay  Ormfay). 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +4 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. 
 Ithay: 5 (1day4 + 3) iercingpay amageday. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay ayay eaturecray, ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 10  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray oryay aketay 5 (2day4) oisonpay amageday andyay ecomebay oisonedpay orfay 1 inutemay. 
 Ethay eaturecray ancay epeatray ethay avingsay owthray atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay, endingyay ethay effectyay earlyyay onyay ayay uccesssay. Arescay (1/ Ayday). 
 Oneyay eaturecray ofyay ethay quasit’syay oicechay withinyay 20 eetfay ofyay ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 10  Wisdomyay avingsay owthray oryay ebay ightenedfray orfay 1 inutemay. 
 Ethay argettay ancay epeatray ethay avingsay owthray atyay ethay endyay ofyay eachyay ofyay itsyay urnstay, withyay isadvantageday ifyay ethay quasityay isyay withinyay inelay ofyay ightsay, endingyay ethay effectyay earlyyay onyay ayay uccesssay. Invisibilityyay. 
 Ethay quasityay urnstay invisibleyay untilyay ityay attacksyay oryay usesyay  Arescay, oryay untilyay itsyay oncentrationcay endsyay. 
 Anythingyay ethay invisibleyay quasityay isyay arryingcay oryay wearingyay isyay invisibleyay asyay onglay asyay ityay emainsray inyay ontactcay withyay ethay quasityay.  Ethay avenray ancay imicmay implesay oundssay ityay ashay eardhay, uchsay asyay ayay ersonpay whisperingyay, ayay abybay yingcray, oryay anyay animalyay itteringchay.

 Ethay arkshay ashay advantageyay onyay attackyay ollsray againstyay ayay eaturecray ifyay atyay eastlay oneyay ofyay ethay ark’sshay alliesyay isyay withinyay 5 eetfay ofyay ethay eaturecray andyay isn'tyay incapacitatedyay. Wateryay  Eathingbray.

Itespray Inytay eyfay, eutralnay oodgay Armoryay  Assclay 15 (eatherlay armoryay) Ithay  Ointspay 2 (1day4) Eedspay 10 ftay., yflay 40 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay3 (-4) 18 (+4) 10 (+0) 14 (+2) 13 (+1) 11 (+0) Illsskay  Erceptionpay +3,  Ealthstay +8 (ethay eckchay isyay ademay withyay isadvantageday ifyay ethay itespray isyay yingflay) Ensessay assivepay  Erceptionpay 13  Anguageslay  Ommoncay,  Elvishyay,  Ylvansay  Allengechay 1/4 (50 XPay) Actionsyay_______________________________________ Ongswordlay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +2 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. 
 Ithay: 1 ashingslay amageday. Ortbowshay. 
 Angedray  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +6 otay ithay, angeray 40 ftay./160 ftay., oneyay argettay. 
 Ithay: 1 iercingpay amageday. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay isyay ayay eaturecray, ityay ustmay ucceedsay onyay ayay DCay 10  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray oryay ecomebay oisonedpay orfay 1 inutemay. 
 Ifyay itsyay avingsay owthray esultray isyay 5 oryay owerlay, ethay argettay allsfay unconsciousyay orfay ethay amesay urationday, oryay untilyay ityay akestay amageday oryay anotheryay eaturecray usesyay anyay actionyay otay wakeyay ityay. Earthay  Ightsay. 
 Ethay itespray ouchestay ayay eaturecray andyay owsknay ethay eature’scray urrentcay emotionalyay atestay. 
 Ifyay ethay argettay ailsfay ayay DCay 10  Arismachay avingsay owthray, ethay itespray alsoyay owsknay ethay eature'scray alignmentyay. 
 Elestialscay, iendsfay, andyay undeadyay automaticallyyay ailfay ethay avingsay owthray. Invisibilityyay. 
 Ethay itespray urnstay invisibleyay untilyay ityay attacksyay oryay astscay ayay ellspay, oryay untilyay itsyay oncentrationcay endsyay. 
 Anythingyay ethay invisibleyay itespray isyay arryingcay oryay wearingyay isyay invisibleyay asyay onglay asyay ityay emainsray inyay ontactcay withyay ethay itespray. Ariantvay:  Warhorseyay  Armoryay Anyay armoredyay warhorseyay ashay anyay  Armoryay  Assclay asedbay onyay ethay ypetay ofyay ardingbay wornyay (eesay apterchay 5 orfay oremay informationyay onyay ardingbay).

Ombiezay Ediummay undeadyay, eutralnay evilyay Armoryay  Assclay 8 Ithay  Ointspay 22 (3day8 + 9) Eedspay 20 RftSTRay EXDay ONCay INTyay WISyay ACHay13 (+1) 6 (-2) 16 (+3) 3 (-4) 6 (-2) 5 (-3) Avingsay  Owsthray  Wisyay +0  Amageday  Immunitiesyay oisonpay  Onditioncay  Immunitiesyay oisonedpay  Ensessay arkvisionday 60 ftay., assivepay  Erceptionpay 8  Anguageslay understandsyay ethay anguageslay ityay ewknay inyay ifelay utbay an’tcay eakspay  Allengechay 1/4 (50 XPay) Undeadyay  Ortitudefay. 
 Ifyay amageday educesray ethay ombiezay otay 0 ithay ointspay, ityay ustmay akemay ayay  Onstitutioncay avingsay owthray withyay ayay DCay ofyay 5 + ethay amageday akentay, unlessyay ethay amageday isyay adiantray oryay omfray ayay iticalcray ithay. 
 Onyay ayay uccesssay, ethay ombiezay opsdray otay 1 ithay ointpay insteadyay. Actionsyay_______________________________________ Amslay. 
 Eleemay  Weaponyay  Attackyay: +3 otay ithay, eachray 5 ftay., oneyay argettay. 
 Appendixyay Eyay:  Inspirationalyay  Eadingray INSPIRATIONyay ORFay ALLyay OFyay ETHay ANTASYFay WORKyay Iyay AVHay Edoneyay emsstay irectlyday omfray ethay ovelay ymay atherfay owedshay whenyay Iyay wasyay ayay adlay, orfay ehay entspay anymay ourshay ellingtay emay oriesstay ehay ademay upyay asyay ehay wentyay alongyay, alestay ofyay oakedclay oldyay enmay whoyay ouldcay antgray wishesyay, ofyay agicmay ingsray andyay enchantedyay wordssay, oryay wickedyay orcererssay andyay auntlessday wordsmensay. 
... 
 Allyay ofyay usyay endtay otay etgay ampleyay elpingshay ofyay antasyfay whenyay weyay areyay eryvay youngyay, omfray airyfay alestay uchsay asyay osethay writtenyay ybay ethay  Othersbray  Immgray andyay  Andrewyay  Anglay. Isthay oftenyay eadslay otay eadingray ooksbay ofyay ythologymay, agingpay oughthray estiariesbay, andyay onsultationcay ofyay ompilationscay ofyay ethay ythsmay ofyay ariousvay andslay andyay eoplespay. 
 Uponyay uchsay ayay asebay Iyay uiltbay ymay interestyay inyay antasyfay, eingbay anyay avidyay eaderray ofyay allyay iencescay ictionfay andyay antasyfay iteraturelay incesay 1950. 
 Ethay ollowingfay authorsyay wereyay ofyay articularpay inspirationyay otay e.—Emay. 
 Arygay  Ygaxgay,  Ungeonday  Aster’smay  Uidegay (1979)Ayay eatgray ealday ofyay antasyfay iteraturelay ashay eenbay ublishedpay incesay ethay o-creatorcay ofyay  Ungeonsday &  Agonsdray wroteyay osethay wordsyay, includingyay eakthroughbray worksyay etsay inyay ethay aredshay worldsyay ofyay DDDay. 
 Ethay ollowingfay istlay includesyay  Ary’sgay originalyay istlay andyay omesay additionalyay worksyay atthay avehay inspiredyay ethay ame’sgay esignersday inyay ethay yearsyay incesay. Ahmedyay,  Aladinsay. 
 Onethray ofyay ethay  Escentcray  Oonmay. Alexanderyay,  Oydllay. 
 Ethay  Ookbay ofyay  Eethray andyay ethay estray ofyay ethay  Onicleschray ofyay  Ydainpray eriessay. Andersonyay,  Oulpay. 
 Ethay  Okenbray  Wordsay,  Ethay  Ighhay  Usadecray, andyay  Eethray  Eartshay andyay  Eethray  Ionslay. Anthonyyay,  Ierspay. 
 Itsplay  Infinityyay andyay ethay estray ofyay ethay  Apprenticeyay  Adeptyay eriessay. Augustayay,  Adylay  Egorygray. 
 Odsgay andyay  Ightingfay  Enmay. Earbay,  Elizabethyay. 
 Angeray ofyay  Ostsghay andyay ethay estray ofyay ethay  Eternalyay  Yskay ilogytray. Ellairsbay,  Ohnjay. 
 Ethay  Acefay inyay ethay  Ostfray. Ackettbray,  Eighlay. 
 Ethay  Estbay ofyay  Eighlay  Ackettbray,  Ethay  Onglay  Omorrowtay, andyay  Ethay  Wordsay ofyay  Iannonrhay. Ooksbray,  Errytay. 
 Ethay  Wordsay ofyay  Annarashay andyay ethay estray ofyay ethay  Annarashay ovelsnay. Ownbray,  Edricfray. 
 Allhay ofyay  Irrorsmay andyay  Whatyay  Admay  Universeyay. 
 Ulfinchbay,  Omasthay. 
 Ulfinch’sbay  Ythologymay. Urroughsbay,  Edgaryay  Iceray. 
 Atyay ethay  Earth’syay  Orecay andyay ethay estray ofyay ethay  Ellucidarpay eriessay,  Iratespay ofyay  Enusvay andyay ethay estray ofyay ethay  Enusvay eriessay, andyay Ayay  Incesspray ofyay  Arsmay andyay ethay estray ofyay ethay  Arsmay eriessay. Artercay,  Inlay. 
 Warrioryay ofyay  World’syay  Endyay andyay ethay estray ofyay ethay  World’syay  Endyay eriessay. Ookcay,  Englay. 
 Ethay  Ackblay  Ompanycay andyay ethay estray ofyay ethay  Ackblay  Ompanycay eriessay, eday  Ampcay, Lay. 
 Aguespray. 
 Ethay  Alliblefay  Iendfay andyay  Estlay  Arknessday  Allfay. 
eday  Ampcay, Lay. 
 Aguespray &  Etcherflay  Attpray. 
 Ethay  Ompleatcay  Enchanteryay andyay ethay estray ofyay ethay  Aroldhay  Eashay eriessay, andyay  Arneliancay  Ubecay. Erlethday,  Augustyay andyay PHPay. 
 Ovecraftlay. 
 Watchersyay outyay ofyay  Imetay. 
 Unsanyday,  Ordlay. 
 Ethay  Ookbay ofyay  Wonderyay,  Ethay  Essentialyay  Ordlay  Unsanyday  Ollectioncay,  Ethay  Odsgay ofyay  Eganapay,  Ethay  Ingkay ofyay  Elfland’syay  Aughterday,  Ordlay  Unsanyday  Ompendiumcay, andyay  Ethay  Wordsay ofyay  Welleranyay andyay  Otheryay  Alestay. Armerfay,  Ilipphay  Osejay. 
 Akermay ofyay  Universesyay andyay ethay estray ofyay ethay  Worldyay ofyay  Ierstay eriessay. Oxfay,  Ardnergay.
